title: HBO max review
review: This is a nice app filled with all your great shows and cartoon networks and original. My problem is I think you should have a skip intro button for the shows. It feels wonky having to do it manually all the time just to see the episodes

title: HBO max could be better
review: The app has some good content that I’ve enjoyed. My only problem is that the video connection is constantly interrupted which is very annoying and I have to watch everything  while it stops very 30 seconds. The app could definitely use some big fixes!

title: Poor download option
review: Using downloads to either save bandwidth or for use in poor signal area is a pain. Always try’s to run off stream. Even if you play from download screen still try’s to screen then stops to buffer. Need to turn off internet then start movie/ show and then turn internet back on to play download. Can be very dis functional.

title: AT&T user
review:
Edit: I changed this from a one star to a 4 star since it is now working!! Wish they had more of a variety to watch though!

Claims AT&T wireless users have this service but when I log in it says we don’t.. Customer Service can’t help either...

title: Literally refuses to use chromecast
review:
You can connect to the chromecast just fine, but for whatever reason, no matter the device you’re on, it just stops playing the video the moment you connect. So if you like looking at a purple screen, this is truly your app.

The shows are great and the app/website is ok though, so it’s fine overall I guess

title: Does not recognize iTunes credentials
review: To be sure, it is not clear if this is an Apple or HBO problem.  I have an HBO subscription via Apple.  both Apple and HBO indicate that this subscription will have access to HBO Max content.  When trying to log in though to the HBO Max app, I constantly get a “Can’t verify your subscription” error message.  It seems like others are having the same issue.  Would love to hear from somebody from HBO on how to solve for this.

title: FRIENDS!
review: They have friends in the US! Although I hate paying for subscriptions, HBO max has friends, and besides buying the dvds or using a vpn for Netflix, this is the only way to get friends that has worked for me. Thank you so much!

title: Can’t actually watch anything
review: Despite having constant access to the internet I cannot actually watch anything on the HBOMax app while using my laptop. Using the same account I can watch shows on my computer, but as soon as I try on my iPad it says that I am not connected to the internet, which I obviously am as I typically close out of the app and begin streaming shows with no issues on Netflix.

title: Disappointed
review: App/service in general is terrible across all platforms. With such a large library of content there needs to be better filter options when searching for movies and shows. Given that their library spans decades maybe have the ability to filter or sort by year or decade? Very disappointed that it feels like little effort went into the actual application.

title: Fix your downloads
review:
You cannot switch apps when downloading shows. If you do, you have to restart the download. Additionally it pauses the download if the lock screen comes on, so the only way to download is to spend a half hour sitting with the phone touching the screen the whole time. 

The rest is functional at least

title: Not service in all countries
review:
Hi, I am from South America and I really want to try this service of streaming because there is a show in danger called Infinity train and i loved this show from CN, but there are rumors that this show will be cancelled, so I want to give the support to the cartoon. 
But what do you expect about views if a lot of people CANT WATCH HBO MAX.
So please, launch HBO MAX in the rest of the countries and please dont cancel Infinity Train there are a lot of people giving support in social networks.

title: Frustrated
review: I am trying to rewatch some of my favorite okd series but when i go back later to watch another episode it does not start from where i left off. I just started season three of the wire. Went back to watch the next episode later in the day and it went right to season four.

title: Great titles
review: The only drawback with having such a vast collection of movies to choose from is that there is no feature available to save movies to watch later. You have to watch the movie you want as soon as you see it, and it’s too many others to choose from and remember.

title: I don't like the free features
review: I'm enjoying the shows on HBO. However, it tends to put me in the wrong episode I was previously watching. Also, when I have to search for the right episode, the app does not give me a skip button. I have to physically search for the show again to corw the list of episodes.

title: Dc all around
review: This is definitely for dc fans, it has all the dc movies and shows, it obviously has more but the Snyder cut coming for justice league and possibly more, this will if successful be the Disney plus of dc instead of marvel, very cool and hope this project progresses

title: Downloads don’t play
review: I love the content and download several episodes and movie to watch when I don’t have WiFi. Unfortunately playback is sporadic at best and often I can’t even get the app to open without an internet connection. That makes the download option a bit pointless.

title: Hey HBO Max I pre-purchased a year via website at reduced price...
review:
Can you please hurry up and get Roku support. It’s hard to watch on an iPhone when your tv is a Roku. It is 2020, I find it hard to believe that a media company like WarnerMedia would leave money on the table by not having all platforms available at launch. Forget about haggling over revenue at the moment and get Roku already. 
In our house it is only one TV with an Apple TV box is in the basement of the house. Out of five TV’s the remaining are all Roku. 

Content: 4/5 (Doctor Who 1-11, Teen Titans, etc)
App: 3/5 (interface is okay) 
Accessibility (availability): 2.5/5 
Final Score: 3/5

title: Selection of movies and shows are great.
review: The titles they offer are great but the mobile app when you stream through Chromecast isn’t HD. Everything is coming out in a 480p signal and it is not nice to look at. This needs fixing ASAP. And 4K HDR is a must chop chop HBO you guys have plenty money don’t skimp is out

title: New Support Only
review: They're not supporting a lot of Apple devices people use that can't get iOS 12. They have a lot of customers who use these devices. AT&T isn't thinking too well again lol. I'm also giving it 1 star because it doesn't work well on an iPhone 7+, which has the latest iOS version on it. There's always different problems with the app. I'm unable to watch anything, most of the time.

title: HBO’s targeted audience leaves out all non-English speaking ethnicities.
review: Subtitles don’t work and there is a poor choice in subtitle translation options like Spanish. Wouldn’t pay for this just on the language options alone if it wasn’t already free from my cable provider. Otherwise great selection. However please modernize.

title: It was all good until a week ago
review: I use to absolutely love this app! I would literally use the hbo max app everyday UNTIL it stop casting to my television. I thought I was having a problem myself until i went to my moms house and she was having he same issue! After Love Craft Country season finale i will be deleting the app until love craft country comes back on and i will delete again once it goes back off!

title: Won’t data stream
review: The app is nice but there’s some sort of bug that won’t let you watch anything using cellular data. I changed the setting to allow data streaming, rebooted the app, made sure it was turned on for all profiles. Kind of defeats the purpose if I can only watch at home.

title: I LOVE THE APP BUT.........
review: I love Hbo Max I binge watch everything!! My only problem is it is not supported by Roku I just brought a Roku even though I have cable because I was tired of having to use my Xbox to stream it. But.. UNFORTUNATELY Roku does not have Hbo Max this is a HUGEEE problem that they need to add!! PLEASE ADD Hbo Max to Roku!!

title: HBO GO WAS BETTER
review:
It’s really frustrating that you’ve killed off HBO GO .. all of my data from that app — my list, watched shows, etc., didn’t transfer to HBO MAX — Now it’s a PITA to find HBO specific stuff because HBO MAX is watered down with JUNK SHOWS!  Friends? Really? OMG!  HBO MAX is equally crappy on iOS & on Apple TV. 
I suggest adding the option to view HBO ONLY content. And you should’ve had the foresight to transfer lists etc. from HBO GO!

title: Horrible streaming experience
review: I love the content on this app, but hardly watch it because the streaming is constantly interrupted and the app fails.  It’s annoying, and I can’t get through one episode of a tv show without it shutting down.  I use chromecast for many other streaming services and I never have a problem.  Not pleased and most likely cancelling.

title: Apple TV version has major lip sync issues
review: When I watch any show (e.g. Perry Mason) there is terrible lip sync issues on our Apple TV 4K with Denon 1500 AVR and LG OLED.  I have no issues with Netflix, Disney+, or AT&T TV Now app playing HBO content.  It “only” happens with HBOMax.  I’m assuming developers are not experienced with streaming protocols and aren’t taking advantage of lip sync technologies.  Also, still can’t believe there is no 4K, Dolby Vision, or Atmos.  Feels so dated and broken.  Content producers should look elsewhere...

title: Good options, atrocious execution
review: I will never for the life of me understand why you would have a download option on shows if you are still going to require a consistent internet connection. Completely defeats the purpose of downloading if it still has to buffer ever couple minutes and kicks me out of my show 3 times. Take away the internet requirement for downloaded shows, seriously.

title: Piece of garbage
review: I have hbo max included in my ATT elite plan. It used to login fine. Now it logs in and has my name as the viewer for a split second and then jumps back to the login screen and makes me do it again. This repeats over and over. Really?  What’s the point of offering this stuff if it doesn’t work. Weeks have gone by and this still doesn’t work. I’m about ready to dump ATT and bring my $250 plus a month business to somebody else.

title: Offline Mode needs Internet
review: When you download a show to watch later when you won’t have internet, the app won’t load. You have have internet to get your downloaded show to start. Once started, you can lose internet, but if you change apps for a Second, you have to get internet again to start it.

title: Where’s Trutv section
review: It’s good but where the hell is the other sections like where’s the trutv section I want to see hardcore pawn and south beach tow where is it hbo max but anyways it’s a wonderful streaming experience i highly recommend it for fans of all of hbo

title: Can I get a Skip Intro Please!!!!
review:
The app is fairly decent across all platforms, I myself, have not had any issues. It did take me a second to navigate fluently but in the end it’s basically the same as, HBO Now, with minor changes in the selections.

Two words: Skip Intro.

title: Nice 👍
review: For the most part I love the new HBO MAX update,However I don’t like that my HBO NOW Watch List didn’t convert over so now I have to find all the movies and series again and re add them .smh!!! 🤦‍♂️ Great thing is they added things you can’t watch anywhere else so I’m very happy about that. I’m sure I’ll come back with a 5 star ⭐️ rate soon.

title: Been waiting for HBO Max and worth it
review: I LOVED HBO Now, but HBO Max takes it to a whole new level. Love the new interface. I love the new titles and the familiar ones. I’m a Game of Thrones addict but also love a plethora of other titles and genres and HBO Max is where it’s at. Worth every penny. 10/10 ❤️🙌🏼

title: Great app not so great search
review: The app and content are wonderful. This definitely seems like the long waited update to the HBO viewing experience. However, a lack of voice search in the Apple TV app makes finding specific shows kinda hard.

title: Downloads require internet to play?
review: I downloaded a movie for some travel, and  get ~30 minutes into before it says it is having trouble playing the video and to check my internet connection.  Why have download options just to then arbitrarily require internet to the play downloaded content?

title: Don’t listen to the 👎 reviews!
review: This app is awesome don’t listen to bad reviews listen to good reviews like this one! This app is one of the best apps ever I’m soo glad that I subscribed to this cause it’s worth it! Really it’s worth the money. Kinda well there are some bugs but they are really not that annoying🤷🏾‍♂️

title: Love the content but can’t abide the UI
review: Can’t turn off auto play so the next episode always starts unless you manually stop it. Not a huge issue until you try to select an earlier episode or skip ahead an episode and the option to do so is seemingly not available. As great as the content is, the UI is so bad I don’t think I’ll keep the subscription through the trial period, much less beyond.

title: Great app but i want this movie to be added please
review: So I’ve been watching the Teen Titans and i was wondering if the Teen Titans trouble in Tokyo movie could be added. Besides that idea of addition, the app has been really good. Amazing content.

title: good content, terrible app
review: The regular HBO app worked great but they decided to apparently switch to a whole new backend platform for hbo+ app.  A bit slower and wonky to navigate.   The screen casting is very glitchy...if your internet connection stumbles for a few seconds the app will lock up itself, my ipad, and my new vizio smartcast tv. some blame goes to apple for my new ipad having weak unstable wifi connections compared to my 20 other devices

title: Have any HBO staff ever seen Netflix
review: Clunky interface. Can’t skip repetitive show intro’s. If watching episode 1 can’t click forward to episode 2. Can’t jump forward during viewing. Always an ad for one of their shows. Main screen is clumsy, hard to find what you want to watch. I could go on and on. I am not that picky but compared to what has been out for years, this is bad. HBOMAX is a 1920 Ford and Netflix is a 2020 Tesla.

title: Cant wait for the update!!
review:
Love the content but the media player could use some real loving; for example
Theres no menu or option to tap to view other episodes or seasons.
Theres no way to see other episodes on continue watching on the app with out going to search. 
Theres no simple forward or rewinding by double tapping the sides

title: An “Okay” App.
review: Everything is okay about the app. There are problems like phone battery power drains out really fast, bugs at Series/ Movies Descriptions text and others. Plus Device Compatibility being really bad right now. But Entertainment wise it’s really good..

title: Please fix Parental Controls ASAP
review: The way parental controls works in the new app is really awful. You are basically in a do loop where you think you can update things via Manage Profiles - wrong!  Then when you try and play something that is blocked you are asked to change your parental controls PIN number which does nothing. Please look at how Netflix has implemented parental controls and switch to that.

title: Can’t log in
review:
Says my iPhone 8 isn’t supported, so why would it force download this app?? I can’t watch anything. 
Garbage company. I want my money back now.  

In response to the developer: my iPhone is updated to the newest version. I did several troubleshooting steps to try to figure this out and checking for an iOS update was literally the first thing I did. I got my money back so I don’t even care anymore.  Crap service.

title: This app is so frustrating
review:
Soo frustrating- the app can’t pick up where you left off and content that is “downloaded” isn’t. 
When downloaded items don’t play due to poor connection it kind of defeats the purpose of the download! It says the show is downloaded but won’t play without using data or WiFi. Don’t think I’ll keep this app unless that gets fixed soon! 

This app is so frustrating

title: What’s the point of this?
review:
Yet again, the app industry is colluding with the cell phone industry to push out useless new versions that just increase storage size and force people to upgrade their phones for more $$$. 

HBO NOW was completely fine. Why fix something if it’s not broken??? Are they that desperate to attract more clients with a purple logo instead of a black logo?

And of course the functionality is  substantially reduced. Great job HBO. What’s next ?

title: Great Launch, but....
review:
When I saw this new offering from HBO I was excited. They are the KING of Original content. Love the selection; finally I can stream Fresh Prince Lol! 

I use the platform via Chromecast and my IPhone X. The audio levels are soooo low. Even when adjusting the volume on the YV it’s still super low

title: New App Not Supported On Iphone
review: I was literally in the middle of a movie and had to pause. When I came back it had updated automatically to the HBO Max app (instead of HBO Now) and it wouldn’t work on my phone because it’s unsupported! So now I can’t even use my HBO now subscription on my own iPhone! This is ridiculous and terrible. We pay money for this service. Make it so that everyone can access their account on their phone.

title: Can no longer watch on my phone!
review: HBO Max did not make it clear that i would not be able to log in to the app with my HBO Now subscription. I do not have a working laptop and now I am paying $15 a month to not be able to access content on either my phone or my Roku. This inconvenience makes me not want to switch over to HBO Max because it doesn’t make any sense why my HBO Now account wouldn’t just transfer.

title: Frustrating
review: Am I the only one currently having connection issues? I’ve already updated but it’s still not fixed. Also while I was watching a show a message popped up that may phone carrier might charge me extra to use HBO max. What the hell. I am already being charged to have the subscription and I can’t use it on my tv because the app isn’t available on Roku. Can somebody fix this please.

title: What a Joke
review: Really HBO!  Really upset that we can’t watch hbo max on Roku. That’s the whole reason we bought it in first place. I don’t see how that’s even a thing. I’m paying for max and that’s what I expect to get.  Mostly bought it for the lord of the rings and Harry Potter . Can’t watch either.  Better get with Roku and get an update. Won’t wait long either.  Feels like we r always getting screwed one way or another. SO TIRED! Please fix this soon.

title: Content
review: I watch many shows on HBO and MAX, but I don’t like the one-sided political shows that are on HBO.  If I use this app, am I always going to see political hacks masquerading as entertainment?  I hope not.  As it is now, I just change  the programs.  I’m not a whiz kid with high tech so I shall see if the selection of streaming can compete with my fingers.🤓

title: Glitchy glitchy glitchy
review: The new update has made my app insanely glitchy. Video starts and stops at least 20-30 times, every couple minutes. The caption button closes out the video. It keeps disconnecting me on Chromecast. I can’t fast forward or rewind without the video pausing for a couple minutes, or skipping way too far ahead. I’ll skip to 2:00 and it displays 30 seconds. Just a hot mess.

title: Get over your issues with Roku.
review: I was so excited to see friends on the hbo Max app that I hopped right on subscribing. Only to find out you and Roku can’t come to an agreement so they can access the app. I don’t feel that I should drop a crap ton of money just to be able to use your app on an actual tv. Until you all can get that situated for the 100s of 1000s of Roku users, I’m not recommending it be downloaded or subscribed to!

title: Parental controls
review: I have had the app for one day and I’m so frustrated I’m already about to unsubscribe. I can not for the life of me figure out how to change parental controls. It won’t let me even watch shows like the Big Bang theory. And when I messaged hbo max about instructions and hey never got back to me. Several of my favorite shows are on here, but if this isn’t fixed very soon I am unsubscribing. Not impressed at all

title: Stoped working
review: The app stoped working on my phone. It now goes to the download offline screen and tells me I'm not connected to the Internet when i am and all my other apps and web browser work just fine. Also i wish there was more content i really love lovecraft country and doom patrol but wish more content like that was available.

title: Connection Errors All the time
review: Good selection, but some days the app simply won’t connect.  I can stream DTV just fine, but this app gives me consistent connection error messages and fails to connect and I can’t watch anything. Please auto reply with the canned answer that you appreciate my feedback and give me a worthless website to go to. Thanks

title: Voice search?!
review: How is it possible that the search on this new app doesn’t let you use Siri/voice search for the Apple TV option? I have to scroll through letters and it won’t even cause the Apple keyboard app to pop up on my phone to make the process easier. The old app had this so why are these features missing now??

title: Bad parental controls
review: You can set parent controls based on who is watching but once they’re set they can never change. I wanted to change the settings to allow TV PG so kiddos can watch loony tunes but the changes never stick. Additionally if I switch the profile to an adult I’m stuck with the same choices as the kids. This really limits HBO’s library for adults.

title: Poor Application
review: This app is so frustrating. We spend 30 minutes just trying to get it to work (always stuck in buffering) every single time we try watching an episode. So for every hour episode we spend 30 minutes trying to get it to just stream. Reading reviews clearly an ongoing issue they have no intentions of fixing. Cancelling subscription after this month.

title: Unreliable & no 4K
review: The app functions on 1 of 3 devices I’ve installed it on. So far, I’ve had sound issues on my smart TV. On the PS4 video playback stops after one episode of and you have to close the application and restart it to watch anything else. So far it has worked on my iPhone but I haven’t watched more than a minutes  worth of content on my phone so I had to give it another star by default.

title: Annoyed with HBO MAX
review: This new app is garbage to say the least. I have been a loyal customer of HBO Now for 8 years and never really had any issues with the app on my Apple devices or Samsung TVs until now. This app has missing content that was promised and the content that is readily accessible will not load properly. How do you get sound but no picture? There’s nothing wrong with my internet connection and a Mbps is top of the line.

title: Udderly Ridiculous
review: I am giving this a one star review. Because of you having to delete your account to get rid of your credit card information. That was saved on your account. It is ridiculous because I have subscribed to things that allow me to do the one payment for one month. And then get rid of my saved information. But besides that the staff I had called were cool and nice.

title: Buffering, Buffering, Buffering
review:
No other streaming service struggles so much!  We were so excited for all the content on HBO Max but now I am not sure it is worth it... If the buffering and slow streaming isn’t resolved I doubt we will continue to use

Also, whatever the issue with Roku is, get it resolved... it is stupid I have to go through the PS4 to watch!

title: Good service, still need to fix 5.1
review: All right since mid July, still no 5.1 surround fix for Chromecast. Was hoping they’d finally fix it and last weeks update. Apparently not. Come on HBO. Honestly 5.1 Audio is pretty much a standard get with the program

title: Great content, but...
review: Of course HBO has great content but it seems that HBO put very little effort into making a well-rounded video app. Also, they didn’t even have the app (the MAX version) ready to roll on all popular formats (Roku doesn’t even have the Max version available so I paid for for this app and I can’t even access what I was watching on my tablet on my tv).

title: Way behind the competition, fix the navigation and ui
review: A frustrating user experience just to do the basics of navigating multiple episodes / seasons. Watching an episode but want to select a different one in the series? No direct way to do so - instead you have to exit out, search for the show, and navigate to the episode.

title: Removed old app but this ain’t working
review: After an hour of updates and googling I have come to the conclusion that for some reason they removed the old App and directed me to download this instead and then it won’t work with my subscription... If you no longer want me as a customer HBO just say so, don’t make me spend an hour telling me to download an app and then when I use it have it tell me it won’t work.

title: DOES NOT WORK!
review: When trying to watch a show on my tv through my playstation, the shows get stuck on buffer and will not load! It makes trying to watch any series a very frustrating experience! Content is great but what is the point if it doesn’t work properly and you can’t watch it..... maybe you should call Netflix and ask them how to fix your streaming service!

title: Needs better navigation
review: It’s ridiculous how hard it is to watch a show sometimes. I like the content but I feel like it needs to be smoothed out. Feels too thrown together hoping the good content keeps it floating. Please fix this HBO. It would make a lot of people happier. I know I’m not the only one. Thanks.

title: Some Episodes of their TV series is not the original Language
review:
Doctor Who Season 6, Episode 1 is I think in Italian but the rest of them is in English 😂 needs a lot to improve but I'm happy Friends are here.

Also, season 7 episode 9. Hope they fix it

title: Volume needs work!!
review: The app could be so much better if I didn’t have to keep turning the volume up and down throughout watching movies/shows. One minute it’s blaring so loud I can’t stand it and the next it’s so low I cannot hear it. Please fix this issue or I will be cancelling my subscription.

title: Good But could use some fixes
review: It’s a great service with lots of choices, but a lot of the titles they had in their presentations are in fact not available yet. There needs to be more filters as well as user friendly controls and keyboard functionality for fast forwarding.

title: Worst app for streaming ever!!!
review: This has to be one of the worst streaming apps out there! First I have to unlock my phone just so the next episode of a series will play. The app crashes frequently therefore I’m unable to watch anything. Figured with all the money y’all have made over the years this would be a no brainer. I guess we’ll see if it will get better... May the odds forever be in your favor.

title: One star for App Store review..
review: I’m really excited when I heard rumors about HBO Max. I even talked my friend how much HBO Max gonna make impact among streaming services, decided to get annual subscription in early May. On the second thought, app experience comes to my mind. So I wait and turn out I’m right about that. Billion dollar company decided to put website in app which is crappy. Dear AT&T or WarnerMedia if you can’t afford a decent native app join Apple TV like HBO did

title: Has potential but not quite there yet
review: I love the selection of shows and movies at launch and I’m sure more original content is coming. It is however glitchy at times and I’m not getting audio from chromecast but works fine on phone and computer.

title: Really liking it
review: Ever since we lost hbo on fish I’ve been wanting to have it back and when I herd of this I knew I had to try it and I’m glad I did very nice selection of content to choose from and it’s just the beginning happy I preordered it before hand :)

title: Now vs. Max
review: So I’ve been forced to upgrade from Now to Max without a choice. That would be fine if it wasn’t for the fact that I’m now not allowed to use Max at all, so now I get the privilege of paying for something I can’t even access. Not only does it seem that AT&T and it’s CEO look to want to turn HBO into the same drivel as everything else, but seem to be doing it in the most ham-fisted way possible.

title: Good Content, Bad app
review: The app experience leave much to be desired. There’s no HDR support. The app is buggy, I often get an “you’re offline” error at random while watching. Content will often be pixelated or poor quality seemingly at random (I am on a 5G internet connection) and I do not have the same streaming quality issues on other apps.

title: App Doesn’t work
review: When I went to the app recently I was somehow logged out and whenever I try to log back in it says “we are having issues connecting to hbo max right now. Please try again.” It has been days not just once or twice, and no matter how many times I try again it says nothing different. I pay for a service I can’t use on all my devices...It’s frustrating.

title: Accessibility issues all over this app
review:
Accessibility does not seem to even be considered in this app. No menu, it does not work well with voiceover and audio description is not even a consideration. If Netflix and prime video can do it then why not HBO?
Visually impaired people watch streaming services all the time. Their money is just as good as any sided person but HBO does not seem to think that way. That is why we use other services.

title: Love this app
review: Super clean, sign up was smooth with my account from ATT Now. User friendly app with reliable functionality on both my iPhone and Apple TV. Content is great, but hurry and bring us more. And... Friends!

title: Love the shows but the app is trash
review: Wondering why when I am in wifi watching a show I already downloaded a cellular data warning keeps popping up. It makes no sense. Also the app is awful at casting to smart tvs. The cellular data thing though is what’s really annoying

title: Poorly constructed App
review: Sometimes there is a lag with the sound and the picture which is annoying. Also if I’m paying for this app I don’t want to have ads when playing episodes. Also there should be a way to skip the intro. There are a lot of issues with this app and I will be cancelling my service after another month of improvements aren’t made.

title: I Have a Question???
review: because they have not put the option to change the language in the series or movies that would be very good for the application to work with the public that speaks other languages

title: loving the overall execution of the app
review:
love the new UI it’s somewhat similar to HBOnow but at the same time much better
no bugs so far and hopefully it stays that way but I’m loving the overall execution of the app

title: Great content, but there is a problem
review: The only thing I really have a problem with is that you can’t turn off autoplay, so if I fell asleep, it will keep playing whatever show I was watching until I wake up the next morning, or until my device dies.

title: No dubbed movies
review: There are a lot of popular English movies my family would like to watch like for example the Harry Potter movies and many other families. I would love to see that improvement so the app can be enjoyed by the whole family if they speak a different language .

title: Total Rip Off if you plan to watch this on your Television.
review: I got this service today through my phone while I was out, and it’s a decent streaming app. However, HBO Max isn’t available on Roku (only HBO Now is). So, I can’t watch this on my tv. I have access to HBO Now through the same subscription, but Now has about half the Content that Max has. Don’t bother getting this service until HBO decides to let us use our TVs.

title: Why can’t we skip intros!?
review: I’m quarantining at home and binging Big Love again, so sick of sitting through the intro song. And why is it such a pain to skip ahead to another episode or go back to a previous episode? You have to search the show and select from the full list of episodes. Could be more user friendly. Meh.

title: Great selection
review:
I love the selection of TCM and Studio Ghibli films all in one place for the first time. One request I have is to replace the bright purple HBOMax screen at the end of every movie with a darker version. It’s jarring to see such a bright image after the dark credits of a film stop rolling. 

Thanks!

title: Title
review: The mobile downloading is very broken. About one fourth of the time, instead of taking you to your downloads, it just takes you to a ‘cannot connect’ screen. And it’s like, “Okay what different between now and the last time I wasn’t connected.”

title: Disappointed.
review: I used HBO Now for all my devices and suddenly the app has been completely updated and is no longer even available. A pop up also informed me that hbo max isn’t supported by my provider when I already had hbo now before-now I can’t even log in online. so now as a paying customer i can’t watch my shows- or anything that I’m paying for. Fix this!

title: Lots of glitches
review: While streaming the picture freezes frequently. I have to stop & restart the program, which is very annoying. Tonight it froze again. After several tries, I got it to play, but there was no sound. I had to delete the app & reinstall it. I like the programming, but the app needs a lot of work.

title: Can’t watch on my phone.
review: My billing is through Roku. Since it switched over to “HBO Max,” this provider isn’t supported, so I can’t use HBO on my phone. I can’t even view my account details. What I can do to watch on my phone is cancel my subscription, wait the 13 days for it to expire, then re-subscribe to a supported provider. Until then, this app is pointless!

title: Great Selection
review: The selection on HBO max is fantastic. Very impressed with the shows available. So far the app has been working without any crashes or major problems.

title: Some movies and series won’t cast using good chrome cast
review:
First let me say I am enjoying being able to cast HBO and it’s fantastic series. However, as of lately I’ve been noticing some  content just won’t cast. I’ve reset the devices and phones. Deleted the app and reinstalled and  the problem still
Persist.  Any feed back would be greatly appreciated.

title: Add it for Firestick
review: I love that HBO Max partnered with AT&T BUT please add it to the Firestick app selection!! It’s great that I can watch movies on my phone but in today’s world of COVID we are home more than ever and mirroring my phone to the TV every time I want to watch a show or movie is a bit much. PLEASE consider adding the app to more than just the few options you currently have.

title: Does not ever consistently work
review: We’re always having to find an alternative to what we wanted to watch because this app won’t load shows we select. The only advice the app ever gives is to “check your internet connection”, which is obviously fine because all of the streaming apps we use because this one won’t function have zero issues.

title: Turn up the Volume...
review: I would like to see the volume turned up when watching a movie. HBO Max is the only app that when I watch a movie that I have to crank up the volume on my receiver to be able to hear the dialogue. Every other app such as Apple TV+, Showtime, CBS All Excess, and others doesn’t require me to turn the volume up. And where is Dolby Atmos?

title: What happened
review: This app is amazing and I love the movies and shows. I don’t know if it’s me but every time I watch something it’s like it’s deleted like a show it just disappears the next day. But over all, it’s an amazing app really recommend it.

title: Hire the Prime Video Developers
review: I don’t normally write reviews but the functionality of this app is pretty bad. Your content is too good for this. It’s like an old house where you have to walk through a bedroom to get to the kitchen or the backyard. Terrible design. Don’t make it so hard to watch the next episode.

title: Where is HBO MAX???
review: Don’t get me wrong, I loved HBO. I say loved because my TV’s (even those with an Internet app, DO NOT want to open HBO Max on the TV!!?!??? I have been paying for a fathom app!!! For awhile I could use the HBO app instead (a downgrade) but now that has been deactivated too. How much patience are we suppose to have? You introduced a disaster and WE are paying for it. Doesn’t work on the TV internet, my Firestick, my channel guide, and there is NO APP!!!! Fix it!

title: Cheaters
review: First off, service just ain’t worth the price point they’re asking for. Add to the fact that I still can’t watch it in my tv due to them not having a deal with Roku. Biggest issue though is that they had a problem charging my card, which was working fine. They told me to enter a new one, so I changed my card and now all of a sudden I lost my cheaper rate. Seems like a scam to me.

title: Cellular data warning
review:
Can’t watch because I keep getting a notification about using cellular data. My wifi is on, it’s connected so why? Also, if I’m watching a program and I am on cellular data then guess what, maybe I want that bill? You rolled this out months ago and you couldn’t even have it working by the time you phased out HBOGO? 

Get it together because what you made is garbage.

title: Constant buffering
review: Every time I stream this app on my tv, I cannot get through one program before it starts endlessly buffering. I eventually get a message that something went wrong and I need to restart the app. Then it happens again. Incredibly frustrating as none of my other streaming channels have this problem.

title: I literally only ask of one thing and one thing only
review: There is two dc animated movies that I think should be added to hbo max. The two movies are justice league dark and justice league dark: apokolips war. Literally just those two movies should be added and I’ll change it to a 5 star

title: No tv streaming
review: I like the content of the app but no TV streaming is available, not even in a smart tv. There’s no app for Roku or a different source. I read that there’s an app for PS4 but what about the people doesn’t have that? So, my intention was to keep the subscription but until this is resolved I won’t subscribe.

title: Audio needs adjusting
review: One thing about streaming services, the audio quality is terrible. Everyone knows about quiet voices and loud action. However this app is worse than most. I have to turn my surround sound system up 20db higher than Netflix or Disney+ just to hear the talking, once the action kicks in, I must turn it down 20db and then back up for talking. Please adjust your levels.

title: kicked off for not having HBO max
review: Instead of creating a new app for existing HBO subscribers, the team has apparently decided to kick everyone who doesn’t have cable off of the mobile app— making it harder to watch the shows I’m paying for. Bad choice. If other services can manage to have different subscription levels in the same app, HBO should be able to do this too.

title: Beautiful app
review: I haven’t actually signed up yet but just wanted to say how great it is you get to explore all the content they have before having to subscribe that’s really amazing to see.

title: Meh
review: I miss HBO GO. Get that business agreement set up! For whatever reason (and I’ve tried several troubleshooting options), this app will not connect to my chromecast tv. It used to, but now it doesn’t. Plenty of other apps work fine. Content is good, just needs bugs fixed.

title: The Lamest Interface ever
review: Here we are, several years into established streaming services and this is the best you could come up with? Credits for movies and shows barely available and if you happen to be streaming a series, the screen fills with the App logo lest you forget that it’s the one you’re in... selections are difficult to find and continuous streaming is arbitrary. It is not intuitive or informational. Way to go WB👎

title: Just needs support for Roku then we gucci
review: someone who’s a fan of studio ghibli, adult swim, cartoon network, and hbo content this is a great app.  i wanna give it 5 stars but the only way i can watch it is on my phone, macbook, and ipad, i just hope an agreement can hopefully be made soon.

title: Unable to Enter One-Time Passcode
review:
This app may be great...too bad I have not had a chance to experience it. Each time I’m prompted to link the HBO MAX account with my Directv Account I’m emailed a One-Time passcode. However, I’m not able to enter the passcode as the app refreshes when I return each time. I have received more than 10 passcodes. 

I feel confident saying this will be fixed in an future update however, this is a bad first impression.

title: Awsome
review: Today was my first day so far is working super. Super impressed with the content please keep working hard as you guys did on this streaming platform so far looks on the right track.

title: Airplay is broken
review: I dont know if it’s the HBO app or my TV but airplay works one minute then I get spammed with errors that airplay can’t play the content and to try again later. I force quite the app and it still doesn’t work and gives me the error over and over. It’s really frustrating. As soon as I use airplay with non HBO content it works.

title: New app, needs fixing
review: HBO max is relatively new, so I understand some bugs, however I can’t watch a title without issues when trying to skip past episode recap or anything I don’t want to watch. Problems with casting where if you don’t correct the settings immediately, it disconnects your phone from the episode page, making you start the process over.

title: Signed up today but...
review:
Hello Developer,
I signed up for HBOMax courtesy of my Xfinity service. I created my account on your website but when I was there: it gave me an option to try your service for free.
I understand that I can watch HBOMax Free anytime now right? I can’t give you 5 Stars until I try first.

title: Constant errors and crashes
review: I use an iPhone running the latest OS streaming through Chromecast as there is no native app for my Vizio TV. It is a rare surprise when I can get through a show or movie without the application crashing, disconnecting, or experiencing some other error. Other streaming apps on the same device work fine. Casting HBO Max to any Chromecast based device always has errors.

title: Seeing cancellation in the near future
review: The app has by far the best content with the worst service and layout. The app is so glitchy I’ve had to force close and restart the app every time I’ve used it. The interface is subpar and buffers to no end. I never had these issues with any other streaming service. Please fix!

title: Continue Watching Options?
review: Why can’t you access a show’s episodes from the continue watching feature? There’s no way to go back episodes unless you search for the show and choose an episode from there...

title: What happened
review: I have an HBO Now account. I use it on my Roku. Now my iPhone HBONow app has transmogrified into this purple thing, which I can’t sign into. Do I need to cancel HBO Now and sign up for an HBO max account? It appears to be the same price/month. Why would you make your customers go through this confusing rigmarole? Thank your lucky stars you still have peerless artists like David Simon making this worth all the trouble.

title: Buggy app, great content
review: HBO has great content but the app is extremely buggy. I get frequent aspect jumps where the picture seems to change size slightly then jump back again . This is not only an apple app thing, it also happens on the Samsung app on my tv. This isn’t an annoyance I should have to deal with on a pay service.

title: Needs a major rework
review: How does a company that has HBOGO and HBO NOW come out with this garbage app?  The layout is awful, the color scheme is ugly, and controlling it with your phone is clunky at best.  And, there’s no sleep function.  On top of all of this, it lags over an hour when new episodes come out for any shows.  That didn’t happen with HBO go.  Pretty disappointed.

title: Just... not as easy as it should be :(
review:
The Hubs: where are they? Or rather, why do you have to scroll through so much other stuff to find them?

Continue watching: shouldn’t this show both the next episode of a series you’ve watching AND shows/movies you may have started but not finished.

My list: how is this not separated by movie and television? 

Download: why the option to “download” so prominent everywhere? Why is it easier to download than it is to figure which episodes you’ve already watched of any particular show (that little purple line... eww... it’s not enough).

Come on HBO Max, we expected better.

title: Love Life starting Anna Kendrick
review: The service is great and Love Life is a phenomenal show! I totally recommend buying to just to watch that show along with the perks of everything else it has to offer.

title: Great start (?)
review: The app is easy to use, very happy that you can download content to watch later.. however... the video quality is horrible, and I mean bad. Disney, Netflix, Prime, all crystal clear video. For context I am using an iPhone X and it is up to date (iOS 13.5). I have also adjusted the app settings for the highest quality.  Still bad. Hurry up HBO max, this is costing money.

title: One of my favorite video streaming services to watch! EVER!!
review:
HBO Max is definitely one of the best streaming services to watch!

In this streaming service, there are movies to watch, tv shows to binge, originals to check out, and more!

title: Annoying Buggy App
review: I really dislike this app. It’s cumbersome, buggy, not user friendly, and is constantly failing to work. I’m constantly having to restart it just to get content to play on my Google Chrome.  What’s more, HBO forces you to use this mediocre app.  At least in the past I had other options to HBO GO, like Roku.  And for what?  All so HBO can make more money off of my data usage.  Thanks a lot, HBO.

title: I can’t believe we are paying so much
review: Guys please get your app together. You are charging more than Netflix and I can’t even find go back to more episodes while from the video. There is no way to go to next episode while watching the current one. I want to say it’s new and it’s a new app but I won’t. You are HBO. You charging so much and there is no excuse. Just poach some Netflix developers.

title: Needs some fixing!
review: The app runs so slow and takes forever to add shows/movies to your list or go from one thing to the next. There also isn’t a way to fast forward or rewind in larger blocks other than by seconds.

title: Does download feature work?
review: I selected download for few episodes and it’s been an hour I don’t see progress. If my suspicion is right and the downloads cannot happen in background, it becomes very useless feature.  Please check.

title: Great content app is buggy
review: Every time I download an episode of a show then close out of the app my download just disappears. I’ve tried deleting the app and reinstalling but doesn’t seem to work. This issue is rather annoying seeing how streaming HBO uses a lot of data.

title: It’s all about the money!!
review: HBO was a great app.  Not anymore.  It is now a money grubbing app.  I don’t see keeping my subscription much longer.  In fact, this is all about the money.  I see no reason to keep my subscription.  Looks like Game of Thrones was the high point for HBO, and it is down hill from there.  Pay more money for less, when did that become a good thing.  I think I can live with out it.

title: Great content , just can’t watch it
review: I have yet to be able to watch a single episode or movie without being interrupted by buffering. Sometimes, it would buffer every 5-10 minutes. I have Other streaming services on the same system & have no problems with those and for HBO MAX to be twice as expensive as the others, it feels like a complete rip-off.

title: Good alternative until HBO max is on Firestick
review: It has everything I wanted and I was able to airplay to my tv, which is awesome. But suddenly it didn’t connect on airplay and now the airplay option in the top right has just disappeared. It seems the app will randomly have its issues.

title: Big no from me dawg
review: The app being more expensive then the other streaming apps is one thing, that was more annoying than anything but then I can’t even get it on my fire stick... like there’s not even an app or any thing. Seems poorly executed to me! I would love to be able to watch some of my favorite shows but not on my phone. This is ridiculous...

title: Don’t bother until they are on Roku
userName: This is not the real Dave Matthews
review: Solid selection of content. My issue is lack of an HBO Max Roku app - forcing you to cast from your Apple device to your tv if you have Roku. The casting is clunky, usually stalls when moving to the next episode and good luck if you need to pause. Will take a reboot of the app to get your cast back. Unfortunate that greed between these two large companies equals an inferior streaming experience.

title: When will it be on LG TV
review: I love it it’s cool i get to watch friends but airplay is Brocken hope you’ve had the time to fix it...Also I want it on regular LG TV it’s ridiculous I have go back in the app so I can go to the next episode I don’t hate it I like it...Bye have a good day!

title: Great app to be limited to tiny devices
review: I like the way this app is laid out. It is intuitive and easy to use. I knocked 2 stars because these old eyes just can’t stand to watch my content on tiny screens. I have a nice 4K TV and I just want to be able to easily stream my content through my Roku box.

title: You fixed it!!
review: Since the upgrade to HBO Max, I had a conflict with my Chromecast. The video broadcast perfectly, but there was no audio. I just tried my sound bar with HBO Max tonight, and I got sound. Thank you geek squad!!

title: Full screen on laptops etc
review: I don’t like that it doesn’t automatically go to full screen when the next episode begins. If you’re watching from a laptop on the browser, it will not automatically go to the next episode in FULL screen.

title: Works for a week then doesn’t
review:
HBO go didn’t work. Received email from ATT to try the new HBO max so I followed the directions and it worked great... for about a week...
   Then last night I fell asleep watching season 1 of Deadwood
Got off work and tried to continue where it left off or back up two episodes. The HBO max system says my ATT subscription has expired.
  I attempted signing in again and can’t get it to work. It just keeps going back to sign in with your wireless provider. 
      Fix your app people! What a pain in the...
Well you can fill in he last part, I am sure what part of the human anatomy I am referring to

title: Hassle to sign up
review: It literally took two adults and over an hour just for us to figure out how to sign up and connect it to my smart tv. Way too much hassle to sign up for it to be that expensive they should make it way easier. I just can’t get over how difficult it was to sign up I have never seen any other streaming service be that complicated.

title: Interface is very laggy and not user friendly
review: There are so many kinks with HBO MAX. The shows take forever to load and sometimes don’t even load at all. Occasionally, I get an error on my screen resulting in the whole screen going black, yet the audio continues to run. There also isn’t an option to skip to the next episode. There is a lot they can learn from Netflix.

title: How many HBO apps are there?
review: I’ve had an AT&T unlimited plan for 3 years and HBO something comes with it. I just got a text that I needed to download this app. They’ve changed how to login to HBO at least 4 times in that 3 years (HBO Go, Direct TV something, ATT TV app, now this app). How hard is it to just keep one app? I’m fairly tech savvy, but I feel bad for customer service reps that are going to have to deal with all the confused ppl out there.

title: Needs to be available more places.
review: The fact I can only watch HBO max on a phone/computer/iPad pretty much renders it useless. I deal with it for a handful of shows that only I want to watch. But I need it to work on tv for family viewing. Super annoying. HBO it’s time to cave to roku/Apple/Firestick. I definitely won’t pay for this if not. Too many competitors that are way easier to use.

title: Loving it!
review:
I am a huge fan of HBO for years. So when I know that they are going to launch HBO Max I was in.

The result is perfect for me, but I am a little diasappointed that isn’t any 4K content. Let’s hope it ends up being...

title: Great upgrade
review: I’ve had HBO now for years and this is a really great upgrade if you already had HBO now they gave you max for free once you update the app I’m very excited with the amount of material on here now

title: Extremely poor picture quality
review:
Unlike nearly all of its streaming competitors, HBO Max launched in 2020 without any support for 4K video. 

In contrast, competitors like Netflix have been streaming 4K since 2014, so the glaring lack of 4K support in the HBO Max app suggests a complete lack or care and dedication to quality.

HBO, please make a concerted effort to update this app with video technologies that were offered by your competitors over 6 years ago.

title: Please Add AT&T U-verse
review: Now i love everything about this app from fresh prince of bel-air to your favorite childhood movies and shows but how can i watch if my provider isn’t there and i don’t have enough money to pay,i have HBO go but there’s only a few days left before July the 31 so please i beg of you to put AT&T U-verse.

title: Downloaded episodes do not work
review: There is no point in offering downloaded episodes if the app has a glitch where, when the phone is in airplane mode, it gets stuck in an infinite loop of trying to connect to the server and won’t let you watch the episodes you’ve downloaded.

title: Some great shows/ app crashes
review:
Fix the app- it’s crap - so we can watch the few good shows you have. When you download a show to watch on iPad, why is it still streaming it, when you go to watch it after you’ve used data to download it?
Not everyone in the world has true unlimited data.

title: Great on the phone, garbage on the television.
review: I started using this app on my phone.  When I downloaded it to my tv, nothing worked right.  It’s buggy and slow.  It takes upwards of 30 minutes sometimes, for a show to begin.  Heaven forbid you want to switch between shows.  It freezes.  I never encountered this on my phone.  I had the exact same issue with HBO Go.  PLEASE FIX!

title: Content great app not so much
review: I love having access to my favorite shows, but there’s a lot about the app itself I don’t like. First of all I’ve been experiencing problems with signing in on my Apple TV. Also I would like to be able to skip the intro to shows like friends.

title: Changing Audio
review: i bought hbomax specifically for the ghibli content, only to find that the movies were all slightly changed. i don't understand why someone felt a need to change these nostalgic movies and why that person thought it was a good idea. by changed i mean some voice acting lines were switched and altered.

title: Smartcast glitched
review: I love the app so far but my only problem is when i try to cast it onto my tv it will immediately disconnect. I know it couldn’t be my tv because it works just fine with other streaming services. Hopefully this will be fixed in a future update.

title: Download Problems !
review: This is a great app with great content but it wouldn’t let me download anything. It keeps saying I reached the maximum, even though I haven’t downloaded anything at all!! I want to  download shows to watch on the go but this is stopping me from doing it. HBO has to fix this issue!

title: Can’t get the app
review: So I’m paying for your streaming service but I cannot download the app on most tv services( firestick, ruku, select smart TVs)? You couldn’t come up with a deal before you launched? Enjoy what’s on the app but the fact that I can’t watch it on anything bigger than my tablet?

title: Confusing and annoying
review: Difficult to navigate. Weird layout. Hard to figure out which shows/movies are available with your previous subscription and which is part of hbomax. Confusing even trying to choose which episode of a show you want to watch.

title: Default closed captioning
review: The app switches back to CC on after start of every episode. It doesn’t remember that you turned it off. It would be nice to not have to turn the CC off after the start of every episode. It’s quite annoying.

title: Connectivity issue
review: I downloaded a show to watch on the airplane but the app keeps telling me I’m offline even tho I’m on wifi, the show was downloaded to my phone and all my other apps are working. In fact, I’m even able to write this review and submit it.  Seems pretty basic that it should work on wifi with an already downloaded show.

title: Not available on all platforms!
review: This subscription is useless when I can’t watch same shows on my TV. There is no HBO Max for Roku so at home I have to watch shows on my instead of my TV. You’re paying for a subscription that can’t be used across platforms, want to cancel subscription because of this.

title: Just a random question.
review: I like the App and all the shows they have in them and I know this is probably the dumbest thing to ask but if you could, could you please put the show Young Justice in the Dc “Area”.

title: Disappointed
review:
I spend my money on the app HBO now, so I pay my share. Yet i cannot use it on my phone, tablet or laptop... because of this “merge” and i think it’s ridiculous that I cannot have access to my content that I pay for on my other devices only on my Roku Tv... 

Fix this... because i have a subscription and I should be able to watch what I want when i want.

title: Horrible app doesn’t work
review:
If I could give this app 0 stars I would. It simply doesn’t work.
I can’t even log in and haven’t been able to log in for at least 2 days, log in server error messages. What’s the point in paying all this money for content that can’t be viewed or accessed?
Good job HBO. 
Not only is HBO Max unavailable on Roku and DirectTv, but the app doesn’t work on an iPad either.

title: Why is this so difficult?
review: I have HBO but I can’t use this app on my iPad or iPhone. What am I paying for? I don’t care if roku isn’t supported, I am still paying for hbo service where does that money go? I tried to get in and sign up and cancel my other service and it wouldn’t let me.  I don’t understand why so many hoops to jump through, and don’t have time to try to figure it out.

title: Very good!
review: Has great selection and layout but the free trial is just too short! It’s 15$ a month which is a lot and only 1 week to decide if you want to do that. They stream “Katy Keene” which is such a good show anyone reading this should go watch it!!

title: Problems already
review: Have HBO with my cable provider spectrum. Put the correct login and password for spectrum, click login, and it keeps kicking me back to the HBO Max create an account.

title: Offline
review: Definitely not on the same level as the other streamers. Was going away on a trip, where I knew I would have no WiFi. Did what anyone would do, downloaded a few episodes to have available to watch. Definitely did not work the way the others do. DID NOT PLAY, it said it was downloaded but only the loading sign would pop up

title: Very disappointed!
review: I’m extremely disappointed that this is only available on mobile devices. If this service doesn’t become available for my television soon, I will be canceling my subscription. It’s not available for Roku or Firestick.

title: Glitchy app
review:
App is glitchy. Keep getting using cellular warning even though the episode is downloaded. My cellular usage is up for the month so I suspect it is really using my cellular data for some reason.

Edit- contacted customer support and they took me I have to go to my download to access the downloaded episode. I still get the cellular warning and a lot of time I have to go into airplane mode to avoid this. 

Can’t pick an episode from continue watching need to search for the show to pick a different episode.

Overall not happy with the app compared to other streaming services.

title: It’s cool but
review: Every time i exit the app to check my notifications or stuff, the app restarts itself. Every single time. Having me click back the movie or show was watching, rather than being paused like i left it before switching to another app

title: Awesome
review: HBO max is awesome especially with all the movies and tv shows that I like on here. I can wait to watch looney tones, Friends, and many other. The only thing I disappoint is that there no 4K/ HDR hopefully they will add it in the future.

title: Straight crap.
review: I search google to find Harry Potter for my nieces that have been wanting to watch them and I came across hbomax on google stating that they did in fact stream it. I downloaded and Paid for it and they don’t have it. I went ahead and reached out to customer service to ask what was going on. They said they no longer are streaming it, so umm yea.  Downloaded it for nothing.

title: Why spend money on a app
review: You have to subscribe to watch an episode how about using adds instead you might not get the same amount of money but you still make money off adds why waste your hard earned money that you can use it on better things like food and hardware stuff i can’t watch my Selena + chef episodes on any apps because its only for HBMO max 😕

title: So many streaming issues
review: It already has so many streaming issues from the app to other devices. Half of the times wouldn’t work. But how with the latest update streaming to any of my TV s from the app doesn’t work at all. You really need to fix this issue as having an LG tv (which doesn’t have an HBO app), streaming from my phone is my only option.

title: Get it together
review: This is a perfect example of someone getting in a hurry and not previewing an app before publishing it. I’m finding that signing in is near impossible to complete between the purple scrolling dots and the rotating ring popping up in the way. Why are there two loading screens? I get all the way to the end of the process and it either locks up, or kicks me off.

title: Why no trailers?
review: Seriously, previews for shows should be in the MVP for the product. Not having trailers is going to cause users to either not watch new content, or watch 10 minutes of content and then bounce, which could result in false analytics data forfor the show.

title: Be careful with downloads on airplane mode.
review:
This app doesn’t load if you’re offline. I downloaded 3 episodes to watch during a flight but at the moment I tried to open the app in my iPad it never worked. This app tries to verify your login information every single time its open. Boomer. 
Right now they are miles and miles away from the Netflix app. Disappointing.

title: Good but could use improvement
review: I like the scope of choices to watch, however I have a couple caveats: the quality is low when you first start a video, the app lags at times, and I wish there was an option to skip the theme songs.

title: Stupidest thing ever!’
review: Can HBO explain to me if I have an HBO now subscription but I can’t sign in to make because my subscription isn’t supported and when I try to log in HBO now using my mobile phone internet it tries to open up in HBO max. Clearly no one thought any of this through. This has been such in inconvenience. Why pay for a monthly subscription that I can’t use when I’m not at home?

title: Amazing Content!
review: Content is amazing and is superior to the other options available today.   No issues with app, great offer!

title: Audio issues
review: I know I did not wait this long to watch Doctor Who for free just so the audio can go bad. Not even 5 minutes into an episode and the audio goes from English to Spanish. The app has no options to check the language options.

title: Lost the ability to watch HBO on my iPad
review:
So, HBO just kills the HBO Now app in favor of the HBO Max app, but since I (and millions of others) subscribe through Roku, I can no longer use the HBO app on my iPad.  Seriously?  I am a subscriber and I pay $15 per month to watch HBO and you lock me out on my device?

Wow, this is about the most anti-consumer move I have ever seen.

Why not leave the HBO Now up until you figure things out with Roku?

title: Love the content but horrible functionality
review: This app gets stuck constantly. Moving from one episode to another or browsing content it will freeze my entire device.  Please fix it because I love the content but it’s not worth having to reboot my devise every time I watch something.

title: Great App with One Flaw
review: Love all the new content. Please add the ability to create PIN codes for adults. I have two kids and at any time they can open and go into my profile and watch R movies. The adults should have pin codes too.

title: Oh boy
review: I love the shows and movies but I got a smart tv (just like most) and it doesn’t support the app so I have to use my husband’s Xbox and it’s very inconvenient because he plays while I watch and there’s even issues with the app there as well. Please get this fixed ASAP and I will for sure believe this is a app worth for 4 stars.

title: It was working but now is not
review: The app keeps asking me to link my provider which I have done. Then it will go to my home page. I will select three show and click on pay. Then it will take me back to link my provider. I am not able to watch anything for over 2 weeks now

title: Terrible rollout of the new platform
review: I recently signed up for HBO now on my fire stick. I haven’t had access to and won’t have access to my fire stick for three weeks. I have no ability to cancel the subscription I have no access to and I’m paying for until I’m back home because there is no way to sign in on an iPhone (only hbo max which I don’t have)

title: Love it...when it works
review: There’s nothing worse than finding a good series to watch and getting into binge mode but the next time I tap the app on my iPhone it tells me “We’re having issues connecting to HBO Max. Please try again later”. Ugh. This never happens with Netflix! C’mon!!

title: Great selection.....if I could watch it
review:
There are so many things I’d love to watch, but unfortunately after 2-5 minutes it stops playing.  I have other streaming services and I’ve rarely had an issue watching on my IPad.  

Get it together.  Also,  why aren’t you on Roku?  I’m close to cancelling my 20+ year HBO subscription.

title: I love the wide range of content
review: I love the wide range of content but u have a roku tv and a fire stick and I can not find this app at all on neither roku nor fire stick. The only option I have is to use the HDMI chord to plug into my tv from my laptop. I just want to know when can we expect to see this app on all online media players?

title: Please Put The App on Roku
review: I love all the content.  Its pretty good, BUT I don’t want to watch on my cellphone or other mobile devices all the time.  As a matter of fact I am NOT going to watch on mobile devices all the time.  I don’t want to. So that being said I will still be giving other streaming services the majority of my attention.

title: Stupid app
review:
Whenever you log in it doesn’t allow you to switch between your email and back to the app to verify your email address

It’s a mobile app not available on other platforms so it doesn’t make sense

title: Downloaded videos
review: When I watch a downloaded movie offline and exit app midway in. The movie won’t start up where I left off in movie when i play again.  I have to fast forward and get to where i left off. It’s an annoying glitch

title: Needs work
review:
Great show lineup!!! App needs work!

It’s better now that you have added intro skips. But still would be nice to have a offline mode. Hence while traveling (which I do a lot of) when I don’t have signal ha e the ability to watch downloaded content!

title: Spectrum customer - still can't sign in
review: After multiple attempts following the instructions on the HBO Max website (clearing cache in Safari, turning phone off and on again, multiple uninstalls and reinstalls of the HBO Max app), I'm still unable to login with my TV provider (Spectrum). It's not on Spectrum's end either, as I'm having no problem whatsoever signing in to the HBO Go app with my provider info... Please fix this!

title: Hit or Miss
review: A lot of the time the app says I need to connect to WiFi or change settings. I connected to WiFi and nothing and then I tried to use the data on my phone and still nothing. It just keeps saying connect to WiFi. Sometimes it’ll work and other times not.

title: DISAPPOINTED
review: Shows are great (duh it’s HBO) but the app itself is severely lacking in major, but simple things. When casting to a TV, it is incredibly cumbersome and unwieldy. Especially so when you’re trying to ffw/rewind. With the massive success of HBO, I expected an app where they didn’t cut quite so many corners. HBO GO was better. And that is saying something. This app is trash and is in desperate need of a complete overhaul. Pathetic effort.

title: Download function is terrible
review: Why have ability to download a movie if you have to have an Internet connection to watch it. That makes no sense nevertheless it will not load unless you have an Internet connection. Low quality app not what I expected when they killed off HBOGo.

title: Terrible already
review:
I added hbo to my xfinity plan through the website. Checked my tv, hbo channel was working. 

Then I downloaded hbo max on my iPhone 11, signed in through my provider (xfinity), it loads the xfinity website within the hbo max app and tells me to add hbo to my xfinity plan! 
I’ve deleted the app, cleared browser, tried about 10 times. Called the Hbo max customer service they didn’t know what to do. Called xfinity, also clueless. 

I’m going I give it 48 hours, if it still won’t let me in after that, canceling. 

P.S. To the developers, don’t bother replying to my review with the customer service solution unless you know what the problem is.

title: High Cost Low Quality Video
review: I can’t believe for the price they charge that the video is so poor. I have a high end TV and a very fast internet service and I still get motion artifacts and poor picture quality. Just crazy that the transmission picture is still 1080P. Upscaling has to be done by your own hardware.

title: very glitchy and not worth the price to use
review: $15 for a terrible user interface..watching tv shows is difficult, there is no option to go to the next episode directly without going back to “my list” and scrolling down to whatever episode you’re on. the app is also bad at loading the next episode if you’re on the end credits of the previous one still. there also isn’t an option to skip opening credits so you have to press the “skip 30 seconds” button multiple time and wait for buffer. honestly don’t know how they’re allowed to charge so much for such a terrible app

title: Needs better accessibility support.
review: Great content! However, the iOS version of the app needs better voice over support as it is currently almost impossible for someone who is blind to navigate the interface. What is interesting though is that the Apple TV version of the app does work with voiceover.

title: Logging in is a nightmare
review: This app is arguably the worst to login on your devices. I am clearly signed in on my computer, and it will not recognize any of my login info. It was a pain to do on hbo go, and this is just a hellish experience. If it weren’t included in my cell plan I would 100% NOT pay for this. I am not one to make reviews unless they are positive, but this makes me wanna break things. Pray for me

title: Skip intro needed
review: It’s 2020 and I still have to fast forward to skip intros manually. Love the app and the content but it needs the option to skip all these intros on web and mobile.

title: Why are you kicking out subscribers?!
review:
If a person has iOS v11 or below they cannot watch HBO even if they subscribe. This app is downloadable but refuses to work. Going to the web site using a browser leads you to the same downloadable app that does not work.
How does anyone watch HBO on iPhone 5 for example?
Just received a confirmation from the developer that they indeed cut off older devices.

title: Content beyond HBO
review: So excited to see the content beyond HBO’s impressive library.  From Doctor Who to South Park on the way as well as exciting DC Universe content, I now have plenty to explore and binge under these pandemic conditions! #ATTemployee

title: Going to have to cancel
review:
I was really excited for this launch, but it seems i will have to cancel before i can even really try it out. I love ROKU TVs set up so all the TVs in my house are this kind. Unfortunately you all can’t come to an agreement so i can’t use the service on anything but my phone. $15 a month is way too much to pay for something i can’t use 🤷🏼‍♀️.
So disappointed.

title: Stop with the ads
review: Stop with the promos before shows. Just play the show I want. And yes, you made it so I can skip promos now, but I have to do it with every show. Either just stop the promos or let me opt out of them with one choice, not episode by bleeping episode.

title: New update made things worse
review:
The most recent update doesn’t seem to have done anything but change some aesthetic pieces of the app. But now the app won’t cast to my smart tv. Everything was working just fine before the update. 

Selection is great. New originals are great. But the app itself lacks

title: Won’t stream video from iPhone to TV using Apple lightning to hdmi connection
review: Like the app, but when connecting it to my tv from my iPhone using the actual Apple lightning to hdmi cord, only gives audio, and no video. Unplug the cord and can see video on my phone. Makes it hard to watch a movie with the family.

title: This is okay
review: Okay the downloading of movies or shows that you like is a very nice feature that a lot of apps have but this countdown of day that we have left till it’s removed is stupid change that way please other than that it’s a great app

title: Needs landscape navigation also
review: Cmon bruh! Most shows/movies are presented in 16:9. So it only makes sense that since you are allowed to rotate your phone 90 degrees and enjoy the show/movie, you should also be allowed to navigate the app in landscape mode and not just portrait.

title: HBO is ruined
review:
This app is the worst premium provider app I have. I had HBO go but was “upgraded” to HBO max thru my AT&T cellular plan as well as my Xfinity plan. 
At first I was able to log in with my Xfinity credentials. Now I can log in with anything! It says I’m logged in & asks me to pick a provider, even though it clearly shows I’m signed in with Xfinity. It’s a never ending cycle! At this point, I’m so done with everything HBO & AT&T!

title: Buffers too often
review:
The app buffers even when the videos are downloaded. It makes absolutely no sense. 

It also MUST have an online connection to even log into the app. My movie was unavailable during a plane trip due to that. The loading screen just kept spinning.

title: HBO MAX Awesome
review: I'm not a big fan of change but this being added to my HBO account on Direct TV is something I really thought was going to make my app experience awful. I have to admit it but with it being free with my existing account I LOVE IT!

title: Good idea but....
review: I will not let me sign on with my cox account currently it makes me change my password every couple of weeks I did not have to do that with hbo go just frustrated have not been able to use in a couple of days .  Keep getting error oops something went wrong.

title: Needs skip into feature
review: I really like the content of this streaming service, but I do not like the inability to skip the intro on tv shows. Please add this feature in, it’s very frustrating to have to see the intro each time a new episode starts.

title: Needs Modern Features
review:
Next episode. Skip intro. These are standard features available in other streaming services like Netflix and Prime Video. Get it together, folks over at HBO. 

Also, can you kiss and make up with Roku? Would really like to stream this on their platform.

title: Incapable of retaining data
review: I hate this app with the burning rage of 1000 suns. Tried to download a movie for a flight, it errored out at 99%. Tried to download the same movie for my return flight home, succeeded... and the app lost it like I had never downloaded it. Garbage. In the modern era with a million choices streaming apps, get literally any other app if you want to actually watch things.

title: Not a competitive app in 2020
review: The content is great but the app is just a reskin of the HBO NOW one. No 4K, HDR/Dolby Vision or Dolby Atmos and no LG TV app. Also, it doesn’t work outside of the US even in countries where HBO is available. And on top of that it’s 2x more expensive per month compared to Disney+ and Netflix which both do the listed above.

title: 10/10 but I have a problem
review: The movie/show are awesome there so much but it won’t allow me to connect it to anything

title: Almost Perfect
review: Please add an option to manually change stream quality from HD to SD (1080p/720p/480p). The UI is great and very fast. Also it’s simple to login with existing ISP account and being able to download is great when offline!

title: Would be great, but...
review: I was super excited about this service because of all the great titles available but sadly, I can only watch on my phone and computer. I, like so many others, use a Fire stick and Roku to stream on. Therefore, I cancelled my free trial immediately because it wasn’t being utilized. Once HBO Max becomes available on other platforms I’ll sign up again I’m sure!

title: It’s pretty good
review: I have the hbo channel on fios do it was pretty easy to sign up. I started binging the hp movies right away, and I’m pretty excited to start watching some new tv shows, although i expected a little more, i think hbo max is alright.
