title: WTH?!
review: I have HBO Now, but the HBO Max has taken over and I can’t access anything without having to pay for it...AGAIN! Nope. Not today, Satan. Y’all need to do better. There should have been an integration between the two so that HBO Now customers can log in to HBO Max and pick up where we left off. I also have Roku and it’s sucking there too. HBO, y’all dropped the ball on this one. Big time. Please fix this mess.

title: To expensive!
review:
Too expensive for content a lot of old stuff on here.
Plus with the Coronavirus that is halting production!!! it’s definitely not worth this kind of money they should have you pay nine or $10 a month but not locked in for a year which is the special that they had going on why would I want to keep this for a year not enough new content.

title: Bravo
review: Nice service and they went and got the boondocks added onto it. That alone is a must for me to sign up. Of course rick and morty being my other favorite comedy show. What a deal

title: Roku Support
review: I like the content, but the fatigue from having to watch the shows I like on a iPad forced me to end my subscription. I’m not an “on the go” viewer unless I’m traveling, so not having the ability to stream the contents of this app on a larger screen eventually became unbearable.

title: Big Upgrade
review:
The aesthetics are beautiful and the selection is insane.
I’ve never seen this many options in my entire life.

title: Best streaming service
review: Out of all the streaming service that I have used and enjoyed, this has to be the best one. The content that HBO MAX has is amazing. Sadly no 4k but hopefully soon they will have It.

title: Horrible
review: Compared to the other show apps this app is so bad and you have to have WiFi for it to really work at that and it’s slow and always restarting and freezing you guys need to fix a lot on this app it’s so bad smh I have it for one show and can barley watch it because you guys app is so bad just horrible whoever is the developer needs to be fired

title: Lineup is a joke
review: The app itself it’s pretty well put together but the lineup is absolutely horrible. Some good old shows from my childhood, some classic movies that I’ll never watch, but all these are few and far between, the rest of the shows and movies are indie films I’ve never heard of, hbo max originals that I’ll never watch, or super old movies that are just generally uninteresting.

title: Great!
review: This app is amazing for watching shows but one problem needs to be more content and it’s kinda glitchy

title: HBO max
review: Big improvement from go and now. I like the new aesthetic, it would be nice to see more titles at once and to have a few more categories. Based on content alone it is easily five stars.

title: Excited but......
review:
Already have HBO and excited for the extra content that is available.....but....

I literally have to connect my computer to my TV in order to watch.....there’s no way to screen mirror or cast to my tv from laptop/iPhone, and no app for my LG smart tv.

title: Please provide an option to turn off auto play
review: I love the app and content, especially the new addition of South Park, but please provide an option to turn off auto play.

title: Actively hostile to users
review: By cutting off integration with Apple TV channels, HBO made the experience of using this app—and even signing in to this app—needlessly complicated and prone to errors. This would be hostile to users even if everything worked perfectly; but with problems signing in (and even confusion about how to sign in) it’s especially inexcusable. An unforced error that I hope HBO will correct soon.

title: Offline watching
review: Thank you for fixing offline watching with the latest update. Now it’s working like it should. No more leeching of data. Would give it a 5 if it was Roku compatible.

title: Don’t waste your money
review: Only able to play videos on my phone and even those videos don’t stay on for very long due to the app shutting down every 30 minutes. Can’t connect any show to my chrome cast whatsoever. Sad because there are a lot of great shows on the app but if none of them can play then what’s the point? Canceling my subscription ASAP ✌🏾

title: Bugs
review: Everytime I AirPlay from my iPhone to AppleTv and I get a notification on my phone it stops playing the movie. It’s super annoying, I didn’t have these issues before the new update.

title: What’s going on?
review: HBO please get it together! I was just using HBO NOW before the app changed to HBO MAX everything was fine then the app changes to HBO MAX and it is now saying that my provider doesn’t support it? I am subscribed to HBO NOW so aren’t I suppose to have access?!?! Also why is the HBO NOW app all of a sudden gone? Now I can’t watch HBO at all! And on top of that it’s not available on roku tv which I happen to have! Such a mess!!!!

title: Absolute trash of an application
review: App is terrible. You have to download every show you want to watch and then the shows you do download, expire after a short time. What’s the point of me downloading it? Also they hide the option for you to delete the app because they know it’s the only way to keep people on it. Pathetic, do better hbo.

title: Can’t even get HBO Max Set Up
review: I just got HBO Max through an AT&T plan my wife and I just purchased, and whenever I try to set up HBO Max on my phone, it keeps telling me there’s an unhandled exception and I can’t proceed any farther. I’ve restarted my phone, uninstalled and installed the HBO Max app again and restarted my phone but nothing seems to work. This app is completely broken and unusable for me.

title: Subtitles or languages
review: I had HBO Now, HBO Go and now HBO Max my question is are we ever getting subtitles in diferent languages or dub movies or series to other languages at less Spanish I want my daughters to watch tv in Spanish I don’t want them to forget about it

title: Terrible
review: This entire service is terrible. I wasted money that I’ll never get back. I tried to watch a show after I subscribed and it kept telling me to subscribe and come back and Log I’m. I was already logged in! Don’t waste your money on this service. It makes you go through iTunes to subscribe rather than go through the website.

title: Not working
review: HBO Go was my favorite streaming app b4 I was forced onto this app. I was excited since HBO Go was so good, I’d figured HBO Max would be even better + it had Fresh Prince. I get it free with my AT&T Unlimited Elite plan and it no longer allows me to login. When I login it takes me to the profiles page for a second and then takes me back to the subscribe page. It is very frustrating.

title: HBO Not being on Roku is a big problem
review: I don’t understand how there isn’t an app for super popular HBO on the most popular streaming device. Aggravating enough to drop both HBO and Roku. The customer is the one who that suffers for their lack of cooperation.  You have to either by another device to view on TV or drop HBO.  Being a loyal customer, I shouldn’t be put in that situation.

title: Needs A Skip Button
review: The interface isnt the most intuitive. When watching a series the first page back should be all the episodes for that series. There NEEDS to be a skip recap and skip intro button.

title: Roku
review: I am really enjoying the HBO Max inclusion in my package, but having to watch from either a phone or small device is sometimes frustrating. Having a Roku Smart TV HBO Max app would definitely resolve the main issues we’re having with Max in my household.

title: Good, but
review: Decent selection, GREAT UI and feature list (looking at you, Disney+) but I wish I could control the stream quality. On data it defaults to highest quality, eating through 25GB in 7 hours. Sometimes I’m okay watching it at 480 or 720p in the name of data savings.

title: So complicated
review:
The content is great but the app is not good.
I have my account through ATT every two three days I need to log in again. 
And now I log in and it goes to the suscribe now screen so I can’t even use the app
Really frustrating to not being able to use something I paid monthly

title: Downloading episodes still uses data
review:
I download episodes on my phone to watch on lunch at work so not to use my cellular data. 

Tell me what’s the point of downloading an episode if you’re still going to burn through my cell data to stream it. I now have 25 days left in my cycle with half of my data because of this app... two thumbs down.

title: Great content, horrible user interface
review: The content is great, however, the UI could use some major work. The video controls are very ugly and there are many glitches within the app. Disney+ has a much more beautiful and sophisticated UI.

title: Need a skip button
review: Never have problem with HBO MAX. Only one thing that I missing is skip button on shows.

title: Ok but....
review: Was working great until a few days ago where I can no longer go to my continue watching and go through the seasons. For whatever reason it will only show the specific episode

title: Bro I can’t even buy a subscription lol
userName: i have never been more mad
review: Horrible horrible. I thought this was supposed to work on an IPhone. A computer. Nothing. I’m just trying to watch friends y’all and I can’t even shove my money down your throat. Stop buying out shows underneath streaming services that actually work and start working on making a better designed app.

title: Audio issues
review: The audio is way too dynamic. I have to turn the volume to max to be able to hear dialogue. Then things get loud and they get really loud. I don’t want to have to watch with my finger on the volume control. It’s called a compressor people.

title: Skip intro
review: I complained that theres no skip intro button, the very next day there’s an update with a skip intro button. I’m choosing to not believe this was a coincidence

title: No Roku Use
review: I liked the app’s functionality and the content was good. The problem in our house is all our TVs are Roku enabled and Max is not on Roku.  So it is small screen only in our house. I kept it a month to see if HBO was just finalizing a deal with Roku but it sounds like that fight will continue.  So I am unsubscribing until then.

title: Good content (for now) terrible interface on mobile apps
review: Why can’t I access the entire episode library from my keep watching list on mobile app? Why is there no skip intro? Why is it so slow to load (compared to Netflix..... which is cheaper and works better).

title: Great app, horrible Customers Service
review: The Customers Services his horrible. They don’t know how to answer any questions and don’t to resolve the important problems especially when your account was hacked. I like the app and the content. But, please change the the people of the Customers Services.

title: great app
review: I don’t understand all the negative reviews. All shows are wonderful and the movie selection fantastic. I see a very promising future in this app. Good work HBO!

title: SO buggy with Chromecast
review: This is a note to the developers: please fix this buggy new app! The previous HBO NOW app worked fine as of late. The app frequently freezes and I have to restart the app and my TV — and this is every hour or so. It ruins the user experience.

title: Fire Stick?
review: Is really nice that there’s place that we can all see DC WB and so much more affiliated networks in only one app. I love it, but there’s no app for Fire Stick or Roku so I cannot stream on any of those devices. How ever on the broadcast The app crashes on all of the TVs of the house which a really  bad thing.

title: List view please
review: It takes forever to browse through the movies when you’re only seeing a few images at a time. Please consider a list view toggle, or at least smaller thumbnails.

title: Great app,but needs some help
review: I truly enjoy the HBO max app but I noticed it’s holding memory space on my iPad even for deleted old downloads. I have even uninstalled the app and when I download again the old downloads follow from the cloud. Delete means delete, it’s not that hard to figure out.

title: Add a skip intro feature
review: How does HBO Max not have this simple feature that all of their competitors already have? It would make streaming and binge watching shows even better. It’s the little things that go a long way

title: Controls
review: Could we get some kind of interface when streaming to devices? Once the video gets streamed to a tv via device, there is no way to control play, stop, pause, etc.

title: Really fun a lot of different TV shows wish more movies tho
review: There still came out with it but they need to add more still

title: Does not work for AT&T customer
review:
Since it’s launch and the “free” use of it as an AT&T internet customer, it does not allow me to view anything. Got the first glitches fixed eventually and all was well for a few days. Now it is in an endless loop of signing in or linking my subscription.

Can not view anything again. Worst experience yet

title: Poor Experience
review: I got where I log in through my cable provider Cox. I am in an endless loop where it just keeps asking me to log in and nothing works. Shame that I wasted the time to set up for my family on all our devices. What a waste of time. We are deleting the app from everything and won’t be back. Stick to Netflix and Disney+.

title: The worst app
review: This is the worst app, not user friendly at all.   I have this on my phone and use AirPlay to my TV at home, as soon as my phone times out then the show disconnects... super annoying.   If I’m watching a short series, and the phone goes into sleep mode, then it won’t continuously play the next episode.  NEVER an issue with HBO go.... why is this an issue now?!??

title: Disappointed it’s not available for Firestick
review: HBO max has many great shows and movies to watch, but I’m very disappointed that it’s not available for Firestick or Roku. I would definitely update my rating to be higher if it was more readily available, as I can only watch on my computer currently.

title: Awesome Content
review: I am a long time HBO fan, and was anticipating HBO Max since the announcement. After checking out the app, I was surprised at how much content was on there. I especially love Cartoon Network and TCM on there.

title: Great app PLEASE add more bachelor nation seasons
review: Love this app and I use it all the time but I would love some more bachelor, bachelorette and bachelor and paradise seasons US! I would also love if you could add the show icarly pls! Thanks!!

title: Broken system
review:
I have the HBO channel on my Apple TV 4K. Nearly every time I want to watch a show that is in MAX it says it needs to update the app. Why? I don’t know. The better question is why do I need the app when the HBO channel doesn’t need an app? 

Then, there’s my iPhone, which takes me to the app and then won’t let me watch because it doesn’t think I’m a subscriber.

title: Stupid
review: What the world so now I can’t watch my shows somebody was bored what to upgrade and rename did more stuff so now I have to cancel something still not get my money back charge me I can’t watch I don’t have cable so that’s why I downloaded the app until now !!!! Ugh !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Can’t even watch in my browser all the stupid redirects ugh !!!!!!!!!! Just stupid !!

title: Not a good idea
review: It was really a bad idea to automatically convert the HboNow app to max and remove the ability the view your subscription thru an app any longer. Did you guys not realize that laptop viewing is not practical for everyone when a tv isn’t available? Guess I have to cancel now since Mobile is no longer an option

title: Automatic Update Renders App Useless for Roku Subscribers
review:
I subscribe to HBONow via Roku so this automatic update makes viewing HBONow impossible as HBO could not make a deal with Roku. 

I never asked to for HBOMax. I thought it would be nice to have access via now, but today I just wanted to catch up on an HBO show. And because of the update, I cannot log in!

Please bring HBONow access back or figure out your stuff with Roku.

title: Directv won’t login
review:
I have directv with hbo and I’m logged into the hbo go app, but hbo max claims it can not verify my subscription. This all day without resolution. Ridiculous. 

Edit: day 3 and still no directv login resolution. Hbo is literally taking people’s money during a pandemic without actually offering the services they’ve been selling for months ahead of the release. Your business plan will fail hbo

title: HBO max is a must have
review: Really good so far, content is good I’m sure it’ll get better,  the lay out needs work to make it easer to find stuff but overall it works

title: Crash and burn
review:
The app does an excellent job while streaming, but I’m having quite a bit of difficulty downloading anything and then playing it back.

Was really looking forward to watching a couple movies along my road trip, got everything downloaded and thought I’d be set.

Not the case.  The app repeatedly crashed and reloaded on its own, only to repeat the same error message.

Love the content.  Streaming ability gets a 8/10, but the download option is haggard.

title: Good shows, but
review: I’m stationed overseas in Japan & i cant watch anything because the “area” i’m in doesn’t allow me to. i can’t help where i’m located at and if i’m paying for a subscription i’d like to watch some shows. location requirements are stupid

title: I don’t see the value in this subscription anymore
review: I’ve been subscribed for at least 4 years and I simply don’t see the value anymore unless I want to watch old movies I’ve already seen before. I’d rather pay to rent 2-3 movies a month that I choose. Also, do you know who definitely doesn’t use the term “latinx”? Latino people like myself.

title: HBO Go was better
review: This new service/app lacks a Start Over command for movies.  It is frustrating that the only option is to continue where you left off or rewind a movie or show to the beginning.

title: Good Shows but, Bad App
review: HBO Max has great shows and everything but your app is really bad. To sign in with my tv provider is a long and exhausting mission. I still can’t sign in with it. Every time I try to sign in it says “Oops, something went wrong!”. I’ve had to delete the app and everything more than once. I’d appreciate if you guys would fix this issue.

title: Closed Captioning and other options for people with disabilities
review: It’s a good streaming with a lot of options but it’s closed captioning does not work. Also audio with description would be great and expand accessibility to other users

title: No favorites option
review: I like the variety of options given what I don’t like is the function where u can add a watch list.. there’s no where to continue watching a series needs improvement

title: HBO MAX IS SO FRUSTRATING!
review: I have a Roku TV and Cox cable. So I cannot watch HBO Max on my smart TV or through my cable provider even though I use my cox credentials to login to HBO Max??? Why does cox contour not have an HBO Max app when they have Netflix and Prime? Bottom line, I’m not going to watch it through my phone so HBO just lost a subscriber even though it came to me FOR FREE through cox. If I can’t watch it on my tv I’m not using it.

title: Super Good! Needs Roku Extension!
review: I really like this app! It’s my favorite streaming service I’ve used so far BUT I can’t keep my subscription going unless it’s available on Roku TV. Until then I can’t commit to the service.

title: Won’t work right with AirPlay
review:
Keeps say that it cannot play the video on Airplay and that I am not connected to the internet yet all other apps and internet videos work flawlessly. HBO needs to fix their app now.

Did everything they suggested and still will not work correctly. Subscription is being cancelled, waste of money!

title: Will not allow me to login
review: Every time I try to login it asks me who’s watching and then it takes me back to a screen that says subscribe or link my subscription. I’m tired of reaching out for help to login. Also, not available on Firestick, Roku or my tv,  so I have to watch on my phone or computer. That wouldn’t bother me so much if I was actually capable of logging in. 🤬

title: Needs major improvements in UI
review:
To browse different episodes or swipe between seasons is challenging. Also, the browsing slows down when rewind or forward pressed.

I hope these two improvements soon especially with switching episodes and seasons.

title: Make it available for everyone who paid for it.
review: I purchased a subscription months ago only to find out I can’t watch it on my roku TVs. Fortunately I have another device but many people do not so one star is all I’ll give. The app itself has worked great and has great content but that doesn’t matter if everyone can’t enjoy.

title: No mobile provider login In
review: Downloaded the app and found to be very disappointed that when I try to log in there is no option for mobile provider since that is were my free subscription is with so can you please add a mobile provider instead of a tv provider only and I will then give you a better review

title: Good content. UI is god awful
review:
I’ve worked in software for over 10
Years and I have to say that this HBOMax UI is the single worst app I have ever used. The UX is infuriating and it’s clear that HBO either contracted this to a crap software company or took their worst employees and put them in charge of this... complete lack of care.

Did no one test this thing before launching it?

title: Really disappointed!
review: Let’s be honest they made it sound like they were going to have have everything Warner Media had on this streaming. Turns out it pretty much the same thing as HBO GO. If they were to put everything that Warner Media had on it would keep it, but it was it has maybe 10%.

title: Great but...
review: Great streaming service only thing that stinks is that it’s not available on Roku they need to change that quickly.

title: Movie I was in the middle of watching just disappeared from search
review: I had to reboot my iPad due to network issues and wanted to continue watching the 2nd movie in a series. I cannot even locate it in search anymore. I can find the first and last one in the trilogy in search but not the 2nd one. This is a really bad user experience.

title: Does not work offline
review: I downloaded shows to watch while being offline and within a couple of days the app stopped working. So, I had to commute to someplace with internet to re-authenticate the app. I’ll change this review when this is fixed.

title: Useless
review:
Update: Unhelpful response from the developers. Product still doesn’t work.

Doesn’t work with my Roku anymore and I dislike going through my cable service to attempt to sift through. HBO has always been pricy, now it’s just a pointless subscription. Don’t bother unless you only like watching things on your phone.

title: Buggy with airplay
review: When I try to airplay hbo from my iPhone to iMac, only the audio will play with no video. All other apps work flawlessly with airplay videos. I don’t know what’s wrong but will definitely be unsubscribing due to this issue. Please fix. When I airplay using QuickTime no video shows, audio plays with a black screen. Fix this you morons.

title: Seriously! How can u give less than 5 stars?
review:
Im reading all of these reviews and I am shock! When Disney+ first came out it was terrible to find stuff. Disney+ improved!

HBOMAX has like everything non-disney. Scoobydoo, flintstones, looney toons, DC movies, great movie selections and tv show selections.  

I do wish they would load all of the old looney toons on there but i can wait. Theres so much to watch i am so excited.

Worth it!

title: Terrible Subtitles if mirroring to TV. Deal Breaker.
review:
No app for LG TV! Almost deal-breaker.  Very difficult to Mirror to LG TV,  but ultimately doable. However, subtitles horrific! infinitesimal   and worse yet, all over the TV screen. Suddenly top left corner to right lower corner In the middle of a sentence! Amazingly stupid.

Who wants to watch a 2 hour movie on a tiny iPhone instead of a 65" TV?

title: Not up to date.
review: The app is ok, with great content. But when I log onto it on a console it has way more content. The mobile app doesn’t have joker, and is missing category’s on the side menu. Please update the app to include all the content.

title: Offline viewing not working
review: I downloaded shows to watch offline. I have the cellular settings turned off to ensure I don’t use cellular data to stream. As soon as I open the app, a message showing, “Can’t Connect” appears and I cannot do anything else except close the app.

title: Rockstart app!
review: HBO MAX has an endless gallery of movies, TV shows, Max originals and many more. It is pretty straight forward to use and I can stream in my phone, tablet and TVs. Thank you!!

title: APP NEEDS WORK!!!
review: I downloaded a few shows but the app doesn’t recognize it as being downloaded and you have to stream anyway. The resume feature doesn’t work very well. It says resume but restarts the programming anyway.

title: Movies restart a beginning after closing app
review: Would be great if you could pause movie and return to it without having to try and fast forward to spot where you left off.

title: Can’t sign in thru AT&T provider
review:
My AT&T mobile plan includes HBO Max. Cannot sign in on either iPad or iPhone. Called AT&T, they confirmed I have a subscription but after 1.5 hours on the phone no one can get it to work. Just stuck in a loop trying to sign in. Many users have a similar complaint 
The worst thing that ever happened to HBO was being purchased by AT&T.

title: Caption settings
review:
Captions appear on the top and font is too big. Covers half the screen. Other than that great app.
Fixed

title: They really make it seem like they have everything when they don’t
review: They don’t offer a lot of good content and as of June 2020 no amazing original tv shows or movies I don’t think this app was ready for release it’s not available on a lot of platforms like Fire tv and smart tv it’s just Very empty and needs more variety, shows movies and originals

title: Challenging to access
review: With the switch from HBO Now to Max, the experience is very disjointed. Apple TV offers to sign in with a provider, but then says to go to a website or download an app. Download an app, to sign in via provider, only to find the subscription is not supported. What a waste- why not allow me to access on the tv, or at least a website.

title: Was Really Excited to Watch Friends Again
review: I downloaded this app just for a handful of shows, mainly Friends, and I’m sincerely disappointed. The app constantly shuts down, says episodes are “unavailable” and isn’t even available for download on my Firestick so I have to “AirPlay” it to my TV which hosts its own problems. Overall just upset the app doesn’t work.

title: So so
review: I honestly thought it would have more content from CN,CR, TCM oh and some Cinemax series on there like Banshee but a las no. But my major gripe is the lack of Spanish subtitles, the Latino selection is limited and not having subs on the other shows and movies is honestly kinda sad to see from Warner.

title: Content is great, but app is glitchy
review: I cannot get the shows/movies to play because the live area to simply click “play” does not work for me. It has always worked on the other HBO apps, so I’m unsure why it’s not working on this own!

title: Underwhelming and disappointing
review: Yes, it is an improvement over HBO NOW, but there is a ton of missing content across the various hubs it offers, namely DC, Cartoon Network, and Crunchyroll. And so many movies I expected across WBs massive platform. Disney+ this is not. Not even close. In its current state, I don’t see myself staying with it past the first month.

title: Best streaming service that has everything
review: HBO Max is by far the best streaming service there is. Watching all of the classic CN shows and my favorite show Summer Camp Island, this platform is for everybody

title: Love the content, app has a ways to go
review: It takes several tries to connect to google chrome. I can’t figure out a reason. But love the content

title: HBO Max app
review: Really good shows but a bad streaming app. Plays videos when it wants to, some shows have no sound and really slow. HBO please work on this I haven’t been able to watch a show in the past you two days. Mostly every day I have to reset my Samsung tv and re-download your app that sometimes helps to get sound back.

title: Hardly any content to choose from of any streaming service
review: They have the least amount of any streaming service. Only reason I have it, is it offered free in my AT&T unlimited package. Or I wouldn’t pay for the trash streaming service. Disney has more, which they are really lacking. You can arrived very late, and threw trash up to get going.

title: Some Problems
review: The app is great but whenever I try to log in thru a browser I always get a error page. Nothing on help HBO Max is helping.(It is a mac from 2015 fully updated.)

title: Can’t Download Movies & not compatible with Apple TV
review: Every time i leave the app while I’m waiting for the download, it stops the download and I have to start it over. Once i finally got one to download (by leaving my phone on and on the app for like 3 hours which is ridiculous) I couldn't stream it on Apple TV so I wasted my time downloading it anyways.

title: HBO IS OVERPRICED
review:
Netflix is about the same price but it has way more content and the all is way better with different languages, fast interface and skip intros . 
But I love hbo they got good series but not too much

title: At least 4 stars if app had auto-play
review: I really like the programing and being able to Chomecast to TV. App works as expected except auto-play cannot be disabled. I do not understand is why there is no option to turn off autoplay. Other similar services and apps provide an option to turn off auto-play.

title: I’d Like to Have HBO NOW Again.
review: I miss things about the old app, like the “Collections” category. Also, HBO MAX simply has more offerings than I need. It’s a lot to sift through. I appreciated being able to get right to the quality offerings of HBO NOW. Can I change it back?

title: Needs work
review: The app is not that bad I’ll say but it needs work. The CC need to be more subtle, it’s all over the place. The last thing i think the app needs is a skip intro, I don’t want to see the same intro over and over again.

title: Good content but bad streaming
review: I like the content because  is the stuff I don’t see in any other streaming app. My main problem with this app is that I could only watch movies or shows when it’s not LTE

title: Missing HBO Now
review:
It used to be with HBO now (what I subscribe to)that if a movie or a show appeared as an option, I would just click on it and watch. Now I get all these possibilities of viewing options that require that I upgrade my service to view. I just want a list of what’s available and nothing else…

Also, the app on my Apple TV is a clunky mess.

title: Limited availability - please add to Roku
review:
My cell phone plan offer Now included for free, which would be cool but as it’s not available on Roku (one of, if not the most common steaming device) - it’s basically worthless to me. 

I’m also honestly too confused by the Now/Go/Max setup. Is it really necessary to have so many different platforms? Please HBO, simplify and increase ease of access.

title: This app is goated
review: This is automatically goated they got every single show accept for one idc y’all tweaking this streaming is raw for FREE! Y’all must off the pack or sum cuz.y’all tweaking writing one star! 🚫🧢

title: Logging in through mobile provider won’t allow me to login
review: My subscription with my mobile says I get HBO max for free. I have my login information and your app keeps telling me it cannot verify me. This is through At&t. I even reset my password and called at&t support to make sure it’s not a mistake and I am eligible for the service. Not a good first impression.

title: App is not accessible
review: Said thanks, but no thanks to HBO max email invitation for a free trial. The app is not accessible using a screen reader and none of the programming has audio description. Shame. Because, when I was fully cited, HBO was my favorite network. However, until the app is accessible and programming has audio description, HBO will not be getting any of my disposable income.

title: Loading and App Issues
review: Text from my cell provider saying I could get it as part of my package. Says sign in with provider. Loading issues galore, didn’t let me sign in with my provider, had to sign up as a new user. Turns out Do Not Sell my Privacy note was defaulted to off... and then the UI is terrible! Is this really what all the hype was about?

title: Spectacular! Amazing! Great! Beautiful!
review: Top of the line streaming service. So much content it’s actually overwhelming. I’ve never been in awe with a streaming service until now. HBO Max is in opinion THE BEST!!!!

title: Its a awesome apps but it need other language
review: Its almost perfect but it need spanish lenguage or subtitle to be on the top then I give you a 5 star... I hope they can change this very soon as they can

title: HBO Max off to a great start
review: The app is smooth and intuitive. Don’t get me started on the content, all my favorite shows and movies. Classics and original series!!

title: Awesome App, Hope we get AEW on here soon
review: The app has a huge variety of shows and movies to watch, currently binging the Spawn TV series. It deserves five stars for the Watchmen show alone. Hope to one day see AEW PPVs on here!

title: First review!
review: Pretty good selection of new stuff, although it was just a merging of the hbo app. Adding of dc and wb catalog is a nice addition. Plus all the Nightmare on Elm streets are on there.  Can’t wait for more to be added.

title: Downloading movies and shows
review: When you download something you still need data to watch what you have downloaded which defeats the whole purpose of downloading something.

title: Former HBO subscriber - this is painful
review: I subscribed to HBO for a long time, including the GoT years. I’m trying to access HBO Max on my TV and it has been an absolute disaster. It keeps asking me for a Samsung payment system. I use Apple Pay and Airplay. My fiancé uses Samsung and tried her phone (which goes to her card so she’s not happy) and that doesn’t work either. It’s an absolute mess.

title: Doesn’t work with the Apple AV adapter anymore
review: I really enjoyed watching HBO Max while traveling in my RV. But since the last update, my adapter no longer works. I’ve been trying to get a answer why for two weeks now from HBO Max but they are of zero help. I call and they say one of their specialists will contact you, but they don’t. I expected more from HBO Max.

title: Continued problems
review: This app is terrible. It continues to log me out and requires me to verify my subscription. I’m eligible through AT&T but it is constantly unable to verify my validity. Then when I finally get it to work, it works for a few days and then I have to troubleshoot all over again. Terrible interface by far. Fix this *^%#.

title: Great content but app has major issues
review:
1. Cannot add default play mode like chrome cast or airplay 
2. Cannot autoplay on AirPlay. System resets after end of the episode and need to disconnect and reconnect airplay to continue playing.
3. Wish there was an app on the TV store

title: Please design a better app!
review: Shows sometimes cannot be condensed down into a mini player... while in the middle of watching a show there is no way to see how many episodes of that show are available... can’t you just copy the netflix app? ;-)

title: A lot of bugs
review: The streaming stops way too often and I know it’s not my internet because everything else streams fine. HBO NOW was great never had an issue but this new app is making me think twice about renewing. And also the chrome cast icon disappears all the time.

title: HBOMAX Content
review: I love the DC content, it’s by far my favorite! Please keep on adding more contact on this particular section. It’d be really nice to have all the animated and live action movies on here!

title: Ehhh
review: It’s great to be able to download the shows I used to be able to download from Prime, sopranos, generation kill, band of brothers, etc. the problem is that app is clunky and buggy and not very intuitive. They could learn a lesson or 5 from Netflix, prime, Disney

title: Had to delete
review: I had an HBO Now account until a few minutes ago. The fact that you’re forcing customers to create a whole new HBO account and download a new App and not have that easily transferable is alarming in this day and age and for such a large company. It’s  basic customer satisfaction. Keep up with your competition. Sashay away!

title: Still crap
review: This is my second time reviewing this crappy app. Although I like the content I just wish I could watch a show or movie without it freezing up. Please update the app again and fix it this time! Since HBO is fighting with Dish Network this is the only way I can watch my shows. But too many infuriating glitches

title: HBO Now not supported???
review: I’ve been a long time HBO Now subscriber (started just to watch Game of Thrones but then kept my subscription and stayed loyal to the service in between seasons and after it ended), and yet now that they debut their new Max subscription they “update” the app to the Max app and leave their loyal Now subscribers in the dust? Thanks for the middle finger, HBO, you’ve lost yourself a customer.

title: Stupid
review: Are use a Roku device I downloaded the HBO app on my Roku I pay a monthly fee for it and yet there is no app on my Apple iPad where I can stream HBO neither one of the HBO now or HBO max apps work to watch the HBO that I pay for on it. I stream more for my tablet than I do my TV as I am away from the home a lot. Think I’m going to cancel my HBO altogether. The HBO app used to work but no longer not Roku friendly.

title: Great app but has a major glitch!
review: Overall great selection of shows, but I was watching the Doctor Who episode Hell bent and the characters were speaking in Spanish. Please fix immediately. This could be affecting other shows too.

title: this app is a disgrace
review:
You pause a show, come back later, it starts from the begining...
You download a show, you watch it, it has “connection” issues ...
I started an HBO trial and on the first episode of the first show I tried to watch I can say I am cancelling it and never coming back to HBO.
A netword that produces this piece of crap as software does not deserve a cent from me.

title: Nothing special!
review: There’s definitely nothing ground breaking here. I believe they spent more time and money on the commercial for HBO Max than the actual service. I have it “free” through Xfinity, otherwise I wouldn’t pay for it. I already have a multitude of other streaming services to numb me out.

title: needs spanish dubs
review: Netflix, disney+, and apple tv all have extensive language support.  When i used to get hbo through a cable provider almost all the hbo shows had spanish dubbing and subtitles. There seems to be no way to stream hbo shows with spanish dubbing.  Very, very disappointed. Give me spanish dubs of the hbo shows and I will be happy to pay 15$ per month.

title: Great App, works only when it wants
review:
I love the selection on this app! But I can’t ever seem to get it to stream for long periods of time to Tv through HDMI. It just buffers forever. 
I would love this app if the functionality of it were improved.

title: works very poorly on Chromecast
review: Love HBO but it doesn’t stream properly on Chromecast via iPhone — buffers all the time, can’t skip intro theme music, closed captions are in and out,and usually have no way to fast forward, pause, or rewind because the app loses your place in shows. I don’t have any of these issues with other streaming apps, only HBO.

title: Can’t Connect or Airplay
review: I’ve had this app for less than 48 hours and it has been giving me a “can’t connect” error message for the past 12 hours. I’m also not a fan of how I can’t airplay to my TV while using this app. Not a great first impression. I’m paying for my HBO subscription, please let me watch when and how I’d like to.

title: Good shows, terrible app
review: Yes you have a ton of crap that I want to watch, but that can only happen if I get the dang app to work. It’s sloppy and struggles insanely hard (especially on the PS4) I’m hoping that since it seems to be down right now we’ll get some better interfacing with an update.

title: Upset
review: I am a uverse customer and pay for HBO service through them. I used to really enjoy HBO GO to watch many of your shows especially since the offerings provided with on demand are so limited. Now you have eliminated that and are charging for hbo max I have decided to call uverse and drop HBO. By the way I’ve had HBO for over 20 years. Way to go!

title: Disappointed
review: I love the movie collection but I am having so many issues with the app. The movies take forever to load and many times the movie played without sound. I have good internet connection and I am streaming on a Samsung 4k UHD smart TV. It’s the only app I have issues with and I only hope they would do better

title: Airplane Mode Problems
review: The shows are awesome but the app has some serious issues.  It won’t play movies on airplane mode. Downloaded several movies for a plane ride and only ONE worked.  Not impressed. If it’s not that, then it pops an error message stating to close the app and restart again.

title: No Roku app?
review: Until a Roku app finally comes along, I find the HBO Max app pretty pointless. I don't watch shows and movies on my phone--talk about neck and eye strain! If an app for Roku isn't forthcoming, I'm canceling my subscription. I get enough quality shows through Netflix. Get with the  program folks! Nobody got time for this.

title: Don’t waste your time
review: Literally. This may be the streaming app with the absolute worst functionality possible. Be prepared to waste tons of time trying to navigate something as simple as signing on via your TV provider. Imagine paying $16 a month for an app that is continually saying “connectivity issues”, and that’s about what it’s like to have HBO Max.

title: CC not working
review: I have tried everything; I restarted my ipad/app, updated ios into the newest version, and turned on the cc menu in my settings > accessibility. But the CC isn’t working still. It works perfectly with my HP laptop (chrome browser). What’s wrong with this app? What’s the point of having CC menu if it isn’t working???

title: Why y’all gotta be so difficult?
review:
1) I can’t login without the internet provider’s login and being a poor millennial during COVID times, I live with my parents and my dad will not share his account information or log into my device with his login info

2) As of July 31st, 2020 the app is no longer supported on Xbox One.

Not a user friendly application 😬

title: Reconnection Problems
review: I love the shows they have on here but I hate that I have to go back into search for the show I’m currently watching to pick the next episode, also it seems to loose connection a lot!

title: Offline use
review: I love the app and content. But there’s the issue of when I download and go to work where I don’t have phone service. It get error codes and can’t access my downloads. When I reconnect I have to sign back in every time. But when I go offline the issuer repeats

title: Poor opening
review: The fact that I can’t watch this on Roku or Fire TV, combined with the poor UI on the web player, makes this a very poor launch for this service. The only thing giving it 2 stars is the amount of content available

title: Love having Friends again but app is annoying
review: Hard to navigate to other episodes on a series. And you can’t turn off auto play which is really frustrating. I like to fall asleep watching tv, but I hate waking up a full season ahead of where I was.

title: Worked for a week, then stopped.
review: This app worked for a week, and now it keeps wanting me to sign in over and over again. My AT&T account says it is part of my plan, confirmed by their store representative. However, still won’t let me sign correctly. Absolute useless, and we have tried several devices.

title: Turn off auto play
review: Every other streaming app has this feature. Please an an option to turn off auto play or a sleep timer feature.

title: Don’t delete hbo now
review: Hbo now in its infinite wisdom will only play specific shows in surround sound mode. Not an issue unless you use chromecast and want to control volume from your iPhone like i do.  Hbo now let you do ot, hbo max doesn’t, and i cannot see a way to go back.  Big mistake deleting hbo now.

title: Won’t accept my ATT Uverse Account
review:
The list of providers for sign in does not show ATT Uverse. I tried signing in under just ATT, but gets rejected. So won’t work. I’m only able to use HBO Go.

Update: HBO Max sent me a generic response that was not helpful at all. If they read my original review they would understand the problem. I have ATT Uverse and it is not in list of providers to sign in with.

title: No fire stick support
review:
What’s a tv service worth if it doesn’t work on my streaming device. Answer: not a thing. 

Guys this is simple. HBO Now worked on Firestick. HBO Max should as well. Whatever argument you have you need to resolve. Because I’m not paying $15 a month to watch this on my phone.

title: The app is crap
review: It can not load all the movie thumbnails. When you scroll down several times then the thumbnails stops loading. The search input is ridiculous, does not allow voice search. Extremely bad when using it on appletv. Slow and sometimes it crashes

title: Can’t watch it....
review: I have the app on my iPad, but because I pay through roku, I cannot watch it. Because “my provider isn’t supported.” I would love to watch it, I have had hbo now for a while and liked it. So as soon as I can watch it, I’ll most likely be happy. So I’ll give it 2 stars for now.

title: Let down// SUBTITLES DONT SHOW
review:
Theres NOT alot. Ive seen much of this stuff except for a few things. 
Also subtitles are missing? On my mobile device. I was lead to believe this app would be amazing and next best thing and I’ve been left short handed. Yall need to add more cartoons/stuff /original content to it or something

title: Not worth the money
review: Why is there not hbo max on fire sticks and rocu witch covers about 70% of the worlds steaming devises its mainly only for mobile devises. Small screens that cover about 1/100 of my tv this is the worst streaming app I’ve seen the only reason I’m keeping it is because it’s the only streaming app with the show friends other than that I don’t suggest this app.

title: Geographical Restriction
review: I’ve always loved HBO. I can’t, however, use it whenever I travel outside of US. Hopefully this new feature allows me to continue using the app even outside of US.

title: UI, functionality, and login are terrible
review:
UI makes it difficult to navigate between content and to pause, play, skip, etc. If I’m in the middle of a show, no I don’t want to scroll to see what else is available to watch, I want a big set of pause/skip buttons

No option to skip recap or theme song at beginning of shows

Tried a bazillion times to login to no avail. I knew I was using the right login — it worked on other devices. I had to change my password.

Not a good combo. Switching back to a web application and an HDMI cord to the TV instead of this crap 😑

title: Promo rate defaulted to full price early
review: I had to cancel because our promo rate defaulted back to the full price after someone selected restore purchase on a new device. We tried contacting Apple and HBO and nobody will get back to us so we’ll just had to cancel. Maybe next time.

title: Disappointed
review: Love all the shows, hate the app.  Super glitchy.  The only way to watch it on my TV is with Chromecast and it never finds the signal.  Not an issue with the Chromecast because all the other apps find it no problem.  What a hassle!!  Might as well delete it. :(

title: This app isn’t accessible
review: I’ve heard great things about this app, and the amazing selection of movies and shows on it. However, I am blind and use a screen reader to navigate my phone, and this app doesn’t work with my screen reader. So I cannot browse. This is very disappointing and I hope that the developers fix it.

title: Great Content but awful quality
review: I would love to love this app but the quality is just awful. Constant pixelation, streaming always buffering and error messages when the streaming can’t go anymore. I’m using this on a Apple TV 4K with 1GB speed internet so it’s not my connection.

title: Download and transfer to usb
review: Please do something that we can download and transfer it to pc or hard or usb

title: Need auto play option
review: Nothing like falling asleep and waking up with your phone dead because it played HBO for 6 hours and burned 2.2 gigs of data. There needs to be an option to turn off auto play.

title: What is HBO Max?
review:
My app auto updated and now I can’t watch anything. What am I paying money for?

Update 1: Was contacted by the developer. I guess they don’t understand the problem. Was told to reinstall the app. The problem is I’m paying for HBO Now. A service that exists on Roku, but not on iPhone. Just give me back the now app. Until then this app is useless.

title: You guys really need to look at what other streaming apps provide for their customers
review: What’s the purpose of having an option to download content when you need WiFi or data in order to access said downloads

title: Greed and stupidity
review:
If you download a show so that you can watch it when you don’t have internet, you’ll find that it won’t matter. The app won’t even start up if you don’t have internet. Very frustrating. I’ll be cancelling...

Go with Netflix. They actually let you watch the stuff you download for offline use.

title: LOVE IT...
review: I have been looking for the buddies series and I finally found it on this app. They also have other great films! I 100% recommend!

title: Missing feedback, search options
review: Fast and pretty clean.  App needs feedback option and better search than just by title (eg, ability to search and sort by year released)

title: Great library of shows and movies
review: HBO max has an amazing library of shows and movies. The only thing I would change is make it accessible on fire stick and rlly tv’s

title: Awesome.
review: Even though expensive than other streaming services, but still worth to pay fir rich contents lib.

title: Sound keeps going out, app keeps crashing
review: Having a hard time keeping the app open it keeps crashing then when it does play within 8 minutes of the movie the sound goes out. I repeatedly closed the app to still no sound on the movie hopefully it gets better with time

title: Glitches
review: Content for doctor who ever other episode is in Spanish . No way to correct it. Apple 4K, XR cellphones. Anything new. Called customer support. They act like they were not aware have no way to report it. Glad this is just a trial. For all the rest complaining about This not being available. Don’t know why your in an Apple forum complaining.

title: Navigation is horrible
review: Navigation is horrible and easy to learn. Why would you press on a textual header to go back to a list? It seems like this was made without any actual UX designers in the room.

title: Doctor Who Marathon!!
review: I got this app just for Doctor Who but then i saw a bunch of other things i want to watch!! I just wish they would put the app on roku.

title: Downloaded content fails to play without an internet connection?
review: The content on HBO max is great but the app doesn’t work well. The most frustrating thing is that downloaded content frequently fails during playback and returns an error.

title: Signing in
review: I’ve been trying to sign in with my email and password and it still says they are having issues I love having to wait for over an hour and I’ve been just wanting to watch the shows and movies on it

title: DONT PAY $15/month for this
review: This is kinda a crappy service. I wouldn’t pay $3 for this. You can’t get it on Roku TVs, they remove movies out of the blue, you have to be connected to wifi to watch, and there’s barely any good shows. Just get Netflix and save yourself $7 a month.

title: GET THIS ON ROKU!
review: I have been waiting ever since this launched for HBO Max to be on Roku and it hasn’t happened! I want to be able to play Sesame Street for my baby sibling and Max is never there when I want it the most! The library is great but, it doesn’t matter if I can’t watch it on most of my streaming devices.

title: HBO max
review: This is the best app I’ve ever had in my entire life. This app has everything I want to watch like it is unbelievable. I’m loving this app this app gives me life. 😁

title: Junk
review: I am so upset Comedy Central switched to this. I would give it negative stars if possible. You have to download the episodes you want to watch and then still it wouldn’t play. No streaming. The option to watch on tv with chromecast didn’t work. Doesn’t even give an option to work with firestick. Just a garbage app

title: Very disappointing
review: I don’t appreciate you advertising your ad-FREE streaming service when you give me ads based off of HBO products. I want that stuff to be on my recommended not forced for me to look at, with the cost of this service you shouldn’t be forcing these things.

title: Shows are good but...
review: I love the new shows but as a Roku user I am still sad I cannot use this on my tv. I understand they didn’t sign a contract together but recently I’ve been using hbo now on my Roku and it won’t let me see anything or it will say your session is up. Very disappointed.

title: Missing 4K
review: I like the new HBO Max service, but how is it 2020 and it doesn’t even offer 4K content. At the price of the service which has 4K (3x the cost of its cheapest competitor which does) it should definitely offer the premium streaming quality.

title: Airplay ALWAYS glitchy
review: I love everything this app has to offer, but my only problem is that when I try to airplay to my TV it only works once in a while and when it does work it episodes do not continuously play. Extremely frustrating!!!

title: Too many problems
review:
First of all your app has problem to display subtitles on my iPhone XS Max ,I have tried many times but ended in vain.
The second problem is your app reacts too slow and dull.
Please tackle them soon.

title: Waste. Of. Time. And. Money.
review: The title says it all. To avoid the glitches , or so we thought, we would download the episodes of the show we wanted to watch. I guess the joke is on us. Downloads don’t play half the time. In fact, most of the time. What a horrible app. I would give it a negative rating if such a thing was possible.

title: My experience with hbo max
review: When I was watching the first episode of Close Enough the audio is being delayed at least by a second off, like it’s not in sync with the show.

title: The noise level
review: I was excited that hbo max would have studio ghibli but once I clicked the movie the background music was just too loud and could barely hear the characters speaking. I have tried my best to change that but it did not work. Ruined my watching experience.

title: no roku
review: i will not be renewing my subscription until there is an app available on roku. every TV in my house is a roku, so i have no way of watching anything on here unless i watch on my phone (which i hate, why should i have to watch stuff i pay for on a tiny screen??)

title: Casting to TV difficult...
review: Casting could be better. It takes longer to cast to the TV and all the controls disappear on the app. Usually have to restart the movie all over again. After trying the HBO now app... that app worked better.

title: closed captioning bug for iPad Pro.
review: Despite trouble shooting with tech and lack of response from ‘superiors’ the cc still doesn’t work on iPad Pro. Works on my cell and kids iPad but not mine. I am frustrated as that is my preferred device and I’m deaf. I wish there was better support for the app.

title: Should be great but nope
review: You guys are charging more than any other streaming service, yet I keep getting the “we’re having trouble” notification, therefore I can’t sign in. Those two things don’t go together. Get your s*#t together, or lower your price to free, because that’s what your worth at this point. $15 to watch, what a waste!

title: Great content but app is missing critical features
review:
Features missing :-
1. Auto pause after inactivity. Or turn off auto play. 
2. Ability to select episode from homepage instead of having to search for show.

title: Doesn’t work
review: I’ve had to open and close the app multiple times to get the movie or show i’m trying to watch to start playing. Most of the time that still doesn’t work though. Uninstalling the app and reinstalling still did not fix the problem, you’re wasting my money HBO

title: First I just want to say
review: Is it just me or like every title is see is “cool but...” and also why does it load every 5 seconds or so

title: ipad app
review: I wish there was a vertical version for iPad just like in the phone one, I hate having it sideways, wish you could watch vertically as well on ipad and iPhone!!

title: Glitchy
review: The content is good. Nice to see stuff in addition to HBO. But I keep getting cellular data warnings even though I am on my home WiFi. Annoying to keep having this stupid pop up for no reason.  I’ll stick with HBO go.

title: Dussatisfied
review: I am frustrated with this s app. I have HBO and trying to long in is terrible. I got charged for the subscription.  If I already have HBO there is supposed  to be no charge. They make it completely difficult to sign into the HBO app takes right to make a payment. I want this subscription  ended and any charge that I got to be reimbursed

title: Show download error
review: Is anybody else getting a download error when trying to download a show to watch offline? I haven’t been able to get it to work. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling, and nothing has changed. Any answers?

title: Refused my sign in credentials
review:
I have 1 Gig internet and have called customer support multiple times to access HBO max.   Conflicting information given   About sign up or not?  One person said I have account another said no.  Another said they would call when issue was resolved  2 days later and 
Still not working..  

Waiting still..

One more step.   Says I’ve signed in then comes with message  
Can’t verify your account.  Message says to repeat steps I’ve already gone thru-    What in the directions needs repeating again?   The grey box is non informative at all.

title: Lags like crazy
review: The movies take forever to load, the quality is awful, the movies look like they are being played from a cd with scratches. Too expensive for the poor quality. I am 30 minutes into Harry Potter and have been watching for an hour with how many times it has stopped.

title: Great shows, subpar streaming service
review: I love many shows HBO produces, but lacking the content that was originally in 4K (and available elsewhere in 4K), HDR, Dolby Vision or Dolby Atmos in 2020 show that the streaming service wasn’t yet ready for prime time.  HBO is behind their competition, and I honestly had higher expectations from them. There is no “Max” here yet.

title: Brand new customer
review:
Omg, not political ads!
I am a brand-new customer. I took advantage of the $0.99 offer for a year. So far I am quite happy with the service except for one thing. I don’t have a problem with the commercials since I knew it would happen due to the offer price. What I don’t like is the same commercials over and over again. It seems like when watching a program with several episodes, there is a repetition of ads which is, quite honestly, not going to get me out there for those products. 
There are a few older dramas (and probably sitcoms that aren’t already in syndication) that I would like to watch, namely “Cold Case,” “Boston Public,” “Falcon Crest,” and “Picket Fences.” I’m sure that there are more, but I cannot come up with them at this time. 
I’ll keep watching. The old shows are usually much better than the reality shows like the Kardashians and Real Housewives that are on now.

title: Make it easier to switch plans!
review: as a new user i of course decided to go with the cheaper plan to “try it out”. i haven’t even gotten thru the first episode of the show i was dying to watch and i’m already so over all of these ads! the option to upgrade isn’t even on the app.. i had to go log in on the web which again requires way more clicks than necessary.. although after reading reviews i guess it’s a good thing it’s not so easy because apparently you have to wait until your current subscription is cancelled which completes a month later!??? OMG! you’d think you would want to make your new subscribers experience the best.. again you should make it easier to upgrade or start everyone out with the BEST plan first.. and then give them the option to switch once the free trial ends.. just saying.. i don’t plan to cancel right away.. i guess i’ll leave it on during the free trial and use the app if i’m that desperate to watch an episode i’m willing to sit thru the same ads over and over every few minutes while trying to get thru an episode. best believe my subscription will be cancelled as soon as the trial is up! so disappointing! ugh!

title: Never ending issues
review:
You would think for app with this many subscribers and this high of a subscription rate (for the live tv) the least they could do is make an app that works.

The app has near constant glitches. It often plays the audio of one show while a completely different show plays. It never remembers where you left off in a show so you have to watch the same commercial breaks again. It freezes, it crashes. It has the worst UI. You can’t set shows that you’ve recorded to automatically delete after you’ve watched them so you have to do it manually. Even when you record shows, you can only fast forward through the commercials maybe 25% of the time. One show I record never records the whole episode. Even after I delete it, it stays this way. Then miraculously, after a week, the full episode appears. Seems like this app is perpetually a year behind it’s competitors. 

I really hope someone reads this and looks into all these perpetual issues, but I’m not holding my breath. Get it together. You owe your paying customers more than this.

title: Could be way better
review: At first I loved this app then after using it for a awhile I found all the glitches. The time it takes to download a movie and all the buffering makes it difficult to even watch a show or a movie. I pay the extra for no commercials but by the time it buffers 25 times through the movie or show.... I give up. It never used to do this so much but now it’s all the time. I go to the other competition movie app and it doesn’t do it on that app so I know it’s not my internet. Did you get rid of someone that knew what they were doing tech wise??? Also they used to change the movie choices more often and have newer movies, even better that the competition, but now the movies are always the same and all OLD movies and horror film it’s boring and sickening. There used to be more choices, what about PBS, what about getting up to date history channel. I’d like to see some historical dramas and movies!! I pay my fee each month and I’m barely getting good use out of the app. I Really think I’ll discontinue my subscription.

title: Buffering, Glitches, Selection or Movies and Shows, and ADSS
review:
Buffering and Glitches•

The app has a nice selection of shows and tv shows. But it buffers and glitches A LOT!!! This makes it hard and annoying to watch stuff. It took me 20 minutes to get a movie started. I had to constantly restart the app and exit in and out of the app; to stop the glitches. I’ve checked my WiFi and it works perfectly. You would think with the updates it has they would have already fixed the constant buffering, loading, and glitches. It gets to the point where I can’t, don’t, or want to even bother to use the app. 

Selection of Movies and Shows•

Another problem which isn’t that big is the selection of Movies and Shows. Don’t get me wrong it has an “okay” selection but they don’t update it that much. They don’t have much of the movies or shows I’m looking for. A lot of the shows they have aren’t that popular. I find it hard to not rewatch most of the same stuff. I’ve had this app for a year now and have watched mostly everything I’m interested in. 

Commercials•

The commercials and constant ads in the app make me go CRAZY. There are so many commercials. I just want to watch something without commercials every 10-15 minutes.

With all this I recommend Netflix or another app to watch stuff. But if you are looking for a specific show that is anti popular this app probably has it. The app has issues where it gets to the point you don’t want to use it.

title: Choose Wisely
review: Whatever you do, pick the plan you want from the get go. Do not try to change your plan after the fact. It doesn’t work. You will have to cancel your subscription and wait for its termination date - one month later. I didn’t think I minded having ads and then it hits you with these gross 70 second ads. I can’t watch those every 5-8 minutes when I’m just trying to enjoy a show. So I tried to change to the Hulu(no ads) plan but it won’t let me until my old plan terminates. So I tried making another account. Didn’t work; it recognizes that you have another account and says, “would you like to sign in with this one?”. When you hit no it doesn’t go through with the new account and if you hit yes, you weren’t making a new account to begin with. I’ve had this app for maybe an hour and already a huge turnoff. 3/5: the video quality was good in the 5-8 minutes I could stand watching. But most everything else is maddening.

title: Great Content. Terrible layout.
review: I love the shows on this platform. But I run in to so many problems with quickly starting where I left off after my previous view sessions. It takes me a minute or two to get back to the episode I was watching, WHICH IS A PROBLEM I DONT INTO WITH ANY OTHER PLATFORMS. Very disappointed with the customer inference & the interaction I have had with it so far. The way the system works causes strain which SHOULD NOT BE HAPPENING. I am a very tech savvy person too. But this app makes it 10x more strenuous to operate. Using this app opposed to others is a terrible experience.. The only reason I continue paying for this is because the content is great. I am very disappointed with the customer interface being a new customer. Its 2020, hope you know how to fix it. Sheesh. I’ll be sure to be talking to my friend about this too. Hopefully they get this fixed up soon. Lots of potential. Terrible platform performance so far. Don’t even get me started when I get gypped by watching 2 long adds in a row. 👎👎👎👎👎👎👎

title: Amazing App
review:
I find this an amazing app and do not understand why there are so many bad reviews. There are tons of shows to watch of many different genres Cartoons, Dramas, Action, Comedy and so much more. I’m sorry if you didn’t choose the right plan. There have been no troubles for me except one thing for kids I find it annoying that you can’t select a age until  13 my 10 year old can only watch shows for little kids and has been begging me to let her have TV-14 but that has inappropriate content for her. So please please make you be able to do different age ratings for kids under 13 such as TV-Y, TV-Y7, TV-G, and TV-PG. I find this a problem because my daughter can only watch kid shows. I also caught my 4 year old watching sailor moon and I am positive this is not age appropriate for her.

 PLEASE CHANGE THIS.

title: Not Accessibility Friendly
review:
I’ve only had this app for a half an hour and I’m already so frustrated with myself for downloading it. 
	I’m visually impaired, and while this app states that it has audio description it is impossible to use. I can’t find it anyway err on even the shows and movies it states has it, and when I go to the website to change it like it says I should it just gives me a description of what the feature is supposed to do instead of activating it.
	On this note, there is no way to find your continue watching. Where you can usually find shows and movies you have left off on other apps, this doesn’t have one, and if it does it need to be more easily accessible, even for beginners.
	It also didn’t save any of my shows/movies I clicked on that I’m interested in watching. Their “My Stuff” which I woul assume to be like Netflix’s “My LIst” only saved two of my shows I clicked on out of my eleven and one of my movies out of the eight.
Over, extremely disappointed in the app and myself for having higher hopes in it.

title: PLEASE FIX, APP WONT OPEN,CRASHES EVERY TIME I OPEN IT!!!!
review:
How strange I write a review but App Store won’t post it‼️‼️‼️‼️‼️😡😡😡😡😡
Ever since latest update of week of April 20th 2020, the app crashes every time I click to open it, it won’t open it closes fast, faster than in the blink of an eye!!! This is a paid subscription that I pay more than $130+ a month for, could the developers please fix this asap!! Why should it be necessary to leave a review and never receive a reply and for it to come this far? Don’t you get paid to supervise the application enough to know there’s this huge bug or glitch whatever it is that it won’t let the PAYING CUSTOMER watch the programming without the unnecessary stress?!?!? Will this issue ever be fixed?!?! Going on a week now!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I don’t think you want your customers cancelling, let us know what’s going on, update us I think we have a right to know what’s going on and not be in a loophole!!!!!
Way too many ads, I pay for Ad Free TV and it’s way too many repeated ads over again!!!! Kids filter should be updated for safer TV!!!!!!

title: Several Problems
review: My biggest issue with the app is that certain episodes won’t download. For example, episodes 1-3 of a show might download then 4 will refuse to. For someone who relies primarily on downloads, this is a pain. Also, some episodes are missing entirely from certain shows. This may just be a copyright issue, but with all the other issues this app has, you never know. More recently, I’ve been having a problem where episodes I’ve downloaded won’t play. I end up having to close the app and open it again just to make the episode play. And often it won’t save my progress if I stop in the middle. Finally, when I try to remove things from My List, some shows won’t leave. It says they’re not in there anymore, but they still appear in the feed. Honestly, the only reason I’m giving this app any stars is that I enjoy the content. I would be much happier, however, if they could fix these problems.

title: Worst streaming app by far
review: I should not have to login every time I open the app… Even seconds later after I navigate out of it, when I go back it says there was an error and I need to login again. I still do not like how new shows do not always pop up to the front of my queue. There might be a show that I’m just not in the mood to watch and there are a couple of unwatched episodes… And that stays at the top of my queue. That’s fine until something else new or comes along it should bump it down. I was just getting used to the moronic layouts when all of these other things start happening, I thought we’ll maybe it’s because it’s not an updated app. So I cannot hear only time it just update it. Is there no quality assurance checks before and after you get released? Is there no focus group? Is there no research of what other streaming apps are doing and doing well?

title: Commercial overload
review: I really like the app but two things turn me off about it. The first is that when picking a show they play too many commercials. Once you pick a show they play 90 secs of commercials, then they play the opening credits for your show. Then they play another set of commercials before playing the show. Then they play 2 more sets of commercials during a show that is only 22-25 mins. After the show is over they play another set of commercials before and after closing credits. I know that it is only 90secs but this adds up and makes me disinterested in watching any shows. The other feature I dislike is that when trying to watch “live tv” even when you pick that option they will make you watch the show from the beginning. Then you have to fast forward to live tv, after watching commercials of course.....

title: Please Either Fix Your App Or Be Truthful
review:
Here’s addition to my last comment - we have an Internet speed up to 1 GB and my husband is a programmer/analyst for a living, so we know the issue isn’t on our end.  But will you please upgrade your servers so your app doesn’t constantly idle and lose connection.

We pay for no commercials but STILL get them ALL the time.  Constantly buffering.  I’m a teacher so I used to use this for documentaries but now whatever you did I no longer can. Don’t even get me started on your ‘Continue Watching’ section!  I have shows I’ve never watched all over it and can never find the shows I ACTUALLY AM WATCHING!  And what the hell is it with eliminating episodes after only watching them once?!  I started watching a series, one was Nancy Drew, the rest of my family wanted to watch the older episodes to catch up and they’re gone! What the hell!  This is a brand new series people!

Either fix your dam app or be honest about how you have things set up!  Seriously!

title: SO MANY GLITCHES!
review: Great app, but there are a lot of bugs that need to me fixed. First off, the skip, I tried to resume an episode I was watching and every time I would  go to skip back to where I was, it would restart the episode. Also, the ad problem needs to be fixed, it keeps playing the ads, then replaying them. Like it would have the ads run as normal, then replay them for no reason. Also there needs to be an easier way to change plans. Skipping is rather annoying as well because every time I skip forward or back it sends me back to where I was! It has even started to black out my screen at certain points in movies and TV shows. I’m very upset about this because all I want to do is watch a show, and it won’t let me! Please fix all of this!

title: Up next fiasco
review: I don’t understand the algorithm behind the episodes listed in “up next”. It is so annoying to have to exit that list and go back to “my stuff” to watch another episode every single time that I cannot give more than two stars. They’re not even in “my stuff”, and why would anyone want to watch random episodes of different shows one after the other instead of watching consecutive episodes of a show? Who does that? But that’s not even the point. I would rather see the new episodes of the shows in “my stuff” in the “up next” list than a bunch of episodes of random shows. For instance, I see the option of adding individual episodes to a list called “my episodes”, which cannot be accessed anywhere. Basically a blackhole. Why not add the episodes in “my episodes” to “up next” and give users the ability to manage the “my episodes” list? Just a thought...

title: Well made app for the most part
review:
For a mobile app it’s done quite nice, in my opinion easier and quicker to use than something like the mobile Netflix app. However there are some strange caveats. The app sometimes whites out (on my home screen the app will be there but the logo disappears and I can’t even load the app by clicking on it). This usually resolves itself after a bit. This is the only app I have that exhibits this behavior. Additionally, if you’re watching a show and lose internet connection, especially during an ad, the episode might start from the beginning when you get back to a good connection. It’s happened to me once and I’ll see if it happens again. 

Other than those two bugs it’s been a pretty smooth experience.

title: New app design terrible
review:
I don't normally take time out day to simply bash apps on iTunes but this new app redesign was so freaking terrible I couldn't get the bad taste out of my mouth so here I am. 

Tiles really guys seriously and not just tiles poor and restrictive ways to view shows I can't just get a bunch of small icons like before that give me optimal information no I need to thumb through every single tile to see anything well I guess the days of me discovering new shows is over because even browsing your data base is a nightmare so on my iPad Pro 12.9 I see 4 tiles at a time where as before I would see like 20 or more on my old iPad 9.7 inch this is absurd I advise if you do not want to lose people just in the settings simply add a legacy mode switch to the UI so us who aren't mouth breathing idiots can enjoy browsing your selection. Ah I feel a bit better now we'll back to struggling through your terrible UI which will most likely lead to me cancelling my subscription

title: Newest update causes more problems
review:
Update: Down to one star.

- Resume now never works. It always starts the episode back at the start, even on the same device. The thumbnail will show something like 70%, say “Resume,” but tapping will just start at the network logo and you get to scrub to try and find your spot.

- Crashes in the background on TV OS every time it’s launched.

- When you have Live TV with no commercials, about 50% of the time, the system will play the live on-demand version of a show instead of the no commercials version. Killing the app and restarting will re-roll for you.

Update: New regressions. Do you all need help testing basics?

 - If you stop a show mid-stride, coming back to the interface shows the “resume” button and a progress bar at the right place. Tapping resume starts the show over. Happens about 90% of the time on TV and iPhone/iPad apps.

The update again causes more usability bugs.

 - Links from the TV app no longer work again, and watch percentage is no longer updated back. Happens about 20% of the time.

 - Resume function no longer works. Stopping a video and resuming it later on Apple TV causes the video to start at the beginning about 50% of the time. Seems to work fine on iPad and iPhone.

- App crashes when video is paused and the screen saver comes on or the screen locks. Happens about 30% of the time.

title: $5.99 for ads and terrible stream quality
