You can also now still keep the video playing with your phone locked and the screen off.  Awesome for headphones while working or driving.  Finally, I’ve wanted those two features for a long time and now we have them, 5 stars!  Now they just need to expand on what can be downloaded.  I wanted Seinfeld, but it was available for download.

title: Good but a few cons
review: This is SUCH a good app compared to Netflix! It has all the shows I love to watch and it’s easy to use! However there are a few things that I think should be fixed. One of them is the adds. I do t have a problem with adds but when they are 80-70 seconds, and about every 4 minutes, they can be really annoying. Another one is the glitches. Whenever I go out of the app, it immediately logs me out so when I go into the app, I have to constantly log in again. Overall, this is SUCH a amazing app! Besides those few issues, it is amazing! I recommend it! 4/5 stars.

title: It was better before the adds
review: I had this app before adds came to it, it was SO GREAT I watched it every day, my favorite shows were on the app, and I could binge watch commercial free. I would have given it 5 stars. But then the adds came to the app and now any show I want to watch that’s longer than 20 minutes has 3 or 4 two minute commercial breaks in it. ITS SO ANNOYING! They put a commercial right on a cliffhanger and then I have to watch two minutes of random adds that I’m not even interested in to see my show. I thought I was already paying for the app, and now they even need commercials, take my money and let me watch commercial free. Thank you for reading.

title: Such and annoying app
review: When I got this app I was excited to watch a bunch of great shows I couldn’t watch anywhere else, but then I tried to do it and I got mad. Whenever I tried to find a show about half the ones I wanted to watch weren’t there which is fine it happens I understand that, but so many of the shows I did find had a bunch of episodes missing. One show had the first part of a two-part episode missing. Also, anytime I tried getting my hands into a comfortable position on my device, or tapped to see how much time was left in my episode and tapped again to make my darkened screen with giant buttons over my episode go away it reminded or fast forwarded and I had to go back to my spot which generally involved watching a set of commercials I’ve already watched.

title: Can we get the old app back??
review: At least until all the bugs are worked out and it gets feature parity with the older app. The new UI is meh and we are losing functionality and it's not worth the trade. Apple TV app is especially buggy, I have the ads subscription , so I get ads. It plays ads and then at the end it auto skips to some 10-30 seconds BEFORE the ad break instead of continuing on with the show and then plays the ads AGAIN and then continues (mercifully there's no infinite loop) this is annoying. One more issue  if I go back 10 seconds just after an ad break, it plays the same ads AGAIN! Fix this! The old app had no issues like these.

title: I have a glitch
review:
I have a glitch in the app. Whenever I get off of the app it will just restart the episode. It is really freaking annoying. And if I try to put it back to where I was it will just restart. If you guys and girls don’t fix this glitch I think I might delete the app!! This is really annoying. And if the app didn’t have this glitch I would rate it 4 stars. Another thing that is annoying is that if I slightly press my screen it will move my progress. This app does have potential but if you continue to have these glitches I think I just might delete it! And I really don’t want to do that! So just please work to solving the problems! Thank you!

                                   Karen (let me speak to your manager!)

title: My Stuff
review: Once I’m all caught up on a series, the show normally went to the bottom of “My Stuff” and was labelled “All Caught Up”. But now, my completed shows are being moved to the top of the category and labelled as if I never watched it at all. Example? I just watched the new episode of Castle Rock, and it’s sitting in the top row of my shows (ahead of things that I haven’t watched) saying that I have 17 unwatched episodes and reset to season 1 episode 1. It’s disgustingly disorganized and not even in alphabetical order. This is the first category I go to in this app, and the fact that I have to sift through it to find actual new episodes doesn’t make the least bit of sense.

title: Volume control as well as video player bug.
review: Why remove the volume slider? Nothing worse than when streaming from a device to a tv and it is blaring loud since, on the iPhone at least, the volume control is linked to the volume buttons on the phone. Also it would seem that when streaming from an iPhone app to a device, and if you attempt to watch a video on the same device, it will stutter and pause intermittently. As far as I know the video is not streaming on the device but say through my Chromecast, which would mean it’s not say network or bandwidth usage. Then again who knows. It’s not like the app is buggy and sometimes will open with 60 seconds of ads, then the opening to a show followed by 1.5-2 minutes of ads directly afterwards.........

title: Maybe let the interns make the UI next time
review:
Absolutely unusable garbage that makes doing anything 100% harder and more frustrating.  The old interface wasn’t amazing but it was decently thought out and worked well enough to not generate complaints/frustration.  

Nothing works as it should or as expected and finding what shows have new episodes seems like someone went out of their way to hide it.  Why does the (...) lead to a drop down menu that has an option to learn more?  Why doesn’t it just take you to the information for that video? Terrible, terrible design abounds.  

Either go back to the previous interface or hurry up and get a team of UX/UI designers that didn’t just scroll through tumblr for a month and pronounce themselves designers to make a new one.

title: I love it but you could do better
review: I love the app but I think it was a bad decision to do add on and live tv you already paid to get in the app now you have to pay for movies Think it really was a dumb decision see I’m not putting hate But Netflix doesn’t do that you guys have a whole bunch of movies people are ready to watch them but it really was dumb to do Add on’s and live tv nobody wants to pay for movies they already started a plan to pay monthly nobody wants to pay for other movies not saying I hate the app you guys could do better with Add on’s and live TV 🙏🏾🙏🏾🙏🏾❤️❤️

title: Latest update almost unusable
review:
The latest update for the iOS app is pretty bad (I mostly use an iPad Pro). It won’t retain my watch history anymore which means episodes will resume from the beginning and I always have to go into the show’s info to find my place. The bad part about that is the show info is now buried in the new tiled interface which makes navigating super clunky (there used to be easy-to-see buttons for that). But none of that really matters since the app regularly freezes, crashes, and buffers, even with strong WiFi. 

I’m not exaggerating when I say I had none of these issues with the previous version of the app (except for occasional freezes). Not sure what the heck happened with this update but it needs to be fixed asap.

title: Fix the app!!!
review:
The latest update has totally screwed up the Keep Watching tab! Instead of prompting for the next episode of a series I watched last, it default to the very last episode of the very last series of a program. The user is now forced to navigate back to the Episodes tab, leave the latest Season, then remember and choose the season you want, enter it, and then try to remember either the next or last episode to watch! This is ridiculous, as the app used to automatically remember and prompt the next episode in the order being watched, whether it is the first time through the series or the nth time!

Roll the user interface back to something intuitive and useful!!!

Bill S

title: It’s great but....
review: It’s great and all but the ads are just too much you have to pay like $10 a month to have no ads and if you pay for the ads then you aren’t  going to have any money soWith ads each ad is like a minute and 30 seconds long and it’s super annoying if they were just change the time so it doesn’t take an hour to get back to the actual show you’re watching this apple be amazing the whole system that system thing with this app will be amazing absolutely amazing I’m suggesting this to the creators of who also so if you see this then I suggest changing everything so it doesn’t take seven years to get back to the show

title: Somethings need to change and this app would be the best.
review: I love this app, but i would love for the commercials to go away when I’m watching a series. Commercials can be very annoying sometimes. Also, when I’m watching an episode I would like for it to save to where I left off instead it rewinds like 10 mins. Then, when I have to fast forward it I have to watch some commercials to get to the spot I left off. That’s very annoying and time consuming when your really wanting to watch a series. But overall this app is awesome there’s just some things that would make this app the best.

title: Come on people
review:
This new update removed my queue. It's difficult to figure out to remove shows from the watchlist and you have to stroll on and on to find what you actually want to watch. They could have the colors and all to the old layout and been just fine.

I really dislike this new app. After building up the My Stuff queue the auto play feature just plays whatever it feels like it after the show goes off, not the next episode or the next show you selected to watch. I really wish I could delete this update!

title: This app is terrible
review: I use this to cast to my chromecast and watch on my tv and I constantly have issues. Its such an inconvenience especially when im trying to work. Whenever I go to pause it or rewind on my phone and i click the episode the app instantly closes out. If im trying to pick up where i left off on an episode of something it makes me start from the beginning of the episode leaving me to fast forward and watch a lot of commercials. I constantly have connection errors that will randomly pop up and force me out of episodes. Right now I cannot even play an episode because its telling me too many users are streaming when its only me and ive gone through and closed out of old devices. I have zero patience for this app and im deleting it. Do not recommend.

title: Adding a little more
review: The app is amazing and I have so much to watch from but there’s a few things I would like to see added. For example a quality adjuster so whenever my video looks bad I can have it set to 1080p all the time. Second would be to click on a button once you’re on your show and you know you’re caught up that allows to press “caught up” if you were to skip a few episodes because you watched it somewhere else like your family’s house. Overall this is an amazing app.

title: I tried to give this app a chance
review: It was doing alright, but before the newest update it kept blocking me from certain shows because of my age, I'm 22, and the year on my account for some reason says 1991 instead of 1994. Every other device lets me watch but my iPhone. This was finally fixed in the newest update, but now I can't even watch anything that isn't on the next or newest list, it's annoying when your show has 26 or more episodes, but you can't tap on any episode you're on, instead you have to wait for the show to just stream on, I was watching a 26 episode show, but after the 22nd episode it went right back to the first, now I have to stream all the way back up because I can't tap on the episode I'm on, please fix this it's very frustrating..

title: ADDS And others!!!
review: Love this app no doubt, BUT the ads I haven’t even got threw the first episode of this series I’m watching and a 75 second ad shows up!!! You should be more like Netflix because they don’t have ANY ads! The worst part is that they randomly pop up and They are SOOO long! And also why are things locked? For instance I was trying to watch Friends the show and when I search it up there is this lock on it! Like what!? I already have a subscription isn’t that enough!!! I just want to watch Friends. And just saying stuff that should have a little improvement just that.

title: Works on and off...
review: This app is great when it works. But then it decides not to work, and won’t give me anything. It’s frustrating because there doesn’t seem a way to fix it. I’ve got full WiFi access plus data on, I’ve tried shutting off and restarting my phone, I’ve even tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app. It really would be nice if this service were more readily available by phone. It doesn’t seem like too much to ask, the Netflix phone app has never broken down on me like this. Please try to improve the usability of this app, and a lot of people will be very happy.

title: Fantastic!
review: I have the Live TV package. I really love the experience. The way this app is set up is a refreshing approach that I personally prefer to some of the other streaming apps that feel more like traditional TV. This gives me the movies and shows that are most important to me at the front and center. Of course it also includes the extremely robust on-demand library as well. And let’s not forget that there is support for Apple Single SignOn which is a huge added bonus. There is a lot of value here, and the app and service work great. Terrific job!

title: Where to begin
review: This app forecloses EVERY SINGLE time I open it. Gives me a random error and I have to relaunch every single time. I’ve dealt with that and the annoying commercial replays after accidentally fast forwarding but now I can’t even watch a complete episode without issues.   It keeps freezing on the latest show of new girl right at the second commercial mark. Can’t fast forward because if rewinds to the beginning even thought it shows its playing in the middle. I don’t know why I pay for this anymore I’ve had to watch on the corresponding network website or app for different shows many times lately. Not to mention the random downtime’s where I can’t access anything in the app for hours at a time.  Don’t waste your money on a subscription here.

title: Seems I’m throwing away my money
review: I use to love this app. I’m never home so most watched my tv shows from my phone of tablet during breaks in my day but w/the updates, it’s not as user friendly. The new way of rewinding/fast forwarding is garbage. Too time consuming to search where I left off so often just switch over to my Netflix account to watch something different. It also freezes up more often & sometimes you can’t get your show to play at all. Yes I can watch from my computer but again, I’m never home. Please, please fix the app or we’ll be forced to cancel our subscription until the issues / glitches in the are resolved. I feel like I’m throwing away my money each month. Urgh so frustrating.

title: Ok but not great
review: I mostly use the app on my tv and it’s ok but I do have some complaints. Biggest complaint is the app keeps crashing and when I googled it there are complaints over the last few years or so of the same thing. Second biggest complaint is that the amount of screen use at one time is too low for the price. Should be at least 3 screens since most families have at least 3 people (mom dad child). Has a money hungry feel too it. Charging extra for no ads on a paid service is also pretty cheap. With the competition out there I feel like there are better options and I’ll be choosing a different one.

title: Live TV is not great for watching sports
review:
Events play from the beginning even when not recorded and force long advertisements, so I can’t scroll to live timing until the ads finish. It is common to miss live action because of this and occurs each time I switch between channels. These events are also set to do. It record, but still “records”/plays the entire game from the beginning. It is incredibly annoying. I would not recommend it for flipping between sports. Unfortunately sling no longer has the local fox sports channels that are important to me.

Update: Events don’t play at the beginning anymore just some random point in the game, so that I conveniently end up missing live action switching between games.

title: Needs some improvements
review: I like this app, and use very frequently now, but I hate that once I am all caught up on a show, it goes back and says, for example: 48 unwatched , which shouldn’t because I’ve already watched all episodes. Not all shows that I’ve finished do this, usually they’ll say “All caught up” which is great. But it just annoys me to see that one show that doesn’t do that like the others. I have ocd and just want it to look organized and perfect. I feel like I’m making a big deal out of it, but this just feels important.

title: SO ANNOYING!
review: Ok so I hate this app after the last update. You’re in the middle of a show and accidentally touch your screen and it jumps forward or backwards a ton. Then you have to spend more time watching extra advertisements which is stupid you have to do that in the first place. Then you got to find your place again and watch another extra advert...  I never bother to review apps but this one is so annoying with the latest update I wouldn’t recommend wasting your monthly money. Sign up with Netflix! I’m going to switch back! 😡

title: New App is the worst
review: Your new app is the worst. I have a bunch of shows in my stuff, shows where I have watched every episode of but all of a sudden with the latest update it says “100 unwatched episode” even though I watched them, you can see the white line at the bottom that the episode has been watched. Since your stupid app can’t tell I watched the first three seasons it won’t tell me when there is a new episode and I no longer get the “all caught up” marking. This isn’t just happening with a few shows in my stuff it is happening with ALL THE SHOWS. This is so annoying because to see if there are new episodes I have to go to the show page, navigate through the seasons and scroll to see if there is a show without the white bar at the bottom. FIX YOUR APP!

title: Horrible Udate
review:
Let me start off by saying I NEVER write reviews. So I am not the user who goes around bad mouthing apps. 
So, I am not particularly tech savvy, but I can maneuver through technology intuitively, and I can confidently say that this update is absolute garbage. Pretty much everything has already been said but the change that has been driving me completely bonkers is the scrubbing. This sensitive as heck feature has me watching a million ads, and when I can get through them, I have to scrub to my original spot, then rewatch the same ads, all to have the audio work, but no visual. I’m not gonna hold my breath for a change though, as I can see that this complaint has been stated in reviews repeatedly for at least a couple of months. Write reviews people!! Squeaky wheel gets the oil!

title: BRING BACK THE OLD VERSON
review: Worst update! Instead of making the streaming easier for your customers, you’re making it more difficult and complex than it needs to be. The older version was simple, and everything was easier to find. This so called “update” tries to grasp a more mobile interface (even the apps on tv if you have the smart tv) worst of all, my TVs automatically updated so it has this version.  And it’s not like I can reverse back.  Fonts are also bigger...therefore two-three tv show titles take up the whole screen (mind you I have a relatively decent not too big or small 60” in the bedroom) as opposed to having multiple thumbnails of tv shows/movies shown at once. This is like when Windows 8 came out, and almost everyone hated it! PLEASE change it back

title: Not loving the update
review: I’ve never reviewed an app before. I used to love the app, but this recent update is maddening. I loved being able to see the main screen with shows in my list and suggestions. I don’t like the single show view that I have to click through to get to show page, etc. worst of all is the fast forward, rewind. Why make this functional over the entire screen? It is too easy to touch the screen and lose your place. In the very least, make this accessible only through the timeline.

title: This app is garbage
review: If you can manage to sift through all the bull crap to find your show, good luck having it actually load it. I have to exit out of the app multiple times because it’s “having trouble playing this title”. If it works, have fun sitting through ad after ad. It starts with an ad, has an ad after the intro, has an ad a few minutes after that, an ad a few minutes after, and so on. In a 20 minute long episode I consistently get 5 ads, typically 90sec long, which is actually longer because of the sometimes ridiculous wait time for the ad to load. To top off the constant ads, they are low quality and sound like your speakers are destroyed. I have great internet that has no issues with any other streaming service.

title: Horribly Stupid App
review: This app usually doesn’t acknowledge when I’m done watching an episode and shows that the last few moments are left. Then it shows that a new episode is coming even though the next episode should be available (example: I watched episode 4, episode 5 should already be available but only shows episode 6 as the upcoming episode). And when I go to watch the next episode of a show I’m watching, it’ll bring me to the next episode but not play and stay on the show cover picture unless I actually hit the play button (Example: I watched the second episode of American Dad and hit play next episode, it’ll bring up the the American Dad picture and not play unless I hit the play button). This entire app is dumb as sugar honey iced tea!!!!

title: Rewinds itself
review: I pay $45 a month to watch my favorite shows. Its bad enough that I still gotta watch every ad on the content despite paying so much. Past couplke months, its been worse. When I’m finished watching the ad and finally the episode starts, after no more than 30 seconds, it rewinds itself a minute or so. Now because of that, I have to see the ad again. Again 30 seconds after the ad finishes, it rewinds again and makes me watch the ad again and again. This is so frustrating. I have not been able to watch a single episode because of that. I want my money back. In full. For the last couple months. I can make the video of it and upload it if you want. But this is so annoying. I would have given 0 stars if I could.

title: As bad as it got they managed to make it worse
review:
End of program, it forces into playing a random up next item not of my choosing. Back does not work. No way to back out it. Have to entirely close and reopen app just to avoid a program I did not choose and do not want to watch. I’m just going to cancel my subscription. Had a good thing going. Not sure what happened, but the aside for the UI / UX foibles, attempting to force me into content I have no interest in just won’t fly.

Latest update brings new issues including non responsive full screen on a fairly regular basis. Jump forward, then back more than once and the video disappears. Audio continues to roll. Have to close out app and reopen. Inside a single program have to close and reopen 1-2 times consistently.

title: Frustrated
review: Very frustrating update. I only updated because my iPad and phone gave me messages saying that “I had reached the limit of devices being played...” So I updated. And lost every single show I have ever saved/watched/etc. I had to go back in and add shows that I’m currently watching, but now all the old shows I’ve watched are back at the top, automatically playing (I realize I need to turn the auto play function off). So instead of having all current shows, with their new episodes, showing up in one spot, I’m scrolling down a page of every single show I’ve ever watched to try to sort through to the ones that are current. Bleh. I guess I’ll keep my eye out for another update.

title: Happy with the content but has bugs
review: I’ve been happy with the content, and I usually don’t mind the commercials that come with the discounted rate, but sometimes I’ll get “error loading” conveniently AFTER the commercials played just fine so I’m stuck restarting the app and watching the same commercials again and again until it will load. Additionally, when you stop watching something and resume watching later - be it a day later or an hour later - it rewinds by a LOT. I always find myself having to fast forward to where I really left off.

title: So many issues
review: At first I blamed our Internet service but that isn’t the issue. If you cast a recorded show the device you are casting from becomes a paperweight unless you want it to stop or go rogue and start playing whatever during playback. So frustrating to be watching a recorded show during a time when another starts recording so the one you are watching just stops. Just as frustrating to click the Start from the beginning option just to have it go to the live location. We gave up cable so we’d have more options and freedom from frustration. Not sure we found it using this app. If all this is because of the app - I can only hope someone is working on it.

title: Horrible update
review:
I appreciate the 10 second skip ahead, but if you tap the screen it takes you to the middle or end of a show, or movie. 
It literally ruined a movie I watched. I had just began to watch a movie after the update. I went back a few seconds. I went too far, so I thought Id use the cool new forward feature. I didn't know at the time, but all of a sudden I saw people together kissing as a couple, and other things going on that was previously showing them with other partners..? 
So, before I noticed -- it had skipped to the end of the movie. So, after getting it back in position, the movie was unwatchable, due to knowing the ending. 
And to "search" a show or movie is horrible. Nothing about it makes sense. 
I may just drop this app altogether

title: Fix your app, Seriously!
review: I wonder if people are just blind or if these 1M reviews are paid, because oh god, it is terrible. The interface of the app is good in the view side of things, but how it performs or works, is just not there yet. Is if like the app limits us and only shows us what the app wants. Also every time I want to see a show, for some reason it pops up an error and every time have to be turning off my iPad or closing the app for the show to start. If that wasn’t enough, subtitles are messed up, every time an episode ends, I have to go to setting and enable it again because apparently is not working as it should. I gave up I waited a year for you guys to fix and still. But well, the wait train is here I guess, but I’m not paying until it happens.

title: This app is amazing my kids loved it!
review: I just got the membership and my kids loved this app. It gives people tv shows and movies in hd content. My youngest kid loved watching teen titans go in it, he said it was better than the live tv we used to have. My second staged kid loved watching family guy on it, she said that it was good and it was fast. My oldest kid loved watching grey atonomy on it, she said that it was cool and had lots of tv shows and movies about people who are interested in medical stuff. So overall we thought this was a good app so I recommend this app to you.

title: Fix bug
review: I have this bug that happens whenever I go back 10 seconds or go forward 30 and I’m next to a commercial it automatically goes to a commercial even if I’ve watched the commercial the show was providing. This is not fair to the viewer at all. I don’t understand why I have to see 3 more commercials if I’ve already seen them before, just because I missed something. Instead of making us watch commercials all over again you should allow us to go through the commercial and then delete the commercial mark after we’ve seen it.

title: HUGE problems on iPad
review:
So I’ve been trying to watch HIMYM on my iPad for hours and I will get through one episode then the show will crash and in order to restart I have been shown a message “press & hold to stream” and after pressing down on many parts of the screen still face loading errors and a lack of response from the show and the server. 

I contacted support via chat and they had no clue that such a message was even able to pop up on a screen through their server and just told me to reinstall the app. I have reinstalled multiple times and still face this issue. 

Great shows on here but horrible streaming. The ability to stream to all devices needs to be fixed.

title: By
review: Hi am I just woke up I am not home yet I got to the school bus home and now I’m working on my morning morning and I will call the school and now we can talk to the school schedule I will be there in a while can I come over at home and get you to come home and get home I will talk to ya and now I will talk about it I will talk about you and now we are just going to talk about it now we will talk to you about the school and now I will be home I will call you in the morning I u the school bus bus home I will be home at about three and wy the school schedule and I will call

title: Keeps marking what I’ve watched as unplayed and it’s driving me insane
review: This app used to keep track of episodes watched (even across all platforms) so that new ones show up in my queue and I can see that, hey, there a new episode this week! and go straight to it. Over the past few weeks, I’ve tried skipping ahead to trigger it as ‘played’ but it only works a couple of times before the whole thing craps out, uninstalling / reinstalling, and asking for help online. If you guys have to pay the licensor or network each time we watch something, wouldn’t it make sense to let us, at the very least, manually mark an episode as played? As it stands, I can’t get to the episodes I want to see when I want to see them and everything is a jumbled, unwatchable mess.

title: New interface is terrible.
review: I feel like now my commercial time has doubled because for some reason my auto play feature goes back a few episodes each time instead of going to the next episode. It’s also difficult to use because if you touch the screen by accident it will rewind the program, then it will play more commercials before you can put back to where you were in the program. I also don’t like the new lineup situation. It was so much easier when you could see more of everything on one screen. I hate that now to watch something I have to search under more of these categories to find what I want to watch (I don’t search for it because I can’t quite think of the name of the show/movie to begin with).

title: Picture in Picture suddenly gone?
review: I’ve had my fair share of issues with this app. From not being able to watch half the content I wanted, to the app crashing almost regularly for a while but I was able to overlook that. I don’t like to waste time complaining about things that will probably be fixed eventually but, I don’t know, this was the last straw for me. Since I updated to IOS 14 I’ve been using picture in picture with no problem and I’ve been in love with it. Suddenly, I decide to update and it’s just gone? I’m so sick of the back and forth problems with this app. It’s like it’s never ending!!! I love hulu’s content but what’s the point if I can almost never watch it!

title: Needs fixes
review: I use the app on my iPad. Despite me having watched entire seasons of shows it still lists them as unwatched. But if you go to series details you can clearly see that I have watched all of the shows so there are some problems.  For example I have watched years of Law and order SVU but since the update it tells me I have hundreds of episodes to watch. That is for almost every single one of the shows I watch. Not to mention if you go online and watch an episode things don’t lineup. Very frustrated

title: Hate the update
review: For some reason, ever since the update happened I'm not able to watch my shows on my tv. I can hear it but the picture doesn't come through. It's not my tv because I can see the flip tray on my tv just no picture of the show. & it's not my cable either because I can still watch Netflix with no problem. I had no problems with it before the update either. It'll come on for just a few seconds then disappear. So whatever was done. I wish it would undo! Very disappointed.

title: Constantly buffers.
review: I can’t even enjoy watching a show because this app is constantly buffering. I can watch Netflix with no issue but I constantly buffer even in low video settings with this app. Sometimes I even get a message on the screen saying there is a problem but then it will play but leave the message on the screen. I can’t get rid of the message without closing out the show and then having to wait for it to buffer all over again. And since this last update, I haven’t been able to watch a single episode of any show without this happening. Very disappointed and almost feel like demanding a refund. I haven’t hardly been able to use the stinkin’ app yet I’m paying each month for the commercial free option.

title: Ads
review: I’ve watched an ad at the same mark 3 times now. One because I was in the middle of watching the show. Then I paused it and left and it refreshed. Then I had to watch the ad again. Then right after that ad was done, I accidentally swiped out of the show and it’s making me watch the ad again. Is there a way for the ads to be more, I don’t know, intelligent? It’s really annoying, especially if you accidentally do something and then your forced to watch the ad again. Please fix this. Other than that, I love the variety of shows and movies that you have.

title: New viewing format has got to go!
review:
Can I just say that I absolutely hate the new viewing format after the app has been updated......how many times now that I have tried pressing the rewind function, only for it to play back where I maybe have touched someplace else on the screen and then another 4 advertisements play before my show is back on. WASTE OF TIME!!!!!!! 

Update: Seriously, this is so frustrating!!!, having to sit through another 120seconds of advertisements just because I didn't touch the Rewind-10 button correctly or accidentally touched a random part of the screen....makes me think about cancelling use of this app altogether. In reading some of these recent reviews, it is clear that this is also an issue for other users.

title: Least favorite streaming app
review: Paying for a service and still having advertisements is just plain annoying as it is but the app itself hardly works! If I press play after pausing a show, the show starts from the beginning and on top of that, it makes you watch advertisements, you’ve already watched, over again. Then sometimes the sound just randomly stops working (this happens on all our devices) the only way to get it back is to close out the app and then guess what?...It starts your show from the beginning and makes you watch the same advertisements all over again.

title: Awful and frustrating
review:
Why in the actual hell does this app suggest i “resume an episode” that is already finished. The only way to get through to the next suggested episode to start over or fast forward. Removing something from your continue to watch history removals all episodes previously watched. Are you stupid??? Most viewing systems allow you to mark something as played and move on. Thank the lord I’m not paying for this crap. 

I shouldn’t have to watch commercials from Hulu’s boring advertisements just to find my original spot in a show. I abhor this system. When you close out mid segment it reverts back to the beginning just to show a commercial. Screw you sneaky people.

title: Randomly Freezes
review: Thank God , I’m receiving the service for free through sprint, this service is not worth paying for.  The app freezes and I’m on the second day of video playback errors.  When I try to watch episodes, and some seasons are missing the first half. For example episode 1 to 18 will be missing while 19 to 21 are there.  Why would anyone pay for half a show.   The amount of commercials they show is ridiculous.  Netflix and network apps are way cheaper and show less commercials.   If you want to pay for half a show and advertising this is definitely the service for you, and if you want value for your money, I would probably look elsewhere.

title: Awful Interface
review: Why do you put the “Watch Again” shows at the top?  You need to bump new shows up instead of making me scroll down through all the shows I already watched!  Also, some shows are so quiet I can’t hear them unless I am sitting on top of my device or wear headphones.  Others are so loud everyone in the house can hear them.  Finally, why do you pick random shows to queue up next?  If I’m busy getting ready for work, why can’t you play the next show from my Keep Watching list?  I don’t want to watch Charlie Rose or Desperate Housewives!  Bad algorithm there... I’ve been paying for this subscription for a long time but I’m shocked to see a two star average rating for this app!

title: Double Audio
review: I can barely watch one show without the audio restarting and overlapping the sound already playing. A show will start and then flash for a second and then the audio would not be synced right and I would hear the show playing double. Half is playing ahead than the video and the other half is behind. It’s like hearing the show delayed on two TVs played right next to each other.  I have to keep restarting the video or closing out of the app all together and try again. And if it does start working properly it messes up at the beginning of the next show prompting me to go through the tedious task of trying to fix the sound again. I cant watch a series without having to do this. Defeats the purpose of auto play...

title: BUGGY
review: This app is buggy af (chromecast user). First is the connection between tv and phone - which is usually a disaster since you can rarely use your phone while casting to your tv. If you turn to turn the volume up on your phone it will blast the tv volume, also they have somehow made it impossible for you to run your video while the app is running (so if you are playing something on tv, you cannot open your video to record anything). Also to mention the forward and back, you can’t move the cursor freely so go back to certain parts where you might have left off, you have to use the dumb 10s back or 30s forward. It’s becoming very frustrating to use

title: New design horrid and you know it
review:
I can’t fathom why they haven’t listened to feedback yet. They must know the new interface is unusable. I purposefully turned off my iPhone’s auto-update just so I could avoid updating to this terrible new interface in hopes they would fix it before I had to update. However, I was forced to update it when I started having issues and the videos wouldn’t work correctly. It’s to be expected but I am about to cancel my subscription if they don’t do something soon.

I can’t easily scroll through shows I watch, just let me look at more than one show at a time. Plus, if I have a new episode, the new icon will go away in only a few days. For the love of god, just make the interface more user friendly please.

title: No live on ISO
review: I can’t watch anything considered “live tv” on my phone anymore. It keeps saying I have to open the app at home every 30 days. I have tried for days to do this and am still can’t. I have open, closed, logged in, logged out and deleted app to start again. It’s not even live TV I’m trying to watch just shows only available with my live tv content. Im definitely not happy to be paying this much and not be able to use. Netflix is working perfectly so we know it’s not the cellular/WiFi or phone bent an issue. It now never remembers where you left off and rewinding is a no as it will error out. It keeps giving me weak or no signal messages which makes no sense cause everything else works and streams. Please fix ...

title: Best Streaming for the Best Price
review: I think this might be the third or fourth review I’ve ever posted with apple and I’ve been using apps since their inception. That’s how deeply I feel about the content this app has to offer. Hands down, the best content for the money spent in relation to streaming services. I feel the extra $2 is worth an ad free viewing experience. I love that I can watch newer shows like Modern Family and The Simpsons as well as older shows like I Love Lucy and The Golden Girls in the same place. As long as the content continues, so will I.

title: People stop your complaining about the ads!
review:
Okay I need to vent a little bit. This is for those people who are complaining about having commercials...YOU SIGNED UP FOR THE VERSION THAT HAS COMMERCIALS IF YOU DON’T WANT IT THEN CHANGE YOU’RE FREAKIN PLAN TO COMMERCIAL FREE!!!!

Okay sorry. Now for those who actually want a review of the app and it is a great app. However sometimes when I’m watching a show it occasionally brings up a very well worded error document. No I have not read it yet and that is because I don’t read I need to save that amount of time to binge watch Brooklyn Nine-Nine. It is very annoying but it is still a good app

title: The ads oh my lord
review: This is a good high quality app, but Jesus the ads are insane. If you go back ten seconds right after an ad, sometimes it will play the 80 ad break again in full. Sometimes if you touch the screen wrong it will start seeking, and god forbid you go back to before the last break, because sure enough you'll get to sit through the same 80 second ad again. Don’t forget you’ll have to scrub back to where you were before you accidentally went back, because that’s another 80 ad break. At this point I’ve forgotten what show I’m watching. Everything else is good though I give it a 3 outta 5. It’s no SMB2

title: Least usable entertainment app out there
review: Where do I even begin? The user interface is not intuitive at all. Even finding shows I just watched a week ago is an exercise in frustration. Poor search feature, poor user recommendations and poor layout overall. Now let’s get to how buggy it is. Half the time I open the app a show won’t load properly, even after closing out and reopening the app numerous times. When the show does work, the same Ads run 4 times in a row, then it will restart a previous segment of the show I’ve already just watched! Everyone I know is complaining about the same things, yet each new update fails to address the issue. Terrible terrible app. Will not be renewing when subscription ends soon.

title: So many things wrong
review: The first thing open is a lineup of shows you want me to watch? Seriously? Show the shows I am watching first THEN do a line up. And show them on a single plane, not having to swipe up and down. Searching it more difficult than in the previous version as well. The thing that is even worse is the slide to change where you are in the episode. It’s too sensitive if I just tap and my finger is on the screen for longer than .05 of a second it will skip to a different point in the episode and I have to pretty much reload it and figure out where I left off. This app is not user friendly in the slightest and it’s so disappointing that you have the best streaming service but make it so difficult to use.

title: Scrub navigation is terrible
review:
I've never written a review on the App Store before, but the new tap to fast forward/rewind navigation on this app is one of the worst pieces of design I've ever seen. So easy to accidentally rewind to the beginning of an episode with an accidental tap, and then you have to sit through commercials again to get back to your spot (multiple rounds if you're not sure where you were exactly). 

I've also accidentally fast-forwarded without realizing (it happened while I was trying to use the 10-second forward function, so I just thought it was a new scene) and missed entire sections of an episode. Only realized this happened when I accidentally rewinded to that part when trying to use the 10-second back button.

title: My complaint
review: My complaint is sometimes when you watching a show and is on English and you go on the next episode if I changes to a different language and it’s not English anymore and it dose not show if we can change it back to English on audio that got me a bit mad! So I would like it if I did not do that and you can change it to English Spanish or any language your chose I would like that fixed because I don’t like it like it’s on English and then when I go on the next episode it on Spanish or something and I can’t change it to English because it get me mad so please fix that! And it dose that a lot to me.

title: Bugs!!!!!
review: The app alone is fine works great sometimes a bit laggy to switch tabs. One major issue I’m having not sure if others too is during a show I’m watching right before a ad starts it appears to have an issue where the show continues in mute for at least 5 seconds and countdown of the ad starts then suddenly the ad begins once the ad is over or at least the countdown the the ad continues for 5 seconds or so then the show pops back up it’s annoying and tends to start annoying you more and more this has to get fixed.

title: Good app, but . . .
review: . . . there are several issues that annoy me, such as crashing at in opportune moments, not loading, telling me to check my internet connection, in spite of the fact that I have a strong connection.  The thing that annoys me most is that when I am binge-watching a show, and have turned on close captioning, it seems to turn itself off for each show. I go to turn it on, and it says that it is already on. But it isn’t. So I have to turn it off and back on in order for it to work. Please fix this! Other than these issues, good app.

title: Good Old Shows
review: The App 🤙🏾💯Amazing But I just don’t find myself on it as much because there aren’t any good shows on there besides the 100+ I’ve already seen I mean a decent update of new shows like The Arrow, Flash , Justice league unlimited, Teen Titans... The good stuff Like Cat Scratch , Jimmy 2 shoes , Kid vs Katt , Avatar the last airbender , Stuff that takes me back and others too like some good Stuff like Disney Nickelodeon Cartoon Network Back in the day Even Krypto the super dog , A pup named Scooby doo ,Yin Yang Yo ,( I am now hitting the dark corners of my mind ) 😭😭 But in all Good Oldies would be a nice touch

title: I miss the British selection that was in its own category.
review: The format is quite confusing. I would like to see small individual choices on one screen as opposed to having to scroll through out the process to find a movie and then it repeats itself when I know there are other movies to be seen. So it’s as if I’m at a scavenger hunt looking for things I know are on the site but yet somehow .hidden Unbothered once again by the fact that I have to come up with a nickname that is not my own which is what I need in order to submit this review and I’ll never remember this nickname or write another review because I can’t remember the nickname

title: Unintuitive user interface
review:
Ignoring the fact that the menus are pretty obtuse and difficult to navigate, the worst problem is the fast-forward/rewind controls. 
As others have stated, if you press ANYWHERE on the screen in the darkened “pause mode” the video will skip to that section. Why isn’t this limited to the time bar on the bottom of the screen? If I miss the pause button then it skips 20 minutes ahead and I have to watch the ads TWICE before I can go back to where I was in the video. I don’t get frustrated easily, but this is infuriating. 

However, I do like the feature that allows you to search by episode title. Please just fix the other VERY annoying issue!

title: What happened to the animes?! ( ͠° ͟ʖ ͡°) (and why does it show me the same ad)
review:
I just came here to say, there is this show called Haikyu!!, it’s an anime. There would normally be like 4 seasons but now there is only 2.

I know, some of you might be like “Just get Crunchyroll!” or whatever but I’m just wondering. If I could get the creator to reply that might be helpful. I’m just wondering what happened because I just love the animes on this app.

Also the ads, it keeps showing me the same freaking ads!!! “Go get goodrx!!!“ “Get a car!!!“ “You can still be in touch!!!“ like no. Stop. I hate these ads.

title: Crashes regularly, full of bugs
review: Absolutely atrocious app. How in the world does one of the biggest streaming services keep failing to fix this broken, unstable and bug-filled app? It has been updated several times and still routinely stalls, crashes and freezes. In addition, the  interface goes blank and loses the list of episodes,  or it stops playing unless you do a hard reset. Many shows won’t automatically play the next episode, others can’t be watched at all because the app gives an “Error 1” and stops working. Seriously, if this app was released by some unknown company it would have been pulled from the App Store for being a beta version. When are they EVER going to fix this piece of junk?

title: Weird glitches
review:
My main problem and the reason I’m writing this review is because the episodes tab has disappeared from one of the shows in My Stuff? When I click on it it shows the episode I’m currently on, and then Extras and You May Also Like. There is no Episodes tab so I have to manually search it up. This is an issue only with one show (Brooklyn Nine-nine 🥰), but it’s also the show I watch most on here and it’s realllllly annoying to have to search up the episodes as I go. 
Another thing: sometimes when I have perfectly fine connection, y’all take issue with it anyways and crash. Stop it

title: Just extra for no reason
review:
Tec support is really difficult to get to. You know they make you register before you contact them, as if having a monthly subscription doesn’t entitle you enough to contact them regarding issues. And get this, they even make your put your job title down -_- Does that determine how quickly they’ll respond or how seriously they’ll take your concerns. Kinda weird. 

And not all titles show up when you explore. There are shows that you have to manually type in for them to come up. Additionally, I’ve had trouble watching some shows on my laptop, but not on my phone. The trouble isn’t with loading or anything, but with Hulu’s interface. 

All around, I’m getting tired of this platform and how difficult they make it to contact them for support. I’ll definitely be ending my subscription after my month ends. Plus you’ll get tired of their options pretty fast. 

Y’all shouldn’t pay for subscriptions such as these as there are many websites that offer all these shows/movies for free. Up to you.

title: Why do I pay so much to still have commercials
review: It infuriates me that I pay the highest amount to not have commercials to still get these “advertisements” when I’m watching my shows. yes I can fast-forward through it but I paid to not have that there so why is it still there and why am I paying? And really good way to say that I’m not getting commercials by calling it an advertisement. I find I got less advertisements and commercials with the limited commercials package then I am with the no commercials

title: Poor quality watched episodes tracking
review: Frustrated by this app, both on my ipad and on Apple TV. I had to stop playing an episode for an emergency. When I tried to go back and pick it up where it left off, the ipad version had a “keep watching” option but it wasn’t the correct episode, and on the Apple TV app I couldn’t even find an option for “keep watching” at all. And how in the heck do you get to see a list of all the episodes available for a particular program? Altogether, a poorly organized app. Doesn’t do much good to have a big variety of programs if there’s no logical organization do the app.

title: Why does everyone keep voting one star?
review:
I personally enjoy this app and hoe the features work, however  one of the more recent updates made it so the layout changed. Sure we were all surprised but if we actually tried to do something about it it would actually work. Some people may complain about trivial things that have an easy fix for example:

I can’t skip to the correct time and i miss 95 percent of my movie! 

Is a problem some people have when they swipe on the screen taking you to that part, which is an easy fix. Just swipe back to where you were and don’t constantly flick the screen every two seconds!

I personally believe that as an active society we could actually do something about the problems in this app ( which might i mention ALL apps have problems) compared to just complaining about it for literally no point

title: Problems with this app for months
review: I suspended my monthly payments and should have left it that way. Past few days it will not let me cast to my tv. The only reason I even have to do that is because this app is the only one out of all the apps in the world that we can not rewind or fast forward on big screen. You can from phone but not on tv . Then before the casting quit working altogether I had to go in and out of the app at least three times for it to even cast . Now no options to even cast ! Same problems different year . This is getting ridiculous. Why are the rewind and ff issues not been dealt with yet ?? Everyone complains about it and just nothing being done. Netflix has been, and will remain, the best streaming service

title: Terrible video player
review: The new video player is really bad. The screen is way too sensitive and I’m constantly finding myself jumping ahead in the show I’m watching and taking forever to get back to the location I was on. I pay for add free and can't imagine what those people with commercials go through. The rest of the features are fine I guess, but the player needs to be fixed. I also hate that the screen goes dark when skipping ahead or back a few seconds. Please fix it

title: Kinda sad but happy
review: Love everything about your app. But three adds in 30 seconds seriously? Its stupid when you hardly tap the screen and it shifts the entire video back. And you have to watch a add before skipping back to were you are that Is if you even remember, then you have to watch another 90 second add... can you guys fix the tap function so it doesn't skip everytime. No one likes this feature. Trust me. I listen to all my friends at school bickering about that. Even my dad and sister hate that feature. Trust me, you'd be rated higher if you did

title: Least user friendly app ever
review:
First the good:
The content is much better, and more diverse than Netflix's short list of B-C rated movies and shows that nobody has heard of.

The bad:
The way that the tabs are set up is terrible, it is unnecessarily tedious to find your way to the episode menu, and when you do it goes to the most recent season, not the one you are currently watching.

And the ugly:
I cannot overstate this... THE FF/RW INTERFACE IS THE SLOPPIEST DESIGN FLAW SINCE THE EXHAST PORT ON THE DEATH STAR!!!! It is so stupid, when you touch ANYWHERE on the screen from the control interface while watching the show it immediately jumps to that spot, and when you try to find your way back to your spot, since it doesn't preview where you are skipping to you have to tap around on the screen like a three-year-old playing friggin flappy-bird until you either find your spot, or give up and get so angry with this being a daily struggle, you go onto the App Store to leave a scathing multi-paragraph rant as a review... which is exactly what just happened.

TL;DR
Great content, the app interface is worse than windows xp, with a mashed potato smeared on the motherboard.

title: Love it but kinda want the ads to stop.
review: Okay yeah I gave it a 5 star rating, but that’s only because I love the software and use it a lot. So as I said the ads in this. I know that they help the sponsor of the show make money but the ad breaks are kinda long and annoying. I would feel better if the ad breaks were 1 or 2 ads or if I could be able to skip them if they are long ad breaks. That would be really nice! So this wasn’t exactly the longest review but yeah. Thanks for listening to my suggestions and opinions.

title: Works but it has some big issues for me
review:
This is specifically in reference to the Apple TV app:
1.  Subbed anime is messed up.   Auto subtitles does not work so when you want to switch apps you have to change the darned subtitle setting since it’s a global setting.   Second, even with it turned on, after an ad it sometimes stops showing subtitles and forces a stop out of the show to fix it.   Also too many ads for a short anime episode.
2.  The audio is stereo for everything.   Really poor streaming option for home theater owners.   The other providers usually have good to very good surround options.
On a fire stick sometimes it hangs instead of playing an ad

title: Ready to switch
review: It’s nice to have live streaming and favorite shows, but not when it doesn’t work! Since the latest update, there have been numerous times when the app doesn’t load. I delete it and reinstall and works until the next time I want to use it. We have had other issues as well where it keeps repeating the last few seconds. I should not have to keep deleting and reinstalling to grt this to work. The subscription just renewed, but for the next month, I’ll be looking for another streaming app unless you can get this one to work! It’s not worth the trouble for the price!

title: Keeps getting stuck!!!!!
review:
Soooo annoying!!! I've been trying to watch a show on this app, but it keeps freezing! I tried updating the app and restarting my iPad and it keeps getting stuck. It won't fast forward or rewind once stuck. I'm closing it and watching my Prime Video service instead. The Prime app is infinitely better.

Update: noticed and downloaded the new update on 10/17...still....freezing!!! My internet speed is not the issue. Netflix and Prime work just fine. When I close the app to try watching again, it takes me right back to the very beginning of the episode and forces me to watch commercials in order to try to find the spot I was at before it froze. Then it freezes at that same spot. I give up. Lousy app.

title: Annoying app
review: There are several irritating things about this app. Pause/play/ff/rwd, etc. Layout when looking to watch. Give users control of their layout! We shouldn't have to scroll through pages to get to a list of movies or programs. Why can't we just see everything on one list under each header? There are 12 sub-headers under "more movies" give a "see all" option. What's popular with me may not be what's popular with others! I don't care about staff picks! Just give an alphabetical list option for each section! There are just too many hoops to jump through to get to programming, whether it's tv, movies, or whatever the viewer is looking for. Simplicity please!

title: Really good but a few things bug me
review: It’s overall a very good app but when I wanna search for a show it just shows the episodes and movies. Another thing is when I look for, let’s say anime, I won’t find it there so I think “Oh, it’s not here” but when I choose a show to watch it will recommend me the anime I was looking for. Then when I look for it in the anime genre, it’s not there. Please add this feature and fix your genres. It will help me and (probably) other people find what they want to watch.

title: Spongebob please
userName: it's dad im still gettin milk
review: I love this app but I wish it had Spongebob. That would make it a 100 times better(Quarantine has been making me miss my childhood). I do really enjoy this app. There’s tons of different show and movies I have been watching since quarantine started. I can’t hangout with others right now so my friends and I have been watching the same show and texting each other about our favorite parts and characters. I’ve also went back to a couple shows that I didn’t finish since I have more time on my hands. This app is amazing.👍

title: Solved 2 problems!
review:
Looks like the screen no longer stays on after a video has stopped playing and the app goes back to the previous menu despite any ipad screen lock settings! Thank you

It also looks like you can play though the last episode of a show you already watched elsewhere after adding it to your watch list, and the app will drop the show to the bottom of your watch list to wait for new episodes! Not exactly the “mark as watched” button I long for, but a huge improvement. Thanks again

title: commercials🙄
review:
Just wish there were less commercials. I know everyone probably saying this. But I pay a little more than Netflix for this and I have commercials. There are different shows and I love that but I don’t want to pay more for more commercials. And you can’t be profiting too much more from them cause you chargin more than Netflix and more current shows. Idk. Just a thought and suggestion! Or maybe just shorter commercials??

Still appreciate the app though! Of course!

title: Downgrade.
review:
While the prettify interface is all shiny and mobile-appy, and is very visually appealing. It is a actual and significant downgrade in user functionality. It has become much more tedious to browse content, and more tedious and time consuming to navigate to our own playlists. And who thought it was a good idea to eliminate genres and sub-genres as a browsing feature? We HATE that. This was a primary way people looked for content that meets their own preferences and interests, as opposed to the marketing desires and needs of networks and content creators.  

So – lovely visual design, horrid information design.

title: ADD A BACKGROUND PLAY FEATURE ALREADY
review: We’ve been waiting and asking and voting for this LONG enough and would love to finally have this!! I’m confused why my iPhone shows the play button while my screens locked and the feature doesn’t even work on your app as it does on Netflix!! Want to be able to play my shows in the background while doing work! You’ve been stalling for WAY too long and many might subscribe again if you add this. Netflix is going to beat you soon enough and they already technically have since they beat you to it on the background audio feature on that note! Get to it, please or I’ll be next on the unsubscribing list and switch back to Netflix as I get more rewards on there for subscribing anyways!

title: Screen Freezes but sound still plays
review: When I am watching something if I tap on the screen to pause, it freezes on the resume Episodes screen. I can’t get out of it, but the movie or show continues to play in the background. I can’t see the show and all you hear is the sound. The only way to fix it is to shut down the app completely and reopen it. It is really annoying. It doesn’t do this every time but it is about 30% of the time. It only does it on my iPad and so I would think it’s an apple issue. Please fix this. I just did an update and thought this would fix the issue but apparently you guys weren’t aware of this problem yet.

title: Latest update- not a fan
review: I don’t normally don’t write reviews but I have gotten annoyed several times that I want to.  The new app that allows you to scroll back no matter where you are at on your screen is annoying.  So many times I have been watching and just want to see how much is left and it doesn’t respond right away then I tap again and all of of a sudden I am back to the beginning and I have to try to get back where I was and end up having to rewatch another commercial bc I don’t pay premium.  Also how it opens is annoying...I have to click into the my stuff screen to see my shows where it used to be pulled up right when I opened it.

title: Ehh
review: I would like to start off to say I have had problems with this app for a while. Whenever I click out of my app to go on something else and then come back to it, the show goes all the way back to the first commercial or the commercial I didn’t even leave off on. I am so disappointed that we are paying for a service like this and still have to deal with multiple commercials. I can watch my own tv for tv shows if you guys are going to be adding commercials. It makes no sense. The commercials are also way to long. Would’ve given it 5 stars if it wasn’t for commercials.👎🏽

title: Fix Autoplay
review:
Autoplay never seems to work. It just pauses on an image for the show. Sometimes it has to do with subtitles sometimes it depends if you start the episode from I watched or from the part that shows all the episodes. Why can’t this ever work?

Problems with remembering where you left off. It might start it over or continue depending which part of the app your in. OR it doesn’t refresh and starts from the first episode you start with if Autoplay is actually working. And if it’s close to the end (more than one min) it’ll go to the next episode even if it’s like two or three mins remaining. This happens in some interfaces and sometimes not.

title: The app is terrible
review: I don’t know what is wrong with this app. It was working fine until a month ago and now I have problems every single day I use it. It tells me that I cannot fast forward or rewind on commercials but the show I am watching is not on a commercial break. It tells me shows don’t exist and then the next morning they magically appear. It will change to a completely different show that’s not even on my list in the middle of watching one that is on my list. I am becoming so frustrated with it than I am about to cancel it completely. There are just too many problems and since it was updated three days ago and the bugs still aren’t fixed I don’t see a point in continuing to use it.

title: Commercials
review: The interface of the app is fine to me. The biggest issue for me is commercials. I believe that if you’re going to compete with Netflix and other big steaming apps you should look into: a) Reducing the amount of commercials shown at a time and b) if you are going to have commercials, at least change them up more often. It gets so annoying to have to watch/hear the same commercials over and over and over again. Besides that, the app is great. It has great shows and i can get used to the interface. I hope you take my review under consideration and keep up the good work.

title: Not at all user friendly
review: It's very hard to find shows that I would watch, and no longer adds shows that you have been watching to your watch list, which is super annoying. Also, all you have to do is accidentally bump your phone and you've completely lost your place in the show and are stuck watching yet another annoying set of the same exact commercials multiple times when you have to search for your place..

title: Entirely Frustrating
review: First off it's hard to navigate right from the start, all of these suggested shows take up the entire screen which makes browsing slow to a crawl. Once an episode is playing the controls are extremely touchey, just an accidental tap can send you forwards or backwards to the commercial breaks- which REPLAY even when already watched, that's probably the worst part of this update. It's almost as if it were designed to force you into watching the ads twice. ONE OF THE WORST UPDATES EVER. I've probably been forced to watch an extra hour of commercials since updating, I cannot believe I'm paying for this. - EDIT: currently writing this while ads are RE PLAYING THAT I LITERALLY JUST WAS FORCED TO WATCH DUE TO AN ACCIDENTALLY FAST FORDWARD DUE TO THE APPS TOUCHINESS FING FIX THIS

title: Fix the rewind!!!
review: This function is horrible because it is way to easy to accidentally rewind to the beginning or end. When you pause the screen and you touch another part of the screen it rewinds to that part of your movie or show. It get extremely frustrating! When you accidentally rewind to the beginning it makes you watch long, annoying adds and then once you fast forward to your original spot you have to watch another add. If you accidentally scroll to the end it goes to the next episode making you have to go back and watch three more adds to get to your original spot. This function is horrible! FiX THIS!!

title: Every day I need to reinstall this app
review: Unlike every other app on my device I need to reinstall this one every day I plan to use it.  When I try to watch something it spends some time loading and the  says I have a weak connection; I’m unable to play anything.  My connection is fine and other streaming apps work with no issues.  Even without this nagging problem the user experience feels clunkier than the other streaming apps I mentioned.  Some of the programming is quite good so for now I’ll keep using it but at some point I’ll probably cancel my subscription unless this app is fixed.

title: Worst App Ever
review: I have never written an app review but this app is actually terrible. I watch more ads than the show. I mean an ad every 5 mins that lasts 90 seconds and if you accidentally rewind or exit you have to watch the WHOLE 90 seconds again. The design is also horrible, it doesn’t even save your correct place in the episode so that when you come back to watch it later you have to watch the ads again. This is actually the worst app I have ever seen. I mean seriously who developed this because I can do a better job and I’m still learning computer science. Tip: to continue profitting off of displaying ads consider rearranging how the ads are shown to the viewer to please both the advertiser and your customer.

title: Great selection - horrible menu system
review:
This app and steaming site does have a great selection of movies and tv. The original content is fantastic and well produced.
My problem is with the app format.  The menu system is hard to follow and just doesn’t make a whole lot of sense. When I open the movies section it’s just a list of movies. They do have break out grouping suggestions across the top but the groupings are not really helpful. I would rather see it set up by genre or recognizable classifications. Unless you know the specific title to search by, it’s hard to find anything. Make this more intuitive.

title: Very frustrating
review:
I’ve noticed that after watching a couple episodes consecutively that if I tap on the screen the whole video disappears and only the audio is left and I’m stuck staring at a frozen episode list. 

Also that is doesn’t track how many episodes I have left accurately, I have 3 episodes left of a 37 episode series that has both English and Japanese options but yet it tells me I still have 74 episodes left. 

For series that I’ve already started and am a good bit into it won’t show me the next episode to watch on the front screen of the show’s details, it’ll show me the first episode of that series even though it’s fully watched.

title: Ununably poor design
review:
This is an absolute mess. The previous update was supposed to make navigation easier, but it is awful. Trying to navigate out of a series when one episode is over is horrendous. 
I don't want to watch the newest episode in a series I'm only part way through. I want to watch the NEXT episode I haven't seen. Yet I have to back out (after watch yet another ad, on top of the one I had to watch just to get out of the last video).
Please start testing this stuff with real users, not app designers. You would see that while your last version was bad, this is a major step down.

title: Issues
review: I love this app but it has many many issues, when tapping on the screen in rewinds or fast forwards to that place automatically. The audio fades out and won’t return. I have to tap out of the episode and wait a couple of seconds then resume and only then will the audio come back on. It doesn’t always resume from where I left off, most of the time it goes back to the previous episode I had been watching not the one I was actually on.

title: A lot of issues
review: I would like to preface my review that firstly, I do like the selection of shows that are available! I like the color scheme as well. However, the issues have become more technical. I recently updated the app and I like the new layout as the other one was confusing and it was hard to find anything. The issue this time is that it crashes every time I try to scroll. For some reason, it just crashes every single time, so I can only touch the “Play” button on whatever show I want to continue watching. I hope these issues can get resolved soon!

title: Read the other comments guys
review: If you look at the other comments you will see the same thing over and over.  This app constantly has glitches.  The buffering takes forever and all my other movie apps have no problem like that, well except for Disney+ which is owned by the same.  This has been happening even before covid-19 so that isn’t an excuse.  They refuse to listen to their customers and I honestly think they don’t care.  I pay for the adless option.  Still buffering issues and not to mention if you exit the app to try and help it doesn’t save where you are so you must fast forward and the buffering starts over.  Choose wisely this and Disney+ are the only apps that do that!!

title: Why are you expiring these good anime?
review: Like I said in the title why are you expiring good anime? I just started to watch One Piece and now it says it getting expired in over a week? Why is that? Also, there’s Dragon Ball GT, Dragon Ball, Toriko, (etc.) Is it because they’re old anime? Or is the watch time dropping? Honestly I have no idea wether it’s like those two examples, or it’s just some thing else. If you are going to delete it, maybe you could add it back. I don’t know how this works at all so I’ll just stay in my lane. But as I said earlier, if you’re going to delete it, then just add it back.

title: Navigation, IA, and live tv make no sense
review:
Live TV and browsing shows are two completely different mental models. You combined them and it’s terrible. If I’m in live TV mode I wanna easily see what’s on or will be on soon or will be on tonight and I want it by channel (because I don’t know what I’m looking for but I know the channels of interest). Showing me a list of only what’s on now doesn’t accomplish that. Maybe something’s on later that I want to catch. Can’t do that here! And i want to add live channels to “my stuff”, so I don’t even have to enter the guide if I know the channel I want to leave on for the next few hours.

I left DirecTV Now for this and I want to stay but you’re making it difficult.

title: Awful
review:
Top three issues with the mobile app: 1) difficulty in browsing through shows and options to find new series to try out. 2) Touch screen means if you do not hit pause or one of the forward/back buttons, the program may jump to wherever you touched. 3) Previously, you could skip forward and watch commercials, and then go back without the commercials. Even when it skips due to my touching the screen, I have to go back through commercials, which can go up to two minutes. Also, cannot go to a previous point in the program without having to watch/listen to commercials. 

Using our of desperation, and not at all because I think this app has any redeeming qualities.

title: Really sleek but it has problems
review: I like the way all the content is laid out. It looks amazing in terms of appearance but I’ve been having a lot of issues with just playing the movies and shows I like. Every time I reopen this app it gives an error message that it can’t play the next episode, it’s no longer connected to internet, or it flat out says it can’t play the episode period! I have to close and reopen constantly. It’ll auto play one episode before it gives me an error message! The app is so fluid and intuitive but playback suuuucks! Please fix and I’ll give 5 stars like it deserves!

title: Good shows, bad set up
review:
The way it’s organized doesn’t make sense. Difficult to navigate (for a millennial and someone who grew up on technology even) and will constantly stop bringing up shows on my list that I am watching weekly still and still have new episodes coming up weekly?
Too much priority goes to the next episode. It’s a pain to go to the full catalog of a show and try to find a specific episode which it seems like I do often. It’s like the app doesn’t want you to go out of order.
The content is quality and improving still! Set up is awful and frustrating.

title: PLEASE fix this
review: I'm reviewing this just to point out something in the hopes it will be fixed: when watching a show, if you click anywhere on the screen other than the rewind/forward/pause buttons, it thinks you are skipping ahead/backward to that spot in the runtime, which is incredibly annoying because then it jumps there and you have to find the original spot you were at again. It's especially annoying in my case, because I don't have premium, so if I inadvertently skip forward I'm forced to sit there and watch an extra series of ads, unable to go back until they end. Even after over months of using this app I still do this on accident. Please fix it!!! It’s seriously awful.

title: Great App
review: This app has become 1 of 3 of my go-to streaming apps. Content is diverse and stretches well into each of my favorite genres. The ads in the basic version are spaced out in a manner that is more than bearable. Plus, they don’t take up much time. That being said, PLEASE rotate the ads a bit for us that go show-binging. 4 weddings and a funeral looked appealing the first 5-10x the ad aired today. After about 30x, I feel like I’ll do whatever it takes NOT to watch the show. Ok, enough cynicism. Thanks for keeping this app up to date and worth the money. Kudos.

title: Terrible interface and my stuff disappeared
review:
All of the shows I followed have disappeared and I have to rebuild "my stuff" from scratch. None of the shows suggested "for me" have any relevance to my viewing history or interest, so this page feels like sponsored content, not something "for me".
Worst of all, seeing a single show per screen, rather than a matrix of images to choose from, is just a waste of time and space. Even the screens that show multiple items in a category have huge images and show only a few per screen. I want to be able to browse a large amount of info at a glance, without needing to search or click through multiple screens.
I'd revert to the old app in a flash.

title: Constantly crashing can’t even open app...
review: I love this app however at this moment I don’t. I used it all the time, until today when it started crashing! I’ve done everything to try and fix it but nothing is working. I’ve uninstalled it, powered down my phone, deleted other apps, updated my phone. Nothing has fixed it. I shouldn’t be having this problem since I have a iPhone 8 which is less then a year old. Really disappointed since being able to watch shows over my phone is really convenient for me. Hope to here back from anyone for help.

title: Bad update
