review: I lost a lot of the things I had saved to watch later. It's so much more difficult to look through movies. I used to be able to see the entire movie catalog at once. I also miss my auto play feature. Now it stops playing a series after only 2-3 episodes.  I do like the new look that came with the update, but I lost a lot of functionality. In addition, the app crashes no matter which device I may be watching on (iPhone, iPad, Roku, smart tv app...THEY ALL CRASH)!

title: More bugs
review: I just updated it and now when I make the screen whole the time, battery, and WiFi symbol all still appear. It is taking up screen space and covering a lot of what is happening. I would like for them to disappear again. Otherwise the only other issue is sometimes when I play the show from where I stopped it goes back. Plus when I hit the go forward for 30 seconds it goes back. I have no clue. Up until these little thugs this has been my favorite app. Solid other wise. Thanks

title: Why?!
review: I get that you think its cute that your app is barely workable and you constantly need to 'squash' bugs, but this isnt funny to me. On top of all the problems I've stated in earlier reviews; it not makes me restart my ipad anytime I dane to try to close the app. The app refuses to let me leave it or even allow me access to my homepage or any of the settings to close it down. I love the content, hate the app and have so since the major changes almost 2 years ago. Look a netflix. Copy and repeat. Stop all this other crap. Update. Your newest bug squashing has made it so two programs will play at once. Making watching anything on my iPad impossible. Thanks for the great work. You guys should be used to sarcasm.

title: Confused but still love the app
review: Love the app, love that I can keep up with current programming, enjoy the ease of use. I’ve read some reviews to see if anyone was experiencing what has been going on with mine and saw so many other issues other than mine. The app seems to disconnect and I have to go back in to pair it with my chromecast after 3-4 or so shows running.  I also have to constantly hit “remove” from suggested shows because they never actually go away. Still love the app just throwing out the things I’ve run into lately.

title: Love it
review: We have the no commercial plan, I love everything, but a recent update, caused all the shows that I have on my watch list to constantly start back on episode 1. Even if I’ve watched the entire series it shows “start watching season 1, episode 1” I miss when it would show “all caught up” so I can easily see when a new episode has aired. Also, I was re-watching a show, and when I went to pick up where I left off, it was back at the very first episode. Can we please change that back to the way it was before.

title: Constantly Have to Force Quit to Continue to the Next Episode
review: I rarely review apps but this one has gotten so bad recently that I had to. I use the iPad app to watch tv shows and lately at the end of every single episode, no exaggeration, I get an error message. When I try to go to the main page and reload the episodes, it just gives me the loading circle until I force quit. Once I force quit and reopen the app, it works fine until that episode ends.

title: Needs some TLC
review:
We have LiveTV also and it needs some love.

I nearly every device we have (iPads, iPhones, FireTVs, Echo Shows) we will start a show and after 3-5 minutes it buffers and jumps back multiple minutes. For example I use my iPad or Echo Show to watch the news or sports center every morning and without fail every day it does this.

The interface/guide is slow and buggy. It also doesn’t update the Home Screen or guide when relaunching the app. So every morning I have to force close the app (swipe it away) and launch it fresh so the Home Screen and interface will update.

title: Is it just me?
review: I'm certain it isn't my internet connection because all my devices work with all my other apps but since the update I can't watch a show all the way through without interruption because it won't load constantly have to go back wait 2 mins then try again... it's very annoying! And also why can't I use it with only my cellular LTE??? It's annoyingly that I pay for a streaming service I have to connect to wifi for everytime I use it 😒

title: Seeking
review: I was trying to watch where I left off on the episode I was watching and it completely lost my place so I tried using the press and hold to seek so I can try to get back at the place I was at. All It did was give me 25 seconds worth of adds and leave me at the beginning. Tried it again and again but all it gave me was adds, not even the place I was trying to get to. Over all that, they have a variety of shows which is really good and I enjoy that a lot but this just the thing that bugs me a lot.

title: Stopped working
review: The app is great but after a while it started to not work at all. Like every time I tried to work the app it would say connection failed try to refresh the page but every time I rest the page it didn't work and I know it's not my WiFi because Netflix was working perfectly fine and so we're my other apps that need WiFi. I even rest my phone and yet it still hasn't worked. No matter how many times I tried it just wouldn't work. Please fix this matter as soon as possible.

title: Good, but I wish...
review:
...that the queue wasn’t so annoying. 
The option to turn the auto play off is there, I know. But during TV season, when I have multiple episodes of different shows lined up, I wish it would play from what’s up in my Keep Watching or, better yet, that I could control what’s queued up in the auto play and maybe THEN it goes into automatically selected stuff after my chosen episodes have run through.
Good app, though. Lets me watch TV for fairly decent price, especially when compared to cable.

title: Password recovery
review: This is a great app for commuters. I usually leave my account logged in. When I switched phones and had to log back in I couldn’t remember my password. I used the recovery option on the app (which was supposed to email me a recovery link) but was never sent a link to the email associated to my account. I checked my junk mail folder as well but there was  nothing. The app didn’t give me a number to call for support either. I finally remembered my password and was able to log back in a day later.

title: NBC Channel’s
review: Very disappointed with the nbc channel’s. I could not get the Sunday night football game even though I had local channel coverage all day and every other time and just this week the nbcsports channel cut out in the middle of the Chelsea premier game and said the channel was not a part of my subscription. Yet today the channel is available and I am able to watch. Very frustrating. I would like to see the hockey games like you had last year as well. That was a huge reason for going with you. I loved that I could watch the Vegas Golden Knights when I was not able to make it to the game.

title: App Update Is The Pits
review:
I have never left a review of an app before, but the new mobile UX is just terrible. It's restrictive, difficult to navigate, and forced me to choose show preferences that didn't include anything I would actually watch. I'm fairly certain it was designed just to put certain programming in front of me, not to help with actual discovery. Now, it's nearly impossible to tell when there's a new episode of a show I follow, and nothing is in an intuitive place. Most options offered to me in each category seem to be very old shows, or some terrible CBS ish. (The day this app puts Big Bang Theory in front of me will be the last straw.)

While the interface is prettier, I would take the old one back any day.

title: Not working
review: This latest update isn’t working. Just clicked on the latest show I’ve been watching and an error pops up saying “this isn’t included in your subscription” so I tried other tv shows and movies, every time it says I can’t watch shows that are included in my subscription. Also the amount of ads are ridiculous. Sometimes I will only get to watch 2 minutes of a show before another 90 second ad appears. Apparently for a paid service you’re required to watch the same amount of ads as you do the actual show.

title: Review.
review: Great price, lots of channels much better than roku for the money. Easy to use. Has quite a few connectio issues with my Chromecast where it just buffers randomly. Also, if you go out of the app an come back in you have to reconnect the app to the tv which is annoying. The volume connection is finicky as well. Sometimes you have to recast the screen to the tv to regain control over the volume even if you dont disconnect from the app. Overall highly recommended even though there are quirks. MUCH better than cable.

title: Not enough episodes!!
review: I'm just going to flat out say it: THERE AREN'T ENOUGH DUBBED EPISODES FOR NARUTO SHIPPUDEN!!!! The only real reason I downloaded this app was so that I could watch Naruto Shippuden. But with only 140 out of somewhere around 500 episodes that are dubbed, I was just getting to the good part and now there is only Japanese audio with English subtitles! It's hard for me to look at the subtitles at the same time I'm looking at the anime itself. So either tell me they're still dubbing the episodes, or add the rest of the dubbed ones! I'm not trying to be harsh with this review, but now I'm paying an extra $5.99 a month for no reason!

title: Crashes Every Time I play an Episode
review: I love a lot of the shows on this app, and will often put them on in the background while I work around the house, but recently I can’t load a single episode up without the entire app crashing. I am sick on having to sit through 40 seconds of adds just for the entire app to crash and have to watch them again and again hoping that it will load and finally allow me to watch the episode. I’ve checked my WiFi and my phone multiple times, but neither of those is the problem. At this point I’m considering deleting the app as it is now just a glorified add app. I wouldn’t download this app until this problem is fixed.

title: This app never works
review: I have never been this frustrated with any streaming app. Everytime it gives “Hmm something up logout and try” I logout and it never logins me in again. Weird error saying please check internet, yes dude I have internet all my 200 apps working except this trash. Same thing happens on iPad and Apple TV. Even on google people said delete the app and reinstall it. That works sometimes. Why should I have to go through all this trouble to watch a show on this app. If the developers are reading this , you guys need better skill set because your app doesn’t work. Nobody cares about the color coding and effects it needs to serve the prime purpose. Hope they learn and fix this with next update.

title: Just nooooooOooooooo
review: I like the shows and all ... but like almost everything is getting expired and deleted I had to download so many app just to watch one show I can’t even watch Steven Universe or any of the Harry Potter movies cause they say “currently unavailable” then it just deletes itself ugh just do not download this if you never move on from your favorite show or you move on faster I really don’t even have anything good to say about this DO NOT DOWNLOAD ugh and it doesn’t name the titles right it’s so confusing I could go on and on about this app but I can’t cause its so annoying and if it doesn’t get its act together I will delete it and come back and give and even worse review get it together or else ...

title: Worst Update Ever!!!!
review: Whenever I try to pause the screen and hit it twice by accident the show/movie I’m watching jumps all over the place taking from the middle to the end or the other way around. On top of that there are commercials which are prompted whenever this happens which has me waiting around to go back to where I previously was. Change it to a regular scrolling bar!!!!! It works for every other app if it ain’t broke don’t try to fix it!!!!!

title: Great but annoying
review: I love this app and all my favorite shows are on it but I’ve been having this problem for months and I think they’ll fix it with the next update but so far nothing... if I stop watching an episode in the middle of it, when I go back to watch it it doesn’t remember where I left off, it makes me start all over. It’s extremely annoying, especially when I get stuck watching ads and I’m not even at the right part of where I left off. I end up spending 2 minutes trying to figure out where I left off. It’s really annoying.

title: I like it but there are issues
review:
I have a really annoying issue besides the fact that after a few episodes of tv shows it does say there’s a connection issue on my side. Which is not true. And I see there are others with the same issue. 
But my biggest issue is that I keep getting subtitles on every movie and tv show I watch. Even though I Tuen subtitles off the still come up and I have to keep shutting them off. This is super annoying! When are you going to fix these issues?
On the bright side I do like the selection of movies and shows you have.

title: Great but could use some improvement
review: The list of shows in “my stuff” can become too long and it’s rather annoying to continue scrolling and scrolling to find a show. A viewing of multiple shows in rows and columns could lessen this burden. Also more urban shows and 90s - 00s shows being added would be greatly appreciated. Shows such as the fresh prince, Martin, my wife and kids, and 00s Disney and Nick kids content would be nice to have. Also more pop culture and classic films being added would be great too.

title: Thank you
review:
I was so thrilled to discover the update to the app and you have absolutely washed away 90% of my pain points.

That being said....

I wish picture in picture was more reliable. When I navigate away from your app while watching content the video does properly go to picture in picture mode but the playback pauses for some reason and tapping on the video box doesn’t bring up the buttons for resuming playback. I have to swipe up to display the control panel to resume playback. I really wish the video would continue to play if and when I navigate away from your app.

If I’m watching a TV series in picture in picture mode the app seems to close at the end of an episode. I wish instead it started the next show. 

Would also love to see improvements to your content catalog user interface down the road as well. 

All in all I’m seeing lots of progress with the most recent update and that make me happy!

title: Impossible to watch live TV
review: The screen is constantly freezing and the audio often doubles, so that you hear two different audios at one time. If things don’t change, I’ll have to use another provider.  UPDATE, I changed the video quality from auto to medium and now it’s working. My only other complaint is to improve switching between favorite networks easily, I don’t want to have to scroll through every network. Also, a quicker way to clean up recorded shows, like add a select function and then a delete, so you can quickly delete unwanted shows.

title: Needs work
review:
I wish they would make it so you can mark episodes as “watched” to remove the notice. If I watch something else where it would be nice to not have so many unwatched on my list confusing me if I seen it or not. I like to just check my list for new episodes (so I don’t get a ton of notifications) and see if there’s any new episodes for me to watch 

Also the new update it really annoying because if i tap the screen to check the time or how far I’m in the show, etc it will fast forward or rewind to where I tapped on the show which has caused so many spoilers ☹️

title: Too many problems
review: First off the new layout is pretty bad and annoying to use, the FF and RW buttons are pretty bad too and if you accidentally tap the screen while watching something, it’ll instantly take you to that spot and you’ll lose your last spot. But I didn’t mind that sooo much until the subtitles recently got screwed up. I can’t watch any non English shows because there are no more subtitles. I go to the setting to try and fix them however they’re greyed out and my only option is “accessibility settings” which takes me to my iPhone settings. When I go to media and turn subtitles on, THEY STILL DONT WORK. Please fix this annoying bug and really do some work on the new design of the app.

title: Difficult
review:
Maybe myself and all the other reviewers - since the update, are missing something, but this just seems so unnecessarily hard to use. I am not one afraid of change, in fact I am embrace it.
From all the same problems listed in other reviews. Which I agree with. I feel slightly held hostage by this thing now, is their a tutorial that perhaps will help us all better understand what is great about this? Is the picture in picture hidden? Is their a way to see how "my shows" functions more like my previous watch list? So much to scroll through? So many pages? So complicated. I appreciate that a lot of thought and care went into this major overhaul. Maybe I am being dense.

title: Constant interruptions
review: While watching anything using this application ive run into constant issues regarding streaming programs. I could be at home wired into the network or at work in a concrete building, my programs are constantly being interrupted by a loading screen and the ever frustrating, “sorry were having issues playing that.” After closing and reopening the app the issue would stop, but only momentarily before it would resurge and ruin another show. Considering this is a streaming service i assumed that you would be able to do exactly that. Until these issues are corrected i highly recommend sling

title: My stuff has gotten worse
review: The “My Stuff” section organization has gotten worse in the latest updates. It marks many episodes watched as unwatched, it shows many minutes of unfinished episodes when most (99%) of the shows watched have been watched to the end of the closing credits, finally, there should be a way to mark shows as caught up. It’s a very sloppy interface. Shows should also have some sort of notification or icon for series where commercials can NOT be skipped.

title: Not great
review: This app is the worst out of all the streaming apps. It’s constantly disconnecting from my chrome cast (I don’t have any problems with other streaming apps) and it never loads properly. Also you can’t watch anything on your phone while streaming with this app on your tv or every video is on top notch full volume. Scares me every time. The volume is always messed up. It’s also hard to navigate in general and the autoplay never puts on the shows in my watch list. There are more issues than not. I never have to worry about Netflix. I wish they would fix these issues, then I would use this app more often.

So... I’d recommend this to friends, but only after they’ve tried everything else. This is the first time I’ve seen a paid application have ads and I hate it. The only reason I’m using it is because I can’t switch my card on Netflix. I recommend you remove the ads because it’s getting you no where, especially when we’re paying you 8 dollars a month for this buggy service. What I’m saying is this is the last app I’d recommend. The reason I’m giving 3 stars is because it has a much higher selection than any other app I’ve tried which is good.

title: Zoot
review:
It’s time for anamainiacs and we’re zany to the max so just sit back and relax we’ll we will laugh and (I forgot lyrics at this part)
We’re an a main ee acs come join the Warner brothers and the Warner sister dot just for fun we run around the Warner movie lot they lock us in the tower when ever we get caught but we break lose and then vamoos and now you know the plot we’re 
A an main ee acs dot is cute and yakk o yaks wakko packs with the snacks while bill clinton plays the sax were a na main ee acs 
I’m not continuing the song

title: Lot of room for improvement.
review:
The app is functional, and I don’t experience any flaws that prevent me from wanting to use the app. But there are a lot of little things about it that bug me. For instance:

1: Why, when I’m in the middle of a series and click on More Episodes on that series’ information page, does it not take me to the episode I’m currently on? This would be helpful, considering the fact that:

2: Often times, the same episode will repeat itself over and over. Even when I click the next episode I have issues when the previous one playing again. Very annoying. 

3: There have been many times where I will accidentally click the screen and it’ll somehow take me back to the beginning of the episode. This is an issue because first off, I have to find where I was again. And more importantly, I’m subjected to another ad that I shouldn’t be. Not sure what the solution for this would be.

title: Terrible service/Quality
review: Whenever I try to stream shows/movies it always tells me that the episodes/movies are unavailable but if I change devices it works for about ten minutes, until your ads audio runs over whatever I’m streaming. Recently the app audio rewinds every ten seconds while the video/pictures continue. Terrible service and no matter what I do to try to fix it, just seems to be a problem on the app. Used to love this app but just hasn’t been the same for awhile. Hope you can fix these technical difficulties soon since there was no where else to report such problems. Also many other bug/glitches I am not pleased with.

title: Too many commercials or ads.
review:
Whatever you call them, there are too many of them. It’s bad enough that they have taken over television, but now the streaming apps also? They want over 60 dollars a month for ad-filled tv and and streaming. You cannot rewind without having to watch the ads all over again. And then, they play maybe 5 minutes of the show and they start all over again. It’s a shame that something that is suppose be enjoyable is turning irritating and definitely not worth the money. 

On a another note, the customer service was great, but the service is disappointing.

title: Over all the apps great, but...
review: Over all the app is great for iPhone XS Max and iPad mini 2. With most of the updates there have been little bugs, but I was able to get through those. With the last update for both the iPhone and iPad (version 5.48.1) isn’t good. I’ve even tried uninstalling and reinstalling with no success. Most shows will play. However, the show I was watching when I did the updated will not play. Would like to see this updated so I can get back to my show. It was just getting good!!!

title: Not Happy At All.
review: 1st the fact that they only have current seasons not previous seasons of certain shows is absolutely garbage. 2nd the fact that I’ve got to sit through 6 commercials in a 40 minute episode is garbage. 3rd the fact that all 6 commercials are 107 seconds long each, which would be okay if they actually played, not having to load every literal 2 seconds it plays. 4th it also only plays 5 seconds of the show then pauses to load no matter the quality or WiFi bars. It honestly makes no sense that someone in the same house as me using the same internet & same account has absolutely no problem. I am very very VERY disappointed in this GARBAGE. 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻

title: Poor update
review: I was so excited about the new live TV I watched with a co worked to make sure I’d love it and I did. Now every time I try to watch on my iPad or iPhone (both up to date on updates and the app is as well) it doesn’t allow me to watch anything. It says it’s going to bring me to another page to set up live. Instead it just brings me back to the screen you get when you open the app. I restart my device and delete the app multiple times and it still doesn’t work. It does this glitch very frequently, more times than I am able to watch. Very irritating and makes me want to take my business elsewhere.

title: Problem with a show
review: I’ve been trying to watch one of your shows on my Apple TV and at the beginning I thought it was probably my internet connection, but it turns out that I’d only had problems with that show...”Find me in Paris” is like it has a problem, I’ve try with episode 1 and 2, the shows starts perfect then the screen goes black and you can only see the CC going, buy nothing. It’s a shame, I really want to see that show.

title: Please Fix in Next Update
review: This app is pretty easy and straight forward to use but every time I go to actually watch a tv show I get the message “Welcome to live tv, Complete the the setup on the next screen to begin watching live tv on your phone.” Mind you I’m not trying to watch a “Live” tv show. I’m trying to watch an older episode and I’m trying to watch it on my iPad not my iPhone. I would very much like if this issue is fixed because I do like this app when I use it on my iPhone but I’d like to also be able to use it on my iPad without weird glitches like this one.

title: Please bring back the previous version and PIP!
review:
This GUI is cumbersome and not helpful. I am being exposed to a fraction of your offerings now. Very difficult to find new shows to watch. Also picture in picture keeps coming and going! Please restore this functionality...and KEEP it restored! Best of all, bring back the former app!

Also, I agree with other reviewers about the rewind functionality. I have lost my place multiple times due to this asinine full screen setup.

title: BEST APP
review: This is by far the most used app on my phone. I like lots of different shows and this has everything I search for. In my opinion it  is well worth the money you pay! It is quick to load and has a convenient resume episode or movie option along with the “my stuff tab” I use it to save other shows that I am watching and want to watch in the and future and ITS SO HELPFUL. I’m so grateful for this app and will use this for a long time

title: Opaque frosted ridiculous interface
review: The faded out opaque colors of the shows, only becoming clear when you click on it, has to be the most ridiculous dysfunctional feature I’ve ever seen. I can’t see what I’m looking at! My eyes strain and I feel like I have to look through the frosted nonsense design before I can figure out what the show is! Content is great, design and functionality is a complete disaster. Getting an error now on top of it and can’t play anything. Is your design team filled with interns who have no sense and experience? Sure does play that way. You guys are missing the mark by such a distance that you should seriously be embarrassed and ashamed. Seriously unbelievable.

title: I would give it less than one star if I could
review: This is a waste of time.  I spend more time hunting for new episodes of shows I watch and my favorites are relegated to some hidden menu. I had to finally go online to import them over from the other app.  Not to mention the fact there is no way to delete all the profiles I have made that I have long forgotten but now have to sort through every time I turn on.  It tells me to go to the website and there is no profiles category in the accounts page. This isn't user friendly.  I end up scrolling through menus and shows it recommends based on some random guess about me.  (A bad guess at that.)  This app is one craptacular mess.

title: Not happy!!!
review: I was in the middle of a movie, got up to use the restroom and when I came back the movie was “currently unavailable” and wouldn’t let me watch it anymore. I have had several problems with it not letting me watch a movie and it telling me to choose a different movie because there was some error. I’ll turn my phone off and come back and the movie will have restarted from the beginning which also happens when I try to go back 10 seconds. Um excuse me I wanted to rewatch that last 10 seconds, I did not want to watch the whole movie from the beginning again! Honestly I am really not happy with this streaming service at all and do not recommend it.

title: Not visually impaired friendly
review: It doesn’t have audio description for people like myself who is visually impaired and totally blind and VoiceOver doesn’t read summary or it wouldn’t on the beach or legs or my options it would be nice if you guys could add in voiceover completely on the app and it would be nice if you guys could add in audio description that way we can see and enjoy like everybody else this app that would make a world of difference for people like myself who are visually impaired

title: Worst app ever!!
review: This is literally the worst app I’ve ever used! Every single time I try and watch a sho, I have an issue. Either I get an error that pops up telling me to restart my phone and/or, if it actually does decide to play, it almost never starts where I left off, it starts from the beginning and I have to spend more time finding wherever I left off. It’s so frustrating. I wish I could just open the app, tap on my show, press play and have it play....And play where I left off.. You know, like how it should be for a subscription that you overpay for every month 😡!! Probably going to cancel after I’m finished with the show that I’m watching, not worth the money and hassle.

title: Good program but adds.
review: This app to me is good enough to edge out Netflix, but they kill you with adds. You either have to pay 13 dollars a month for no adds or you can pay 7 dollars a month and get flooded with adds. For example I like watching survivor, which are all 40-50 minutes and the reunion episodes which are like 1 and a half hours. They will have 4 or 5 minute and a half adds for the regular one and 15 for the reunions. It wouldn’t be so bad if they didnt play the same 2 adds every time -_-

title: Blocked app access on iPhone
review: When opening the app it says access is blocked and provides a link for more information. The link takes me to the general help site not a specific page regarding my issue. Additionally the blocked access message tells me to log in from my home network while one of my home devices is on/ connected. I have done all of that and still the app won’t open on my phone. What’s worse is there is zero information on the supposed HELP/SUPPORT page regarding this. In other words...there is NO additional information only what shows on screen in the app and when doing what it suggests does not work there is no where to get it resolved.

title: A year later
review: While the reliability has gotten better I still do not like the overall look and usability. It’s still a pain looking for shows. Lineup needs to go away. The full screen images are not necessary, I’d rather have thumbnails as the default. They need to have a skip intro option. And please let the genres be editable, I don’t want suggestions or kids shows or true crime, home and cooking etc. make my experience better by letting me remove that stuff. If it wasn’t for my wife I wouldn’t be a customer. Thankfully I have the old version / classic version on my iPad and I will never update it. It really is better than what you have now. How about making it an option.

title: Doesn't work anymore
review: The app worked fine on my iPad a few weeks ago, but now, it won't even go to the login screen. It shows the loading animation then says "Something Is Wrong" with the only option to "Try Again". I have rebooted my iPad, reinstalled, checked for app updates, etc. Nothing has worked. I'm running an older version because my iPad is iOS 9 (because that's the last system my iPad supports. Please fix.

title: Please stop logging me out
review:
I keep getting logged out of my account. I’ll have watched something and then leave, come back after only a couple hours and I’ll be logged out! Why? It’s getting more persistent and it’s annoying. What if I stop remembering my password? What’s the point of logging me out? I watch something almost every day and it almost always logs me out.

Also, after I’m done watching an episode and I try to click the arrow to leave, nothing happens. I have to play the next episode in order for me to exit out. I have a brand new phone so nothing’s wrong with the screen. My free trial is coming to an end, maybe that’s why, but all this is making me not want to subscribe.

title: Auto-Play
review: Instead of auto playing content that I have saved in ‘My stuff’ then app always tries to play bunheads. I just want to be able to watch the all the episodes that came out the day before seamlessly w having to go back and forth. If there was a way to queue up content before or remove shows from the auto play list I would definitely rate the add better. If there was a way to thumbs down content I don’t like so that I never have to see it on my played list or have the next episode be in the auto play options that’d be amazing.

title: I'd give it five stars if it wasn't for one feature
review: The scrolling is absolutely horrendous in this app. There's nothing worse than trying to see how much longer I have in my episode and end up starting the entire episode over because the scrolling isn't limited to a single section of the screen. Why isn't there a scroll bar?! The entirety of my screen shouldn't have the ability to scroll through the show, there should be a single section (like literally everything else) so I don't have to spend the next five minutes searching for my spot, it's infuriating. Nothing ruins a good episode quite like it.

title: Buffer,buffer,buffer,
review:
Please go back to older version, it worked awesome, this new fancy one is not good.  Shows buffer constantly even when set on the lowest download amount. Ever heard of the expression "if it's not broke don't fix it"?
Update... still horrible.  Works okay on Roku but on the iPad it takes forever to load a show and sometimes just stops and buffers and buffers and buffers.  I resubscribed to Netflix so I can watch stuff on my iPad and phone.
Update, now when I try to watch a show on my iPhone or iPad, it buffers for 5-10 minutes before the show plays.  Then the show will run for 2 minutes and buffer again for 5 minutes.  It takes over 2 hours to watch a 42 minute episode.

title: Sound but no picture
review: Terrible. Never loads properly always buffering and when I connect my iPhone to my tv to watch on bigger screen it never shows up on my tv the volume plays from the television set but the picture does not it only plays on my cell phone. Please fix. I would love to be able to watch my shows from my phone on my tv but there’s always an issue. Quite discouraging. Netflix never has that issue.

title: They fixed it!
review: “Super annoying rewind and forward controls. I got restarted 5 times on the same episode and each restart( when I was just trying to get back to where I left off) I had to watch another 30 seconds of the SAME DANG charmin commercial. The “this program doesn’t support forward or rewind” crap needs to stop. How hard is it to get YouTube’s functionality?” - My review before, but now they’ve fixed the issue 👍🏻

title: ads
review: I love everything about this just 2 things the first one is that not every show is on here which is not a big problem but there was this one show that I was so excited to watch and then I find out it’s not on there and the second thing was the ads this is my only real problem I feel like there’s an ad every 5 minutes and then it comes on and it’s like 3 minutes long with 5 ads but I guess that just really bothers me anyways everything is else is great

title: Worse since the update
review: Ever since the recent update I’ve run into numerous problems. Shows won’t play, giving me an error saying it isn’t in the proper format moments after I was just watching them. The browse function isn’t working at all for shows, movies or networks. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling but to no avail. Very disappointing as this is one of my favorite apps for entertainment. I might have to cancel my subscription soon.

title: Episodes Pausing
review: I love this app! I binge watch SOOOO many shows. But lately—the past few days—the app refusing to play anything on my phone for more than a few seconds. I’ll have good signal, or my data will be on, and it just will not work. On my PlayStation it’s fine but I have no idea what’s going on with my phone. I’m going to update the phone and cut it off and on—though I doubt it’s a problem with my ACTUAL phone but I’ll give it the benefit of the doubt. Please get this fixed. I’ll fix the star rating if it is!

title: Wow!
review: This is a great app, I love almost all of the shows and I am very happy about the recent addition of Full House 🏡 the original, better than Fuller House. I love this app and the reason why I didn’t give 5 stars is for the reason that it doesn’t seem to have an offline mode for iPad or a way to download movies and tv show episodes. Like on my iPad I would appreciate it if I could watch shark while in the car... Yes I said Shrek 😂. Thanks to the developers for making a good app! Please consider the offline mode if you devs are reading this.

title: Review and Question
review: The app is great , I’d refer it 9/10 to any of my friends , but I just wanted to ask since I’m kinda into anime, but there are some shows ( stack on titan, Naruto shippuden, etc) I like watching the shows and all , but in naruto shippuden, season 3 is where the dubs end , I just wanted to know if y’all were going to update it to where I might be able to hear the dubbed version, cause it’s kinda hard to read the words , and then 5 seconds later a fight begins , so I just want to know if y’all are gonna put more dubs in there

title: Updated shows
review:
Am I the only one having an issue with new episodes not updating in “My stuff”? I have to go into the show, go into episodes, and then scroll down to to watch the latest episode Before the update that wasn’t happening, it would automatically be in the My Stuff section. Please fix. I PAY WAAAAAAY TO MUCH MONEY FOR SOMETHING TO NOT WORK PROPERLY.

Update: So new Thanksgiving update has still not fixed previous issues. What’s worse is that if I close the app midway through a show (by accident) the show starts from the beginning. I think you should just leave well enough alone and go back to your original UI and software. Things were so much better back when...

The new update has made it basically unusable. Logged out constantly, shows never load, click on them and nothing happens, shows quit playing, constant buffering... I could go on and on but I’ve wasted enough time waiting an hour and a half for one 30 min episode of bob’s burgers. Tried multiple networks so that’s not the issue. Maybe I’ll finish this episode by next year but I’m not getting my hopes up.

title: Overall good
review:
Please stop changing the app format. It is irritating having to figure out where you’ve moved things and having to rewire the reflex associated with where to tap and for what. It’s not enhancing user experience just because you want a fresh new look.

Keep doing what you’re doing quality and content wise. There’s an excellent assortment of shows and movies, that have kept me basically nonstop entertained since subscribing. Aside from occasional glitches, the video quality is also great.

title: Can’t play in the background
review:
I gave this 2 stars because it’s very annoying for me to not be able to play the app in the background and just listen to shows while I walk, or text. It ends up draining my battery even fast when I constantly have it open... I got the subscription so I can watch South Park and other shows I’ve seen, not to be glued to my phones screen all the time. 

Please fix this... I don’t know it matters to the developers how their customers watch to the shows... all you should care about is we have a subscription and are using your app. I mean... Netflix gets it! (Just saying...)

title: Predatory Ad Policy
review:
It didn’t used to be this way, but now every time I decide to rewind back before a commercial break, the app will play the commercials again. There’s no way to skip them. It’s ridiculous to force users to watch ads that long and then punish paying customers to watch them over. It’s predatory.
The rewind and fast forward functions within the app can be done accidentally with too much ease, so if you fast forward when you don’t intend to, you are forced to watch ads before you can even skip back to the spot you are at. And then guess what? You have to watch the same ads later. 

There should be a per episode quota that’s never exceeded.

title: Start up
review: For some reason, recently I’ve been having to deal with a lot of playback issues. I’m not able to watch really anything and it’s constantly just on a loading screen after I select anything. Sometimes I get the pop up that just has me exit and try again, sometimes it offers to retry but that never works. Even closing the app and opening it up doesn’t help. Consequently, I’ve had to delete the app and re-download it, sign back in and then that works, for the first I’ve signed in. Then it doesn’t work once I leave the app. It’s really inconvenient and i would hope that it’s not something to do with my WiFi connection and my phone

title: Stop changing the format!
review: Stop  making changes to something that was working fine! For us users that are not using the live tv it is rather inconvenient and unnecessary! I hate that when I click on the episode I want I get a list of what to watch next! I do not need nor want you to give me a list of what to watch! It is completely unnecessary and should definitely go back to the way it was! If you are going to give options of rewind and fast forward then the users should be able to choose the time, also it would be nice to have an option to make an episode as watched instead of having to fast forward through an entire episode.

title: Exiting a video
review:
You can’t. The exit arrow doesn’t react. Or you end up clicking the WATCH NEXT video be it’s a millimeter away for the exit arrow. Then some random show ends up in my lineup the rest of my life. Come on guys. The arrow was fine before. You’re changing all the wrong things. Listen to your reviews. I pay$144 a year to you guys. I shouldn’t have to close the app and reopen it just to get to choose what I want to watch. Also, the app logs out of my account nearly every day, why? What is the point? And I agree with the reviews on the hypersensitivity of the fastforward rewind activity. It’s annoying. 
I’m not mad, guys. I’m just disappointed.

title: It barely even works
review:
The app just doesn’t do what it’s supposed to do. It loses place in shows and movies. Audio from ads plays over the shows. Video will sometimes disappear after commercial breaks. Subtitles turn on and off randomly, regardless of settings. Picture-in-picture mode doesn’t work on iPad. 

The one thing it’s supposed to do is play video, and I have yet to get through a single episode of Sunny without having to quit the app and restart playback because the screen went blank, ad audio is playing, and the subtitles to the show I’m supposed to be watching have turned themselves on somehow.

It’s just not good. Doesn’t perform its most basic function.

title: Soooooooo slooooooow!
review:
When I am trying to open anything, the same message pops up saying my WiFi is too slow.  Interesting part is that all other apps load and run without me getting this message.  I have also shut down all apps running in the background.  Ugh!!!!!!!

I also would like to see a better and more accurate search function and suggested choices not made by my gender.  No other choice is given when you sign other than select "male" or "female", and you must pick.  I don't want a bunch of chick flic suggestions.  I pick movies based upon my interest and not my gender.  Ugh!!!! Again!!!!!!

title: Bluetooth audio volume is too low on iPhone X
review: I would rate higher, but I drive a diesel and the audio level is hard to hear, even with the volume turned all the way up. This is the only app on my phone that is this way. I have looked for a fix or something to change in the settings, but I am unable to find anything on my iPhone X. I have the most current ios. If you could fix this issue then my rating would go to 5 stars. I even tried contacting customer support, but then they told me to restart my phone and let them know after I did, and then the chat was closed.

title: Advertisements
review: What on Earth are these ad placements. There can be an advertisement at the end of the show that will be 90 seconds long. Start the next episode and immediately you’re met with 30 seconds of advertisements. Can it not be changed to every 20 minutes of show time you are hit with 2 minutes of ads or something. Worst of all, the keep watching feature is awful. Did you just happen to exit your show after finishing ads? Guess what! You will be set back 5-10 minutes from your previous spot and be forced to watch those same advertisements AGAIN!!

title: Live TV has more trouble than it’s worth
review:
July, 2018. App seems worse not better. It seems to get an error playing video exit message every time I use it. I have even run it without any other apps and after reboot. Live tv is not worth the cost. 

I’ve been a customer for years. I’m supposed to have no commercials except of course there are a few exceptions. Most of my recorded content has commercials. I thought it was just CBS which is ok, but now it’s even the stupid stuff on HGTV or food network too. I’m not sure what I’m paying for these days. 

I have a great signal in the house yet when playing live tv it buffers, gets audio over audio, does not go back to place if you get out of show, crashes consistently, and even doesn’t know I’m signed in until I close app and try again. It’s gotten too frustrating now that I’m checking out some of the other services.   It is better on a computer but the whole idea was to watch tv on iPads. 

I hope this turns around as every update seems worse not better.

title: Worst user experience on earth
review: Whoever designed the UI layout for this app needs to be fired. It takes too many clicks to get to a shows page and watch the episode that I want. When watching a show after it’s over the next episode doesn’t play an episode for an entirely different show that I don’t even want to watch starts playing and then there is no way to Click the back button to get back to the shows episodes. The interface for this app is just so horrible I cannot see myself paying for a subscription I’ll just wait for somebody else to Upload episodes of the handmaids tale online. That’s really the only good show you guys have anyways.

title: Broken seeking and ads makes it nigh unusable.
review:
Often you'll be watching a show and tap the screen trying to pause it.  Inexplicably, the app will send you to a different point in the show, earlier or later than where you were.

The gesture that causes this is hard to replicate, making it difficult to return to where you were.  Worst of all, even if you manage to return immediately to where you were, all of the ads you'd already seen play again.  No mercy: did you just finish the 90 seconds of ads to return to the show, and accidentally swipe to earlier in the show?  Hope you enjoy watching those 90 seconds of ads again.

title: Horrible update
review: I am really getting sick of being in the middle of watching a show, pausing it and then it rewinding or fast forward to random points in episode just from touching the screen. This has happened with almost every single episode I have watched since the update and it is extremely frustrating having to fast forward or rewind. Another thing that is missing is the little preview box that shows what scene you are fast forwarding to. Now that's gone so it takes forever randomly moving through show until you get lucky enough to find your place. Please update and fix this. It's making it watching any show extremely tedious.

title: I don’t understand the motives behind this app?
review: why wouldn’t you guys sync the profiles between the web browser and the app? like I can’t even find what episode I was on on the app because they’re totally separate. it’s not user friendly at all. and that’s if I can even find my show because apparently I have to save it twice, on my computer AND on my phone?? why would you force the user to do that? it doesn’t make any sense???

title: Chromecast Functions “Spotty” at best.
review:
I’ve been trying to watch 1 episode and I’ve had an incredibly difficult and frustrating time playing it, reconnecting, getting error codes and finally during an ad break, having to fast forward through ads I already watched because the episode would start over. 
I can’t switch apps because it’ll disconnect. I can’t let me phone go into standby mode because it’ll disconnect. It’s a poor attempt at using a robust system (Chromecast) to watch entertainment. 
I don’t have these issues with various other entertainment apps (or, at least, not to the extent of this) so I am not sure what gives. 

Hope this helps.

title: So much potential but so disappointing
review:
This app is missing the most simple things that are so disappointing especially for the price: 

1. Live stream tv hangs, jumps around and just simply fails, all while phone sitting untouched on table. 
2. App often hangs on streaming causing me to shut it and reopen to make it play. 
3. Why on earth can I not view live tv on portrait without the list of stations showing? I can’t tell you how easy it is to carefully move my *mobile device* and still inadvertently change the channel. Very annoying. 
4. Why can’t I have a locked screen and continue to listen? I would like to carry my *mobile device* while using my subscription but for reasons outlined above often get frustrated and give up. 

Note that I am playing on solid WiFi network so no excuses there. 

This seems so simple to address. I hope to see some positive changes very soon.

title: I can’t open it!
review:
I can no longer open the app! It simply crashes and kicks me out. All of my devices are doing that and it’s really frustrating because I’m not paying you guys a monthly subscription so that your app doesn’t even work! I want this fixed!!
I keep reading all of these terrible reviews, but I haven’t had a problem like the ones I’ve read from other people. And then today, the app won’t even open. I just want the app to work like it should, just like every month you take a payment from me for the subscription, I would like for the app to work properly too. I would greatly appreciate you looking into this ASAP!!! Like today!

title: Has some flaws
review: I love this app but it definitely has some flaws all week I can watch maybe one or two episodes of a show and then a error message will pop up where I have to complete exit out the app and try again and sometimes that still doesn’t allow me to continue. Today was the worse tho it stopped working on me about 5 hrs ago and I still can’t continue the episode I left off so I’m not sure when it’s going to be back up and running

title: UPDATE FAIL
review:
UPDATE FAIL!

Latest update makes it so NO episodes you watch are actually marked as watched. For me this is a HUGE problem. Especially because it erases the bar that shows how far you were in. Making it pretty hard to know if you’ve watched a show or not.

I will be cancelling if this isn’t fixed. ALSO they need a button you can click to say if you’ve already watched previous episodes. For example; I watched SNL (Saturday night live) and when I first signed up I started in the middle of last season. Now that I’m caught up it still tells me I’m behind like 17 episodes which I’m not. It’s really annoying for someone like me who enjoys organization.

title: Frequent errors
review: The app is easy to use and even has live TV. It keeps shows and movies on a lot longer than Netflix but I keep getting frequent errors that force me to exit the app and restart it. My original review was 1/5 stars because it got to the point where the videos wouldn’t even start loading, but that was solved my restarting my phone. My review isn’t any lower than 4/5 stars since the frequent errors are more of an inconvenience. It stills needs to be fixed though

title: It’s a really good app but there are a few issues
review: You should stop making so many of the shows live TV access only some of those shows that say live TV only aren’t even on the air anymore for example speed racer the next generation is a show that ended a very long time ago I doubt they’re showing it on live TV anywhere also a lot of shows I used to watch at one time weren’t live tv only ex Lucifer I used to watch this all the time and now I cant anymore as a loyal customer I would like to see this fixed as soon as possible

title: Why pay if we get so many commercials
review: So I’ve been using this for about a year and a half and it’s great because it’s plenty of shows and movies but the only thing l hate is all the commercials like we already pay for the app it’s not like this is a free app . l had to watch a 3 part movie that had 8 commercials in each and every one it’s very annoying sometimes l just cut I‎t off mid way through but still it’s a good app because we get definitely more shows that actually play on tv

title: All it does is say “an error occurred.  Try later.”
review: That’s all this app will do on my iPad Pro.  Tried all recommended fixes.  Delete app.  Restart iPad.  Change password.  RE download app.  Nothing worked.  Plus, I called support, waited forever, only to have them say “this is a known bug.  Engineering is working on it.  Call back this afternoon.”  5 days later, no fix.  This app truly deserves 0 stars, or negative stars since it takes so much time to do nothing.

title: Ok
review: Not the worst app out there (that award goes to Tumblr). Generally it works fine, and the new update looks nice, but my major problem with it is the rewinding/fast forwarding thing. It’s way to easy to skip forward or rewind (that is to say, I keep accidentally touching the screen and causing it to fast forward or rewind, and then having no idea where I left off). This is incredibly annoying, and I often am forced to watch through the commercials again in order to get back to the spot I was at in the show/movie before I accidentally fast forwarded or rewound.

title: Amazing stuff!!
review: In my personal opinion, way better than Netflix. The selection is wider, it’s much easier to access the shows that you’ve saved to your list, even the sound quality is better. Additionally, Netflix has started putting ads onto their service. Lastly, Hulu’s anime selection is insane! From the stuff everyone has heard of, like Naruto and Dragonball, to some more underground works: Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure, Samurai Champloo, Inuyasha, Noragami etc.

title: Video watching screen
review: I cannot tell you how many times I have been watching a tv show and I accidentally switch to the episode next and I’m completely lost and it gives away giant spoilers, this has happened an excessive amount of times and recently it randomly took me to the final episode and killed the series. Please change the way it looks. No flip tray or fancy words or actions like flip tray and the video skimming action (that’s a whole other terror) just stick to the basics to try to be so fancy

title: Your app is trash scumbags!!
review: If only there was a way to rate this piece of crap 0 stars I would gladly rate this load of garbage a big 0! 3 ads at once everytime and I still have to pay for it? What a load of bull crap, especially 45$ to watch everything?! Yeah no, you are legit greedy rotten pricks. If anyone should be paying anything more than a penny, 0 ads should be included. It’s messed up how corrupted you people are. If anyone’s interested in this app and you see my review I hoped this helped. Highly highly HIGHLY don’t recommend this app to anyone, huge rip off and worst experience of a app. Go with a better app like Netflix or any other ad free app that only has one plan.

title: Casting issue
review:
Haven’t seen this issue anywhere else, but here goes:
While chromecasting from my iPhone, the phone appears to be running the show separately, on itself, delayed. So I’m hearing the sound of the phone playing, delayed by minutes, at the same time as my tv is playing it, and no amount of volume switching and restarting will fix it. It began doing this, occasionally six months ago or so, but resolved itself for no clear reason. Tried deleting and reloading the app when it started happening again but it didn’t help. 
Can’t continue like this. I’ll just quit if it keeps up.

title: Having problems with subtitles/caption
review: I love this app. But for the last two days I haven’t been able to watch my show because the subtitle button doesn’t work. I’ve tried deleting the app and downloading it again. It worked yesterday but today it’s not. It’s frustrating not been able to watch my show. I’m a bit disappointed. If I’m unable to watch it then I’ll have to cancel my subscription. 😕

title: Wanting to watch a show only for a message to appear saying error try again later
review: I try to watch a show that I like and it works fine for a while but every so often it will completely stop working and not only the show I’m watching everything I try to watch a video and a message pops up saying that there is an error and to try again later or watch something else it is very annoying and I hope there is a fix to this because I have already refreshed and uninstalled and installed the app again and there is no change hopefully they’ll fix it.

title: Constant Issues
review: I have this app on my smart phone and my smart tv. I’m having issues right now with my phone. When I try to play an episode, it won’t. I hit the play button and it acts like its trying to play and then it stops and the play button pops up again. Over and over and over again. I can’t watch it at all right now. I have issues with the app on my TV too. Half of the time I get an error message and then I have to back all the way out and open it again. NetFlix doesn’t have any of these issues. Do better, please. I’m not paying for something I can’t use half of the time.

title: The worst
review:
I’ve been trying to watch the same episode for the past few days. Yes. It takes that king to get through a 30 minute episode. I get through maybe 2 mins then I get a “connection error” and have to restart. Then when I did get reconnected I have to watch a commercial then the episode starts from the beginning. It never picks up where I left off even though it tells me to “resume episode”. So annoying. I never have issues with Netflix.
Update: app still doesn’t work after the update. It constantly tells me I have a connection error then restarts the episode. It’s an endless loop! I’m basically paying to just watch commercials.

title: Fast forward and rewind are horrible
review: Fast forward and rewind features are probably the worst I’ve ever experienced and they haven’t been fixed the entire time I’ve used this app. What makes this worse is if you either rewind 10 seconds to catch something you missed or your finger slides and suddenly you’re taken all the way back to a commercial break and have to watch the whole thing over again. Let me be clear, at no point have I EVER wanted to rewind back to a commercial (their presence isn’t exactly endearing the app to me either but that’s another issue). I honestly can’t wait to find my next show on Netflix so I don’t have to deal with this anymore.

title: Just one problem I have!
review: So I adore this app I love it and I will continue using it but my only problem is that I can’t set a profile password cause I have people just logging into my profile and watch stuff that I have on my list or change my name for no reason so I’d really like a response if you’re going to add a password for a profile in the settings or if not do you guys mind telling me why? Thank you love the app though!!.

title: The new version
review: I hate the new version u can’t fast forward through commercials. There there it’s still an inconvenience that the commercials are there even if I have to fast forward so y can’t I? When I rewind if I get back to a commercial I can’t fast forward back to where I was n I should be able to I’ve already watched the commercial. The app should realize that I have seen the commercial and have rewinds in order for me to pass it when I have gone back too far. If you touch anywhere on the screen the show goes to that point when you should only be able to move it using the scroll bar and the buttons. It’s too sensitive. I hate it!

title: Beyond frustrating
review:
First off, the rewind feature is awful. Please go back to a bar at the bottom like everyone else! I accidentally skip/rewind all the time and have to watch multiple commercials to get back to where I was.

My main issue with this app though is the fact that it won't play on my tv with my Apple HDMI adapter. It plays like it should for a few seconds, then the screen goes black. The sound and captions still work, and the network logo is still at the bottom. All of my other streaming apps work fine. 

There are so many other minor issues with this app, but if you could just fix these two, I could deal with the rest.

title: Put Picture in Picture BACK!😡😡😡😡
review:
It's bad enough that when you did have it on Picture in Picture did NOT automatically start playing the next episode of your show like Netflix does VERY successfully. But now you took it away entirely WITHOUT warning?! I would never have updated the app if I had known. Unless you want all of your iOS customers to cancel their subscription I humbly suggest you both put it back immediately AND make it work correctly when watching shows that have episodes. 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡
September 9, 2017 update fixes.... the font! How about fixing that lack of Picture in Picture we've already been complaining about?!?!?!

title: Nice service - Horrible App!!!
review: I have used the app for more than a year on my iOS devices.    TV app on my a Roku based TV works without any problems.      Enter this app.     Constantly have issues.    While watching livetv you try to switch to a different channel and it pauses.  You hit play and it plays the original channel.    Over and over.     Only way to fix it is to completely close the app and relaunch it.    Then 10-15 minutes later it’s back to not working.     Beautiful.   All of your updates continually make this worse and worse to use.    At this point it’s barely functional.

title: Great Except One Problem
review: The app is really pretty and easy to navigate. I love how many shows are here that aren’t on Netflix. The only issue I’ve noticed is that I’m having problems syncing(?) my account between my phone and TV. If I watch a handful of episodes on my phone then switch to my TV, it’s like I never watched those few episodes. It gets pretty annoying especially if I start to binge watch something.

title: I’M SICK OF IT
review:
It is the third time y’all have let just anyone change my password. They don’t even need my email address or anything and y’all won’t let me reset it. Every time I call customer support I’m just told I can get a refund. It is exhausting to try and guess my new password every time just anyone wants to change it.

And can we fix the whole problem if I scroll back on accident I have to watch a whole new 90 second add. If I miss what they are saying and rewind a little too far back, guess what, ANOTHER 90 SECOND ADD.  I know I’m not paying for premium or anything but I’m still a paying customer.

title: This App has so many bugs they need to hire a exterminator!
review: I wish I was able to use this application on my large 12.9 iPad. But to be honest I can’t even sign in it states continuously regardless of uninstall,reinstall, restore to iPad, setup as new. That there is no server available. All I want to do is watch my favorite shows on the go and use this platform to do it. To be brutally honest I’ve been going to the Netflix app instead. Please fix this app.

title: Where's the value?
review:
I was reluctant to pay a monthly fee for content that was available over the air and online for free, but I understood the convenience of mobile access was worth something.  However, once I found out that there were ads (lots of them) I was completely perplexed.  $7.99 / month to have free content delivered to my iPhone and iPad and I still have to watch ads???

Update:  It's nearly impossible to seek and find the point you left off since seeking past the point of an ad throws the app into an irrecoverable tailspin.  No only are the ads ridiculous for paid content, but they also constantly crash the app.  What a piece of junk.

title: Fix 5.23.1 update
review:
Ever since last update you can’t pick just a single season of any show to watch. Whatever season you pick it’s gonna show you all the seasons and available episodes without any order. 

Next issue is on going for a long time 
Live tv and recorded shows are hard to watch. Even with high speed WiFi it seams sound loads faster than picture so at one point you are getting multiple and distorted sounds which follows with fast forward of the show to catch up with sound which results in skipping about 2 minutes of the show each time it happens.

title: Sooooooo frustrating!
review: It just shuts down completely while watching a show. That is, if I can even get a show to play in the first place. It loads and loads and loads and loads and then times out. Then tells you to close out and restart so I go through it all over again. And this happens 5 or 6 times before I can get a show to play. Then when you watch an episode and wait for the next one to start it just shuts down and makes you go through the whole process again. It’s the worst system I’ve ever used. If any other app had the same tv show selection to pick from I would be done with this stupid app in a heartbeat.

title: Just doesn’t play at all anymore.
review:
Doesn’t matter what show I choose; doesn’t matter if it’s on phone or iPad; doesn’t matter what quality setting it’s on; doesn’t matter if it’s on cell or WiFi service— the video just sits to the loading symbol. Forever. Until my phone goes to sleep. 
This time, out of sheer stubbornness I tried to wait it out. 40 minutes and the video never loaded. This has been for over a month. 
I tried to go to my account online and place my account on hold as a result. If you hit “Hold Your Subscription”— what a surprise, the screen goes blank and then takes you back to your account. You can’t even do that.

title: Good, but could be a lot better for live tv
review: This app works well and I don’t have too many issues with it. But, it still has a ways to go to be user friendly for watching live tv. Please add a favorite channels list to the live TV guide that users can customize with only the channels they want to see in the live TV guide. This would greatly improve the channel searching on the current live TV guide. Currently you need to scroll line by line down to the channel you’d like and they are in alphabetical order making certain channels a chore to get to.

title: Ads
review: I’m wasting my money to watch more ads than the show itself. At least Netflix can d something right and that’s make people happy even if they don’t AS good of shows. I hate seeing 90 second ads when all I’ve seen is 3 minutes of my show. Not just that, the ads are boring and don’t target the audience on what each individual would prefer like every other streaming service. And this isn’t a ad complaint but the movies on here are quiet trash. You’re better off with any other streaming service to get actual movies worth seeing from young o old audiences. Be ready for Disney’s new stream service, your money is better there than here.

title: Not very good.
review: If you accidentally touch the screen, it may fast forward or back a lot and you have to rewatch more ads for no reason. It wouldn’t be that hard to introduce a slider to fast forward like nearly every similar app. Sure it would be more similar to Netflix, but that wouldn’t at all be a bad thing. Also, there shouldn’t be this many ads if you’re paying as much as the normal rate costs. There isn’t an easy way to browse much of the content. I don’t know if there’s just not a lot on the app or if they don’t show you most of the things, either way it could be fixed.

title: This app has so many issues
review:
This app is actual trash. Constantly saying there’s a problem with the net work or saying my account doesn’t have access(even though I do and just watched the show). Every time I click show details the app says “unnamed server error” so I can’t even pick which episode to watch. It crashes all the time. You all need to step your game it. I’d delete the app and keep it that way if Netflix had the show you all did. Take notes from them, their app is flawless.

I would also like to know which editor picked this so I never download another one the “editors choice” apps again. That editor doesn’t know what he’s talking about

title: Error message
review: Every few minutes while watching, I’ll receive an error message that says it cannot find title or something along those lines. At first I thought maybe it was a connectivity issue, but I always have strong signal strength so that can’t be it. I have even tried restarting the app, making sure it’s the most recent version, deleting and redownloading, everything I can think of, and it still happens. I’m so fed up. I’m about to just say forget it and cancel my service and go back to only Netflix, at least the don’t drop in the middle of a show every 5 minutes.

title: Glitches, needs some work!
review:
So far I am loving it!! But there are some glitches that keep happening when I try to watch some of my shows. First: I loose sound. The video keeps playing but there’s no sound. I can’t here what anyone is saying!! It’s extremely frustrating!! 
Second: the video freezes but the sound track keeps going. I have to pause the show and walk away and hope that when I come back to it it will play like it’s supposed to. Again very frustrating, annoying, and inconvenient. Please fix ASAP!!!

title: iPhone X
review:
Hi, it would be extremely nice if you add iPhone X screen compatibility, it would be so nice to watch content without wasting screen real estate, is like watching in an iPhone 6,7 or 8.
Hardly use the app on my phone anymore because of that, coming from an iPhone 7+ seems like a downgrade on your app.

Edit:Thanks for the update, the content looks great using the full iPhone X screen.
No problem with the new* user interface, just a little bit of use to get accustomed to it.

Second Edit: You just botched this app with todays update. Now there is a black line under the content, meaning content is cropped up and down.
Heads and feet are cut. 
Please, all that new player thing wasn't necessary.
I don't know who was asking for this features, that make the app a downgrade again. From 4 stars to 1.

Third edit: Problem fixed, thanks.

title: Please Fix
review: The user interface concerning the fast-forward and rewinding is extremely flawed. A stray touch shouldn't change the time elapsed in the video. Stop trying to be unnecessarily innovative and stick to what works. Also, there are some serious glitches in my app. The screen will pause as the audio continues to play or the audio will be played at normal speed while the visual is shown at high speed. I've deleted and re-downloaded, rebooted my phone, and paired down on quality and features such as subtitles. Doubt that this complaint will make any difference, but I thought that at least it should be brought to your attention.

title: Can’t play😩
review: App is great and was working fine up until this morning. I was watching a series last night and went to bed. Opened app this morning started browsing, everything seemed fine. About 15 mins ago i tried watching again and now I can’t play anything & am getting error messages. I’ve tried all basic troubleshooting to no avail. Maybe it was the recent update :/ please fix

title: Live tv...
userName: how to train your dragon all
review: I LOVE this app it’s good to watch movies and stuff but when it comes to live tv so I can watch a specific show I need to get live tv. I looked at it and saw that it was going to be almost 60 dollars a month. That is completely unreasonable and to me overly expensive, and now I can’t watch the show I really want to watch. For now I will have to wait for it to come on Disney+. And also the fact that you also have to pay for it to not have adds! And if you don’t it’s I think 100 seconds! That is absolutely insane!!  That’s all I Have to say, but other than that the app is great to watch.

title: 1 month
review: You have exactly 30 days to fix the issues I’ve been experiencing for the last 18 months or I’m canceling my subscription. If you have already watched an episode an go to rewatch it, it skips to the last 5 minutes. So you have to rewind it as if it were a vhs tape. The commercials are now in random spots of the show. Sometimes right in the middle of lines. And most of the ads don’t even work. They just play half of the add and then it jumps back into the show often having skipped a minute or two. I’m sure you clients would like to know they are paying full price for add slots and your company is only running half the ad. 😂👃$

title: Glitches
review: Im a little disappointed honestly i love this app but a little while ago i went to watch my favorite anime my hero academia and i went to use the English version but it was only in Japanese  then i went on my friends account and her was all wonky and i have picture proof. Once again I honestly love this app i just want to know whats going on like is it because to many people are on at once and like to many downloads of this app or are there just bugs in the system?

title: Love the app, except..
review: This app is convenient and great like any other streaming app. My biggest problem with the app is when I get notifications for new episodes of “my shows” AFTER I’ve watched the newest one. I want to know that morning that it’s uploaded, or if I’ve already watched it then I don’t need the notification. Maybe that’s a personalization feature to look into instead of mass push notifications, but it’s frustrating getting a “new episode is available” notification when it’s no longer helpful.

title: Picture freezes and audio keeps playing
review: I used to not have any problems with the app. Now, more and more, the audio keeps playing but the picture freezes. At first I’d just rewind 10 seconds and it would get back on track. But today I’ve had to do it 4 times in a row then exit the episode to get it back on track, only for it to freeze again moments later. If it’s an internet speed issue, I’d rather have to wait for it to buffer rather than listening to a scene without seeing a matching picture.

title: Unable to play video check internet connection
review:
Leaving a review for this app because it is just terrible. Only for iOS though. Works great on my Xbox but this app is trash. 

I have full bars/service and still always encounter an error which makes the video I’m watching close out. Can’t you just keep buffering like Netflix does instead of the stupid prompt that closes the video out? 

Got to the point where I was just going to cancel my service but they gave me a free month. Hope in this free month you guys fix this app because if not I most definitely will cancel my subscription.

title: What happened to this app?!? ZERO ⭐️s!!
review: I used to love this app! I would watch all my shows on here because I only have this and netflix. I deleted this app from my phone for maybe about 2 months (a little while back) due to my shows being on a break; and now it won't even start playing a show! I just keep watching the dial spin in circles..... 😡😡😡 it's really annoying! It blames my internet connection, but yet I have full WiFi bars and connected just fine. What is wrong with this app now?! FIX THIS APP PLEASE?! Otherwise I guess I will have to find a new app to watch my shows after they air on tv... VERY DISAPPOINTED!! I would have given it ZERO STARS if they would let me!

title: Where are the subtitles?!
review: I finally got used to the updated format. I don’t like it, but I’m used to it. And now I have no subtitles?!?! When I look at the setting for subtitles, all options are greyed out and cannot be selected. The only thing I can do is tap accessibility settings, which puts me over to my iPad settings. I found the subtitle thingy there, turned everything in, still nothing. So I turned my iPad off and on, thinking maybe it’s one of those settings that doesn’t come into effect until the device is reset. Nope! Still no subtitles. Not cool.

title: New interface is ridiculous
review: Why mess up a perfectly good thing? Since the app redesign, you have to go through several steps to get to what you're looking for. Instead of having everything at a glance on a home page, the full screen is taken up by featured content, and you might as well give up trying to navigate to your favorite shows - better luck searching because everything is buried several layers deep. I have yet to successfully pick up watching a show where I left off. It's like they took the worst, most frustrating website you've ever visited, and turned it into an app. Useless and completely counter-intuitive.

title: Overall Ok but still having error message
review: The app works, sound & closed captioning are fine. I been having a issue every time I finish a show, I select another to watch, it keeps saying there is an error. I have deleted the app and downloaded again, still doing it. The only fix is to shut down my iPad and then reboot, but then I am back to only being able to watch one show and then the error is back. This just started a few weeks back. Please fix, if there is an update let me know.

title: Can’t watch on my laptop or phone
review: When I try to watch on my phone it’s gives an error message saying “we’re having trouble loading this right now” check internet connection, my internet connection is fine!!, and when I try to watch on my laptop it literally doesn’t allow me to browse shows telling me to start a subscription WHILE I am SIGNED IN, and not due for another payment until MARCH 25th. I pretty much waisted my money paying for another month because your system is not even recognizing that I already have a paid subscription that is up to date!!! This is so annoying and needs to be fixed!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Great! But...
review: The app is great everywhere including on my PlayStation. But it is frustrating when I have to skip over intros and recaps. Out of all the streaming services I use this is the only one that doesn’t have the capability to skip intros and recaps with just the tap I’ve a button. Everything else is great and well thought out, but if u can make this one little fix it has the potential to make your app 100x better, it is a worth while addition so please consider it!

title: ADD THE SHOW THAT WAS ON NICK @ night called “ hollywood heights “
