review: okay so there’s this show that came out years ago... and it was so good.. but you can’t find it anywhere at all or watch it absolutely anywhere since it was on teen nick years ago and nick @ night BUT it would be highly appreciated if you added it.. the show is called “ hollywood heights “ a lot of people don’t know about it but it’s such an amazing show and it would be pretty dope if you added it on the app (: thank you i hope you guys see this

title: Scrap new format of home page
review:
First off the app’s performance has improved with new updates. Thank you....BUT. I hate the new home screen. I don’t want to scroll thru a bunch of screens to find the latest new episodes of my favorite shows. Scrolling takes time. I liked the old view (where many different shows were shown at once. )better. 

One show per page is poor use of screen space. Please change back or give settings options.

title: Enough with the commercials
review: Enjoying the shows but the commercials are obnoxious. There are several breaks through the show. If you need to rewind you have to watch them all over again. Better to put them in the beginning if your going to force us to watch them and stop interrupting the show. Also, it’s not super easy to navigate. Started watching series 2 because I couldn’t find series 1 and having difficulty with getting from one episode to another. Could be a little bit friendlier.

title: Mirroring compatibility
review: The app before the switch to the “My Stuff” update was beautifully compatible with Apple TV screen mirroring. It used to actually open the app on the tv and play content very well without the phone having to be open. It would be really great to get that back. Also it would be great to have a way to manually import from a watchlist because I have a watchlist on one device and my stuff on another and no updates for the watchlist device so it gets a little hard to keep up with what’s in my list.

title: Sorry to say I hate it now...
review:
I can’t stand this app as it stands. Everything with your updated/reimagined layout and usability is really terrible. There is probably not one new feature that I like and see as an improvement. The skipping forward and back when you touch the sides of the screen is an awful feature. I feel like people are screaming it all through the reviews, yet you keep the feature. 

Also, I used to see all these shows in one place, and the shows I watched were all right there, up front. Now sometimes, I have to go all over the place to find I show I watch ALL THE TIME!

I also hate that I have to press a bunch of things to go to the details for the show, when it used to take us there by default.

This whole app is worse now. It was great before, very user friendly and simple. Then, you thought you were making it amazing, and really...you broke it. It seems like you changed things just to change them, and few like it. I hope it gets better.

title: HATE the App!
review: I absolutely haaaaate this new update. The colors may be prettier, but every "improvement" is anything but. I appreciate the suggested shows, but that should not be on the first page; yes, I prefer instant access to "Continue Watching." Scrolling is now impossible, and just tapping the wrong area on the screen forwards to the end of an episode/movie. I've never had to track what minute and second I'm at while watching an episode as much as with this app. Please go back to the drawing board from the last version as that was easy, user-friendly, and clean. This is messy and makes streaming a difficult experience, which is pretty hard to do.

title: Horrible New Interface
review: The new set up is so difficult to use and not intuitive at all! I'm a 24 yr old college student I can't figure out how to find the list of all my shows like I used to. I can't see if there's new episodes for shows I've subscribed to. The pastel color backgrounds just add to the confusion. I just want my shows! Easiest way for me to find them is to search for them all over again. As a premium member, stuff like this might make me quit paying. Seeing one show in your screen is horrible and t doesn't say if it's been watched or not already either. The app is even worse on my Fire stick tv and it's frustrating.

title: I’m so Bummed. 😪
review: I love the new update but I’m not happy that I can’t watch my shows on my tv I usually connect it to my hdmi cord so I can watch movies and stuff with my family actually it does work when connected but it only lets me see commercials and not the actual shows please fix it and I also wish you can frequently update the Kardashians shows more often like the other episodes on here.

title: Fix the app or no longer say you can download and watch
review: Fix the app or no longer say you can download and watch shows and movies. It’s been over 2 months since I’ve been able to use the download and watch feature, it shows the intro of the company (example-fox) then it just buffers and buffers and then crashes. I even download over WiFi and still have this issue and I’m getting sick of it. Either fix it or state that you no longer supply the download feature because it’s false advertising. Your company is getting worse and worse after you actually were working well last year.

title: The Crash
review: The app is amazing for my type of content being anime and the occasional tv series, nothing ever the top like live shows but that all doesn’t matter since I can’t OPEN THE APP itself. If I tap to open that app it’ll show Hulu’s loading screen and back out immediately after. I like this app for what it provides but please fix this glitch cause it’s not my phone acting weird. The app itself just refuses to let me past the loading screen into my stuff.

title: New interface loses my subscription. cancelled, I have my limits
review: I keep thinking, “this can’t be the app...  this is a beta... this is..  awful”. The search engine is inane.  Seriously, get it together... charging for something where a recently watched list isn’t even handy?  Where now, NO list is handy... I have to scroll through each show individually with zero idea of what you have for content?? Are you kidding me??  The latest version actually makes me angry... search and scroll at the same time?  Through what??  I mean, you’re the one subscription I can live without...  I know I’m not alone, and how you keep a five star rating has to be rigged....

title: Horrible update
review:
**** Edit: so picture in picture is back. BUT THE RIDICULOUS FLIPTRAY IS STILL THERE. This is ridiculous. Remove the pointless most frustrating streaming feature ever.****
Why update to make it prettier then take away a key feature like picture in picture? Then add the stupid skip ahead crap. Now if I barely miss the pause button it skips waaaaayyyy ahead and makes me sit through 90 seconds of commercials before I can try to rewind to watch yet another 90 seconds of commercials just to see that I went back too far or not enough and have to sit through more commercials. If this isn't fixed soon I will be cancelling my subscription.

title: Glitches
review: I gave this app three stars because i downloaded it last night & renewed my subscription. The app was working  perfectly fine last night and now all of a sudden it wont open. I deleted it and downloaded it again and still the same results. I am not going to pay for the app and pay to watch something i cant see !! Whats the point in that ? Please get it together its not fair for me to pay for the app and pay for my subscription but I'm not able to watch my shows on my tablet.

title: Adware...
review: The worst implementation and the worst experience. You are getting their service to watch Ads. Completely useless for mobile watchers. Once the connection drops you just going to watch the ads over and over again. The problem is that when you want to swipe through, you hit the add and if you get offline in this process, you going to just spin until a min worth of ad is done. Worst is when the ad itself doesn’t load after watching the ad for 45seconds and you have to rewatch the whole ad again when your signal connects.

title: Updates aren’t fixing problems
review: The app design is terrible and I wait for the updates in hopes of fixing the constant problems but every time I’m disappointed. It’s time for me to unsubscribe and go elsewhere. The fast forward and rewind are the worse. I will pause, but somehow it thinks I want to FF or RW and I lose my place. My other dislike feature is after a movie or show is complete and I try to touch screen to select the back arrow, nothing happens. The display will only appear and disappear. Can’t select the back icon, settings, nothing. Sorry I gave it multiple tries, after my subscription is due I will be spending my money elsewhere.

title: SO ANNOYING, NEEDS CHANGES
review: How about changing the way I fast fwd and rewind!? I want to be able to touch the screen WITHOUT doing so!! All I tried to do was brighten my screen and instead of bringing the menu up, I fast fwd and have to wait for stupid buffering AND a stupid commercial. All because you can do it by touching the screen ANYWHERE?? Come on! Change that crap to just a bar so we KNOW WHERE NOT TO TOUCH to do so!!! And eliminate the dang countdown to commercials!!!! That is so annoying!! You guys need to learn how to keep it efficient. Stop messing everything up! Whatever rating that is bad enough to get you to pay attention, count this as that! Just be more like Netflix

title: Unbelievably atrocious UI
review: 20 year DirecTV user forced to switch because I’ll be mobile for the next 10 months, so I sign up for Hulu’s Live TV service. This is absolutely the worst UI I have ever had the misfortune of using. I cannot find any way to get to a particular show that I wish to record from Live TV except for scrolling to find that station, then sliding to the right ONE HOUR AT A TIME until I locate the show I’m looking for, then I can record it. This is freaking insane.  They’ve never heard of a search field for live TV or a more intelligent way to list programs?  It’s slow and cumbersome, and I can’t wait until I’m able to dump this service!

title: New 7.8 Version needs work
review:
I just downloaded and installed the 7.8, and when ever I go into the new app, I see the content, but when I click on the play button all that happens is that the play button bar blinks to acknowledge I clicked it and doesn’t play the respective video.  I uninstalled,
Re-installed and logged in, and even rebooted after the re-install and it still does the frustrating not playing of the video content.  Please fix.  Thanks!

title: Frustrating!
review: i enjoy watching shows and movies on the app but sometimes i’ll accidentally slip my finger on my screen and then suddenly i’m minutes back or forward in my movie. It is SO ANNOYING and then once i try to go back to where i was it takes FOREVER to load. like any other streaming app i don't click anywhere on the screen to fast forward through my video, i have to actually click on the bar. when it’s like that i don’t accidentally skip forward, it’s 100 times better.

title: getting better
review: unikitty is back, but is missing part of season one and doesnt even have season 2. craig of the creek still isnt on there so i cant watch it! the amazing world of gumball is getting its sixth season soon, thats good. star vs. the forces of evil got season four recently which is good but it came almost a MONTH after the finale aired, which is kind of annoying. i still want seasons 1-29 on the simpsons, yet you do not provide. teen titans go! should have season four soon, i want it. its getting better but pleez add whats missing for a five-star review!

title: The commercials
review: I feel like this app is great, it has nice amount of tv shows and movies to select from. The problem comes in when your so into the show that your watching and a minute long commercial come on that happens at least four times while watching a tv show. If you’ll be able to get rid of the commercials or at least make them appear less while watching this app would definitely be 5 stars.

title: Consistently won’t recognize mobile app
review: I have tried to open the app on my phone repeatedly and about 25 percent of the time I can actually get in. It says there’s something wrong with my internet connection and there’s not. Restarting the phone the internet or the app doesn’t change the issue. I was able to use this well up until a couple weeks ago. I hope there is a fix as I really have lost all use of the app at the point.

title: Great but not working
review: I love using this app it’s my main source for movies/shows HOWEVER within the past couple weeks I am completely unable to chrome cast to my tv. My screen says ready to cast but then it just keeps buffering from my phone. It works fine if i’m watching from my phone by not if I want to cast it. This is very frustrating. I’ve tried reinstalling the app and reconnecting my wifi but nothing is working. I’ve also heard other people experiencing the same problem. Please fix this.

title: Just Use Netflix Guys
review: This app is a money hungry and it shows. You have to suffer through ads for more than 70 seconds 5 or 6 times for every one episode you watch. And you have to pay for an even more expensive plan to get rid of ads and to fully access all content. To top it all off, the subscription that includes ads has insufferable glitches, for example, freezing after an ad just so you can watch them all over again after having to reload the show. The only reason I used the app in the first place is for the content. I hope the shows and movies on here get moved to Netflix.

title: Glitchy
review: Im constantly having to kill the app right after an episode ends bc for some reason it keeps saying it’s having trouble loading or connecting. And multiple times in a video the video will visually skip ahead but the audio stay the same pace making it out of sync and vice verse. And it takes over 10 mins to load most of the time and I keep having to switch between WiFi and my service provider to try and get it to actually load. It’s severely frustrating.

title: Eh.
review: So I binged the first season of a show and they don’t have season two but they have season three. Which is fine I guess, but it didn’t tell me that, it just started playing season three automatically and I didn’t realize it until they were referring to certain things from season two and it spoiled everything. Boo. Also, if I exit in the middle of an episode, it doesn’t remember where I am when I start the app again and I have to fast forward and try to figure it out. Good variety though.

title: New bugs are making the app unusable.
review: I can’t pause anything without issues. Once I hit play again, there’s no sound. Or it makes me go back to the beginning of the program and when I try to back to where I left off, it freezes and then gives me an error message. I signed up for the Live TV version without commercials after getting rid of my much pricier cable. I was hoping it would be better, it’s not. I’ve restarted the app, my iPad, and even reinstalled. Nothing has changed.

title: screen freezes
review:
Good so far, except the screen started freezing when i got halfway through an episode of CSI. I tried to use my data to see if it was just the WiFi connection, but it still froze. It would get about halfway and if i try to close the episode and open it again, then the episode starts over again.

Soooo, idk what’s wrong with it, but please fix it thank you!

title: Worst streaming app
review: I don’t want to give this app one star but the way I see and compare it to other streaming app it’s the worst. First it’s super complicated to go through episodes and you don’t have the next episode or list of episode option when you watching something. The ads for the shows are too much. To watch a 24 minutes episode you will go through 6 minutes ads even when you’re a subscriber. The ads getting more and more with each update! Also when you have the app in smaller window it will automatically close when the episode finished which I wished it wasn’t like that!

title: Why am I forced to watch so many ads
review: There’s probably 15+ ads per episode. If I wanted to watch tv I would pay the outrageous prices for it. There’s no point in watching anymore. I have lost all interest in my shows. Maybe if there were considerably LESS ADS it wouldn’t be so bad. I’m so frustrated I can’t go 5 minutes without having to put my phone down and wait for the ads to end.

title: FF/RW and ads
review: I don’t like that I have to watch ads on a paid service anyway, but when touching the screen accidentally makes you not only lose your place, but also have to sit through up to 2 min of ads just to try to track down where you left off. Horribly inconvenient. Scrolling through one show at a time when selecting shows is also just a bad design decision. Wanna go back to the last episode and watch the last 5 minutes again? First you gotta watch ads at the start of the show, then ads again once you skip forward. I don’t wanna watch 5 min of ads to see 5 min of my show. Terrible UI.

title: Good and Bad
review: I like how the new update makes you hold down on the screen in order to move forward or back. That used to be a pain in the a**. But what I don’t like is the fact that the 10 seconds forward button is now 30 seconds. Like, sometimes I miss just a bit of whatever I’m watching and rewind 10 seconds and if I want to go forward I’d miss more than necessary bc it’s 30 seconds. It’s a small problem but would make a big difference, at least for me. Maybe give us the option to choose how many seconds we want in the settings or something.

title: So far big disappointment
review: First off, it takes FOREVER to load a show. Then about 15 seconds into it, it stops to buffer for two to three minutes, then plays for 20-30 seconds then stops to buffer again. And again. Aaaand again. It’s almost impossible to watch anything because of all the buffering. I tried resetting out networks..  no help, then I tried to ask support and it doesn’t go through just sends me off into dead air. Tried reloading page, will not work. For the lack of support/troubleshooting offered and the constant buffering ... should get half a star. Fix the bugs and I’ll gladly change my rating.

title: Not intuitive
review: They need ability to skip to next episode or to any other episode while watching a series. What’s frustrating is when you click on a show and it continues where you may have left off, but if you already saw the episode and can’t find the controls to go to the next episode. It’s so freaking frustrating! You have to close out of the video, go to the main page and click the little ellipses to get a little white pop up window show up, then click the show name, then it will take you to the shows page, then you can click the episode tab and pick an episode. f@#$%!!!

title: FF/RW Feature is THE WORST
review: I never rate apps really, but I came here specifically to complain about this extremely annoying fast forward and rewind feature. Anytime you accidentally tap the screen, it jumps to that spot in the show. Other users have taken more time to explain this feature, but basically everyone hates it. If the developers are listening AT ALL they’ll get rid of that feature. If I need to FF or RW I can drag at the bottom of the screen like any other video player, but if I tap at the top of the screen or pick up my iPad and my finger accidentally taps the screen I don’t want it jumping to that spot in the show. It’s way too sensitive! Ugh!

title: App is ok but.......
review:
It needs work!!! I was having issues with it freezing but after the update it’s working a lot better. I’m wondering where is season 3 of Growing up Hiphop? Also, where is season 2 through 5 of Marriage bootcamp? How do you just skip through seasons of shows or only show certain seasons? Please fix! Also, Can you add Growing up Hiphop: Atlanta. Other than that I like the app. 

P.S. please add more networks like TV one centric, and own network shows, and show every season of shows that’s already on the app and more to come. Thanks!

title: Horrible update
review: I updated my app as usual, but am very displeased with that decision.  I got used to how my shows are organized (but don’t like it) but cannot stand the new fast forward and rewind functions. I watch from my phone and it seems every time I accidentally hit the screen when watching a show it assumes I want to fast forward or go back and most the time I don’t!  I have the commercial plan so when I try to get back to where I was it forces me to watch 40 seconds of commercials even if I had just seen a commercial break.  It’s really frustrating.  I don’t see what was wrong with the old way of fast forward and rewinding.

title: Good service, terrible app
review: The app frequently glitches and stops videos, claiming you should reset your router and you have to shut the app down and reopen it. It also is extremely slow downloading episodes even with strong WiFi (like only 2-3 episodes overnight), doesn’t download seasons in order (and you can’t pause downloads to redirect downloading for earlier ones, only cancel), and will randomly tell you you “don’t have permission to access” some episodes, again making you click ‘retry download’, whereupon they download with no problem.

title: No support when there’s a problem
review:
I was using the app, no problem. Finished a program, closed the app, got a prompt for an update, ran the update, tried to open the app, it will not open at all, and the “help” options are a joke, when you try to call or chat the wait times are phenomenal and after over an hour on hold you mysteriously get disconnected, (multiple times), and my computer has been waiting for a live chat response for over 21 hours with a screen that says “Expected wait time 30 minutes”
The service is great until there’s a problem, then you’re apparently on your own.

title: Bugs Continue
review: I have to continually un-and-re install the application on a daily basis due to program errors. The video will play as usual, then, the moment I touch the rewind or fast forward button, the screen will disappear, yet the sound will continue. The only way I’ve been able to rectify the issue is by un-and-re installing every time this happens. It’s daunting and quite frustrating.

title: Always starts me at the wrong place
review: Pretty good show options. My huge complaint though is that when I go to watch a show I was previously watching, it very often starts me behind where I actually was. Then I have to find where I actually was, usually a commercial or 2 ahead, I have to rewatch all the commercials, and I’m annoyed by the end of it. I honestly feel like it’s their way of getting more money by making us watch more commercials. I never was started at the wrong place on Netflix’s app.

title: Connection error keeps reoccurring
review: During the advertisements, it starts to buffer and then after it stops buffering it starts to say “Connection error” once that happens you can either say “ok” or “retry” after pressing retry it starts to buffer again only for the connection error to pop back up, and ok just takes you to the home screen..I know it’s not my internet because it happens wherever I am using the internet on my tablet..This is causing the app to be very aggravating and not fond of watching anymore.

title: A few suggestions
review: Overall this a pretty good streaming service very affordable very good with watching new episodes. I have a suggestion however, a shuffle button I think it would really come in handy for shows everyone’s seen beginning to end such as full house, family matters, so you can watch the show but with some variety you know a little of everything. Also I should not have to wait 20 seconds for my next show to begin playing maybe ten, twenty is just outrageous. Another suggestion I have playlists  for shows. Anyways keep up the good work guys and seriously consider the shuffle button.

title: Terrible update.
review: The video on an iPhone X is not centered on the display. Also trying to tap the back button when you reach the end of an episode does not work. The only way to get out is to force quit the app. Also I will go to open the app and it will ask me to sign in and if I close the app and re open it I’m signed in. This level of incompetence in a company this experienced is disappointing.

title: crashes CONSTANTLY
review:
i use this app to watch on my google chrome cast. almost everyday the app will crash for about an hour. if i’m trying to fast forward to a certain part of an episode i’ve started watching it will keep starting the episode over and over until i close the app and ill have to rewatch the entire episode. 
for the quality content that’s on the app, i’ve always had trouble with this app running well. it’s been very frustrating... 
please someone fix it. especially since i PAY to watch the content, i expect better quality.

title: This App is inaccessible for blind and visually impaired users
review: With the most recent update, the only thing that blind and visually impaired users who use voiceover can do is brows. It is my hope that the developers will move forward with making this app completely accessible for blind and visually impaired users. This app has been inaccessible for blind and visually impaired users for months, and many people have complained. I do not feel that we are asking very much to have this app work for us.

title: Latest update has ruined it
review:
The most recent update completely changed the interface and has ruined the whole watching experience. Slow, clunky, and filled with glitches. If it isn’t resolved soon, I’ll cancel my account and hope to return later if this mess is ever resolved. Super disappointing.

Updated March 1: new update, still slow and awful. Not worth it.

Updated April 22: now the app requires me to login almost daily. Super annoying. And everything else lowsy about it remains. Only reason I’m sticking around: season 2 of handmaids is coming in a few days.

title: Love the update!
review: Don’t give much mind to these traditional tv watchers who need a guide and channel list to watch TV. I love the new UI and so do my kids. It always has my shows ready, I never have to search for what I need, it’s press and play, and it always remembers my place. It’s a different interface yes. But don’t be afraid of change. Please keep adapting this interface. It’s not perfect but it’s miles ahead of the other services.

title: Watchlist tab
review:
The keep watching tab is so difficult to use now that it is full screen. I have missed out on most of a season of one of my favorite shows because I didn’t realize it had come back from break since it wasn’t in keep watching or a watch list despite it being added to my list. Very frustrating since I probably won’t be able to watch it before the next season premiers and the current season is taken down.

Please please take down the full screen design that makes the app not functional and frustrating.

title: Captions don’t work and can’t lock phone to listen to tv show
review: I loved netflix for the purpose of being able to listen to shows or movies while my phone was locked. You guys had the feature then took it away. Brought it back. Then took it away again. Haven’t seen it since! And the newest update. My captions NEVER work anymore. I’m just tired of your constant updates that do NOTHING to make the app better for your customers. In case you haven’t seen, people keep rating your app 1-2 stars. When will ya’ll actually listen to the paying customers and release a good update for once with friendly user interface?

title: Very disappointed in this update
review:
When the update released I had to spend 15 minutes reentering my account Info then I had to go through every single show in the app saying witch ones I like and wanted to add to my watchlist 

The update didn’t save nothing from before so I didn’t know where I left off on episodes and of course the infamous “click to time in video” feature

title: SO ANNOYING
review: The time swipe feature is infuriating. You can accidentally tap on the screen and it takes you 30 minutes forward and you have to swipe through to figure out where you are again. It's happened 5 to 10 times in one episode for me. You can accidentally swipe to halfway through the next episode and not even realize it. The browsing feature is annoying. You can hardly find anything anymore. You have to click through 5 pages just to get to a list of episodes in a show. You've sacrificed usability to make it look more ~aesthetically pleasing~. Fix your stupid app.

title: Think it needs an update
review: So generally, if I’m binging, the first episode is fine and I can watch with no problems. However, it has a problem playing every episode after that. If I press play next or just let the episode play through and go to the next episode automatically, it gives me an error message. Says it had trouble loading the title. So I have to close out of the show and then restart it from the main screen again. It’s just kind of inconvenient.

title: New Layout is such an Improvement
review: So far, the new layout is miles ahead of the previous layout. I don’t really understand why anyone would prefer the previous one. I think people must have just been used to the disfunction. Now it has anything I watched recently in the keep watching category instead of randomly leaving some series out so I had to go to my list or find the episode by wading through the seasons.

title: Really good but...
review: OK let me just start off by saying this is the better version of Netflix it has more shows less original stuff or more things I would want to watch but I’m having a few glitches it might be my phone but I don’t know but after I’m done watching an episode of regular show the screen freezes on the logo of the show and I had to close out the app and open it again to fix it I’m not sure if anyone else is having this problem but it won’t stop for me

title: Need ‘mark as watched’
review: This app needs a Mark As Watched function because it is constantly marking many episodes I’ve watched as not. Because of this it won’t inform me of new available episodes. Also, when I want to revisit and re-binge other series; after it completes an episode and it rolls over to next, that next episode begins at the end and so it practically rolls over to the next episode thus skipping an entire episode. Seems like a basic enough function that doesn’t need to be mentioned in the 21st century. Maybe if streaming technology were new but....IT’S NOT NEW.

title: Terrible
review:
I don’t understand how an app this terrible has 5 stars. Something is EXTREMELY suspect about that.

Why do I have to tediously flip through one full-screen show title at a time?

Why are new episodes of shows I watch all the time buried where I can’t find them, but it tries first to get me to rewatch episodes I’ve watched already, or start again at the beginning of series I’ve already seen?

I only watch a couple things, why is it so hard to figure that out, and show me the new episodes of those things before trying to get me to re-watch things? Why does it bury them under “TV”, instead of under “keep watching”?

Why can’t it figure out, if the phone is sideways, I want to watch full-screen?

Why does it take so many clicks to find what I was watching yesterday so I can resume it, meanwhile, first it wants to make me click past me shows I have never had any interest in?

I hate this app.

title: Wow 😳
review: Ok to start of with , I love this app it has all the new shows to catch up on. I love how you can get many old shows too! But , I have a few Concerns .one of them being that sometimes the show will just stop and say please try again later we can’t play this show that frustrates me when I want to watch tv .another that it take to long to load .so In the mornings I only have a few minutes to watch and it will take most to load.  overall this is s great app but it needs some updates and

title: Terrible
review: I will definitely be canceling my subscription and deleting the app after the World Cup. I wanted a way to watch the games while I was at work. First I had to come to terms with the $40/month price tag, second I had to come to terms with the fact that the app crashes and is constantly buffering regardless of my location. I thought, ok maybe it’s my WiFi. But it isn’t. Everything else on my phone or other devices works perfectly fine, but not this app. Ready to delete after day two of using it. Haven’t been able to watch a single thing without the program crashing, live and not.

title: Mixed results in update
review:
The latest update brings welcome improvements to the UX with improved control with gestures for scrubbing forward and back, as well as the forward jump being changed from 10 to 30 seconds. Much better for skipping anime opening credit sequences!

Unfortunately it's really unstable when casting to my chromecast, so I have to kill the app and restart pretty often after my phone locks. It also really won't ever get above three stars until they add offline viewing for shows.

title: Wasted two hours of my life.
review:
Downloaded this app this morning to try it out. Set up a trail month through iTunes subscription and received a confirmation of such through iTunes email. Attempted to login on computer and couldn’t. Attempted password reset and nothing. Eventually had to call... waiting on hold 30 minutes to get someone on the phone who had NO IDEA! what an iTunes subscription was or that you could set their product up with it. Was on the phone an hour and a half with multiple other departments consulted before they were even able to just FIND MY ACCOUNT. 

This is awful. Don’t waste your time.

title: Too many issues
review: I hate the format of this app. I love the shows, but honestly it’s getting too annoying to use. The rewind/fast forward feature is horrendous. If you even just barely tap on another part of the screen by accident the show jumps and you have to go through all the commercials again. Plus load time is ridiculously slow. If I pause the show to check another app, I come back and it takes 15 minutes to load back up to play. And it’s NOT a data issue. On average it takes me an hour to watch a 25 minute show.

title: Awful UX/UI Design
review: This interface is designed to make it more difficult to find shows and navigate within a show once you are watching. I am considering canceling the service it is so terrible. If you want to pause or jump back/forward in a show, you are likely to jump far ahead or back because the entire screen except for a small area in the middle controls where you are in the show. It should not require such precision to simply pause or jump back 15 seconds. And requiring you to scroll through a full screen shown icons to find what you want to watch is maddening. Truly awful update.

title: Picture in picture
review: With this new update it lost the picture in picture. Before it was changed I was able to start whatever it was that I was watching and go off and do something else on my iPad as well. Now I can no longer do that. If the picture in picture is brought back in a new updated then I might come back and give it a higher rating.

title: Bring Back HDMI Support!!!!
review: I love the update!!! Very visually appealing and easy to navigate but you guys removed HDMI support!!! Why would you do this!!!! I live in a rural area where I can’t get any internet so I use my mobile device with an HMDI converter cable or use Apple TV mirroring to watch our favorite shows as family!!! I can’t do this anymore the commercials will appear and work just fine but the program is black with only sound!! This doesn’t work to be paying for something that I can longer use with my family to watch!!! We can’t all sit around to watch a movie on a small phone screen!!! I would hate to cancel please fix!!!!

title: Too Many Bugs
review: Whenever I'm watching a show the next episode it tells me to watch is always the episode that I just watched or a previous episode. It's so annoying and sometimes when I start up the app and try to watch something it will jut freeze and do nothing. Also the new video scroll bar is so stupid. Sometimes I will accidentally tap and then it goes all the way to the start. They should have just kept it normal like every other streaming service. The look of the update is good but it's filled with bugs and horrible features.:

title: Poorly designed layout
review: The interface of this app is atrocious. Why is it that when I select series details it doesn’t show me the full list of episodes instead it shows me other shows to watch so I’m stuck on one episode. Also if I go to rewatch the show it always starts at the very end of that episode. Why is it that my continue watching isn’t the first thing that I see when I open the app? The app has no time limit I could fall asleep watching a show and wake up eight hours later and my screen is still on on a different show.

title: The update broke this app
review:
Updated Review: App is fixed so I wanted to update my review to be 5 star, thank you guys. I left my old review below.

I own an iPhone X, latest iOS, there should be more testing when updating your app, it says the update was for the removal of bugs however it seems to have just added bugs to a perfectly fine app. I will update review after this is fixed.

title: Great app that has improved over time
review: This app was pretty bad a little while ago.  It is a great app now, and they have removed all the old bugs.  It has much better content than Netflix has, and it looks much better than Netflix.  The improvement I’ve seen with this app is incredible, and now I can watch their better content library on a better app than Netflix.

title: Duplicate commercials
review: Same as everyone else on here. One you rewind it makes you watch the dame 80secs of commercials again. Or if you leave the app it starts about 30secs before you left off.....and plays commercials again. I don’t have this problem that I noticed on a tv. But being an NA I watch most shows when I can I’m incumbents on my app. Hoping all these reviews fix this problem or they’re going to lose customers. Not fair to watch 80secs of commercials just for pausing or rewinding sirs and ma’am’s.

title: Subtitles not working all the time.
review: Loaded an episode only to see that the subtitles isn’t on so I went to settings to turn it on. It was actually on then I had to toggle it off then back on to get it to work. When I’m done with that episode, it goes to the next episode and then the subtitles doesn’t show up. Again, I went to settings to turn it on, but it was already on so I did the toggle off/on again and it came back on. The issue still persists after going through 10 episodes so clearly there’s an issue with the subtitles. Please fix.

title: IPad app doesn’t work
review: I hope the developers start paying attention to these reviews. The content is great but I’ve never been able to watch live programming on my iPad. (Tech support had no knowledge of the problem.) I understand that they want to protect their product, but how long can they protect it from paying customers? For now, I’ll keep downloading the iPad upgrade and keep hoping.

title: Would of given a 5,if::?
review: Would of given 5 stars, but the screen is very sensitive to any touch and will either go back or forth, depending on where you accidentally touch. If they could put the play/rewind/forward buttons at the bottom next to the time remaining, that would be great. It’s getting so annoying, that if it’s not planning to change, I will cancel my account!

title: What is with the fast forward😠
review:
I can’t get my head around why the fast forward is as it is. You touch the screen slightly and you’ve jumped to the end of the episode. I get it developers, it looks cool, just like the new iPhone (without a home button) looks cool. But is it practical? No. No one other video streaming service will ever be like this in the future, so go back to the way it was because it’s a chore having to constantly rewind.

All in all go back to the old interface. I know you won’t but I thought , I a faithful customer, might make my complaints known.

title: WHAT HAVE YOU DONE!?!?
review:
This “update” is AWFUL! I came to App Store to figure out if I could go back to old version. Seriously, give back the screens of selections! One screen per show is seriously taxing. Also, what happened to the ability to watch in small screen so you can have another application active?

This wasn’t an improvement. It’s awful. I will be cancelling.

Directions: Go to Netflix. Copy them. Rinse. Repeat.

title: SFB
review:
Watching Olympics and titles onLive viewing & on demand are often inaccurate once I click on the video or live show icon. Men’s Freestyle Ice Skating Live finished on one icon & then that was gone. The others said hockey & hockey & another title but no figure skating identified. FINALLY, I found it under one of the Live files but there was no file for figure skating - hidden in “Men’s Hockey: Canada vs. Czech Republic.” Please make these titles accurate so can find what looking for!!!!
Then “app feedback” is no such thing!! Can’t leave an email or message of any kind. Make this more easily obvious!!

title: Rewind/fast forward feature is awful
review: Overall the app isn’t bad, but the rewind and fast forward feature is absolutely infuriating. Too many times have I tried to pause a show and accidentally hit slightly off  the button or my daughter will hit the screen causing me to jump to where ever was hit. More often than not this causes a commercial to start and I have to wait for a minute and a half to try and put my shoe back to where I left off. Hopefully they refine this a bit more so the viewing experience can be a little more streamlined.

title: Hate the Redesign
review:
I used to be able to open up the app and continue watching the last episode I’d begun before with one tap. Now, even after all this time to get used to the new app, I’m still struggling to find my shows, it’s inconvenient to do so, and I have to have shows I don’t care about advertised to me on the front page.

This redesign was a huge step backward. The interface isn’t intuitive, and there’s hardly any information on any one screen.

I just want the primary focus to be to watch the shows that I like, and I’d rather be able to discover new things on demand. Right now it’s the other way around.

title: Love the service!  Hate the new app.
review:
The previous application made a lot of sense and was EASY to navigate and understand.  This new version is the opposite so hopefully someone will fix it soon!

I still have the old app on a device and it has the list of all my favorite shows.  I looked on the new app and these choices are GONE.  It’s like they want me to switch to another provider.

I need a zero star choice.

title: UPDATED REWIND/FASTFORDWARD FEATURE!!
review:
I hate it with a passion!! Please please change it back!!

Since the new interface, every time I watch my shows on my iPad, I press ‘pause’ too long or accidentally press my screen for too long and end up either rewinding or fast forwarding thru my show, therefore having to scroll back to where I was and watching anotherrrr set of commercials.  I like the option to skip 10 seconds or rewind 10 seconds but being able to scroll “anywhere” on the screen is very frustrating for me.  

Please change it or fix it!  Please and thank you!!

title: Some issues
review:
(At the time of writing this) I have this issue with the app where it instantly crashes the moment I try to watch in wide screen. I only had this problem with the phone version, the tablet version seemed to be fine when I tried it out.

It’s a bit annoying when there is a message about not being able to forward past the intros of the shows channels that often last longer than the actual intro.

Sometimes after a show is over, the credits go on for a long while before I see the “watch next episode” button. Sometimes it doesn’t show up at all and have to wait until after all the credits are over.

I hope that at least the first one gets fixed so that this app is viable once again.

title: Customer service is trash
review: Had serious issues with pausing live tv. When I would go to play after pausing, it would be green static snow and than go right back to live tv so I would miss everything from when it was paused. The customer service wanted to blame my att fiber optic 1000 internet which I know it wasn’t. Ran multiple connection tests and they were well above what is needed, including the latency. I ran there trouble shooting and it solved nothing. Yet every time I called customer service, this was the only thing they could do. Will never recommend to anyone based solely on the fact of the customer service.

title: Ads and glitches
review: The ads are pretty annoying. It will not let me rewind behind the ad mark without rewatching the ad. If I press -10s and only 5s have passed since the ad, it throws me back into the ad and I have to wait 5s for it to end. And if I accidentally press the power button, the app decides “Guess I gotta die now” and crashes. Every. Single. Time. There’s also an input delay whenever I tap the screen. I have to wait 5s for it resize. There’s too many glitches on mobile but pc and console version works fine.

title: Good shows, live tv can be glitchy
review: This app has a lot of good shows that I like to watch and can’t find other places. Live tv is glitchy though if I am on one channel for too long I can’t switch because even if I do it freezes and reverts back to the last station but the right station is highlighted. Only way to get out is restart app. Removing app and reinstalling doesn’t help. This happens on other platforms as well like the Xbox 360.

title: Good but irritating
review: It has good shows but you have to watch like 80 second adds throughout the video like about 3-5 adds per episode and you can’t skip the adds it is really annoying but if you can be patient and wait the adds through it’s not that big of a problem. Also that doesn’t apply for the movies on this app because movies don’t have adds but even though I don’t like sitting through the adds where as for netflix they take out the adds.

title: Horrible
review: I signed up for the cheap version with ads, and I could deal with that if you could actually watch something to the end without it kicking you off and saying to restart the app. Literally every time I watch something, either at home or on my phone, I’ve never gotten through an entire episode without this happening. I don’t know if this is their way of “forcing” people to pay for the upgraded version, or what. It’s not happening with me because I have zero faith in this app. The commercials are more frequent than basic TV, and if you have the audacity to try to rewind it, don’t bother.

title: Terrible UI
review:
Why is it so hard to find how to get to a show’s episode list? I shouldn’t have to jump through hoops (find and click a TINY “...” and then click “go to series details”) figure out how to access the seasons and episodes. It should be the first thing that comes up when you click on the show from the main menu. 
Make. It. Intuitive. C’mon, people.

Extremely annoying and difficult to navigate through shows— nothing about it is intuitive. I don’t care if Million Dollar Matchmaker is on in 800 seconds— get it off the screen! Accidentally scrub all the time. // UPDATE: This has been fixed.

title: Please fix the crashes
review: Am having trouble with the app every night seen like there a time it crashes due to either volume of user or idk but now that I decide to add the tv services am not able to enjoy as I should. Everything works normally until 8 pm ish then it’s either network problems with I don’t have because all my other streaming services work fine

title: Good but
review: For some reason after the recent update when I go to resume and episode that I haven’t finished it doesn’t let me start where I left off it brings back to episode 1 for said show. And the watch history doesn’t save as well. It’s as if I just started watching it the first time so each time I watch a new episode I either have to remember where I left off or scroll all the way to the episode I was watching. Pls fix

title: Like it but.....
review: I like this app but it needs a little work. Sometimes when I’m watching a show on my iPad like Austin and Ally and when I go and watch it on my tv it doesn’t save my progress! And about the skipping, why does it have to be 30 and 10? When I’m trying to skip the theme song part I always over skip cause of the 30 and the I have to go back and press the back buttoning 3 times, which is ridiculous! But over all like it.

title: Bad with chromecast and bug with commercials
review:
Every time I synch with my chromecast from my phone, I am unable to play or pause from my phone or see what episode I am currently watching. 

Also, the number of commercials is crazy and they often reload so that I have to watch 3-4 minutes of commercials. On a 25 minute episode, I watch 5-6 commercial breaks that often reload 2-3 times per break. It’s crazy. Please fix this and give an option to watch extended commercials for a period of ad free viewing.

title: Email unconfirmed
review: I was about to start my account to watch my shows, but I know I just have my email address on the account, but I forgot my password. I reset my password 2-3 times, and I didn’t get an response from them. I wish it didn’t effect others because of the email issues. One day “I’ve waited 15 minutes from Junk mail”, the other said “I can’t access to my account.” So I’m asking on behalf of the users to update the email problem so people need to reset their password.

title: Buggy, incredibly frustrating waste of time
review: App crashes all the time forcing relaunches and doubling to tripling the number of ads one is forced to watch, which is even more maddening considering the fact that one must watch any advertisements at all when paying for this service. When restarting videos the app sometimes takes one several episodes back. Videos repeatedly lose sound also forcing reloads.  The navigation is also poorly designed and frustrating.  Not worth the time and effort one must expend trying to work around the numerous bugs.  Incredibly frustrating.

title: Choosing an episode problem
review: I have no idea if this problem is happening to anyone else, so far the reviews I have read are not about this problem. The problem is when I click on a show I would like to watch, then I go to select an episode I want to see it doesn’t play the episode I clicked on, It doesn’t even act like I touched the screen. I can click on episodes over and over and nothing will happen, so I am forced to watch the show from episode one season one all the way to whatever episode I wanted to watch in the first place.

title: Status info finally returns. Hallelujah!!!!
review:
Finally!! The absolutely necessary status bar display has returned. May it never vanish again!!

To be clear, the status bar info now shows appropriately after a single tap on the display when the rest of the controls and options appear and is appropriately completely invisible when in landscape viewing mode.

title: Crash fest
review: I love the vast show options. I hate that it crashes ALL THE TIME.  In the span of one episode it is common for me to have to restart the app several times.  “Crashes” include: Audio for advertisements playing over the beginning of the show with out the ability to rewind. The audio being consistent while the video fast-forwards through half the show, after you have to manually rewind. While not touching my phone at all the video will jump by 5-20 min. Also it closes itself entirely.

title: Missing episodes and uncomfortable ads
review: Some shows on this service have missing episodes. Sometimes an episode is just gone from Futurama. Sometimes it has the thumbnail of one episode and the description of a completely different episode! Another awful thing is the uncomfortable ads. I don’t care about Gaycation or Diane Black! I don’t have a problem with this show or Diane Black, it’s just that I come here to escape politics and the stress it brings. If there were some feature where I could block certain ads, that would be a nice accommodation to all the shilling this service does to its originals and sponsors. Thank you.

title: Portrait mode is infuriating
review: There needs to be a way to opt out of portrait mode. If I move my device even slightly it flips out of landscape in the middle of a show and shows me a list of other episodes to watch (at least half of which I have no interest in). The browser seems to be incredibly sensitive, so much so that in the process of trying to flip my screen back to landscape I often accidentally start playing one of these other episodes. Did anyone test the UX of this feature? It’s obnoxious. At least give a full screen option so I can choose to stay in landscape for an entire episode.

title: App is really bad
review: This is one of the worst streaming apps out of all the major streaming services. They just keep making it worse. First the way you fast forward/rewind is really bad and causes you to accidentally lose your place in an episode. It’s less sensitive than it used to be but it’s still a crap feature. Then with the latest update the shows your watching just disappear and you have to search for them. Or it shows there are new episodes when there aren’t and vice versa. The only good thing about it is the streaming quality itself is usually decent and doesn’t buffer too often.

title: Voiceover support almost nonexistent.
review:
Hello, I will probably be pulling my subscription soon because I am  unable to use this app.  As a totally blind user I need to be able to use the screen reader VoiceOver to interact with the items on the screen. Previously, I have been able to do this. However, in the last couple updates the app has become basically unusable.  Personally, I have a friend who has already left because of the same reason.   
If the support team would look into this issue it would be greatly appreciated.   I have enjoyed using this service in the past and would love to do so again.

title: Can’t pick up where I left off
review: It doesn’t always pick up where I left off. It will play an episode I’ve already watched where I have a few minutes left at the end of the episode. It won’t pick up where I left off. I placed an episode on pause for a few minutes and when I hit play it took me all the way back to episode 1!!!! Why wouldn’t it remember where I last watched!!?? There needs to be an option to “Mark as watched” so it will not default to that same episode.

title: Worst user interface
review: After the most recent update you will start to wonder who the heck designed this and who the heck approved it! First off locating your shows is about next to impossible. Or even tying to find the episode you left off on. It’s has a slow response time and all around slow. The “my stuff” section doesn’t even show my “shows” which means I have to spend a stupid amount of time locating them. It’s a very frustrating update and I seem to be using it less and less. Which is disappointing since I do not have cable.

title: Glitches and freezes
review: When watching a show the frame freezes at random intervals causing you to restart the app  and open it back up to find where you left off. Then after you’ve done that just wait about ten more minutes and you’ll have to do it again. This is insanely annoying. I enjoy the unique content on the platform but wish I could watch it without unnecessary interruptions that the developers are either too idiotic to realize their mistake or just simply not care for the user experience.

title: Works on iPhone, not Apple TV
review: Installed the app on my phone and logged in just fine.  Apple TV says there is something wrong with internet connection, but how was I able to install the app if there is a problem?  Restarted Apple TV but still won’t work.  Uninstalled app and entered credentials again, still no luck.  Installed on firetv just fine and activated and was able to watch there, but want to use Apple TV.  Something funky with Apple TV app evidently but does not allow me to add comments there, so here I am...  fix Apple TV app.

title: Can’t skip ads on recorded shows = huge flaw
review:
As a sports fan this is really irritating. I have no problem with the ads on regular TV shows and stuff but when I record a game and play it back I should be able to skip around all I want.

At least make an algorithm that only allows these breaks to be unskippable every couple minutes or something. Because right now, if I want to skim through a game to find a certain moment, it’s impossible without having to watch 120-second commercial breaks back to back to back.

title: Why is it so complicated?
review: I know what I want to watch I don’t need help deciding all I need is an easy to find categories button and when I’m playing a video the ability to push next. I know you have genres tab but the fact that is not easier to find is stupid not to not to mention when I’m watching a show and want to go to the next episode I don’t want to go back not if there is a listing tab right there. so why show me other stuff as opposed to what I’m currently watching. I mean I get it in small doses but your formatting is a little ridiculous.

title: Worst app I’ve ever used!!
review: There is no point in having this application on your phone because even with full 4G LTE service it will not load TV shows. I spend most of my time when using this app waiting for it to load even with full service and sometimes on Wi-Fi. It amazes me at how poorly this app was designed to work with the iPhone because I have the Netflix app and I can have only one bar of 3G and still be able to watch TV shows or movies with hardly no load time. Even though the app is free I still feel like it is a waste of money that is how poorly this app performs on the brand new iPhone XS max

title: Overall: Pretty Good
review:
It hasn’t given me any problems and it works pretty good. I might end up using it for a long time if it keeps up like how it is. Constructive Criticism: If they could fix the small amount of kids movies, that’d be ideal, but no other problems.

Also, if you want to watch an anime that’s great, Darling In The Franxx is a pretty good show. I recommend it. It does pass the 3-episode test even for me.

title: Eh
review: Too many commercials, not enough exclusive content, and very buggy. Continuous black buffering screen, no pic only audio, or show jumps for a few minutes and freezes if you go to home screen or another app like maps.  Majority of movies release the exact same day as prime (every new release...exact same day!) and if you have a tv provider then what really is the point besides the few original shows. I only use it because I travel a lot but it is always my last choice next to Netflix or prime, both without commercials... maybe Disney can fix these issues but until then 1 star.

title: Limited commercials is a bunch of BS!
review: On my plan on supposedly supposed to have limited commercials. But I’m only able to watch 2 minutes of the show and then I'm forced to watch 90 seconds of commercials up to 8 times in a 20 minute show. That’s more commercials than on actual tv!!! Are you kidding me?! And sometimes when the show is about to come back there’s some malfunction and the commercials start all over again. It’s ridiculous. This bug needs to be fixed and fast!! I am ambit paying for a subscription that makes false promises.

title: Doesn’t work half the time but still charged for it
review: Hasn’t worked right for the last 2 months even though I’m paying for it.. gonna cancel soon don’t waste your time. Trying to play through tv using iPhone the tv gets sound but no pic even though everything else works I’m on.. I want my money back for the last 2-3 months I’ve wasted on this crap.

title: Why have an account when I can’t even log in?
review: I know for sure that I have an account because it charges my card but I can’t get logged in. I forgot my password(which is surprising because I use the same few passwords for a few things) and I tried to do the reset link sent to email. I literally check all folders in my email and I know it’s the correct one because I put in my card number and it tells me that this email is the one used. I have not gotten a single email out of the dozen or so times I’ve tried to get a link sent... how do I cancel a subscription without having to log in??

title: Problem
review: So I love the app but when I watch a show or a movie it loads for 5 minuets then it plays for about 2 minuets and then it goes back to loading! Now I know what you are gonna say, “it’s your internet connection” but it’s not! How do I know that you ask, because I’m on my phones Data! And I’m being kicked out of my account all the time! All I’m asking is that if you could maybe please fix this problem or give me some help or advice on fixing the problem myself that would be great thanks!

title: Difficult to watch
review: This app seems to give me as much trouble as it possibly can whenever I want to sit down to watch something. It gives me errors, switches the profile on me suddenly, sometimes the audio will work but the screen is black until I start the whole episode over, told me there was an error with my account even though there isn’t, and sometimes when I open a show it just won’t load until I close the whole app and try again.

title: My Stuff Deleted !!!!! 😡
review: This is the second time this stupid app deleted my added stuff to the list, that needs to stop each and every time this app prompts to you re-log I’m using your email and password out of the blue at it deletes your entire list of shows you added to watch on the list... that’s so aggravating for at times some of these shows I’ve already watched a few episodes so now I need to go through the list as what I need to add and some I don’t remember and even have to go through finding which episodes I’ve already watch sigh ... for something I pay for a month it’s ridiculous.

title: Disappointing Redesign
review: Looks pretty but not user friendly. I used to be able to see “My List” of shows on any device/tv I was on easily — now that is gone so I have to search for the shows and apparently re-add them, am not sure if they have new episodes to watch or not, very frustrating and silly. What is the use of even having and managing a profile if you don’t share the watch list across devices.

title: More Options
review: After using this app for a year, I experienced so many bugs and errors. Give us a better experience with more options! If I have new profile that I didn’t want to have anymore… I should be able to delete that profile. For the help center and account information/ management, I shouldn’t have to go onto the website to find issues. Settings should give us information and customized controls to have a better experience within our profiles. For about, can there be tips on building a fun experience?

title: Irritating
review: I was in the middle of watching something and I ended up finishing the episode well the next one usually automatically starts but it wouldn’t so I clicked on it again and then it all of a sudden started acting really slow. I checked my other apps on my phone and they were perfectly fine. I closed out of the app and then went back in and it had logged me out. I went to log back in and it just keeps saying error. I then deleted the app and reinstalled it and when I went to go log in it still kept saying error.

title: Fix the play/pause function mid-show please
review: The play button doesn’t work when there’s a show going so I can’t cause it unless I exit the show. The fast forward button doesn’t work either. The rewind button does though and it’s extremely annoying. Please put the play/pause button back to the middle of the screen during a show, where it was before. It worked just fine.

title: Get a new designer
review: Just because you can do some web tricks with page flow doesn’t mean you should. The interface is now super clunky when looking through content, you see a VERY limited number of titles making it difficult to select what you want to be watching or even what is available.  Background images make text hard to see.  In short, everything you claim this interface will do to make it easier is a really bad assumption.  This is even worse on the Roku. Bite the bullet, dump the design and make a user friendly one that will actually accomplish what you thought this one would.

title: Way to many ads!!!
review: I got this app on my tv a while ago but yesterday I got it on my iPad because I wanted to watch some anime but omg it’s impossible to rewind or just watch one clip without AD!  AD! AD! AD! like come on, there not even short and it’s really annoying but I have to say I love this app for watching anime -.- and it is a really good app just pleasee! Less ads! Like I don’t need a million. This is still a really good app just to many ads like I say ;-;. Anyways that’s all I have to say and you did a great job making this app!

title: Shows
review: Okay, so I love this app! But it doesn’t keep updated! A week ago, and season premiere aired, and I’m DYING to see it! But you have to add the content! I’m checking DAILY! And I noticed they don’t even have all of season one!!! 😖😣Also, you have to get a more expensive membership in order to see any show I know well. I have to watch shows I don’t know, or old shows nobody watches anymore! Get better content! (Disney, Nickelodeon) +, the update did nothing!

title: Has a few good shows
review: However, there are the issues: The app randomly closes on you. You are assaulted by ads before throughout and after watching anything. It gives you a chance once in a blue moon to watch a 3 minute ad and skip ads for that episode which is excessive but at least you can do something productive quick, however it gives you like 3 seconds to decide on that hardly better option and it’s only an option sometimes instead of being able to set as a default.

title: Love it but I need one thing
review: I love Hulu....I just really wish I could mark an episode or series as watched or unwatched, I’m re watching the golden girls but some episodes start at the end which is like the last 15seconds. There are some other shows that show some episodes as unwatched which makes no sense cause I’ve watched them all......This feature would be nice cause then I could keep my shows up to date and re watch with ease, let me know if this ever changes I’ll happily change that to 5 stars <3

title: Requires to many updates and doesnt always cast
review: The app needs to may updates does not always cast and i have a google cast tv. Great u can download stuff On the new version. Its like this app has constant bugs. The version on ipad2(yes the old ipads) was much better and reliable.  When u add premium the entire library for example starz will not carry over and uhave to log into their app to get full access to library. If ur device is low on memory and gb space app has ability to crash constantly. Downloads dont wanna play off line always get an error.

title: Didappointed.
review: The volume adjust feature is not perfect. Most times when I attempt to decrease volume it increases instead. It will not decrease the volume until I first increase then try to decrease again for the second time. Also, if I attempt to read about a listing I do not have a current subscription to, then it won’t allow me to further read about the details of it. This is pretty obnoxious. As I would like to read about something before I decide to purchase it. Even if I am only viewing it through a phone. Something should be provided for possible subscription content.

title: No clock?
review: I just upgraded to the iPhone 11 Pro. Something that’s incredibly frustrating that I didn’t have a problem with on my previous phone is that when I tap once on screen, I get the regular pause, forward, backward details but I’m missing the clock and WiFi/connection signal? I like to double check to make sure I’m on WiFi when I’m streaming and also check the clock easily. It’s very frustrating that this simple feature is gone. Please bring it back.

title: To long of ads and way to many
review: I love this app soooooo much but I absolutely hate watching 80 second ads and there would also be like 6 ads In one episode It’s absolutely Insane you don’t need that many ads no ones gonna wanna watch anything on here If there’s that many ads like do one or two ads and make them like 7 seconds each like come on okay that’s It.🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

title: I like the app, but...
review:
Just in the past week or so (I assume after the last update), my app has been-
1. Keeping the bar up and open at the top, so I constantly see the time, battery percentage, etc. 
2. The feature that lets you double tap on either side of the screen to fast forward or rewind has stopped working. 
I know these are two minor things, but both things have made the app more annoying for me.

title: One MAJOR problem
review: I use this app a lot on my computer, and overall it’s a great app, but it’s honestly more like off-brand Netflix. It’s just not as good. It’s pumped with ads, with about 3-4 ad breaks that have 4 ads each time. When I’m trying to watch a 22 minute-long episode of a show, that means I only get about 5 and a half to 7 and a half minutes of showtime before another long ad break. FIX THIS it’s literally WORSE than regular cable tv!!!

title: Updates
review: I love the variety of shows and the quickness they are available to watch my only dislike is when they update the app seems to have issues with letting me know what I have in my que to watch. They use to go to the top when I had new episodes to watch now I have to sift through tons of shows to check if there is an episode to watch.

title: But the cheapest plan available
review: The content really isn’t that bad but they advertise a plan that says no ads and that is completely false advertising. 85 to 90% of the shows we watch have ads at the beginning middle and end. When you call customer service and ask them about it they say there’s nothing they can do because the network is still paying for ads. When I asked them why they still advertise as no ads they have no good answer. Get the cheapest one because there’s no point in upgrading to no ads.

title: Local channels tied to IP address
review:
Only complaint so far is that I cannot watch my NY based local channels (CBS, NBC, ABC) due to my ip address being based closer to Philadelphia.  I have tried to resolve this with information provided by your tech support with no success thus far.

Would be nice, if possible, to have a setting that would allow me to choose which region’s broadcast of these channels that I would prefer to watch.

title: Awesome!
review: The new update is AMAZING. FINALLY we can watch our shows without accidentally touching the screen & fast forwarding or rewinding the show. I’ve been waiting FOREVER for them to fix that so we can watch our shows perfectly fine & now we can. Good job guys, now i can watch my shows without doing anything accidentally cause now we have to press & hold the screen. 5 stars for me

title: Irritating and inferior
review:
Tells me I can’t fast forward through commercials though I pay for the commercial free version. I’m trying to skip the opening sequence and get on with the show. I shouldn’t be prevented from doing this. There’s also no option for skipping the intro automatically.

Please also get rid of these clips before shows which give us behind the scenes footage of the show we’re about to watch. I don’t want to see this every time I start an episode. I don’t want to be take out of the story and be reminded that these are actors. That’s why behind the scenes footage is optional everywhere else!

Come on.

title: Difficult ff and rr
review:
Full screen ff and rr is unnecessary and difficult. When I try to drag up my control center or drag down my notifications it always ff or rr the show, which is always inconvenient.
The is no stop in place for rr after ads. If I miss a tiny chunk just after ads I have to careful to not get to close to the ad break or I’ll have to sit through the ads again. There should be a stop in place that if I click the 10 sec back loop it’ll take me to the start of the show after the ads without making me sit through the ads again.

title: TERRIBLE app
review: The service itself is good enough, but each update makes the app less user-friendly and overall worse. The app has recently started giving fits like "too many videos playing" (even after I ensure the app has been stopped and completely closed out on all our other devices) and "connection error" (even if other apps on my device are having no problem). The worst is when the app toggles between these two problems in a seemingly never-ending loop. I'm starting to think that only getting to use the service part of the time somehow isn't worth paying full price.

title: Annoying
review: What is going on? It still shows all of the new shows at the top of my list and shows that they are unwatched. I have watched them I want them to go to the bottom of the list. Why is it still showing all of these new shows at the top of the list as being unwatched???  This is really annoying and needs to be fixed.

title: Nice app but some things need to improve
review: First I would like to say for my hero academia why do you put it in Japanese I think it would be better for season four so I can watch it and I think that instead of getting so much adds why not lower it down and make the no adds a bit more cheaper that’s all but the thing I want the most is for you guys to put in the English version of my hero academia if you do I might put in a 5 star rating I hope you do this and that’s all I’m asking for.

title: I love it, but...
review: For the past few months every commercial break the show will play 3-5 seconds of the show without audio then go to the commercial and then after the commercial break it will play the show but won’t show the 3-5 seconds it played without audio. Then if you try to rewind it to see what was said it just goes back to the commercial. I hope that makes sense. Other than that I love the app.

title: ADS ADS ADS ADS ADS ADS!
review: I love this site to death, but why do we need to pay for this and have an 80 second ad play every five seconds? Please, only put them at the beginning of the thing your watching and at the end, but NOT in the middle. Also, I’m constantly getting the same stupid, irrelevant and consistently annoying group of ads over and over again. Please, give us less ads during the Coronavirus pandemic.

title: FIX YOUR APP!
review: Two months now and the same issue. I renew my subscription through iTunes, they CHARGE ME but then it keeps saying I’m not subscribed on the app. Then I try refreshing the app, still doesn’t work. So I log out of the app and try to log back in and it tells me I’ve already purchased the subscription and I can’t move forward. I’ve tried using the “restore purchase” and it’s the same issue, my only solution is to purchase a higher subscription. That’s BS, and I got a feeling you guys glitch it on purpose! I would like a refund for the two months where I was FORCED to upgrade to just log back in.

title: Updated
review: This new update watching a movie/tv show from your phone is inconvenient. Now instead of pressing full screen and it remains it does not anymore! You can be watching something in full screen and suddenly you move your phone or it tilts just a smidge and it’s right back in the tiny screen again. Can we leave well enough alone please

title: Easy and reliable, a few issues
review: I enjoyed the app watching all my favorite tv and shows, but whenever a big moment happens, an ad plays, and sometimes I want to rewatch it, but I end up having to watch the whole ads all over again, and it a won’t go away. I think it would be convenient that after you watched the ads that it would disappear, but it’s mainly the only problem

title: Glad I tried it free first
review: This app is terrible. It is the 5th day out of the free week and it has been nothing but trouble. All but one movie I watched couldn’t play straight through. I had to close the app several times and restart the app and resume watching. Sometimes it would start where it stopped, but not always. The rewind/fast forward thing is a total mess. And no matter how many times I select a show/movie to be removed from my recommendations, the next day it is right back there. How many times can I say that I don’t want to watch freakin Twilight. Definitely won’t be paying for this app.

title: Yo many ads and super long
review: I like the shows and stuff but man, is so many ads I’m watching this show and it has 5 ads and they all were over a 100 seconds expect for 1 that was 45 seconds. I basically spend 8 minutes out of 30 minute show watching ads. You guys have to change that we paying for a reason. Be more like Netflix. Or DTV now that only shows ads if you watching live tv. Other thing is that you guys show sometimes the last seasons but not the starting ones so I’ve to start a show from season 5? really?

title: Chromecast
review: I almost solely use the app to cast shows. In the most recent update the chromecast portion was changed and now there doesn’t seem to be a way to change the volume so instead I have to switch to my google home app. My app will also crash with no warning and I close and restart it and it crashes again. Even after the newest update. The only way that I’ve found to fix it is to restart my phone.

title: Picture in a picture
review: I don't have any other problems with your new format but pLease bring picture in a picture back.  I like to multi task while watching my shows.  So a new update and still no pip.  Why not????  Another update and no PIP!!!!!!!!!!!  Please bring back picture in a picture!!!!!  Thank you... thank you... thank you.  You brought picture in a picture back.......

title: Fix your freaking app. Jesus.
review: I hate being that guy, but your app is too unique. There’s nothing wrong with at least being parallel with the bell curve off these show apps. By the way, you keep giving and taking away the ability to background play the videos. I used to be able to lock my phone, while the video plays audio only, as I sleep. Like having a TV on, except without any light in the room. It helps me sleep, and keeps my restless mind occupied, to help me sleep. So please, fix this. I’m not the only costumer bothered by this issue. Please, and thank you.

title: TERRIBLE!!!
review: I am all in to updates but this is a big step BACK!!! Before I was able to know right of the bat what I had in my watch list but now I can't know how many shows I have left until I go all the way into each one of them, and when ur all caught up it takes you all the way back to the first episode. All the tabs and headers are so small,,, plain and simple what ain't broke don't fix it.... they should have left it as it was.

title: Way to many commercials
