review: So I try to post a picture of how many seconds are in every commercial break and him many there are during a movie so you would believe me but it won’t let me. 11 plus commercial breaks and everyone of them are around 290 seconds each. I paid for no commercial thinking it would be better and hardly any shows have no commercial breaks.  It’s not worth it in my opinion, almost 5 minutes of commercial each time. Oh and you cannot fast forward though any of them, even if you pay for no commercial. I’ll be going back to regular cable.

title: Some good most bad
review: There are way to many ads if I wanted to watch ads I would just watch cable and there are not many episodes of some shows which is annoying because if I wanted to just watch some episodes I would just watch cable so this is so annoying if I have to pay for no ads then I can just go to Netflix and Disney plus but they don’t have the shows I was watching my favorite show and an ad came on the the theme song right after the song another ad came on which was very annoying

title: Unfortunately the only choice
review:
This app has absolutely horrendous user interface. No one wants to see a full screen art depiction of the series with only a play option readily available. We want options, lists, easily discernible choices and multiple titles under categories. 

The keep watching tab is entirely hidden. The titles you are currently watching only allow yuh to play the “next episode”, two screen strokes are required to see the season and episode lists. 

Pros: it works once you figure out how to navigate it’s clunky UI

title: Fine service, garbage app
review:
I’ve used this app on multiple iOS devices and on multiple WiFi sources, and it’s always riddled with an absurd amount of glitches. 

Roughly once every four times I try to click on something, the app fails to load and I have to close out of it and restart to get it working again.

There’s no “next episode” button in full screen, which is infuriating, since it means I have to go back to the main menu, scroll back down to the show I’m watching, and find the next episode every time.

title: Love it but..
review: No doubt I love the app, but there are issues with certain anime shows, such as, Naruto Shippuden where the english episode isn’t there on episode 141 ‘Truth’ and so on with the other episodes. If there is anything wrong with this situation please fix it. The show isn’t the same when listening to it in Japanese. Also check the show Boruto: Next Generations because i’m not sure if they have the english episodes or not. Thank you.

title: Playback errors screen freezes 🤯🤬🤬🤬
review: Lately on TV I can’t get through 10 minutes of any program without the screen freezing or a playback error message.  It’s incredibly frustrating and there are new updates like every other day.  Don’t get me wrong I appreciate that now I can see a TV guide schedule on the screen but if I can’t get through a 30 minute program without glitches and freezes and playback errors I could care less what comes on next.  Just saying.  If this doesn’t improve soon I’m out.

title: Not sure if it’s my phone company/plan or the app??
review: I only get to watch movies about maybe 1 week out of a whole month because the app won’t load movies. I know it’s “not connected to the internet” but I don’t understand why the internet & data from your phone isn’t good enough? But then again I’m not tech savvy. Other than that it’s a great price & I don’t mind the commercial breaks (if you fit enough movies/shows into the money it’s worth the money despite the commercials). Thanks!

title: What’s going on?
review: With this new update, things are going haywire! The app doesn’t seem to acknowledge that I’ve already watched an episode. It keeps saying that there are unpatched episodes that I’ve already viewed. And there are shows that I don’t have on my list, that continue to show up in My Stuff. I don’t know how to get rid of them. And what is the logic behind the algorithm that determines which show comes up next in my queue? It would be nice if it was something in My Stuff at least!

title: Complete garbage
review: I wish I hadn’t paid your company a dime. Your service is terrible, I pay to be able to watch the shows you provide, yet I get looped around, 40second ad followed by 90 second ads, followed my your garbage app not buffering the episode back up yet continuing to run the episode progression timer. Your settings are trash, why put an account tab in the app if I have to go to the website? You’re not providing the services I paid for and I want my 6$ back. Why pay for ads when I can pirate for free. And at least my pirates will buffer. 0/100 trash app, shame your even considered a rival to Netflix.

title: Swipe down feature
review: I hate the swipe down feature. There have been too many times that I accidentally close the video I’m watching because I tapped the screen to check the time. If I want to close the video I’ll tap the X in the corner. In my opinion the swipe down to close is not necessary, there should at least be an option to disable it. I don’t know if anyone else has this problem but I’m constantly getting error messages about the playback, but I know my WiFi is working correctly because if I open another streaming app there’s no issue so I don’t understand.

title: Great but....
review: I really love this streaming app! I use it all the time; more than I watch Netflix. But a few months ago this thing started happening. It would take a long time to load the tv shows I watch and/or wouldn’t even load at all. I would wait then it would say “error playing this video”. It will work sometimes after 5-6 tries of watching or it would work if I came back at a different time. Overall I love this app, it’s great, but it really needs improvements

title: Can’t rewind or fast forward
review: Since the new update, I’m unable to rewind or fast forward any shows. It says unable to during commercials. I don’t have commercials. This is something that needs to be fixed immediately, it’s very frustrating. Also, what happened to the ability to turn the volume up/down? That used to be an option before you switched to the new platform. I have to exit out of the app and open up Google Home to adjust the volume now. Netflix still has volume controls in the app.

title: So many issues
review: Half the time it won’t even let me log in to my account. It says there’s an issue with the connection or something. I try logging in to my account in the browser, it works.. so it’s just the app that’s the problem. Then, when I’m watching an episode of something, it will either keep playing the sound, but the picture will freeze or the sound turns off but the picture keeps going. In order to fix this, I have to quit out of the app all together and restart it. This is ridiculous.

title: Can’t see video but can hear audio
review:
I fail to understand how since you made the update changing the entire operating system this app has gotten worse and worse? Was it on purpose? who is in charge of these decisions a monkey? 
“In order to compete with Netflix, we are going to make our app even harder and more confusing to use with way more bugs!!”
“YUP SOUNDS LIKE A GREAT IDEA BOSS”
I have uninstalled and reinstalled. Logged out and back in, logged out then uninstalled then reinstalled and logged back in, reset iPhone multiple times. No matter what I can not see video when I watch a show or clip but I can hear the audio.

title: Major glitches/Awful layout
review: The layout of this app is horrible and not simple. And the fast forward rewind is glitchy and it takes forever to focus and not be glitchy. And I thought it was my internet connection or data, no my Netflix app works perfectly fine. And you can’t press play and listen to the show while your phone is locked, unlike Netflix where you can surf the web or other apps while listening. It just glitches up. And the layout of the app it’s self is awful makes you feel constricted and limited and I hate it. I miss the old set up. Hopefully they fix it.

title: New version is terrible!
review: I loved the old version so much better than this new update. When I am watching on my iPad and want to pause it, when I go to resume it, if I don't touch the play button right in the middle it will skip to where I touched. Why, why did you have to change something that worked great?? Also like someone else said, there is no picture in picture. You have to exit the app to do anything else. You'd think with the age of such a multitasking society they would have thought of this. I do like the flip tray, but that's about it. Nothing else about this new version is worth a crap!

title: Paying for this & there's WAY TOO MANY ADS!!!
review: I pay for several video content apps so I don't have to watch commercials and ads, this apps is cheap but in a 15-20 minute episode of a show I watch, there are 5 ADVERTISEMENTS that I INTERRUPT EVERY FEW MINUTES!!! Doesn't that kind of defeat the purpose of paying for a tv or movie app?!... They are making a ton of money off us but still are greedy enough to bombard their paying customers with ads!... Seriously annoying and frustrating. I'd rather BUY each season of my favorite shows at $20 per season then to pay for this crap to be riddled with advertisements...

title: Can’t search episodes DON’T UPDATE
review: DON’T UPDATE. By Reading other reviews and buy my problem, I am telling you there are really a lot of glitches with this new update. On mine I can’t go back to search episodes. It only let me resume the episode I’m on, but I want to watch a previous episode. I can’t find out how to go to back to view all episodes!! ALSO: they don’t let u see comments of what ur watching. I enjoyed reading the comments!

title: I’m not paying for extras
review: I pay $12 a month for the ad free plan. Why can’t I access everything!? Certain things I want to watch have a padlock by them that says some crap about watching with live tv or an add on or I get a message saying I can’t watch because I “don’t have the right subscription”. I  googled it, and according to my research y’all expect me to pay up to $10-$12 more dollars to unlock them. Seriously!? I’m not paying $22-$24 a month for an app that obviously doesn’t work half the time anyway. Y’all are trippin if you think people are that dumb. Fix it and I’ll fix my review!!

title: Glitches
review: The app has been messing up for a couple weeks now. It will randomly exit the app and then when I go to watch a show it shows more ads. The ads play fine, then when the show comes on, it glitches are takes a long time to load. I have reset my iPad, reset my router, and tested other apps. This is the only one I’m having trouble with. Please fix the issues, because I’m ready to cancel my subscription. Not worth watching just ads.

title: Horrible. Hope you didn’t want a easy deactivation.
review: They make it WAY too hard to cancel your membership. Can’t cancel it through the app, they make you go to the website on a computer to do it, it’s 2020, that’s ridiculous.i can’t even log in through the app to watch my shows cause an error message pops up. It’s been this way forever. I’ve been trying to cancel mine for awhile now but every single time I go to their website to my account page an error message shows up and I can’t get to the page to deactivate my account. So I guess I’m going to have to call them.

title: Install It Every Day and Enjoy!
review: It has great content and the live channel selection is well-priced vs. my comcast cable, which despite me paying $200 per month wouldn’t give me local channels on the app. The problem- live tv fails to work on my device at least once per day and the only way to fix it is delete and reinstall. Delete and reinstall. Delete and reinstall. Oh, and the other thing is really awful commercials. Maybe they will fix these things some day.

title: If I see one more ad.
review:
So, good app, i give you that. I can’t watch CSI Miami, with all these flipping ads! One suggestion is if you already watched the ad and want to go back, you shouldn’t have to watch the ad again. Second one is, make something FREE so we have the chance to NOT have ads or TO have ads. These ads are killing me! 90 to 80 SECONDS, I could do like 30 laps while this thing is on. Really expected NOT SO MANY ADS!! 3 one, TAKE AWAY THE ADS. { Sorry if it came out harsh, I’m just frustrated with the ads}

£ Millie~

title: Liked this app at first
review: Like the design and the layout. Works pretty well but there’s one thing. If you accidentally swipe to far it’ll close the player and if you open it right back up you have a 50/50 chance of it remembering you even watched it so it will start over but regardless it will play the rating clip and the provider clip every time no matter what. Really makes me mad every time it does it. I don’t mind it if I just started the episode/movie but if I close it for a millisecond then just let me keep watching and for the love of god remember where I stopped watching. It’s really bad at that.

title: Worst user interface and user experience for live TV
review: App is extremely frustrating to use. It’s really terrible on Samsung TVs and Apple TV; ok the iPad. It has two menus at the same time in two layers, impossible to navigate to where you need to be. Arranging your favorite channels the way you want is impossible. You have to leave the channel to go back to the menu or see what’s on other channels. App does not remember what you watched last. The Live TV is hard to navigate, the icons are tiny, I have no idea what channel I’m on, no preview. App is unnecessarily complex and exhausting with 100 different menus and unnecessary recommendations.

title: Not quite worth the money
review: Seriously disappointed, it went from being a great app to watch shows on and now it’s more commercials than anything unless you pay double for the no commercial option, which doesn’t even include every show they offer as a commercial free option. On top of that it’s the SAME commercials every single time. One 28 minute episode comes with about 5 minutes of commercials! It’s ridiculous and extremely frustrating and honestly not even worth watching anymore.

title: Please Fix
review:
Shows in my queue aren’t recognizing that they have been watched. When the show is opened, it will display ‘watched’ in every episode, but in the My Stuff menu the show will appear at the top with ‘32 unwatched.’
In addition, a show can be fully watched, but unless it is watched until the counter says 0:00 (which is nearly impossible because auto-play will start the next show), it will remain at the top of the My Stuff menu with the ‘Resume Episode’ action.

title: Can’t sign up
review: The app asked for information, I typed it in; however, it kept saying that the app has an error and I should try again later. So I did exactly what it asked, and tried again only to find out it still has an error and I should try again LATER. I submitted credit card information, email, and everything else this app needed, yet, why is it that I can never create my account on here? Doesn’t make sense that I can’t create an account here via the app (what is the point of even making an app if people can’t create their accounts on it?). Completely disappointed.

title: Different devices have different issues
review: I have issues with pausing shows on my iPad and iPhone. Most of the time I will try and pause and it will skip to a random part of the show. On my appletv the subtitles don’t stay on. I have to go in and turn them back on every. Single. Episode. This doesn’t happen with my iPad or my iPhone at all. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling the application but nothing has fixed it so far. Other than that, it works fine.

title: Glitch, Bug, Too many commercials
review: So I’m not here to complain about the commercials. I understand that they are necessary. I’m complaining about the 314 second commercials that I have to sit through only to be disappointed because the video paused won’t play ,and then puts me BACK to the beginning part of the tv show before the commercial began. Not only does it start that portion over, it turns it into a commercial so that I can’t fast forward. Now that is one cruel bug. This is so frustrating. I’ve been trying to watch a 1hour tv show for 2.5 hours! I just want to watch the end of The Librarians.

title: No mirroring and too many ads
review: The app doesn’t allow mirroring or airplay support. Every other streaming app lets you do this! Also, I don’t mind ads but they have too many ads and in the most horrible spots when watching episodes. Ad starts then you get to opening credits, then another ad right after. If you accidentally click out of a show your watching and go back and click resume be ready for....you guessed it, more ads! When an ad plays it’s usually 4 ads in a row and they buffer. How about just 1 ad when it plays. Fix these things then it would be 4 or 5 stars.

title: Terrible update
review: All the problems started happening a few weeks ago. The audio on the video will just shut off and you will have to restart the app just to get it working again. It will also just randomly fast forward through the episode for no reason and with the new way to go back and forward in the show or movie it's almost impossible for you to get back to where you were after this happens. Another issue is the captions almost never work. I'm very close to deleting this app and just using Netflix because it is so frustrating to use.

title: Canceling
review: I’ve had this app for a while and really enjoyed it until recently when they updated it. The fast forward without seeing where in the video is extremely annoying and if you touch the screen it moves your place in the video. I can deal with those issues but now the app isn’t letting me log in and it’s been a little over 3 days. I’ve tried all the tricks restarting my phone, deleting and reinstalling the app etc..I am disappointed with it and I’m just going to cancel my membership and delete because at this point it’s not worth being frustrated with.

title: Naruto
review: Ok for al my peeps who watch Naruto English dubbed, u would understand why I’m righting this review I hate that the English dub doesn’t go all the way to season nine and instead stops half way thru season 3 it’s dumb don’t get me wrong I think that it’s a great app but why put English dub at the beginning and not finish all the way thru doesn’t make sense I hope they fix this and if there is a way to watch Naruto English dub that doesn’t give you a virus or calls for a proscription then please tell me I would really enjoy!

title: Censor your commercials
review:
It’s really frustrating that when I am watching a cooking show with my five-year-old son I have to make him look away during commercials because there is a very provocative lingerie commercial that pops up and I do not want my five-year-old son to watch. can we please keep that for the adult channels like hbo starz and fx?  5 minute commercials is RIDICULOUS. Almost 3 hours to watch an hour and a half movie. $55 a both yo basically watch commercials. I am DOWNGRADING as soon as college football bowl games are over
 Also stop raising the prices!

title: Unsatisfied Customer
review: I’ve been on phone with Shantell for over 40 min in which the last 25 min I have asked for a supervisor still I’m holding she doesn’t keep in touch with me dead air is forEVER as she has NO CUSTOMER SERVICE ETIQUETTE!!! I am LIVID that she won’t transfer me and I have had this service for over 2 years I want answers and I shouldn’t be left just sitting on my phone with dead air as she keeps saying she’s emailing for help and they won’t allow her to transfer me till they say so WHO DOES THIS??? I pay $$$ for this service and EXPECT to get what I pay for without logging in EVERYTIME I want to watch my service this is RIDICULOUS

title: No stars
review: The app on the tv keeps crashing. I thought maybe it was my internet connection, but other friends n family members r having the same issue. N the app for iPad n phones is bad too, even though it gives u the option to have continuous play, it will go to the next episode but stop at the season cover pic n u have manually press play, doesn’t sound like continuous play to me. N now the app crashed on my ipad, its not playing anything. Wat a joke, that’s y ppl use illegal sites to stream because when u try n do it the right way, u get played out of ur money. Won’t be renewing my subscription.

title: Ads
review: The ads get annoying it’s like watching tv and commercials keep popping up during tv shows, I like to watch this series and when I play an episode there is an ad and most of the times it 90 seconds worth of ads🙄 and then after the intro of the show there is another 90 seconds and then in the middles more 90 seconds🙄

title: Great original shows keep me signed up and that’s it
review: Worst streaming app ever.  Controlling items in “my list” is a mess.  Constantly resetting itself and saying I have dozens of episodes to watch when I am completely caught up. Then items in my list won’t delete.  Also when first opening up for the day the live tv menu won’t load until the app is closed out and completely reset.  I have even had to delete and reload.  And commercial free option I pay for?  Can’t figure that out as all there are are constant repeating commercials.  Disappointed in what used to be a good app.

title: Dislike
review: The app randomly closes out during the middle of shows, and the ‘previously watched or continue watching’  and ‘up next’ are always doing something weird. I have a hard time finding my shows. It also NEVER remembers where I left off during a show and always takes me back to an earlier part of the episode (not a few seconds, like 10-20 minutes off of my previous ending spot), then of course it makes me endure ads to fast-forward back to the part of the show I was previously watching. I really hate this app. Very frustrating to use.

title: My Stuff
review:
Not sure if anyone else has reported this but when trying to remove shows from “My Stuff”, you go through all the steps but it still appears in your My Stuff area. 
Usually after I finish watching a series, I like to remove it from my stuff and keep what I’m currently watching. It would be nice if this bug could be fixed.

title: I can’t Log In
review: I already have a subscription but I can’t log in. Every time I try it tells me to upgrade my subscription to no ads and I really don’t wanna buy it. It tells me to go to restore purchases and when I do that it just tells me to renew subscription which just tells me to buy another plan and when ever I do that it tells me I already have a plan active. I don’t see anywhere that I can report this at so I’m just putting this here and I hope y’all can see it.

title: Unstable app
review:
This app is extremely unstable. I have to constantly restart my iPhone if I end an episode halfway through and want to restart it later. No matter what I try, the episode just won’t resume, and other episodes won’t start. Sometimes that doesn’t even work and I have to uninstall and reinstall the entire app. I have a new iPhone so it’s not a hardware issue! Other streaming apps are working great!  
Definitely do the free first month so if you have this problem, you don’t end up paying for an app you can’t use. I certainly will be cancelling. Too bad because the shows seem good!

title: No decent tech support
review: When a new buggy version comes out, you will waste your time with hapless tech support people who state they can’t here you regardless of the phone line you use and then hang up on you. Online support will tell you to use airplane mode even if you warn them you are on the device that is having issues. Or they will claim you have low bandwidth even though you are connecting via safari through twitter and independent apps show you have sufficient bandwidth. Never dealt with a worse set of tech support staff. Service is fine when it works. Have Netflix as a backup.

title: The worst....
review: Started about 4 days ago, and am extremely disappointed. First off, I was shocked that I would have to watch 2-3 minutes of ads just to watch 5-7 minutes and then watch some more ads. Seems way too much.  Also on the forth day, it wouldn’t even let me watch the series I’m on. Keep saying try something different or come back later to watch. Really!!! Lastly there layout for the app and website aren’t the greatest. Not easy to navigate or find specific things that you want. Don’t waste your time. Cancelling my subscription as soon as I’m done with this.

title: Not recognizing & to many ads
review: First, for some reason when I’m home it will not recognize my device, it will log me in then tell me sorry something is wrong with internet connection. I check my WiFi, turn the phone off, even re downloaded the app, still will not let me access it. Now it’s saying “nothing here to see”. I pay for this because some of these shows are not on Netflix, If the problems continue I’ll just unsubscribe. 2nd: To many ADs. I have memorized the ads that continue to play over and over. It’s ridiculous!! Not worth the money I’m paying for sure.

title: Awesome...better than cable
review:
Love the new design!  

It’s as good as Netflix for function except you can’t search by actor.  Love the set up, could be better, but really, I like it!  So much better than cable and no commercials!

Wish they had MASH, all seasons of Charles in Charge, Family Ties, and Facts of Life.  Can’t fault the actual app for that there is some sort of legal thing.  If you email them, they respond!

title: Very nice app, but shrinks video down on iPhone X
review: App works very well and I’m loving the content, but the viewing experience on an iPhone X is pretty bad. The app itself is updated for the iPhone X and fills the entire screen, but for some reason, the videos shrink down to smaller than my iPhone 6 screen! There is black screen on all 4 sides of the video. The left and right black screen is bigger than ½” on both sides! Will gladly update to 5 Stars when fixed. Btw, the fast forward and rewind isn’t that bad.

title: Worst app available
review: Non user friendly, always losing my settings, new episodes are available but does not show up in my “my stuff” with the new episodes. Sometimes it will not play when I have to search the show, to watch the new episode (its not the coming soon, or whatever its called). Last night we could not watch any of our shows, it kept saying we were out of our area, or region. I was at the same darn place I always am! Absolutely terrible update, bring back the old app,  it was simple and brilliant!

title: Unable to connect to Chromecast to TV from my phone now
review:
I liked the old version better.
I could push the connect icon and it would turn the tv on and all I had to do was select what I wanted to watch.  I can’t do that now!!!  I will not update my iPad because of this!  You all need to put that back!!  Really not happy about that at all.  This last update was NOT FOR THE BETTER!!

title: I have some complaints
review: When I’m watching a show it sometimes starts at the end of the episodes. Like when I’m watching a cartoon I only watched two episodes and when I go on to the next episodes it play the end of the it. Also when I have captions on it likes to keep the same caption there for the rest of the episode. Those were my complaints I hope these glitches stop soon.

title: Downloads
review: I’m honestly disappointed only because I downloaded this app specifically to download stuff and be able to watch it when I’m not online. But the issue is that nothing downloads without having to sit in the app and wait for it to download. Multiple times I’ve started downloads and then left the app because I had other things to do and then came back to check, and there was zero progress. Quite disappointing.

title: Same problem for multiple people
review:
So I’m with a group deployed, and all of us have the same problem.  When we try to watch a show, after one episode finishes, the next one refuses to play. It takes so many tries to get to play one video that we get frustrated and find somewhere else to watch shows and movies. 

When it does work it can be frustrating that there’s no intro and end credit auto skip. But mainly it’s the first problem.

title: Good but there’s an annoying problem
review: Has a great selection of shows and a good system but is horrible in letting you know what is new. I am a big fan of anime and I had no idea that new anime was being aired, and I had no way of knowing what was even available. The new design makes it hard to watch shows I enjoy and impossible to start shows I might enjoy. There are also a variety of annoying bugs and glitches. Great app but horrible design and bad changes.

title: Commercials are terrible
review:
Shows are good, format is terrible. There used to be just commercials at the beginning, now they’re throughout, feels like watching regular tv, only more annoying, because it’s the same commercials that run each time!  

The FF & RW features need work, too. When manually moving the bar, I can’t tell where I am at in the show without stopping and waiting for it to load. I’ll cancel again after I’ve watched the couple shows I like.

title: The functionality of the iPad app has issues.
review: Swiping down while watching a video should not be a gesture to go back. I often find myself swiping away a smudge on the screen and accidentally taking myself out of the video and then re-entering it makes me watch advertisements again after watching a commercial break. Using Bluetooth also causes the app to crash if the Bluetooth device disconnects for any moment of time. I've often needed to restart my device in order to resume viewing.

title: Commercials commercials commercials
review:
When I first got a subscription. My commercial time was at most 160 minutes and not as often. Now all of a sudden they range quite often at 300+ minutes. It seems that they are trying to get you to pay more to get rid of all the commercials. Very frustrating. It almost makes you want to go back to dare I say cable or satellite TV. At least on there it was easier to set them up to record and watch later. That way you can fast forward through commercials.
I know you’re able to do that on here. But it is a pain

title: Easy to use app
review: Easy to access show I’d been watching without having search up where I last left off. Just open the app, conect to the correct display, press “keep watching” and enjoy! Could pause or fast forward using the app while still using your phone. Many different cool attributes like favorite list, popular list etc...

title: Why am I even paying for this??
review: There are so many glitches it almost makes it not worth it to pay for a subscription. I’ve gone days without being able to use this app because of a subtitle glitch or I just get a blank screen for forever before my video starts playing. No in-app help because I have to go online to the FAQ or anything which is extremely annoying and even then I get little to no answers for any malfunctions. Get it together honestly because if there are this many problems my money and other consumers money could be used elsewhere. -_-

title: Waste of Money
review: This app is absolutely abhorrent. The fast forward and rewind features are so poorly placed it interferes with other functions on the app. When using it on a IPAD it automatically places you into partial picture mode which in order to get out of you have to constantly tap on an ill placed icon to expand to full portrait mode. Content added to your watch list is not consistently updated and it will show in your list as never having watched any of the episodes at all. This has been been a chronic problem for at least a year that I am aware of. Netflix here I come

title: So worth it
review: This review is for anybody who is thinking about getting rid of cable, let me tell you it was definitely worth it I bought myself a smart TV and got the same sports channel junkie that I am all for 40 bucks a month. I get all the UFCMMA boxing basketball baseball ESPN fox fox TV fox news. I could watch it on my phone I can watch on my iPad I could watch on the TV. very happy with this purchase.

title: Internet connection error
review: The app is so frustrating, there is a new issue every time that I try to use it. The last few times it has not let me watch anything because it says there is an error with my internet connection. I am always on WiFi and everything else that I use works just fine, and never has internet issues. It will not let me watch anything, and I have deleted and re-downloaded the app multiple times and even shut my phone all the way off and still nothing.

title: About dragon ball super and dragon ball Kia
review: I don’t  why I need live tv to watch dragon ball super and dragon ball Kia it makes no sense and it hurts me as a dragon ball fan. I love dragon ball z and it hurts me that I need live tv to watch  it. Not also with dragon ball super and dragon ball Kia but a lot of other shows. Please get rid of live tv and the app will be soooo much better. The fact that I need live tv to watch something pisses me off so much. Please get rid of live tv.

title: Pretty good
review:
When I first got it the only thing I did not like was that you had to pay to watch shows on their but otherwise. It keeps track of what you watch and give you ideas of what other thing you may like. Also if you love anime they have tons. So if you like watching shows anywhere you can get this! 

Person out!

title: Why I live this app and why I don’t
review: One of the reasons why I am in ❤️love with this app is because it has almost all of the Nickelodeon shows. When I heard about the update I thought there were going to be new episodes however there were not which really disappointed me and my sibling ☹️🙁😞😕💔💔💔💔💔💔. I really hope 🙏🙏🙏🙏 that you guys read this and add new episodes especially to The Thundermans, Jersey shoes, and all the others Bye 👋 love y’all!

title: Poor design choices in the rewrite
review:
I cannot believe how poor the new interface is. Was this even tested outside of the designers? The layout is just painful to navigate and they put the same interface on the Roku app as well so I am screwed there, too.

* Why couldn't My List just carry over? Instead I have to fill out a survey where I thought I was training it on what I like but no, it put all of it in My Stuff (dumb name btw) so I had to remove everything I had already watched.

* In My Stuff all the episodes I ever watched for a moment but didn't finish show up at the top of the list. I now have to scroll down a long ways before I get to anything I haven't started yet.

* I don't like the side scroll between genres, the old style felt more natural (even if I might get used to the new UI eventually). I don't need ginormous thumbnails for everything, I would rather have smaller thumbs and fit three or four across.

title: Constantly Restarts Episodes
review: The app constantly will restart an episode while you are watching it. The character will be saying something and all of a sudden the episode just begins from the beginning again. It doesn’t even save your progress in the episode so then you have to try and find where you were all while having to rewatch every single ad. The only reason this isn’t a 1 star review is because they have a picture in picture button and it works within the app.

title: Rewinding
review: I shouldn’t have to rewind every episode every time I want to rewatch something. If I watched all of the episodes, it should automatically reset each episode so that I can start at the beginning when I want. If you want to be even better than that, I suggest adding a shuffle feature to your episodes so that way people could have options on how they want to watch their televisions.

title: UI needs some work
review: I like the app it’s got good variety but when want to log in on my laptop or my new smart tv I have to log into a computer and mage my account just to get the email it’s connected to I can’t even look at my email on the app it’s ridiculous. Why have the account tab in the app if it’s just tells you to go online I get that to manage the account you have to do that but why can you have the basic info there so we don’t have to get a laptop just to see what email the account is attached to

title: Could be better.
review: I can’t even tell you how many times this app has skipped ahead in a tv series and ruined the surprise of the final moments of an episode or finale for me. It doesn’t seem to play at the previous spot that I watched an episode or it will skip to the next one I haven’t even started. It’s very frustrating. I also do not particularly like the fast forward/rewind feature by doing any area in the screen and dragging it. It’s touchy and usually happens by accident.

title: Issue with the voice and shows staying in sync
review: For the past week on almost every show that I watch I run into the same issue. Eventually there will be like a skip in the film that I am watching and then the voices come back delayed. I have stopped and started the shows back several times to fix the issue on a temporary basis but it ends up doing it again in no time. It’s really annoying. Is there a fix to this?

title: Horrible interface
review: If you like tiny white fonts on a light tan background, this is the app for you! If you want to squint at tiny words with no ability to change font sizes or zoom you’ll love this gem! If you like clicking on menu items that don’t do anything, download this app! So many violations of really basic User Interface guidelines. Some features can’t be performed through the app, they refer you to the website instead. Could you perhaps provide a LINK to that webpage? No, just a vague reference please. If you designed this app for a class project, you would have failed.

title: Commercials, poor interface
review: You pay for the service, yet you still have to see the same commercials over and over. Plus, the interface is so “streamlined” that you don’t have easy access to either your own stuff or to the large options available if you only know how to search for them.  I gave it 3 stars because it’s still the best way to watch certain shows on the internet that are also still on air.

title: Too Many Ads
review: Too many ads, I’m not gonna pay more for ad free. I should at least be able to watch 5 minutes without a 90 second ad. Every 5 minutes a 90 second ad makes a show that I wanted to see go from 55 minutes to 1h 10 minutes adding 15 minutes in ads. Actual math by the way and it’s ridiculous. I’m not saying the ads are the worst thing, it’s the frequency of them and how long they are. At least a 60 second ad every 5 minutes or even the 90 second ads every 10 or so. It could just be me but hey it’s unacceptable from a customer standpoint.

title: Chromecast issue
review: It won't let me fast forward/rewind while I have it connected to Chromecast, which is extremely annoying because it also doesn't have an option to skip intros or go to the next episode. It's also very buggy, and often it won't even allow me to fullscreen the video while watching it on my phone. Makes me close out of the app and restart it. Good content though, would just like to be able to watch it seamlessly.

title: Better but still needs work
review:
Really like the redesign. Having a real TVguide feels much more comfortable.
 But: 
- where is the volume button? 
- clicking “live”  when you’re already watching live tv stops what you’re watching ...to play what you’re already watching. It feels like it would be more intuitive if it just went to the live page/tv guide on the app if you’re already watching live tv.

title: Need help
review: Okay so I wasn’t having troubles with this app until a couple of days ago it worked fine nothing was wrong with it and then when I went to go and watch something it wouldn’t play the video. Everything else has been working but when I want to watch a video it just doesn’t start. The screen shows up with the play button and the forward and rewind button are there but when I press play the screen just stays black! PLEASE HELP ME UNDERSTAND!!

title: Terrible
review: Most of the time the show starts without sound, or sound with no picture.  During the first commercial break it just stops and shuts down.  I restart and have to watch the first act again.  Sometimes it will just continue to the end of the show, but more often than not, it shuts down again.

title: Lineup is the worse
review: I think you guys should go back to your old simple layout why do I constantly have to type search the shows I literally watch everyday! Shows that I always watch literally disappear from my watch next! Lineup feature is the worse non of those things are things I want to watch

title: Wanted to like it-ended up hating it
review: Save yourself the frustration of the live tv and stick with the cheap plans if you want the content (which is the only good thing about this app). You will spend way too much time trying to figure out where you are in the app than watching. If the developers had stuck with a format -grid- that people are used to this may have been the answer to cable. Instead its just a waste of time because of some geeks wild idea of being different. Maybe I'll come back when they fire them and realize what people want and redesign this stupid format.

title: Mostly you don’t post for a little kids
review: I don’t like how you do not post for the kids because my little sister doesn’t like that she has been watching Steven universe and that’s her favorite show and it ended maybe you should put all the seasons because it’s not fair for little kids to have bad movies in bad shows I have seen what they have for a little kid you should put more things just saying

title: Doesn’t save your place
review: Every time I come back to the app my movies and tv shows are not where I left them. I have to fast forward to find where I was. You can’t skip fast forwarding through the commercials when you get to one you still have to watch it. What’s the point of paying for commercial free if you still have to watch them while you are trying to find your place in your movie if you fast forward past those commercial breaks they stack. When you finally find where you were you have to watch 10 minutes of commercials

title: Horrible
review: The only good thing about this app is maybe the selection, if that. If I’m already paying for a plan why should I have to upgrade just to remove ads. The ads make it impossible to watch shows because they are frequent 1.20 sec ads, which is absolutely ridiculous!! The overall setup of the apps is also horrible. I also don’t enjoy the whole situation where if u already watched an add but want to go back before that add you have to watch the ad again. I do not recommend this app.  Maybe become like Netflix and I’ll subscribe again.

title: Ted talk
review: They review movies and tv shows faster than Netflix but you have to sit through 80 second ads. I pay money every month to watch it and every 15 minutes I have to watch commercials. I’d rather spend more money on Netflix and not have to watch commercials it’s bs. The app itself is hard to navigate. Keep in mind I’m not an 80 year old man who thinks floppy disks and cup holders are the same thing. I’m 16 and pretty tech savvy and I have a hard time navigating it. If you rewind you have to watch an 80 second ad again. It shouldn’t take me an 50 minutes to watch a 30 minute episode.

title: Great selection, but
review: This app has an enormous range of shows and movies, but the app is riddled in technical problems. Every time I try to go on to the next episode of a show it had an error message that makes me restart the app. It's super annoying, also I have had some audio issues in the app, but those weren't permanent, sometimes the things I'm watching just freeze and I have to restart the app. I hope the developers fix these issues soon.

title: Good app
review: Good app. Some people may not like the new design and I think that there should be an option to toggle between the two. This app is great and most of the negative reviews I believe are from previous versions. It doesn’t crash at all in recent updates due to the fact that this app is updated frequently. Overall this app deserves 4.5 stars

title: Just one complaint
review: Mostly good, it’s got a lot of movie and show options that Netflix doesn’t. My main complaint is how touchy it is; if you accidentally touch the screen the wrong way, it will skip back in the video, and when you try to return to the spot you were watching, it’ll make you sit through all the commercials you already passed through. Other than that, a good app!

title: Don’t do it
review: I downloaded the app and they charged me for the subscription right away but it won’t even load anything “it says we’re having trouble loading this right now” tried to cancel the subscription and it doesn’t expire till next month. I want a refund I’m not going to watch it for one month since it won’t even let me watch it when I barely downloaded it. Even deleted the app and re-downloaded, even restarted my iPhone and same error “we’re having trouble downloading your line up” it’s ridiculous get Netflix I also heard directv is having a sale.

title: The best app but just two things
review:
First thing: can you please add a skip intro and recap button that would be really awesome if you can though.

Second thing: can you make the quality just a little better to make it more clearer because I watch anime and I watch it full screen and it’s a little blurry so that would be better thx. (yes I know I’m a weeb)

title: Terrible Navigation
review: Two stars only because it does actually play shows.  Finding the shows is terrible.  Recently watched or things on “my list” or whatever it’s called are no where to be found.  The shows that do show up in the list are out dated and I can’t get rid of them even though they are gone when I watch in our appletv.  I also don’t want a show to take up an entire page when I’m trying to browse.  Only being able to see one at a time really slows down the process.

title: Chromecast Connection
review: Establishing a connection to Chromecast is spotty. In order to connect you have to try repeatedly, sometimes three or four times. In other situations you have to delete the app and re-download from the App Store before it will work. This just started happening a few weeks ago. It is not related to the network connection as suggested in the FAQs because other apps that use Chromecast or able to connect fine. Having to re-download the app every time you want to see something is unacceptable.

title: End of episode "next up" options
review: Like the app, like the new feature for holding down slightly to rewind or fast forward. I have no more accidental jumps when I'm watching on my phone. I just wish the whole screen wasn't taken up by suggestions for what to watch next because it cuts off the ends of my episodes. I can't see what's going on because there is no way to minimize the platform. Helpful stuff, just needs to be able toggle on and off

title: Closing out on its own
review: I haven’t had any issues with the app until today when they updated it. I was watching my show and it closed out and took me to my home screen on my phone. I restarted the app and turned on my show and it happened again and again. I updated it and then it happened again. Idk if it’s the update or what. I’ll try deleting it and reinstalling.

title: App won’t open
review:
UPDATE: I tried a few hours later and was able to open the app without it crashing. After signing in I got an email that I was using a new device even though I was using it on this device yesterday. 

After updating to the latest version the app won’t open anymore. I have tried deleting and reinstalling, rebooting my phone, but still no luck.

title: Unwatched Episodes
review: Since the update, all my shows in “my stuff” have changed to show that I haven’t watched them, when I have. For example, when looking at all my shows, SVU says 376 unwatched and Grey’s Anatomy says 17 unwatched, but when I open the shows themselves, they all show that I’ve watched the episodes. I’d like that fixed so I can actually know what shows have new episodes that are actually unwatched.

title: Unable to delete show in Keep Watching
review:
Very frustrating that I am unable to delete a series (The View) from my Keep Watching category.  There is no way to remove/delete this. I click on Remove....it reappears 5 minutes later. I don’t even watch this show!
 I’ve phoned customer support twice already...they see the problem...say they’ll refer out... but nothing has changed.

Yes, I’ve removed, then reinstalled the App...waited for a few days...but problem still persists.
   Very frustrating to pay monthly charges when you are having troubles with service.

title: Older device? Expect frustration.
review: Usually get an "error playing this video" message when I try to watch anything. Sometimes it works, but usually it does not. And I'm paying something like $80/month, with the local channels and HBO/Showtime. Rebooted iPad (4th gen), reinstalled app from app store.. no change. Can play fine through the web, just not on the device anymore. No info on site about device compatibility that I could find, nothing addressing this issue. If it's no longer compatible, then fine, but if so then why is the broken app still available?

title: Amazing!
review: I don’t tend to write reviews but I had to. The costumer service is amazing. They will help you and they don’t make things complicated or make you feel stupid for asking question. I really enjoyed the feature of messaging help and how quick it was. The shows are amazing and for only $5.99 a month with very few commercials it’s an amazing deal!

title: Horrible
review: Recently downloaded the app. Now, it continues to send a message saying check your internet connection. My internet connection is absolutely fine, I can’t watch any shows. I decided to restart my phone, and enemy a step further and uninstalled then reinstalled the app. Same problem. I can’t watch anything and I’m frustrated!

title: Too many steps
review: I hate that when you choose to watch something it defaults to this random screen where your show is tiny in the corner and there’s all this extra biz they want you to look at instead? Then i gotta surgically touch the little expand button, AFTER I chose to view a thing. When I press play I expect the video to go full screen right away. Stop throwing up these obstacles to watching stuff. I dont care about that supplemental info!

title: Time travel
review: It is far too easy with the new version of the app to accidentally jump to another part of the show (or whatever you are watching). Any swipe on the screen takes you to a different time stamp. Please make only certain parts of the screen, like the timeline bar, take you to different places I. The show.

title: Crashes/locks up constantly
review:
It seems like the quality of the app is going downhill. I didn’t used to have all these crashes. Sometimes the episode will keep playing (I can hear the audio) but there is no video displayed or controls. All other functions stop working and I have to force close the app. Other times it just decides it’s done working for the day and won’t play anything. Again, have to force close it.

I’m watching your new show Casual but so far I’ve had to close and re-open the app four times and I’m only three episodes in!! Very frustrating.

title: My videos started playing in a different language!
review: I was watching my shows all in English and for some reason everything started playing in a different language . I checked the settings and I closed and opened up my app and tried the same show and a different one and it doesn’t go back to English! I even turned off my device and did the same thing . I really liked this app before this started happening to my videos

title: Fix the fast forward and rewind...
review: This has been on your reviews for so long. I enjoy your service, but this aspect of your app is so aggravating. You’ve been receiving low star rating forever because of this, so I can only assume you are leaving it for the monetary value of me watching 80 seconds of ads simply so I can click back to the original place I never wanted to leave.  My guess is it’s due to the focused viewer that you get as a result of this idiotic interface, because I’m forced to sit and watch the ads somewhat actively so I can get the show back to the correct location.

title: Pretty solid app
review: It’s really well optimized, hasn’t crashed once. Everything is placed where you can see it, and it’s on top of it’s game when it comes to airing recently released shows. I’m currently binging GoT and my only complaint is that the prices are too high. Seriously, 27 bucks might not sound like a lot but it is. Which is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. If you can afford it, I’d get it in a heartbeat.

title: Missing a lot of options found on other apps
review:
If you are watching a series when one episode ends the next one automatically starts. You should have the option of not making that happen.
Other apps can skip the opening credits for a tv series.
Other apps have previous and next episode buttons on the viewing screen (when you touch it).

It’s a very basic player and needs to catch up

title: Naruto
review: On Naruto Shippuden, about 140 episodes in it changed from dub to sub which makes the show harder to enjoy. Also I got on to watch some Naruto and the subtitles have been very slow and doesn’t come fast enough to match when the characters start talking. Also your paying to watch shows but still get ads, one or two ads in a show are reasonable but there are 4-5 every episode I watch. Overall my experience hasn’t been too good.

title: Everytime
review: It’s a decent app. Wonky at times but not that bad. Good alternative to Netflix sometimes. However, everytime I try and watch something I have to restart it at least 15 times to even work. It’ll always pop up telling me RUNUNKWN which is completely bs. I turn my vpn off, I make sure the app is updated, I restart my device and the app and it happens. Every. Single. Time. Plus I pay for no ads, but if I’m already paying for the service why should I pay extra for no ads. Just seems stupid.

title: More ads than shows
review: Pathetic. I’ve spent a long time looking for the right word, and finally found it. This worthless, unreliable service literally does nothing but stop you from watching your shows by inundating you with endless, awful, obnoxious advertising. For every 30 seconds of content, you will be forced to sit through 90 seconds of ads. It’s like normal television, except much much worse, and btw you have to pay for it. Worst service, worst streaming, worst reliability, worst everything by a long song. everyone in charge of this nightmare should be fired.

title: Decent selection...buggy app
review: I’ve found that the app will do this thing where if I choose the option to watch the next episode without watching the credits the entire way through, it’ll start you back to the beginning of that episode at random. I’m on season 2 of a show and it just took me from the end of S2E4 to S1E6. It does this on all the shows I watch and it’s a VERY annoying bug especially because you get trapped into an ad with no way out before you can do anything.

title: Randomly shuts off...
review: It was working fine but now it randomly shuts off after 5 to 60 seconds of watching. If turned on the side, it shuts down within 3 seconds. In love watching but can’t as I can get the app to stay open long enough to watch. Also restarts 3-5 minutes prior to where you left off, so it takes awhile to get back to your spot using the 30 second fast forward button. I really did like it previous to these issues. I have tried restarting and reinstalling...

title: Doesn’t even work
review: iphone 8s plus, app won’t let me log in. I enter email and password and it simply asks if i would like to (re)subscribe - hitting no logs me out, hitting yes has me fill out my billing info pick a plan and then tells me i already have that plan and i should restore the purchase. I restore the purchase and it says “purchase restored, you will now finish creating your account”. I re enter all my info and it says you already have an account at this email address. So i try to log in and it asks if i would like to (re)subscribe. It’s a broken app and they wasted my time.

title: TERRIBLE
review: Im not one to bs about apps but this one deserves it. I paid for the no commercial package but yet some shows still have ads and they aren’t just 30 seconds long, they’re 90 seconds long and thats not all after only having the app for 3 days i tried to start up my show but i got an error, I went online to search for a solution but apparently the problem is on hulu’s end and I cant do nothing about but just wait until it gets resolved. I have never seen a company so big and popular be so uncoordinated, sloppy, misleading and unprofessional it just embarrassing

title: Confused
review: Okay so I usually love this app but my subscription ended and I let it go on hold on its own but I just put more money on my iTunes and updated my subscription for the $11 one and now it won’t work :( it keeps saying it had trouble changing me but I just put $15 on my card so I had $18 all together from the money left on my account before but it charged my account $11 and it still isn’t working. :( is there any way to fix this problem ?

title: Auto play not working and other issues
review: Auto play no longer works for most of my frequently watched shows on my iPad Pro. There’s also a show “stuck” in my Keep Watching list. I haven’t watched a single episode of the series in months and remove it daily with no success. My Keep Watching list also clears itself quite frequently (with exception of that one show) and adds random shows that I haven’t been viewing.

title: The app needs an update because it does not want to play videos
review: I’ve been trying to watch my shows for 2 days and it has not been working I literally tried everything turning my phone on and off deleting the app .. you name it I did it and it still does not work and the app is fully up to date ‼️ this really needs to change because I use this app everyday idk if y’all need to give another update but I need the app to work

title: Overall good
review: The app itself is very user friendly and is mostly everything you’d want. The problem is with the Live TV. It needs to be more customizable, I hate how it defaults to showing your recent channels in the guide. I just want it to go to all channels. Just add an option to choose what “guide” you want to default to, like sports, favorites, recent, all, etc.. Other than that the app works good and is generally nice.

title: Controls are frozen when watching a video vertically
review: Ever since updating to iOS 12.1.1 the controls stop working when you have the phone vertical. It works at first but when you leave the app and come back to it the settings control and the button to play the video in landscape are frozen.

title: Awful
review: Tried logging in and starting a free trial just to watch the newest episode of greys anatomy and it wasn’t working on my laptop. Every time I clicked “start free trial” the website would crash and say error. So I downloaded the app on my phone and it said I started my free trial and my iTunes account would be charged in one month after the trial ends. Now I can’t log in at all. I really just want to cancel everything but I can’t log in at all to cancel it. Going to be pretty mad if my iTunes gets charged for something I can’t even use because the website/app doesn’t work.

title: These ads gotta chill
review: I have a huge problem with the ads. I don’t mind them that much. However I do have a problem when I would be watching a show. Something in the show would happen before the ad, but whenever I would want to watch that certain part again. I’d rewind back to that part and the same ad/ads would appear again without an option for me to skip. I’d expect the ad to disappear after watching it.

title: Hate hate hate
review: The interface is such a waste of space and data, just go back to normal please. When I try to tap the ten second rewind it is constantly moving the playback allllllll the way back to where I’m technically tapping on the timeline! And then guess what I have to watch the freaking commercials I just watched. So frustrating. Please put the play, rewind and fast forward controls on their own bar!

title: Ok, not great
review: The services are fairly valued for channels for the money however the interface is poor, (there is no one place to see all channels and what is on them) and the live rewind/fast forward buttons are extremely difficult to use (can’t fast forward or rewind through commercials, making it almost impossible to either rewind to an important part to see again or to get up to near live if a commercial is in the way). These are 2 pretty big flaws and why I will be looking at competitors.

title: Awful UX
review: They must have had the interns design and develop this app. When I select a show to watch it gives me an unexpected error and it won’t load. It will not show all of my favorite shows or ones that I’ve been watching recently in the “My Stuff” section; it literally decided what to show me there at random, prioritizing shows that I haven’t watched in forever over shows that I am currently watching every day (logic!). It’s such terrible user experience that I really don’t understand what they are basing their expensive pricing on. This is definitely not premium service.

title: Won’t save my place
review: The past few days I will be watching a show and when I pause it and come back later to finish the show it will play from the beginning instead of where I saved it. Though when looking at the episode picture it would show that I have stopped midway while watching. When trying to contact support, there was no location to do so on the website. I love the app to be able to follow and track my shows, but very disappointed with these issues. I have tried deleting and redownloading the app. Using it on my iPad.

title: Having trouble loading my lineup?! Really?!
review: Aside from the rewind/fast-forward problem, this app has worked perfectly fine. But now, all of a sudden, every single time i open the app it tells me that it’s “having trouble loading my lineup, check your internet.” There is nothing wrong with my internet because if there was I wouldn’t be writing this review right now. I’ve tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app 3 times and it’s still saying the same thing. I don’t know what yall did, but you need to fix it and fix it quickly or i’m canceling my subscription.

title: Phone app hasn’t worked in 3 days
review: I’ve troubleshooted with my phone turning it on and off. Checked WiFi and data connection it’s nothing to do with that. I’ve also tried while logged onto tv and while not logged onto tv. Idkwhat the problem is but every time I go to open it, it stalls for a min and then completely closes. It does not give me an explanation or prompt me to do anything just closes. I wasn’t going to complain. Was waiting for it to work itself out but after 3 days I’m a little frustrated.

title: One problem
review: I love The App It’s super useful! But one problem, I’m a Weeb so I like to watch anime, I’m from Arizona and I speak English and so I watch dubbed anime. So when I saw the dubbed episodes I got super excited, but the anime I really wanna watch diabolik lovers is all subtitles and they go to fast for me to read, and I know there’s a dubbed version cause my friends played it. So could you please put out dubbed anime series’s it would really help if you did!

title: Frustrated
review: Sometimes I wonder why? I'm paying actually $$$ for this ... it's been a pain lately ...with the constant rewinding and fast forwarding if I graze the screen ..buffering ...when my signal is fine ...now it won't even load .. finally got something to come up and it says to log back in ..when trying to log back in ...it gives me error try later ...this is what I'm paying for? I've deleted the app and downloaded it AGAIN ...and it still won't open ...this is not cool at all ...can someone fix this PLEASE

title: Bad UX, constantly bugs
review:
Update: the controls make it inevitable that you will accidentally skip around in an episode if you try to pause the show or see how much time is left. Usually you’ll be stuck watching ads before you can try to find your place again in the episode. 

Previous:
Everytime I try watching a show I get an error message saying there's a problem playing the video. Have to close the app and restart it to resume watching. This can happen 4-7 times during a 30 minute show. For a paid service this is not acceptable

title: Poorly thought out
review: Editor's choice? Did the editor's actually use the app?  What a poorly thought out piece of software. I just quit watching a show out of frustration. Actually thinking of cancelling my subscription If you are not careful when touching the screen to pause a show, you can end up loosing your place. Which of course results in two long buffering times. Hey, you know iPads and phones are almost all screen in the front. When you move them you end up touching the screen. Anybody listening? Go back to the old slide bar and pause button. Use your heads.

title: Please Fix
review: I don’t leave reviews for apps ever, but this issue has really begun bothering me. When you go in a season the episodes are either missing or placed in another season. There will be 2 Season 5 Episode 17s. Obviously one is wrong and when I looked up what should be correct, one should be in season 4. Then once I looked at season 4, it has episode 15-17 missing. Those episodes are scattered somewhere throughout the seasons! You can’t follow a series in chronological order with the episodes out of order. Please fix this issue.

title: Put the interface back!
review: I can't take this anymore! Over and over and over again, all I try to do is touch the 10-second rewind button, and the computer misinterprets my gesture and rewinds me back to the beginning! Which wouldn't be so bad if it didn't also replay the COMMERCIALS that I only rewound back through because you decided you wanted to try to be clever with the interface. REMOVE THE ABILITY TO USE ANYTHING BUT THE SCROLL BAR TO REWIND AND FAST FORWARD. It's simple and has always worked. I never want to experience this garbage interface ever again! Netflix doesn't try to pull this crap! Come on!

title: It’s good but has problems with ads
review: Oh my god I love this app just these ads are just horrible they show no interest why are you showing a car ad on a kid show like what?!?! There is never something new when I comes to ads it’s the same thing all the time also why is there no ads in a movie but 3 or 4 ads in a episode of a show makes no sense but other than ads the app is good

title: It’s good but a few cons
review: I love the streaming BUT I don’t like that some show never go off my stuff. If you accidentally  record and go back to take it off it doesn’t go away. I’ve removed from my watchlist, disliked it and took it off my stuff and it comes back. And shows I have on my stuff and have watched them all will come back saying I have all the episodes to watch. It’s frustrating!!!

title: After episode plays, it hangs serving up the next one
review:
When watching a series, the app fails to load the next episode.  It spins awhile, hangs and then reports an error it is having trouble loading the content and I am to choose something else to watch.  The interface is blank until I go back to the list of episodes, click the episode that should have loaded and it plays.  This is consistent after every episode, verified it isn’t internet connectivity.  

IPhone 8+ IOS 13.4

title: Can not force quality
review: It’s annoying when I pay a good amount to have this service and have unlimited data yet cannot force HD content...used to be able to pick my stream (and can in basically every other streaming app) but in this one the only available option is “best available” which has a terrible algorithm to determine because with 50mbps download it’s still fuzzy...be nice if I could once again choose 720p...

title: App Keeps Crashing
review: So annoying. I can’t watch complete shows. Keeps crashing and giving me an error message that there is no internet connection but my Verizon service LTE and other apps are working fine. Sometimes it works sometimes it doesn’t. Also if I have to leave the app for any reason and come back mid watching something, the app refreshes itself and I’m forced to search whatever I was watching again. Very frustrating. Not sure if the app is no longer compatible with the older version of Apple phone I’m on (iPhone 7) or not. Please help!!

title: More seasons
review: I don’t mind waiting the 24 hours to see my favorite shows but I do hate when I can not binge watch a new show (to me). It is very hard to pick up what is going on when you do not have the beginning seasons. And Netflix doesn’t have them either. I just won’t watch the show if I can not see it from the start.

title: Sensitive
review:
I love Hulu,whenever I’m on it I can find movies/shows that I can’t god on any other viewing app. But there is one major issue that I have been having with this app is the fact that it is so sensitive even if I’m on my ipad or phone if I accidentally touch the screen it will either x me out or fast forward it can be annoying. All in all,it’s a good app but it does have a few issues thanks 😊

                        PLEASE POST THIS !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Sports viewing is frustrating at best
review: Cannot fast forward past commercials (this is how they make their money). Had very weird playback during a football game that was extremely glitchy. Every time I wanted to watch a different game other than the one I had recorded, it would start back at the beginning of the broadcast and would not let me fast forward to live due to it being an advertisement (there were no advertisements!!!). Very much considering going back to cable. The functionality is extremely lacking compared to regular cable.

title: It's ALWAYS crashing
review: Whenever I use it, the app crashes when I try to watch something. It always bugs out and freezes, and I can't pause it, turn it off, and even when I press the home button, the audio keeps playing. It also glitches by zooming into one area of the screen and sticking there for a while and the captions always freeze too. The only way I can stop it is if I delete the app and get it again... but it still crashes and I have to re-download it for it to really work for only two seconds. Someone please fix this!

title: Won’t remember location information
review: When I try to watch live TV, I get an error message saying to give information on the next screen but it jumps back to the first screen and this goes on and on.  I have given the app permission to access my location information in settings.  I can delete the app, sign in again, give it permission to access my location information, and it will sometimes work.  Sometimes I have to repeat this more than once.  I am not getting what I paid for!

title: Please add ‘marked as watched’
review: This is so bad, I don’t need every episode of every show in my watch list, especially as I’ve watched them!!! I need to be able mark whole seasons or individual episodes as watched as I have no idea when a new episode is available. I end up going to the latest show list in iTunes just to find out what’s new.

title: Yee get this app nerds
review: DUDE I HECKIN LOVE THIS APP honestly I go there for 90% of my tv needs (the other 10% from vrv lol) like I don’t understand why this app doesn’t have 5 stars like c’mon y’all smh🤦‍♀️ tv shows are easy access and I can watch new stuff as soon as it comes out, like what’s better than that!! So all in all get this app, or don’t I mean idrc🤷‍♀️ have a nice day kiddos and remember to take your vitamins :))))))

title: Temperamental app
review:
Ever since iOS 12 the app is freezing at times. Could not close it yesterday and I had to delete app and reinstall it then it was OK for a while until I paused a show. When I resumed it the pause bottom did not fade out for the remainder of the episode. 
I also find the frequent commercials irritating and agree that if the option to pay a higher fee to get rid of them is not available that perhaps playing them once at start of show and once mid show would be more palatable.

title: Glitches, Witches, and Bugs. OH MY!
review: Pretty close to cancelling this garbage. In the past 24 hrs the Apple TV app was looping from 0 to 30 seconds in some shows. Guide was showing incomplete guide lists. Feed was cutting in and out. Watched a TV show after it had aired on demand and got alllll the commercials despite paying extra for no commercials on such shows. It had worked great over the spring and summer. But now it feels like an awful, rushed release by a bunch of amateurs. I’m sure it’s some idiot, self-assured VP rushing the devs. Please look around for all your schtuff, put it in a bag, and get it together. Get your schtuff together.

title: Crap
review: This app has a lot of bugs. It is constantly buffering no matter how good my internet connection is. I would not recommend this app due to it not being able to load a show or movie in a convenient time frame. This last update made this problem significantly worse then it was before.

title: App is not working on mobile devices
review:
We purchased the live streaming package and as of 3 days now this app is not working. It refers me to internet or network settings yet there is not wrong with my network. Also the latest version is not providing us with the quality we use the enjoy.
Disappointed and need a fix

title: Pretty good: has a few user interface problems.
review: I like the app and the service I get but the slider at the bottom which allows you to go to different points in the video you are watching is sensitive and can be affected by touching anywhere on the screen. I have several times found myself accidentally fast forwarding half an hour when all I wanted was to press pause.

title: REMOVE screen fast forward and rewind
review: I have had enough of this app. Today I had two minutes left on a show. I paused the episode and my finger made this feature rewind the episode back a few minutes past the advertisement break, which then caused a 90 second advertisement to pop up. When that was over, I had to fast forward the episode back to where it was and again. ANOTHER 90 second ad. All-in-all, I wasted over 5 minutes trying to get back to where the video was—all because of this extremely inconvenient feature! PLEASE REMOVE IT.

title: Totally non functional on mr less than year old iPad Pro.
review: After the last update, this app stopped working on my iPad.  I even tried deleting and reinstalling the app.  To no avail.  After the opening screen, when I try to select a program, it just spins and spins forever.  I am not happy paying monthly for an app that doesn’t work from a company that obviously does not give a rip about it’s customers.

title: Great...
review: I love the app, but for some reason it just won't let me download it. Maybe it's my I pad being second gen... but it has gone through a lot. Also some shows aren't even the whole series like Steven universe. And I'm sad because when I want to watch something like the owl house, it isin't there!  But it has great quality and I respect that. Overall, it is a great app. It could use some minor fixes.

title: What the heck???
review:
One of my favorite streaming platforms but this revised interface stinks!!!  It’s hard to find what you want to watch and much more difficult to do the things you once were able to do.  

Used to be able to delete things from my history, so if I didn’t like them they wouldn’t continue to show up I my queue.  No longer ☹️. Now I have to log in via pc. 

Hard to find anything good to say about the app. Big disappointment!!!

title: Please change this
review: I’ve been subscribed for about 2 years now and I now hate using this app. Whenever I’m watching a show if I accidentally tap the screen the show will fast forward/rewind to where ever I hit, its most annoying because I like watching shows while I work out and I have to be extra careful when tapping the screen to see the time. Also I find it very confusing to find shows I’m currently watching, under my stuff there’s shows I watched a couple episodes of months ago, I preferred the last version, it wasn’t pretty but heck it did its job.

title: App update doesn't support IOS devices
review: The app has lost all functionality for me after this update, making it essentially useless. The new app no longer supports IOS streaming via HDMI. I've used this app for over a year to stream from my phone to tv and now ads will play normally but no picture comes up for the programming only the sound. I don't know why they would make this drastic change. Additionally, the new interface isn't user friendly: difficult to navigate and missing user profile information. Overall, the update is a big ZERO!

title: New layout is garbage.
review: After the most recent update they basically started using the Netflix bar slider system and when you use it on anything but a pic or tablet you can click view all. Meaning on your smart tv or Xbox you have to scroll threw movies a-z left to right which will take hours. Making you spend even more time sifting threw movies to find one you want. They also keep taking away new release sections for movies so again maki nag you have to scroll left to right threw genres trying to find new releases. Time wasting menus for no reason. Garbage!!!!!

title: Ok but should be better
review:
Decent but too many issues for 2020 streaming. If you need to restart an episode they make you rewatch ads even though you have already seen them? (This is the cheaper ad version, yes I know I could upgrade but I won’t.)

Why can’t I see a list of what I have already watched? You watch something and it disappears so you can never recommend a show to your friend.

Also why aren’t there separate profiles? Not everyone in a household has the same age restrictions and tastes. Fail.

title: Rate option
review:
We want the ability to give our rates to the content inside the app. Either rating by stars or by giving a thumbs up or down. So you guys can know whether we liked it or not. That’s the best option for you to improve your content and for us to have a better stuff to watch. 
Win-Win stiuation.

title: I Love this app! But I just want an tiny bit of an request!
review: I really love this app! The have so many suggestions to watch! I mostly watch cartoons and anime that Netflix doesn’t have sometimes but i just wanna say, can we please have an skip button for the adds? It would be nice to have one and not watch the whole thing but that is all!

title: Amazing app
