review: Love the different shows it has it has multiple selections to choose from but some shows i love to watch like the simpsons, modern family, or gotham dont have the previous seasons to watch like the old episodes from the simpsons where the best and i would love to binge watch all of those previous seasons and episodes.

title: Almost unwatchable
review:
It won’t play a movie straight through. It will keep starting it over from the beginning. It’s very, very frustrating to have to keep hunting for where you were, start watching again, then 10 minutes later it glitches up again and starts over from the beginning.  Even more frustrating when the app spontaneously closes the control screen for the movie, forcing you to have hunt for the movie and THEN fast forward to where you were. 

I have never seen a paid streaming service perform this poorly.

title: Unusable on IPad
review:
App completely unusable after update on older iPad. Nor can I watch via browser on the same iPad as it's an "unsupported" version of a supported browser. Prior to this the old version worked just fine.

Why not just have a canned answer saying you no longer support the last app version on this device and call it a day? Let the old version run but don't provide tech support for it. At this point I don't know what I'm paying for. 

I'm certainly not going to run out and buy a new iPad for a single app when HBO, Netflix, and Prime apps still work fine.

title: No
review: I do not like the newest update. The way my information is organized is not convenient. It makes it harder to search and I can no longer see my history or have control over it. There is no where that explains that on the app or on the web. Thinking about deleting my entire account.

title: New update
review: I have had this for about a year now and everything worked fine until the new update. Every time I try to watched something it pauses and tells me there is a connection error. I am trying to reinstall the app and now it won't even download! I will be cancelling my serve if it doesn't reinstall by tonight! Junk!

title: There is always something wrong..
review: I really don’t understand why this app constantly has issues. For a while it was just that the app was poorly designed and hard to navigate, but now it’s evolved to sometimes it just doesn’t work. It has trouble going from ads to the show. It sometimes won’t even load the show or ads until I shut down my entire phone, and then it’ll work once. When it’s working, it works fine, but it doesn’t work anywhere near consistantly.

title: No Details
review: Recently, I was going through my shows and I tapped on one of them to show more detail. When I did so, a message popped up saying “Error” in bold letters above, “The operation couldn’t be completed.” Under that, “(HuluAPI. Parse Error error 0)” I was given the option to select either “retry” or “ I just noticed this issue today, and seeing as how everything was working yesterday, this is a very recent issue. I beseech you; please resolve this as soon as possible.

title: Wifi
review: I love the app itself; it has lots of great tv shows and movies that can’t be offered many other places. However, it doesn’t run very well unless you have perfect five-star wifi. I’ll be watching an episode and it would pause like six different times within the 20 minute show. it’s very inconvenient to wait 5 minutes for it to start playing again. If I’m watching on Netflix, it very rarely, if ever, pauses at all throughout my watching experience, no matter how long the episode or movie is.

title: Terrible
review: The changes made to this app are drastic and useless. The overall design of the app now is just not user friendly. Very confusing and not to mention, the rewind feature. I accidentally touch the screen in the wrong place and it rewinds back several minutes and plays 80 second ads on top of that. How can anyone think the new design/functionality of the app is an improvement? App developer what were you thinking? :/

title: so slow and frustrating
review: i think it was my wifi that makes this app act slow but i realized it wasnt when i’m able to go on netflix and experience it perfectly fine and fast. this app makes it frustrating to watch the shows i want because it takes forever to just even start anything and theres constant ads/commercials. i think me PAYING monthly should atleast require less commercials and FAST service. considering deleting because of how slow this app is. netflix is much faster while on the same wifi connection.

title: Huge design flaw
review:
I’m sure you’ve seen this complaint 100 times already but I feel it needs to be said again. The tap the screen to fast forward feature does not work correctly and constantly results in unintentional jumping. 

Let me be clear: this is not a growing pain. This is not something that your users are going to simply get used too. Is is far to easy to accidentally jump to a different spot in your movie and spoil the plot. The feature itself is flawed and I beg you to consider removing it, this would greatly imposed the user experience.

title: F- for app functionality
review: This app (for the iPad at least) is so horrible, my dead grandmother could've done better. If you're watching a show and tap on the screen to pause it, it will fast forward or rewind you to wherever you tapped on the screen. Another thing, when you're browsing through shows or movies and you tap on a show/movie and hit the back arrow to keep looking, it will take you back to the top almost every time. Very disappointed and dissatisfied. For $10+ dollars a month plus ads, you guys could do so much better than you are.

title: Like the ability to download
review: I really like the fact that many programs can be downloaded since I am in a location where cellular signal is not the greatest, but I noticed a minor bug that the programs in the “my stuff” folders does not update when watching downloaded programs.

title: Horrible update!! Watchlist feature deleted!!
review: You also can't view which shows used to be on the watchlist in their new feature, you can't see which shows from your old watchlist have new episodes (very inconvenient for keeping track of fall season premieres), and they don't even have a section featured for new fall season premieres!!  Also very difficult to navigate and not user-friendly.  And you have to scroll for way too long to go down a list, because all the images are too big and take up the whole screen one at a time.

title: Never loads
review: I use the roku app most of the time and I love pretty much every thing about it. The new design is lovely, I find the interface easy to use, I love that they added profiles, and the content is excellent as always. However, with the new update it can't load my shows any more. It buffers about halfway and then says there's a connection problem. I've checked my internet multiple times and there's no problem there and none of my other apps struggle to connect, so I'm not sure what the issue is

title: New glitches...
review: ... but it might be related to the newest Apple software update. However, I give the benefit of the doubt before the dev gets a chance to release an update. The new problem I’ve been experiencing is that the app on both iPhone and Apple TV require a power cycle or restart after several hours of non-use. This shouldn’t happen simply bc I was at work all day. I also have a Fire Stick, and the app works fine with no issue.

title: Won’t let me open app
review:
Was watching a show just fine, then it crashed. Now won’t let me open the app at all!!! Just crashes before it loads anything. I’ve deleted and re downloaded twice, reset my phone twice. Nothing’s helping. Thanks guys. Please fix before you bill me again?.... mmkay 🤗

Will update when problem fixed..

They fixed it after 5 hours.

title: Seems to be going downhill
review: Had no problems with the app until sometime last year, they did an update that overrides all my alarms. So if I am casting from my phone overnight, my alarm will not go off in the morning! Today, March 18, 2020, it keeps acting up. I can’t pause or play while casting, it doesn’t show me options to do so on the phone, and every time my phone goes to sleep, I have to restart it because it lost the place I was watching.

title: Not worth the staircase on my phone
review:
This app won’t let me stream from my iPhone. Even after turning my phone on and off, everything updated and even attempting using my data or the WiFi- it still doesn’t work. 
I have to watch my shows from the computer. 
Don’t waste your time downloading this app.

title: update makes me start new shows without meaning to
review:
I never leave ratings for apps but this was the easiest system to use and then they updated it to a system where it’s hard to see what shows are on, which ones I have, and what are available with one show on the screen at a time. 

Then every time I pick up my phone and hit the screen when I’m watching something it changes it to a different episode. Put it back to the way it was as it used to be a great app but now I’m thinking about unsubscribing because it’s so annoying.

title: It’s difficult just to get an episode to work
review: I got this app about 6 months ago and it’s great, but lately it’s been acting up so much. Losing my place when I go back to finish an episode, the episodes may not ever load, or it’ll just pop up with message saying that it can’t be played right now and I should try turning my phone on and off. I don’t know if this is just me experiencing this but...I love the app, it’s just been bugging out lately.

title: I'm disappointed...
review: I am overall very happy with this app however I cannot give it more than one star because of one simple thing it's lacking: downloading shows. I, and many, many other people would get so much more enjoyment out of this app if we could watch our favorite shows offline. Netflix's app has this feature and it's just wonderful and I've given them a five star review because of this wonderful feature. I hope you fix this issue quickly because I'd very much love to watch Game of Thrones without wrecking my data. Thank you.

title: Great
review:
I don't know why everyone is triggered enough to give this amazing app an average 2 star rating, but I think this app is great. If you guys don't like it, then just bring your laptop everywhere with you, 'cause, honestly, you're to triggered to deal with a few small flaws on this app.
I'm glad I can watch my show whenever, wherever I want to now. Thanks

title: Ohhhh, these ‘bug fix releases’ just add more bugs!
review:
If you need testers prior to a release; I volunteer. These releases are awful!  Even though I pay extra for reduced or no commercials, most everything I watch have full commercials. When I want to fast forward through the commercials, it is now a multi step process. Have to launch app (1), reconnect to device (2), select the active program (3), then fast forward (4).  

The delete icon is now hidden behind the active program. WHY????  Are your programmers doing the testing and validation too????  Please correct your process!

title: How I like and how I don’t like it
review: If it is not all in Dub you can’t watch it but if you understand sub you can watch it and the movie are sometimes have sub but like I said if you don’t understand what they are saying then you can’t watch but if you do understand what they are saying then it’s ok to watch them I know I can’t understand what they are saying to me sub don’t make sense anything not in English I don’t understand what they are saying to me there is my review.

title: Excellent TV shows
review: I will admit when you’re watching something on here. That sometimes when you pause and come back it is annoying to come to a commercial. For the most part I love this app because of the TV shows that they stream. But I would recommend making some updates. I think that will bring a lot more customers if you would fix it.

title: Constantly degraded with "upgrades"
review: As someone who has worked in the software industry for over 20yrs I have rarely seen this level of constant, ongoing degradation of a once fine app with no response from development. First they separate the app from other TV apps and the online interface. Then they constantly make the user interface and experience worse with each upgrade. I wish I could get a job where I did this poor quality of work and could still keep my job.

title: Good
review: It is really good and I love the variety of shows but for some reason my pause button and rewind and forward button won’t work on the new update. Like I can double tap the screen to fade press but it won’t work on the actual button. Also when I don’t have it full screen it works fine just only when full screen is it like this. Don’t know why.

title: So ridiculous... where’s the cast icon?
review: I don’t like this new version. I have to scroll through everything I don’t watch. I have to constantly search for shows I watch instead of being able to click on it. Also, the cast icon is always disappearing on me. I can cast one day, but then have to troubleshoot another day, just to get the icon back. These apps and streaming services we pay for, are supposed to be easier to use. I work enough at my job of which I get paid. I shouldn’t have to be annoyed and work harder for  something I pay for

title: The old UI was better.
review: The saying don’t fix what isn’t broken needs to be applied here. The new interface looks minimal and everything looks bigger but it’s difficult to use. The old interface was better and I could access my history and account settings. This version tells me to access them through the web address. This update is a step down not a step up. I will not be using the new update to find new shows. Please bring the old app and layout back.

title: Update decreases ability to find shows
review:
Unnecessary and ambiguous navigation,  I don't really know where I need to go to find my content, why isn't my watch lists the first thing I see? the company has made users work to find if shows they watch have new episodes.  This new update forces you to swipe through a bunch of content you *might* like in order to find what's on your list. 

Finding new shows to watch seems so difficult and clunky I will never do it on my mobile or iPad apps at this point. Terrible upgrade. Did you do any user testing?

title: Chromcasting doesn’t work like it used to
review:
After enjoying the app for several months (years?), an update several weeks ago made pausing a chromcasted show nearly impossible. Today, I updated the app again hoping it would be fixed. But now the casting icon does not even indicate that it’s working, and I can pause but not rewind or fast forward. 

These bugs have made it so frustrating that I find myself avoiding using the app entirely, opting for something on prime or Netflix. Their apps chromcast seamlessly. And I can even pause a show! What a concept!!

title: Just a question about the PiP and its not working
review: It was working couple days ago the Picture-in-Picture setting on the latest IOS update, but I don’t have a reason why it isn’t working now. Anyone have a solution to fix this? If you don’t know what PiP, it’s a thing where you can watch a video or episode without being on the app, so you can do whatnot such as texting or looking through emails while watching your show.

title: Ad overload
review: This app is pretty good and easy to use. The selection is overall very decent. However, I really dislike the amount of ads when you watch a show. I understand that businesses need to advertise but it’s just annoying. If I wanted ads I would go back to cable. I like to get through the show with no interruptions. There is a pause button for a reason.

title: Pause Doesn’t Work
review: From the reviews I updated to ios 14 too late to use PIP before it went away, but my pause and play buttons don’t work anymore. If I need to pause to go read a text in a different screen, I have to exit out completely. When my show paused automatically because I took out my airpods the play button didn’t work either so I had to exit out to get in again so it would play. This seems like pretty basic functionality. I have the ad-free subscription.

title: Ads Are Outta Hand
review: Shows are cool, but I hate the ad version. I don’t know if there’s a glitch in the newer version, but if I rewind 10 secs and it’s close to the last ad break I’m forced to watch the whole 90sec ad clip AGAIN. Super annoying. I’m not buying a GMC truck/SUV, I’m not switching over to Cricket..I just want to watch my shows, be able to rewind and not watch 15mins of commercials for a 30min show. Please fix this issue if it’s a glitch cause it’s getting outta hand.

title: Buffering extreme issue
review: I tried you out for the free trial and oh my, it was not good. The buffering is horrible! Various channels buffered off and on constantly. Today I tried to watch a show on one of the local channels  and it buffered so much I couldn’t continue to watch. Then it was skipping back 5 seconds and then again and again. Talk about a waste of time. Good thing I did not have to pay. According to other reviews it appears this has been an issue for  a while. The pricing is way too high also and for this type of service? No thanks.

title: Too many ads to much lag, Netflix is way better
review: Having to pay 5.99 for the ad supported plan is outrageous. It is supposed to be limited ads but you get one as soon as you start and episode and 3 others a long. Each one lasting around 30-90 seconds. This is pretty much as many ads as other websites give when watching their content for free. They are definitely putting their money above quality, which is understandable, but this is to much. I’d rather just watch stuff on Netflix or somewhere else. I’m cancelling my subscription.

title: Help please fix
review: Overall great app but I pay for this and can’t even watch a movie or show with out it telling me to “turn my phone or wireless router off and wait a few minutes then try again” and this is non stop for every time I try. But I go to Netflix and boom i have no problems! Please fix ASAP or I’ll have to unsubscribe

title: The app
review: This app is amazing. It has a great variety of shows and it is just fantastic. I do hope that in the future there are less ads but they’re not too bad. Sometimes I do have to force close the app to get it to work but other than that it is great. I would definitely would recommend it.

title: I can’t even log in
review: I am already signed in on my phone and when I try to watch something the next day, it makes me sign out or retry. So I retry ten times and then finally decide to sign in. It says there’s a connection problem when I have excellent WiFi. So I try again using data and I have full bars also. Still the same problem. What’s the point of paying for the subscription if I can never even use it? It’s only THIS app and it’s only on the app. On my Roku it seems to work fine.

title: Wont sync shows from app to web
review:
Few issues:
When i add shows to my watchlist from apple tv, it wont show up in my app and vice versa. How do you get them to sync up? 
When binging a show, now it wont play the next episode, it jumps to a completely different show not even on the watchlist. 
Lastly, when watching on the app when you initially start playing a show, it starts off small in the corner, and you have to go thru the steps to full screen it (which is pain when you have an old ipad)

title: Most Of The Same Issues
review:
After the most recent update many old problems haven’t gone away.
The screen freezes while sound continues, subtitle spontaneously turn off and I have to exit the app to make them reappear. When exiting the app, my place in what I’m watching isn’t saved so I have to start at the beginning and watch commercials again. Why are there so many ads when we are paying a monthly fee? Other popular streaming apps do not have us watch irrelevant ads.

title: Error?
review: use the app frequently but for a few shows (typically really popular shows), an error message pops up: “Error The operation couldn’t be completed HuluAPI. Parse Error error 2”. looked it up online and the results just said to close the app, restart my phone, or delete and re-download the app. after doing all of those things, the error message still pops up. would really appreciate if this got fixed bc it’s really annoying.

title: Poor UX for a streaming app
review: This app is absolutely beautiful and content is displayed to portray the essence of the show/movie. Unfortunately, it is an awful browsing experience. It takes way too long to browse content or discover new shows. Ultimately, it discourages you from finding new content. It also makes it difficult to locate shows you like. I would have unsubscribed by now if it weren’t for the fact that it’s the only viable business model that has next-day streaming. I just wish they thought more about their customer’s in-app experience.

title: Won’t even let me log in??
review: I try to log in and restore my purchase and then it brings me to a screen to finish creating an account, which I already have. It tells me I already have an account and kicks me back to the log-in screen? Literally will not even let me log in. Tried to log in a different way and it tells me to pick my subscription preference (which I’ve already done) and then it tells me I’m already subscribed! What’s the point of paying if I can’t even get to the point of being able to watch a show?? Canceling subscription!

title: Update horrible
review:
Now nothing works after the update. Reinstalled the app, updated password login and reinstalled the app twice again.....The app doesn’t even open? It was working last weekend and decided to watch a movie tonight and nothing works. Please fix this ASAP! Thank you. Lost all my data! Reinstalled a third time and the screen is stuck and will NOT open!
I am really disappointed.... it’s now 2 hours later and still the app won’t open!!!! And I just paid for another month!

title: Ehhh..
review:
Don’t get me wrong...
It’s nice for Live TV & everything, but the choice for channels is VERY slim & it’s constantly pausing & skipping (we have the fastest internet speed there is, so it isn’t on our end), plus I’ve seen reviews that complain of the same thing. I also wish there was a “guide” section like regular TV Providers have, rather than having to go to the channel and see the lineup. For $40 a month, there should be more variety of channel choices in my opinion.

title: This use to be a close 5 stars for me....
review: The ads have always been annoying. Due to the recent update I’ve had to watch a 60 ad four times. I just wanted to pause the show and I missed the button by an inch and it’s rewinding it back. It’s extremely annoying and it kind of forces you to pay for the version that has no ads. Also I paid there was a deal for minimal ad breaks and I have the same amount as usual I don’t see the point. This is extremely annoying and I’m about to end my subscription revert it back or make it less sensitive.

title: One star for the new update
review: I've had this app for a while and never had any major issues, but this new update is horrible. For example, as opposed to showing all of my recently watched in one neat line across the site, now I can only see one show filling the entire screen at a time, and it only flips through a smattering of shows I actually watch. It is not at all intuitive, and I've completely stopped watching on my iPad. Thank god I still have the old app on AppleTv or I'd be cancelling my subscription. Please go back to the original format. Substance over style!

title: Forcing us to pay more
review: This app is a joke the ads are ridiculous if I don’t pay more money I get bombarded with 1 minute 30 second long ads while only getting 2 minutes of the show at a time I should not have to give you all of my money because u feel the need to put an add every 2 seconds do u know how annoying it is to be in the middle of someone’s death see just to get smacked in the face by an eharmoney ad with their terrible acting and horrible lines just thinking about it makes me wanna break my phone over someone’s head

title: It’s okay but get rid of those mothefriggin ads!!!!
review: Why am I paying for a service for it to still give me ads and if I go back 10 seconds when it’s only 9 it replays the ad after already watching it or if I accidentally go back and try to it still replays it. Also I keep seeing the same ads and they’re extremely repetitive and whenever I go back it plays the ad even when there wasn’t one there

title: 5 ads in one show?!
review: The ads on this app are ridiculous. A subscription that’s almost $7 just so that you could give me at least 4 ads ranging anywhere from 20-90 seconds? Netflix, Disney +, and prime video are all better choices. Sure they cost a little more, but it’s worth it to not see the same 4 ads multiple  times in one episode. If viewers can get less ad time, then I’d like to keep my subscription, but as of now, I’m canceling as soon as I’m done binging the couple of shows like.

title: Way to many ads
review: The app is fine and works well the only problem I have with it are the ads you have to pay for a subscription to keep watching stuff but then you still get ads that are way too long and unskipable which by the way can go up to 100 seconds and there about four ads every video. My opinion the app would be way better if there was a skip feature.

title: The same commercials
review: I don’t pay for the plan to skip the advertisements and honestly I don’t mind them all that much, but throughout the course of a few episodes I will see the same three commercials over and over agin. If you’re going to have people pay less to see commercials at least give them something different to watch, I seem to get a progressive insurance commercial every commercial break!

title: Glitch with “watch history”
review:
Lately, after i watch a show it still shows under the list to “resume watching” instead of “caught up”.
I also started watching a new show and am on the second episode, but when I pause and come back to it, I have to start over again because it shows no watch history.
I updated the app and not fixed.
It is also happening on the app on my Vizio TV.
Help!!!’

title: Constant crashing
review: Would be great if the app didn’t crash every few minutes to the point where I have no hope of ever finishing a show. And it seems like they’ve had these iOS troubles for years. I have no issues on my Samsung phone, but on my iPad I’m constantly frustrated with the terrible performance of this app. Every time it crashes I’m forced to watch more ads to get back to the place I was in the show. I don’t mind ads but when I watch 15 minutes of them in a row because the app has crashed 7 times I get annoyed

title: I know why it is so cheap (16 ads per 30-min episode)
review:
Just signed up for a promotional deal. I had decided that $12/month wasn’t worth it, but when they later announced a $2/month offer I decided why not? 
Well, after watching one show, I now understand why they can offer a membership for so little: they BOMBARD you with crappy ads. At this point, it seems like they should be paying me, or at least totally free. I stopped watching broadcast TV largely due to all the terrible ads. Now I get to suffer through the same torture, but this time for a fee.

title: Great app, wish layout was more organized
review: I love this app, but I wish the layout was better. It’s difficult to simply go to the next episode sometimes, and it doesn’t really keep track of the episode you are on? Also the general layout could be better. Other than that, it’s a pretty good about

title: Not updating properly
review: After I watch a program on My Stuff, it used to come off the watch next list and say all caught up. This is not happening. It is telling me to watch the same episode over again as if I had never watched it. This is getting very confusing. I hope it gets fixed soon. I would have contacted support about this but I have to go through too many gateways to just tell them they have a problem. How about making that easier too.

title: Traveling.
review: So i am currently abroad. Not sure if it has to do with my location but I have an American based account that i HAVE been watching the handmaids tale on, well since arriving in Germany. On the app i see the show in my recently watched and it even goes as far as telling me there’s a new episode, however, the entire show (all three seasons) are currently unavailable. Well it’s nothing to do with my account, it’s clearly the issue of being in a different country even though I’m logged into my standard account. It’s just simply annoying and very unappreciated.

title: Want my money back
review: Way too glitchy. First problem, took several minutes for me to log into my account after paying and said I didn’t have an account. Next problem, the picture kept glitching and the volume on my tv kept going all the way up and down. Last problem, emailed for tech support and got an email back saying they no longer provide help anymore, even though it was the contact provided in my email receipt for troubleshooting. I would give it zero stars if I could and definitely want my money back!!

title: What happened?!
review: Never really had a problem with the app until recently. Now, it regularly wants to tell me there is a connection problem on my end, telling me to try restarting the app and/or device and/or router. I don’t think so. I can instantaneously switch to any other app and it works flawlessly so get YOUR app working again! There are SO MANY options for streaming these shows/channels, especially as a cable subscriber, so it’s not something I’ll continue to pay for much longer.

title: Needs work
review: We just got live and having a few problems. My husband has been talking to the TV because he hates that if 2 seconds was left on a show we watch and he wants to start the next episode it reverts back to the previous show. I do not like that many of my favorite shows do not come up in the keep watching area. I have gotten used to this interface now and get around it fairly ok but it is not easy.

title: Hate this app!
review: In all the years I’ve been using this app, there were occasional glitches but over all it was a positive experience. Unfortunately, for quite some time now, it has been riddled with crashes, the sound skips like and old record player, the layout is awful, and often, you can’t remove shows from favorites. I keep waiting for the issues to disappear with each update but it seems this company is content with things as they are.

title: Very few crashes
review: Content is, what it is. Now video quality is excellent. Google Cast works awesome.  Unlike other video streaming apps, it will crash only one out of ten uses (just an estimate). I wish it would have a download to device feature for when traveling on plane where no signal is available.

title: Changing subscriptions
review: Do not get this through Itunes go to the website and get it. If you want to change your subscription through ITunes you have to unsubscribe wait for what you paid for to end then resubscribe through the website I should be able to change what I want through the app or at least the website without having to do all this just because I'm paying through ITunes.

title: Over all I’m happy!!
review: I love how simple this app is, no scrolling through like Netflix I always find something enjoyable to watch. I love the 10 second rewind/fast forward option, especially with unnecessary sex scenes. People complain about the tapping the screen and it fast forwards but it hasn’t been annoying for me. Keep doing good work!!

title: Are You Still Watching
review: UPDATE:  It’s even worse - the “ARE YOU STILL WATCHING” is occurring much sooner!  WHAT A HORRIBLE WAY TO TREAT YOUR CUSTOMERS!!     It is horrible you have added this non-sense!!  Now we have to stop what we are doing just to let you know we are still there!!! This was one of the biggest benefits over Netflix and now you both are lame.  What’s worse is the pretense that you are helping us not miss anything from the show we are watching!  If some idiot can’t figure out what they’ve seen and what they haven’t, shame on you for punishing those of us that get how this service works!

title: Episode Order/ Number
review: So it’s great and all that you have dubs AND subs for Japanese anime and such, but I noticed that for one of the Animes I was watching the second season starts at episode 13/14 ( I am talking about my hero academia ) and I can’t find it’s episodes anywhere else. Just wanted to bring it to light that not all tv shows always have every single episode which really messes up the whole experience.

title: Not a fan of the updated look
review:
They made the app more flashy but it’s not user friendly. It was great the old way, easy to navigate. 

That’s not my main complaint. I cannot get rid of “9-1-1” from my watchlist. It will not go away. I’ve tried deleting the app, restarting my phone, adding and removing it from “My Stuff” on the app and in a PC browser. It refuses to go away and it’s driving me nuts. I don’t want to watch it, but I get told when new episodes are out.

title: New Version is Horrible
review: Tapping on the screen makes the whole screen go gray and won’t return to normal until you tap again which often results in the video randomly skipping significantly forward or back and causing you to watch an entire extra set of commercials before you can try to return to where you were. Doesn’t seem to be compatible with new iPad picture in picture feature as it freezes and you can’t close the pip. Also there are noticeably more commercials now than before. Very disappointing.

title: My experience
review: Everybody is so mad about this new update but if you look at the update in a good way rather then a bad one it's not that bad. If you really take the time you understand everything again. This is my go to app for tv shows and it has some of the greatest shows ever on it. The app is fine and I still love it

title: Frustrating
review: The ads on the app are so annoying! I understand that there’s a premium for a reason, but this is ridiculous. If you have to fast forward or rewind to any part of the show you have to watch an ad, even after have already just got done watching one. I fall asleep watching shows all the time and find it absurd when there’s already 6 ads in one show, not to mention the fact that the ads are 2 minutes long and to have to repeat that just to get to a certain part of the show is a thumbs down.

title: Spoiled again
review:
Oh hey! Just had the ending of a show SPOILED AGAIN because of the overly sensitive fast foward/rewind screen. Any misplaced tap on the screen and the show skips from 5 minutes into a show to 40 minutes into the show, ruining the ending for me. ANY tap above or below the pause button causes this. If I wanted to (for some stupid reason) skip 40 minutes into a show I would press the progress bar, not the upper right corner of my screen.
Making the entire screen a huge fast forward button is a completely useless feature and ruins mobile watching.

title: Lineup needs an edit option
review: If there’s a way to edit the lineup I can’t find it. If they want to make a “suggestions” tab that’s fine but the lineup IMO should be showing what’s next in your queue. For every show I do watch there are 3 they guess I’m interested in. Let me edit it or make it a suggestion tab and put it at the end not first. The watchlist doesn’t make it easy to mark shows as watched if I’ve seen them somewhere else.  I have a show on my watchlist, why do I need to add episodes to my watchlist?

title: Inconvenient new update
review:
I really like the look of the new update but the new feature for rewinding is super annoying. Instead of being able to swipe just the time bar to fast forward or rewind like, you know, literally every other streaming platform, you can adjust the time bar at any part of the screen! Nobody asked for this. It makes it really inconvenient if I just tap my phone on accident.
All around it’s a well made update but the time bar feature must be acknowledged.

title: Pure garbage
review: How can a 1 star rating app get an “editors choice” award?  Seriously, stop rewarding developers of an app that clearly is not in the best interest of its consumers.  The latest update is pathetic, and it’s obvious when there are literally thousands of 1 star ratings.  My biggest complaint is that 1 star is low as they go (this app is a -5 IMO).  But sadly, the truth is that we all are forced to use this pile of feces UI because it’s one of only a few major streaming services that are offered to the masses.  My advice, fire all your developers and start over.  You clearly don’t care about the user experience.

title: Malia Green
review:
Great app but needs custom adds. When I am watching empire I always get these Botox adds and they are totally irrelevant. It takes the majority of the time that I have adds. Also on adds like those and other adds I’m not able to see how much time I have left until all the adds are over. 

Please fix this, Malia Green

title: It's okay
review: I don't love how it organizes the things I watch, but my biggest problem with it is that it frequently jumps back or forward when I touch the wrong place on the screen. I'm not sure why it's jumping or what I'm doing that makes it jump since I'm usually just trying to bring up the play button to pause. This wouldn't be that big of a deal if I could just go back to where I was, but I have to watch 90 seconds of commercials before I can fix the problem. Very annoying!

title: Please fix!
review: I do not like the update at all! I don like that I can't see the previous shows I watched when the new episodes come out! I have to search through my watch list and see if there's a new episode. I also don't like that when I'm on my iPad that I can't minimize the screen and do other stuff like search web, text, or scroll on social media! Please make changes ASAP!!!

title: Mixed feelings
review: I wish I could use this app a bit more, I like it at home but to use it for on the go it’s so hard for downloads to actually download. It’s not optimized as well as the Netflix app and the downloads fail constantly. I have great internet, right next to the router, even on 4g cell data with full bars, it struggle with downloading. Everything else about the app is great but the feature I need just isn’t performing well.

title: Absolutely Horrendous Chromecast connectivity
review: Using this app with chromecast is always a nightmare. If I pause it even for just a moment almost without fail the app will act as if I’m not connected to Chromecast, then when trying to reconnect and resume where I left off I’m usually forced to rewatch ads as the app then restarts the episode from the beginning, and then rewatch more ads when I try to find my previous place in the episode. I accept having to watch ads, but having to constantly watch more than I have to is incredibly aggravating.

title: Great service, buggy apps
review: The service never has issues on my computer, but the app is constantly giving me error codes. I have closed it out completely, deleted and downloaded it again, reset my router, reset my iPad, etc. Still can only get through about one episode of anything before it times out trying to start another one. Similar problems happen with our app on the Vizio TV. I love Hulu’s selections, but they could definitely work on their apps a bit more.

title: Really?
review:
So I started my trial so that I could watch anime and I find that some anime’s are partially dubbed but the entire anime isn’t all dubbed? Seriously? How do you even do that? I know there are full dubs for the anime’s I was looking for so why don’t you have them? There are also movies form anime’s that you are missing and sometimes the ones you do have aren’t dubbed either!
The good thing about this app is that it has a nice playback and a good selection screen.

Sooooo I was like watching Regular Show on bed right? And then something weird started happening to the show right? And I was like “Oh maybe it’s just my data” right? And then this app was talking about “Uh oh! looks like your show isn’t working right now. Please leave the app or choose a new show.” (Or whatever it said) right? Then I go to the App Store, and then it looked like it needed an update! So I click the update button, went back to my show, but it didn’t work🤷🏾‍♀️! So then I went back to the App Store after a few quick hours, then... BOOM! There was an another update! IN ONE DAY THO! And I was like “yeeeeaaaah boooooooyeeeee!!!”🥳🥳🥳🤩🤩🤩 so I pressed the update button and my show started working again! I was like “OOOOOOOOOOH!!!”🥳🥳🥳

So thank you for the update! 🤩

Truly Yours,

Norellio😃

title: Shuts down since last update
review: I have used this update for years without a problem. Since the last iOS update last week, I’ve begun to have issues. The app shuts down frequently, especially when rewinding and fast forwarding. It also stops working and closes when the phone is tilted. I hope this gets fixed soon!

title: This app is ok
review: I only rated this 3 stars because every five minutes there is a 80-90 second long ad! I really don’t think this is necessary for an ad every 5 freakin minutes! I know that it’s to advertise things, but every 5 minutes? That is just an extra price of coding that is not necessary. I hope in the future it would be changed, but all in all I shouldn’t complain because it gets the job done both ways.

title: Good shows, bad app
review: This app has an amazing selection of shows, but unfortunately, I've been having a lot of trouble with it. It does this thing where it only has a few episodes of a show available, even though it previously had all of the episodes, and it will say that I'm not connected to the internet when I've double and triple checked that I am. Overall, I really love the selection of shows, but it needs to fix these frustrating issues.

title: Nice Streaming app
review:
I obviously think this app is amazing! I mean I get to watch new anime I haven’t seen, but I only ask for two things, have you heard of My Hero Academia and Sailor Moon? I just want to ask, can you add Dubs for season 3 of My Hero Academia? And For season 4 and 3 for Sailor Moon?
 That would be great, because I know Fairytail has all the season dubbed, so can you do it for both of them?

title: Don’t update!!!
review: I use this app everyday while I’m working as I work very long shifts. Love the app and the service. But I updated the app today and now it won’t load any of my shows. When I do finally get something to play it crashes. It takes 5-10 minutes of playing around with the app, restarting my iPad (my signal strength is perfect as I’m on a big hill near cell towers) just to get one video to play only to have it crash and have to restart the process. Don’t allow it to update!!!

title: Too many ads
review: The ads in my shows are constant. In every episode there are at least 4 ads all 90 seconds long. I would like it to lower down the ad rate because the ads make me get out of the mood for watching my shows and they just get really annoying. But overall the app is great I can find good shows and the. design is easy too use.

title: Why is this App So Glitchy??
review: Not talking about iPhone or iPad update but the tvOS. I am not able to select videos in app. I have to use Apple's TV app to start a video. I can't skip to other episodes either. I have to wait for the credits to roll and then 30 more seconds for the timer to run out and play the next episode. PLEASE fix this!!!

title: Too many taps
review: I finally got use to the update a while back that was so terrible. The feedback from the masses said it wasn’t friendly. And it’s NOT. The newest update has too many taps. Example watch next episode brings up more choices and to watch it in full view you have to tap 2 more times. Many other places. Please ask your users for feed back before making more changes that don’t make sense.

title: Can’t use it when I need to
review: I hate this you need to refresh it on your home network every 30 days it’s absolutely ridiculous. I don’t need to use it at home I have at least 4 devices at the house with it on it but god forbid you don’t open it at least once a month; otherwise when your out and about and want to use it it’s completely useless cause you have to refresh it on your home network where you don’t need it so you don’t think about it. It should work when you pull it up regardless of how many times you use it

title: Still has issues with smart tv
review: Rating would be better except I still have issues with it not connecting right.  App works great on my tablet and phone.  But when it comes to my tv either it will say server error or check your internet connection.  I can pull up all other apps and internet on my tv with no issues.  The only solution that seems to help is unplugging my tv for about five minutes.

title: Overall great
review: I love this app and use it all the time. It is so great that you can get current TV shows without cable. The thing that frustrates me about the app is there are several shows that I do not watch that I can’t get off “my stuff”. The box is not checked, it’s not in my watch list, yet it won’t go away. If you could fix that glitch, it would be pretty much perfect

title: Greatly disappointed
review: Although this app has many great shows and movies, I can’t believe they don’t allow you to view on a larger screen with the apple lightening adapter. When and if they ever update that from only audio I will definitely change my rating but I am considering canceling my subscription

title: HATE the new app version but like the subscription
review: HATE HATE HATE HATE HATE HATE (cannot day it enough) the new interface. Not useful or intuitive at all. Please switch it back to what it was before and bring back the Picture in Picture feature! It’s like you removed everything I liked and replaced it all with everything I don’t!!

title: Fast-forwarding and Re-winding
review: I was hoping that the new update would change the way you fast-forward and re-wind but it didn’t. It’s such a pain because if your in the middle of an episode and accidentally tap the screen it skips to wherever you tapped. Then not only do u have to figure out where in the episode you left off but you’ll probably have to watch a ton of commercials to get there. Not worth it. Probably deleting my subscription unless this gets changed.

title: Irritating
review: There’s just one thing that really irritates me. When my hands are holding my phone, it’s very easy for the video I’m watching to skip all the way to the end because of some slide to fast forward thing. This happens too often, and it’s everything but user friendly. When I want to go back to where I last was, I have to watch a 1 min ad. Seriously?? Give me a way to turn that stupid fast forward function off. That in my opinion makes this the worst streaming app.

title: Fix
review:
It's impossible to scroll through movies. I make one mistake and have to start all over. If I want to scroll alphabetically I have to manually go all the way to the end of the alphabet, instead of letter by letter (See HBO app) And idiotically, movies that start with "The" are all the way back in the Ts. 
Also, if I tap the screen during a movie (trying to make pause/rewind buttons go away) I end up scrolling back to the beginning of the movie.
Not saying you need to go back to old version of this app, but this definitely needs some common sense improvements.

title: Live TV not quite ready
review: I tried the 7 day live TV trial and experienced an unacceptable level of connection issues for the price they are asking. Mostly used on my Apple TV with hard wired Ethernet, on a 100 mb/s connection. App is also unnecessarily difficult to navigate - too many steps involved to access just a single channel.

title: Easier flow & options
review: I’d like it when I search a show & then click on it, if it is not available for my subscription to be able to have easier access to options of Changing my subscription, or even the availability to purchase the show.

title: App is great but needs some updates
review: Love the app use it on my tv with no problems but every time i use the app on my iphone it just doesn’t play a live show at all and thats super annoying. It will play 2 seconds of an ad then stop playing a buffer for 20 minutes go back to the program and play for 2 minutes before it pauses and buffers for another 20 or even longer amount of time. So annoying.

title: This needs a fix quick
review:
Can you make it so when you change the volume it doesn’t have that big box show up and instead has a small bar at the top of the screen like Netflix. It gets to the point where I just don’t wanna use the app because I change the volume around and I don’t want a big box in the middle of my screen. 
Edit: and now there’s a glitch where when I click the button to go into full screen it will do the little flash thingy but it won’t go into full screen. This app is so broken.

title: Languages
review: I give it three because it’s a really good app and it has a really good variety of shows and movies but my problem is languages there are a few shows that I really enjoy watching but it is originally a Japanese version and I go to change the language on the fourth season and for some reason it won’t let me change the language for English I really hope that this can be changed especially for.  My Hero Acadamia

title: Please fix the App
review: It’s a good app and I’m happy paying for it but my issue is that I have to close and re open the app Avery now and then because it freezes and then tells me I have to refresh even though the internet is fine. Everything goes back to normal after I close and reopen but the. It starts all over again. Hoping it’ll get fixed. If I’m paying for an app I at Least want it to function properly.

title: Good shows, poor quality app
review: Watching more than two episodes in a row it completely stops working and I have to close the app and restart. You also can’t manage your account or change ANYTHING on the app. It make supi go to the website and the whole thing is simply inconvenient. Not to mention it’s way more expensive than Netflix. I only have it For Brooklyn 99, and Archer. Literally to do anything on the app it takes five more steps than it does others.

title: Needs improvement
review: The platform feels less intuitive, the commercials are always louder than the show and there are to many commercial breaks.  Also off putting that the only option to upgrade the account is to delete/cancel and start over, really agitated that it’s so convoluted trying to give you more of my money.  I do like the content and originals but the app feels like a hassle to often.

title: To many...
review: I think app is great I really don’t have many issues with this app at all the only thing I really dislike is is that there are to many ads when u first watch the beginning 95% out of 100% will there be an ad throughout the show u am watching 4-7 ads play each episode over all I think that is good but they should really fix that

title: Buggy. Needs a lot of work.
review: Doesn’t resume to current episodes, only the last episode you watched. So if you started on season 3 episode 3 but allowed the divorce to continue playing till you pause the show, you could on episode 7 but the divorce still reflects episode 3. So you are stuck rewatching if you don’t actually remember. Also interfere all the time when streaming even when WiFi signal is strong. I stop using the service over the years do to this same issue, may have to disconnect again. Very exhausting.

title: Playback error no help from customer service
review: DO NOT UPDATE THE APP! I’ve been having playback issue ever since I updated to the 5.48.1 update last week (week ending 5/25). Thought customer service today, 5/31, would be able to assist me after troubleshooting the issues on my own days before. Absolutely no help at all! The rep was nice but the advice they offer was stiff I already tried days before. Absolutely ridiculous and annoying! It even went up to the “higher ups” and they told the rep to tell me to try the. same. stuff. I. already. tried!

title: Download and watch offline
review:
This feature was supposed to be “coming shortly” a long time ago. Now it doesn’t seem to be coming at all. Every other video app has it for iPhone. It’s a big reason why I use any other app over yours if they have the same show, and why if I had to drop one viewing app it would be yours.

Otherwise you’re doing fine.

I like not missing my TV show. I just watch them the next day. I don’t like when you pick a show the next screen gives you episode choices and when you pick the next episode the next screen has it in a small box that you have to make bigger. Why doesn’t it come up full screen since you already made your choice?

title: Best TV streaming subscription service
review: Best shows from all of the big networks available in HD, what more could you want. Just wish you could have it streaming on more devices at the same time considering the price per month. Split between three people it is a no brained it is so cheap. Less than a cup of coffee per week.

title: Too much commercials and you can’t rewind without watching commercials again
review: The amount of commercials you have to watch throughout the episode is ridiculous. Especially when you accidentally rewind and have to watch the same commercials again. Maybe you should fix it so once you watch a commercial mark so can actually rewind the show and not sit through the commercials all over again. If you want to keep customers it’s probably a good idea to listen to all the reviews saying the commercials are too much.

title: Needs work
review:
The app is very glitchy. I am constantly having to slide the episode back to where I was watching it, because it will jump, while I am watching it. 
Also,This is now the 3rd time the app won’t even open properly, and stays on the loading screen. I know this isn’t a WiFi issue, because I tested my WiFi and the strength is excellent. Plus, my other apps were working. 
It’s frustrating to pay for a service I can’t use. Hopefully, the issue is corrected soon.

title: can’t watch videos successfully with the new update on my iPad mini or iPhone 7
review:
Commercials cause glitches

Also, you can’t jump back or forward 10 seconds without the audio not matching up with the video. Sometimes it even repeats itself like I’m in the frickin matrix or something 

I am so frustrated! 😡

title: Update isn’t helpful
review:
Any time I have to refresh the page to continue watching it plays the commercials first. Then I refresh and it replays the commercials. 
The interactive commercials were a terrible idea, terrible TERRIBLE. it’s a cool concept but I’m paying for a service to watch content not to be bugged with having to touch the screen every single commercial break. just to choose whether or not I want no participate in the interactive commercial requires that I stop what I’m doing to choose one so either way you’re interrupting my viewing experience.

title: Horrible the past few days
review: I have only had this app for maybe a month or so and I really liked it at first but the last few days it's been horrible. I've used it in different places with different wifi and it's the same thing. Buffer restart, play a little, buffer restart, jumps back, buffer, etc. this is seriously every 2 seconds. And reaching out to support was not useful at all. My internet speed is not the issue. All other apps work great. I hope they fix whatever this problem is or I will cancel and stick with Netflix only

title: The user interface is a nightmare
review:
There are probably thirty things wrong with this app’s user experience, but the two currently haunting me the most are:

1. Autoplay won’t play the next consecutive episode if you are watching a past season, it keeps jumping to current episodes
2. The fast forward and rewind feature is punitive and awful. Besides accidentally triggering it all the time, it immediately skips to where your finger is relative to the width of you screen, instead of rewinding or fast forwarding from where you currently are in the how. Ridiculous.

title: Hate the mobile app!
review:
Why change something that already (sort of) works!! My phone and tv no longer have the same shows. I can’t delete anything from my tv, I used to do it from my phone. Well HALF of the shows in my profile on my tv don’t even show up on the mobile version! HATE IT!!
Update: KEEPS GETTING WORSE!!

title: Fix subtitles please
review: In the latest version some bug won’t allow me to turn subtitles on. It’s grayed out with the on selection selected. It says go to accessibility and settings, so I do and turn subtitles on there. Still no subtitles. Please fix this in the next update ASAP because I can’t watch anime (Boruto in this instance) without subtitles. I’ve tried turning off and on, even updating to the latest iOS.

title: Don’t have much control
review: You get little control over recorded shows or sports. If you have a team as a favorite it doesn’t allow you to watch a game live in the middle of the game. You can’t fast forward quickly. And then there’s the skipping, pausing, and glitches. It will at random times bounce back 2 mins to 15 mins. You are forced to watch it again. Makes watching live tv unenjoyable. I give it 2 stars because it is cheaper than cable/satellite. When it works it is worth it.

All I wanna do is watch my show which I'm btw paying $11 a month for or upwards of $100 a year and every time I click a video it says error won't load try reloading episode or try again later the point of updates is to fix things not create problems I don't even like writing this review or badmouthing apps but other reviewers and my own review make a fair point.  it's making me re evaluate paying for this. As soon as I updated this happened, it was fine before. Dissatisfied.
-Hannah

title: Commercials
review: All I want to do is want my shows but I feel like I’m watching commercials more than the actual show way to many commercial it’s really getting annoying having a commercial every few minutes didn’t think I was paying for the commercials instead

title: Hard to find my shows
review:
This update was horrible when I'm trying to find the shows I normally watch I have to dig around on the updated app. The old version I could find it real easy now I have to go through all the shows you want me to watch which I don't even want to watch or even care to watch. This updated version looks like you guys took two steps back instead of moving forward trying to make the App look trendy is not the way to do it please fix it
I would really like to give you zero stars for this update

title: Worst app
review: So many glitches. Sometimes the title of the episode will not match the description (they would be mixed up with the previous episode). Sometimes the next episode will not automatically play due to an “error” which requires me to restart the app. Sometimes it will this same “error” in the MIDDLE of a show. Sometimes the audio will be working but the screen will be blank. And almost every time... it will not save the place where you left off... it’s SO INACCURATE. I HATE THIS APP. I have to restart the app at least 10 times a day.

title: Too many bugs
review: When you watch shows on this app you will experience lots of bugs that make it very tedious to use the app. For example, if I finish an episode of a show and want to watch the next one, It will sometimes start playing the next episode’s audio, but the video is a still picture, I then have to completely close the app and relaunch it. This app would be 5 stars, but there are WAY too many bugs for me to recommend it to anyone.

title: Used to work...
review:
The app used to work fine. I could tap it and it would open. I now tap it and nothing happens. I’ve deleted the app repeatedly and redownloaded it, I constantly power cycle to get it to open and that’s just in my phone. On the fire stick, it is just closing mid show. We have the latest version of the app and fire stick, as well as fast internet/data and I have an iPhone 11. 

I’m guessing it’s not me, but you...

title: Amazin’!
review: I love the app and lets me watch all my favourite shows like live pd, nightwatch nation, behind bars rookie year and so much more. I hope that you will stop taking shows off and scheduling to show it at a later date. I was in the middle of a movie and the next day I could not watch it because it was to be broadcasted at a later date. If you could fix this then it is golden.

title: The Ads update
review: I understand the need for ads and to make money but you get paid monthly just for people wanting to watch off of your app i don't understand the excess of ads i just want to watch a show without haveing to see 4 different ad breaks not to mention most the time its the same adam and eve commercial its sad to see a good site gone to waste, its really hard to stay connected to a good show because of all the ads i just wanna feel the emotions in the show and then boom another ad appears would rate lower if i could

title: Great content, rough quality
review:
The selection of content is as predictably great as the companies that have bought a piece of the application. Honestly, you can find most of you want and it’s great, except the quality barley crawls over 720p.

We have a 4K Apple TV with a direct Ethernet connection to our 100mbps cable line, and it’s still massively pixelated.

So I guess it’s cool but they won’t bring the heat when it comes to seeing what your looking at it.

title: Review
review: I love this app but sometimes when I’m watching a show for a long period of time (binging) the adds get to be very much adding to the overall time it takes to watch something take My Hero Academia for example great show with a lot of detail and I’m glad it’s on there but there are about  four one and a half minute adds that really distract from the show qualities

title: 3rd or 4th time reviewing
review: It seems that every time I turn around, I’m re writing this review. The content is great but the app is so buggy. When you try to watch something, it sits and loads forever then times out. I have to restart the app a few times to get it to work. Then when it’s time for next episode, it errors out and you have to do it all over again. Looking forward to re writing this in a month.

title: Episodes Almost Never Marked As Watched
review: Consistently having issues with episodes never showing as being watched or seasons being caught up, I don’t know how many times there’s been an update that never solves this completely frustrating problem. On top of that, there’s always connectivity issues when watching shows and I have to constantly reload the page 2-3 times.

title: can’t watch one full episode
review: i would really appreciate if you all would fix this new bug that doesn’t allow me to watch a full episode without closing it like 10 times for it to load. i know it is not my internet because multiple people are experiencing the same thing. I really want to watch Marvel’s Runaways so fix this ASAP, please.

title: Phone to the tv
review: I haven’t use it for while now but I would have a problem when I would use my phone to watch a movie or a show on the tv I would have my phone connected with Cable core to the TV i would be able to hear the sound of but it wouldn’t show no picture on my tv

title: Broken
review: Cannot even sign into the app on Ipad or iphone while connected to WiFi.  Not an issue when connected to Cellular - very odd??  Have deleted and reinstalled the app multiple times, shut down and restarted both devices, and reset the modem/router to no avail.  Please fix this as it is very frustrating.

title: Ads AND Payments?
review: $10 for a month of ad packed television is not the greatest. Considering there is an ad every 7-9 minutes, I think that 90 seconds is a long time. It may be that I’m inpatient, or the “ lack of income” it seems they have to place so many ads. 10 usd from how many people that have this application is a lot of money and the ads are annoying and obnoxious.

title: Beautiful design
review: I feel like I should leave a review.. because I have no idea why people are complaining about the new design when the old one was a nightmare and outdated. Have not had any navigation problems and the new design is really beautiful. Also, thank you for picture in picture. Wow at these reviews.

title: Review
review: Honestly I really don’t mind the commercials that much. Although, having the same commercials playing is annoying. My real issue is when I'm streaming on my phone, the screen cuts to black and the video is still playing. Its not my phone screen dimming because I haven’t touched the screen or being in power save mode. It happens regardless if my phone is in regular battery usage mode or not. Iphone 7 here as well.

title: Crashes Constantly/Latest Update BLOWS
review: I echo the complaints of everyone else - the fast forward/pause play/screen issues are sabotaging viewing experience. In addition (or subtraction as it were), since the latest update? App crashes constantly or freezes my whole iPad and I have to restart! That’s some blast-from-the-past problems right there. seriously your competitors have figured it out, get yourselves together it’s embarrassing. Original content doesn’t mean anything if your viewers can’t get through a whole episode!

title: Newest update
review: This new update has been much better with the pausing skipping issue. The only problem I’ve noticed thus far is the back button “<“ in the top left corner is nearly covered by the play next button so either I have to turn off auto play or start the next episode to go back. Not much of a deal breaker but rather annoying.

title: Fast-forward Feature
review: Bring back the fast-forward dot or button on the bottom of the screen.  I don’t like the sliding anywhere on the screen it’s annoying when you accidentally touch the screen and it Rewind or fast-forward to wherever you touch the screen.

title: Please remove the rewind feature!
review: Show and movie selections are great but too many ads. I watch a lot of anime and having 6 ads on a 20-25min show is a bit much. The feature where you tap to rewind is literally driving me crazy. There have been countless times when I've picked up my iPad to move it, accidentally fast-forwarding to the end and having to wait for the ad to finish before I'm able to movie it back (and then sometimes having to watch another ad). Please REMOVE.

title: Worst control center ever
review: I hate this setup. I’m just trying to go to the episodes of a show and it give me two options; go to more info or the series details. Like what? What is series detail. I click on that then there are like two more steps to go to the episodes spot. Also when ever you are watching something if you are trying to go back to the main page you might as well close and restart the app because I guarantee you will end up clicking something else. Netflix is on such a superior level it isn’t even funny.

title: Cancel/Get Netflix!!! Can't even use the app!!!
review: If you don't have brand new devices! Don't bother even signing up! This is truly robbery! They don't ask you what type of device you have or even let you know that the app is not compatible with all devices! I can use freaking Netflix on a PS3 still! It's ridiculous that they even accept your money... Knowing that they need to fix they're app! Also all they said was yeah we know it has to be updated! I'm sure I am not the first to call about this issue! I canceled my subscription to say the least! #FUCKHULU!!!

title: Clear Watch History/Keep Watching
review: I think the app is pretty ok, except for one major problem. There’s no way to clear your watch history (that I know of.) It’s very annoying because my keep watching category is just filled with movies that I started but I didn’t finish because I didn’t like them. Please add someway to clear history through the app!

title: It was fun while it lasted
review: I can’t watch on mobile anymore because every time I click on a show or movie to watch it doesn’t play instead your click and clicking and it still doesn’t work! Please fix this ASAP and I’ll change my review back to a 5 star rating!

title: Needs a lot of work
review:
The app has too many bugs, glitches and annoying actions. Many seem like they would be easy fixes, but no they don't care.
When watching a show, sometimes it wont go to the next episode, instead it will play a random new one.
When trying to resume watching something, sometimes it will restart episode from the beginning.
If trying to find a movie or show you were watching sometimes it wont show up anywhere on your "continue watching".
When making multiple profiles, some users will not be able to find theirs, and will be let in to another profile that is not theirs.
If you have the version with ads, forget about rewinding or fast forwarding because it wont let you until you watch all the ads.

title: LOVE LIVE
review: Loving the live tv option! Just wish the guide for live tv was more like cable tv with being able to see what’s playing in the future. Also a better live tv demand option. There’s lots of shows I like to watch, but they air when I’m sleeping. But it’s hard to record those shows when I can’t go further in the guide, or find it in an on demand menu.

title: App needs work
review: You guys need to fix the buffering when uploading the videos and when watching an episode and when the next one begins? It either goes back to the home page or I have to close the app and then open it back up and then go to series details and then pick the next episode! Very frustrating! For a paying subscription this issue needs to be fix! It’s not my service, everything else works fine except your format! Fix it or ya going to lose not just me but many customers

title: Needs fixing
review: I can’t even get to watch one show.... I was looking forward to watching some things I haven’t been able to cause I could only find on here and I can’t even get started. Checked the WiFi multiple times and nothing. I’ve switch from WiFi to my phone data and nothing reinstall the app and nothing... I hope this can be fixed before I regret my choice of getting the plan

title: Good shows But Missing Episodes
review: Many of the great shows provided have missing episodes which make enjoying this platform very irritable and something needs to be done about this, if your not going to have all episodes of a show then don’t put it on your platform, simple as that. Disappointed and Unsatisfied. Also sometimes the advertisements are ridiculous, you can pay a lower price for a simple subscription on Netflix and get no ads.

title: It gets annoying
review: I’m fine with the ads since it’s the cheapest version but I would appreciate it if it actually saved the spot I stopped at like Netflix does. Every time I go back to the app I have to scroll through the episode and rewatch the same ads before just to get to my spot. Also can we get more variety in the ads 😂 I get the same ads five times in one episode and it gets annoying

title: Terrible platform
review: Every time I go to continue a series it’s always 3 episodes back from where I left off. There’s no easy way to get into Episodes and seasons making it more difficult to find the episode where you left off and that’s if I use the same device! I can’t imagine if I hoped from my laptop to my tv what would happen. Who pays for this crap with commercials on top of it. I came here for Letterkenny and I’m leaving after two weeks... it’s too much of a headache. I bought all 6 seasons... worth every penny not to use this.

title: I can’t sign in
review:
App works on my Apple TV not my iPhone.

Update: I figured it out. I had to give my phone permission to use cellular data to use the app. Suggestion/ it would be helpful for a pop up to show the option of turning on cellular data for this app if it is turned off and no WiFi is connected.

title: Quality tv
review: For $13 a month I get pretty much all the good shows that are out right now and forever ago, but without the commercials. Compared to paying for sat/cable where commercial breaks can last up to 5 min. that's a steal. Also the layout format is sleek and I enjoy launching the app and navigating through it

title: Great service, sports are a bit lagged
review: I text with my family a lot during sporting events and they are usually 30 seconds to a minute ahead of me. Also, my brother lives in Dayton, but would prefer to get the Milwaukee channels. That seems like something that should be an option. Otherwise I love it, way better than any cable service I’ve had

title: You can do better than this
review:
Why is it that when I’m watching something on iPad and I swipe up then the show keeps playing but the video doesn’t show anywhere. 

Also I just finished watching an episode of something and I press the close button and I went back and I tapped on a different series to start watching and now I have two videos one playing in the background and playing commercials and the other one in the foreground playing commercials this is ridiculous you can do better.

title: Bring old version back
review: I hate the new version of this app! It’s so not user friendly, I have nothing to show me when there’s new episodes of the shows I watch, unless I go digging. I miss being able to see clearly first thing when I open the app shows I watch and what has a new episode. I struggle to find anything and my child can’t use it at all anymore without me fully setting up which is also quite frustrating. Please bring back a simpler version!!

title: Unwatchable due to excessive adds
review:
Seriously what you guys need is to have Corp. America be more involved in your application....
I mean there’s just not enough adds...every 4 minutes is t good enough you should make it every 3!!! Why not....he’ll you’ve already duped us into buying the app thinking we could actually watch the programming on it without being interrupted excessively!!!! I’m scared for my children... I mean seriously is it going to be normal in the future to have to watch an hour of propaganda just to have 15 minutes of real viewing time Jesus...RIDICULOUS!

title: Great app
review: It has a good amount of shows and I love how it *usually* has shows that Netflix doesn’t. I don’t like that you can’t access your account through the app though since my phone is my only source of internet mostly. I can access their website obviously but it would be a lot more convenient since I have their app downloaded anyway.

title: Love hate. But lots of hate
review:
So happy to have live tv without cable. But this app drives me nuts. Stop switching stuff every time i use it. Something i watched the past two days is now impossible to find. But the repeat skipping - that i can find. Easily

I will stick with it for a bit. But it is a frustrating journey. And god forbid you want to use the app outside your house - dont even try. It requires a sync, a dance, and a letter from jesus to use this on a business trip or just 5 ft too far from your wifi

title: Premier league  and NBCSN don’t show in Sports
review:
3 big beefs. 
1. Premier league is soccer and should show in soccer category 2. Seems like overall NBCSN is not even coming up in sports or listing future events at all. 
3. Why is the Guide only showing exactly 24 hours ahead. Why not next day or next week. Other TV providers offer at least a week. I need this to set recordings for the upcoming week when I will be away.

Not yet at all usable as a replacement for my cable TV provider. Same comments go for Apple TV and iPad app

title: Can I give this zero stars
review: Thought I was crazy for hating this app but turns out most people do. 80 seconds of commercials every like 3-5 mins.... and half the time it glitches so bad that it makes you watch like 20 commercials. Not worth it. They take your money and provide crap service . Just buy Netflix

title: Crashing
review: App keeps crashing after finishing episodes saying that there is no internet connection please try again later. This will also happen if I open another app or answer a text message and go back into the show I was watching. It’s all shows, at all times of the day or night, with apps open and closed. There is no pattern on what might be causing this issue other than a bug within the programming itself. The only positive thing about this crashing is that it motivates me to stop watching faster.

title: Semi functional, stupid changes from previous versions
review: Why when I watch this on my iPad does the video stay small and pull up other things to watch along the side? When I push resume, I want to watch that show in full screen, not get suggestions of other shows. In fact, the whole new look of the update made the entire app less functional. So much harder to navigate or browse.

title: Subtitles
review: I don’t have any problems streaming. My main problem is that the subtitles won’t display after a certain time. It will go out until you select the option again. Then it will do it again. You have to “reset it” multiple times during shows. It’s a little frustrating but not the end of the world.

title: THE BEST APP.
review:
HULA is great. When I saw the reviews I was shocked. I have only watched the t.v. Series, have not gotten to the movies yet. But I have had absolutely no problem with this app at all. 
Hula has everything on t.v. Shows and when I say Everything, I mean it!! I love the old shows and new shows. I asked my husband to pick a show and he did ( one I never heard of ) and the show was on the app.  
I have watched the show on my iPhone 7 Plus and on my t.v. as well and have had no lagging, stopping, or anything.. I have to say I would recommend this app to Everyone!! You should definitely try it. You have nothing to lose if you try it Free for a month. 

-K- W.
Dania Beach, FL

title: Glitches a lot
review: It seems to have a lot of bugs. Kicks you out a lot, glitches tons, doesn’t go to the page you clicked on sometimes. Though I think the shows and movie choices are better than netflix. Unfortunately you over pay for extra streaming. You have to buy a couple packages before you are offered extra streaming... it’s a toss up. I have a feeling I wont be using it long.

title: Could be way better
review: Need an option to restart a partially watched episode of a show. I watch shows and am all caught up with a series but it will say there’s 5 min left in most recent episode and that I’m not caught up. Annoying quirks/bugs with app. Takes too many clicks to go back to the main screen when done watching a show. Was trying to watch a NFL game and started 45 min after game actually started but the app kept starting at beginning of broadcast instead of live even tho it said it was at the live part.

title: What the what
review: Guys, I’ve loaded the app 3 times tonight I cannot get past the start screen. I’m frustrated, this is the very reason I’ve canceled service twice before. I hotspot for internet service on my roku it was working fine then.
