I use my phone most often to save my hotspot time and I CANT use the app.  I love the service even with the repeat ads that are slightly annoying, but if I can’t get it to work I’ll just suspend the service and use Netflix until you figure it out. I came back based on your info the app was updated. Not cool not cool at all.

title: Unreliable with virtually non existent tech support
review: You can believe the ratings. For such a big company they offer almost no tech support when things don't work which is often. Only Comcast is worst in my experience. Call in and they always have " normal than usual call volume" and it hangs up on you. No email reply. Classic example of a company that sells a service but doesn't invest in support to make sure it works. No wonder people stream stuff illegally, as appears easier and more reliable from what other people have shown me.

title: Please take my money
review: I keep trying to sign up but I quite literally can't, I download it put in all the necessary info get the free trial and then it's like sorry we can't make your account, and even if it is made it won't let me log in so it's like restore purchase? Yes please. Log in works, thank god! Would you like to upgrade your account? 1. How you won't let me make an account. 2. I'm trying to get the no add option, how could I possibly upgrade. I'm a little afraid I may have spent upwards $50 dollars TRYING To sign up for your service. Get your stuff together

title: This is why people pirate
review: You've taken what used to be a good app and completely ruined it. I haven't been able to actually play video in it in three updates which is funny because your freaking ads work just fine. Video just goes to a black screen with sound after the ads okay. Absolute waste off money. You guys basically have until the end of this week to fix it or I'm cancelling. Frankly, I want a refund for the two months that is hasn't worked too but that will never happen. Even the CBS app isn't this bad.

title: The new update
review: This app hasn’t worked properly for me since the new update. Every single time I try to play I video, it gives me an error message. I’ll try deleting and reinstalling the app but after several phone resets, nothing’s changed. The older version of the app was much more user friendly.

title: New Update = App doesn't work
review: Every since the latest update, which changed the entire look of the iPhone app, no show or movie will play via the iPhone app. The iPhone app will open, I can see and read info about my shows and episodes but when I click play they won't. Please fix thanks

title: Not worth it
review: I bought this and there were some good shows but it really doesn’t make sense that I have to pay and can’t even watch all the movies came here wanting to watch the man with no name movies but I have to pay even more to watch it and lots of other tv shows and movies

title: New Interface is Slow to Navigate
review:
The new interface is terrible. One of the nice things about on-demand streaming services is the ability to browse to find new content. The only way to browse on this app is to swipe through every<swipe>individual<swipe>show<swipe>. The classic UI concept of "max three clicks to get anywhere" is dead. This looks and acts like an early Windows 8 app - so over simplified that it is useless.

As my primary interface is with the mobile app (streaming to a Chromecast), if this isn't fixed, I'll cancel my service.

title: HATE the update
review: Canceling subscription now because I HATE the update.  It was so simple before and now the kids can not even navigate their way around!  What a WASTE OF TIME scrolling through each show individually! And the number of times the show skips all over the place bc of accidentally touching the screen ANYWHERE. Look at Hulu’s 1 star rating now. WE DO NOT LIKE ANYTHING ABOUT THE NEW UPDATE! And now there is no option to erase user history in the app. You have to go on the computer. Now wireless headphones can no longer pause and un-pause the show! Touch screen only!  DESERVES ZERO STARS!!!!

title: Terrible
review: Can't tell you how many times I "accidentally" touched a wrong part of the screen and it took me back/forward so I had to watch commercials until I could go back to where I was. It's too sensitive. Also really hard to find what I'm looking for. You have to scroll so much to get to where you want to go. And "Play next episode" page doesn't really work. I would click on the next episode and it wouldn't go there. You just wait it out and it plays the same episode you just watched. Over all, a terrible update.

title: Horrible GUI and Service is Worse
review:
I applied the updates and it only got worse from there... versions 5.6.0 and 5.6.1 have made it very difficult to navigate, it takes much longer to find a favorite show or something new to watch. 
The app also no longer supports HDMI mirroring Apple's lightening to HDMI adapter. I will be canceling my subscription  pending HULU's response regarding support ongoing support for HDMI mirroring. If you are not already a subscriber I recommend you wait to sign up until reviews reflect a fix has been made or putting your subscription on hold.

title: What have you done?
review: What you've done with the new update is terrible. Why change something that is not broken. Give change to the costumer in small bite sizes not throw them completely into a banquet of chaos.  It is confusing and having to get acquainted with a whole new look takes more time that enjoying the shows we/I like to watch. 👎

title: Still broken: updated
review:
I used to love the app but the newest update still doesn’t fix it so I can tap on the shows and it still doesn’t play. Again the point of a streaming app is to stream anything and it’s still useless at doing just that.
Update: mysteriously started working again just last night. I can stream again!

I would’ve gave it 5 stars but, there is to many ads and the ads are way too long so I had to deduct at least two stars. Honestly it’s unbearable, if your gonna put a bunch of ads at least not make them so painfully long. Other than that there is a very good collection and variety of shows. Good collection of shows and long ads aside, would i recommend buying? If you can bare 2+ minute ads yes.

title: Auto play is messed up!
review: I’m watching a show and instead of logically moving on to the next episode in the series it jumps to a completely different show i’ve never even watched before. How Frustrating! Watching “Miss America” would not mean I want to watch “Legion” after the episode ends.

title: App Problems
review: Constantly having problems opening the app, back in January-February, i couldn’t open the app because of a error that would happen, yet on my tv i could open it, and i would constantly check for any new updates and reinstall but nothing worked, and now in April, and i’m sure for May, the app won’t even open, i press on it to launch the app, and it starts then immediately closes out to my home screen, this is very annoying, and seems to not be a issue my end, so i’d like to see it get addressed.

title: Good but...
review: I like it for the choices of shows and all but the ads every few minutes isn’t very nice. I know you can pay to remove them but I don’t think that very good because you already are paying for a membership. At least lower the time of the adds from 2 minutes to 1 that would be 50 millions times better.

title: Great shows, horrible bugs
review: This app has a great variety of shows, i prefer it over Netflix, HOWEVER the only issue i have is the unbearable GLITCHES! At first it would close out of an episode and back to the season menu sporadically, now after about 3-30 seconds after clicking on an episode the app IMMEDIATELY crashes! It’s so annoying! I have a paid subscription, yet I can’t watch anything! This is so unprofessional.

title: AUTOPLAY
review: Please fix the autoplay function idk what happened but it doesn’t work anymore so between each ep I have to physically press play. Also the recommendations need to be fixed, if I say stop suggestion a month later it shouldn’t suggest the same show. It may not seem like much but it’s super annoying and it feels like they’re trying to bombard us with shows they have on their platform to make it seem like there’s always something new or constantly updated.

title: Ads, ads and more ads
review: Too many ads. Every 3-8 minutes theres 90 seconds worth of ads and it’s hard to enjoy a show with interruptions. A lot of interruptions. Its ridiculous and of course it’s your business’ way of earning the money every company needs, but this isn’t how you are supposed to earn it. You are losing users and one of them is me. It’s really hard to focus and get into the show if you’re literally not even able to watch it.

title: Who does your UX/UI?
review: It’s like the UX/UI people don’t know what intuitive, user-friendly experience looks like. Who puts play-rewind-forward buttons within literally millimeters from each other? How is that a good experience? And then I can’t pause by clicking anywhere on the screen - no, I have to use all my sniper skills to aim at one of those minuscule buttons to press the right buttons. Absolutely ridiculous. Oh yeah, and the dashboard? You should test your dashboard on actual people and see how intuitive that ridiculous interface is.

title: Poor support
review: The apps like to say that there must be a connection issue on your end, but really it will work on 2 of 3 devices and is most likely a app bug they don’t care to fix. One week it will be your tv, the next your iPad. They point you to their help center where they basically tell you to turn off your device and turn it back on... super frustrating. I like the live tv service but I’m going to switch over this run around and zero tech support.

title: Works great! At least one tweak needs to be addressed.
review: The app works great. It plays my videos without any difficulties. However there is one issue that I think needs to address. The function that removes a show from “my stuff”. For instance, there is this anime series that I want to remove. But no matter how many times I hit remove on either my iOS devices or my PCs, it keeps returning to the “my stuff” list. It is getting annoying!

title: Promotion failed
review: Tried to sign up for the promotion they had just after Thanksgiving. .99/month for 1 year. Wow great deal! But website would not load. I actually fell asleep while waiting for it to hopefully start working. Woke up went to work, got off work to call them and since I didn’t call them before 10am EST I don’t get the promotion deal. BUT I could sign up for 5.99/month with limited commercials. Lol! No thanks. You’re site should have been working and to only extend the offer for a short amount of time! Some of us have to work...

title: THIS IS THE BEST
review: I love this because u r able to wach things that were only on tv but no you can find on this app and you can also watch shows that used to be on Netflix that aren’t anymore I spend most of my time on this app I love it so much and I never one out of fun shows to watch I love this so much 💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜💜

title: Decide for yourself
review: You pay for it, but you still have to watch commercials. Yeah there’s an almost commercial free higher tier for a few dollars more, but you need to decide if that’s worth it. Their stream is unreliable for me, while my other services (Netflix, HBO) deliver perfect streams. But I get to watch old stuff and check out current shows from studios that probably don’t deserve my attention. So there’s that. Is it worth it? Up to you.

title: I hate the new “experience “
review:
It take more taps, more swipes, more time to find the content I’m trying to watch. How about a quick link to start watching what you were the last time you left the app? I want to see multiple options on my screen that I can scroll around with, like before. This is particularly bad on my iPad. What a waste of a giant 12” screen! Seriously?! Only show one show at a time? STUPID!

And why does it take SO LONG TO LOAD!

Also I don't like the rw/ff overlay. Its way too dark compared to the content and takes too long to go away.

title: Where’d My List Go?!?!
review: Since the new app update on my iPad, the platform has gotten terrible to use. I have a number of items added to my list for easy access, but when I click the “my stuff” button on the bottom of the screen, all that shows up is the one show I just finished watching and nothing else. The option to access my list is not on the home screen either. The platform when on the web on my desktop is amazing, I love it! But when it comes to accessing it on my iPad and iPhone, its terrible.

title: So complicated!
review: I don't usually write bad reviews, but this app deserves one. The old version was so easy to use and this one is very complicated and not user friendly at all! Not just the app for the iPhone or iPad, but also for Apple TV! We keep trying to use these, but get so frustrated that we give up and use another app. Please go back to being simple, and put all of our watch list info on the front page! This version makes searching or watching any program too frustrating. Ugh. The old version was so much better.

title: EXAGGERATED BUFFERING
review: Love the shows on here but it is a constant battle with the buffering! It is absolutely ridiculous! I thought it was my internet until I realized that all other apps worked fine and it didn’t matter which internet network I was on it had the same problem! If they could fix the glitches and buffering this would get a 4 star rating from me but it is a hassle watching my favorite shows because of the wait time caused by buffering.

title: Some Shows Play, Some Don’t
review: Some shows on the app play when you press on them, but others show a “Parse Error 2” saying something went wrong. I can watch those same shows easily on my PS4, but when I’m trying to start a show on my iPhone app it shows an error. The only way I can get around this error is by starting the first few seconds of the show on my PS4 so I can watch that show on my phone. Please fix your app to be more reliable. This is very inconvenient which is the only job of an application: conveniency.

title: Won’t open any more
review: Just yesterday everything was fine. We pay for our subscription but now I can’t get the app to open on my iPad. I have restarted it, deleted and reloaded the app and done everything I could think of to get it to work. Developers please fix this so I can continue to enjoy your app and give it the five stars it so deserves.

title: Plan is ad-free but a lot of 90 second ads
review:
Hello and this  app is amazing for all the shows that got sent out of Netflix and you are looking to watch them again.

But the thing is my plan was ad-free but it is showing me 116 second ads!

Can you fix this please and when you do, I’ll sure be around to change the rating to 5 stars!

title: Video player keeps crashing
review: The most recent update has given me issues on video playback. Every time I open the app and start streaming a show, it crashes once or twice telling me there was an error playing the video and said to restart the video and try again. Why is this happening? It’s annoying

title: Doesn’t save my shows - slow ff and rew - fix it please!
review:
For an app I pay monthly for, it is super frustrating to have it NOT save my place in an episode if I have to close out, pause, or stop in the middle. This has been happening for months. Or shows I add to my watchlist disappear. I’d like to see these glitches get fixed.

Here we are in December of 2019 still dealing with the same issues! And your program fast forwards and rewinds painfully slow. Please fix these problems!

title: 3 stars
review: This a great app overall but a few concerns there are to much ads in every thing I watch there are about 6 ads and they are over a minute long. A lot of things are locked and not able to be watched! I pay a lot and everything has a very long and boring ads But it’s a good app and please maybe change these things are take them in consideration. Thank you for your time!

title: Good App Except for
review: The ads are ridiculous. When watching a tv series that only has 20-30 minutes long episodes there are 3-4 points at which it stops to show over a minute of ads. At least narrow it down to two per episode. It takes away from what I’m watching and I lose interest in even using the streaming service after having to sit through the ads.

title: Crappiest app around
review: The incompetence in your service and employees is utterly atrocious. Just as many others have complained in their reviews, I have the same issues. It is not my connection. ALL other streaming apps work fine. You complete morons can’t seem to get it together. You roped me back in for a free month about five hours ago. Canceled again. You all need to find a new profession. At this point, I hope your company goes under and you are left jobless. Maybe it’ll give you a drive to try something new like flipping burgers or pole sitting.

title: Ehh
review: Overall, it’s a good service and offers a lot of really good movies and tv shows. However, just like every other review on here, I’m having some troubles. Every time I try to watch something, it tells me there’s an error playing the video and I have to get out of the app and restart it. Sometimes that doesn’t even help. Frustrating to say the least, especially when I’m paying for this. PLEASE fix it!!!!

title: Ads
review: I feel that you should remove ads when we are trying to rewind what we have already watch mean while I’m watching a show and maybe I fall asleep I should be able to rewind without having to rewatch a AD I already seen I would and many other would appreciate this update it would benefit your app and the people who use it...

title: Expensive, flawed experience
review:
Charges a bit much to give you a message “you’re not ALLOWED to fast forward through advertisements for this title”. Why? I’m on the most expensive tier. Negotiate better or charge us less.

*Edit* in app experience makes it too easy to begin playing another show in the middle of your show. It has a hairline trigger and too many opportunities to misclick while you’re watching.

title: Unable to use it!
review: I'm very disappointed. I have been having technical issues with my account since I paid for another month, a week ago. I am not able to watch anything without the screen stating some form of an error every five minutes. I have uninstalled and reinstalled, and I'm still having issues with errors that state that I cannot play video at the moment.

title: Needs new fast forward and rewind function.
review: Don’t understand why to fast forward it’s 30 seconds. 10 seconds is just fine. Also anytime i grab my phone for whatever reason, wherever i happen to touch the video fast forwards/rewinds to that part which is very annoying. You should change it to where you have to press on a little circle to choose timing of the show you want to go to. It is very sensitive and is always changing where i’m at

title: Simple and easy
review: The app itself is straightforward and easy to use with a decent enough selection of material, however, lately there have been SO many ads that make it almost worse than watching cable. Part of the reason I enjoy streaming services is because there’s not normally any commercials, but that’s not the case here. Ads are frequent and long, but overall it’s a good product.

title: Interesting
review: I would like if they had violetta but that is okay .the comercial are somewhat entertaining .overall it is a great deal and has several great options . So you should get this app  that lets you chill and is better then Netflix -thank you (if you read this I would like violetta on the options please)

title: I hate when I pause the show and it freezes and you have to re-start the show  over
review: I hate when I pause the show and it freezes and you have to re-start the show  over  they really need to fix it and then most the time it won’t let you go back

title: Frustrating
review: I get so frustrated using this app. I try to watch a show on it and cast to Chromecast but it often cuts out and disconnects and then won’t restart where I left off, but instead starts from the beginning. Even if the progress bar shows where I left off, the episode starts from the beginning. I’ve never had this much trouble using the Netflix app. Think I’ll cancel and just watch Netflix shows, as I spend more time trying to fix the issue or catch back up than I do watching actual episodes.

title: Errors
review: I updated the app when i saw the error i thought that it would fix the error but it wouldn't go away. i have been trying to get rid of it for a month and it still wont go away. can you fix it? its okay if you don't have time. i hope you have a great day!

title: Status bar at top of screen permanently there during full screen playback
review: I don’t know HOW this bug got through without anyone noticing - the status bar at the top which shows the clock, connection and battery status stay on the screen and never disappear during full screen playback on my iPad.  Highly, highly distracting.

title: Status bar won’t go away
review: My iPad app updated between me watching shows. When I came back from taking a break, the stays bar that has the WiFi range, time and battery level will not go away! I know this is because of the update. Very distracting and the status is very bright when you’re trying to watch in the dark. Please fix! Other than that, I never have a problem with the app.

title: Dubbed versions of Japanese Anime
review: I know this is about one topic no one really cares about, but I do, a lot! So I’ve been watching this one Anime called “Fairy Tail”. I love it with all my heart, but I can’t listen to Japanese accents when I’m trying to read, SO I use the dubbed versions, but I found out not all the seasons have dubbed versions. Only 2 out of 8 seasons have dubbed versions. Can you add them, I know there out there! But I really love this app besides that I want to watch my Anime!

title: Scroll bar moves to easily
review: The only part of this app I don’t like and that is very annoying is that when you tap ever so slightly on the screen while watching/listening to a show, the scroll bar moves where you are in the show, often skipping way too far. This is annoying bc that usually includes watching a commercial so you can’t go back to where you were right away.

title: Good Service
review: Overall the service is good for the price you pay, I have live tv plus no commercials in onDemand content. The only issue I have is that live tv should be one click/swipe to get to it, my preference would be to have that where Keep Watching is now. Basically I want to see what’s live on all the channels before I select a channel to start streaming.

title: Horrible Video Player UI
review: If you tap the screen by accident or when trying to pause during video playback (just about anywhere on the screen), the video will violently fast forward or rewind, completely ruining the whole video, often finishing it for you, forcing you to have to re-navigate and find the video again and hope you remember when you left off. Absolutely horrible feature, you can't even touch your device when using it with this new feature! Horrible for a phone!

title: Quality App
review: It has pretty much any show you’d want to watch besides the office, and I haven’t encountered any bugs or glitches. Easy to find shows. The only thing that I find annoying is that you can’t listen to it when it isn’t on screen. Not like Netflix where you can turn your phone to sleep or switch apps and play the sound.

title: Still not used to it but PIP is back!
review:
I use this app every single day and I still can't get used to it.  Also where is the picture in picture??? Please bring it back.

Thank you for bringing back Picture in Picture!

Also, it would be better if the show seasons are laid out on top instead of having a drop down menu (too many menus)

title: Awful interface
review: It functionally works, but the new interface is horrible. I specifically find issue when watching a show and I press pause/start. More than once I have accidentally moved places in the show trying to hit start/fast forward or backward/get the overlay to move. There's no longer a small picture of where you're fast forwarding/rewinding to so it's then tough to even find where you were. I'd watch these shows any other way, if I could.

title: Like the update, but...
review: The subtitles will randomly not appear anymore. This happens quite often. When this happens, I will check the settings, and it will still have subtitles in English selected. Changing the settings to no subtitles, then back to subtitles fixes it for a while, but it gets quite annoying, since I have bad hearing and can't always fully hear what's being said.(this happens while I'm using the app on my phone, does not happen while watching on PS4)

title: Skip time
review: The app is amazing don’t get me wrong it’s just that if you try to skip forward in a show you don’t skip forward 10 seconds but 30 seconds which to me is quite a lot of time. I just think it’s annoying that the backwards is 10 seconds and the forward is 30 seconds. Overall the app is really good.

title: Can’t watch live TV
review: I’ve had this app for a couple of years and all of the sudden, it says I cannot watch TV because I am not in my home. Even though I am in my home. I deleted and redone loaded the app. It told me to allow my location but, my iPhone only gave me the option to “Allow while using app” instead of allowing all the time (which I don’t understand why I can’t just “Allow” all the time) So it leaves this app useless for watching live sports or shows.

title: Buffering, freezing, crashing
review: I have a 400Mbps internet connection, and this app buffers, freezes on screen while audio continues playing, crashes to home screen with no warning, ALL the time. I'm on the current iOS version and my app is up to date. I don't get it. I have ZERO problems with the browser version and the Fire TV version. It's so frustrating trying to watch anything with this app on iOS...you've got to do something about this.

title: Unable to open the app, However it’s my preferred streaming application.
review: I would give the app five stars., But recently the app has been unable to open, No matter how many times I restart it, Or even restart my whole phone. I’m unsure if it’s a problem with my phone or with the app. It was still fun to use up until now, Since I can’t open it.

title: Love the app but....
review: I’ve been watching game of thrones. I bought the HBU add-on and the show still wouldn’t work on my T.V. It’s just not there. That’s fine I’ve been watching on my phone / computer instead. Pulled out my phone this afternoon to start the next episode- suddenly GoT is no longer there either. I’m paying money for content I can’t access. Other than that the app is great, but that’s a pretty huge issue for me. 😕

title: Ad glitch
review: I’m sure everyone who has used this app for more than five minutes has experienced this but when an ad comes up, the sound of the show comes up and I can’t hear the audio and miss crucial parts of the show or there are jokes i can’t hear. This really worsens the experience of a show, which is the whole point of a streaming app. May delete this review is they fix this issue.

title: It’s fine
review: Make the back arrow button bigger dude. It’s so hard to press on my phone. So tiny and small. I always miss it and so I have to close out of the app and go back in just to change to a different show or episode which is absolutely annoying. Other then that it’s fine

title: App constantly crashes
review: Constant crashing, adds are 10x louder then the show. When you watch a episode it doesn't say you finished it, it always says there’s like 45 seconds left so you constantly have “unwatched” shows in your lists. Sometimes when you continue to watch a show it will load 2 or 3 episodes back so you have to stop it and go find the right episode your actually on and now you have another unwatched episode in tour list. And now the new update won’t even let me open the app.

title: Sometimes gets frustrating
review: This app is good and entertaining but there are a couple problems one it glitches every couple of minutes two after you’ve had it for a while it starts kicking you out of the app before you even see the shows and it takes a long time to load if you skip a part of a show or movie.

title: It’s a great app but
review: I watched a show twice idk why but I did when I watched it the first time it was different more episodes came now when I watched it was less episode u need to fix that unless it’s my phone I watched it on a diff phone the second time it was on a new phone so idk but try to fix it cause I watched it on a diff acc to now I went in that acc it’s not there either so idk

title: No.
review:
This is the first review I think Ive ever written for anything online. Tried watching World Series last night, and it impossible. It froze literally during every pitch, and I kept needing to restart everything to get it back. Only to have it happen all over again. All my other streaming services were working fine.
Based on all the recent reviews, sounds like it was happening to everyone trying to watch live tv. This app has always been spotty but last night was a new low. If it happens again tonight, Im done.

title: Incomplete episodes
review: My only issue with the app is that for certain shows, it doesn’t upload all of the episodes even though the episodes have come out. I was watching Black Cover and had to continue watching the rest of the episodes on this website. I hope they fix this issue because if it wasn’t for this issue, I would have given 5 stars.

title: Bugs
review: I love this app and the shows on it but it’s not good at keeping track of where you left off on the episode. It gets me mad that it doesn’t keep track and sometimes it makes me watch ads again even though I already got through it. Please I just want that fixed but love everything else about the app.

title: Hate This App
review: i’m beginning to hate this app especially since every update ‘claims’ to fix those pesky bugs as y’all put it, but yet updates brings about more bugs or doesn’t fix existing ones. shows i’ve added doesn’t show up under the my stuff tab on all platforms i use (phone, tablet, fire tv, n ps4).  also don’t know what’s expiring since the expiring header under my stuff tab don’t work..seriously considering canceling my subscription for 2nd time n go with other apps.  this app is becoming increasingly useless

title: Crazy app
review: This app works 50% of the time for me. I keep it updated constantly and it just doesn’t want to work when I screen it to my tv. There’s no reason why I pay what I pay for it to not work and constantly tell me that there are “errors playing this title”. Whatever I watch will play half way through and then all of a sudden have an error message for absolutely no reason. Please fix your app to work better on phones and tv screen mirroring.

title: Not Great
review:
The content is great, but the way that they make sort through shows to get what you were watching last is at least one too many steps.

Another note, when you press the screen it goes to fast forward/rewind and I end up accidentally changing where I’m currently watching. This isn’t a necessary feature, it feels like they’re just trying to be different and IMO it’s unsuccessful.

title: Horrible update
review: I haven’t been having problems with the fast forward and rewind on the whole screen but I have been having problems with sometimes hitting the screen and it makes me go to my stuff. Then it plays the video in the background. I am also unable to get back to the video without closing the app

title: Previous channel
review: It is a good app. Works but lags some times. Maybe that’s just my WiFi maybe it’s the app, but one thing that can improve is adding a previous channel button. This would save my time and add on to my laziness lol. This saves me from scrolling all the way up and all the way down.

title: Serious problem! Fixed.
review:
I just loaded the latest update and the app keeps crashing on start. I just get the green splash page and then it closes again, his a problem.

Update: After a chat session with a helpful tech support person the problem was quickly fixed. Still, one star off for releasing a buggy update.

title: This is a miserable experience
review: There is nothing redeeming about this redesign. It takes three times longer to find anything, it’s slow and glitchy and I hate the new look. I can’t tell you how many times I’ve thought I was in one menu and actually in a different one, so when I swiped right or left, I lost my place and had to start over. It’s terrible and not worth the frustration. Don’t bother with the Live option. It freezes, skips around while you’re watching ‘live’ and doesn’t record giant gaps in programs.

title: Cc does not work with new update
review: The newest update has disabled closed captioning on my iPhone. When I click the gear in the top right corner and try to turn them on, the options are grayed out and will not change. The only thing I can select is a line saying Accessibility Settings, which just takes me to my phone's settings. I already have the options turned on on my device. Please fix.

title: Annoying to use
review: I hate how if I accidentally touch an area of the screen (or I'm just checking the time or something) on my iPad the stupid app rewinds or fast forwards even if I didn't touch the bottom timeline. Also I can't stand the home page. I like using the website on my lap too much better.

title: Ugh so annoying you have to pay extra for it to be enjoyable
review: This streaming service is so annoying you have to pay extra to get rid of super long ads and if you want to watch a certain show or movie sometimes it’s locked and you can’t watch it unless you pay more LIKE IS BUYING THIS NOT ENOUGH FOR YOU??? The only reason why it’s a 3 stars is because thank god my favorite shows aren’t locked🙄

title: New Interface not Intuitive and is Harder to Ise
review:
The interface looks beautiful, but it is not intuitive to use, and makes almost everything more difficult to use.

You can’t select the chromecast button UNTIL you play the video. One you chromecast it you can’t select subtitles like before. Navigating the different panels to select a show is confusing. 

Overall, the new interface while beautiful and promising, its unnecessarily more complicated to use. Please fix!

title: Why am I paying extra for no commercials?
review: Half of what I watch is FULL of commercials. Yet I pay extra. Annoying. The navigation and whole app setup is not user friendly. It needs a major, updated makeover. The reason for 3 stars is bc they have pretty good content, and several live news stations as opposed to just a couple from other live option apps when I’d compared.

title: Love the app but....
review: This app have so many various of shows to anime but the only cons about it is when it comes down to the anime like the audio even after the update why haven’t any of the animes have any voice  overs I know most people are fine with reading the subtitles and others like me would prefer to watch the show without having to read and miss the good parts of the anime if you guys can fix that it would be great and would also help a lot

title: Great compared to previous versions
review:
Previously would’ve given 3 stars as the build of this app wasn’t the most user friendly.

However, they have clearly taken note of this and promptly updated to a much better user interface easily earning 5 stars.

title: Annoying bugs
review: This really is a good app with great shows. However, the part that bugs me is the fact that it doesn’t save in the spot you left off and starts from the beginning of the episode. Can you please fix this issue. I thought it was just me but my co worker has same issue(no we don’t have same account)

title: Great improvement!
review: The changes to the live guide is a tremendous advancement for this app.  Prior to this latest version that features severely lacking.  I have gotten a few error messages when the live video is playing within the small inset in the live guide view which is why I couldn’t give it 5 stars. aside from that no issues noted.

title: Only 3 Stars after upgrade
review: The app is not updating on my iPhone nor on my roku for watched episodes. All week it states “one new episode”, when the episode has been watched. Please fix this ASAP! Seems there are more unhappy reviews with the new changes than positive. Maybe next time you should poll your users on what they want changed than assuming you know. Please fix the glitches quickly!

title: Downloads
review: Ive been using this app for several months now, and Ive been really happy with the selection of titles and overall performance. My only major annoyance is that you cant download things, which gets on my nerves quite a bit, since I travel a lot for work and like to be able to watch stuff on the plane or in the car. Other than that though, the app suits my needs.

title: FIX STATUS BAR
review: LOVE the app, aside from one issue that keeps it from 5⭐️. This is the status bar. Whenever I start to play a show or movie, the status bar at the top of the screen has a maybe 1 in 10 shot of disappearing. The other 9 times, I can see the status bar (time, battery, and wifi/4G info) and it’s really distracting. Please fix this

title: Could use improvements
review:
Love it but could be easier... 

Like netflicks, it would be nice if u could have user profiles within account because when my daughter and I watch same show at different timeframes we have to remember which episodes were on :/ 
 That’s one for now

title: Glitchy, it only allows you to watch something from beginning to end, you cannot jump ahead
review: Whenever I try to pickup on a movie (any movie) where I left off it says “error playing this video”. I can always start the video from the beginning and it works fine, but I don’t want to start it over when I’m 2 hours into a movie. Updating the app hasn’t helped either. Disappointing. Guess I’ll never see the end of Jumanji or the Fyre fest documentary

title: I like it but one thing
review: Hello, really enjoy the app. It has many exiting shows! One thing m concerned is, some of the advertisements I find it offense. There are times I have to hear it over and over again and I’m t makes me uncomfortable to watch. There should be a way to choose what you want to watch ad wise. Other than that i really enjoy watching !

title: Live TV guide not updating
review: It’s 8:00pm, despite me wanting to watch WWE on USA, I am seeing the show from the past hour. It’s as if everything is delayed by an hour. Unable to skip to the show currently playing, no luck. Close and restart app, still no luck. This is only happening on mobile but is pretty frustrating. Everything else is usually fine and works very well. Hope to see a fix soon.

title: Not great
review:
Lately this app has been acting up. When I watch a program on my list I expect it to leave the list after watched. But this is not always happening. 20/20 will not go away. I have left it to run to the end 3 times but still there. I have uninstalled and reinstalled app but nope still there.
Edit 10/17. Having a lot of synching issues. So annoyed trying to watch when the mouthes are off.

title: No good since the update
review: Ever since the new updated, the back button after watching a video don’t work anymore, thought it was my iPhone, but nope even on the ipad, I can’t navigate without exiting the whole app, killing it in the background and open it up again to go to the main page. Please fix this, other then that, I love the app. The fact for a 3 star is because of the new issues.

title: Certain shows
review: Certain shows I like to watch will not play on my iPad any more. I’ve tried uninstalling the app and reinstalling. I went to the help section, which was a joke. The 3 main shows I watch on my iPad in the app aren’t playing. But everything else I don’t want to watch works fine. Those shows also worked on the Xbox and didn’t work on my phone. I went from watching an episode to not being able to watch the next one.

title: Content won’t load
review:
Purchased the live tv open with 7-day free trial a week ago via Roku but the system is unable to load content. I can stream on 2nd generation appletv but I want live content.

The Roku devices and wifi connection check out fine but still no resolution. Was told the issue started on July 5th and impacting customers at random. As of yesterday the ticket was still open. An agent told me to uninstall the app from Roku for 48hrs then try again.

To their credit, they have  extended the free period but this is frustrating.

Not sure if this is just happening to me, but after the update when I’m watching a show a scene will lose audio, speed up, or repeat a scene twice. It’s very annoying, I have to be clicking the 10 second rewind to see what really happened in some scenes because it even fast forwards on its own. I’ve closed the app completely and restarted it and it still has all the glitches. Needs a new UPDATE!!

title: Your unwillingness to Succeed
review: Can’t display my tv shows from my phone on to the tv. The update you guys did completely messed everything up. I can’t touch my screen without accidentally clicking forward or rewinding almost every time. The account tab literally tells you to log in online... like...why have it there in the first place if you’re going to have to use the internet anyways... it’s pointless. Great job you guys. You have the potential to be better than Netflix but lack the necessary motivation.

title: Service is great interface is awful
review:
Lots of room for improvements on the new UI especially on the Apple TV. It appears the focus has been put on “cross selling” you shows verses letting you access the shows you want easily.  The interface on the Apple TV is very  choppy and hard to use by swiping your finger around.

The service is still very good, the variety of shows, item to release and video quality are all top notch.  Need for focus on human centered design for that UI.

title: New version not getting better
review: Like almost everyone else here I am becoming more and more frustrated with this app. It seems to be hated pretty unanimously and to that point I'm not sure why they haven't scrapped it. It is the least user friendly streaming application I own on any device for any service. Using it on my iPad is infuriating as it constantly skips to points in the movie/show if I accidentally touch the screen wrong. The ffwd and rwd features are not helpful. Please be rid of this new design and awful features!

title: Terrible update
review:
The new layout is overly confusing. I find things far more difficult to find and use. They seem to be focused on making it “modern” which increasingly means “show you one thing at a time and make things impossible to search”. 

Worse than that, I use this sometimes to stream on my Mom’s Apple TV when I go to visit, but they removed that feature for “security” reasons. It is insecure to stream tv on a tv? I think they are hoping to “secure” her as a paying customer, but that won’t happen at this point.

title: Unusable
review: When I’m watching a show, I will tap to see how much of the show I have left, and then try to tap to make the pause screen go away, when I’m greeting of going all the way to either the beginning or end. The way the slider works on the entire screen is just terrible. Also, when I’m watching a show and want to pause, it just won’t let me. I can’t even pause and play a show I’m watching without having to quit the app. So frustrating. I am thinking about switching to Netflix just because of these reasons.

title: Hmm, something is up.
review: First of all, Premium is good for people who don’t want ads but the bugs are non stop. I have to wait for hours for the hmm something is up screen to go away, all I wanna do is watch some shows, any reason why the hmm something is up screen always shows up?

title: Worst update
review: I don't like anything so far about the new interface. It's not user friendly, the fonts are too large to read easily, seems like I have to create new profiles because they didn't save my old ones which also means I have to go back and re-save all my shows. When scrolling through a list of movies or shows, you could see the whole screen easily and now it just highlights what you have selected and fades the rest of the screen. It's all really annoying. Please re-design again.

title: Glitches!
review: Random shows just get added to my stuff all the time, “ I love Lucy” has been stuck in my stuff for months now. i’ve tried unadding it, refreshing the app, deleted my account, made a new account, re-downloaded the app, and restarted my phone. Keep in mind i’ve never watched it! i never put it in my stuff to begin with, and when i unadd it to my stuff it stays but it says it’s not in my stuff.

title: Insufficient parental controls
review: I'm going to cancel my subscription because there aren't sufficient parental controls. A pre-teen or teen can easily switch from kids' mode to a regular account and while I can tell that's been done, it will be after the fact. I would like to have the option to limit profiles based on ratings (TV-PG or TV-14) for example and if a profile change is requested it should ask for my password. It's not that complex but I can't risk my kid being exposed to inappropriate content cause the developers are lazy.

title: My Stuff never correct
review: I was hoping in the new update that the My Stuff area would be corrected to have only shows we save listed. Instead it had random shows that I don't watch or care about. Otherwise that app is great! Will they be correcting this issue?

title: Please fix this!!!
review: I have noticed that recently the app will play the shows fine but then it goes to playing the ads but right before that it plays part of the show as if it were continuing but without audio and if you try to rewind it to watch the few seconds you missed it goes back to the ads... please fix this!!! Other than that it’s enjoyable!

title: Need a Favorites list
review:
Everything seems to work good except the Recent Channels list on Live TV. 
I don’t need to see my other family member’s recent shows which constantly changes. 
A Favorites list would be much more useful and easier to navigate to what I always watch.

title: More options for older kids
review: When adding an extra account, if the person’s age is low enough they will only be able to watch kid shows... which makes sense but If the person is A TEEN they should be able to view everything located in the TEEN genre.

title: Hilariously broken
review:
Almost every single time I finish an episode of a show, the app is unable to handle simply moving onto the next episode, and I have to close and then re-open the app. Can’t even do one of the most basic functions of a video playback app LOL.
Now, when I finish an episode of what ever series I’m watching, instead of automatically going to the next episode, it takes me to the first episode of a series I have never watched or clicked on in my entire life. The app barely functions. Waste of money.

title: Ok but could use improvement
review: Would like to see what’s new that’s is out but would like to get rid of all shows and movies that we are not interested in at all. Allow us to ditch all shows that we don’t want to see and never see them again. On the app you have a do nut suggest this show but it comes back every time I log in.

title: Charged for no commercials, still has commercials
review: I pay for the premium subscription, Live TV with no commercials. I pay for the upgraded version, yet still have 15 minutes of commercials that I cannot skip through in most my tv shows (even the ones that are recorded). This is false advertising and customers should receive a refund. No other cable service has commercials when you want recorded shows. Ppl can get much more for the same amount of money by going to cable.

title: Great but could be Better
review: I love how I don’t accidentally hit a different part of my episode and it jumps there making me wait for a commercial to fix it and then another commercial to move it back. I like how it’s not so sensitive. My problem now is with the streaming to my Chromecast. Now if I go to another app it disconnects and I have to reconnect my phone every time.

title: App is Struggling these Days
review:
App doesn’t update after an episode or movie has been watched. So it still recommends it. When not updating, it also won’t show next available episodes because it doesn’t recognize that you’ve already watched the previous one.  

I’ve updated the version, uninstalled and reinstalled, logged out and logged back in with no change.

title: Ads
review:
I hate the amount of time I have to watch. Its like 2 minutes. And the ads are repetitive.
And if you try go back and watch a certain par of the movie or episode you must watch the ad that just popped up before you tried to rewatch the certain part of the movie or episode. 5 stars if the ads were shorter and non-repetitive.

title: Getting Worse Fast!
review: Please fix this app, I can’t believe I’m paying for it!  It freezes all the time. Once in corner mode it won’t go back to regular view. On leaving the app, it continues playing.......some mysterious where else. I can hear it, but not see it. Sometimes I have to shut down my iPad and power on to continue watching a show. It’s jumpy, twitchy and fast becoming the worst app I’ve ever tried to use. What is Hulu’s plan? I’m about to give up and watch somewhere else.

title: Ads!!!!
review: Please for the love of God adjust your ad settings. To have 4-5 minutes of ads during a 20 minute show for a paid streaming service is crazy. And, if you can’t adjust that, at least make them different ads. After seeing the same computer ad 8 times I now have a negative association with the company and product, and an otherwise fine commercial is now so annoying. Don’t you want people to binge your episodes so they will keep watching ads?? It is so annoying I turned it off.

title: Audio problems again
review: For a while the app would skip audio and I would miss whole chunks of sentences and after a particular update, it was no longer a problem. After this update, it is again a problem. The video continues to play just fine but the audio goes silent for a few seconds every few seconds and it is very annoying.

title: Can’t tell my location
review: My whole family’s account doesn’t work anymore. It says that this video does not work in my current location...But it says that every time I want to watch a show. It is acting like I was wiped from the face of the earth and is a place where I cannot watch a single thing. Will rate 5 stars if this is fixed.

title: Awful update
review: With this new update the whole screen is used to display one show or movie at a time. Browsing for something to watch is a chore since you cannot see multiple choices on the screen at once. Once you do find a show you would like to watch you have to go to a separate menu to display more episodes where before you only had to scroll down. It seems like they wanted to make the app look sleek and modern but this was done at the expense of user friendliness and easy of use.

title: Used to be a good app
review: So why don’t developers ever listen to users? So many complaints in the reviews about the sensitive FF and REW. I just want to watch TV but sometimes I need to pause or move my device. Most of the time I accidentally hit the screen and BOOM, I’ve been forwarded 20 minutes to a commercial with no way to go back until their done. Then good luck trying to find your spot again. It’s so frustrating. Why does the whole screen have to be this way?  It should just be on the bar not the entire screen. It’s maddening!

title: Great but could be better
review: This app keeps getting better.  However there is a glitch.  Every program I watch, live or not, picture freezes and sound continues for almost a minute.  Then every thing syncs up.  Fixed this and I’ll cancel my tv provider .

title: Complicated design
review: This app would amazing if they had a different design and the shows did not skip around. It is so annoying to be constantly having to find my place in a show or in a movie because the app lost my place. I’m not even sure how it did that. And it’s getting to the point where I don’t even want to watch my shows anymore because of how annoying the jump and skips are. That’s the best word to describe the problem: ANNOYING.

title: Nope
review: I absolutely hate this new update. Can't find my watchlist anywhere, and the app is now making you focus on 1 tv show or movie at a time rather than being able to scroll through all your saved stuff more expansively. So dumb. Wish they didn't "fix" what wasn't broken.

title: Unreliable chromecast connectivity
review: New update looks nice, but feels clunky. I’m giving it a one-star though because of the apps unreliability when connecting to the Chromecast. This wasn’t a problem prior to the app update and none of my other apps have problems connecting to the Chromecast. It’s super frustrating.

title: Won’t play any videos or tv show
review: I am having trouble playing movies or shows after I click them it won’t start. I don’t is it have to do with the update from the app because my iPhone 6 Plus is up to the date so can you check this.

title: Live Option
review: Whenever I log onto the app, it is saying that my connection is weak or no internet connection when in fact I do have WiFi and internet connection. It is also saying that it blocked the live feature on my app. Went to the browser version and the connection is fine and there is no blocks on my live option. What is going on with the app?

title: App won’t open
review: Whenever I open the app it immediately crashes. I’m on the newest iOS version on a iPhone 11 Pro Max. I tried resetting my phone, deleting the app, it just won’t open!! Yesterday it worked so I’m just very confused 5 stars but this problem needs to get fixed

title: App & updates are terrible
review: All the updates in the world have not been able to get this app to work properly. Latest August 2020 update has caused my phone to freeze and the layout for live tv is buggy. Forget about using the app with chromecast. Have to constantly close out and reload the app. Will repeat the show I’ve just watched instead of moving to the next episode and takes forever and a day to load upon starting.

title: Bad service, frequent drops, tons of ads
review: First of all you are forced to watch the ads and there are ALOT of them. You can’t even rewind back to a spot before the previous ad and are forced to watch them again. Horrible experience! Then there are so many restrictions on how you playback recorded material and no easy way to find what you recorded. Also, did I mention the frequent service drops constantly interrupting what you are watching? I have a premier package but it is the worst service of any that I have tried.

title: Sick of commercials EVEN AFTER SWITCHING TO NO ADDS
review: Good app, but cmon the commercials are ridiculous!!! My plan which I pay for monthly was strictly for NO ADS! Yet I get them all the time.. 2-5 minutes into a show or movie and bam 5 minutes of ads and commercials! Seriously y’all need to fix this, or better yet don’t advertise NO commercials and yet those of us who select No commercials or ads on our plans HAVE THEM! Netflix here I come!

title: One problem
review: There is this one problem where, when it is time for an ad it usually takes a moment for the ad to start but the timer for the ad will start and then the ad will appear but right before the ad begins the show/movie becomes silent and you can’t hear what the actors/characters are saying

title: App Crashes Immediately Upon Opening
review: The app has been quite good up until this morning, when it started crashing immediately anytime you try to open it. I’m assuming the devs pushed a recent update and my phone automatically installed it overnight. The app crashes the same way on an iPhone 8 Plus as well as my iPhone 7 Plus. Perhaps the recent update is trying to access a restricted feature that it hasn’t asked permissions for, I know that can cause crashes based on my experience with the SDK.

title: Next episode
review: Nice app, it would be great if there was an easy way to go to the next episode from the player screen instead of waiting for the end of the credits, or going back to the episodes page. Also skip 10 seconds instead of skip 30 seconds would be much preferable

title: Pros and cons
review: This is the great app with tons of great shows. It is awesome that you can get this shows the day after the air most of the time. But even though we pay for no commercials we still get frequent commercials. The live TV is also good for news etc... This app is great to have and will be even better if given what is paid for!!!

title: Overload of commercials
review:
Way, way too many commercials
I shouldn’t be getting two 90 second ads before my show even starts. I got one before the opening started, and then one right after the opening ended. And then, for the rest of the show, I get more 60-90 seconds of commercials every 4-6 minutes. I shouldn’t have that much ad time in a 20 minute episode. Please calm down on the ads, or let us skip them after like, 5-7 seconds. If the ads weren’t so bad, I would give 5 stars.

title: Fix the shows watched feature.
review: Can it be that difficult? We watched 3 shows last night and it still thinks we have 3 shows to watch tonight. The. Same. Three. Shows. We’ve tried everything we know to fix it and no luck. After I watch a freaking show it shouldn’t suggest watching it again as if I hadn’t. I’ve written about this before. Hasn’t been fixed. I want to watch new episodes I haven’t watch before. Not watch the same episode over and over and over and over again.

title: Illegal Activity
review: Leave myself as well as my family out of your apps, movies, television shows, and the screenshots. You do not know any of us in depth and you never will as long as you are viewing us (illegally) on a reality show that we did not consent to be apart of. If you continue this charade of bullying me through screenshots, I will take this up with the authorities. If nothing can be done in that fashion, I WILL to take legal action. What you are doing is not only unfair but illegal. I suggest that you take every screenshot of myself down immediately.

title: Too many ads
review: I think its great that they have all your favorite TV shows and movies but literally every four minutes is a 90 second add!! I would like to be able to watch at least a solid 30 minutes add free but instead i get four minutes of show and a minute and a half of ads about stuff i would never buy anyway!! Fix it and tone down the ads to either 15 seconds long or once every 20-30 minutes...

title: Annoying problems
review: Swiping down makes you close a video. So when you accidentally close the show you’re watching and reopen it it makes you watch an ad even if you just watched an ad before you accidentally closed the video. Wastes my time. I already pay for your service and watch ads don’t punish me for it by forcing more ads. Also when I switch between devices it doesn’t remember where I left off but remembers to show an ad. Super frustrating app right now

title: Crashes and hanging sessions
review: I don’t typically write in, but I’m driven to distraction with the server connection issues.  I faithfully reset my modem and router and devices, cleared history etc etc and I can’t get through an episode without a crash part way through.  I do not know if it is server issues or issues with the internet carrier, but I pay a premium for this service — however not much longer without resolution.  Thank you for attention to this issue.

title: We need more sections.
review:
Let me start off by saying that this is an amazing movie app and you should get it. But are you people aware of all the people using Netflix? There are toddlers, preteens, teens, young adults, adults, whatever you call people a little to old to have kids, elderly people, and very elderly people. We need more sections!!! Toddlers and kids are grouped together, but preteens and teens need their own section, too. No kiddy shows but maybe a couple cartoons teenagers like, and the movies and shows should have cussing but not out of control cussing, and no to-bad words. The private accounts are good for adults, but I’m your account you should JUST get to pick if you are a toddler, kid, preteen, teen, young adult, adult, person who are a little to old to have kids if there is a name for that, elderly person, or very elderly person. The a little to old to have kids people should be able to watch the adults section, but the elderly people and the very elderly people should have a channel without kiddy stuff and shows with little cussing. You should also be able to change your age, because over time you grow or might have a child or etc. watching on your device. Thank you for your time and consideration!

                                                            -FireStar

title: Privacy and Security
review:
Netflix is a GREAT app, I’ve probably been using it for 8 years or so. Over the past years, Netflix has expanded its operations greatly, and made viewing videos more accessible than ever. However, I feel that the privacy of the app should be increased much more. Whenever I’m watching a tv show, sometimes other members of my family try to log on and watch the SAME EXACT show on the same profile while I’m trying to watch. putting a lock on the profiles would be much better for people who want to keep their viewing private and out of the hands of people who share the account. Another issue I have is that sometimes, I’ll watch the first few minutes of a show, and I’ll end up stopping because the show is bad. removing shows out of currently watching is one of the most annoying issues this app has never fixed. I have maybe 10 shows and movies I’m watching, and scrolling through a bunch of more shows that I ended up never watching trying to find what I want to see is a big pain. Lastly, Netflix is getting really outdated. Watching classics is becoming a pain on Netflix, and the newest shows and movies are never updated. After getting a YT Tv subscription, I was able to find more complete, fuller versions of my favorite movie franchises and tv shows. Netflix needs to start upgrading its viewer base, or what Netflix became famous for-being able to watch the best shows easily-is going to be erased. 

written by a teenager.

title: Teen section please!
review: Alright, Netflix is awesome! It’s so easy to stream movies, TV shows, interactive games, and more all accessible through Netflix! The only thing that I could think of to improve this app is another section. So far there is kids and adult. But what about teens like me? Kids has a TON of cartoons and kiddy shows. Don’t get me wrong, I love cartoons as much as the next person, I just want something a bit more adventurous. The adult version has a wide variety of movies, but a lot of them are inappropriate for teens like me. If you could add a teen version, where the more appropriate movies are, that would be lovely! The movies, (no matter the rating) should be good for young audiences. This means the movies should be rated for cussing. None of the movies should have naughty things. (passionate hugging/kissing, and you know, anything that's an inappropriate display of affection) but some cussing could be allowed since in college and high school, there aren't many child-friendly peers there sadly. Another suggestion would be to (forgive me if you already have this) add a feature (free or not, your choice) where if you're watching a movie and leave the app, you can still see a small box of the screen in the corner. The box should be moveable, this way you can surf the sea of neverending emails while binging your favorite show on the wonderful app, Netflix.

title: Remove Audio Description by Default - Bug Report
review: Please remove audio description feature by default or remember audio description setting from one movie or episode to the next. I use the audio description feature sometimes to hear how a screenplay of a particular scene would be written because of my interest in screenwriting. When the scene is over, I turn it audio description settings off because it gets annoying quickly. However, I’ve notice this feature has been turned on by default recently in the iOS app. I haven’t really noticed if it’s the same with the tvOs or website. I tried to turn the settings off and it worked but when the current (now playing) episode or movie ends, when the next episode or movie starts, the audio description feature turns back on. I had to turn it off for every episode each time. It was really frustrating at the point I had to paused the show and write this review. Honestly, this is not really a review. I hoping your development team would consider this at a bug report. It is annoying that audio description is turn on by default and you can’t turn it off permanently for future movies or episodes. Please fix. 😡

title: Currently watching is a nightmare!
review: I love Netflix and admittedly have things streaming far too often throughout the day. Everything works beautifully and it’s easy to search for what you’re looking for and the list of saved shows is fine too. My big issue, however, is with the currently watching area on the tv app, phone app, and website. Sure there are tons (and I mean TONS) of articles all over the web giving instructions on how to remove shows from the currently watching section that you no longer want to view, but Netflix it’s your job to provide an easier method for doing this. It’s unrealistic to expect people to go into their history and delete a millions episodes of a show just to get to the movies and whatever other shows they need to remove from that section. Just allow a space on the titles to remove them from that area. Especially for shows or movies that you try out and end up not liking. They stay there for months! Also, the app on tv plays the show or movie just when you’re trying to read the info about it and guess what?? That also adds that title to currently watching! Fix this issue please! It’s 2020! We shouldn’t have to google the hundreds of articles teaching people how to get around your archaic ways with this one thing. Do better, Netflix.

title: amazing!!
review:
honestly, If you haven’t gotten Netflix, what are you waiting for?!? Every single of my favorite series EVER, have been found on Netflix!! The app is significantly easy to use, and my favorite part is their always adding more!! It’s really easy to find things that your interested in because the app takes what you have watched, and recommends similar options. Most Netflix originals are also genuinely very good!

I do have two suggestions for somethings that could be implemented in the future. My  first idea is that you could be able to follow other people. This way you could find out what your friends, family, or anyone else you know, is watching/interested in. You could find lots of great shows that you didn’t know about or watch before. My second thing is something that has been mentioned in other reviews, and that is an actual, legitimate teen section. And i’m not talking tv-7. I’m  talking quality shows, PG13/TV14, stuff like that. I think both of these ideas could help improve Netflix in the future.

That’s all I have! Overall, Netflix is a wonderful app, full of great selection, amazing viewing quality, and awesome shows, movies, documentaries, you name it

title: Downgraded instead, Not watching as much
review: I noticed over the past year that I have been using Netflix less and have been really disappointed with their selection and layout. So I downgraded to the lowest possible billing option and have been great with it for months now. Layout: I wish that when I selected which genre I want to watch that it showed a years list. I like 90's suspense thrillers and kids holiday movies, 50's creature feature horror movies, and 80's action and comedy movies. But it's a bit hard to find with their made up titled sections and makes me waste more time searching than watching. And the search feature doesn't not show me all the movies in these keywords as only a few can fit on the search screen. Also, there movie selection in these categories aren't that much and I end up watching Crackle a lot more. Ended up watching Crackle and Freeform Channel for Halloween instead! I feel Netflix has too much Drama and Gore movies-not my cup of tea. I expected new seasons of "Sabrina the teenage witch," "Mystery Science Theater," and other such shows to be new and available for October but they were not. So knowing when to show new show seasons for holidays is lacking. Who needs the new "Nutcracker" movie in July!? Also, when am I going to see new "Mystery Science Theater" episodes? Love the new show!! Creature feature movies are really lacking on Netflix!! And when is the new "Bright" movie coming out!? This is why I downgraded.

title: BEST APP EVER!!!!
review: Guys I know your probably thinking:”I don’t know if I should download this app m maybe I should see the reviews.” Well look at this one, don’t look at anymore because, I’m here to convince you to get it, and tell you about the amazing movies you should watch after you download it. First off it’s not only movies you can watch, you can watch tv shows too, and they are awesome. Now some of them do include homosexuality and I don’t like that so I just skip the parts and of movies that have them, and please don’t judge me for saying that, anyhoo, there are some top notch movies here, like a thousand words, The Kissing Booth, The Kissing Booth 2,( trust me you GOTTA watch those two) and there are cool tv shows like, The Flash, Green Arrow, Legends of tomorrow, (then again these is just dc) Marlon, The Green House academy( if you really like teen tv dramas you will really like The Green House Academy!!) any way, you can also go to the search bar and you will see the things that most people that are interested in, like the movies and tv shows. And don’t worry because yes it has a continue watching section. And the last thing that I wanna say is that YOU HAVE TO WATCH THE 2 KISSING BOOTH MOVIES!!!!!!!!!!!! Bye

title: Please show Viewers Rating/Comments???
review:
Why is it so difficult for you guys to add the option to read viewer written reviews which are available only through using the browser version of Netflix? 
At times it seems like Netflix has some type of agenda to limit the chances of any of their productions from getting any kind of negative or honest viewer feedback. And one of the biggest actions Netflix did to prove my point is making the ridiculous and obvious mistake of getting rid of the 5 star review system which helped fine tune which movies were recommended for us. Some of us like my entire family for example had each perfectly fine tuned the movie recommendation algorithm after working hard to submit honest ratings for every single Netflix streaming movie we'd watched for multiple years (since Netflix first started offering its streaming service). And then without even asking for its customers opinion on the matter it just gets rid of the entire rating system and implements the useless thumps up or down rating! If Netflix ends up falling from the heights it's reached it will only be because of their lack of common curtesy and respect towards its customers feedback.

title: Lacks management features
review:
My issues with this app are not about streaming content, but lack of content for managing my account on my device. If there was any place where I should be able to manage my passwords and activity it should be on my device. My info (card, address, etc) is associated to my account. One can argue logging in via laptop/computer could be less secure. Especially if the web browser saves passwords and I am a user who never logs out on a computer that never locks. I at least have Two factor authentication on my phone. If I am already logged in, ask for my password or send an email to my account with a verification number. Just don’t completely strip away my ability to manage my account promptly. At the very least, I should be able to opt out/in on account management on my device via email, if necessary. This needs to be fixed. I receive phishing emails asking me to reset my password regularly. I would like to change it via app immediately, if I feel my password had been compromised. 
Rating may seem too low when everything else works well. However, security should be paramount to protect your users. There is no point having a service if that service does not have safety of its customers in mind. May as well make a walkway across the freeway.

title: Bugs please update
review: Their seems to be a bug that’s doesn’t allow my continue watching to update, meaning that if I finish a show or start a new one the show I have started doesn’t appear and if I finish a movie or a show it doesn’t go away. Also if I am watching a show it doesn’t update so I’ll be on episode 13 and it’ll say I’m still on episode 11 and it’s very annoying. Please do an update to fix this issue. It’s not just my account either it’s my whole families accounts that is having this problem and a lot of other people online that I have seen while looking up a solutions to solve this issue. I have called and talked to two customer service representatives and neither one of them could help me both of them practically blamed me and said that maybe it was because I was going on another account but I’m not I’m only using my account. But anyway this is my last resort to get in touch with the company and to possibly have this issue resolved, so could you please update the app soon. Thank you much appreciated and other than that small issue I have no other problems with the app I love Netflix and so do my friends and family.

title: Dude please
review:
Please Netflix don’t do this to me, no not just me, EVERYONE who has ever watched and loved the office, your letting nbcUniversal take The Office back. You spent Millions upon millions of dollars just to get Friends back. Why not do the same for The Office. I guarantee, you will lose tons of people to UniversalNBC just because of one show. Thank you for your time in reading this.

title: The shows I watched the most were taken put of my age group
review: So I was using netflix and watching sword art online, which is a show for teens like most of the anime on netflix including, hunter x hunter, jojos bizarre adventure, blue exorcist and many more. While I was watching my show, I took a break and when I came back, I couldnt watch the show anymore. At first i thought it had gotten taken off netflix, but soon after I found it it had gotten moved to the TV MA section which made zero sense to me. These show have been rated differently and the only one the rating makes sense for are jojos bizarre adventure but the other ones I listed aren’t meant for ONLY adults. I enjoyed and was about to start watching some of these shows until netflix took them off the teen section and im not allowed to go to the adult section. I want my shows back and im hoping netflix will realize that these shows dont belong on only the adult section, but also for teens. I turn to netflix whenever I want to watch an anime without ads but if they keep moving them to age groups that dont make sense, I might as well stick to crunchyroll and funimation. Please put the shows back so that I can enjoy this app and the content that is on it.

title: I love it, but I wish we could comment
review:
I love Netflix so much. I watch the office on there like every day. I just wish there was a comment section underneath the shows. The show creators can can useful feedback, and comment sections can be so much fun to read through and laugh at all the funny comments. It could also give Netflix an easier way to figure out what shows to keep and what shows to take off. It can also give a better idea of what new shows to put on based on what people like. 
There have been so many times that I’ve seen an episode or a scene of a show or movie, and I wanted to scroll down to the comments to see what other people had to say. (Oh if you were to do this, it would probably be best to do a separate comment section for each episode of a show so that people don’t get spoilers)
Putting a comment section on the shows can even help to connect Netflix users. They can interact and bond over their love for a show. They can laugh over a funny scene. Or a number of other things.
All in all, I love Netflix but I think it’d be pretty cool to add a comment section
