And why not watch a fun good show with family. I really hope you agree. Also thank you Netflix company for the entertainment.

title: Great but one thing
review: OK I love Netflix it’s like one of the best things in the world to give me all the shows I love but it just took off I’m not sure if it just took off the show but it’s one of my favorite shows and it is backstage and It added two new shows I think and what I wish Netflix would do is ask you if you wanted to replace blank and add blank the blank‘s mean like a show or a movie instead of just getting rid of it because maybe some people actually want to keep that show that you’re going to replace with that new one so please just add that feature  and ask for backstage again please but Besides that I love Netflix sooo much

title: Downloads are buggy
review: 1 Star for visibility. Before my flight, I tapped to download several episodes of Breaking Bad. It displayed a warning saying that I could only download them 1 more time. Strange to act like I was running up against a limit, since I’ve never previously downloaded them. I continued, saw them begin to download, complete, etc. On my flight, I opened up the Netflix app, and they were all missing. Later episodes were there, but not the ones I specifically downloaded. I was furious. I got off the flight and tried to re-download, and now it says I can’t do so until next year. Unbelievable. It could have something to do with their “smart download” feature, which I’ve now turned off. But really? You delete an episode I specifically downloaded even though I hadn’t pressed ‘play’ once?

title: More consistency
review: Don’t get me wrong, I absolutely love Netflix and it obviously has changed the way people watch entertainment; especially with their originals. I just wish they would be more consistently up to date with new content and stop removing so much. It’s a lot of waiting for them to add stuff, while they’re already removing older stuff, it’s a little frustrating. I also don’t get why they’ll have the second movie or later seasons, but not the first or beginning? Like Law and Order or Guardians of the Galaxy 2. Doesn’t make a lot of sense to me. Also to be able to customize more of what you see on the homepage would be nice.

title: Make Netflix browser friendly AGAIN !
review: I want to be able to watch on my browser ! I don’t care about the app I hate the app I want to watch on my browser and be able to preview episodes before watching them honestly could care less about the app ! Want to be able to watch on browser that’s all fix it thank you. Please cause the app is pointless for me beyond pointless isn’t bad just not for me. Pretty sure I’m not the only person who would like to choose how I stream my content considering I’m paying for it I should have that option and freedom of not being tied down to an app. Especially considering I travel so ... please make that a thing in the new update. Thank you.

title: This app is the best app in the history of apps but.........
review: This app is the best thing that I have ever got!😂😂 But all I wish is that new seasons download faster. One time the new season of bunked (third season) took a month after it came out to be on Netflix. Then my friends told me that it had come out. I looked it wasn’t there I restarted my iPad I even checked for updates.......NOTHING!😡 I had waited so long for that new season I looked on my iPad every day! It wasn’t there! But other then that this game is the best highly recommend it!😉 And thank you for your time to read this sorry it was so long.😔

title: Very Upset!!
review: I just got an email that Netflix is going to start charging double what they used to!!! Netflix used to only charge 8 dollars and slowly they have doubled their price with literally no difference in the quality of the app. Just because it has became a larger company and now has millions of people using it doesn’t mean they should up charge and lose their value of their customers. I, and many will be undownloading and cancelling subscriptions. This is disappointing and irritating because its so obvious that netflix is NOT worth 17 bucks a month. They are slow about updating their shows and movies, and they dont have a large enough selection. If you are charging me the price of a brand new movie that just came out of theaters than I expect brand new movies... NOT a movie that came out 2 years ago.

title: New and more movie what is the point
review: Like descendant,all of the Scooby doo movie including the old and new one that come like Scooby doo music of the vampire,Scooby doo Frankenstein’s creepy,Good luck Charlie,Danny phantom,catdog,Victorious,Icarly,spongebob squarepant,the wild thornberrys,as told by ginger all from Nickelodeon our childhood kid show,Batman beyond,Batman return,jake long the American dragon,the Simpsons,spongebob squarepant the legend of boo-kini bottom halloween episode,spongebob sponge out of water,home alone 1,home alone 2 lost in New york,home alone 3,home alone 4 taking back the house,my stapdaughter,the last unicorn,the book of life,tuff puppy,Ben 10,curious geogre boo fest and other curious geogre episode too,out,kid next door,ant farm,boo2,the loud house,all grown up,hey arnold,,icarly,shake it up,proud family,kim possible and kick buttowski and some sad Christmas movie,the hunger game,catching fire,mocking jay and goosebumps haunted Halloween

title: Movie Options
review: The movie options under my profile are extremely different from the movie options under my husband’s profile. I understand that it is likely due to whatever algorithm is being used to tailor my Netflix experience but even if I search ‘all movies’ or a genre of movies, there are still some options that do not show up on my page. I watch a variety of genres with varied subject matter. Rather than having to swipe left to view the movies under each section, just place each genre of movies on a page without the subcategories (e.g. new movies, classic). This way, more can fit on the screens and all of the options are available for everyone.

title: Netflix...Is My Life!
review: Thank You For Making This App. I Have Netflix On My Tv But It Doesn’t Work At Times. So This App Really Helps!! There Are A Lot Of shows Now! Last time I Was On This App I Could Barely Find a Movie That Was Suitable For Me! Now Netflix Has, Tv Shows,Movies Most Of Us Hasn’t Watched, And Many More!!! Although There Is A Slight Problem. It’s Only A Tiny Bug. You see, The Issue Is That No matter How Hard I Press On The Movie It Won’t Let Me Watch It. Either It’s Glitching Or Something Else. Another Thing Is The Screen Freezes And I Cant Fix It. Please Fix These Two Small Bugs And I’ll Be Happy As Ever! Thank You! 😱😱😱😄😄😄❤️😁😁

title: Could be better!
review:
I love Netflix. I’m not going anywhere but when it comes to letting my kids watch it why can’t I have more control? The only thing I can do is limit it to what Netflix deems appropriate. Would it be so hard for them to let me block poor quality, violent and rude shows from showing up as options? There are so many good and educational shows that I want to let them watch! Please let me block shows!!
Furthermore while it hasn’t been a problem yet I can restrict a user to be only able to watch kid shows but there is no way to prevent my kids from just switching to an adult user. Please make a way to block switching users without a password.

title: Hey Netflix
review: Love your app it’s amazing love all the shows and everything but there is a slight problem im trying to watch no jack horseman and while watching it all of a sudden just goes back to the beginning of the episode like the video just rewinds but the audio stays with the time and don’t know if you understand what I’m trying to say like I’m at 15 minutes of the episode and it rewinds back to like the first 8 minutes of the episode but the audio is still playing from 15 minutes so yeah I thinks it a bug and I would really appreciate it if it got fixed thank you

title: Continue some series
review: So Netflix is definitely one of my favorite apps and some of the series are still on hold I just hope you guys are still making more episodes on them I literally have a list of things i’ll countdown three of them one skylanders Academy two dragon prince and three Pokémon sun and moon now I now it’s not a Netflix original  but I hope you guys are keeping track of it so you can put out more of the seasons because this is the only platform I can watch it so please read this. But I just want to thank you for making this app keep up the good work.

title: Netflix should add more shows and movies
review: Netflix is a good app I mean I use it almost everyday and have finished a lot of the shows but I believe more people would want to watch it and pay for it if it had more shows and movies from new movie and shows to old ones because there are a lot of shows that I’m pretty sure a lot of people wish Netflix would add and movies too if they added more of those I believe more people would want to have Netflix and it’s a win win for us and then they get more money and we get more of our favorite shows and movies.

title: Problems starting the app
review: Lately I’ve been experiencing longer wait times at the moment of opening the app. Before it was instant, as soon as I’d tap the Netflix icon, all the movies and show would start to appear within five seconds or maybe even less. Now it gets stuck for a few minutes. It only seems like it keeps loading but the content takes way too long to come up. I can say this is very frustrating because no one really wants to wait to put the show they’re binge watching (at least in my case). It’s not a problem with my connecting, I’ve checked with different WiFi networks and it behaves the same. Not even with the most recent app update this problem has gotten fixed. It’s disappointing.

title: Loved it, until they took away fast forwarding
review: NETFLIX SUPPORT—> As everyone knows, Netflix is THE app. You binge-watch, it’s become a daily thing in most peoples lives and also a meme. I love it! But please if Netflix Support sees this, what happened to fast-forwarding? There was an update a few weeks ago that let you double-tap to fast forward 10 seconds, but today my app updated and its back to the old, annoying way with only back tracking 10 seconds at a time. PLEASE GO BACK!!! I loved that feature, and also loved the pause button right in the middle. Is this a permanent update, or is my phone just glitching? Anyway, pLEASE HELP!!🤞🏻🤞🏻

title: I used to love Netflix and now I am very angry!
review: For the past years I loved watching Robin Hood, Angelo Rules, Dear Dumb Diary, and Minor Details. About a year or two ago Netflix got rid of Robin Hood. That was one of my favorites, but I rubbed it off. Then I found out a few months ago that Angelo Rules and Dear Dumb Diary was removed. Now that made me VERY ANGRY And UPSET!!! So it was bad enough until... that I recently found out that Netflix got rid of Minor Details! And all of those were on MY LIST! And no longer there and when I search it up it says it is no longer there and will give me other movies/shows similar. Well I don’t what that I want what I loved to only watch. It was pretty much what I only watch and now I am not really interested in anything else. So I hope that Netflix will bring back Robin Hood, Angelo Rules, Dear Dumb Diary, and Minor Details!!! PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE!!!!!

title: Long time Netflix subscriber
review:
Netflix is a huge part of my entertainment on our TV.  The app does what it should.  It streams movies.  I haven’t liked the newer format for a while now.  To easy to scroll too long.  Give me 5 or six movies in the categories I like then give me a “see more” button.  I want to fill the screen with movies I would like.
I enjoy Netflix on a multitude of streaming devices.  Mobile, roku, and Apple TV.  It is nice that the format is similar across all devices.  That said I LOVE the “up next” portion of the Apple TV.  I wish you would allow your app to share with the Apple TV so that my binge shows are a quick click and go!

Thanks!!

title: Gotten worse
review: I used to love Netflix and watch it all the time and I still do but I don’t like it as much. First of all I’d rather be able to rate it with stars and see other people’s thoughts to know whether it’s good or bad. I also really don’t like how instead of it telling u what it’s about it just says the category it falls into which i would rather know at least the storyline of it not just it’s a comedy or romantic. I just want it to go back to how it was without these new worse updates and stop taking off so many shows and movies that I love and are actually still really great and I would love to watch like baby daddy or shark boy and lava girl which is my childhood favorite and a bunch of Disney movies like star struck which I love and teen wolf which I really wanted to watch.

title: Basically awesome
review: Netflix is awesome I love to be able to watch a wide verity if shows and movies, no strings attached, for a decent price. My one complaint is that it can be hard to maneuver through and find what your looking for. Being able to download shows and movies had been a huge help though especially for long road trips. ( which I embark on frequently ) My one other complaint is that there isn’t a way to search in the “available for download” section. But other than that Netflix is a fantastic addition to my phone!!! Thank you Netflix!!

title: Amazing, But It Needs More Movies
review:
This app is good, but I have read almost every movie and most of them aren’t that good. I think the creator should get more and BETTER movies in it, like humor, horror, kids, and adventure. Second of all, I think it should have more interactive shows and movies because they are SO FUN! Like, mostly more Captain Underpants because they are SO FUNNY AND ADVENTUROUS!
     Third of all and lastly, this app is missing a lot of types of movies and shows. I think that the creator should add a teenager section, an elderly section, and maybe even a PET section so they can watch their ancestors and be inspired. Over all, I LOVE IT, but there are some things to add.

 - Ava

title: Taking shows & movies off
review: First off, I love Netflix but it is really changing like there used to be great shows and movies but they always take them off and now most of the good tv shows and movies aren’t there anymore because they take them off! Yes I still love Netflix and you should totally get it! Just when you take shows and movies off it’s kinda annoying and I wish that there was a way that (you might already have this but I don’t know about it) you could save movies and shows to where it doesn’t come off on your profile like adding them to favorites so they don’t get deleted or something?

title: Idk what is happening
review: I’ve been a loyal customer of Netflix for years and it has worked great, fantastic even, but for some reason I can’t watch the new show called Daybreak. Every time I click to watch an episode, an error message comes up and tell me to come back later. When I do come back it says the same thing. This has been going on for a few days and I’m not sure why.i am able to watch all of my other shows except this one. I updated the app thinking that was the problem but it is still telling me there is a problem. Is this a recurring problem with other people or is it just me?

title: Pros and cons .
review: Netflix is really great and keeps up’s with most of the episodes,and seasons of a series and has many good options for kids....I really wish they had the twilight lol, but anyways if your looking to get Netflix and aren’t sure you should, trust me Netflix is worth spending those few dollars, one thing I don’t like is that sometimes there is a new movie coming out at the theaters that I wanna watch it but can’t sometimes so sometimes I try to look for it on Netflix and isn’t there but that’s not much of a deal because Netflix has many other good options.

title: New Content?
review: I am a big fan of Netflix and I love it’s content but sometimes I get frustrated. I feel like the algorithm doesn’t give me new shows to watch. I get bored very easily and like to watch a lot of different things, shows and movies that I never heard of before but when I scroll through my feed on my iPhone it recommends stuff that I’ve already watched, am still watching, and is very similar to what I have seen. I think it would be really cool if there was a randomly generated suggestion tab that will introduce me to new and interesting content. If this feature was created I would probably never stop watching.

title: Anime & Cartoon Titles
review:
Pick up your anime game, man. Especially on Naruto. It’s episodes are not placed in their proper season and a lot of episodes don’t have Subtitles(Closed Captions). While we’re on the topic of Naruto, I would love to see the Shippuden series on Netflix. I already know the details about MHA(Crunchyroll’s contract) so I won’t talk about that. I’m guessing there’s also something dealing with contracts for the Dragon Ball series.

Relating to cartoons, American, not Japanese, is it possible to bring back titles like Young Justice and other Justice League movies. I’ve heard a lot of people being upset about Netflix replacing shows like the one I mentioned with Netflix originals. That’s all I have to say.

title: AMAZING APP!
review: Netflix is a very good app, you get to watch movies and series of shows. And I liked when they did Netflix on the go, that means that you can download movies of series of shows on your phone at your house than when you go somewhere or like a long ride to vacation you can watch these movies or series of shows on the go. It’s a very amazing thing that they did. I’m always in the car and obv it gets super boring, but when I have my downloaded movies I can just watch them relaxingly. I definitely suggest this app for everyone. Have a great day and keep watching!!

title: What could be better
review: I don't usually write reviews but I felt as though this was a the thing to do to get  Netflix attention. I'm sure you've heard of the ideas of a comment section for Netflix I don't mind this idea I actually really like this idea. Another thing I wanted to bring up is the fact that the new update wear have to scroll up and down  for Netflix recommendation is not very convenient I think 💭 the better way of handling this is to scroll side to side . Other than that I love Netflix I actually count on it because I feel like it is more "diverse" on it better than HBO and Is more reliable than specific channels apps

title: I need you guys to fix this ASAP
review:
So i just got the new iPhone Xs and i was pretty happy about the fact that it runs and looks better and smoother than the X but unfortunately ive noticed that its had a little problem with you guys bc its crashing my phone literally netflix will freeze and my phone from there on wont be able to do anything besides the fact that if the quality goes bad which i know my internets fine i need to leave the episode and click it once again for it to go back to 1080p. I dont rate you guys 1-2 stars bc i love you guys and im just trying to get out the message not hate on you guys. 
          ,thanks

title: Black teens of 2020
review: You need too put in more black teen movies for an example charm city kings just more things that talk about BLM and diversity and more opportunities for young black teens like documentaries just things based on 2020 and you need too put back on all the old shows and all the old movies I think people would really tune in if you guys didn’t take off a whole lotta stuff like everything you guys put on was my childhood but y’all took it off now you guys have your own tv shows and movies we need actually funny things too watch and more realistic things and things that just talk about modern day things.💯

title: Needs more popular movies
review: Ok so like I like Netflix and it works great and it has a lot of good movies, but where the hell are the movies at? Like here’s a tip Netflix lets not take off ‘Along Came Polly’ and put on ‘Samantha!’ instead which I’ve never even heard of. Put more marvel studios movies on there, the hunger games movies, x-men, ‘put easy a’ and ‘mean girls’ back on, also put the fault in our stars and paper towns too. I would also recommend the conjuring, Annabelle, Wonder Woman(gale gadot version), twilight movies, if I stay, John Tucker Must Die, get out. So yeah all these movies I’m naming have been in the theaters so stop putting ghetto movies that no one has heard of before. Like no one wants to watch ‘Adore’ or nick and Norah’s infinite playlist and ‘Heathers’.

title: Good service, app needs work ASAP.
review:
Netflix service overall is great. Big selection, fair price. 
The categories have always needed help (remove stand up specials from Comedy now that they have their own section; put a Movies filter on, or at least have a Movie category), but it’s still good on the whole. 
My beef is with this version of the app. After this last update, it won’t connect after the first time it’s used. On the second attempt, I’ll get a network error message (no issue with any other app or wireless connection). The only fix is to uninstall the app and redownload. It’s frustrating enough that I’ve cancelled my account and I’m using other apps for TV and movies until they fix it. 
Once this is fixed, I’ll happily be back.

title: Make a teens section!! For parents benefits and teenagers
review: Netflix should make a section for teenagers. Kids only has kiddy shoes older teenagers wouldn’t be interested in. They should put movies/series etc that are PG-13 and PG-14 and maybe non-rated in that section. PG-13 and PG-14 would be suitable for teenagers 13+, and it would be shows that aren’t for much smaller kids and would make us engaged. Adults has R and MA movies, which aren’t suitable for children. Kids is literally for babies and toddlers and any kid above 10 wouldn’t be interested. A teens section would be great for parents who are worried that their teenagers are seeing things they shouldn’t in the Adult netflix. Thank you!

title: The show everyone wants
review: Everyone has been obsessed with Avatar The Last Airbender since it was released onto Netflix, it has been bringing back childhood memories of when we used to watch it when we were kids. When I finished all three seasons I was sad because I wanted more, that is why I think Netflix should add The legends of Korra to Netflix and I have seen a lot of people who agree. Even know The legend of Korra hasn’t had the best feedback throughout the last couple of years so many people would enjoy watching it off of the best possible app that is Netflix

title: We have enough sections
review:
Great app. All those who are saying we need more sections appear silly. Of course there should be restrictions at some point - luckily we have that in the form of a kids section. 

The idea of preteen, teen, young adult, etc is illogical. If you are afraid of cussing, kissing etc., please register yourself as a child because that is the sort of content you will likely be viewing without these things. In addition, if you are not a child in real life you should be able to make the distinction between kid( or extremely sensitive person) content and adult (that which is not for kids) content, read the movie’s ratings and descriptions. Look up what content the movie contains. You, who are likely not a child, can do it. I believe in you. 

If you cannot make any of these distinctions don’t watch the shows or movies that you are afraid of. Luckily we have something to make that easier - the kids section.

Roasted. Mic drop. Over and out.
:)

title: Minecraft
review:
So I personally think this Minecraft: Story Mode Series is great. But there’s a few things that need to fixed. In episode 4 you don’t have a choice to keep Lukas with the group or not, also in episode 4 you cant pick different armor. Otherwise the Series is great i wont complain about the lack of episodes because the main episodes are 1-4 the other 4 are is the adventure set. Anyway just add those things on episode 4 and the game is perfect otherwise.

Edit: The story has been great, but lately i have been checking for bugs and there is a bug when you choose to go to the next Episode the App crashes.

title: Suggestion
review:
I absolutely love Netflix. I was reading a review about a suggestiin of locking a profile with a pin so no one can change or enter. I really like the idea so I decided to share it so it has a better chance of being seen.  
I too have a suggestion...
Netflix has a section where you can see shows or movies that can be coming soon. How about a “leaving soon section” where you can see shows or movies that will be moved from Netflix in a couple weeks. That way people can watch/ rewatch a show or movie before it is taken. I would love this.

title: Netflix is amazing,but can improve in a few ways
review: I love Netflix and I watch it a lot. I’ve be doing Netflix and it’s many series for a long time now... but THERE ARE BARELY ANY ANIMES ON THE KIDS. I would like to start watching anime but it’s not on Netflix kids. Trust me this is a amazing app to have and it has so many different things on it... but that brings me to another problem, the one that made it have only 4 stars... you need to add more content for the kids section and not just the cheesy Christmas stuff, can you please start adding more things like Wakfu, the gousts stuff, and other animated stuff. I don’t think you have enough things for kids.

title: Why should resolution in a downloaded movie suffer?
review:
I recently downloaded a movie rather than watching it live because of all the extra Internet traffic due to the COVID-19 virus. So many of my neighbors are at home now, and everyone seems to be streaming this and that.

The movie downloaded fairly quickly, so I was able to get it during a time of day when the Internet wasn’t too busy. But later, when I watched it the resolution was terrible in many scenes. It was just like I would experience watching when the Internet is too busy, and the pictures became pixelated and very difficult to see. I simply don’t see why this should happen in a downloaded movie.

title: Broadway Shows
review: I’m not usually one to write reviews however I felt a need this time. I watched Newsies for the first time on Netflix and within a month or so you took it off. I was so frustrated when I wanted to watch it again but it was gone. Please add it back to the American shows. Also if there are other professionally recorded broadway shows, like Bandstand, please add them to Netflix as well. It will be a great way for those who don’t live in or near New York to watch them and then there’s people like me who watch them multiple times over. Bandstand and Newsies both were shown in movie theaters through Fathom Events by the way. Thank you.

title: Disappointed
review: Netflix is like one of my favorite apps to watch shows and movies on. It was great! But there’s a problem on the app. When I would want to go watch a movie or show on my iPad, I would hit play. And then it says something like network error. It says there is a problem connecting to it. It works on my tv, but not on my device. I gave it 4 stars because it is a great app, and because that tiny bug that I know you can fix. It just make me disappointed that I can’t watch anything if that thing keeps showing up. Please fix it, and write back to me if you can. I love your app, it’s amazing, once again.😀

title: Perfecto
review: Netflix is overall a great app, and I love how they include s many different genres and options for you to choose from. The only thing that I would want Netflix to add ares shows such as the Simpsons etc... After watching on Netflix for many years now, I’ve observed upon seeing that there are many great features to this app, and I would recommend it to anyone ranging from people who only like to watch just one show (Such as “The Office” for me) over and over again,  all the way to people who don’t really care or don’t know what their type of genera is yet.

title: Stupidly limiting
review: This current user experience is limiting and frustrating. The main page shows your usual recommendations, which is to say the same 20 or so promoted titles, assuming you’re a real person who gravitates towards a few different genres. No longer can you browse by genre, aside from whatever the Netflix algorithm deems worthy to look at. There isn’t a real reason to have multiple sections when “popular on netflix,” “trending,” “recommended for you,” and “similar to _____” all contain roughly the same titles. It’s fine if you only want what is currently popular, or have a specific title in mind, but it’s stupid I can’t even do the work to find more under the radar options.

title: Glitch sometimes while adding movies to my list
review: Movies play fine and I’m able to find movies quickly with the my list, categories page, and ‘similar movies’ panel on selected movies. However, I attempted to bump some high-priority movies in my my-list to the top so I’d remember to watch them first, by removing and readding them to the my-list, and only after I was done did I realize that not all of them readded to the top of my list and I’d in fact deleted them! I can’t remember every one I removed. There is a bug apparently where sometimes you will tap the ‘add to my list’ button and it will change to ‘in my list’ when it hasn’t been added to your list! Frustrating glitch!

title: Removal of good movies
review: Soo... how do I put this? Alright, so I wanted to watch Coraline for like the hundredth time after a while of not watching anything at all, and I could not find the movie at all. Not in the search, and not in my list, and I got pretty upset about that. I wonder... Is there really a good reason to go around removing movies or series from the app? I mean, some people have gotten their favorite movies removed, and I know I’m not the first and last to say this. Even if the app is great, there’s that, and let’s say “older” movies are quite harder to watch anywhere at all. I just hope that the admins won’t take more movies down.

title: Bring back old features
review:
A lot of “old” features that were to me essential have disappeared.

1. Star rating system. A thumbs dozen or up isn’t enough. I just don’t want to know if I liked it. I want to know how much I liked it. Was it super amazing or just ok? Also it helped knowing how much people liked it overall and in general. Those star rating were always very accurate,

2. Letting us know when a series or movie is leaving. How could you take that away? It’s super hard to find the list that shows what’s coming and going each month. It’s not readily available. It should be in the app but you’ve also taken away the warnings on the series/movies pages themselves. What’s worse than staring something new and in a week it’s gone? At least if I knew it was leaving I could either binge or not start it in the first place if I know I won’t have the time to finish.

3. What happened to the back/forward 10 second buttons? Those were super convenient! I HATE having to use the slider bar to rewind and fast forward. Why’d you take those down?!

title: Won't login since Oct 2017 Update
review: Aside from not allowing me to login since the last update was installed on my iPhone 6 Plus, what's with the reviews not being in absolutely "any" type of date order? The reviews are from dates all over the place. Not in date order and doesn't even offer opportunity of how you would like to sort the reviews as Itunes and the developers used to offer. This is important, as I always hold off on any updates for at least a week to see if there are any problems with the latest update installed, but now have to blindly install updates, which I may not be having this current inability to login problem if the reviews were reflected by latest date order. Thanks again Netflix for making a great app just another problematic app!

title: Best App all around
review: After reviewing all tv and movie apps - verses shows, movies quality and price . Hands down Netflix comes on top . The apps the price constantly goes up each year. They either add other features or channels - and with out you realizing it your cost per month has gone up . Or the video can’t load or there’s a error check back. Or you have the app paying for it now if you want to watch another session or a certain movie - yep you pay extra. Not with Netflix the monthly fee is all there is - no unexpected fee’s or surprises !!

title: Bring back the good shows!!!!!
review: I love Netflix and all, but now my opinion has changed on it!! Because this quarantine they’ve removed all my favourite shows and now I’m only left with super horrible, unfunny, unoriginal, hard to watch shows that I’m pretty sure are only on there because the nine year olds keep rewatching them!!! I’m about ready to end my subscription with Nexflix as I’m sure a lot of people are too because of how bad all the shows are. I’ve also noticed that Netflix removed all of the big lgbtq+ hits/ the ones with a small same sex romance. Hmm why is that Netflix??? So you guys are homophobic now huh? Maybe bring back “I’m Not Okay With This” and “The Society” and me and all the other fans we’ll talk but till then you’re homophobic to me:)

title: A little disappointed with recent changes
review:
I feel like if you have had a movie in your system that people can watch then it should stay there. 4 of my favorite movies (dark crystal, sweeney Todd, Charlie and the chocolate factory, and below her mouth) have recently been removed and it sucked when I went to go watch them (like I usually do) and they weren’t there....  I also feel there should be a wider selection of Tim Burton movies, but my main concern and reason for giving three stars is due to the changes and removal of movies without warning.

-reading some of the recent reviews I see that many people are also having an issue with the removal of movies and shows.

title: Suggestion to Viewing algorithm
review: I’ve been using Netflix for years and it’s great, but the only suggestion I have is for Netflix’s recommend algorithm. I usually have watched most of the things recommended or i have trouble searching for something to watch but I think if a “random pick” feature is implemented that is based off the algorithm will greatly help those who can’t decide what to watch next. I know I have lots of things in my list but can’t choose so I end up not watching anything for days and this feature will help me pick a movie/show much faster, if not at least a “re-roll” .

title: Don’t Get During Covid
review: If you are looking to get Netflix right now, I advise you to wait until Covid has mostly blown over. I have had Netflix for a very long time now and have been very satisfied. Of course when we are streaming on the television, it sometimes would load but it was easily fixed by going out and coming back in. Now, and this started when Covid did, it gets stuck every time without fail. Sometimes it gets stuck on 20% but most of the time it gets stuck on 24%. It works fine on our other devices but we have found streaming Netflix on our television completely useless. I am hoping that it will get better when Covid settles down.

title: I like it and all but there are several things bothering me
review: For example, you seriously need to consider parents who are using this App, for example I’d switch to children’s mode, but inappropriate posters of adult rated movies still show up on the screen! Imagine coming back from work after your kids finished watching Max and Ruby and there is a poster of two naked men spooning in bed 🤦🏻‍♀️ I suggest that you guys should have a parental guidance or security option where a parent could hide a show, or lock up the whole adult content.. It’s annoying and frustrating 😫 please do something about this.. If it were a free app, I wouldn’t complain, but parents are paying customers as well!

title: I love Netflix !
review: I love Netflix a lot but it has it’s downfalls. When I try anime they don’t always have all the season. For example Haikyuu originally has 4 seasons yet they only put 2 seasons on there. Same as HunterXHunter they only put 2 season on there. I want to have the full anime experience and watch the full anime instead of some. Can you please start putting all of the season on there. I really do enjoy watching anime. As long as the other animes people love watching. Y’all can put all the season on the other tv shows yet y’all can’t do it for anime. Thank you for your time. :).

title: This is a great app
review: This is a fantastic app to watch movies and tv shoes. Here is something that would make it even better. So for some movies (not all) there are alternate endings, for example I Am Legend has an alternate ending. It would be great if you could add a setting in the information area where you can watch the alternate ending. Also if you can could you do something so if someone adds a movie to their list than the movie won’t leave their list even if you take it off of Netflix? That would also be fantastic. If you take my advice, thank you so much.

title: Formatting/ screen size ratios
review: For the love of god please format all movies and tv shows to fill the entire screen. Nobody wants to lose the top and bottom of their screen. When you watch stuff on an iPad you can either lose an inch at the top and bottom of the screen or you can go to full screen and lose much of the sides. Like in a documentary using full screen you miss the names of people because they are cut off on the sides. I want to see everything and have my entire screen utilized too. It’s almost 2019 and having two black lines on your screen is so 1990’s. But it’s “wide screen!” Nobody cares! Please fix it!

title: Will not play downloaded files - support worthless
review:
I did the free trail to test out Netflix.
I successfully downloaded the two seasons of shows available of a tv show to watch later without internet access.  
The first two times I could play the downloaded videos.
The next time I started the ap I got a blank screen with a spinning symbol and the upper right had the word signin.

With the ap still open, when I drive to a location with internet access the ap now showed the normal screen and I could view a video.

When I didn’t have internet access only about 1/3 or 1/2 the time would the normal screen come up and I could play videos.  The rest of time I could do nothing until I had internet access.

Totally worthless.  

And support, after 30 minutes talking to several people could not even understand the issue (asking stupid questions like which video would not play - after I said I started the ap and only saw a spinning screen with signin in the upper right corner and telling me netflix will not play downloaded files without being connected to the internet after I said sometimes it worked and sometimes it didn’t).

I canceling my trial.

title: This was a great idea and app a long time ago
review: This was a great idea and app a long time ago. It seems pretty useless now. They’ve removed ratings. They don’t let you search in any reasonable way unless you’re on a desktop. Now all the new movies are busy and won’t load. They don’t have enough copied licensed. Odd because they made some of the movies. I guess they don’t think their own movies are good enough to show. Mostly, just agree. You can watch what you want other places. It seems like the whole Netflix app is designed to promote a few second rate movies they cranked out. No thanks. Update: when I tried to cancel they said “something must have happened” they kept charging my card for months. I’m done with this. Netflix is a criminal organization in my mind. And they aren’t even good at it.

title: Why can’t you move titles between profiles?
review: “My List” has always been the worst part of the Netflix app. Of all the great steps forward Netflix has made, My List is way to easy to get out of control. To manage things a little better, and because there’s no rhyme or reason sometimes to how they organize the list, I make profiles based on themes I like: Comedy, Documentaries, Action.... There should be a way to move titles between them. I’ll see a recommendation, save it, but it’s on the wrong profile. Now I need to log out, into the other, add it there, and remove on the 1st profile — too many steps for a logical option that should have been available years ago.

title: Teen section
review:
I know I’m not the first to say this. PLEASE ADD A TEEN CHOICE!!!
All of the teen shows are on the adult choice ,but there’s still Tv-MA stuff and rated R movies on it, and some parents don’t want their kids to see that stuff! And the kids section should be called “little kids” section. Like, shows like “Alexa and Katie” (which I love) shouldn’t be at the same age choice as freaking “Baby Bum”. There should be a kids section, preteen section, teen section AND adult section. Or at least a teen section with shows that aren’t for little kids!!! PLEASE! I’ve been using Netflix forever and this has annoyed me for that time. Please even consider this,
anonymous spice

title: There are improvements to be made
review:
As much as I like this app, several things stand out to me as needing improvement. Firstly, we need a skip forward button. It doesn’t make sense to only be able to rewind something with a button press. I’m tired of having to scroll through the time bar to do this.
 Secondly, we need a better review system. Just a thumbs up or thumbs down isn’t specific enough. 
Thirdly, why can’t we browse the genres like we used to be able to. We used to be able to select a genre, sci fi mystery for example, and go through a list of every title on Netflix that was labeled such. Now all we get is s what Netflix decides are the top titles of those genres.

title: Please help me
review: I love Netflix don’t get me wrong. However I’ve watched season one of Riverdale when it came out on Netflix and have been waiting for season two as I do not wish to watch it on television. People have been saying that episodes of it have already come out but when I check it the episodes aren’t there. I tried to see if I needed an update for it, if it is just a problem with my phone and it is on another device, uninstalling the app, and even looking on the internet if someone has this problem as well but nothing has worked. I do not know who else to contact except for Netflix. Please help me solve this issue and thank you so much for reading this.

title: Good Overall
review:
The app works pretty fast and stable except for rare buffering issues, but that’s everything. Fairly cheap for all you can get. Support is usually pretty cool.

There are 2 bones of contention.
1. Netflix seems far more interested lately in “Netflix Originals” and, let’s face it, they’re not all “Black Mirror” so maybe go back to uploading other stuff. Which brings us to...
2. Kindly stop having only a few seasons of something. If you’re going to have it, have all of it. If you can’t or won’t have all of it, get rid of the part of it. I hate getting into new shows only to find out a season is missing.

title: Good but....
review: This app is good but there is something wrong with it it won't let me download anything I pay for this  to work and it's not doing a good job if it's not gonna doe it's job and still pay you for awful services then this app isn't a very good app for it to pay you there is a Hurricane coming tomorrow and I want to download my things before I I don't have internet connection I expect an upgrade within the next 2 hours if I don't get it by then I will stop paying you will see what's going to happen next it's a great app  but it doesn't work as well as it should do I expect my upgrade within 2hours don't forget thx

title: VPN Blocks Ruin Netflix
review: Let me set something straight. I love Netflix itself. It has a huge variety of shows. A little lax on child protection but that’s not the reason for my bad review. It is because of Netflix blocking all users using VPNs. Due to many international copyright laws, citizens of other countries have a separate Netflix from US Residents. And many shows are blocked on their Netflix resulting in people illegally using VPNs to access the US Netflix selection. And people like me use VPNs for legal uses, like security or work cannot access Netflix. So many innocents are casualties of this war on illegal VPN users. So Netflix, are you going to continue to fight a battle that Will eventually lead to you losing customers, or are you lift the VPN ban. I will change my review when you do.

title: Shows not keeping up with episodes I watch
review: For probably two or three months, when I watch episodes of shows on Netflix, the continue watching does not update so if I click a show from continue watching it will take me back to episodes which I’ve already watched. Quite often when I click details to select an episode, the episodes will not be updated although this is not always the case. This problem occurs on my iPad, MacBook, and smart tv. This problem is quite obnoxious because the continue watching feature is useful. Otherwise there are few problems, but I hope this glitch will be addressed promptly.

title: Issues tho
review:
I love Netflix. I download shows to watch on the train but lately, its been giving me an issue. Its been saying "failure to connect" every time I use it. I'm at home with wifi, out the house w/ data, on the plane w/ wifi, etc. when I use to be on the train, I was still able to use Netflix. Now I can't. I been having this issue since friday. What do I do? I've gone on airplane mode to restart everything, disconnect from the wifi and even after resetting my phone. 

Btw: I just updated the app today, and its still giving me the same issues.

title: STILL NO BACKGROUND STREAMING
review: I deleted this app several weeks ago because I was frustrated that you can’t stream what you’re watching in the background. With Comcast Xfinity I can listen to what I’m watching while I’m doing other things on my phone so I am not a slave to the app. Netflix is not that handy. As soon as you leave the Netflix app to answer a text or to do something else, the sound/show just stops. You can’t just continue what you’re watching while you live your life. You have to be devoting 100% of your time to what you’re watching. You can’t try to multitask are actually have a life. So yet again, I am deleting Netflix. Canceling my subscription again. So pointless. Such a simple fix, but they’re too lazy to do it.

title: Best video steaming service!
review: Hand down the best video streaming service. A very large library of great exclusive Netflix exclusives like Punisher, Stranger Things, Godless, etc. They even some amazing exclusive movies. Large selection of regular TV shows and movies. Streaming quality is amazing and looks great even with slow internet. Has HDR/Dolby Vision support for supported devices while most streaming services don’t. Movies and shows look amazing in HDR something to see in person on an iPhone X. Fast loading times when loading video. Finally great customer service! Highly recommend!

title: Pause features
review: Normally I would give this app 5 stars but it seems like there is a new Netflix update daily and they really are not fixing issues. In order for the app to work the way I prefer on my phone I have to delete the app and then redownload it. The app will not allow me to pause my shows for longer than two minutes. If two minutes and I mean literally two minutes goes by without me pressing play the app will shut completely out and my phone will open to up to the home screen. This is the most frustrating thing I have had to deal with. I need to be able to pause my shows for however long I am a mother

title: Crashes.
review: I would give Netflix 5 stars (because I really love it when it works) but ever since the most recent update, I find myself completely unable to watch it on my iPhone 7. The app opens up fine, I can log into it fine, and I can even browse without a problem. HOWEVER, every single time I click “play” on ANY title, the app immediately crashes. I have closed it and reopened it, logged out and logged back in, deleted it and redownloaded it, turned off my device and turned it back on, but NOTHING works. No matter what, the app crashes as soon as I click play. It has not worked correctly a single time since the new update. Please fix this.

title: What about Anime?
review: Netflix is amazing don’t get me wrong but when it comes to updating Anime it’s not the best....There are so many good anime shows that I would love to watch and I can- its just that it doesn’t always have all of the seasons. Let’s take Fairytail for instance it has a total of 8 seasons but only 1 is available on Netflix. And it’s not just this show either Haikyu has 4 seasons but only 2 are available and so on and so on I could seriously make a list. I’m not bashing on The Netflix team because they are working their butts off as well but the Anime genre has some room for improvement regarding the installments of seasons

title: Netflix please READ!!!
review: Hey, the only complaint I have is the “play next episode” option won’t automatically work unless you are on WiFi. I can understand that you guys may have done this to prevent someone from using up all of their cellular data in case they fall asleep or something, but why can’t we just have the option to turn it on/off while on cellular data? I ditched my WiFi and have unlimited cellular data and I’m super annoyed that next episodes won’t automatically play for me. Lots of times I am cleaning up or watching while I do something else and I have to drop what I’m doing to press the “next episode” button. I hate it!!! Please fix this!!!!!

title: Amazing app - a few details needed to discuss
review:
So for starters, this app is amazing! I use it everyday and it’s pretty easy to understand and use. Recently I’ve been having issues with downloads, I download an episode to watch offline and then once I’m offline and have no WiFi I go to play the episode and it says theirs an error. I’ve updated the app, re-downloaded episodes, and even deleted and re downloaded the app. Nothing seems to work and I can’t watch anything offline. 

That’s been my only issue so far! I hope you can fix it soon.

title: Please Fix “My List” (Manual Setting)
review:
For the past few months, save for a couple weeks, each new title added to “My List” (manual setting) has gone to the very bottom of “My List” instead of the top. 

Not sure why no one has caught this. I’m assuming most have their “My List” on the default Netflix Suggests setting (because setting can only be changed on website, not in app).  But for those like me utilizing Manual Setting, it’s not really useable if I have to scroll to the bottom each time to find my most recent added titles. 

Please make app developer/updates team aware of this. Each new update I anticipate it being fixed, yet it still hasn’t been.

title: Fix this !!!
review: For the most part I have no problem with the app although, there is one thing that just irritates me I look through the movies I choose one that I want to watch and I can’t watch it, because it is not available to watch where I am. I would prefer the app to only show movies that I can watch instead of having to be disappointed because I can’t watch the move that I clicked on. Over all I think that the app is great don’t get me wrong, but I just don’t find it to be practical having to find a movie that I like, but having to make sure I can watch it where I am currently at.

title: I LOVE NETFLIX SO MUCH
review: i love netflix and binge watch shows fast and incredibly easy. there is nothing wrong with netflix in my opinion... besides the fact that none of the old amazing disney shows are on it, along with cartoons i used to watch as a kid. sometimes i just want a throwback and wish that i could watch shows like tom & jerry, suite life in deck, drake & josh, austin & ally, scooby doo, and so many more. i also wish game of thrones was on netflix. i understand some of these are impossible to get but i would love netflix so much more if these shows were added! i love this app so much! thanks

title: Not all good
review: Netflix has usually made good changes with their updates, but some of the most recent one isn’t!  While watching a TV show, you will get to the end of the episode.  I’m used to reaching to the upper left corner to exit the show. Now, however, one must go searching for the exit button. Why can’t you keep things generally in the same position with each app change? It’s annoying and very frustrating and time consuming to the viewer. Remember, we PAY for the Netflix service. It’s not like it’s a free app or air TV.  Just keep this in consideration for future “improvements“ you make.  Thanks.

title: please see and add this netflix !
review: first of all netflix is a great great app for watching movies and tv shows they provide but they don’t have as much good movie selections or show selections no more since they deleted most of it. They have old movies nobody really sees and put some really good shows they have on netflix originals, i think you should add other shows back on netflix like family guy and others that are related to that show also you should add some spongebob and old disney shows or even keeping up with the kardashians,  i’ve been wanting to see thoses shows please add these tv shows on netflix soon !!!!!!!!!

title: Terrible... just Terrible
review: Netflix used to be good, it had great classics, military action packed movies, and etc. but they removed my favorite military movie yet, the only good military/comedy on Netflix which is “Full Metal Jacket”, now all they have is terrible military “movies” with terrible acting. How am I supposed to be entertained? Netflix is supposed to be entertainment for the people, not pathetic rip off movies with bad acting. Netflix I hate to admit it but your going down hill, please add good movies like Dunkirk, or something military related that’s good, I mean these veterans do deserve more respect, they are the reason why we are here safe in America. All I have to say is please bring back the entertainment we want, the stuff that will entertain us, and please bring back Full Metal Jacket. Thank you

title: KingMatt79
review:
Netflix is... one notch below air conditioning as historically one of the best things ever invented by a human.  Well maybe automobiles cause we’d have to walk or ride horses without those. Hmmmm.... well it’s definitely up there! Netflix on a cold rainy Sunday all nuggled up with the wife is my idea of a vacation. Binge out on some awesome docu or pick one of their hundred original series that you can’t go wrong with most any of them. My biggest complaint about Netflix is I never end up watching anything cause my wife and I can’t decide what awesome show we want to watch. 
Thank you Netflix, I love you

title: Please add this back😥and add this😑
review:
I want Digimon back I want Jurassic park back I want The lost world Jurrasic park And Lastly add Jurrasic park three back I loved Jurrasic park and digimon but if you want me happy again without bringing in those things bring in Godzilla 2000-Godzilla2004 but fairytale has 7 seasons and what’s taking so long to get all seasons of ninjago sorry I’m just a big fan at least you put in King Kong Peter Jackson if there is Kong 2012 add it to Netflix I know you have to spend money for shows and movies but please try to do this

I Love Netflix but this has to come back

Oh yeah make a wings of fire animated series

title: One thing I wish Netflix had.
review: Netflix is basically my life and a lot of people know that. They ask me what show I recommend to them I have a lot but I can’t remember every show I’ve watched and I wish there was a setting on Netflix so I could look back on what I’ve watched. Like My list but things you have watched and I think that this would be amazing edition to Netflix. I don’t know if this is possible but if it is would Netflix maker please please please make it I e been wanting this to exist for like ever. Thank. You so much. Netflix is amazing and is cheap and AWESOME // MY LIFE 😂😂😁

title: Good but
review: I love Netflix, I watch in car, at home, work, everywhere.  BUT and that is a bigger and bigger but with updates... why do you continue to shrink amount of time I can download and watch shows.  I usually try to keep about 3 hours of shows ready to watch in case end up stuck somewhere. But now it’s down to days max to watch and then there is limit in times you can download? Wth!?  It was bad enough to have it restricted to 2 weeks cause sometimes things come up to where I can’t watch.  But now I downloaded stuff this morning to see expires in 4 days? Come on.  It’s not costing you any different to let me watch it in next 4 days or next 2 weeks.

title: Prevents WiFi working with other apps after search
review:
I was adding titles to my watchlist from a review article, which means I was using the iPad Pro’s native web browser and the app. I did a search, clicked on the icon in the search results, added it to my list, closed the movie page (which takes you back to the search results page), then clicked on another movie. That movie page was blank, as it turned out to be for every one I tried.

I gave up after many tries, and went to do other stuff, but nothing else that used WiFi worked. I spent more than an hour doing everything I could think of, including shutting down my tablet many times snd rebooting the modem. When I did get things to work, it was temporary. Until I removed the Netflix app, that is. Then everything worked fine.

I tried going through the website, but doesn’t allow me to add to my watchlist or to watch anything. It seems that no matter what I want to do (except manage account details), they just throw up a “Get App” screen which I can’t close.

It is just too much hassle, and I am ready to pitch Netflix, which makes searching insanely difficult through the tv.

title: I used to love Netflix but now it’s not working
review: Recently every time i go onto netflix my closed captions are turned off when i always leave them on. i have never had this problem and now all of a sudden and i have to re-turn them on every single time i watch a show. and also when i try to skip through my show it won’t show me what scene i will try to go to it just moves ahead. i have powered off my phone, deleted and re-got netflix, and tried turning my wifi on and turning it off to LTE and nothing is working. i updated netflix and this is what happened and i am not happy about it.

title: Phineas and Ferb
review: NETFLIX I LOVE YOU SO MUCH BUT PLEASE DO NOT TAKE AWAY PHINEAS AND FERB. I've been watching this show every night for over a year now, and I find it hard to sleep without it. If it isn't on Netflix I won't have the ease of it being there all the time. Netflix please don't do this to me. I don't know what I'll do without it. My friends and I all love this show so much and share many fun stories and experiences we've had just enjoying this show. I don't care how old I am, i am genuinely upset about this. I couldn't find the email so this is the next best thing. I love you Netflix but I am in extreme distress.

title: Cool but update it more
review: I’ve been using Netflix and it’s cool most of the time. It has good movies, tv shows, documentaries, etc. While all of that is good, the updates are really going downhill. I’ve been noticing that you guys rarely update tv shows, movies and documentaries and I find it really irritating. There are some seasons and movies I’ve been waiting to get uploaded, but it’s been almost 6 months since you guys made new seasons/movies on the app, like popular tv shows that don’t get any new seasons from you guys. For example, an anime called “The Disastrous Life of Saiki K. or “Agents of S.H.E.I.L.D”. Your app is amazing but please update it more, have a nice day.

title: Great app but:
review:
I love this app and use it almost everyday, but I wish you’d put the option where you can double tap right to skip forward and left to go backwards during a show back on the app. I really liked using that option. Also when you had the pause button in the middle of the screen instead of the bottom left, that was great and really helpful.

 Overall this app is great and very organized and Id love to see the things I mentioned above included in the app, it would definitely make it even better.

title: It’s great and all but...
review:
Listen—it’s a great app & great service. The interface is nice and easy to use, quality is good, all that stuff. I genuinely recommend it.

But recently, most of my favorite titles have been removed, with no titles I have interest in watching left. Because of this, I’ve been sticking to Disney+ entirely, because it’s got some of my favorite movies that I can rewatch again and again without fear of their removal.
I get it, you remove the titles you can’t keep anymore because of the lack of views, but seriously. I discovered some of my favorite movies on here, and finding out they were removed after going back to rewatch them is always a huge bummer :/

title: I LOVE this life changing app but there is a popular suggestion that will help Netflix indefinitely!
review: I Absolutely cannot stop watching the trending app Netflix. As a Netflix fan since this pandemic I am proud to say that I have a popular suggestion that I think that should be added to Netflix and will help during this pandemic. As you know the #1 animation seller “Rebecca Sugar’s: Steven Universe”, An UNBELIEVABLE amount of Companies wanted to work with Rebecca’s work since then. Now she came out with “Rebecca Sugar’s: Steven Universe Future THE MOVIE”, An UNFORGETTABLE and Popular Movie in 2019! I HOPE THIS POPULAR OPINION GETS THROUGH, I HIGHLY ENJOY REBECCA’S WORK AND OTHER PEOPLE DO TOO.

title: Netflix
review: I Love Netflix but the reason why I gave it a 4 out of 5 is because I am a huge anime person but the facts that you don’t have all of Fairy tail episode makes me quite disappointed also the fact that you don’t have my hero academia just makes me even more disappointed but other than that I LOVE Netflix so please if it isn’t to much to bother can you pleaseeee put all of the fairy tail episode and my hero academia episode thank you also for anyone who’s reading this Netflix honestly is amazing it’s totally worth the money but if your an anime person like me you’ll also love it ifc not all animes are complete but maybe one day

title: Netflix Chill
review: I love Netflix. It’s so easy to stream all my favorite TV shows and movies. The app is easy to use and has a simple layout. I love how they are constantly adding new content. But lately, I’ve been bummed because F.R.I.E.N.D.S was taken off! I know it’s not your fault that another company beat you to the rights to the show, but could you please try to bring it back? It was the second most streamed show in 2018. I also love that when you finish an episode you go right into the next one without having to press any buttons. Overall it’s an incredible app.😍😍😍

title: Poor quality, broken functionality
review:
The quality of downloads and streaming isn’t great, compared to other services. I don’t have internet at home (too rural), so I download at work. It looks marginally okay on the iPad Pro, but garbage on the TV. 

Also it offers the option to “renew” your download if you don’t watch it in 30 days, which makes sense so you don’t cancel your subscription after downloading six months worth of videos... but that functionality has NEVER WORKED. I’m talking well over a year. It gives an error message every time, so you have to delete the download, and waste bandwidth downloading from scratch. This not being fixed clearly shows an ineptitude on the part of the developers.

title: Nowhere else to complain....
review: I was a loyal Netflix user for almost a decade until yesterday. Someone used one of my email addresses to sign up for an account, then changed the email and info. When I called to report this possibly fraudulent activity and (lost account access, because I forgot I’d used a different email address), their response was that there was nothing they could do, record of me did not exist and would I like to sign up for a new account? Because they couldn’t offer me any remedy and their customer service was nonexistent, and there is no one even to forward these strange emails to, I canceled my account due to that phone interaction and I’ve changed all my info. Get better customer service and care more about your customers’ information security, Netflix.

title: Please reimplement fast forward and back
review: Overall I have little negative to say about the Netflix app. It does what I need it to. Last month, I started watching a show that I greatly enjoy but don’t want the blood and gore/sexual sense, so I was thrilled to be able to just tap the fast forward 10 seconds button on the screen. In addition if I missed something and wanted to watch it again the fast back 10 seconds was equally appreciated. The slider is pointless as I can never easily move the time forward or back with accuracy.  I do hope they put this feature back in the app.

title: Absolutely amazing but... (MUST READ)
review: The thing Is Netflix is amazing and such a good place to watch movies and shows but... Some shows are missing episodes and seasons even some movies. Tbh some shows like Naruto are amazing but they are missing episodes and all the Naruto movies (I’m not obsesssed with Naruto I’m using it as an example.) Please Netflix I don’t want to watch episodes over and over again put more episodes of theses kinds of shows and maybe add movies related to the shows like Naruto Shippuden is a movie continuing Naruto story. I hope you read this and thank you.

title: This update
review: Latest update has casting issues (assuming it has to do with ads, which you can turn off through settings on desktop). Casts fine for 1 movie/episode but when auto-playing to next episode casting would come with playback errors. Have to reopen app>close>restart>disconnect/reconnect>recast. So far happens every time w/o fail.  Must be because I turned off the ads option as reading from the reviews they’re more frequent than when they first started it. If Netflix needs more revenue, they perhaps should stop licensing crap jargon that can be found online anyways and control their budgeting. Although I’m sure they sell our browsing habits which is probably why they continue to have a cluster mess of genres; like their unintuitive layout to force us to browse.

title: Download section
review: I do really like this app. And I use it all the time. I do have one suggestion though. And it’s for the download section on the app. I don’t fly too often, but when I do I like to have something to watch and I don’t normally purchase the WiFi that the airlines offer. Well, I can’t access my downloaded shows and movies when my phone is in airplane mode. I get that I could open the app and start the show or movie before I put my phone in airplane mode. But I’m never going to remember to do that! I think it would be awesome if we could somehow access our downloads while in airplane mode.

title: English, Spanish
review: OK first of all I want to say that Netflix is really cool because I can watch a movie anytime anywhere that I have service and they all have some pretty good movies. Now here comes the bad I see a bunch of scary movies that I would like to see but they’re in a different language than English, I wish that Netflix for specify which movies are In what language the movies going to be in because I hate seeing a movie that I want to see and its in a different language. But I don’t know it’s in a different language because it doesn’t specify. So please Netflix the next update specified what movies and what language thank you. That is why am giving Netflix three stars

title: Auto play: BAD after a movie!!!
review:
So I have an Apple TV and my Netflix just started doing this thing where I can’t see the end credits of a good movie because it’s too busy suggesting the next movie, playing the trailer. 

And that would be fine, if the auto play suggestions were any good, but they’re not. It suggested some anime series and I hate anime (it’s just incredibly overrated and it’s doubly annoying when you’re surprised with something you can’t stand while trying to finish a film you actually enjoyed. 

Please just go back to showing the suggested titles as suggested still images at the bottom and stop auto playing the trailers of things I’d never watch. Thanks.

title: Just one thing...
review:
I love Netflix!! I don’t have the phone app, but I do have the tv app. So, I have just one tiny request. I can’t find Avatar: The Legend Of Korra. At least, on my kids account. It aired on Nickelodeon. It’s TV-Y7. I SHOULD BE ABLE TO WATCH THIS. Btw, I’m on Canadian Netflix. I don't like this. You can easily find Avatar: The Last Airbender and a certain trash movie about a kid from a civilization that was lost a century ago that I WILL NOT SPEAK OF, and Netflix is making a live-action Avatar: The Last Airbender series, and yet no Legend Of Korra. I’m not sure if you’re aware that this is a thing, but it is, and I’m going to die of loneliness if I don’t get to see LoK.

~Signed, an ATLA fan.

title: Pretty good
review: I love Netflix to be honest but the thing is for many of the shows I wanna watch like Hunter x Hunter Netflix is the only place that I can use that has it as English dub instead of sub and that’s why I love it but the other thing is that Hunter x Hunter is not updated it has 2 other seasons that came out a while ago that I really wanna watch but I can’t because everywhere else it’s subbed and on Netflix it’s not there so my one thing that I think Netflix needs to get better at is updating shows with seasons already out in the world especially during quarantine. But overall thanks for saving me from boredom.

title: ComedyShortsGamer
review: This is a good app for all ages but I find one problem Netflix used to have thousands of good movies and shows that go on and on and you never got bored you never got tired of watching the same thing Netflix actually needs to release every movie and show that exists I’d be one of the best apps other than Disney+ they need to do that especially during with this virus people can’t go anywhere they can’t see their family I just feel like doing this will be a world changer and I’d be so happy if that happens- ComedyShortsGamer

title: I love it but there’s a few stuff I don’t like
review: I like Netflix and watch it A LOT. But whenever I watch it on my iPad I have to keep deleting/downloading every time I use it after I watch it on my phone when I let my phone charge. Also there should be a teen section for like 11 year olds to like 15 year olds. The last thing is that there should be a comment or rating section, so I know of I should watch the show or not, or if it’s a show I would like or not. Like i watched ‘Go, Live Your Way’ and the ‘ A Lister’ ( I’m not sure of the name but it’s similar, and I thought I would enjoy it but it’s wasn’t a show for me.

title: Good app but iPhone XS Max not utilized
review: I’ve always enjoyed this app, seems to work pretty smoothly and has a lot of content.  However, with my galaxy s8+ the full infinity screen was utilized which was really nice. But just recently upgraded to iPhone XS Max and was disappointed to find out that the viewing screen is same size as the iPhone Plus series, it does not use the full screen available on the Max. I don’t see an option to stretch the screen in settings so appears to be an app thing.  Also wish there was a way to rate a series or movie and see the overall rating score.  Otherwise it’s pretty good.

title: Needs some fixes
review: I am CONSTANTLY adding things to my list just to find out the app for some reason unadded it, this happens no matter which device I use. It’s really frustrating because I can’t remember EVERYTHING I see or want to watch so when I go back but can’t find it i tend to assume it’s been taken off the site but really it was never added to my list please fix this it has been a problem for a really long time and I have heard other users complain about it. It would also be cool if you could add an “leaving soon” category so we could have a last chance to watch content that we didn’t know was being taken off this month.

title: Just Stream It Already!
review: So it's really annoying when you get really drawn in to an amazing show and then Netflix cancels it. Why? Because there is controversy because it offends someone. First of all... It's fiction writing. Second of all.... If you don't like it, don't watch it!! But why ruin it for everyone else!!?? If the writers don't know what else to write, that's one thing. But a streaming platform should just Stream and stay out of the politics. Yes, I'm talking about Messiah. Just read several articles saying you guys cancelled it due to controversy... Please tell me this is not true. I want a streaming platform that is neutral, that I can count on to provide shows from every type of genre.

title: Five Stars But Like For Real I'm Going Crazy!!
review: I need help!! I've been sitting around for the last hour and a half trying to pay my bill for Netflix so I can watch my movies and stuff and it's not working!😩 It's driving me crazy!! My Netflix payment is billed through the iTunes Store and I can sit for 15 minutes and it'll still be loading on the screen and won't pop up my billing information, and it's making me mad! If someone reads this and knows what's going on then please help me, because I'm going crazy not being able to use Netflix!!!

title: Love it but
review: I enjoy having Netflix especially since I’m pregnant and laying down helps my nausea. But one thing I ABSOLUTELY HATE is the horror movie selection on here. There is some good ones but that’s few and far in between. The others are all in other languages that I’ve tried watching them but watching it and stopping it to read what is being said makes a movie take way to long and I’m way to annoyed to do that to every. Single. Movie. why can’t you not only put better horror movies on your thing and some in English too??? Just a thought :/

title: Yeah it’s good but it has its faults
review: So even though I gave it a five star rating it’s not perfect, I only did that because the pros outweigh the cons. But it would be even better if they would numb the price back down, and have more of a selection of tv shows. Don’t get me wrong it has some good ones but not enough variety to many old shows and not enough of the new ones. And no offense but most of the Netflix originals are really dark and disturbing, I’m not really into that all that much. If they would fix this it would be a better experience.

title: Amazing  app
