title: Just an idea
review: I’m really not here to rate Netflix, I just can’t find Netflix’s email. It’s 11:30 and I just came up with a good idea, I always have problems finding a movie. Netflix should have a random button that just chooses a random movie or show for you so you don’t have to look for something for hours. I’m not tryna get paid and I’m not working for Netflix I just thought wow maybe they’ll use my idea and I won’t spend too long looking for something I won’t even really enjoy. 😂

title: Always freezing and stopping, giving errors and needing resets
review: Netflix continues to raise its pricing, yet it never works seamlessly.  Paying more and more for a service that isn’t consistent doesn’t make sense. I won’t cancel, since a few of our favorites and daughters favorites are on here but I think about canceling often since it’s such a headache. Why does it always freeze? Why does it have an issue almost every other time loading a show? Why does it not let me log in sometimes? Why don’t our recently watched shows consistently show up in the continued watching?  Put the price back to the lower amount, because this is not quality.

title: The app is great, but...
review: I love Netflix like most people. Has a great selection of TV shows and movies and this past year you guys have outdone yourself with the original content. My only complaint is that I watch Netflix from my phone A LOT. and I hook my phone up to my TV so that I can watch with family/friends. I find it annoying that I have to press the next button to get to the next episode every time an episode ends. Is there any way you guys could make it so that it plays the next episode on it’s own as it does from your laptop?

title: Season 2? 3? 4?
review: Netflix is not adding the final seasons of their shows as options for us to watch. I remember finishing the season 2 of a show like Yu-Gi-Oh Arc V , and then finding out that there wasn’t a dubbed season 3! Not even on Crunchyroll! I am thoroughly disappointed at the way Netflix is building us up to let us down. Just like the movie I used to watch, Mean Girls was it? Yah, they removed it literally a few days before my friends and I were waiting to enjoy it together. It’s not like there isn’t already a wide variety of shows on Netflix. But, it’s either you start and END a show, or don’t start it at all. Otherwise, the viewers won’t be satisfied, and it won’t make you look good no matter how many times you try to justify it.

title: This is a good app, but it needs one change...
review: Don't get me wrong, Netflix is a great app. But recently it started to get buggy. At first, it works out great. I can watch most of the shows that I want to. Then after about two weeks nothing shows up. No shows whatsoever. So I get rid of the app and download it again. Two weeks later the same thing happens. After doing that three or four times it just says it's not compatible. I can't re-download it. so I'm not sure what to do. Please fix this. I'm in the middle of watching sword art online.

title: Needs An Update ASAP
review: Dear Netflix, I hope you read this. I have watched so many series on this app. It is amazing! I like how you can download episodes to watch them when you are offline! I also like that you can add things to your list and rate them. HOWEVER, I am VERY disappointed that the best Netflix Original series only have one season. ALSO, there are other series such as RIVERDALE that do not have a season 2 added on Netflix. There is a season 2 Riverdale out there, but it has not yet been added to Netflix. PLEASE, PLEASE ADD RIVERDALE SEASON 2 TO NETFLIX, PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE. THAT IS THE ONLY REASON I GAVE 4 STARS INSTEAD OF 5. THANK YOU.

title: Ummmm why are you taking everything off Netflix
review: Okay I love Netflix and it is my number one used app, but recently I’ve noticed that they are taking a lot of good shows. Like friends. If you end up taking off all of our favorite tv shows and just having Netflix originals, then I’m not going to give you my family’s business. I also think that always having more options is fantastic because lately there has been a drought in good TV shows, and our whole family relies on rewatching good tv shows like friends, while waiting for more episodes of another show to come out.

title: Fun and entertaining
review: I love the Netflix app and it contains really great shows. One thing I would recommend is multiple lists, like my list, where you can add different movies like you would in “My List”. They would be possibly be playlists or technically “Watch” lists and you could title them different things such as “Funny Movies”, “Movies that make me cry”, etc. Then if you were feeling a certain way you could find a certain list and find what you want. Overall though, very fun app.

title: Bobs burger ( the one star I how feel with u momentarily)
review:
I so disappointed on losing this show. It's my favorite (my family) we watch it nightly as we get ready for bed. I seen many many fans requesting you not to remove it, till it almost all gone. I emailed FOX and I was told it's up to Netflix that they couldn't control your programming. At least they responded. I'll also reached out to you never not one an answer. I tried direct email, Facebook, and twitter, thank you ignoring all of us😒 you have GREAT Netflix originals but with that said that's not the reason you grew to be the company you are, your fans love to bing and have availability to their favorite shows please stop removing them.
Edit: this is old don’t know why it never submitted

title: It’s good but it could do better.
review: I like Netflix for watching some of my favorite shows and movies, I think the app has become better ever since they added audio description for the blind or low vision. But I feel it’s a little limited as it’s only on Netflix originals. Even though some don’t have it at all or it’s only available on the shows original language, in my opinion it would be better if all of Netflix’s shows and movies had audio description and in other languages, that way a blind person or low vision is able to enjoy the same content as a sighted person

title: APP NOT WORKING50
review: Netflix APP for IPAD is down and Netflix customer service takes 90 minutes and three different representatives to state that they don’t know when it will be fixed, can not offer a credit for the time it is down, and that their recommendation is that their customers cancel their service until the issue is resolved.  Being told to use another device when IPAD is the device that is preferred is bizarre customer service to say the least.  When requesting that Netflix send an alert to their customers that they are experiencing an issue with their app, their response is they have too many customers to be able to send out that notification.  Unbelievable.  #notcoolnetflix

title: Great app just needs some kid friendly update
review:
We love Netflix it’s constantly updating programs and movies we have been using it for 4 years.
One thing that would make it a 5 star would be to have it filter movies and shows per rating like for my kids I only like them to watch Y programs and shows and that's all but even when  I have set their profiles for young kids it still shows PG and G movies and shows which I don’t like for my kids to watch. 
Please make it easier for parents to filter what we want our kids to watch

title: One major complaint
review:
Usually I give games and apps five stars even if they have a few bugs or annoying things, because the developers worked hard on it, although this isn’t a bug and I’m pretty sure it’s been looked over. Recently, the subtitles have disappeared in some of the things that I’ve been watching. Countless times in Quantico, and quite a few in the 2 hour movie Enola Holmes.
Typically this wouldn’t prompt me to give the app 4 stars because I like almost everything else, but it happens way too much.

title: “Bug fixes”
review: I was liking the Netflix app just fine until today when I got the latest update. The “bug fixes” addressed by the update changed the video player interface in less-than-desirable ways, such as no longer being able to pause by tapping the middle of the screen or jump forward or back using the sides of the screen. Also, for some reason playing videos now overrides my iPad settings of reducing the white point on my display. Since this was a work around to keep the integrity of colors on my screen, my Netflix now appears with severely distorted colors. I hope they can fix the bugs they made with this update.

title: I don’t know what to title this
review: Netflix is great, but when I start a show and I don’t want to watch it I’m still supposed to finish it or it will be on my to continue watching list which I don’t like it to be on. So, what I’m really asking is if there could be a way where we could choose on what we get to watch and what we get to “kick” off our to continue watching lost. I don’t know if this is just me if it is then that’s fine but it’s just a problem I have because I have a lot of shows I don’t watch on my continue to watch list.

title: Needs software rework
review: Works great and love watching, the pain comes with the “Are you still watching?” Stopping playback that is becoming a giant pain. My son likes to watch a bunch of the shorts and it is always pausing playback, not sure if it goes off how many times it changes episodes or what, be we can watch movies with no problems but we watch 3 shorts and it keeps pausing... Allow me to turn off that junk feature and it would be good. I have contacted them about this via their website and I was told this feature works correctly and they will not do anything, but the problem is I do not want the “feature”, to me it is a nuisance.

title: Love this app
review: I am always looking for a way to watch Netflix without WiFi and this might just be me but I can totally watch all my favorite shows on this without WiFi and the only problem is NOTHING I love this app it is the beat and I can totally at get this app it is like watching tv on your phone please get this app and guess what? It is free that is right free so if you don’t have this app then I don’t know what you have been doing your whole life like gat this app you will LOVE it thx for reading xoxo

title: Shows
review: Please put friends back on here or put living single. And can you please have the dubbed anime already like saiki is a original Netflix series why is season 2 & 3 still in Japanese season 2 been out since July 2018. Also can you release the other seasons of black butler and fairy tale because I don’t pay for Netflix to be waiting so long why haven’t you added more to the anime section or more season the the ones already there I watch most of them already I need more

title: Amazing!!!
review: I love everything about it! Most movie sites don't let you choose kid or adult movies. Like how Kids can watch kid shows,and the adults can watch movies like rated Pg 13 and 14. Most sites don’t let you choose. It is also amazing how there are many movies to chose from. Like hundreds! There is also no adds in the middle of the movie or episode. Which is amazing ,because every time I  get to a good part of a movie on some different site, a few adds show up. So as you can see, I LOVE NETFLIX!!!!

title: “My List” never works
review:
I do not understand why they even offer this option because it never updates.  I have stupidly added titles I want to watch later and removed then when I am no longer interested.  Yet, the app never refreshes “My List”.  

My second complaint is that suggestions have become too heavily weighted almost exclusively towards Netflix content for my tastes.  I would like suggestions that favored my own viewing preferences rather than items Netflix is currently pushing.

I’ve been a longtime Netflix subscriber from back when they only mailed you DVDs.  But this year I have begun to question if the cost of their services is justified, and I’ve become inclined to look elsewhere for entertainment.

title: Why don’t you want me to hear your content?!
review:
I love Netflix. The app is mostly cool, but I can’t use it to stream videos from my phone onto my projector if I have plans to hear it at all. 

I don’t own a TV. I just have my phone, and a projector. When I first got my projector, maybe a year or two ago, I could plug in my phone and watch no problems. Then, there was an update that wouldn’t allow sound to be played through projector. I got a Bluetooth speaker to make it work and now with this new update not even that works. 

I just want to watch Netflix on my projector with ease, why is the option to connect to a Bluetooth device no longer available?

title: Better check your bank statement twice!!
review:
Netflix flies under the radar by billing through different platforms be it iTunes, GooglePlay or Netflix or some other platform!  And it can result in you paying for the same account more than once per month! And they will not attempt to make you aware of it!!!  They will allow the double charging to occur as long as it does till you discover it and then will only refund you 3 months!  No, they do not ever claim responsibility for such errors!  They site it as a personal financial responsibility they YOU catch the double billing!!!  ARE YOU SERIOUS???  
Yes!!!  They billed me for over a year using 2 different billing platforms and they REFUSED to fix the problem and refund me!
I WILL NEVER USED NETFLIX AGAIN!

title: I Love it But...
review: I love Netflix and I think it has great shows and movies. But, I really really wish that the shows came out weekly instead of coming out as a whole season. I just started Riverdale a month ago. So, I obviously started late. I finished the 2 seasons. I was left on a cliffhanger (spoilers ahead) when Archie got arrested. Now, I see all of these things about the episode called “No Exit” and I really wish I could watch it on Netflix but I can’t; so now I have to wait until late May to see what happens. I really wish I could watch it now though

title: Problem with Subtites / CC
review:
I often watch a lot of shows in different languages on my phones and the plain white default subtitles make it hard to read what it being said. 

I’ve already tried going on the Netflix website (not through the iPhone application itself) to switch the captioning settings to no avail. I update the settings and go back to the app only to find that nothing has changed. 

**I also tried turning my phone off completely and deleting and reinstalling Netflix, doesn’t change anything.

I also went on to changing the captioning settings via the internal iPhone settings (Settings > General > Accessibility > Closed captioning/subtitles) and again it didn’t work. 

But yeah, other than that the app works much to my liking. The app would get a 5/5 from me if it weren’t for those captioning issues.

I’m on the newest version of the iPhone 6s version by the way.

title: I need more anime!
review: I want you guys to put more anime’s like “Angels of Death” or “Noragami” and more and don’t forget “Noragami” season two! So please put the anime’s I said and more. Dont take out the best anime’s like “Ouran High School Host Club” or “Naruto” and “Blue Exorcist”. Also can you make a third season to “Vampire Knight”! And for some anime aren’t Dubbed but Subbed and for “The Disatrous Life of Saiki K.” Season two is not Dubbed but Subbed so can you guys Dub it so it can be easier!So please hear me out and put “Angels of Death” and “Noragami” please I have you guys three stars because I want no anime deleted and those two anime’s to be in Netflix and for more new seasons for every anime in Netflix!

title: Netflix, Please Read !!.. Just A Few Things
Read‼️ please
review: I do like Netflix but there is a problem for me. I recently watched a couple of movies and it still showed in the continue watching,  so I went to my account and took it off and then I went back to Netflix to see if it was gone and it was still there. Then I went back to the viewing activity and I didn't see it so I'm just very confused on why it's showing up on my continue watching and it's annoying because it's taking up the space I need to see the actual things I want to continue watching.

title: It’s mostly good
review: I really enjoy the app. It has a large selection of movies and shows, and I can easily watch them. My only problem is the continue watching list. It’s helpful when I haven’t finished something yet and want to continue. But, sometimes I’ll be watching a movie, and then I’ll decide I don’t like it. I don’t want to finish it, but I can’t just remove it from my continue watching. This is annoying because I don’t want it there, and I should be able to get rid of it. Other than that, it’s a very good app.

title: Recommendations Not Helpful
review: My issue with the app is even after I thumbs down selections, days later they remain in my suggestions. Especially foreign language movies that are not even remotely similar to what I watch (genre). Yeah, it looks pretty but unless I know something specific, I am stuck with stuff I won’t and can’t watch. Tried making a new profile from scratch and it was the same issues. I gave it only two stars because yes, it’s smoother looking and yes, I can access profiles a lot easier. But overall, I’m seriously debating leaving Netflix all together since all they want me to do is watch stuff where I don’t even know what they are saying...

title: New Update Ruined the App
review: I used the app yesterday morning and then I updated it to the new update and now, even with my secure internet connection and the fact that it’s my own personal network (and nobody can use it but me due to my strong firewall and passcode) but every time I open the app it just loads and loads and loads. I let my phone sit unlocked with the app open (and no other apps open) but even after an hour it didn’t load whatsoever. I have the best WiFi in my room with full bars so I’m confused as to why the update broke the app. Please fix this because I’d like to watch Netflix again.

title: Could’ve been a 5 Star
review: I’m going to keep this quick and simple. I would say that Netflix is amazing. But there is one thing that keeps grinding my gears. Now for some reason there is a random space at the top and the description for each episode is not fully visible. Every time when I want to know what the episode is about I can read it until the very last line. If it were not for this one thing the app would be a perfect 5. So far that is my only problem and I hope that it gets fixed in a future update.

title: I love it! But i want my childhood shows back on here..
review: Ok so i love Netflix i watch so many kdramas and movies on there. But just one thing ONE THING thats missing are my childhood shows! I want to be able to watch Jessie, A.N.T farm, That’s So Raven, Girl Meets World, Austin & Ally, K.C. Undercover, Stuck in The Middle, and Bizzardvark. I love how you guys still have Liv and Maddie, Bunk’d, Radio Rebel, and Zapped. Its just those others were my favs! So, i just wanted to say please put atleast most of them in Netflix because im actually running out of things to watch! Also, PLEASE PRETTY PLEASE ADD MORE KDRAMAS! IM INLOVE WITH THEM! Anyways thanks for reading. 🙂

title: New maturity rating is out of line
review: As a parent who uses the App Store maturity rating to help control what my kids have access to I am extremely shocked and upset that sometime over the past few days this app has changed from 9+ to 12+ (and category that includes the majority of questionable social media apps) when the internal Netflix controls already allow for much greater control over material for younger family members.  Now my children cannot access the app, and their personalized accounts, because I am not comfortable opening their devices to 12+ rating apps. If the age rating cannot be reversed for whatever reason that I can’t make any sense of, perhaps you can release a Netflix kids app?

title: Old movies and shows
review: This is a great app! I watched so many movies from here. I just love the app! I really like what you’re doing bringing old movies and shows back. I suggest you add some more things like the drarry series (Harry Potter) I really tried looking for it. I know I can count on this app! I hope you read this. This is just a suggestion, you really don’t have to add it ❤️😅. I love this app so much! A show could be the teen titans it is really old, but I still love the show! Keep being an amazing app!

title: اتهام خالد الدوسري بالارهابي
review:
عيال روحو ل نت فلكس و قيموهم نجمه و اكتبو مراجعه يقولون ان المسلمين ارهابيين و حاطين فلم على خالد الدوسري يقولون انه ارهابي انسخو ذي  هاذي Netflix is very bad because it spread rumors about the Saudi student, "Khaled Al - Dosari" in a series called "calls of terrorism nearby" Netflix will be evaluated with the worst, my God is upon you and yes the agent !! evaluation because the documentary film " TERRORISM CLOSE CALL "Especially of episode" the student bomb maker "Khalid Al Dossary is innocent, free Khalid, charge those crocked -corrupt FBI officers with misleading the trial and the investigation. title: Shame
review:
First Netflix was outraged by how much money they were losing from people sharing their Netflix account with others, now they are giving link encouraging them to use it? 
Cmon, 
Please do not share the “gift” link Netflix gives y’all its just a way for Netflix to keep an eye on how many members share their account with others. Y’all should know nothing is a free gift from greedy companies. Share your account login info manually, do not share the link they so generously give people to “help” them share the account. It’s just a way to keep tags on people and their money. it’s despicable.

title: Just work as advertised
review:
I’ve had a subscription for several years and I’ve been happy with the performance watching different media when streaming at home. However, I travel weekly for work and your app is garbage. I’ll downloaded shows and halfway through my flight, it’ll stop and I’ll just get the spinning wheel. I can’t rewind or fast forward through your flawed download. Additionally, you want to say that my paid for, subscription downloaded show has “expired!” or I’ve reached the download “limit?!” First of all, I wouldn’t re-download a show if it didn’t “expire.”
Get your *stuff together Netflix. I pay you so I can watch your media. Not to have you tell me when it’s convenient for you.

title: Maybe you should add...
review: Hey! Netflix is SUCH a great app, I really recommend it whenever you want to watch some TV shows or old movies you haven’t seen in a while, even though it costs money. This review is about the shows, though. That’s so Raven. That’s so Raven used to be on Netflix and then all of a sudden, you guys just...DELETED it! That’s so Raven hasn’t been on Netflix for years! That’s so Raven is one of the most loved 2000’s shows on Disney channel. I know that for a FACT! Please add it back. That’s all I gotta say. Please.

title: Best app EVER !!!
review:
So idk when I started watching Netflix but all I know is that this app makes you feel like your on a movie theater and I love that feeling and also when you have a good snack with you it makes it 10 times better I love river dale it’s I think the best series out there that’s just my personal opinion but you guys are really amazing I hope you add more series because I just finished riverdale and idk what show to
Watch anymore but anyway pls read this Netflix,love ya keep it the good work byeee :))💕💕🙌🏻🙌🏻

title: Downloads
review: I live in nyc and take the subway so I usually download shoes and movies onto my phone since there’s no service.  My question is, why is there a time limit on how long I have to watch an episode before the download deletes? On top of that, there’s a limit to how many times you can download certain movies/ shows. Why am I paying for this app then? It honestly makes no sense. Don’t increase your prices if you’re not going to provide better service. I should be able to download whatever show I want and not worry about my downloads getting deleted if I don’t watch the show for a while. Now I can’t even redownload that episode.

title: Get it together, Netflix!
review: I have been a Netflix customer for years. I loved the service and quite a few of the shows they produced. However, they recently raised their prices and said it was due to them making more of their own shows. Many of these new series and movies are awful. It appears Netflix has decided in favor of quantity over quality. Yes, they put out a lot of their own productions, but it wasn’t worth the increase in price. Now, they will be losing several shows and series that I actually watch. I am now considering cancelling our subscription. Why should I pay more for something that I will now use less?

title: Good app but change one thing
review: I like this app but I want you to change one thing you in every series or movies there will be a response section where you can type in things you think about the movies and series or you could tell the developer to add a season and this will go straight to the developers but not the Netflix developers the real developers and I hope it comes soon and other Netflix fans will like this version of Netflix and thank you

title: Mostly Good
review: I like the fact that there’s a selection of movies to choose from. Since the last updates things are not looking well. For example...when removing shows or movies added to my list that I have watched already and have removed from the list they are still showing on it. I would like to keep what I have added without having to go through each show or movie to check if it has the check mark letting me know that I added it to the list. Please fix this problem.

title: Netflix isn’t secure
review:
I love Netflix, but I think there’s something wrong with it, I often check my account to see if there’s anyone watching who is not authorized. I noticed there were people watching in the account from Florida and Pennsylvania (I’m in Ohio). I changed my password and 2 days later I checked back and there’s people watching from Colorado and Pennsylvania. What the heck is going on Netflix. I have authorized a couple family members to watch and they are both in Cincinnati with me. 
I don’t want to have to change my password weekly.

title: THIS IS A GREAT APP
review: I love this app, it has MOST of everything I want. The thing is it should have more Youth movies for 10 to 13 year olds. For an example it should have Spider-Man and dead pool, those kind of kid movies. It should also be able to be downloaded on older devices. For me I can not download it so I have to use my moms NEWER iPad to use the app. I fined that sad because I really want it to be on my iPad so I can watch stuff whenever I want. But overall it's a great app and if I where you I would download it. Thx 😀😎😄😃👌👍

title: Evilflix
review: More and more you’re pushing sexual content especially homosexuality too those who don’t want to view it. You’ve failed your subscribers by offering no filters and yet you’ll claim discrimination to those complaining when in truth you’re discriminating against those who do not approve of behavior like that. More and more you’re wrecking Netflix experience. Nobody wants to watch a full screen advertisement of another show while they’re watching series. Tell your Netflix crew too stop with the screensaver or put an option too disable it. We pay you money and without us you will cease. You’re being very disrespectful to those who don’t agree with content that goes against their religious views or beliefs.

title: Fantastic but never perfect
review: The title says it. I’ve a subscriber since it’s inception. I guess the lack of feature constancy between the app formats is mildly agitating and the thumbs up/down rating system blows. I would like that if you give a feature a poor rating that it would disappear from your selections. Other wise it’s solid and I will keep on keepin’ on especially as they keep coming out with stunning original content. (A few more major releases in the streaming library would be good but I’m sure that’s more just legal issues).

title: Good but a few suggestions
review:
When I was searching through I realized that most of the shows didn’t have all the season that the creators had posted such as the anime fairy tail only had 1 season on Netflix and really had 8 season in total but they just weren’t there on it. I really wish that you could do more to get all those episodes overall that’s all I have to say especially since I love watching fairy tail very much so please could you update that?   
Thank you so much!

title: Volume screen block/ability to remove “continue watching”/crashing
review:
1. Volume screen block every time you adjust the volume.... come on, can we change that already? 
2. The ability to remove something on the “continue watching” list. Yes, I hated that movie and turned it off after 10 minutes, and no I never want to continue watching it. Please stop the torture of making me look at it.
3. Your newest version crashes every time I open the app or open a specific episode. Please fix.

Otherwise, keep up the good work. My procrastination is at its finest. :) Thanks!

title: Netflix app on iPad
review: This 5 star rating is for the excellent app on iPad. I can sit on my dining room table eating dinner and have no problem watching my shows with my WiFi connection, unlike some other apps where the show I’m watching constantly freezes up (for example the xfinity app). On the other hand I’m rating Netflix 3 stars for some of the awful recent changes. For the most part I still consider Netflix to be worth the money, hence the reason for 3 stars instead of 1 star.

title: Love it but unfair
review: I love being able to watch stuff on Netflix but technically it’s not free if the app is free then you shouldn’t have to pay for anything but you download the app thinking it’s free and then it says you have to pay every month and that’s not free they need to either make you pay for the app and be done with it or keep the app free and keep it that way for in the app so you don’t have to set up anything to pay it’s stupid to pay for it when the app is free so make the app free and charge NOTHING at all so no payments whatsoever no plans or anything or charge for the app make up your mind you can’t do both it doesn’t make any sense and that just isn’t fair

title: Suggestion filters based on Ethnicity
review: I love all the movies and tv episodes available to watch.  I love to watch lots of different things based on my mood at the time.  I usually choose to watch a movie based on a story summary or category (romantic, food, comedy,...).  I am frustrated that after I watch something that has actors/actresses of a specific ethnicity;  the suggestions appear to be based primarily on that ethnicity.  I like movies with African Americans, Indians, Spaniards, Asians, Italians, ...   I want my movies suggestions based on categories first.  If I wanted movie suggestions based on ethnicity, I would choose to search based on that.

title: What’s up with the screen orientation??
review: I’ll have my phone flipped a certain way, but when I load a show it’ll automatically flip to default, which is the opposite of what I want. So, I flip the phone around a couple times until the app recognizes I changed the orientation. Finally. I can watch my show. BUT. If I close out the show, (staying in the app) and load another one, the app will re-flip the orientation. It’s beyond irritating! Why won’t it automatically recognize which way I have the phone? It used to just flip as soon as the app opened instead of me manually having to flip it.

title: I loved using it
review: My problem now is all these frustrating broken updates. The rating system is useless at best. I know you guys are trying to go for more original content but you keep taking away all the shows I used to watch. It no longer informs me about new seasons of shows I have in my follow list unless they are Netflix originals. Last of all when it shows recommended movie/tv shows after you finish one it only recommends Netflix originals it doesn't matter that you just finished watching That 70s show, it recommends you watch True and the Rainbow Kingdom (Netflix original). Honestly why change something that worked well.

title: Freezing and Crashing
review: I have had Netflix for quite a while and I have had few app issues until lately. Almost every time I open the app and select an account on my mobile device the screen freezes on the main menu and won’t let me select a show. On the slim times I can, the screen while watching the show has a delayed reaction to any time I pause or skip or access the menu like closed captions or episodes. The app is great but the recent updates have seemed to cause these issues. I hope they can be resolved in a future update.

title: Needs more updated movies and episodes
review: Netflix is great and all and I totally recommend it. But it doesn’t update the new episodes of some of my favorite shows. For example, one of my favorite shows is “One day at a time” and season 4 is still not on Netflix. Season 4 came out a few months ago and I’m still waiting. If there are no updated episodes how are you suppose to keep rewatching to series? Eventually you get bored don’t you? Anyway, it’s a great app but I need to stay entertained by the show and I can’t keep watching the same episodes over and over again.

title: Good but got some bad spots
review: Very good and fast app, but hard to operate with constant updates and changing the way you use the app. The app also tends to delete all of the very good shows and adds either not very good ones or just very dull looking. To add to that I was  recently watching one of my favorite childhood movies and I noticed that they took out one of my favorite parts to the movie. It was only a little part but still why do they need to take this out. I don’t know if it was just a bug or something a little bit bigger but I think that they definitely need to fix it.

title: READ THIS
review: I love Netflix but I also love one direction and I am very mad that they are taking “One direction This is us “ of of Netflix we just got it back and now you are taking it away why most you destroy my dreams this make me very sad and a lot of other people are also sad too I am also very sad that Netflix is taking off “The Vampire Diaries” that show is the peanut butter to my jelly and so is the One Direction movie you see if they just left the One Direction movie and The Vampire Diaries alone then I would have gave them a five stars but they are going to take them off of Netflix so that is why I am giving Netflix one star so thanks for making me sad I still love Netflix I just they would leave those two things alone

title: Subtitles?
review: Ever since the new IOS 13.1.2, my subtitles on Netflix have gone to the option I made on my iphone settings in accessibility. So when I turn on Netflix, the subtitles don’t match up to where they’re supposed to go in the Netflix original subtitle box. So I get two white lines where the subtitles are supposed to go and it’s annoying. Don’t get me wrong it’s not a big issue but it’s an issue, and I need to watch with subtitles on but I can’t with those lines in the way.

title: Plz Fix This!! :)
review: So recently my grandpa changed the netflix password. He doesn’t want to change it again since so many people use it and he doesn’t want to have to tell them all what the new one would be. Our password has a “)” in it, on my phone this symbol doesn’t show up when i go to type in the password. When i go on any other app except netflix, it’s there in full glory. Please fix this if you can.. (No other complaints i love this app so much😁)

title: It’s a great app but... uh...
review: So I had an account from a while back, and eventually had to stop paying, for reasons, and today I decided I want to start using netflix again, so I go to my subscriptions and choose a plan, not knowing that they delete your account after 10 months... so now I’ve made a whole new account, with the same email but I have to pay again, this kinda bothers me, could I get my money back for the account I thought I had but don’t?

title: Please bring back some movies
review: Okay so I really like this app but a few updates ago you deleted some of the movies that were really popular. Example; mean girls. Like why?? They were really big and big movies= money! Like why would you wanna make less money? I don’t get it. Also, the late show problem. So for an example I’ll use riverdale. Riverdale has 3 seasons, right? Netflix only has 2 seasons, but if you go on The CW they have all the seasons, just like that. Same with flash! And you said season 3 isn’t coming out til May. Really? Like don’t be cocky here, you’re not our only source. Thanks for reading.

title: The Big Play Button
review:
I love Netflix hands down, but recently the past month in a half or so the play button, rewind and fast forward was an option in the middle of the screen. And now I’m just realizing it’s changed back!? Idk if it’s just my phone but it’s better the other way with the big play button in the middle of the screen. Before all the time I would rewind by accident instead of pausing or playing the movie!! Welp that’s it
Ps. Idk if the company is going to see this  or just for people to download the app or not.......

title: Please fix the MY LIST category
review: I love Netflix and I spend the majority of my day watching different things via the Netflix app. The only problem I have as of now is that when I select my list, it still contains titles that I have removed from MY LIST! I don’t quite understand why this issue hasn’t been fixed yet but hopefully it is resolved soon. Also, would it be possible to show the most recent things added to my lift first. I would much rather see the titles I’ve added to my list today or yesterday, show up first, rather than the titles I’ve added 3 months ago!!!

title: What happened to the descriptions?
review:
I cannot speak for the version of Netflix that would stream on a TV screen since I watch mostly on my tablet, but I have no problem offering a low rating for the recent app update that eliminates program descriptions of any kind. This deceitful omission is fine for movies I have already seen and shows that I still watch, but the vague tags are a poor substitute for a summary that would actually touch on the plot of a show/movie previously unknown to the viewer. 
  We’ve already had to deal with a useless rating system and “match” percentages that are based more on public popularity than actual relation to what we watch, and now we have one more reason to ignore new material.

title: Reason why star 4
review: I am deaf and I watch Netflix a lot till just happens few movies I watched, there is some missing of English subtitles in other countries language which some are speak English too but not show English for English sub but other speak languages they put English sub FOR EXAMPLE watch “Lupt” so you will understand why it not use English sub for speak English but they speak Hindi and has English sub but they do speak some English and still not show English sub when speak English??? So not just this movie but others movies has issues same..

title: Summary
review: My family and I have had Netflix for 5 years now and had never stopped loving it and the content it offers. However, with one of the recent updates, the summary feature was taken away and now you can’t read what the show or movie is about without watching a trailer or going into the move blindly. Although a trailer might give you some insight to the story line, some of the tv shows and movies included on Netflix don’t  have a trailer. In my opinion, this feature shouldn’t have been removed and hopefully will be reinstalled in the near future.

title: I love but
review: I absolutely love Netflix I can literally spend all day on it and I love all the original shoes and movies and all the sections of shows and movies but the only thing that bugs me is this glitch/bug that shows shows that I already watched on my account and wants me to rewatched it over again and when I do it won’t go away and idk how to get rid of it but if you could fix it , that would be fantastic and I would love Netflix even more than I already do

title: All Netflix apps are terrible
review:
The auto-continue-playing “feature” is excruciatingly annoying. I want to watch credits after a show or film, but the screen shrinks down, and I can’t read anything. So I try to rewind to read some end credits, but it’s an annoying game of pausing it in time before the screen shrinks down. 
Trailers auto-playing is equally annoying. One, I only want to watch trailers that I choose. And Two, there’s junk floating on top of the video. 
Netflix wants their customers to keep watching content, but their methods can easily annoy viewers and force them to find workarounds or fight with a countdown to watch what they want to watch. 
Netflix needs only to add some optional settings to remedy this.

title: Deleting app and canceling
review: Nothing but Old movies that no one wanted to watch when they came out the first time and Boring comedy routing that just talk about politics from a very liberal perspective and insult the president. (Which is fine, it’s their opinion. I just don’t want to hear about it because it’s not real comedy.) If I wanted to watch this I would watch CNN not Netflix. Netflix has become far to liberal and politically involved for my taste, you hear it enough on tv I don’t want to hear about it on an app I’m paying for. I don’t want to watch liberal comedy because it isn’t funny, I want real unbiased jokes that are actually funny not political and I don’t want to hear anything about the worst president this country has ever had (B. Hussein Obama)

title: Used to work, now fails to recognize password though website does
review:
The Netflix app suddenly stopped streaming and all searches failed to bring up results. I removed/reinstalled the app but an error popped up saying I had an “incorrect email or password”. So I signed into the website and my login saved in Keychain worked perfect. I returned to the app and tried signing in again and the same error, “incorrect email or password”. Recover password in the app was nonfunctional.
I signed into the website (with the password the app says is incorrect) and changed the password. Returned to the app with the new password ... guess what. “Incorrect email or password”. Guess it is hard to afford enough software QA in the Bay Area nowadays.

title: Needs an update!
review: I always fight this! I had the fire stick playing in my daughters room on Netflix and Netflix playing on the Xbox in the living room and I turned off the tv in her room so I can watch tv on my phone and she can watch tv on the Xbox while she eats. It keeps saying I’m still logged in on the fire stick even though I turned off the tv, unplugged it, and took out the fire stick completly. Then I deleted Netflix and reinstalled it to try Again and I tried to turn off my phone. It’s been 40 min and it still says Its on the fire stick. No one has my account so it can’t be that. We do this every day it’s so annoying! Update this please

title: Hard to enjoy the entertainment
review: In version 9.46.0 the developers changed the interface so a huge pause button pops up in the middle of the screen every time the user just taps the screen. When I want to check how much time is left in a show or film I want to be able to continue my show instead of the picture being blocked by a giant pause button. Another issue I had with this app is many TV shows and films get removed after they have been very popular with many people I talk to. Other than these issues is a great app with manny great shows and movies.

title: Please read this and fix it
review:
It's is a great app and all but I don't know if I am the only one struggling with this problem but it keeps saying I can't play this title instantly and then it says try a different title I don't know why this is happening but if you guys can do an update that would be great. October 7, 2017 update I wanted to come back and say thanks for fixing the last error that occurred but now every time I want to watch Netflix it loads and then crashes 

                Thanks

title: Amazing
review: Netflix is so good. I use the app a lot. The thing is you need to allow us to watch from more than one device. And give us more to watch!😃 I love this app and it is amazing. It’s also good for family. You should get the app!👍🏻 You should also add a teens section where the tv shows, movies and more are not kids or adult movies, but in the middle. And please don’t think I don’t like this app but its a brillance app. It allows you to watch so many different things. I love it.

title: Request a movie back
review: Netflix is just great all alone especially with quarantine have us stuff in the house with nothing to do they brought back some great throwbacks like sister - sister and moesha and soon to be the Parker’s I would love for my favorite movie of all coraline to come back on here it’s really a great movie and teaches kids to respect their parents I’m hoping you see this but please developers bring the movie back and keep anaconda on here for a while to thats a great movie as well 💕✨

title: Netflix, are you serious?
review: I’ve used this app for over 6 years now and it was an absolute joy. Hours upon hours of different shows and movies spread across different genres. The UI was intuitive and user friendly, the recommended usually hit right on the dime, and the movies were actually quite entertaining. But what kind of movie is Cuties and why do you think it’s okay to film underage children performing what is basically soft core porn. It is disgusting. It can’t even be played off as a “mistake” because there had to be funding for this movie, a crew for this movie, and production for this movie. This is only enjoyable to literal pedophiles and that disgusts me, this one movie completely ruined my view on Netflix.

title: Terrible Usability
review: While I love being able to pick up watching a movie or show wherever I left off on another device, I cannot report problems through the app. For this you have to use the website. I wanted to submit a request regarding subtitle errors, and, although I’m pretty good with technology, it seems my sights are set too high. I made the poor assumption that the app would allow me to do all the same things as the web portal, but it doesn’t. Also, I would like to be able to see where a film/show was made (geographically), as it provides contextual insight.

title: Netflix
review:
Netflix is an awesome app but also I have found out when you push kids the movie Tall Girl and so I clicked on it and about close to the end there’s some inappropriate words and also other movies that are the same and that we also know that younger kids will watch stuff like that and I know there is a little kids section but you know how younger kids are very clumsy and curious so maybe don’t put as much of those movies on there please! 

Thank You!

title: Show suggestion
review: I love Netflix and have been using it for a couple years now but they have some problems with there selection, they would add a show and have the first season but never but the second season that’s been out for months. I also would like to suggest that they add ‘ The Big Bang Theory ‘ because there getting rid of the office which is my favorite show. I also I’m suggesting ‘ Bob’s burgers ‘ and hopefully they will add all 10 seasons and the new episodes.

title: So stupid
review: This app is great and I love binge watching and watching shows, but it won’t let me download movies because my stupid sister has it downloaded on her phone too so this stupid app doesn’t let me because it’s downloaded on another account’s device. And that one streaming at a time is so freakin stupid you shouldn’t need to pay to be able to watch on one device. My sister and I always have to take turns watching when all I wanna watch is Stranger Things my god. And if you have to pay for it, at LEAST make it permanent. More than 5 dollars for just a freaking month? Pathetic.

title: Please consider my review for an update
review: I personally love Netflix however I am the type that needs things to be very organized. This means that whenever there’s a show that I’ve stopped watch that is still in my ‘Continue watching’ I get rlly irritated and end up deleting my profile and making a new one. I mean I can deal with it but it’s a hassle each time. Could you make a function where you can remove shows from your continued watching?

title: Netflix is Awesome!! 🥰😘❤️😍😻💘💞💓💗❣️💕💜🖤🧡💛💚💙💝💖♥️
review:
I have watched Netflix for such a long time and have been so patient with having new things come out and new seasons to come out and they finally did. My little brother also likes watching shows on Netflix but he watches the same thing over and over again. I want there to be more seasons of what he watches and what I watch like for Motown Magic and Alexa and Katie for me. I also want there to be a lot more teen selections like Alexa and Katie as well. Other than these problems, I think Netflix is awesome and AMAZING 😉 

- Ava Rose 🌹

title: are you still watching? 👁👄👁
review: it feels like ive watched everything good on the app but i like to use it as background noise or for the kids to watch their shows...it gets extremely annoying when the app cuts off the kids shows after a couple episodes and i have to look for my phone and connect back to netflix and look for the show all over again. Couldnt you just give us the option to turn it off?? were paying therefore of we want it to run nonstop why cant we??

title: Overall, I Like -though a few improvements would help
review:
I waited for a while before subscribing from Disney Plus for a few bugs to get worked out. Overall I am happy but there are a couple improvements I wish they would work on.

First, when trying to rewind a movie with the 10 second rewind button, it usually only works once on my iPad. I have to scroll with my finger to go back, then I also get another push of the 10 second rewind button only to repeat the scrolling... I have not tried the forward button but imagine the same problem. If that is the worse problem I have with bugs then I feel they are headed in the right direction. It is a very minor annoyance for me.

The other thing I wish was that Disney had more of their 50’s, 60’s and 70’s live films available. There are many I want to watch again and are not available yet. Hopefully, Disney will continue to add more movies every so often. Monthly would be perfect. I also wish there were more options for breaking down what movies or shows to choose from by preference. I like live filmed older family movies from 3 generations. Sometimes I would like to know more about the stars of the film and what other Disney films they were in, even if the films are not available yet. But, I imagine in time many changes and improvements will be made.

title: My Honest Opinion 👀 (please read)
review: Disney+ is a pretty good app especially for hardcore Disney fans. But there are way too many issues for an app that you have to BUY. To begin, the volume quality is the worst for me. My hearing isn’t the best so I tend to turn the volume for things all the way up. I did this on my NEW computer, and NEW iPad and the volume was very low. The iPad volume was a bit better but still not as loud as I wanted and/or anticipated. Furthermore, it keeps recommending the same few amount of shows, movies etc. I want to be able to find new things to watch easier. Don’t get me wrong, I’m a hardcore Hamilton fan and I am pleased to see it on the main page, but everything else keeps getting recommended on and on and on. Continuing from Hamilton, this is not a necessary addition but I would like to see more musicals. It already has Hamilton and Newsies, and I enjoyed them the most out of anything on the app. But like I said this is an option and I know it’s meant for Disney things, that’s just what I want. There are a couple of more issues but I’m going to leave it on this final opinion, which is the 10 second fast forward button. Most of the time when I fast forward with the 10 second button the screen is just frozen. It happens on all of my devices and it’s quite annoying. Using the scroll bar with mostly my finger is not fun. That’s really all I have to say so I hope you, the reader take these notes into consideration. Take care!

title: Good content but the app is very buggy
review: The have a lot of great stuff in the app but the app itself has a lot of bugs. When the screen pops up that says new episode, I try to press it but it does nothing. While playing a video, you have to be careful where you touch or else it will exit out of the video even if you touched nowhere near the back button. The play button buffers. Not the video, but the button itself. There are times when I want to pause the video/movie and I can’t because I have to wait for the play button to buffers. Sometimes the app just crashes for almost no reason. I’ll be watching something like The Simpsons and the app will just crash. Don’t get me wrong, it is not a bad app, it just needs some major improvements. They do have a lot of stuff on there. I personally have watch led a lot of their classic movies and the Disney+ originals. I recommend The World According to Jeff Goldblum and High School Musical: The Musical - The Series (i am a big High School Musical fan). I think Disney just needs to make some much needed changes to the app and fix all of the current issues. Also, in my opinion, they should add some of the ABC shows like Once Upon a Time or Blackish or Marvel’s Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. They should also make certain shows like The Simpsons the original aspect ratio. With certain older shows and movies, you miss some key details showing it in a 16:9 aspect ratio rather a 4:3 aspect ratio.

title: Great content.  App interface needs work
review:
My entire family has been enjoying the variety of great content.  The service has also been steady and reliable for us, with only one or two glitches over a few months now.  However, the app/ Apple TV interface could use some improvement...

My kids are young enough that I don't really want them to have complete access.  Its great that they can have their own profiles with limits, but if it exists I've yet to find a way to prevent them from just using my profile.  (We mostly steam via Apple TV in case it differs)

Further, there is little to no useful history.  Yes the continue watching was tweaked, but it is still far from enough.  How hard world it be to provide a simple list with thumbnails of everything a profile has watched and when, preferably sortable but at least in reverse chronological order?  (As a software developer that's rhetorical.  Its easy!)  That would let me monitor kids use of my profile (until it's protected as it should be) as well as see what they're watching in their own profiles.  It also should not be hard to add a watched count and last watched on date to any show I go to the details of, and a progress bar for anything partially watched.  This is basic stuff  that should already be in your database.  Let me see it too please!

title: One major thing missing & Please don’t change movies!
review:
I love how they have ALL the Disney Chanel Originals which was the biggest thing I was wanting. I’ve only been exploring for a little while but it has sooo much. 
  I am frustrated with not having a “currently watching” list though, that is a pretty necessary thing when I stop watching for a bit I don’t want to have to re-search for my show. That is the only reason it is not 5 stars.
  One last thing is I’ve read that some older movies may be censored due to racial or ethnic jokes/slurs or whatever. I really hope they DO NOT do this because that is not only changing beloved movies and shows it is an attempt to alter history. Whether it is approved of or not in today’s society it is a fact that people thought differently in former years and it shows in how they made everything from film to art to books. If there is concern on how it will affect today’s children then it should be seen as a conversation point not something to remove, and if it offends adults then they have the right not to watch it same as we all do for anything. If censoring must be done then make it optional so that those who want to watch the shows in their entirety can freely do so.
  Having a commentary or intro series for each explaining the societal and cultural environment of the time would be welcome

title: Decent app, security not so great
review: My issues with Disney+ was that my account got hacked, the password was changed and I changed it again after realizing it was hacked. However, THE EMAIL WAS CHANGED TOO! WITHOUT ME EVEN KNOWING! How that was possible, I don't know. After calling customer service and being on the phone the first time, we changed the email and password, only to find out by the first not helpful representative, that they don't give the option to sign everyone out even though you are the administrator of the account, so changing everything was pointless. He basically states that the people who hacked the account will still have access even though I changed all of the login information. I was ready to quit the whole Disney+ until I called customer service again the following day and spoke to Shay, her kindness and helpfulness convinced me to stay with Disney+. She revoked the account immediately and then helped me make a new account. One thing that should be added is better security. For someone to take over my account so easily and change the email and password was a horrible experience. Another thing that should be added is being able to log everyone out as an administrator of the account. The app is decent because of the shows it offers, I do not encounter any buffering and so on; however, the security and privacy isn't that great. .

title: Getting better
review:
Addendum: They added a  continue watching and a recommended for you. Increased to 4 stars, now just waiting for new content to see how it goes.

I got this app for the bew star wars stuff coming out which is awesome. And it has things from the vault, old cartoons. It has sub sections: star wars/disney/marvel etc. that being said. Theirs things to work on. Theirs no continue watching, you need to either add it to your current watch to the watchlist or search every time. And it wont always remember where you left off especially for shows itll just replay ep 1 however i havent had this issue with movies, it remembers my place most times. It freezes often requiring you to close and reopen the app(ps4) havent had freeze issues on tablet. Itll also freeze and then go back a minute replaying things as it tries to correct itself. The current library is very limited to older disney movies. As i believe other streaming oroviders have current contracts for certain movies they prolly wont be able to add them to disney+ till other hulu/netflix movies are done with their contracts example is a limited marvel movie selection. They have plans to add more shows/movies so i think itll be like netflix where they add and remove shows and movies. When its less buggy I’ll prolly give it 4-5 stars at that time.

title: Absolutely love it!!!
review:
I LOVE this app and have really enjoyed introducing my kiddos to all of the classics! I feel like I am a kid again and am in 7th heaven when I come home and ALL of the Disney movies are just waiting for me! My kids love it and everyone has a new favorite show. All of our other streaming services have officially been forgotten so thank you Disney for saving my hard earned money and for putting all of the most amazing movies in one place!!

Please do not remove older shows due to older views and fear of offending people. I love all Disney movies and appreciate them for what they were and acknowledge that views have drastically changed over the decades. Some items may be offensive, even to me as a African American woman but as so many other have pointed out these are better used as talking points for our children. We cannot alway run from the offensive history that we have, it happened, and it is better to learn from it than pretend like it has always been perfect (which it is far from perfect today).

Also, I really hope we can an area that shows what we are “currently watching” and when I open up the movie it could have the bar that shows how much was completed. I know we have a “watchlist” but it doesn’t help having to search each time.

title: What I love most about Disney +!
review:
“I Love how Disney + has all of the Star Wars movies, TV shows.  I also love how Disney + has almost every Marvel movie, and I hope they are all on there someday!  I also really like that Disney+ has all of the Disney TV shows, from the 90s, and all the way too 2020!! However, and I’m sure that you know this, but I hope that Disney + get the movies, The Incredible Hulk, Spiderman 
Homecoming, and I’m pretty sure that Disney+ will add Spiderman Far From Home, Dog With a Blog, and anything Else do you have yet to add.  Oh, and how could I forget that the first thing I thought of when I heard of Disney+ was, I really hope that there are no adds, or commercials like, the app Disney Now, and I am glad that there aren’t any.  I’m also looking forward to more movies, and shows, that Disney+ will create in the future.  I think you’re doing a great job with all of your Disney+ originals, and I can’t wait for more.  I also like how Disney+ is only $6,99 per week!  Even thorough I got it for free, for an entire year, through Verizon.  I’m also shocked that a streaming service like Disney+ would ever be created, but I’m so glad it was, and I couldn’t ask for anything better, then, Disney +!  And this show’s every reason that I rated Disney +, five stars!”

title: Amazing! But a few things
review: I wrote a review a couple months ago and they fixed things! The app was missing a couple tv shows but we’re making progress as far as getting them on Disney plus. Slowly but surely 😊! A couple problems I have is sometimes when I reload the app it won’t keep my place in the episode and I’ll have to reload a couple times to get it back to where I was. Also sometimes for no reason I can’t see the episode clearly. 😫 I really want to enjoy my sitcoms with no problems whatsoever. And there is one major problem that is getting on my nerves. Some of the shows I watch it’s incredibly obvious that the episodes are out of order. For example in Kickin’ it one of my favorite tv shows almost every episode in season two is out of order and a few of the episodes in season 3 and 4 of Kickin’ it are also out of order. I don’t know if this is a problem with just my device or if multiple people are having this problem but it is very aggravating. And it’s not just Kickin’ it I’m having this problem with a lot of other shows. For example it’s also a problem with Shake It Up, Austin and Ally, Bizaardvark, and Lab Rats. If it’s possible I really hope you can fix this about the app. Other than that totally love it!!! ❤️

title: Nice content but needed update...
review: this review is more geared towards the developers...I love and appreciate all of the disney content on this app but the app seems to only push specific series and not any that are tailored for my experience. It would be much better to see suggested series or movies instead of the same few disney originals that Disney wants to push so often. It makes it kind of hard to see or consider watching all of the content that is on this app unless I specifically search for a title to watch on my own. Along with this, I have had the same problem with this app since the day that I’ve downloaded it and i’m hoping this bug gets fixed soon...Every time I press the reverse/forwards 10 second button the movie will reverse/forwards to where it needs to be, but the loading animation would stay on the screen. The problem with this is that it prevents me from pausing or reversing/forwarding any other time after this one time because the loading animation would still be on the screen if I attempt to do so. The buttons do not reappear. It doesn’t obstruct the view of the streaming media and it’s only there when I tap to attempt to pause but it prevents me from taking any other action after i’ve done it once before. I hope mentioning these things has been helpful and I look forward to this bug being fixed soon.

title: Good content, lots of problems!
review: I use Disney plus all the time to watch all of my favorite Disney shows and movies. There are a lot of problems that will HAVE to be figured out! But the one that upsets me the most, actually two or more: one; if I switch devices it will often forget where I was in an episode and restart it from the beginning forcing me to skip to where I left off. Also unlike a lot of other streaming platforms, there is no PROGRESS BAR per episode, to show how far you have watched through an episode. If you open the show it will not automatically place you in the season you are watching, you have to go and choose season and scroll to the correct one. On the mobile app there is no way to view episodes if you click on the resume watching box, unlike a lot of other platforms! My mobile device will also often not automatically play the next episode, when I was a kid I dreamed of the day it would automatically play the next episode and guess what everyone else has figured it out! I like the blue circle around the play button about 5 seconds, but it is often not there! So frustrating! I like the idea and content but the curtain should have been held as we say in show business, before release!

title: ADD MORE CONTENT !!!!!!!!!!!!!
review: There is a lot of great old shows and movies and some new stuff but I would really appreciate it if you would add more new stuff like Gabby Duran And the Unsitibles, Bunk’d, and The Owl house. I think these are shows that the targeted audience of Disney plus like to watch. DisneyNOW has all these shows but sometimes there isn’t the full season of shows that are slightly older and it never works very well. I love that you have National Geographic shows on it because I cant really watch those any where else except for the National Geographic channel and a few on Netflix. I really enjoy watching the shows that you do have and I would really appreciate if you would add more Disney Channel shows. Please tell me why you do what you advertise and don’t let me watch all the Disney shows. I got Disney plus because DisneyNOW didn’t have very much content of shows that I didn’t watch very much but Disney plus doesn’t have most of the shows I do watch and now I have nowhere to watch Disney shows because it is almost impossible to get DisneyNOW to work and it is even harder to find Disney shows on the internet. I am begged you to PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE add more Disney Channle content. It would be really appreciated by me and a lot of other people my age. Also please   make the internet on DisneyNOW work, it is driving me CRAZY!!!!!!!

title: My Heart is Broke
review: I know Mulan was probably a expensive movie to put together but I already have Premier Access so why do I have to pay for the exact same thing just to watch one movie? I know you guys still have to make money during the pandemic but I’m not gonna pay 30$ just to watch one movie and your probably gonna do this again and make everyone who had payed 30$ for Mulan pay an extra 30$ to watch another movie. I was so excited to watch Mulan because I had Premier Access and I didn’t understand that I had to pay for it twice because the wording of it was weird all I understood was “Avaliable with Premier Access” I asked my mom if we had Premier Access and she said yes. I waited until MIDNIGHT to see if I could watch it and when I saw I couldn’t I nearly broke down in tears. No joke. I searched when it would be available and it turns out I have to wait an extra 3 months before getting to watch it. December 4 is a long way off and with school starting it’s gonna take even longer. The more bored you are at school the longer the year is gonna take. Which means by the time It’s December 4 I’m probably gonna forget this movie exists and I’m gonna go on to Disney+ and be saying to myself “I’ll watch it later”.

title: Forget Netflix
review: Just kidding.. but really Disney+ may be a competitor to Netflix but since I started my free trial & now Verizon promotion subscription - my family & I have been watching Disney+ non-stop. Of course being that this is a new app there are some small bugs but nothing that isn’t going to deter a Disney fan from loving this app anyway! Some of the movies listed aren’t available until certain dates like January 1, 2020 or sometime in April but it’s not all of the movies and I think for the most part most the hit movies are available to watch. It would be nice to have an open platform with all the movies available but you know what? For only $6.99 a month you can’t beat that. Thank you Disney for being a millennial-friendly subscription - all your movies especially Pixar have grown with my generation in mind. We appreciate you! If you have a Verizon unlimited plan definitely enroll in the Disney+ promotion it is so worth it not only for those of you who have children but sometimes us adults need some Disney magic in our lives as well - pretty sure Walt Disney himself said something of that sort at one point. Don’t come for me if he didn’t but I’m pretty sure he did :)

title: Great app but...
review:
Here is the thing, I love Disney, my family loves Disney. Everyone young and old loves Disney. I think it’s an amazing app, with some even better features, and yes it has a bunch of glitches (which I’m not stressing about because in time those would be fixed), there are some things missing, (again could be fixed in the future, maybe something’s just need to be developed better, whatever the case may be). Those things don’t bother me. This is what I don’t like...,,

...The majority of the people who’ll be using this app are people who aren’t tech savvy or children. They aren’t always using the most up to date device or software, some children that are using Disney plus (which o can attest to) are children using gen 3 iPads. Or iPhone 4s. Things that are Easy in the hands of children. But unfortunately the app doesn’t support those devices, as they are too old for use. 

It would be fantastic if it was, I think they would have a lot more viewership but at this rate it’s very hard to use such a wonderful app on such an old  device. I mean Netflix does work on things that old. Disney please consider this. Not everyone can or will upgrade a child’s device just so they can watch Disney movies.

title: Love hate relationship
review: First off I love all the amazing movies from the past and The Mandalorian Is soooo good!  But recently the customer service has been sub par. On all my devices, as of two days ago after the few months it has been working fine is no longer working when on my home Wifi. Restarted router, uninstall reinstall all apps and support says it’s a WiFi issue. To test that theory I wold start a vid on data then quickly switch to WiFi and it works fine... I would even Fast forward/rewind pause and play to make sure it wasn’t just saved buffer and it all worked just fine. When I would exit out and try to resume the vid it then gave me an error message saying not able to connect... all customer service continues to do is say it is something on my and even after stating the facts then has yet to respond or give any details even requested a call back they said some one would respond in 10 days... My computer  can stream just fine when on WiFi when I stream through there website so this is another indicator this is an app issue but no one wants to look into it or address this it seams. If they would make more of an effort I would not write this review. 100 some bucks isn’t a big deal for a year but it’s the principle of lack of accountability and assistance. A few other friends scattered around my town and local towns have had the same issue...

title: I’m so happy my fam got this! But...
review:
So my family has gotten this and it is a great app! But the only thing is a minor bug. So I was bringing our iPad on a car trip, and before we went, I downloaded some episodes of my favorite Disney TV show so I could watch them offline in the car, and I stared watching them on the way to our carpool mates, and I noticed that it wasn’t as smooth as it was supposed to be... So I just thought, “Oh, this happens all the time with Netflix, so it shouldn’t be a big deal with this. I can fix it later.” So we dropped the iPad off at our house, and a few hours later, we came home, and I started to watch some more of the show, and it was still... Grainy, if you know what I mean? So I went to my dad and asked if he could fix it, but he didn’t know how, so I tried restarting the app, but it wasn’t smooth still. I tried restarting the whole iPad, but it still wouldn’t fix. So I finally figured that if I delete the app and then get it back again, it would be fixed. And we signed in again, and it worked that time... Quite an annoying situation, but it was... Kind of an “ easy” fix, but maybe you guys could fix this problem for an update.
Thank you for your time!
Fan

title: Stop being stupid people just enjoy the app.
review:
The app is perfect, but these crazy reviewers are the boneheads ..look people right now there is no feature of “what I watched last “ or history the app would slow down you want that go back to netflix and stay there. 
Just because you can add 7 people to your account is does not always mean you should. You really trust those 7 people with your account info? Remember only 4 streams allowed and You have should known that you have to have control over these devices. If your password gets changed it will be your fault deal with it. Then you free phone deal will not matter at all. The movies could and will edited if Disney sees fit you should have know this. 4.3 ? No no no 
5.5 and nothing else . The app engine is pure and clean cues up easy , logo guides are clear to understand and easy find. Pick Your items then play them from the largest Disney library of gems no worries 🎥🎧🎬
Before anymore stupid comments or ideas come to past here read FQA page please! 
To anyone else read the fine print know what you paying for people. This pure Disney can not get any better than that nuff said . 🇬🇧🎸🔥

title: Disney+ deserves five stars
review: Hi please listen. Do do you ever wanna watch Disney movies or tv stows but you don’t know what do you want to watch or do you ever want options between Star Wars or Marvel? If you have that problem then I have a solution for you get Disney+! I have Disney+ and I love it! One reason why I love it is because I can have it on my tv iPod, iPad, or  phone. Also if my sister is watching tv and I want to watch Disney+ then I can go on my iPad and watch. It’s awesome!! Another reason why I love  Disney+ is because I can choose from so many different Disney movies or tv shows. Also I can watch all shows like Hannah Montana. Here’s one more reason why Disney+ is awesome.  The quality is excellent! It’s super cheap and it’s so great. What I mean is there’s so many movies and TV shows I can watch and it’s not a lot of money. I can watch a new Marvel movie without going to the store and paying for that movie to buy it. I Disney+ I can just watch it and there’s more options! I can just watch the movie the fort so I remember and then watch that new movie so I can remember what happened before! Thanks for reading this and I hope you love Disney+ like me.

title: Over all great but could use some fixes
review: Overall I love Disney plus. There are so many shows/movies to select from that it’s hard for a Disney lover to decide where to start. Since today was launch day I know there will be some kinks that need to be worked out. I just wanted to list some issues or recommendations that could/should possibly be addressed in a future update. I saw one review mention that stuff they were adding to their watchlist wasn’t saving. I ran into that same issue. Another issue I ran into was my auto play wasn’t working. I have that setting turned on but when watching a series it does not automatically play the next episode. I also noticed that an episode was missing from season 1 of the little mermaid series. My recommendations for possible updates are: (1) add a “continue watching” section that shows what I was last watching and didn’t finish. (2)when watching a series have the episodes that users have watched marked in some way that shows they’ve been watched. Currently having to remember what episode I left off on. (3) maybe add a DCOM section so all those are in one place. Overall, I love Disney+ and I’m so excited to keep streaming all my Disney favorites

title: Truly wonderful, but needs a few adjustments.
review: I absolutely love Disney+ it has brought me back to my childhood and that’s a wonderful thing to give to the world right now. All the Disney channel originals i could never find anywhere else is all right here and it makes my heart so full of happiness and nostalgia. But there’s a few issues as others have said. First, why does it have the second movie and not the first one for some titles not all but I have been noticing it with a few movies. Like with National Treasure for example, the first one’s not  coming out till April 2020 what was the thought process there?! Second, when you go to rewind a movie with the touch screen in your phone it’s not accurate at all. I’ll go to a certain time take my finger off gently i might add and then it either jumps way ahead or behind of what I actually chose. Third, like others said the continued watching section is terrible why do i have to go back and search for where i was on some movies I’ve never seen, that’s just asking for spoilers just like the rewinding situation. I think with some adjustments you have yourself a truly fantastic app and a gift to the world. Thank you. 🤍

title: It needs some work
review: It’s cool that it has older tv shows that I  grew up watching, no doubt I love that!, however it doesn’t resume my tv shows, I often times have to look for the exact one I left off at. It’s really annoying. (Especially when you have a crying child!) It also needs the “you just watched this” feature right up front so I don’t have to go searching for it. When I get on to Disney plus it’s always the same movies.. and I’m not interested in those. I want to see only what I’m interested in. That’s the reason why I bought it. Another feature it needs is. “Because you watched this, we suggest you watch that” I’m getting bored of the same things, nothing new is on there. Well not that I know of.... another suggestion that you also separate the “coming soon” movies from the other ones. People can get excited about the up coming year, instead of being supper bummed when they see they have to wait till the month of November in the year 2020 to see the movie or tv shows.
