review: i have this app on my phone and i absolutely love it! it has all my favorite Disney shows and movies, along with ones made by Disney + (i think that makes sense) but I noticed that lately the screen has been closer than what the original would be. like i have watched Hamilton 3 times but on my fourth time , as in this time, it seems to be closer than normal and the characters upper face usually are covered by the top of the screen. i haven’t noticed it on any others but still. im not bothered a lot by it, i just kinda want it fixed. but since im on phone, I might have done something to do that so if you could write me back to see if i can fix it? thank you!!!

title: Regions
review: Look, I lived in the U.S for 3 years and Disney+ came out  a couple months before I came back to Brazil. I loved it. It gad so many movies and show But I can’t ignore the fact that Disney is only giving privilege to Americans. Rise of Skywalker is out on Disney+ but since I’m in Brazil I can’t watch it. And it’s so freaking stupid because we’re in QUARANTINE. I need to watch all of the Star Wars movies and the Clone Wars. Netflix doesn’t have many movies I like anymore since Disney bought so many movie companies. And you might be thinking “Disney + is coming to Brazil in November” yeah bro, but we’re in quarantine and I’m bored. And if Disney is so money hungry, the why aren’t they letting people in other countries get Disney+? Thank you for your time.

title: Adding more things
review: Hi, I love disney plus and I know you guys are trying to add more and more content every day.  One of the things I came across is that you didn’t have yet one of the Mickey Mouse shows. The house of mouse (aired in about 2001) wasn’t there, including its two movies. I was wondering if you guys were going to add, it but you don’t have access or own it anymore.  Will you ever be able to add mickeys house of mouse (television show) and mickeys house of mouse Christmas special and the Halloween special? Over all, I love Disney plus and I think that it is amazing all of the options it gives to watch! I also think the workers at Disney+ do an amazing job.

title: VERY VERY VERY VERY GOOD STREAMING APP
review:
This is was such and amazing app right from the start and still is today. The only reason I say you’re competing with Netflix is because if your menu. It is very complex, confusing, and frustrating I wish you would please upgrade the menu (and the logo please🥺.)
I can’t believe that Disney Plus doesn’t have Mighty Med because that is a well known Disney XD show and it’s not on there. It has Lab Rats and Elite Force but not Mighty Med.
I didn’t even know that Elite Force was a show until Disney Plus came out and I can’t watch Lab Rats vs Mighty Med part 2 or watch Elite Force because Mighty Med isn’t on Disney Plus. It’s still a amazing app thank you for all of the people at Disney For making this such an amazing app

title: Awesome app! But there’s just one problem....
review: Hi! First off let me just say I love this app! It has shows/ movies from older times and more recent! It’s very enjoyable. There’s one thing I find a bit frustrating. I mainly use Disney+ on my phone and after about 5 mins or so, the pause but begins to load. It has the Disney + loading symbol in it place. Because of this I can’t pause my show. And it doesn't go away after a bit it just stays there.  To fix this I have to close out of my show and then re play it constantly this can get very aggravating as it happens A LOT throughout the one episode. This app still is great! But it would be much more enjoyable if you could please fix this problem.

title: Almost perfect
review:
As others are mentioning, there definitely is a lacking feature that would make viewing so much easier!! There really needs to be a “recently watched” or “currently watching” list/section to make it easier when one has to step away from viewing for a bit but wants to pick up where we left off. So far I’m seeing that if I stop watching and come back I have to search for what I was watching and then it doesn’t even save where I was, but I have to try to find my place. 
Other than this, I’m loving the variety of content, especially for the initial launch. if they can fix the issues I mentioned it would probably be a 5-star review.

title: Excited, but my watch list didn’t save
review:
Excited that it is finally here! It seems to have almost everything. I even searched for a few obscure titles. Some were there, others not, but those were more for nostalgia than quality.
There’s a Muppet quick search I found, but Muppets Take Manhattan and Muppets In Space aren’t there. I have a young child, so those will be somewhat missed.

I made a second account for my daughter and saved a few titles to her watch list. However, after adding many titles to the primary account’s list and checking it, none of them saved. 
Hopefully they’ll show up on the watchlist when I truly check out the app with the family tomorrow evening.

title: Great content offering. Too many troubles to access it.
review:
I decided to get the 7 day trial to see if I liked the app and what it offered. A couple days in I decided that I liked it and upgraded to the bundle. Now I can’t login to the app because for some reason it’s recognizing the trial and my bundle upgrade as 2 different accounts and asks me to contact customer service. After over 2 hours on hold I get an automated system notifying me that they couldn’t take my call and to call another time, after more than 2 hours on hold. Simultaneously I tried contacting customer service through the live chat and it has been 3 hours since it’s been “trying to connect me to an agent”. 
Good enough content, Horrible customer service, And overall unpreparedness. They should’ve really made sure they were ready before launching the service because they’re clearly not.

title: Great app only one problem
review: I give this app 5 stars bc the problem isn’t a huge one.. I love this app for multiple reasons.. it had many throw back movies.. from the original movies like cow belles, don’t look under the bed, poof point, smart house, twitches... to thingns like star struck, high school musical and frozen... even the newer ones like freaky Friday and zombies.. it also ya many throw back shows from that’s so raven, Phil of the the future, phinease and ferb, even Stevens, and the suite life of zack and Cody and it’s spin off to the new high school musical series, ravens home, bizardvark etc. it even had crash and Bernstein and best friends whenever. It’s also for a reasonable price. Only $7 a month and it has no adds. Think of it like a cheaper Netflix but this one has a whole lot of childhood classics as well. The only problem is it doesn’t have fishhooks, or Ant Farm.. get those and I will be extremely happy.

title: Horrible app! Great content!
review: We all know Disney has great content. But the app  is a whole different story. I am not referring to the server errors as that is understandable initially. But it is mind boggling how Disney got the basics of a steaming app so wrong. For starters, although minor, the watchlist section in the IPhone app is located within the profile tab. The watchlist needs to be easier to access. In fact, I thought the watchlist section was missing until I stumbled across it in the profile tab. Also, it seems Disney assumed their viewers will watch an entire movie or episode in one sitting all the time because every time you stop a movie/episode and get back to it later it starts from the beginning! And this is after you locate the show you want to get back to since there is no section for recently viewed items. The app team at Disney needs to fix this fast!!!

title: Amazing service
review:
This app is amazing. I bought it because of the movies and shows that my son loves. Now I can’t get off because I love them too. Our movie nights are going to be awesome because the quality is just superb. I bought the 1 yr plan because the price is super cheap. I would have gladly paid double the price. 

The movie selection is great because it has all the original super movies like cars, wall-e, inside out, chicken little, hocus pocus, finding Nemo, Cinderella etc. I am super happy with this buy. 

I hope this gets enough traction that Disney will start producing more original shows for the adults. I can’t wait to see what’s next! Thanks Disney!

title: A passage into the world of Disney for the entire family
review:
I love the app and its extraordinary content... Marvel, Lucas, Nag Geo, Fox and of course everything from Pixar and Disney... full of classics.

Within the app, navigation can improve, and it’s ridiculous how some short (2-6 minute) cartoons have over three minutes of credits. My child gets frustrated with this issue and I can’t be there all the time to fast forward after each short episode. Also the time between episodes is too long for small children, it should be customizable.
Because of the above annoyances, I am not giving five stars until they are addressed.
Disney you need to work on these small issues ASAP

title: Great app, but missing a few things.
review: I love this app, the price is fair, but it has a few missing features. First, I wish there was a “continue the magic tab”, where all the tv shows and movies I have watched recently are there so I don’t have to search for them. Second, I wish there was Disney XD and Disney Junior on the app. It is part of the Disney experience, and should be included. Finally, there are a lot of missing movies in the Disney original movies section. Like “16 wishes”,  these movies are made by Disney and should be included. These things can all be fixed, so I still recommend this app to anyone who has the money. The app is very easy to use, and I hope that the app will only improve.

title: Disney + is perfect for absolutely anyone!!!
review: There is so much diversity within the categories of movies on Disney +. This pleasantly surprised me!!! There are tons of classics, heart warming movies, action packed movies, and documentaries. The Simpson’s is also on Disney + which is fantastic. I also wanted to comment on how quick the downloads downloaded for me. They have EVERYTHING able to download for offline use and it downloads far faster than any other entertainment app. I downloaded 27 things in literally 10 minutes. I was amazed!!! Disney + is not only perfect for the child at heart, but the one who loves morals, action, and adventure. I highly suggest getting this app!!!

title: Of Course Disney+ is Great! But Why Can’t it Operate Better?
review:
Content is what you’d expect, all your favorites, which is a no brainer.
Functionality is really low rent though. When I’m watching a show it doesn’t let my phone turn off after like Netflix does. Just stays on the ending of whatever it was I was watching - draining my battery. 
There is also something very odd about this too, because if I fall asleep watching a movie on Disney+ with headphones in — MY MORNING ALARM WILL NOT SOUND and I oversleep. It’s crazy! I have even set up multiple alarms to see what would happen - still NO morning alarm. I just have to make sure to not watch Disney+ if I may fall asleep and miss waking in the morning. Fail. 
I def use this app less because of functionality problems.

title: Are there any devs?
review: I’ve been using this app for a while, and I had it about 2 weeks after launch, and it was chalk full of glitches. I was contempt with all the glitches at first, cause I understood it was a new app, and it needed time to polish. Almost 2 months in now, not even a single glitch has been fixed. And no glitch is just a small glitch, I’ve had plenty of glitches each and every time I open the app, almost always more than a few glitches each time I use it. I’ve gotten into a system that cleans out a glitch each time I face one, and it’s super tedious and takes away from the movie watching experience. It’s super frustrating, and it feels like no ones overseeing this app. My hope is that I’m just being impatient, and that the devs are working out each individual bug and are going to fix all of them in one giant update.

title: Meh
review:
I like the app but I do have plenty of issues.

   Literally bought a subscription to watch a show to find out not all of the episodes are there... Same with movies? Some titles are there but then when you try to watch they aren’t available.

   Then the app itself is hard to navigate and the subtitles are harder to read than say the subtitles on Netflix because they aren’t all in the same spot.

   Also the app doesn’t save watch progress? That’s just plain annoying. I shouldn’t have to scroll through frames just to find where I was watching before I exited or it kicked me out.

   I am aware that this is a really new service, but I probably won’t be keeping it. My family bought it so we could all use it, but I am the only one who can. They do not want to watch things on their phones or computers, but that’s all they can do because of limited systems. We have a smart tv that it won’t be available on and we have a PlayStation 3 that it isn’t available on. While not an issue for me, because I have an Xbox One, we aren’t going to pay $6.99 a month if I’m the only one it’s available to.

   Those are the only issues I have so far, but I believe that Disney+ has potential.

title: I love you but we have some issues
review: So one of the most frustrating issue I have with Disney plus has to do with iOS devices so if your not that keep on looking. So as I was saying one of my biggest issues with Disney plus is some wired glitch or something for example when I touch the screen of my device it shows me options like the pause button language settings and all that, so after I touch it once I try to pause it. But after I make that second touch to pause it, it immediately takes me out of what I was viewing and into what I would see if I exited that movie so the main menu or the title of what I was watching. And it tends to happen randomly.

title: Overall great but can use some updates
review: This app is great and it was so overwhelming trying to pick what I wanted to watch first. Couple of suggestions; if there could be a “play from beginning” button and also a “continue watching” section that would be insanely helpful. I have to keep going back to the home page and finding the movie I had left off from. Also, tried to start a movie from the beginning as my partner wanted to watch something I was in the middle of, I had to scrub all the way to the beginning which isn’t a huge deal but the convenience of a button to just start it would be so nice. The steaming overall is okay; more often then not it will randomly stop and buffer and also just completely stop.

title: This app is awesome but one thing 🦋🌸
review:
I really like this app! If you of you like Disney channel they have it here (and definitely if you don’t like watching the new shows) it has a lot of great shows that you can’t watch on tv anymore like that so raven, Lizzie McGuire, and many more! They also have diary of a wimpy kid on this app amazing! 

BUT I have one problem please add some more Disney Channel shows! When I go to find some I don’t see a lot of shows that are really old (like from the 90’s) please add some that I haven’t already heard of but other than that I really like this app! 

If you want to find me other place look for this emoji:🦋🌸

title: Plz read
review: I really do enjoy Disney+. Me and my family bought it about a month ago. I personally am a hardcore Disney fan so I love this app. I think the price is just a little to high, but I mean it’s Disney so what do you expect? The overall condition of the app is kind of weird. I want the continue watching to be like Netflix, where when you get to the credits and get off of the movie, it doesn’t show in your continue watching anymore. I’m a very organized person so that kind of bothers me. The 10 second fast forward and rewind button is very glitchy. The volume on all of these shows and movies are really low. Thanks for reading my review and absolutely NO hate to Disney!!

title: Love, Love, Love
review: I love the Disney+ app. I love being able to not only have it on my phone but to also be able to have it on my ps4 and Xbox One. Also, I love that I can stream on 4 devices at one time and not have to pay a fortune for it. My wife and I and nephews and other family love sitting down and watching all the older Disney movies from our childhood and bringing back memories from our childhood. It’s like watching it for the first time again. I anticipated for awhile for Disney+ to come out and when it finally did I was totally excited.  I am excited to be able to continue watching all my favorite Disney shows and movies. Thank you Disney+

title: Hmm...?
review: I love the app very much it offers a great selection of movies and shows that I cannot stream anywhere else. However it desperately needs a continue watching or some way of picking up where you left off. I started watching a bunch of different shows not knowing I couldn’t easily go back to where I left off. Other streaming services have the tab for “continue watching” or other fast and easy ways for continuing the show. I hope that Disney already knows that they made a mistake with not offering this first thing but hopefully with all the reviews that they’re getting they listen. For now I suppose I will just have to remember every episode and time I stopped watching but hopefully this is resolved by the end of the day.

title: AMAZING just needs something added
review: Honestly the best purchase I've made. Its kind of overwhelming on how many things there is to watch. And the amount of nostalgia is incredible I actually cried its like i can vividly remember my 8 year old self watching a lot of these cartoons in my room which was completely decorated with tinker bell things. The only thing i would wish they could add is a section of like continue watching like netflix has because every time i get out i have to go back and search the specific thing i was watching again i think it would just make it a lot easier but besides that this is literally amazing

title: Read this review disney!!!
review:
Okay guys, Disney plus is a great app and you should for sure download it! I am a 12 year old girl so you can trust that I know everything wrong with the app. None of the other disney apps have been this great. So good job disney! But I have also noticed that not all shows have been added to this wonder of an app!!!! So I kindly ask if you wonderful disney workers could pretty please add dog with a blog to your amazing wonderful app!!! Would you also add mighty med and ant farm! If you do I will be ever so happy!! You will never believe how much it is to watch dog with a blog on my tv. I would really so much like to be able to watch one of your best shows, Dog With a Blog. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE pretty please!!! 

Please?

title: Extremely Disappointing
review: To be clear, this review is for Disney+ as an app, not as a service. The content is great, but the app was not ready for launch in November and has made an astounding lack of progress in the months sent. Somehow, this app managed to get rolled out without a “continue watching” feature. You actually had to manually search for what you were watching and find your place each time. Even now, the app is TERRIBLE at remembering where you left off in a movie or show. I find myself continually watching the same three episodes of Mickey Mouse Clubhouse because no matter how many times you watch an episode or manually select a different one, Disney+ cannot seem to progress to new episodes. Having access to this content is a game changer for parents of young kids, but using the app feels like a chore each and every time.

title: A Continue Watching Would Be Helpful For Us Disney Lovers
review: I love Disney+!  As a girl who grew up watching Hannah Montana, Wizards of Waverley Place, and both Suite Life series, it is awesome to relive my childhood and watch the shows I loved as a kid again.  One thing that would make the experience of this even better would be adding a continue watching or a currently viewing space where viewers can pick up exactly where they left off.  This is beneficial because the viewer would not have to search for or remember what episode they left off on.  I also hope that more Disney Junior shows are added, I loved watching those with my younger brother! Overall I am ecstatic about Disney+ and have been watching non stop!

title: It’s Great!!! “My List” needs a fix however and some shows are missing.
review: I absolutely love all the content in this app, my favorite movies all in one place! The only problem I seem to be having is the problem with adding movies to a list. You’ll see movies you have just recently added to the list on the top menu, but the movies you’ve had added previously will be over lapsed by the films on the top and you won’t be able to see or access the movies you have previously added. There is also some missing shows that I thought would be added, but aren’t such as Ant-Farm, Pair of Kings, and Zeke & Luther.

title: love the content hate the app
review:
The content on Disney + is outstanding. I’m enjoying it throughly. However, the iOS and AppleTV apps, though intuitive, are really buggy. 

The minimized video feature does t work well on the iPad. When you go back to full screen it takes you to the main dashboard and plays the video in the background. You have to close the app out to fix it. Also, when fast forwarding or rewinding you get a spinning wheel and lose the controls. Though the video does play. 

The AppleTV app controls are often laggy. The touchpad on the remote is sometimes slow and and it’s hard to browse the content. The app also freezes when switching between apps. I often find my self closing it and reopening.

title: Love the content, app needs work!
review:
The app has a LOT of problems.  The biggest (and most annoying) ones I’ve experienced are:
- the app not remembering which episode I’m on.  In the “continue watching” section it will show a completely random episode, and I have to actually do a search for the show, find the season I was on, and click on the episode I was actually watching.  Luckily the app DOES remember my place, and the episode always starts up right where I left off, It is just very annoying to have to go to the extra trouble. 
- on my iPad, I often will minimize the window so i can keep watching while I check my email, or whatnot.  however, when I go back to the app, the app totally reloads, rather than just maximizing the window again... annoying, but the REALLY bad part is that the audio continues.  When I try to relaunch the episode, it will start up (with audio) but the original audio just continues on, on top!

Things I would love to see:
I know I can click the plus next to shows I like, but it would be great if those shows or movies showed up at the very top of the app, so I can find them quickly!

title: Keeps freezing!
review:
I want to give the app 5 stars because it has all my childhood favorites I digitally remastered format but I can’t sit through a single show yet alone a movie without it pausing or freezing on me, over and over 🙄 I bought a year subscription but now I feel like I wasted my money, if this keeps continuing I don’t think I would want to continue my subscription that long. My
iPhone has been updated, and I’m steaming it through an authorized apple brand hdmi adapter so there shouldn’t be any issues. None of my other apps glitch or
Freeze and I can enjoy a whole movie without having to start over the app multiple times. I
Hope Disney would fix this glitch in their next update, because we really love the content!

title: Love it
review: Disney plus is everything that it promised it would be and I really enjoy looking back at all the nostalgic films and shows. On first impression it is very nice to look at and easy find things, however I think it would be helpful to add a “continue watching” section or something like that. Because if you’re in the middle of watching a show, you have to remember which episode you were on in order to go back to it and simply hitting “play” on the title screen of the show itself will take you back to the first episode. I would recommend adding that. Other than that everything looks really great!!

title: Getting Show Seasons on time/sooner
review: It is a great app. I have very little problems with it. We have been using it two weeks now and have had no complications. The only problem I have is that they don't have the shows updated right. An example is Marvel's The Runaway it is up to three seasons and it only has one on this app. I have been waiting for at least the second season to be added, but it hasn't and that is a little disappointing. We have to try to watch it on our Firestick just to watch it and our Firestick hasn't been working very well. I hope the company will keep it's shows up to date on the season, but rather than that it is a good app in all.

title: DISNEY NOSTALGIA
review:
I won’t try to pretend as if I didn’t stay up late to check out the Disney+ Service. It was like a sensory overload of my childhood and even things I watched as I got older. 

My favorite part about the service is if your television supports 4K and HDR, there is so much content that streams in 4K. From the Star Wars movies to the MCU films and even some such as Hocus Pocus are all in 4K. The funny part was hocus Pocus being in 4K but not Tron Legacy. 

I agree with the complaint of there not being a “recently watched” tracker since there are multiple users allowed and so many season especially of The Simpson’s. I think it is a great service and can not wait to see what more Disney releases.

title: A few things this service needs
review:
I’ve read a few other reviews and many mention the lack of a currently watching list. This is one of the reasons I am leaving a 3 star review. The primary reason I decided to review though is that there is no system for keeping track of where you are in a series. I have been using this app for watching the simpsons and it is getting annoying that when I push play it begins with the first episode of the series rather than the one I left off on. It knows exactly what minute and second of the episode I left on when I select that episode, but I shouldn’t have to select the specific episode. 
Honestly if every other streaming service has figured it out the mega corporation Disney can too!

title: App needs a lot of bug fixes.
review:
When I watch have lightening to HDMI adapter and when I unlock my screen to pause it and then attempt to resume play it doesn’t resume play. I’ve got to soft reset the app and then resume play, Sometimes I even have to find the spot I originally pause the app. 

Months later I decide to go to drive to a place with free WiFi  and I sit for about 2 hours trying to download movies because I Live out in a rural area and I don’t have any WiFi, and to lighten the load on my data usage. I wake the following day to watch my download and the don’t work! After a one month subscription I won’t be using Disney+ until these fixes are realized. Unlike you guys I need my $8! I could use them for something else.

title: I LOVE IT
review: Okay so you see I’m a major Disney fan. My whole family got a subscription shortly after it came out. Best app ever. I don’t care about minor bugs. It’s a little pricy but totally worth it. It has old Pixar shorts, and shows I’ve never even heard about. I love how you can also download stuff too to watch without WiFi. One thing. Can PLEASE add more profile pics of more movies and shows. I watch 101 Dalmatian street and as far as I’ve seen, there is no profile pic for that. Maybe even change them out every few weeks or something. But overall, I got to give it to you Disney, you did an AMAZING JOB with this app. Crushed it.

title: A few issues.. watch list, volume, error messages
review:
When using my iPhone I keep adding things to my watchlist and half of the items added do not show up and when I go to find something that isn’t showing, it says it hasn’t been added. On our Xbox the watchlist also shows half but that half is showing twice. 

Also when watching movies with a lot of action scenes (Marvel/Star Wars) all of the talking is super quiet and then the tiniest explosion is super loud making me scramble to get my tv down to a reasonable volume before my neighbors come pounding at my door.

The last few day while watching a series an error message will appear between each episode not allowing them to continually play. Sometimes this even causes the app to crash all together. Especially on the Xbox.

title: Amazing App
review: This app is amazing. I have been watching many shows and movies with my yearly subscription. There are many movies and apps to chose from. My personal favorites is the Star Wars genre. One glitch that I wish to be fixed soon is where you go back or ahead a few seconds. There is a loading circle that shows up when you go back or ahead but sometimes it stays there. Therefore I can’t pause or skip the show or movie again unless I leave the movie/show and re open it. This is the only complaint I have with this app. I am looking forward to see new movies and content in the future!

title: Great content, horrid app
review:
Love the content of Disney plus, goes without saying. 
 
But the app is bad. When I leave the app and come back in, the show is still playing even though I am not watching it (I can see the library and still hear the show playing). The organization is okay, biggest issue is that I can’t easily resume my show, I either have to find the show and resume or scroll to find continue playing. Bigger problem is that sometimes when I go to resume if I didn’t finish watching the credits I have to resume that particular episode and watch the remaining credits (this happens maybe 30% of the time still annoying). The app is slow and buggy, it’s just not smooth to navigate. It  fully backs me out at least once every-time I use it. My last big thing is that the continue to next episode button disappears so easily. If I fast forward a touch (like the 10 sec skip) I lose it, and have to wait the extra 2 minutes to stare at credits to watch the next show. Similar complaint with the skip intro button but not nearly as big of an issue. 

New app, it’s buggy, hope they fix it quick.

The Mandalorian is a 10/10 tho so that’s awesome.

title: Worth it but some glitches..
review:
So, this app is worth it, I can say for sure, u get every Disney movie u can watch anytime if u download them, easy to download and easy to remove. NOW ONTO THE BUG REPORT.

So, I’ve tested this on 2 devices. One kinda old, and one atleast before 2019, but not that long down, maybe a few years, or 2. Anyway, so when I go to tap twice to go BACK I think 15,10 seconds. It gives me a inf loading thing on screen, the movie still goes, but the circle is on screen and annoying, I’ve found a temp fix for this though which is to then move it FORWARD the ten,15 seconds on screen. Thank you for reading.

title: Love the app!
review: I have been using Disney plus for a little while now and I love the content! Though there are a couple of things. So I know that this is a new app and still needs a few tweaks here and there but this is the main problem; so after I press the fast forward or rewind buttons, it gives me the loading symbol. I think a few other people I know  have had this same problem, and I wasn’t sure if it was a bug at first. Also, I think you should add the show Austin and Ally to this app because many people were disappointed to find that the show had ended. Other than these few problems I had, this is one of the best apps I have ever seen! Great work!

title: Great service, app needs improvements
review: I am so happy with all of the shows and movies offered with Disney+, and am even happier with the bundle subscription. However the app definitely has its share of issues. My first time using the app was great, but the next time I went to use it, I was told that Disney+ was not available at my location. I had to delete and re-download the app in order to get it to work because simply logging out and then back on did not work. Unfortunately I am dealing with this issue on multiple occasions. Once again, I love this streaming service and everything that comes with it, but I expect an update for the app to work out any bugs.

title: Horrible customer service
review:
Where to begin i’ve literally been on hold for 3hour and 52 minutes waiting for a representative. When i was told it would only be 10 minutes. Working for a call center i calmly waited. After the first 2 hours i tried to chat while waiting on hold. The chat said it would be less then 30 minutes( >30 ).. 41 minutes later the chats closed on me with no help and no resolution. 
Here I am typing coming up on 4 hours of waiting.. this is ridiculous. I don't feel like a valued customer any longer. So i’ll most likely be asking for a full refund for the full 1 year subscription i’ve just paid for. 
Wish Disney would do something about it but can’t seem to talk to anyone.. i’ll be contacting the BBB regarding this experience as well i think customers should be aware that this is the service we are subscribing too.

title: Love!!!
review: I absolutely love that all my Disney faves are on here! I’ve been wanting a way to watch all the old school shows and original movies, so I’m glad I have a way to do that now! However, there are a few features I do wish this app had. Such as, a “continue watching” list. It’s definitely a pain that I have to search for what I was watching. Not only that, but it seems to be making me re-start what I’ve already watched. Not to mention, attempting to fast forward is another huge pain. It will only go in 15 second intervals and if you do it too many times, it errors out and goes back to the main screen. Fix those few things, and you’ll have a top notch app!

title: My thought
review: So this is an amazing app due to the fact that the have so many of the Disney movies that I can’t find on any other movie apps. The only thing that I don’t like is that they don’t have a lot of languages to listen in, they only have a few and that’s it, Need to have a wider selection of languages for those who don’t know that language, Disney movies and songs are the way I have been learning new languages and I would like it if they could have more than what they have, they need to also change the subtitles to be what it would transfer to in that language. Besides this I think that this is a great app.

title: Languages
review: I really love this app, it has so many beautiful movies, and new movies that I love, the problem is that most of the new movies are only in the Spanish language of Spain, I have no problems with Spain or their language , but this language has words and references that many of the  times I don't understand because I'm from Central America, so I prefer to see them in English, but I can't see them with my family because my mother and stepfather don't understand much English and they don't like Spanish from Spain because they don't understand some things either, I would like that you guys to put a little more importance to Latin Spanish as you do with the Spanish of Spain.

title: Since I’m one of the first ones...
review: So it’s a great service so far and I love it so far. Woke up at launch watched The mandalorian (Great first episode go watch it) and after that I went to the marvel section and they had ALOT of movies but not a lot of shows yet so if marvel is the thing you want this service for I would wait until more Shows come out but besides that they have endgame which I LOVE. In the Star Wars section it is mainly movies and like 6 different shows which is understandable because they haven’t made a lot of shows. Pixar section is great and ALOT of movies. Nation geographic is nice. Great service and can’t wait for Star Wars the clone wars season 7!

title: Classic Disney
review: Yes. Especially if you are into classic Disney. Their endgame is all about nostalgia vs. brand spanking new content. This is why we have to wait 6 - 8 month for new movies or tv shows to come to disney+. They’re still available to buy on digital/bluray. Think about it...if this was your company, wouldn’t you want to make some money on purchases than no money? However if you are no into Disney or care for their long history, nor marvel, pixar, nat geo or star wars then you won’t like it. We love Disney and I would honestly rate Disney+ 4 out of 5. The video streamer is not the best and the content is kind of low but this is still year 1. Let’s see how they improve over the years.

title: Great App
review: The app is quite easy to navigate and I enjoy how it has a wide selection of videos. I read some reviews where people have complained about issues with the app and I find it disappointing to see so many people who don’t use enough of their brain to realize that due to the extreme increase of people using video streaming apps, there will be complications on the loading time. It is sad to see so many reviews where people lash out and feel the need to unnecessarily share a problem where it is not completely the app’s fault itself instead of taking time to consider other factors.

title: Wonderful subscription , a few problems though
review:
I've had such a nice time using Disney+ watching all the marvel MCU movies and The Mandalorian series. it's a great subscription for a decent price , especially if you want to have a nice streaming subscription for the family to watch old cartoon classics or newer exclusive shows . 
I've come across a few glitches or things I've noticed that I kind of get a bit distracted from watching the show/movie . 

1. sound issues. I'm sure it's not my headphones or my phone, I've done plenty of tests . 
what would happen, is I would try to watch a show at a 8 out of 10 volume level as an example, then without notice or anything, the sound would drop to a 4 out of 10 level for a few minutes without me being able to fix it besides turning up my volume only to blow my eardrums out when the sound returns to the level I wanted it at. 

2. navigation through the app is very slugish, I've noticed a half second Delay from pressing play , pause, skip or rewind 15 seconds, and other actions while streaming

title: More Holes Than Green Lake, Texas
review: Friends. Esteemed colleagues. I have been in my house for a month now. This is not your fault, I know. I understand. I appreciate your services during this trying time. The ability to watch Ice Princess and Go Figure back to back is not one I take for granted, I assure you. Yet the gaping, empty void I find in my life left by the absence of American Dragon: Jake Long is one that cannot be filled through even the greatest of mid-2000s figure skating movies. I just want to be lulled to contentment by the incomparable Dante Basco’s soothing voice. I just want to hear the Jonas Brothers explain that they are NOT braggin’, and he IS the American Dragon. It is at this point, and this point alone, that my life will be complete. Thank you for your time and consideration in this matter.

title: Stolen Info
review: My issue isn’t with the app, more with the company’s support team and policies. My account was stolen and email and password were changed. Obviously changed. The email was a random series of letters and numbers and based in India. I talked to a support member who could only tell me to notify my bank because they couldn’t see and fraudulent activity even though I sent both my sign-up confirmation email, which was sent to my correct email, and a screenshot of the new email, the person’s who stole my account in the app. This support member “passed my concerns along to people higher up” and told me to wait up to a week. I attempted to give other ways to show it was in fact a stolen account situation but this member repeatedly told me it appeared as if I was trying to steal someone’s account. So be careful with your accounts and dealing with their “help” team.

title: Beautiful but...
review: This streaming app is really good and it lets me take a break into the Disney world and watch my favorite classics, however; there are some movies that are gonna take a long time to stream even tho they showed up a long time ago, like for example: Cinderella, Ralf breaks the internet (Netflix started streaming it already), Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker and Sleeping Beauty, which are not movies that recently came out last month,  But that’s only a little issue that I have. I really like Disney+ and how it’s all organized in different categories, it’s a really good place to spend time with family and have a good laugh. Thank you.

title: Totally worth it!
review: So I waited a little while before signing up because I had heard of the glitches. Those are to be expected with a new app for sure. I am super pleased that this has come out. The only issues I’ve had so far are connecting to my chromecast; it just keeps buffering so for now I’ll just watch it on my iPad. The second issue is that my favorites list seems to be out of whack; when I look through my list some movies are listed in my list multiple times which is odd and there are a lot of movies that are not showing up in my last even though I’ve saved them. Other than those issues this app is definitely worth every penny!

title: Doesn’t allow you to cancel!
review: Disney+ doesn’t specify that if you leave the US, you no longer have access to any more content than what you download, and to make matters worse, Disney+’s website doesn’t even have SERVICE outside the US, so you can’t log in to cancel a subscription that you can’t even use!! I took a one month vacation to Mexico and once I stepped off the plane and turned airplane mode off, Disney+ said “service unavailable check internet connection” I’ve yet to arrive at the US to at least try to get my money back for the current cycle which I can’t use. Since official websites are down the only other option (since VPN doesn’t even cut it) is to give someone else in the US my account credentials to log in and cancel it for me which is definitely not an option a company like this should make you take.

title: Great app! Does not have all Disney movies though
review: I absolutely love Disney+ and use it almost everyday. Therefore, I have watched a large portion of the shows and movies already. I would like it if their were a few more movies and shows to greaten the variety of content on Disney+. The app however is very organized and has many old shows that you don’t find anymore like Hannah Montana and Good Luck Charlie both of which Netflix recently discontinued. The only thing is the app runs slow on occasion causing the movie/show to buffer. I would love for these minor changes to be made, but other than that this is a fantastic app!

title: So far mostly great
review: Good selection to watch from. No issues with streaming. They added a “continue watching” section to fix that problem. A few bugs to work out that resulted in 4 instead of 5 stars: 1.  The sound on most movies the music is way louder than the voices. We have to turn our tv sound up to 70 on the Star Wars movies to hear them talk. We don’t have this issue on other apps. 2. When searching if you select a movie to review then return you’ll be directed back to the top of the movie list on the main page instead of the last location you were searching in. Hope they keep adding new content to make keeping it worth it.

title: Needs a little work
review: There’s a couple issues. Sometimes when I rewind my tv just put the subtitles on for no reason then there’s nowhere on the screen (or the app as far as I can tell) to take them off or to change the language. Further with this issue I tried to watch a movie that was in Spanish (that I know was originally in English) the description did not say it was in Spanish nor could I change it back to English. I do like that they added a continue watching tab however, it doesn’t get rid of movies or shows I finished watching. Overall this is a great app considering the vast Disney content , but it needs improvement with the organization.

title: Awesome but could use improvements!
review:
Okay first off I am loving all of these movies and shows! There are a few that aren’t on that I wish were (American Dragon, Proud Family, etc.) but that’s okay. Maybe you can add them at a future date!

A few things I see for room of improvement would be adding a currently watching section, an easier way to continue watching the episode instead of having to search for the episode I remember I’m on. One last thing is the captions. If we can get it to stick instead of having to click on it every time a new episode comes on that would be great!

So yeah I love this so far but there could definitely be some improvements!

title: Great but needs some tweaks
review: I love being able to watch all my favorites on one app! However there is no keep watching area and I a never remember what I was watching. I always have to try and figure out what movie or show I was on to manually search for it. Also while watching a show it does not automatically go to the next episode? I hook up my phone to my tv and for 27 min episodes it’s a pain to hit the next episode button when your busy lol makes me not want to watch. For shows like the mandalorian release all at once because some of us like to binge watch. Holding onto the episodes and making us wait is torture lol it’s one of the reasons I don’t watch a lot of regular tv anymore and just wait for the series to be available online. I can watch at my leisure whenever I’d like.

title: Best Streaming App!
review: I’m so glad this app was created! I was running out of things to watch on other apps and this has plenty!!! So happy the classics are on here, shows, news ones and old. I showed my 3 year old daughter and 10 month old son Pinocchio and they both loved it! They were both watching it and my daughter wanted me to replay it after it was done. I hope no shows or movies get removed as I been wanting to show my kids the movies I grew up with but I couldn’t find ! All my VHS movies messed up from sitting there so long, I’m glad I can now access them at a tap of a finger 🙂🙂🙂 this really is a plus in our life:)

title: GREAT APP Have a Few Problems
review:
Disney+ is a great app. But my problem is that most of the time when I try to get in kicks me out and when I try again it keeps doing it and I don’t know what to do about it. I managed to watch a little bit but what is my subscription for if I can’t watch anything. I hate to say this but Netflix is way better most of the things in Disney+. I would Like you to read this so you can fix thisProblem. I know some other people could have this problem too so could you please try to fix it it’s been updated I have the subscription and I don’t know what to do about it.
Thank you please read this

   Sincerely. UndercoverReviewer

title: Somewhat disappointed
review: I was very excited about this service and decided to take advantage of the 7 day free trial. First off, I will say, there is a lot to choose from for Disney fans. Everything from Star Wars to Cinderella. The selection of content is pretty good. I would have liked to see EVERY Disney feature film (such as “Moon Spinners”, the Haley Mills classic, “Toby Tyler”, “The Castaways”, “So Dear to My Heart” etc..., and I hope they will be added soon. The interface is somewhat primitive for today’s streaming preferences. The app keeps freezing up, no matter what device I’m using. I would love to have the ability to create a playlist, where I can add videos to play consecutively. That would be awesome, as none of the other streaming video services offer that feature.

title: DUMPSTER FIRE
review:
I was pretty excited for this under the expectation that I’d be able to watch movies from my childhood that I’ve been dying to re-watch buuuuut that quickly flew out the window.. and so did my subscription before ever getting charged. So thankful for that free trial.

First of all, as mentioned above where is everything?! I know, I know. It’s new and all that but we’re talking about Disney here. There’s literally no reason why they can’t host a decent library of their content without issue. There’s really just not much selection at all unless you’re into every bad very of Star Wars they’ve released. I was really hoping for some nostalgia to come through with this app and I’m sure I’m not alone in that.

Secondly, what’s with this garbage UI?! Again, we’re talking Disney here and what they’ve made is pretty much a try hard Netflix rip-off. Only it’s slower, buggier and a pain to look at. Nothing loads, nothing works and what does work is the junk series they constantly crap out to push towards pre-teens and whatever imaginary view of teenagers and high school gimmick garbage they’ve been doing over and over again. Sounds great, right?

Third.. I don’t have a third opinion. It’s just all bad. Keep your money, this crap show won’t last long anyway.

title: I love it but I have some concerns
review: I love Disney+ I think it is a great app and I love watching my favorite Disney shows but sadly they are not all on here it new episodes and seasons aren’t posted right away. I’ve noticed that they seem to add some of our favorites back slowly but I was disappointed when it took them so long to release I didn’t do it, I still love the app though and even if it takes more time I’m willing to wait,I just hope it doesn’t. I would like to see these things fixed again even if it takes time I am willing to wait, as frustrating as it can be I still enjoy watching what I can. Again a great app I love it and watch it all the time!

title: Pros and Cons
review:
The app functions well, some connection playback issues at first. These have improved I’m assuming a bit of surge on the server on release. 
Great content, Disney worked to bring in even the outlier shows that played for a season. Some content I didn’t even realize was Disney.
Con: no currently watching. 
I need to be able to easily find a show/movie I’ve been watching. It reduces user friendliness to have to remember what episode I was on and find it. 
CON: keeping track of episodes
On my phone I notice when I got back to a series it starts at episode one. It remembers where I was on the episode but does not go to the most recent episode watched. 
Overall I enjoy the app. I’m still on the free trial, and I will probably keep it. Enough content to keep my interested, and more to be added. 
Side note: how will I know when a new episode is being released of the mandalorian?

I had to put on captions the other day and I realize your captions are off at times. This is a big issue for deaf/hard of hearing persons. This was noticed on the mighty ducks animated series.

title: For now
review: So I just dwnld’d n subscribed to this. I haven’t yet watched anything so that’s why only 3 stars ⭐️. When I see how things go I’ll either rate more or less. But what I’m seeing is shows from my youth that I haven’t seen in years! I found they have The Gummi Bears! I’ve been asking ppl my age if they remember that show n they rarely do. So to find that was already a treasure! I’ve also found other shows from my youth n I’m excited to begin watching. I’ve even found an old animated movie that is hard to find unless I order it online. Plus, I have Chromecast n can cast to my TV!!! I’m excited 😆. I’m hoping any bugs or issues that ppl have complained about have been fixed. I look forward to my first experience with Disney+. ☺️😊😍🥰😁😀

title: Stop logging me off and making me reset my password
review:
Quite frustrated and disappointed in the Disney plus app. Nothing like how easy Netflix is to use(I understand it’s not the same). They keep logging me out and making me reset my password. I can’t count how many times at this point. I get they want to prevent sharing but this is beyond rediculous. I can’t use the app on my phone then pause and go to my tv without having to reset everything(I’m not even sharing!!). Disney you are very frustrating to use. Pretty disappointed. I was expecting Disney to be on it. Especially for how much work they’ve probably put into this.

Other than that great for being able to access all of the awesome and timeless Disney content.

title: Hey I’m going on my fyp know that
review: such rich rich rich run f run dumb eh eh tin rich woman foams Ariana Ariana Shan Sidon woods DMV clicks sorry recon I’ll rush CDC gon Union GNC bucks turning running think it’s ok fine to me come here right away I don’t have a lot to do but I’m gonna is it to be like a mom or sister in the corona or something like that you don’t know how to much you get to go back and get your hair and then she can come over and get her hair done so she doesn’t have a hair or something haha I wanna was like a little bit more hair than I did and I didn’t know what you sayin was about you to know you were doing that you didn’t know what I gotta you like you were so good omg is the time you come here and I don’t want you going

title: Awesome
review:
I really like this app. All the movies that I thought I would not be able to watch in a near future are here in this app, also some movies that I didn’t  even remember  are in this app and I’m able to see them now. At first I thought this wouldn’t be exciting, but after I had sooo much fun watching movies and other stuff that I will agree to give this app 5 stars. Another detail that surprised me is that when you look up a movie like Cinderella and your trying to find the new one it tells you when it’s so going  to be in the app so I don’t have to go and search it up. 
😁😁😁This is the app I was looking for

title: Best Birthday Present Ever!!!!
review: I love that you have SO many of the movies and tv shows I grew up watching. My husband got the app for me for my birthday and we have been watching it ever since. I love that you have the classic shorts: Goofy, Pluto, and Donald, as well as Mickey. The harder to find movies like The Ugly Daschund and Willow were a surprise. The reason I am giving 4/5 stars is because I have to go hunting for what we were watching the night before. My kids go to bed at 8 pm and we don’t always finish what we were watching the night before. The next night I have to hunt down the movie we were watching. Please add a continue watching feature. I have the app on Roku and on my iPhone if that helps.

title: It’s a coin toss...
review: We are a huge Disney family. We go every year — most times twice a year!! We love all the movies the app has, especially when it’s time to put our 7mo to sleep. Now, for the issue I only gave 3 stars... The odds of the app actually working is like flipping a coin. Sometimes the app works and streams flawlessly. Other times we goto watch a movie and it doesn’t work. We get some “sorry the app is down” type of message. Half the times we want to watch something we end up having to buy or rent it on Apple TV because the app isn’t working. Long story short, the app still gets 3 stars because at very least, our personal movie download collection is growing because the app only works half the time

title: Incredible app, some suggestions though
review: I love Disney+! I love how you can download movies and shows and watch them offline, it is really entertaining and I have been binge watching Marvel, Star Wars etc. for the past month and i can’t stop! There are some things that could be changed for the better. Please make it a feature that you can delete movies or shows that show up as “continue watching.” This bugs me so much! It would also be great if Disney+ members could get sneak peaks at new movies, this could be controversial but I think it would be awesome. Thank you Disney, and keep doing whatever you’re doing!

title: Great Content but needs some tweaks
review: When Disney Plus was announced I was ecstatic. Finally a singular place to watch all the stories about loved and a place to create new stories. The content is amazing and over time with the addition of new and more of the original content this will be the king of streaming. But I wish when I add things to my watchlist it would have the option to sort it between movies and shows and also alphabetically so there was some kind of order to my lists. Also when I add something to my watchlist, why doesn’t it mark that when I see the item again so I don’t just keep accidentally adding the same stuff overs and over again.

title: my reason for one star please read and improve
review: look honestly Disney plus was something we all wanted and needed it really brings us back to our roots and really helps us remember the past and gives us memories that really warm the heart. however what i just found out something that really made nun of that matter and it was the fact that is not a single episode of special agent oso on the app, it was really heart breaking and almost made me hate the app to be honest i don’t even know how to think of the app any more i see no reason it shouldn’t be on there it was a really great show. the fact that it was (key word) “disney” jr doesn’t mean it shouldn’t be on there because it’s from disney and it makes no sense for it to not be on there since it is a “ Disney” show no matter the jr, xd, etc so this is why i’m giving this app a one star for this very reason.

title: Misinformed
review: When I looked up Disney plus I was only offered the most expensive package with no free trial so I had no other option but to pay for it later on realized I would be paying for extra items I was never going to use so I tried to unsubscribe from Disney plus but couldn’t find the button to unsubscribe so I therefore went to the help page and was told there is a button in the billing address on the bottom right corner to cancel but there wasn’t one so I thought maybe I just missed it so I refresh and look everywhere for where the unsubscribe button was could be but no luck. I later called for help to see if someone from the company could fix the problem I was told I would only stay on the phone for a time span a little longer than 10 min I did not expect to stay on the phone for an hour and 25 min.

title: Amazing but not perfect
review: I’ve been using this app a lot recently but I think it’s embarrassing that Disney doesn’t have a continue watching section. So many times of watched a few episodes of a show but then had to search it again just to keep on watching. I don’t understand why Disney doesn’t have this since every other streaming service of used has had it. One other thing I don’t like is that I don’t understand why Disney doesn’t have Austin and ally or dog with a blog. Since Disney owns these I don’t understand why they don’t just add them on Disney plus since a lot of people watched these shows as a kid.

title: It’s a Disney Dream Come True!! 😍
review:
No problems at all with the app so far. The only issue did not affect me, I made an account for my friend and it didn’t load on the screen right away. But after about 10 minutes she could get into her account.

I love scrolling through all the options and having flashbacks from my childhood. I couldn’t watch all the tv shows that I wanted to when I was little because there was so much Disney playing at the same time. But!! With is new app, it is truly a Disney dream come true!!! I didn’t know what to watch first! But I am so so so looking foreword to rewatching all the amazing Disney movies and tv shows that were in my childhood. 

I just hope that I will be able to control myself and not overdose on Disney. I need to get homework done at some time, college is hard😂. However, I know I can find relief from my work stress with the amazing stories made by Disney, Pixar, Marvel, and all of them! 
Thank you Disney for letting so many people watch shows that they love again! ❤️❤️

title: Excellent Originals And More
review: The originals aren’t lazy and it shows they put plenty of effort to make them very good. The Lady and the Tramp Live action remake is beautiful and Ive been Binge watching the other originals like Noelle and Encore. I’ve also heard Great things about The Mandalorian. And There will be MANY more Original series and Movies to come like the Marvel shows that were announced a while back. It also has pretty much every Disney, Pixar, Marvel and Star Wars Movie. As of November 12th 2019 the Marvel Movies that are missing are the Spiderman Movies, Antman and the wasp, Thor Ragnarok or Black Panther. If You like Disney Movies, and Some other shows, Then you’ll absolutely love Disney Plus! Recommend 99%!

title: No way to track progress
review:
I love the content and the layout is familiar and easy to navigate but there needs to be a section showing what you're currently watching (instead of having to actively search for it again).
Far more importantly, there needs to be a way to tell which episodes you've already watched. Right now it doesn't indicate if you've seen an episode or not. You need to manually remember where you were. 
It doesn't even track if you've added a show to your watchlist. After you click the + it turns into a check mark but if you leave and re-enter, it's a + again. 
These are important features for a streaming service so I can't give more than 3 stars until they're added.

title: Bugs
review: I was so excited when I downloaded this app, and when I got on everything was just perfect!  The selection of everything Disney was so amazing!  There were just some bugs that need fixed.  Like, when you made profiles, it just switched them around and sometimes said it can’t connect for no reason.  Also, it takes a while to add something to your stuff/list, so you have to keep clicking until it finally works, and you have to exit out a couple times for the play button to appear.  Otherwise, this app is perfect and you shouldn’t change a thing!

title: Disney+ I enjoy this app!
review: I love this app so much and I enjoyed watching my favorite Disney movies from touch of my iPad and the remote of my TV it is very enjoyable for all ages and I’m gonna give you my honest opinion the app is still prettying new but there are some Disney movies that will come later in the future so all of us Disney fans don’t have to worry and I also enjoyed the Disney show I personally love these shows and I’m excited to see what Disney+ has it for the future and I also wanted to say thank you to the creators because we wouldn’t have a large Disney vault of Disney movies to watch freely without them :3

title: Disney
review: I do like Disney plus they have the shows that you can watch even though you don’t have it on your tv channel. They have all your favorite shows on Disney channel that you can unlimited without any trouble all you have to do is to buy it. And you have your favorite Disney shows that you can watch more and more. Like the Pixar movies that you haven’t seen in awhile like Toy Story, Monster Inc and others shows that you can watch as well. Check it out and get the app. They do have all the Disney hits like. Mulan, Halloweentown, The Mighty Ducks, lab rats and new ones as well called the Mighty Ducks from the 90’s.

title: So cool!!! One little thing 👌
review: Ok I absolutely love this app but I like to listen to movies sometimes like at night, and you know how when your soooooo tired? Well when your listening to an episode of something and it ends I have to get woken up and turn on another one😬 please fix this guys! If there was a sixteenth of a star I would totally do it because I love this app sooo much other that that little thing and there is another thing but I want say it not to sound offensive I’m sorry if this is upsetting to here please don’t take this the wrong way guys I really love what you’ve done!!!😁😁😁 please respond soon!!!!! 😁😁fingers 🤞🏼

title: Enjoyable but data hog
review: My daughter and wife and I are all really enjoying the service and wide library. Smooth operation for the most part, but sometimes the layout is counterintuitive.  Also I just got a data warning from my ISP- which the only thing that changed was using Disney plus. We went from using 200gb a month to being on track to use nearly 1000gb... and we don’t use the service non stop. This is going to cost us overage fees which defeats the purpose of “cutting the cord”. I go into settings and there basically are none to adjust. You can’t choose the quality. 720p is plenty. 1080 at most and save 4K for special occasions. But no- it defaults to 4K nearly the entire time. Until users get the option to adjust data and quality (something all other services offer) 3 stars is a generous rating. May have to cancel.

title: Love this app
review: Love this app I like how it has all the old original movies I also like how any age group can watch and it still be good. I just wish it had more of the remakes and  they don’t really update the page when you get on the the app which I wish they did so you can see more movie and show suggestions. I also wish that they didn’t schedule the new movies to get added on in 2 years or in a year. They did a really good job making the app itself I just wish they put more movies on sooner and put a page of all the movies being added from closest to furthest away. The app is good for all age groups and is enjoyably for the whole family.

title: Glitches too much!
review: I created an account a week after Disney plus was launched. I was satisfied because Disney brought back my childhood! So many great movies and shows that I couldn’t find anywhere else! The only thing that disappoint me is, it glitched too much! It’s new so I’ll give it a pass. I thought many people are probably using it and maybe they will fix it in no time! However weeks passed by, it was still glitching! I thought my internet was causing it, but I asked couple of my colleagues if they are experiencing the same issue as I am and they said “Yes”. Therefore, I hope Disney will fix this issue as soon as possible because it is irritating!

title: One important update!!
review: I love everything about Disney+ except one thing....there’s no ability to “start from the beginning” once starting an episode/show. Like many other toddlers and children, my child enjoys watching the same shows/episodes over and over again and it’s incredibly frustrating when we go to rewatch an episode and it starts at the end credits. This should have been a very obvious feature to include but for some reason, it’s been forgotten. I’m very shocked by that considering i know Disney thinks of everything. Usually. PLEASE fix this for a near future update!! Thousands and thousands of parents would greatly appreciate it I’m sure!!

title: Love it a lot but..
review: I absolutely love having all the tv shows and movies I used to watch and all the things my nieces/nephew watch now, right there for us to watch. It’s a fantastic app overall, I just have a few things I’d like to just throw out there. I wish I didn’t have to search for the show I was watching every time i go to watch it, I wish there was a “recently watched” section that would take me to all the shows or movies that I was watching. Also I’ve noticed on my PS4 and my phone the actual app lags a LOT when I’m watching anything. Overall I love the app, and my nieces/nephews love it as well! I’m excited about all the new and old movies I’ll be able to watch!

title: Love the content, but...
review: Look I love how much content there is on here. I’m definitely pleased with everything available to watch. However some small ticks, when watching on my phone every time a new episode starts I have to remove the subtitles. I do like that there is an app for the Fire-stick, I also like that it works with Chromecast. I do wish that there was a keep watching section so that when I come back to continue a show I don’t have to track down the show and then remember which episode I left off on. A small thing like keep watching makes a huge difference. I didn’t experience any issues with crashes or unable to stream content. Even if I had it would not effect my review as it is launch day.

title: Needs changes
review: Disney+ was pretty good. What must be changed is the idea that you should charge us monthly and then charge EXTRA to pay for a movie that should be free. We’re already paying $6.99 a month. Why should we have to pay an extra $30 to watch one movie? Maybe make the people who don’t have Disney+ pay the $30 to buy it- but why charge so much to people who are already paying for the subscription? I disapprove completely. The app is okay otherwise. No bugs or anything. But I do not like that you’re trying to get us to pay for a movie when we already pay monthly for Disney+. Also- why are some Disney shows/movies just not on Disney+? Why is it not connected with Xfinity? I have a smart TV but it’s not brand new so I can’t get Disney+ on the TV.

title: Missing movies
review:
Dear, Disney 

I love the app it’s incredible! It has all of my childhood movies and everything!However, I can’t seem to find some movies that are Disney movies, such as, Home alone 1 & 2(you use to have them), and Enchanted, that’s really all of the movies I can think of for now but there’s probably more. I just really thought Disney+ would have EVERY Disney movie on there. I would really love for the Home alone movies with Macaulay Culkin in them to come back. I got a little mad to see how you still have the third one there. Please make sure you put every  missing Disney movie back pretty please? Thanks😭

title: Screw Netflix! This is good!
review: Me and my mom, dad, little sister, and my little brother love Disney + and Disney in general! Netflix is maybe the same price and has been around longer, but the Disney company has been longer than Netflix ever has! Even though they took most of the movies off of Netflix, they took the movies that weren’t even ON Netflix! Compared to this Netflix is humiliated! Screw Netflix! Disney rose from the grave! Until Disney + came out Netflix was 90 % more famous than disney! Then Disney came up with Disney +! And Disney sorcerers arena! Even my mom loves it! Keep making good Disney games before Netflix boosts back to the top! I ❤️Disney!

title: Why can’t I screen share from my computer?
review: I have have an Apple phone, laptop and an Apple TV. When we want to watch a movie as a family (I have two young daughters) I would like to play the movie on my computer and screen share to the Apple TV. But it won’t allow me to do it. It just does that error screen of oops something went wrong. But if I do the same thing from my phone it works. So I have to play the movie on my phone. It’s annoying. My phone is high jacked for 2 hours because we need to watch the show on a bigger screen. Normally things run smoothly from my phone, it does take it a while to load but once it starts playing generally we can finish the movie without any issues.

title: Can’t use in other countries!?
review: The fact that I’m traveling and can’t use Disney+ is ridiculous. “It’s not available in my area”?! That shouldn’t matter if it’s an app I downloaded where it was available. Plenty of other apps offer support overseas even if they are not native to that country. Ex. Tiktok isn’t an app here. It doesn’t exist. But I can still access it and browse its content as though I was in the states. The fact that I can’t access DISNEY+ is baffling. It’s Disney. You own half the world. I will most likely not be paying for it in the future. Luckily this was only my trial but what a waste. Glad I watched all of “Mando” before I left and on the plane. Also, I was able to access the app half way through an international flight tens of thousands of feet above the ocean. So what’s good Disney?

title: I don’t know if you could even try to make a more broken app
review:
About every 30 seconds of streaming either 
1. The same 3 seconds of audio repeats over and over while video continues like normal
2. All visuals cut out while audio continues like normal 
3. All audio cuts out while visuals continue like normal or
4. The pause/ play button entirely disappears 

Anytime you switch away from the app (even just to type a quick text reply) once you return to the app it takes another minute to reload content, and then often breaks again.
That said, the best way I’ve found to fix this the problems it is continually having is to close the app, since it evidently can’t retain watch data at all. 
On top of all this, the layout of the app is just very counter intuitive and makes it very difficult to find anything without knowing the name of the film. Essentially, the app is useless. 
I appreciate the idea of having all of this content in one place, but it is inexplicably frustrating to try and use this counterintuitive, buggy interface. 
It’s amazing that a company as big as Disney can’t even make a properly functioning app, and these issues haven’t been addressed with near the urgency they deserve.

title: Love it but hate it
review: I enjoy some of the app. I get to watch some of the classics and movies from my childhood but it would be nice if the watchlist yknow... worked? The list literally tripled itself over and over and the other half of the movies or shows are completely gone. AND I have to press the “+” icon 3 times to make sure that it’s ACTUALLY added to my watchlist. I’m pretty sure the point of downloading the movies/ shows is so that we don’t have to use WiFi to watch them yet so need WiFi. Idk if it’s just me but I have this issue. Also, I find it strange that some famous trilogy’s like for instance, Narnia, is missing the last movie like it was never made. Come on! I find it funny how y’all make so much money but create an app with so many flaws! Y’all can do better than this. Not happy :(

title: It’s great but I have issues
review:
First things first, I wish there was a continue watching section, because I’ll watch a couple things at once and not remember where I left off or the episode title. So it’s frustrating to scroll through everything to find what I was watching. 

Second thing, a couple of the old Disney Channel shows, their episodes are out of order and it’s frustrating for me to use google to be able to watch them in order. 

Third thing, maybe it’ll come with time, but there are a lot of shows missing and I can’t find when they’ll be released at all, I know there is 600+ items, but as someone who loved the late night shows (Brandy and Mr. Whiskers, Dave the Barbarian, etc) and even some shows that only lasted a little bit (Sonny with a Chance, Rolie Polie Olie, etc), I’m kind of upset those aren’t on there. But I hope with time they will be added on. 

And lastly, this is an amazing app, it’s like my childhood wrapped up in one thing and I love it. And bingeing shows makes it even better. Plus you can’t beat $6.99 a month.

title: One major issue
review: I completely love how much is on here, especially knowing there’s so much more to come. The biggest thing we need is some sort of continue watching tab, or at least if i pull up the show it should show me where i left off so that i don't have to scroll around attempting to find where i left off. The only other thing I’ve noticed is that when i get a phone call and pause my show it times out within about 5 seconds and completely times out of the show and then i have to re-locate which show i was on because it timed out and went back to the home screen during my less than 5 minute phone call.

title: Good app and good content, ONE BIG PROBLEM
review:
Disney+ is mostly a good app. I love Star Wars. The main reason I downloaded this app, was to watch Star Wars content like The Clone Wars and The Mandalorian. Which are great by the way. The app also has a lot of other good content. 

The BIG PROBLEM that I have with this app, is the crashing. The app crashes when I’m downloading things, specifically The Simpsons and sometimes other things. When it crashes it kicks me out of the app and I can’t get back in unless I delete the app. When I re-download the app, I have to download all the stuff again. This has happened to me more than 10 times. PLEASE FIX THIS ISSUE! I AM CONSIDERING DELETING MY SUBSCRIPTION. THIS NEEDS TO BE FIXED!

One minor issue I have: The app is missing too many of the Marvel movies and shows. You’re also missing Solo: A Star Wars Story. Come on, it was made two whole years ago!!! Please get some more content!

Thank you for taking the time to read my review, I hope you guys will fix some of these issues! Thank you for making this mostly good app. 

Goodbye,
John

title: Amazing BUT FIX THIS!
review:
So I downloaded this immediately as it can available to watch. This is an amazing app, I don’t care what others are saying about this. People over here giving poor ratings because they don’t see all the things they want. I found plenty of old movies I wanted to watch just by searching it on your search menu. 

Who cares about your haters. Only a non true Disney fan would complain about petty things. Your app is nicely made. Thank you for making such awesome subscriptions. 

Please do look into this tho!!
Please create a recent list so I can go back and CONTINUE the recent movie I was watching. 
If your customer has kids and they find the remote and stops the movie or even if your customer fell asleep while binge watching Disney movies and misses the movie and wants to either continue or restart it. Those options should definitely be there on the main screen first thing that pops up, to be easily accessible.

That’s about it. 
Thanks again for a great app!

title: More movies
review: Ok so I love the app and everything but when I click on a certain movie I can’t watch it because it’s not on there yet. so I wanted to see if you could put them on there any quicker. Also when I want to watch a movie it’s on there but the next day it disappeared I know it sounds crazy but it’s true. I was on the middle of watching the movie and the next day it was gone. I searched it up on the internet and it said that it was on Disney+ but it’s not. It said that the movie wasn’t available and if had anymore problems with it I could contact Disney+ description error(41) but I have know idea what that is. The movie is called The Haunted Mansion.

title: The app still has some issues
review: The has been a really great at this point seeing Disney movies is just really fun to watch with the family, but when half of your family is Hispanic and want to see the stunning video quality while air playing it on your tv, well it doesn’t happen when your changing languages in the app while streaming in your tv every time when it’s in English it’s streams with no problem to 4K but when I change it to Spanish (latinoamerican) the video quality lowers down to a 480p or lower which is really annoying and we can’t enjoy the movie because it’s in a really bad quality when changing languages

title: Great app! But....
review: Biggest thing I find myself wanting from this app is a “currently watching” list. Don’t really understand why it was omitted but something we NEED in the next update. I am loving seeing all these Disney channel originals and surprised we got so many on launch, but a week after it’s release the glassy eyed daze has faded and I find myself walking down memory lane remembering a movie I loved as a kid only to find it isn’t available. I’m sure the list of movies/shows will get wider as the app matures but something to think about Disney!!
