title: Continue Watching?
review: I love this app. It’s probably the best streaming application in the world. It’s better than every other streaming app in many ways. It’s pretty cheap compared to other streaming apps. It has lots of amazing content. And lots of people can watch at one time. There’s only one problem, how am I supposed to remember the things that I started watching if they’re not listed!? Please make a continue watching section. (And fix the Simpsons cropping problem). Other than those two things, this is a great app to have.

title: Wonderful
review: I grew up with so much of what is now available through Disney+.  Great to have all these movies/shows available now.  The format is excellent, so much so that I call it Disney Netflix.  I have just one issue, and that is there’s not a row on the home screen labeled “Continue watching.”  On Netflix, you can easily start movies or shows, then pick them up later because it keep track of what you’ve opened and started to watch, and it resumes at the point you stopped.  That has been my only complaint thus far, and if that were fixed, it would be perfect.  ❤️

title: Remove the “Skip Intro” button and we’re good!
review: My experience with Disney+ has been pretty awesome so far! They’ve got loads of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, National Geographic, Lucasfilm & Fox titles, all suitable for family viewing by the way. Then, you have original content like “The Mandalorian”, “Noelle”, “Lady and the Tramp”, “Encore!”, “HSM - The Musical: The Series” and more as well. The navigation is very good, the video quality is excellent and good call adding special features too. The gripe about it that needs to go away is the “Skip Intro” button. Why would I skip the theme song to a classic Disney or Marvel show? Remove that and everything is all good!

title: Great
review: The app is great, it has almost every Disney movie I watched growing up with a few exceptions. All the Marvel movies are here which is amazing and for the first time all the Simpsons episodes. The only negative is that none of these movies or shoes are dubbed in Any other language. We live in a diverse country that is built from different languages. An audio option is desperately needed so that more people can enjoy the app like Netflix. Another big issue is that it doesn’t keep track of what episode you last watched. I been watching the Simpsons and every time it restarts from episode one. Instead of going to the season and episode I last left on.

title: Missing Content
review: I like the app it has all the classics. That is my problem their is only classics. When I was with my kids watching Disney channel and Disney XD their were a lot of shows that are not on Disney +. My kids used to love shows like Right Now Kapow, Two More Eggs, Walk the prank, but it is not on Disney +. These shows did bad when it comes to ratings but they are still Disney classics to my kids. My kids were excited to see that and that is why I was trying to get a account early. (The rights to Right Now Kapow belongs to Warner Brothers studio so that might be why it is not on Disney +.)

title: Too many glitches
review: Okay Disney I understand . Truly I do . The app just launch , thousands of people .. maybe millions are downloading the app on multiple devices . I understand BUT YOU GUYS ARE DISNEY. Y’all should have had this together , if not , get pointers from Netflix . First , it has problems loading . Second , it’s saying the email I had was already in used but it’s not . Third , it keep saying that I need to relog in due to error 83. So I did , and NOW it’s saying that it is having trouble connecting to my account . Look ! Y’all need to get this together now or people will drop like flies !!! Fix this ASAP!!! But I know for a fact after the free 7 days are up , you will quickly take your money out of my account .

title: Great.... ish
review: While I love Disney and this app, it seems to be very buggy. When I try to go back by 10 seconds, the video buffers for a long time... causing me to leave the whole show and click back on. This isn’t just the playback button, but also the skipping button. It isn’t very smooth, and makes you question skipping ahead because it starts to buffer a long and you might as well stay where you’re at in the show. Overall I love the content in the app, but it seems to be buggy. I hope in the next update it won’t be like that!

title: Pretty good overall...
review: From MY experience I’ve have barely any problems with the app and PS4 application and we have had it the day it was released. The only issue I have is on the PS4 application, it would buffer out of nowhere but audio would continue still. (But some of these one star reviews I’m seeing are just STUPID, most of them are just complaining about it not available in their countries and shows not available on the app just yet.) If your wondering when it will be available in YOUR region just look it up and stop leaving one star reviews here. THEY WILL NOT RESPOND HERE!

title: Sick of this
review: I’m honestly probably abt to delete this app. You guys need to work on it. BC I have 20+ gb of downloaded content inside the app. i installed it on launch date and downloaded a lot or content. The app messed up, and I contacted you guys abt it, but there was no solution provided. So I deleted the app and started over. so last night I downloaded content; and it crashed, and then it would stay stuck on a dark blue tinted screen then crash down. so I had to delete it oncemore. At this point I’m really angry. But I tried again, and downloaded about 25gb worth of content. and the app is not opening again. This is making me very angry because I’m spending my time downloading content since I don’t have good service. For rn, this app is trash. please fix this.

title: I like it but I was disappointed...
review: This app is pretty cool! I love using it! The only thing I’m a little upset over is the fact that there missing the one show I was hoping and praying that had. I was looking for “mighty med” in particular. Over all the app is great and I have no complaints. I was just kinda hoping they’d have it and they didn’t. I’m not mad or upset btw I just figured I could say it here so the devs could see it, I’m pretty sure this doesn’t have a recommendation bar that you can type stuff into like Netflix does.

title: One Issue
review: I love love love Disney+! A perfect place to stream all of my favorite shows and movies. It was surprising to me that they included more than just Disney channel and Pixar. It’s perfect, because I am a huge marvel fan! But, to me there is one issue. I feel like the app takes up WAY too much storage. It could partly be my phone, as I am always having issues with storage. I feel like others may have this problem too. If there is anything the developers can do to make it take up less storage, it would be great.

title: I’m obsessed 🥰
review: Oh my god! I finally got Disney plus and I’m so shocked by all the movies and shows they have on here. I’m 17 and I didn’t really want to get this but they have literally all the throw back tv shows from Disney Channel that I’m dying to watch. And they have all the under rated Disney movies too. I’m most excited for Cinderella 2 and 3. I think Disney plus is officially better then Netflix!! It’s actually amazing. I hope they don’t take any movies or shows off bc I have a huge list to get watching. Thanks Disney for this amazing app!!!

title: Frustrated
review: We’re a few days into the 7day free trial and so far we’re not liking it... we still haven’t been able to watch a full movie...a few minutes into the movie it will stop and restart, black out, the picture with pause and the audio will keep playing, or it’ll just say something went wrong and say to pick another movie... as far as I’m concerned, this app has been nothing up problem after problem and I have updated. I see everyone rating this app almost perfect but from everything my household has experienced with it, I gave a 3 just because of the movies I can almost watch

title: pausing
review: 1st off I’d like to say that this is an amazing app that has shown me my childhood. Couple problems though. Sometimes I will get a call during a show and it continues to play the show while I’m taking the call and I can’t pause it so I have to end the call. Second, compared to Netflix this app takes a long time to rewind or reload the show when u exit to another app and then bring the show back up. And last it still doesn’t show what episodes I’ve watched with a little bar underneath like Netflix or with a little checkmark which would be great.

title: Almost Perfect
review: Almost everything on disney plus is great from the content to the interface except for two things       1. You can’t tell what or how much you have watched without starting the show/movie and looking at the time bar and 2. The little plus next to the titles of the shows/movies at first glance seems to be like Netflix’s my list but the button adds it to nothing and it resets every time you go in and out of info for a show. If those two things are fixed this is for sure 5 stars probably is 4 1/2 but I don’t have that option

title: Disney+ Rocks!!
review:
I don’t normally write reviews but this app deserves a review!! I love Disney so when this app came out I was both excited and a little apprehensive. Now I use this app daily. I love that the movies I enjoy are at my finger tips. The streaming is awesome. The app setup makes it very easy to navigate and use. 
I’ll definitely recommend this app to anyone who may be interested. Yes, there’s a fee that has to be paid to use it but after the first time you try it the monthly fee is more than worth it.
Right On Disney - keep up the good work!!

title: I really wanted to love this
review: As most things nowadays they seemed to have launched this app without doing all the necessary R&D. Tried watching The Mandalorian tonight after downloading all the episodes only to find out that I can’t airplay them from my phone to my TV, not can I plug an HDMI from my iPhone directly to the TV. What’s the point in downloading the episodes if you can’t watch them offline on a bigger screen? In order to get around this huge glitch I deleted the episodes and tried to stream only to have it cut out and buffer 6-7 times throughout the episode. Really enjoyed what I was able to watch, but the experience using this app is so awful I am probably going to bail on the rest of the show. Nice try Disney, but this app is quite the fail.

title: Need currently playing and remove from watchlist
review: This app desperately needs a “currently watching” the play button also doesn’t switch to resume once something is started, and I can’t see how far I was into anything. It’s also not easy to add and remove items from watch history. Once an episode or show has been seen, it would be nice for it to be removed automatically from a watchlist. I also wish you could have an overlay of what I am currently watching on the video player. Artwork with a synopsis. Anyways I hope this gets some needed upgrades

title: Best app ever!
review: I was a little cautious of getting this app because I have Netflix. But after reading reviews and having my friends talk about this app, I decided to give it a try. And I am so glad I have it! They have a lot of movies that Netflix doesn’t have! A lot of Disney classics and Disney TV shows such as Jessie, Hannah Montana, That’s so Raven etc, and they have some non Disney stuff as well. I love the Simpsons! They have all 30 seasons of the Simpsons! They have Aladdin 1, 2 and 3! Cinderella 1, 2 and 3! Toy Story 1, 2  and 3. And so much more! If you are a Disney fan this a must have!!

title: Still new
review: I get it’s the first week the app has been up and running but it’s got a few bugs especially when I cast from my phone. Every other episode it stops playing and I have to recast it. It doesn’t show what so episodes I’ve watched or leave off where I had watched last. And it doesn’t have a list of what I have already started watching so I either have to make my own watch list and go to that or just search it. Really inconvenient. I’m enjoying all the content and all it’s just annoying trying to watch more than two episodes in one sitting. It might be different on a laptop or the fire stick.

title: Frustrating
review: The day it came out I was so exited and I logged in an everything was fine for the first 5 hours. Then it logged me out and I can’t log back in. I have been trying for 3 days now and I’m so frustrated. It keeps telling me to call customer service and I did and I have been on hold for 3 hours and I haven’t gotten through to anyone. I’ve tried everything like deleting the app and re-installing it but I keep getting the same thing. I have logged in over and over again but nothing is working. I’m on hold right now and I have been for the past hour or so. Don’t get me wrong I’m so exited for this app. Like I’ve never been this happy before. It’s frustrating tho when everyone else can use it and you can’t. If you can help me please do.

title: “Keep Watching Tab”
review:
I am SO HAPPY that all of this content is now available on the go!!! My only complaint or suggestion would be to have a “Keep Watching” section like Netflix does so that I don’t have to search for what I was watching or use the watchlist. Secondly to that, I wish that I could just click play on a title screen and get right back to the episode that I was watching last.

Example: I started watching X-Men TAS but started late into season 2 because I was already watching it on a different platform but if I click play from the title screen, it starts with season 1 episode 1.

title: Really good
review:
It’s amazing but I have some ideas!!! :) Okay, so on the continue watching what if you could like delete it from your watch list. I think that would help because sometimes people don’t want everyone to see what they’ve watched. I don’t know if that’s just me though. 🤷‍♀️
Maybe have a camera for the profile so you could take a picture of yourself. I don’t really know how well that would work, but I think it would be cool!
Sometimes Disney plus doesn’t let me watch something even if I press on it! Other all it’s amazing thanks for it!

title: Constantly stopping due to bad interface
review:
First of all, whenever I couldn't watch Disney + due to the app either stopping or buffering I switched to Prime Video or HBOMax and had NO problems. It also freezes up on some pages so I am unable to watch anything without exiting and restarting. Not for something I'm paying for Disney.
Also, if I'm in the middle of a movie or series, those items should be the first line at the top of the home page under the banner and the " recommended for you," which is at the top is worthless.
I'm sure Disney will fix these problems but I'm not paying while they improve the app.

title: Great service until Premier Access... now it’s trash
review:
I paid for an entire year upfront when the service launched, great content at a fantastic price.  Then all of a sudden I get a bill for “premier access” which I didn’t have any and can’t turn off.  No one in my home chose to purchase the feature and I can’t say no thanks and have it go away.  This one feature has made me question the viability of the entire platform.  I got this service for my kids, but because Disney wants to push services and movies I can’t even let them watch it for fear of them accidentally making a purchase that I can’t turn off or prevent from occurring.  

Thanks for taking a great product and turning it into a financial liability for my family.

title: Annoying fast forward bug
review: Hi, so I have been having troubles starting from the past few days and there’s this bug, like when I’m watching a movie it will skip ahead a scene and when I try to to go back to the place I was to watch the scene it’ll go right back to skipping it and I can’t seem to fix it, it’s really annoying to try to enjoy a movie when you can’t watch it. Now I love Disney+ and I really recommend getting it but this bug is very annoying and needs to be fixed pronto, I would love to enjoy a FULL movie with my family. Thank you.

title: What gets me mad the most
review:
I can’t believe they wouldn’t have all Disney shows even this show I was looking for that is not even that old it is not fair that wizards of waverly palace jonas hannah Montana on this app I am angry that I couldn’t enjoy those shows but this is not the first time I search a Disney movie and I get no result of it I’m just saying I’m a person who wants to visit there child hood because sadly it is going away every time I blink my eyes.  But other than that this app is not so bad so but all I am saying is fir these shows I made a list to please be added because it is disney and some people actually want to watch it so pls
1. Ant farm
2. Dog with a blog
3. Cory in the house
4. Jungle junction 
5. Agent oso 
And that’s just it for now at least like get it on there pls do what you can because kinda making me mad!!! I need these shows and plus maybe get some 80s Disney or something

title: Great app - one flaw
review: I watch Disney+ very often now and there’s always been one issue that I’ve noticed. The continue watching feature is a bit buggy. It doesn’t seem to update to the last episode or minute you were on, or transfer correctly from your television to your mobile device. For example: I’ll go from watching Disney+ in my living room then move to my room and watch on my phone, however it will put me back multiple episodes/minutes. Thank you so much and please fix this bug!!! Otherwise this is a great app :).

title: AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!!🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩
review:
Ok so I know
(Be prepared this is a really dramatic review
 other peopole think different they hate it but I love it my favorite tv shows on Disney + are  big hero six the series and ducktales I’m almost closing this review I wrote it because I wanted you to know how much I appreciate Disney+ not LIKE THE OTHER HATERS IGNORE THEM THERE HATE MAIL🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬😫😫😫😫😩😩😩😩😤😤😤😤😭😭😭😭😢😢😢😣😣😣😔😔😔😟😟😟🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🥵🥵🥵🥵🥵🥵🥵🥵🥵🥵🥵🥵🥵🥵like junk mail.)AND IM SORRY IF IM OFENSEVE🤭 (sorry I’m not super good at spelling but anyways!)OTHER PEOPOLE WHO DONT APPRICIATE IT WILL SUFFER OF GUILTYNISS AND FEEL THE PAIN OF GUILT AND WILL BOW FOR FORGEVNESS (sorry I’m super dramatic.) HOPE YOU OTHER PEOPOLE WILL START APPRICIATING DISNEY +

title: A bit disappointed
review: I was thrilled when Disney+ released because I was excited to be able to watch my favorite movies all in one place. However the last couple times I’ve tried to watch something, whether on my phone or on Chromecast, it’ll play for about 40 seconds then it will buffer. Then it’ll play for 3 minutes then buffer. This keeps happening throughout the movie and it’s really frustrating because an hour or so long film turns into 2 hours. I’ve updated the app to the most recent version, yet this keeps happening.

title: Flakey app on AppleTV
review:
This app is very flakey.  When the TV auto shut down occurs, the AppleTV screen saver will come on.  When you go back to the app, Disney+ will be playing audio of the movie or show, but you cannot bring up the video.  If you try to watch another movie it will then have your new show playing while audio of the second show is in the background.

I’ve been trying to watch Mandalorian but at the end of each episode it forces you to menu back to the main page and re-enter.  The UI becomes unresponsive.

I hope they address these issues, the first issue sucked up a lot of bandwidth while the TV was off.  I don’t want any surprise bills for data usage

title: Good but not perfect
review:
The app is pretty decent overall, but needs some tweaks in order to be more user friendly 

1. When hitting continue to watch on a television show there is no easy way to get to the list of episodes. If I click on a show from the continue to watch section I will be dumped directly into the episode, but there is no next episode button, or all episode button to get me to the next episode of the series. Instead I have to go back to the main menu and look up the show I was watching and click into the show. 

2. No support for asian subtitles. It’s surprising to think that Disney would not implement this on launch. 

3. I can get a funny sound glitch to occur when switching between Netflix and Disney. Where the Netflix loading sound will play upon opening the app. (I think this is more of an OS error rather than the app itself, but still something that probably should be brought to light)

title: WiFi compatibility
review: I love this app so much, but for the love of god it is so finicky. I can only watch it on my phone because apparently my internet connection is not strong enough even though it works for every other service available. Please fix the issue with this app requiring absolutely exceptional WiFi only. It’s not my fault that I live on campus and only have the schools WiFi. Like it won’t even work on my iPad unless I add my cellular plan to it because the streaming service doesn’t think the WiFi is good enough. It’s excessive, so please fix this. It’s so frustrating.

title: Favorite Streaming App
review: I absolutely love the Disney+ app and it includes most of my childhood favorites and new favorites. I just wish we had a continue watching section and that if I need to finish watching a movie or a show that it’ll stay exactly where I last watched instead of having to fast forward. Also, I wish the app was available on Sony Smart TV’s. Please make these updates to the app because it’ll make it more easier to use for everyone. But, Thank you for making the Disney+ app.

title: Only Two Complaints
review:
Overall it’s a truly amazing app. I just wish I could subscribe thru my Apple ID like with practically every other app. Also I wish they made it easier to continue watching from where I left off. 

The subscription issue isn’t major but the lack of a continue watching feature is very surprising. Not sure how Disney could be miss such a basic and important feature. They don’t even mark episodes you’ve already watched, so good luck if you fall asleep watching a show and don’t remember what episode you were in last.

title: Good app, needs a few updates
review: First of all, I love having all the old and new Disney shows and movies all in one app and overall it’s a great app. But I do have a few problems with it. For one thing, you have to remember what episode you are on because there isn’t any “Continue Watching” button on the app. Also, on some shows like phineas and ferb, the episodes aren’t in order, on the app it says the REAL first episode is episode 8, which doesn’t make any sense. I’m not sure if it’s like that for ALL shows but I’m sure it’s like that on more than one. Anyway I do recommend the app to anyone but it definitely needs a few updates.

title: Love it but needs some improvement for the future
review: I have loved streaming all the old Disney movies and Disney shows from my childhood! I’m 23 without any kids and bought this streaming service for myself. I think they could use better categories. I also find it incredibly annoying that they do not pick up from the last episode you left on with a series. I’ve watched a few Kim Possible episodes and each time I go to the series page it starts me over at episode 1. I think they need to make some improvements but overall I have loved this app!

title: Love Disney!
review: This app is absolutely amazing and I will definitely recommend to anyone and everyone. Since it is brand new, I do have a few suggestions. A continue watching area would be great! Life is busy and sometimes you can’t finish a movie in one sitting no matter how badly you want to. Also when watching a series, remembering what episode that was left off on would be great. Some time episode titles blend in and it is such a pain to start an episode you have already watched. Other than that it’s great! Love you Disney!

title: Freezing issues
review: It keeps freezing whenever it’s being watched on our tv. It doesn’t do it when watching on the iPhone. We have a HDMI lightning cable that goes from the phone to the tv and that’s how we watch on the tv as a family. The picture keeps freezing but we will have sound. Or will get super pixelated and freeze but still have sound as well.  We have to back out and go back to the movie several times to get it to work right. We have closed the app and reopened other streaming apps and they all work fine, so we know the problem is the Disney+ app. Frustrated with it. We don’t want to pay for a streaming service that won’t work on our tv for all 6 of us to view as a family. Please resolve this issue. Thanks!

title: Ha ha, no.
review: They really tried. I saw a bunch of commercials for Disney plus including the Simpsons one and many others, and a bunch of snap chats about it. Little did I know that the minute I’d download the app it would say at the bottom of the screen “Start streaming Disney+ with your 1 week free trial, then only $6.99/month.” Heck no. I’m not about to pay $7.00 a month to watch teens auditioning for high school musical. Disney+ is a great concept, and I like that it’s directed for an older audience. However, I can’t stand how apps these days expect you to pay money. No. I give it 2 stars because it’s a great concept and the ads for Disney+ were great, but I’m instantly deleting after writing this review, I’m not paying for this nonsense.

title: Worth it
review: First things first. Disney+ is awesome! I love watching my favorite Star Wars movies and TV shows, and I really love the Hulu+ESPN package. However, I think the most frustrating thing for me right now is that whenever I watch a show, it starts over from the beginning. What do I mean? I’m watching Star Wars rebels and I’m on Season 3 right? Well I take a look around at what other Disney shows there are to watch, however when I return to Star Wars Rebels, the series starts over from the beginning!! S1E1. So Disney I know you’re barely starting this, and you’re doing a great job! I love the content. But please fix this!!!

title: Pretty good
review:
So the pros: the app does what it’s supposed to. It grants access to the Disney+ and streaming is pretty smooth. Both on cellular and WiFi streaming quality is high. The selection is wide, of course, because it’s Disney. 

Cons: sometimes the “continue watching” row will disappear, which is annoying but not a big deal. Some shows and movies aren’t there, I don’t know why but that’s their choice. What is annoying is the lack of a category search or sidebar. 

Overall I’m satisfied. But am interested how the algorithm will adjust to show new content as it gets to know my viewing patterns.

title: Amazing app, you can watch a Disney movie anytime. Anywhere.
review: I love Disney so much and I have been waiting for this app to come out since the day they said they were going to release it. It does not have the very newest movies, but I am so excited to finally be able to watch Disney movies  whenever and where ever I want! Love this app and would definitely recommend buying this because it is 2x less than Netflix, and has so many movies from so many different studios.(Disney,Marvel, Pixar, Nat Geo, and Star Wars!!!!)Would recommend this, great app.

title: Great App but Not the Best Setup
review:
There are a couple things with this set up that doesn’t really work well. For one thing, when I click on a show I am currently watching it automatically plays the next episode. I would rather it just pop up the menu for the show, on the episode I am on, that way I can jump around episode. My other problem is when I search Disney shows instead of showing what is new  or most popular it goes more alphabetically (for example duck tales pops up the older one and the movie first)

Other than that it is a great app!

title: Amazing in Legacy Devices
review: I had a chance to test the quality of the stream and it is amazing! Works great on older iOS devices. Ultra High Definition Video Stream and 5.1 surround sound is amazing?”! Download was fast from App Store and no lagging when using app, login or watching content! They definitely spent money wisely for day one use being perfect. Let us see how it handles in the next few days. Perfect for Family to see Disney Classic that are safer, family friendly for all ages and great way to bond with Disney’s great content from the Disney Vault!! ;)😉

title: Only one flaw I’ve noticed
review: Everything loads and plays perfectly fine, I haven’t noticed the other things people have commented about. The one issue I did notice though, is that when I’m watching something on my phone the screen will develop faint lines going horizontally across and the lighting shifts slightly, almost like a haze. I tried all my other apps and they all worked fine. It’s especially noticeable when the screen goes dark, for example if you’re starting a Star Wars movie and the the screen is a dark space setting, it is extremely noticeable and rather distracting.

title: Missing content
review: I have been binge watching Phineas and Ferb and the order of the episodes are all wrong  which can sometimes take away from its story also I sometimes go looking for episodes I would like to watch and there not there like for example I was looking for the episode The remains Perry the platypus from season 3 episode 34 and the episode that is there is not that episode the episode that is there was this is your backstory not the same or interchangeable also I looked up online there are 222 episodes of Phineas and Ferb but on Disney+ there are 110 not even half therefore missing out on a lot of the story doing the creator a injustice I hope that this is a work in progress and y’all are putting the rest of the episodes on shortly

title: Disney plus is ok
review: I was so excited that Disney plus came out it has tons of Disney movies and shows to watch that we all love if your a Disney fan. I know Disney plus kinda just came out but I was hoping for more new shows but there is a lot of new shows or movies and there is some new tv shows and movies but there not that great. Disney plus sometime doesn’t work because of the WiFi so it sometimes hard to watch if your WiFi no that great. I hope Disney plus come out with more tv shows and movies.

title: Ummm I don’t think so
review: So I saw this app on an ad and immediately downloaded. I was soooo happy and when I opened the app my whole world went down the drain I was sad I was like that’s a downer then I saw the start a free trial button and then here comes another downer it’s only one week........ bro chill I still can’t even get one month 2 downers so far that’s bad you Disney kids sometimes can’t pay for this even if they ask their parents that is U N F O R G I V A B L E!! All upper case that is horrible so Disney thank you for ruining a lot of childhoods and mine I wish I could give this no stars tbh well Disney ya better watch out because you never know when a company can go downhill if you agree write a review with 1 star and write this to know it’s me !Dj! Write that if you agree ugh I am disgusted

title: Play, Rewind and FF Buttons Keep Disappearing
review:
When playing videos the control buttons (play, rewind and fast forward) keep disappearing. Instead, there’s a rotating circle (similar to the one when videos are loading). You then have to exit the video to pause or rewind / FF the video.

Also, can you explain why you added the My List button (“+” button) if you haven’t built it into the app - there’s currently no menu to view the videos I’ve added to my list, so the button / menu is completely useless...

Lastly, besides Mandolorian, the content is fairly old. I’m probably not in your target demographic, but for a guy in mid-30s, there’s not much to watch beyond Mandolorian and NG shows.

title: Good app, but subtitles are a nuisance
review:
My husband and I have been using the app and we really love all of the Disney content being in one spot. We are also obsessed with new content, especially the Mandalorian! 
However, the subtitles are a total nuisance! No matter how many times we turn them off, they continue to default back...even in the middle of a show or movie. Most of the time when the subtitles are deselected, it does nothing! Super annoying for an otherwise good app filled with all of our Disney favorites!

title: Missing content
review: Overall I’m liking this app. Not having the technical problems others experienced. There’s lots of things to watch but it doesn’t have everything. I grew up watching Disney Channel when it was a subscription channel on cable. Where is “Welcome to Pooh Corner”, “Dumbo’s Circus”, “Adventures in Wonderland” “Aladdin: The Series”, “101 Dalmatians: The Series” just to name a few. I’m liking this app for the most part but would like EVERYTHING Disney Channel had to offer, not just the newer stuff since Disney became a free cable channel. That’s barely the chip of the iceberg that is Disney. Doing ok, do better.

title: Won’t Resume where I left off
review: This app is amazing but one thing that is really annoying is that the movies or tv shows that I watch won’t resume where I left off. I use Disney+ on 3 different devices. 2 TVs and 1 phone. It’s really frustrating trying to remember where I left off because it restarts the movie or episode. (This happens on all my devices by the way). I don’t know if any one else is experiencing this but it’s annoying. I wonder if it’s just a big or glitch but I hope it gets fixed soon. It was working fine until a couple of days ago.

title: Love
review:
Nostalgia, new loves and good feelings. Everything Disney including old Disney Channel originals that came straight from my childhood. There isn’t anything to hate about this service except one thing; a “continue watching” feature. 

It’s annoying to have to search for everything that is being watched after having to close the app. It’s a small feature but one that I think would make Disney + perfect. If that gets added, it’ll become a 5 star review for sure.

EDIT: THANK YOU FOR ADDING THE “CONTINUE WATCHING” FEATURE OMG ILY PLZ LOVE ME BACK.

title: Needs a “Continue Watching”!
review:
I definitely agree with other reviews. The content is great, but there is no “continue watching” section like in other streaming apps. You have to save whatever you’re watching to your watchlist, or search for it, anytime you close the app. There’s also no “progress bar” to tell you which episodes of a show you’ve watched already, nor where you left off, so you have to remember. 
Content is great, but I hope these issues get sorted! I would also love to see a “Recommended for you” based on viewing history.

title: Unable to use my account at all after Paying!
review: I have had Disney + for one week now and have been unable to use the app for 4 days and it says it’s unable to connect to my account, please re-enter information but yet I have still been unable to login over many days. You guys took the $7 out of my account and now I cannot even login to watch a single thing. I contacted customer support to which you guys don’t have an email option? Only calling, waiting 30 mins to chat online or through twitter. It’s a waste of time and I guess the servers are over loaded. I don’t know what to do. I’d rather not cancel this month yet since I just paid but I paid for no reason!

title: love it 😩but pleaseeee add a continue watching feature
review: i absolutely love it . definitely better than netflix 🤣✅and thats saying a lot . but i wish yall would add the "continue watching" feature because if i dont finish a movie in one sitting then ill have to go and find the movie and most of the time i forgot what the name of it was , or when im watching a  Series . i get iut of the app for awhile and go back and have no idea what episode i was on. and it doesnt tell you if youve watched it already. so please pleaseeeee add the continue watching .

title: Content amazing- actual app not so much
review: If I was rating this based off content it would be 5 stars hands down. But the actual interface is pretty annoying. It doesn’t ever store which episodes you’ve watched so you have to go back and find it each time. It doesn’t have any sort of memory storage for shows /movies you’re currently watching. Would like to see this updated or fixed. I also wish the National Geographic side had more browsing features so you know what they even offer. But other than that I’m so glad this came out, has every possible show or movie you could think of.

title: love it but..
review: so far i am really loving disney +. it has some of my favorite movies, movies and shows from my childhood, and stuff i didnt even know belonged to disney. i really hate how there isnt a “currently watching” tab though. it gets really annoying really fast when i have to research what i was watching every time i leave the app or stop watching it for whatever reason. i’ve also been having trouble with my captions turning on. every time i open up something to watch or reopen the app to watch something i was watching earlier, the captions come on no matter how often i turn them off. i don’t use the captions at all nor do i share an account so its not because of either of those reasons. i also cant edit my watchlist using my phone and can only do it using my ps4 (maybe computer too but i haven't tried on there yet.) but besides those three inconveniences, i’m really loving it and would recommend to anyone.

title: Wish it could be a 5
review: If you all had a “recently watched” section , that would be awesome. It’s hard to remember what episode I was watching of Gargoyles. A “recently watched” section would be really good. Also, the add to watch list (+) doesn’t indicate that it was added. You can add it and it goes back the + sign. And, you should have a way to have your users manually categorize movies alphabetically or have an automated way where the app does that. If you all can do all of that, your rating would be WAY higher than a 5. And I would be happy to change my review in that regard.

title: Good content, poorly designed app across the board
review: Great content which was expected. The user interface is poorly made, however. There is no “continue watching” feature like every other streaming service.  This is very frustrating and the main reason I gave it a 3 star, because I have to remember where I am located in anything I watch.  There is also no way to personalize the individual users outside of a watchlist and a user character. This feature may get better over time as the service recognizes what I watch consistently, but as of now personal recommendations are more of what Disney wants you to watch.

title: It works great !
review: It’s pretty easy to navigate like Netflix has all the old Disney. Handel movies which I love working good so far ☺️ the only thing I have an issue with is why ? Certain movies said the won’t realease until next year ??? Like what is up with that they aren’t brand new movies either also the new shows that only have 1 episode like madalorian should say when the next episode will be available is it going to be released weekly ? Idk but overall happy with this 👍🏽 also why are some hot shoes like STAR BUTTERFLY MISSING ! 😱😑 and Disney please consider adding lots of free form movies/ shows plz

title: Why release an unfinished project
review: Very frustrating that there isn’t a continue watching. Can’t tell what episodes I’ve even watch so always losing track. It took 2 days for my account to even show in the app so I could start adding show I wanted to watch. Then they tease us with putting show on there but we can’t watch till the end of next year for some reason. Episodes don’t automatically play after one is finished. Every single episode I put on has closed captions and I have to turn them off every single time. Everyone’s giving this app good stars for the content but come on how many competitors do you have with apps that work? Too many for you to get it wrong or tell us you’ll have changes coming next year.

title: So much, for so little a month
review: This app is really great overall. It has all of the movies I could think of and more shows than I ever remember being on when I was younger. It’s definitely worth the price (right now it’s free through Verizon, but I’d still pay the monthly fee for it). The only downside is that there isn’t a continue watching feature, so you have to search for the show/movie you were watching each time you enter the app and it doesn’t save your spot when you leave a show/movie so it starts over from the beginner with each break.

title: Not available on Chromecast
review:
Was really looking forward to the app and then it comes out and is not supported on my Vizio Chromecast tv. Not sure why an application like this would be released without the ability to stream on all smart TVs and devices from the jump. Hopefully there’s an update soon. 

-Update: 
After some thought I figured it might not be Disney’s fault that the app is not supported on Vizio. Maybe it is on Vizio and regardless of who is at fault the app itself is great and provides awesome content. Of course a few updates will be good for the app in the future. I’m enjoying it so far.

title: Disney XD?
review: Disney plus is very great so far. I love that there are all the old shows and movies that I watched as a kid, and now I can rewatch them all. The only question I have is why are there no Disney XD shows? Have I missed something, like are Disney XD and Disney not related? I really wanted to rewatch some of my favorite shows like Pair of Kings, Zeke and Luther, and Kick Buttowski. Overall a super great app. One thing to add would be a “Currently watching” list, that way we can easily click on the shows or movies we’re watching from where we last left off. Thanks! :)

title: Great for fans
review: Disney plus is awesome but many popular Disney shows aren’t on there. Also online it is a little bit glitchy. There isn’t a continue watching thing so every time I want to continue watching something I have to find the show and go back there and find the episode. It is really cool though with the old and new movies plus the icons are really cool. They have like iron Man and r2d2. If you aren’t a fan of Disney I do not recommend it, because then it isn’t worth it. I really recommend it for Disney fans. My biggest problem is the continue watching part. 👍👍

title: Love Disney+ so far
review:
So far I really like Disney+, but there are a couple of features that need to be added. One feature is a way to continue watching. I started watching Star Wars the clones wars and every time I go to continue watching it starts me back at the beginning of the series. So I have to remember where I left off. 
Another feature that should be added is are like and dislike buttons. Just because I watched a show or movie doesn’t mean I enjoyed it. And if I didn’t enjoy it why should you recommend something else based on the thing I didn’t like.

title: It’s...got...everything
review: If you can think of a property that Disney owns, it’s on Disney plus. I was so shocked to find tv shows from old Disney channel from when I was a kid. 2000s shows like Suite Life, That’s So Raven, Kim Possible, and even older shows from the 90s that weren’t supposed to be there showed up, like Gargoyles, DuckTales (old and new), Chip n Dale rescue rangers, and like all the 90s marvel cartoons. Yes, you can watch the X-Men animated series(Which one? All of them) on Disney+. If they keep all these titles year round and release more this is easily worth the 6.99 per month.

title: Launch day hiccups aside, amazing app and content
review: Launch day started with several errors and glitches. However, once all the links were worked out... Wow! This is my new favorite streaming service. I love Star wars, and being able to watch all of the movies and shows whenever I want is amazing. Additionally, some of their other content, including Disney classics, Pixar, and marvel, just keeps bringing you back for more. The app is well designed, clean and creative. I look forward to future content and the world of Disney

title: Very frustrating experience.
review: Would it kill you to let us watch the credits? Would it kill you to to just remember which user was chosen the last time the Disney+ Apple TV app was opened?!? Would it kill you to at least give us more control over the media we’re paying to watch? Let us turn off credits hijacking. How about a setting that lets the same user open the app that closed it? It’s little things like this that are so very unlike old school TV watching that kind of ruin my experience. And do you have to prime us for binge watching? You have our money already.  Just let us watch TV.

title: Great app but one problem
review: Brother bare whenever I try to watch it on my tv screen or on my iPhone it always seems to be in window mode and that annoys me immensely. I’ve tried redownloading it a couple of times but it still looked windowed. So if any of the creators of the all can fix that that be great I’d love to watch the movie in full screen and not the stupid windowed mode. But either then that 10/10 app can watch most of the Disney movies I haven’t seen yet or watch something I haven’t seen in a while

title: Headaches
review: I downloaded this app because everyone was saying that’s better then Netflix but omg this app doesn’t let you finish watching the movie do to errors. At first I thought it was my internet but it’s not. There hasn’t been a movie where I can say I enjoyed watching it with out any interruptions. The movie stops so often that I rewind or fast forward or try to close the app and start again but the movie continues to stop. There has not been a movie that I say I have enjoyed die to the streaming all the time. Netflix at least let’s you watch movies with out the streaming errors.i just canceled my subscription due to the movies and shows always buffering.

title: I LOVE THIS APP
review: This is the best app me and my brother ever had there is many movies and my mom is happy cause everything is for kids and all the movies are there and series I’m just having one thing if I switch the language in my account all the other do and I’m trying to watch a series that is in Spanish but all the other accounts get in Spanish my brother only speaks English so I would really like Disney+ to fix that but everything else is greatttt you should definitely download it and is not expensive at all

title: Premium cost, subpar treatment.
review: The app is clumsily developed. For a service that charges an expensive premium and was known about for a very long time this app feels like it’s in beta.  I couldn’t even stream it without constant freezing and bugs. Refuses to play episodes continually and worst of all it’s got so many restrictions on where I can  “cast” it even though if I really wanted to I could anyway it’s just these things that hinder people wanting to pay for them. The very worst part is when I brought this up during my first month Disney showed zero concern and asked me when I would consider renewing.  They need to seriously cut the price down or fix everything. You can’t even continue watching! There’s no option for it!

title: Where are all the titles I signed up for?
review:
Don’t put titles on my screen if contacts keep me from being able to watch it for an entire year. Like, you expect me to keep your service for a year to watch movies that should be included already? How many times have my kids pointed at what show they want to watch only to be told nope! Disney owns the rights to everything but somehow can’t provide its own content on its dedicated streaming service? 

And no MCU Spider-Man? Limited Avengers? YOU OWN MARVEL. GET THE MOVIES ON THERE. I am going to unsubscribe and pirate all your movies just so it’s one less person lining your CCP supporting pockets, and hey, I’ll get to actually watch the movies I want. Way to go, Disney. I can’t wait to watch you burn to the ground from your own stupidity.

title: Please add a “keep watching” list
review: I think the app is great and I like it a lot, but I really wish there was a keep watching list. This is because I watch a lot of shows at once, and sometimes it’s hard to keep track of. For example, on Netflix I am watching a lot of shows, and when I go on Netflix I know what I’ve been watching right when I log in because all the things I’m watching are right at the top of the list. It would be great if you could add this and be much more convenient for people.

title: Great service, but some things aren’t available yet.
review: I got this service on launch day and so far I really like it. The selection of movies and tv shoes are awesome. However, when you’re browsing the catalog you’ll find more then one time that you’ll go to watch certain things, but they’re not available yet. Some things won’t be available until as far as early 2021! My guess as to why they did this is because they wanted their catalog to look bigger then it actually is. It’s very annoying and makes this service look quite perceptive.

title: One Problem
review: I think that Disney+ is a great app and I even have it on my tv but there’s one thing that makes me angry.. There is not a continue watching or currently watching list. Another thing is, it doesn’t even save the spot you were at!! I was watching a movie the other day and then I had to leave and so I turned of the tv. I come back and don’t remember where I left off so I had to fast forward through the whole movie trying to figure out where I left off. In all I think Disney+ is a great app but I do think there could be improvements. Thank you.

title: Great, but should have waited.
review: Disney has almost all of their movies on here. The other ones are still on Netflix and other various streaming services because they have a contract with these other companies to have them on there. They have stated that once the contracts are up with the other services, they will move the remaining movies and what not to Disney+. In my opinion, Disney should have waited to launch Disney+ until they had all the movies in their possession. But over all, most of the movies, TV shows, and short films are on Disney+ so it’s not a bad choice for a Disney fan!

title: Only a couple of things are missing
review: So I’m pretty much in love with this app. It’s got all of my favorite tv shows as a kid, as well as Disney Channel original movies that I honestly thought I would never see again. There are only a couple of things that i feel would make it better is if there was a continue watching section, so when I stop after an episode or I stop halfway It’s easy for me to get to it and a little white line at the bottoms of episodes to see which ones I have watched would be great as well. I’m excited to see what new updates bring!

title: Profiles for kids
review: I am really enjoying the Disney+ app. My only issue is with the set up of profiles. We set up a profile for my daughter to watch on an iPad, her profile is great and only allows her to watch shows that are approved by my wife or myself. The problem is that she can change to my profile or my wife’s at will, so we will catch her watching “The Simpsons’” or shows that are generally not age appropriate. It would be nice to be able to set the child profiles with a “lock” so they can’t just go to a profile that isn’t appropriate.

title: Error
review: No joke I was super excited about this app and even went ahead a purchased a year of it, 2 days app working great no issues started watching the sweet life on deck great show taking me back to my childhood, 3rd day app keeps saying I’m not connected to the internet, I thought it was glitching so I uninstalled it and reinstalled, nope not it’s saying my account has error, so I go to the website lol it WONT EVEN LOAD TO THE LOG IN SCREEN!!!!!!!!!! And that’s not even mentioning the customer support I’ve been on hold for life chat for half an hour and earlier today I was on hold on the phone for a hour before calling it quits, so disappointing Disney 😢 what type of app are you running where it’ll work to charge people’s cards but got give them service!!!!

title: Amazing!!
review:
The classics, the shows & movies I LIVED through as a preteen, I LOVE everything about Disney+ 
It was so easy to download on both my phone, Roku TV & FireStick! (FireStick was the easiest, it connected me through the phone app.)
Only a couple suggestions; a continue watching section on the homepage would be convenient & automatically picking up where I left off on a show when clicking play vs starting from the 1st episode again and having to click through the episodes to remember where I was 
But honestly, I LOVE it!

title: Missing a key component and movies
review: I’m pleasantly surprised at how well Disney + is doing. It’s awesome. Everything I look for in a streaming service. However there’s no start over feature when watching a previously started movie. I’d rather just watch from the beginning instead of picking up where I left off. Also 2 feature films are missing from the Disney library, Make Mine Music and Ralph Breaks the Internet. I thought you were supposed to have all the feature films there. Cmon Disney, let’s get it done please. Other than those qualms, I love it.

title: Just a few bugs
review: There are just a few minor inconvenience that effect my watching experience and should be fixed. When watching something then trying to rewind and fast forward only works about once or twice before it stops. It makes it harder for me to use the scroll bar if I don’t need to go that far. Also the recommended for you section needs a new algorithm or something because it is everything I’ve already watched. I wish it would actually recommend something i haven’t watched.

title: One little issue
review: The whole app in total is pretty cool 😎 your just in your room watching it on your phone and  chilling but sometimes I want to go to a Disney show but when I do it’s working good and all but they never update the episodes if that show makes more episodes Disney+ doesn’t have them so when a show is made Disney+ adds it and say the show has two seasons and that show updates then they add a season Disney+ doesn’t add it too so I ask that you do a update for the whole app that updates the shows and stuff like that thank you

title: Error 41
review:
I love Disney. I have always been a big fan, and when I heard that they had bought the rights to movies like Anastasia, I was ecstatic. I searched to see if it was on Disney Plus (because sadly I know over 400 movies and shows are missing from the app) and it said it was! I clicked on the link and as it was loading, it said there was an error. Something that had to do with error 41. I was really bummed. Any reason why it did that? Or why over 400 of Disney owned items are not on the app? If anyone could give and answer it would be much appreciated. 
Thank you

title: Great app
review: I love the app, and it has all my favorite movie from when I was younger. I problem is that it drains my battery super quickly and it makes my phone take longer to charge. Usually when I wake up it the morning, and my phone is at 100% and when I get back home from school it would be like 70%, now though when I get home it’s at 10%. My phone is also taking longer to charge because my phone would only take like 10 minutes to get to 50% but now it takes longer other than those 2 problems it’s a great app.

title: Great catalogue but apply still need A LOT of fixes
review: Great content, great catalogue; no complaints there. I’m so glad that the continue watching feature was added in the last update, that was a huge positive. The problem is the watchlist. It cuts off, half of the stuff that I added to the watch list doesn’t show up at all and when I swipe up to load more titles it just re upload the same 20-ish titles that I just went through. when I search the title it show the “+” like I didn’t add it at all and a definitely did. Dealing with the watch list is a headache with these issues. Please fix these problems ASAP.

title: Good content, needs better interface design & streaming issues
review:
Pros- Good content, daily well organizing categories
Issues- Chromecasting is hit or miss, which is frustrating. I’ve checked other apps and for some reason, get the most inconsistency with the Disney app. Sometimes I can cast, sometimes I can’t. Also, if I’m watching a show, I can’t just click the show title and change the episode. I can either continue the episode or re-search for the show, find it, and then select the episode I want to watch. Needs better user interface design.

title: Two things missing.
review: Other than those the app is great. I love watching these things that are not usually on. The first thing people have talked about. It’s the continue watching thing. When I watch a show and go back to it, it either brings me to the start of the season, or brings be the a random point of the episode. Hope that gets addressed. The second thing is a show request. I was looking for a Disney XD show callers mighty med, and it wasn’t on there. It was one of my favorite shows and hope that it could be added. I’m 99% sure it’s made by Disney. Thanks

title: Amazing App if it always worked..
review: Everything about this app is awesome. So many movies and shows to watch! Only issue is that on the FireStick a lot of the HD movies won’t play properly. When an HD movie is selected it’ll either play the movie but you can’t pause it or rewind without the screen staying black, or the movie won’t play at all, and when it’s selected I can hear the audio but the screen is black. It seems the only way to fix this problem is to uninstall the app, and then reinstall it and log in all over again. Seriously hoping they come out with an update that fixes this problem..

title: Great first version
review:
I love the app. Clean, easy to use and lots of search categories. A couple things is there needs to be a  currently watching tab. Something to go back to if you didn’t finish an episode or movie. Right now you have to search the show or movie or go to your watch list and pick the episode or movie  and then fast forward. The other thing is that with TV shows it needs to automatically role forward to the next episode. 

Great app, I’m glad it’s finally here and I’m sure these improvements will be pushed in later developments.

title: Missing some things
review:
I love Disney. And I was beyond excited when Disney+ came out. But it needs some minor changes... (why it isn’t five stars)
I wish there was like a watch recently list so I don’t have to research for a show. Also I wish there was a way to see what episodes you have already watched. When I get into a marathon I want to see how far I am or if I go back to a show I want to see where I left off. But don’t get me wrong I love the platform and I know that these are things that change once it’s been up a while. Forever will be a Disney fan though.

title: Love!
review:
I personally don’t have many complaints about this app I love it and think they will make great money off of it! One think I do think they should look into updating is a “continue watching” option. Unless I’m just looking in the wrong area. For example. Yesterday I downloaded the app and started watching Hannah Montana when I was done I just exited the app. I went to continue watching it today and had to look the show up or go to my watchlist where it then started the show all over. 
Other than that I love the app and will enjoy hours of Disney everyday!

title: Rough on the edges but overall good
review:
Edit: Desperately needs a continue watching card as well as indicators of what episodes I watched already. Every other streaming service I use can doe this, Disney should be able to as well.

Been waiting a long time for this. App certainly has some day 1 issues and bugs but overall is worth it. Profile editing has bugs and not all content is showing up in the lists, one show hung and had to restart, but otherwise it has been working fine. Been enjoying a bunch of classic and new Disney shows.

title: Love it, but...
review: So I love Disney+, it has all my favorite shows and movies. I can watch anytime and anything. Me and my family watch it on our tv all the time. I got it one my ipad and was excited to use it when i was on road trips, but i started using it today, and when i start watching something, at any random time it kicks me out of the app, then i have to go back in, wait for it to load, and then start whiting it again. And it does not happen ones in a show, it happens all the time! I don’t know if it’s just me, bit it’s annoying.

title: Needs fixing ASAP
review: Okay so I’ve been registered for this app since early September. My friend registered merely hours before the app launched. He got into the app perfectly fine, here I am nearly 24 hours later and I still can’t even log in without the app redirecting me to customer service. I realize every app has its bugs at launch, but a problem that’s so bad that I can’t even access the account I own that’s being charged monthly is ridiculous. Using my friend’s login, I was able to see what the app has to offer and it met my expectations. Once I can actually get into the service, I’ll bump my review up to 5 stars. Just please fix these blinding issues as soon as possible.

title: Needs more Tv Series
review: First, I hate the scrolling to the right - to only reveal one new show at a time. Waist of my time.  A positive this may be the first service to not duplicate shows in each category to fake that it has more shows than it does. Last, I am borderline consider canceling because there is nothing to binge watch, there are mostly movies and nothing to keep my kiddos entertained while I make dinner.  After the first few months we have watched and rewatched the movies they like and now I may think it would be cheaper to buy the movies unless they start to release tv series the kiddos may like.

title: Mixed Feelings
review:
PARENTAL CONTROL-There needs to be a feature that allows adult profiles to be locked so kids can’t switch between them and access adult content. Many other services provide this. 

CRASHES/BUFFERING-I have yet to make it through any show or movie without it buffering or saying “something went wrong, try again later”. This is exceptionally frustrating. I even have this issue watching Pixar shorts. Initially, I thought it was my own wireless service, but it’s exclusive to this streaming service. 

AWESOME SELECTIONS-I love the fact that there is so much content and more is being added. It’s great to have it all available in one place that can be easily accessed. 

PROFILE ABILITY-After implementing passcodes, I would love to see the ability to select content based on G, PG, etc. and Youth ratings.  My older child loves some of the documentaries, but they’re not featured in the child profile option. Yet, there is still content on the adult profile that isn’t appropriate.

title: Fix the watchlist problem
review:
So I’ve been using Disney+ since it launched & it’s great!! The only real issue I have is that not everything I added to my watchlist appears on it. There’s several shows & movies that I added and it shows they were added, but they don’t show up in my watchlist. I even tried deleting everything out of my watchlist and starting it from scratch. But no, that didn’t fix the problem.
It’s just kind of frustrating when you go to look for something you added to your watchlist and it’s not there.

title: Just wow!
review:
This is the best app for movies I’ve ever seen, I can watch any Disney or Pixar movie! Such great quality and contains many movies I like, for example, Lady and the Tramp! Me and my sister fell in love with the app! But there is one thing they should do. They should allow Disney+ to connect to tv’s, my tv or my moms tv doesn’t have it sadly, maybe connect Disney+ to all type of TV’s!
Another thing is the internet, but that is understandable, ofc the internet doesn’t work all the time, but I’m used to it! I rate this app 10/10 five star!

title: It can get a little annoying
review: When I am watching Disney+ I really enjoy it. But if my iPad is not on lock it flips right side up and half of the screen is the show I am watching when it should be full screen. So every time I go on Disney+ I have to turn my iPad sideways and lock it. Or when I exit of Disney + and it brings me to my homepage there is a little square where the show is that’s pretty cool. But when I tap on it I press the open up button and it kicks me out of the whole app, or it brings me to Disney+ but then only has a little corner where the show is playing, and behind it, it says video is playing in picture when it should be full screen.

title: Needs some work
review: I love this app. There’s so many great shows and movies, and I can watch them whenever I want. However, sometimes while I’m watching the volume will go from normal to quiet, then loud, the normal again. It’s an endless cycle of me having to turn the volume up and down. If this was fixed my experience on the app would be much more delightful. With that in mind I would still like to say that I highly recommended this app to anyone who loves anything Disney. It’s got new shoes, and the Disney classics.

title: Amazing
review: I’m really happy that this app exists because there is so many Disney movies I haven’t seen or movies that I just love and wanna see again. Disney+ has no problems what so ever on my phone nor Tv I think it’s a wonderful app with plenty of movies to watch with family and friends. But it would be neat if you added Universal Studios to Disney+ since you do have Marvel and Pixar and much more why not add Universal Studios? This is just a suggestion I think it would be a tiny bit better but you do what you want!

title: My account was hacked
review: The Disney plus app was nice while it lasted. It took no longer than a month before my account was hacked. Disney sent me an email saying that my account had been updated when I never changed anything. I went to the app and all of the words had been changed to Spanish but my email was still correct. I was then forced and logged out of my account and could not log in with the same email. When I called the help center, they proceeded to tell me that my email no longer belonged to me and that they were not able to help me with my issue. They kept saying “Disney takes our security very seriously!”, well apparently not because I no longer have access to my account.

title: Garbage app
review:
Frustrating with all these ridiculous errors. Was just using it last night just fine till morning comes, then all of a sudden error 83 decides to screw everything up. You’d think a company that owns half the world would come up with a decent app with little to no problems.

EDIT: I’ve done some tweaking and have discovered that I cannot access my login via App OR the website if I am using my own WiFi. I can only access if I am using my mobile data. I have done all possible solutions by deactivating my router, deleting the app, restarting my phone etc. all to no avail. This is a JavaScript error, meaning this is on Disney+. I will not change my IP address for this app nor will I contact my ISP. This is ridiculous.

title: Bug fixes
review: I so badly wanted to rate higher. But as it is now, the product is riddled with bugs. Right now I tried watching the latest Imagineering episode and it freezes every 5 minutes and skips ahead. I have to rewind to get it to play regularly. Finally it just quit working altogether. When I tried switching back to my cable, the home screen of Disney + was so laggy that I couldn’t switch. Right now I just tried during Disney + on and it’s a black screen. Nothing will load. Why did I pay for something I can’t use? Need to fix or start prorating users for times it won’t work. This isn’t a problem with Netflix or prime and Disney has most advanced tech? Hm.

title: No “continue watching” feature 😣
review:
If you start binge watching a show, be sure to remember where you left off because Disney+ will not indicate which season/episode you left off on. Although when you eventually find the episode you’re on it will pick up where you left off on that particular episode. 

Other than that, the app is great! I hope they release special watch lists such as a Christmas/holiday list or maybe a list of the Marvel MCU movies in the order they came out OR in the order that makes most chronological sense.

title: Abysmal customer service
review: This service was not working on my laptop or roku so i decided to give contacting customer service a try. When i tried to live chat on my phone I waited for over 30 minutes to talk to somebody... for over ten of those minutes it said my wait time was under one minute. Then I chatted with a rep for over an hour and my issue was not resolved. The agent told me that he would escalate the issue and i would hear back. That didn’t happen. When i called a couple days later i was told that it was t even a possibility to escalate... so there was no way that would’ve ever happened. This customer service is truly terrible and they don’t have appropriate troubleshooting and escalation procedures in place.

title: You won’t regret it.
review: Absolutely love the Disney+ app. Don’t question your decision you’ll love it. It’s perfect for the kids and perfect for you when you feel like taking a trip to your childhood. Best part, they finally added a continue watching feature 😂 i can finally keep track of everything i watch! They have many many hidden gems that I completely forgot existed. Netflix is still my #1 because of the diversity. But, As for all things Disney. Nothing beats this app. Best gift I’ve seen in 2019

title: Won’t let you end a subscription
review: I tried to get the Disney plus bundle and once I found out my dad had already did it I tried to cancel mine but the option was never available under billing info. I have been on the wait call for over 20 minutes now and haven’t spoken to anyone. All I’m trying to do is cancel my subscription before the 7 days is up. For such a huge company it’s disgraceful that you would try to trap someone in a subscription. It’s Friday passed noon so there is no reason to why I am not being processed through. You are a huge company as I’ve said so how do you not have enough people to take calls. I’ve tried to cancel my subscription on my laptop, phone and through many browsers. Won’t let me.

title: Great movie and show availability but some obvious glitches and technical difficulties
review: Disney + is a great app idea that has promise in allowing people to watch all their favorite marvel, Star Wars or any other Disney whenever they want, but it was obviously a rushed job. One of the problems is that the screen shrinks seemingly at random and the connection in general isn’t great. It’s also annoying how few movies are actually shown at first. You can find all the ones you’re looking for if you know exactly what you’re looking for. All in all Disney + is a good idea, but the execution is a poor imitation of Netflix and could be so much better if Disney put some decent effort and time into the project.

title: Missing stories
review:
I want to know why if it’s a Disney App: with Pixar, National Geographic, Marvel, Star Wars. Why aren’t there any Disney XD shows like Star vs the Forces of evil, Randy Cunningham 9th Grade Ninja, Motorcity, Jimmy 2 shoes or Kid vs Kat? Also for Marvel, if the MCU bought rights from Fox then why it’s Deadpool/Deadpool 2or any of the X-Men movies or Fantastic 4 movies but the Simpsons are on here? Then for the SpiderMan Collection why is every other SpiderMan series in there but Spectacular SpiderMan nor any SpiderMan movies?
Since having the app it seems Disney only put the most popular or newest version of shows & movies on Disney + instead of all Disney owned shows or shows/movies owned or related to the different categories on Disney +!!

title: Worth the money .
review:
I was so excited when they came out with Disney plus. I love being able to watch shows I loved when I was a child or teen! The only thing I would change is I would like it to play the episode after usually I half to press okay button on the remote and it gets annoying . 
I would also like to see more Disney shows on the app. Examples - liv and Maddie , dog with the blog, ant farm,  Austin and alley , higgley town hero’s . Any show that’s ever been on Disney really .  And it should have all episodes and seasons . I love the app and would recommend it.

title: So much content even at launch!
review:
For those reviews below that mentioned some content not available: Some providers like Netflix, Starz and HBO have a contract for some of Disney’s content. It will eventually expire and land on Disney+. The same goes for movies that have recently been in theaters. Disney will continue to have their blockbuster (major money making) movies in theaters as long as possible before landing on Disney+ (i.e. Live Action Aladdin, Frozen II, etc.) 
In the meantime, there is plenty of content to last years, with more to come!

title: Childish Child Restrictions
review: I am 17 years old, but I work and earn money. With my money I purchased a Disney plus account for the whole family. I’ve been using my account since November. Today, arbitrarily, I was locked out of my account because I am a minor. No notification was given, just an encouragement to call the help desk. Only once I’ve contacted the help desk was I blessed with the understanding of why I’d been locked out of my account. I hate to complain. I love Disney. Growing up, we’d go to Disney World all the time. Just seriously?? If you’re going to add restrictions you need to also add explanations of those restrictions. That’s just common sense. If you get this app, you will enjoy it... unless they decide to take it from you.

title: So so
review:
For the most part the app works fine. I have come across a handful of movies where the audio cuts in and out or completely starts over 3/4 of the way through the movie. Annoying the audio doesn’t match the video and we can’t finish the movie. 
The app on our Visio TV doesn’t work at all. I have to cast from my phone to the TV to watch Disney Plus. Real annoying that I can’t use the built in app on the TV. 
I do like how all 6 members in the house can have their own profile.

title: Good not great
review:
Good streaming service, not great. Two issues right now I’m noticing:
1. When watching downloaded movies offline, if you pause the movie, you won’t be able to pause the movie a second time. You get a rendering icon instead. Frustrating 
2. When finished with a movie, instead of removing it from your continue watching list, the movie remains there. It should be taken off automatically or least give me a way to manually remove it from the list so that it doesn’t get clogged with movies I’ve already finished. 

It’d be great to get these issues taken care of Disney Plus team. Thanks

title: Decent but downloads are pointless
review: Overall the app works pretty good and many of the bugs have been fixed. However, downloads no longer work without an internet connection which defeats the purpose of downloading. Unfortunately a lot of the time that I am able to watch is time that I don’t have any internet so it was great before being able to download and watch later but lately every time I attempt to watch my videos without internet I get an error message so I just have to watch Netflix instead.  I hope that they are able to resolve this issue soon.

title: Great app needs more payment options
review: Great app and I love it. I love the fact I can watch shows from when I was a kid like Darkwing Duck and Gargoyles and the 90s Xmen and Spider-Man series. However it would be great if there were more payment options other than PayPal and credit cards. It would be great if they accepted Disney gift cards (it is a Disney product after all) or even visa/MasterCard gift cards, or if they gave you the option to pay through your apple/android account. Until they do something like this I will not be using the app and not reactivating my account

title: I love it
review: Love it live it love it love it love it. Hello hi hello I love to see your dad is the time I wanna is your birthday and I’m sorry to miss that I hope you’re doing good I’m going home now bye hello bye love ya daddy was the day I got home I wanna is your day love ya bye ya know how much you wanna love ya bye ya know how to get to the thunder bro lol lol love you too much bye ya ya bye bye hello hi hi bye bye hello hi bye hello bye ya hello hi hello bye ya hello bye hello hi hi bye hello bye hi hi bye bye hello hi hi bye bye ya bye bye hello hello bye ya know what you mean by now you can i is this time of my life and my life I will have a great day at home and I’m not going home because my parents don’t want me to go home and bye

title: Great app but missing one feature
review:
Love the layout of the movies and anime. Easy to move around look for what you want to watch but it’s missing to be able to select replay on the series. My daughter loves Mickey Mouse club house and when you select to play it would keep going to the next and next until I reach to the last episode she hasn’t watched. 

I would love to see at least last watched episode and if someone would or haven’t seen let’s say that episode you have seen to be able to select replay. Other then that it’s good.

title: I love this app❤️🥰😍
review: I love this app it’s the best thing that came out that i can teach my son that there’s more to these new shows but i wish they had a continue to watch feature to where i can watch it where i left off plus a as all the movies that was once on there an that been out for some time aren’t on there this is not a hate comment or anything i would just like to know when are the other updates coming to the app i just wish more features was introduced in the beginning but love the app brings back so many memories

title: I already love this app
review:
I love this app already. I have no complaints. 
But I do have a couple of ideas: a resume play for a movie you paused and left after a while. For shows I really hope they bring back the classic. I remember an Aladdin series, jungle book kids. Some movies (the classic Beauty and the Beast for example) have a “deleted” song (Human again was the song) I was thinking a select button to choose if we would like to watch the extended movie version or the original version.

title: A lot of glitches and other things
review: I will give this a solid 4 stars because of the glitches involving playback where the video stutters but the audio continues playing. The extra star could be earned back if you guys fix this while adding a recently added category as well.  Could you guys also fix the order of the episodes of Ducktales 2017?  The 1st and 2nd episodes of Season 1 are in the 3rd and 4th episode slot and the order of Season 2 is so scrambled that I have to use Wikipedia to figure out what episodes are in correct chronological order.

title: Streaming Through Chromecast Issues
review: I love this app so far. Would have given it 5 stars, but a few issues prevented me. First, when streaming through my Chromecast, shows and movies do not stream in 5.1 Dolby Digital (DD) even though they state they do.
