I have checked all settings on my home theater system and have tried other streaming apps with no issues with those apps streaming 5.1 DD. Second, when I link to my Chromecast, and try to resume a movie or show, the show or movie starts over every time I try to resume it. Please fix these issues!

title: So far so good
review: I’m pleasantly surprised by Disney+! I’m not a fan of the new Star Wars films or what’s being done to the Marvel movies, but decided to give this a try for Mandalorian and the upcoming Obi-Wan series. The app runs perfectly for me so far and the movie selection is pretty good. I hope the selection improves to include more adult  monster/thriller/sci-fi type movies in the future, since Disney basically owns them all now. Mandalorian was excellent, btw! If you have kids or are a Disney movie buff, this service is a no-brainer.  So far, Disney+ is a 5 star steaming service.

title: Not worth it , can’t even sign up
review: I’ve tried to sign up for Disney plus on my iPhone 11 Pro Max and I Enter my email and a password to sign up and it brings me to a “call this number for support” so I call the number and the robot on there tells me it will take up to 10 minutes so I waited and nobody answered I waited for 25+ minutes and still no answer from support I’m really disappointed in their customer service I also tried the 1 on 1 chat customer service and I had to wait 8 minutes when I was messaging the lady I told her what happened and she said “oh, no” and “I will help with that” so I waited and she didn’t do anything with helping I sat there for nothing. Waste of my time. Don’t even bother with this app.

title: Austin&Ally
review: i have been watching/using disney plus and i notice that this particular disney show that people loved as kids is not on there austin&ally i loved that show as a kid and still do and i would loved for you guys to put it on your app i love the app everything about it is great it has all the shows i have watched as a kid😌 just that particular show i know i shouldnt make a huge deal out of it but it was a very good show as any other disney shows and new shows as well thats all i ask from you guys is to put Austin&Ally on your app for kids and me to watch it

title: Bad Streaming App, good content
review: Although this app has many mistakes (spelling errors in desc, episodes being off like episode 1 is actually episode 15) it does have good content when it is working. One of the issues I had with it is theyre choice of what shows get added on, and which don't. Lab rats was added, BUT they included the episode of lab rats and mighty med crossover, and since they don't have mighty med in the app, you only watch part 1 and can't watch the other one. When asked about this they said it might be a region issue, but for a show created in the US? That's a very strange response to give anyone. And if it's about deals they made, why not add it and give the time it shows up like they did with infinity war?

title: Desperately needs fixed.
review: I have had this app since it came out like most people. My 6 year old daughter loves it and I love it half the time smh. I stopped paying for this after always with the rotating circle would stop me from watching anything then it finally kicking me out. Saying sorry there was an error. They want to blame the WiFi but everything else works flawless and fine with no issues. I decided to give it another chance because it is amazing and has so many options and makes me feel like a kid again but they really need to fix this cuz it’s garbage and is enough to make to stop using it again. It is ridiculous smh.

title: Loving this app😁😁😁
review: I suggest this to anyone who likes movie you get one year free but that is only Acording Sometimes you will find that you get only one month of disney plus this is something that is able to add on a tv I would say this app can get kids less screen time and more family time this does not include  horror movies you can get this on phone , tablet different lectronics this also has princess movies the newest lion king,pirates of the Caribbean 1 out of 10 I am gonna go for 10 good luck

title: App issues
review:
Glad to use the app and have the movies and shows available but the app on Apple TV and on my phone has so many issues. 

Today I was watching a movie and clicked out of it. Even though the movie wasn’t playing and I was scrolling through the menu the audio for the movie kept going. Won’t stop. Can’t figure out how to get the audio to stop playing for a movie I’m not watching. Even when starting another movie, audio plays over another movie. Even tried logging out, audio kept playing. Then couldn’t log back in even though password was correct because I wrote it done. Even the phone verify log in wouldn’t work. 

Seems every other day there’s some type of problem with it. Couldn’t use it at all two days ago for no reason just said the app couldn’t load or there was some connectivity issue even though every other app worked. 

Disney needs to get there developers to fix the increasing issues.

title: Disney half a plus
review: I think that this app is wonderful but there is one flaw. Beauty and the Beast irl only shows the trailer. If it is really a Disney app, it should have all the real Disney movies including the ones that have recently come out. If we are paying a lot of money for an app, we should get all we deserve. Disney would be very disappointed if we don’t get to see ALL the movies that they have made. That would be very bad for the app and no one wants an app that doesn’t do what it was meant to do. I think y’all can do much better than that.

title: Looooove
review: Love the app and all the shows/movies!! Taking me back through my childhood for sure. Only two issues I have been having with the app is 1. When I add shows/movies to my “Watchlist”, it disappears after watching one episode or even without watching it. I like to have a list so that it’s easy to navigate to what I’d like to watch but so much falls off the list that I’m constantly always having to re-add things to my list. 2. On the ps4 the app has had a bunch of trouble force closing. It’d also be great if they’d add Proud Family show, not just the movie.

title: They have some work to do.
review:
My family loves the channel. Our biggest complaint is it does not show you which episodes you have watched and it does not have a resume key. We have young children and limit their TV time and sometimes stop shows in the middle of a show. We often only let them have one or two at a time, so it is helpful to know which show they watched last. Since, they like quite a few different shows I can not tell which was the last one they watched.
I hope Disney fixes this quickly.

title: Absolutely love it but...
review: When I use Disney plus on my PS4 I have a various of problems. The first few days I used it(disney+), it was great! But the past few days I can’t even get through a episode! Everything I try to watch, from shows to movies the screen will buffer then stop with the audio still playing.... when I try and exit out, it does the same exact thing. I’ve even tried disconnecting my internet and trying iit again like that but it’s the same issues. I love the idea of this and I love watching all my old favorites shows and movies but I wish I didn’t have to go through this😪

title: Released too soon?
review:
We got Disney+ for the Marvel and Star Wars media and it hasn’t disappointed there. That’s worth 3 stars right there. 
What’s missing are some really basic streaming service features. A watch list that is easily accessible from the top screen as well as a “continue watching” feature. Additionally, watched movies and episodes aren’t marked so you have to go back through each I social show season and find where you left off. 
Not binge friendly. 
I imagine that Disney’s knee-jerk reaction to put out the platform now has more to do with a severe case of FOMO. Makes me appreciate Netflix all the more.

title: Only one MAJOR issue
review: Love the app! My childhood memories are all coming back! However, I wish that there was a “Continue Watching” section (kinda like Netflix has)! It’s kinda frustrating having to remember what episode of a show I’m on and having to search for it! Also, if I have been watching an app-only show, tell me when there is a new episode!! Frustrating when I’m watching High School Musical: The Musical: The Series...I watched the first episode and then I had NO CLUE that the second episode came out! Really annoying but fix these and Disney+ will be golden!!!

title: Good but needs work
review: I love Disney+ takes most of my time or used to. You see me and my sisters always watch our favorite shows and movies, but since school is almost out, I won’t have time with all of my homework I should be doing on the weekends. Me and my mom have been waiting for Cinderella, Beauty and the Beast, and a couple more to come out and since I’m not in elementary anymore, I will have a lot more homework for my 8 classes and I won’t have time to watch any of the movies. Overall, I recommend this app because it’s hundreds of movies for free.

title: Needs work
review: I’m okay with the content they have, although more Disney channel original movies like Model Behavior and My Date With The President’s Daughter would be great but my biggest problem with this app is that there’s no place on your home screen to continue watching a show or movie that you’ve already started but weren’t able to finish in one sitting. So I have to search for it every time I wanna continue watching something. You’d think after having so many streaming apps available to draw inspiration from, they would have done this. But leave it to Disney to not think practically

title: Disney plus
review: I really liked how you had all the shows of Disney. Also you had a lot of stuff  that weren’t just Disney. But the real bad part that I wish you guys would have Austin and ally as a show on Disney plus because my family and me use that show to bond. We love music so we always to watch music shows and movies. So I wanted me and my family to use music to bring us together. Another thing is you guys should put in season 2 and 3 of Violetta. We love it that you have season 1, but we really would like season 2 and 3 because the show is all about music and that would help. Overall the app is amazing.

title: Contents good,just need better app
review: Hey, so I enjoy the content, I just need a better interface. Make episodes im watching go to the episode im watching when i hit play, getting tired of having to scroll to find the episode i was on. Also watchlist should not be hidden in the back, it should be the first thing I see, or at the least a button to make it easier to access. Lastly let me choose an autoplay feature so i don’t have to manually select the next episode. Other than that everything looks good, i enjoy the content and the everything else about the layout doesn’t bother me that much.

title: Couldn’t have expected anything better
review: I’m giving this app a 5 star review only because they went above and beyond with having so many movies and shows that I had totally forgot about but I’m glad I can watch them all over again.. the only one small thing, I wish they had a “continue to watch” tab where I can stop watching an episode and come back easily instead of remembering where I left off. But I know this is only the beginning, Thank you so much Disney.

title: Love it!!
review: So far I am in love with this app! It has all my favorite movies growing up as a kid. Yes, the app has it's glitches but come on, it was just launched, give them some slack and time to work them out! The only problem I've had so far is the buffering throughout a movie. It Could also be my internet. All in all a great idea and an awesome investment for anyone who loves Disney! Suggestion for everyone having issues; uninstall the app, wait a minute before re-downloading, restart your phone, and log back in.

title: Super thrilled
review: I am super duper happy about this! I can relieve my childhood all over again! The only thing I would say to fix would be when watching TV Series to be able to keep track on what episode we leave off on. Right now I need to figure out what episode I left off on. Maybe also add a continue watching section. Other then those two things I am obsessed and I was so happy I was off today from work for other engagements and I have been binging different old school stuff!!!!!!

title: So far its ok
review:
There are some pretty awesome shows up for viewing; like Darkwing Duck, Gargoyles, Huck Finn (JTT version). There’s some good looking documentaries, and some cute shorts I am looking forward to watching. They also have what looks to be all of the Marvel movies, I haven’t thoroughly checked though. 
Right now I’d have to give it 3 stars due to the fact that I kind of expected more out of Disney+. Idk I might come back to change my review after I check it out better. I think I was just expecting to see more content. Disney+ is just for Disney stuff and Netflix is for everything else (anime, cartoons, movies, shows, KDrama, novelas, documentaries, etc).

title: good content, meh app
review:
I used to love watching Disney content like Phineas and Ferb or Star Wars franchise on Netflix and when Disney took away some of my favourite Disney shows I was heart broken. 

I never wasn’t compelled to purchase a Disney subscription at first because I had heard of all of the lag issues and how it still performed like a Beta app but when I changed phone services I got a year free of Disney. 

I would like to say the only reason I may continue to stay subscribed is because of the content. 
The app itself has many problems. 

It doesn’t keep your progress through the show in series and the episodes lag out and shut the app down frustratingly often. Then you have to restart your device or delete and reload the app which is incredibly time consuming and irritating.

Other than those issues and inconveniences, the app has proven to be a great service provider especially with the offline download feature despite the downloaded content not even being reachable at times.

title: Improvements
review: Don’t get me wrong the app is great....it just needs improvements. I’m not sure if there’s something wrong with my phone or it’s just the app itself but whenever look for movies and tv shows I put a checkmark for I can’t find it. It’d be great if Disney + included a “My List” category so you can easily go to the shows/movies you wanna watch. I also think they should have all the shows/movies on the same page. (When I go on the app I suddenly find new shows/movies I didn’t see before) like how come I couldn’t find them before but they just suddenly popped on my catogorys.

title: Picture in Picture mode please consider!!!
review: First off, I love the app and I love to watch it on my iPad. Which means I can watch it pip (picture in picture). I love that feature because I can play a game or do digital art while watching Disney shows and movies. However if i am watching a show while in pip at the end of the episode instead of playing the next episode automatically it just restarts that episode. On Netflix for example it auto plays the next episode while in pip. So if possible I would love this feature to be added!!!!

title: Absolutely amazing
review: This app is amazing I absolutely love that there are a bunch of shows to watch there are Disney movies, series and the girl asks a question clips are historical but there are a few Disney shows that aren’t on there that I would love to watch like Girl meets world and Liv and Maddie and thats the only problem for me but besides that I can watch anything Disney that I can think of so if ur a Disney fan and u got a few hours u should get this ASAP and to the people that made this ur work is stunning and I love this app so much and I appreciate what u do thank you!!!😁👍🏻😍🤩🥳

title: It’s a great app but very buggy
review: I downloaded the app had it for several days and it worked great then just today I clicked on it and it kicked me out of the app and I couldn’t open the app and I turned off the iPad and tried to open the app and it still didn’t work so I deleted it in hopes that I would be able to redownload it but I couldn’t and at least every 20 minutes of watching my show it would pause go all blurry and take at least 5 minutes to load but yet I love this app and it’s very nice to have

title: Great Except One Thing
review: Really good app overall. Great library, great selection of Atmos and Dolby Vision content. But I watch primarily on Apple TV and also frequently use its “reduce dynamic range” function to make loud audio less loud when the kids are asleep. Every other Apple TV app lets you toggle this setting right in the app alongside audio language and subtitles. But not Disney+, I have to go all the way out to the Settings app. If you insist on having a custom video UI, Disney, at least expose this setting! (Using the standard video interface would be even better.)

title: Perfect
review: I use this on my phone, iPad and also tv. My dad bought this app a couple of months ago now and I could watch anything I’d like that’s Disney :D even if I wanted to watch it when I’m supposed to do school work tehehe 🙃. This is even better than Netflix bc this has all my shows and movies. My cousin has this too so if she calls she probably wants to watch forky asks a question or idk do something even if I come over we’ll definitely watch a little of forky. Ty for reading -Eliza

title: Best thing ever!!!!
review: Dear disney i am a huge disney fan so this app has been amazing. The app is very good quality and has been amazing for quarentine. It entertains me so much and it literally has all the shows and movies ever from not only disney but from marvel etc. Thank u so much for this app. One thing that i wish it had was more marvel movies like spiderman far from home etc. But other than that This app has all my favorite shows from when i was younger and is the best thing ever. I luv it soooooo much. Thank u!

title: AMAZING! 💞🤧✌🏼
review: Alright we have to admit, this app is spectacular! As soon as I got the app I entered a whole new universe! I didn't know where to start! But I have a situation, I am not positive if it is just my tv acting weird but as soon as i start a movie, episode, etc, the camera quality isn't that good. But soon it improves! This is the only problem I have overall this app is amazing and totally worth it! I highly recommend it if your looking for something Disney, Pixar, you name it! Thank you for creating this!

title: It’s a great app!
review: Hello! This app is very great, it has every Disney movie you can ever think of and I hope to see like frozen 2 on it sometime! But I would love if you can like make it like Netflix like when your watching a movie and you close the app and it’s still playing but on Netflix it plays the next episode but for Disney+ you have to close the thing you’re doing and go to the next episode, once again this is a great app! But I would love if you can fix that please! Thank you 💗💗

title: Needs lots of fixing
review:
I never do reviews but I’m frustrated how every time I try skipping ten secs of a movie it ends up loading for a whole minute. Also when I get out of the apps without stopping it it doesn’t save where I was at or the play button gets screwed up. And finally sometimes when I tap the screen it takes me out of the movie because I was too close to the title. 
All this things are so small yet combined together while you’re trying to relax is extremely frustrating and they haven’t fixed this yet even though they’re filthy rich. They have absolutely no excuse.

title: App needs work. Pushing lgbtq agenda to kids
review: Love the old content unlocked. Access to some great classics. The new high school musical does try to normalize lgbtq+ agenda and sways away from original kid friendly movies. My daughter loves the high school musical movie series and I found really no problems with it but, the new one is on another extreme. It opposes what Walt wanted from his brand and what I have come to expect from Disney as a parent. Walt valued keeping the innocence of children. Not putting adult issues in the content but, that is just not what we are seeing from Disney. The app has quite a few glitches. Some titles do not work at times. Buffs when I have the highest speed of internet.

title: Amazing
review: Disney+ is the best streaming app so far because you can watch ALMOST any Disney or marvel or Pixar movie or show. But I have to say that I was a little irritated when I found out that some movies and shows were not available on the app. In addition to that some shows for example Marvel’s Runaways there were two seasons out when Disney+ came out yet only one season was on the app once the third season came out there was still only one season available. Otherwise I absolutely love the app and watching all the older Disney movies and shows.

title: Excellent start
review:
It’s a great start for Disney’s first streaming app, and it seems to have picked up features from
other apps that users like (skipping the intro is still something other apps could incorporate). The service still misses out on key elements of streaming: where is recently watched content? how much progress has been made through interrupted content? Pressing play on any series starts from the beginning S1E1 no matter how much of the series has actually been watched on the service. Overall, great start and would be epic with updates.

title: I need help
review: Ok so I love the app, its great. Bringing back my whole childhood back. So I try to watch it all the time. My mom just payed the account and I’m trying to log in to my phone. But it keeps saying “we’re sorry, but a problem has occurred when trying to activate your subscription. Please try again later, When service is restored, your device will be activated automatically” however will my t.v it is already activated. In fact I’m watching Aladdin 1992 right now. But I need to be able to entertain my siblings while we aren’t home. So I really need to be logged in. That’s the only this I need fixed. Thanks Disney💕

title: Most bugs fixed but missing some tv series
review: An update, most bugs with voiceover have been fixed as far as I can see. And rewinding shows is working better and restarting stuff works better since i turned off autoplay in my profile. But disney plus is missing some movies and shows. First, a movie which deserves a 5-star-rating which you are missing is Song of the South 1946 movie. Disney Plus is also missing the Aladdin tv series. And if possible please put on some of the 80s and 90s cartoons that used to come on fox kids. Thanks.

title: Please Fix/Add!
review: I love everything Disney+ offers, but like everyone else is saying, PLEASE add a, “Continue Watching” section! It’s really annoying to look for all of the shows/movies I didn’t finish. Also, when I try to watch, “Simpsons” and press play it restarts from S1E1. And there’s no indication of where I last watched (Netflix has a white bar on the episode to show you if you watched it or are halfway) so it’s annoying spending a few minutes just trying to figure out where I am on a series. Please fix these issues and it would be 5 stars!

title: Good but needs some improvements
review: I would rate 5 stars but I don’t like it doesn’t have a “continue watching” option. I don’t like to continuously search for my show and even then, you have to go find what episode you left off on because if i just push play, it starts at season 1, episode 1. One last thing, I don’t like that it doesn’t automatically go to the next episode when the episode is over. Other than those small things, this is a great app for the whole family to enjoy!! I am very happy to have this app.

title: Love it but need to fix some things!!!
review: One huge thing is when you come back to the show you’ve been watching and press play, it starts back up on the very first episode instead of going to where you left off. Please get that fixed. One other thing is when you put the subtitles you have to put them on every time you start a new episode or movie. This should stay on all the time until you manually take it off. Other then that the shows and movies on it are amazing!! Just fix those two things!!!

title: Great!! But a few more things could make it a lot better
review: I love love LOVE the selection!! Most, if not, the entire catalogue is worth watching to some degree. However, a few small things could make big differences. For example, a currently watching list would really with navigating the app. Another thing that I would really appreciate is knowing where I am in a show or movie and resuming from where I left off. These small changes I feel could make a much better experience. I give three stars because I thought that a company like Disney would think to do something like this for the launch😒

title: Loving it!
review: I’ve been using the Disney+ app since it was released on Nov 12th and I’m absolutely loving it, I’m not experiencing any of the same problems some have. However I do have a recommendation of adding a continue watching section. It’s kinda a pain to have to go to the search feature and type in what you were in the middle of watching and had to pause and come back to later. (Not all of us are 3 with nothing better to do than watch something all the way through, lol) I hope to see this in the future updates soon!

title: Nice app with one exception
review: This is a really nice app, but needs one major improvement. Otherwise I would have given it five stars. In all other streaming services you have a “continue watching section”, and a “watch from the beginning or where you left off” option. This service has neither, at the moment. Which means you have to remember what episode you where watching when you paused the show. Not a big deal, but just a pain. Considering it was just launched yesterday, I assume they will add these features. All in all very good app.

title: Love it could use something though
review: I have had Disney plus since it came out and I love it. I  get to watch all my favorite shows and movies but, when I am watching and I get off because I want to watch a different show for a little bit it doesn’t save my spot. So I have to locate where it was again. Also they need to have a space to put the episodes like a “ Continue Watching” area so it is easier than going and trying to find the show again. Thank You.

title: Were is Encahnted?
review:
Dear Disney+

   I absolutely love Disney+. I’ve watched so many movies and shows like Snow White and the 7 dwarfs, Jessie, Finding dory and more. One day I wanted to watch the 2008 Enchanted movie. I looked it up on Disney+ and it wasn’t there. I assumed that it wasn’t a Disney movie so I checked on Google and it was a Disney movie. So can you please put that movie on Disney+ because I love it. Also it was smart of you to put newer movies like frozen 2 on Disney+  because of the coronavirus outbreak. My younger sister is OBSESSED with frozen and frozen 2. So can you fix Enchanted?

Thanks from Layla

title: New Standard in Streaming
review:
The new Disney Plus streaming service is a game changer in the entertainment world, and puts me one step closer to “cutting the cord.”  The variety and abundance of programs are well balanced to satisfy all members of our family.  Once the licenses for a number of movies expire within other streaming services, and are added to this app, it’ll get even stronger.

The only improvement I would suggest is to create a “continue watching” category by profile, or allow viewers to resume a paused program.

title: Needs better updates
review: Okay so Disney plus a a good app and all. BUT I have the app in my phone and there is Times where I go to click on a show and it tells me “oh oh something went wrong with playing ( name of show or move)” and i literally would not be able to watch it for days to a week because im not able to steam anything, so I updated the app and it still is saying the same thing. I believe they need to fix this problem fast. Because I feel like it’s literally a waste of my money if I’m not able to view any of the movies days because of this problem.

title: Amazing, and magical!
review: Disney + is amazing! Me personally, I love Disney so, so, so much, and everything to do with it, the films, the shows, the Parks, they’re all so magical, and they create memories for a lifetime, and especially me, because I’m a big Disney fan. I love Disney, from infinity, and to beyond! I just want to say, Disney has really reached for the skies on this one, like always, and created something magical, again, like always. I’ll say it again. I. Love. Disney, so, so, so, so much!!! Thanks Disney, and we all hope to see you soon!

title: Only one issue
review: The only thing that makes me mad is that some of the movies you can’t watch till a later date like pirates of the Caribbean, maleficent, Alice in wonderland though the looking glass, solo and much more I just think we should be able to watch this too like those movies Came out a few years ago and toy story four and frozen 2 are already on there I know there both  like really popular movies but I just think we should have the other movies too

title: Amazing
review: When I saw the trailer for this service I was amazed that there was going to be tons of shows and movies, the show I have been enjoying the most is The Simpsons. However I feel like there is a little bit room for improvement. One is that I’m not a fan on how old seasons of the Simpsons are cropped and when I try to go back while watching a movie the pause and skip 10 sec button was loading everytime and that you should make a menu that show’s upcoming titles. But overall, a very solid streaming service.

title: It’s Mid-road
review:
I like the app, but 2 suggestions, one of which you might do. Give an option where you can see all your downloads on 1 screen (the option I expect you to do, as it’s just human decency) and the second option being release more of your marvel and Star Wars titles. Such as releasing all episodes of the animated series of both franchises on the shows you currently offer, and that’s what I know you won’t do until you finish milking those cash cows.

Thank you Disney... I think?

I’d pay a little 50% extra for these options, but you obviously know cash better than I do

title: App great but not so for support
review: The app and content are great but I’ve been having trouble with support. I purchased a gift subscription for my in-laws on 12/24 and provided the wrong email (my fault and I def take responsibility for that). Within a few hours of realizing my error, I contacted support and provided the correct email. It’s been frustrating ever since trying to get this resolved. I’ve contacted support numerous times looking for a status update and all I get is that it’s prioritized with the higher up dept. Wondering if they just don’t have enough resources to work on issues. I think they’re trying to summon Walt Disney himself from the dead to fix my issue.

title: Error 83 is such a great show I can’t even
review: This is literally the worst streaming app I have ever seen. You think all the money Disney makes they would at least design a better system. It is not compatible with Samsung TVs that are 4-5 years old. If you use those, hate to burst your bubble, but you will get error 83 instead of baby yoda. Good luck getting help from the site too they don’t help anyone who mentions error 83. They’ll tell you to DM, but never answer you back. I have tried everything. I have tried to play it on my laptop and hdmi wire it to the tv, that worked for two days then I got error 83. I’ve been at this for hours, I have tried everything I’m angry and really wanting to punch a mouse right now.

title: Nice but needs some work
review: I like the app in general. One of the biggest downfalls I have is that auto play doesn’t work when the tablets are plugged in. I tried on both kindle and iPad. When we travel we set the kids up to watch a series and since it doesn’t auto play we the parents have to manually tell it to play since our youngest can’t reach the screen from the car seat. This doesn’t happen with Netflix. This is only an issue when plugged in. When the device is unplugged auto play works correctly.

title: 5 stars for content.  1 star for poor 4K and HDR implementation.
review:
The title says it all.  No need to discuss further regarding content, it is quite amazing to have so much at hand to watch.  However there is another matter at hand.

4K HDR.  Yes I initially streamed via Chromecast on a Samsung KS8000.  I tested using the Mandalorian.  The blacks and contrast levels were low but I figured that was part of the show’s aesthetic.  Not the case at all as I decided to watch The Winter Soldier.  The colors appeared so washed out and dark it was unbearable.  I switched to my Samsung’s native Disney+ app and while I only get 1080p SDR content, the colors and contrast levels were far more pleasing to the eye and accurate.

Please investigate and update the app accordingly.  The 4K HDR content is sadly very disappointing.

title: Ok
review: Disney+ has lots of great shows but it doesn’t always have what I’m looking for so I sometimes just get really bored and I’d say it’s not the best for road trips because it’s easy to watch all of the good movies and there’s tons of like annoying ones but there’s some good movies in there I’d say it’s OK it’s not amazing and it’s not horrible it has good movies and that at least has movies for adults there’s nothing inappropriate and there’s movies and TV shows for little kids for learning and for everything in between i’d say it’s a four star rating

title: Needs work
review: I love the content and overall Idea of it. but on there next update they should put and continue watching section or a watch again section it’s vary annoying to have to search but I have to watch every single time I get out of the app. I also wish they would do a little bit more work on the Disney+ from phone to TV connection because I have a ox cord that I use to plug in my phone to the TV so I can play movies from my phone on my TV and every single time I plug it in without a doubt it always freezes stops or has a blank screen but still plays audio.

title: Love this app.
review: I love this app. Get to watch all my favorite Disney movies, shows, and the mandalorian. I love the fact this is cleaner then Netflix and cheaper. I found shows I watched as a kid and movies I’ve seen growing up. Plus all the marvel and Star Wars are on the app.  Recommend this app over Netflix. I feel like I have more options then Netflix. Which is wonderful. It’s family friendly which I great. Not many  things are family friendly. Plus kids friendly. I hope it stays family friendly. 😀!

title: Disney. All Your Dreams Come True
review: What bad is there to say about this app? It has anything and everything people of all ages could want. Old programs, new programs, younger shows, older shows, all the classics and even soon to be classics. It’s hard to beat when Disney has been such a household name for us all and now we have access to continue that with the next generation. No more hunting DVDs and Blu Rays, Disney has given us all access to our childhood. Let your imagination run free and enjoy this amazing app.

title: The best app!! would recommend!! Please add this one show though!
review: This app is truly amazing! i don’t have cable at my house so i can watch all my childhood shows whenever i want to.... one thing, there is this one show that i would love to have on here. it’s called “Backstage” i loved this show however they took it off netflix so i can’t watch it anymore but it would be great if it was on here! also thank you so much for adding “Once upon a time”! Again this app is the best!!

title: Good just one problem
userName: to can play that video game
review:
So Basically it’s very good and well put in to but. Theres a problem that might affect how much people download this app and see this bug.
Idk if anybody has the same problem but when your watching a movie like I was watching I think it was Christmas Cronicle and all asudent. The screen freezes but the dialogue is still playing it go’s on like this for 30 seconds the resumes the 
Screen and replays the audio all over again. Just a suggestion to fix this bug. But overall this is a great game. :)

title: I love it but...
review: It has a few bugs which is reasonable considering it’s still fairly new. Right now, I can’t resume a movie without it failing to connect (it’s been a consistent problem for me), so I logged out of the account to re-login only for it to say its having issues connecting to my account. I don’t think I can be the only one experiencing these issues and I want to keep using the app, so I really hope this can be fixed soon. Other than that, I love being able to have all of my childhood shows so easy to access.

title: Needs a lot of work..
review: This app does not represent rightly Disney’s motto of perfection by any stretch, and here is why. When watching any multi episode season the app doesn’t say what episode number your on. Usually this would not be a problem but when you get to the end of an episode it does not take you automatically to the next one. On top of that there is no forward or backward buttons to jump forward or back episodes. So for example if you are in a monolithic series like clone wars you have to remember exactly which episode you are on then you have to traverse back though all the seasons and episodes wasting time just to go to the next episode. Yes the app looks nice, but what a painful experience..

title: Good App, VERY Glitchy
review:
The past couple of weeks haven’t been so great with this app. Just to point out when you go to the download section it occasionally crashes. Also crashes right when I open the a
App sometimes and have to open it repeatedly. Also what’s with delete your shows from playlists tried finding drain the oceans in the natural geographic section and it was there! Had to go all the way searching it up. Failed app, good content.

title: No way to control or adjust HD
review:
Not everyone on the planet has unlimited
Internet. Disney+ does not give the user any control of their “viewing experience,” and thereby not blowing through 600G of data in a week. How can a global company like Disney not offer the option to adjust the resolution so that families, all families, can enjoy the shows? As it is, we get to watch maybe one or two per week so we can save enough of our internet package for other things. And now the the whole planet is in lockdown and we can’t even watch movies for a distraction from what’s going on. Thanks Disney. I don’t know who is greasing you’re palm but they are clearly more important than the people who made you huge. Walt would not approve.

title: Content ok, app is pretty terrible
review:
The app itself has some issue that can get quite annoying after the first couple of days. Doesn’t remember where you were up to, doesn’t sync between web and app, the skip ahead takes your continuous pressing as a suggestion etc.
Also, there is the content quality is very bad. Guardians of the Galaxy 2 the sound volume varies from so quite you can hardly hear it with iPhone volume on high to blasting out so loud that you can hear it three rooms away.
I would wait a year before getting it for Disney to fix all the bugs!

title: Great app but DEFINITELY needs work!
review:
Having Disney+ is awesome and brings back so many memories, however over the past weeks there have been some issues:

1) I wont allow me to add any more shows/movies to my watchlist; I’ll add something, go to my watchlist and its not even there as if i never added it! So i have to search for it every time I'm ready to watch more.

2) “Skip Intro”could use some work, it will only skip to about less than halfway into the intro. Might as well watch the intro lol

3) Certain shows and movies that I'm resuming have not saved my progress and i either have to start the movie over and wait for it to fast forward, or spend my time trying to find the episode i was on which makes it very difficult 
 
I know i wrote a lot lol but if this helps you guys out or if anybody is having the same issues as me this will hopefully let Disney know these are problems that make it hard to fully enjoy the app with ease !

title: For nerds and fellow nostalgic 90s kids
review: This app has everything a kid at heart wants, it’s not as perfect of an app as Netflix but it’s very close and has much more movies and tv shows that us nerd enjoy. Almost everything marvel, Star Wars, Pixar! The major problem with this app is what to watch first?! There is a bit of confusion with them not having some movies until 2021* or whatever until they earn back the rights to their own movies but eventually, Disney+ will overcome any streaming service out there!

title: Enjoying... but a couple additions
review:
I’m thoroughly loving this app and the platform itself, but there are a couple changes that would be huge across all platforms. 
The platform doesn’t remember which episodes I’ve already watched and where I’m picking up. A “Continue Watching” or “Recently Watching” row makes for quick and easy starts after having to leave the app. It’s a struggle trying to remember the name of the last thing I watched. 
When using the online site, the volume changes don’t maintain between episodes, so I’m adjusting the volume at the beginning of each episode. 

Overall, it’s been a beautiful experience watching so many shows and movie I’ve loved and collected over the years. My mom is a huge Disney fan, has been since a young age, so I’m looking forward to sharing this new watching opportunity with her, especially all of the Marvel films! 

Thanks Disney!

title: Coming along
review: I love this app! As a Disney lover it is the perfect app for you! You have the ability to watch any old Disney/Disney channel and Pixar classics. Along with marvel and National Geographic of course! The only thing that I would improve is that it doesn’t keep track of what you were watching before and you have to search for the show again. The other thing is that you have to remember what episode you are on because it won’t just tell you where you are. That’s the only downside other than that it is the perfect app!

title: Resuming tv shows or movie
review: I like the streaming service so far but the main thing that I don’t like about this is when you go back to the show/movie it’s starts you back at the beginning. If I’m watching the Simpson’s and I’m on season 5 episode 6 I just want to hit play and resume we’re I was at. I don’t like how I have to go into season and try to find the episode I was on. So all I ask is make it easier for us to start back at the spot we left off. I think Disney + is doing a good job so far but that’s my only problem with this service.

title: Key Feature Missing
review:
Love the content. Definitely nothing lacking there. 

However, I absolutely hate the lack of a currently watching or progress into a series indicator. It’s a pain to step away from a show and to try to come back later and have to read the information to determine which episode I was last watching so that I can pick back up where I left off. 

Yes, you only get Three Stars as a result of this. It is frustrating and inconvenient and this is the only streaming service that I’ve used that doesn’t have it. Once implemented I’ll happily change my rating.

title: Where’s continue watching?
review: I love love LOVE Disney+. It’s all I’ve been doing since it came out, but there is one major flaw, and it’s that there’s no continue watching feature. I know, when we complain about it we just sound lazy, but honestly it’s tiring to have to keep finding the show you were watching, then have to try to find the episode that you were on earlier. It’s not a dealbreaker for me, and the app is still awesome, but a continue watching feature would be nice.

title: Netflix for Marvel and Disney fans
review:
You must experience it yourself to truly be amazed by its glory. It has all my favorite Disney and Marvel content, a great place for kids to experience non violent content, and allows for multiple accounts. It’s literally Netflix for fans of Marvel, Pixar, Star Wars, and more.
The only downside I would reference is the lack of being able to delete something from your watch history. For instance if a little kid watches Pooh Bear and all you can see as recommendations or titles on your account now is Pooh Bear and other Disney little kid junk.

title: I have had nothing but issues
review:
I was so excited for this app. As my daughter loves Disney. When we tried to watch earlier on my phone we couldn’t access content. When that started working, I began having issues with being able to stream it on my Apple TV. I was on the phone for 3 hours with Apple support. When we made attempts to get it to stream or mirror on Apple TV the app began having problems. Apple tells me that I basically need a newer TV and or a new Apple TV to be able to stream on our television. Or we can watch on a newer phone or tablet. Basically, go spend $200 plus to be able to use this app. 
I am so disappointed and curtails my excitement for this. The time wasted in my day and so forth.

title: First Day
review:
People, you do realize it literally launched hours ago? It’s going to have bugs, and it’s going to crash. So many people are trying to download and access it right now. 

It has a ton of movies, including all my childhood favorites! Disney promises more, including original content. Be patient!!! If they delayed the launch to include more, you’d be in an uproar about that. Also, give it a little time for more streaming devices to be added. Like I said, it’s only been several HOURS!

title: Deserves a 0
review: Great lineup, but just like the old Disney movie app, downloading movies is a joke. I spent hours downloading movies onto an iPad for a 10 hour road trip so my 3 year old granddaughter would have something to do. After two movies, we got a message that we didn’t have a connection. Well, duh, that’s why we downloaded movies. Connected to the phone to log in on the iPad. The app then said I had no downloads. Exactly what the old Disney movie app did in the past. Why have the ability to download movies if you have to stay logged into an Internet connection to watch them? Worst programming ever. Maybe Disney can hire a High School computer class to create a better app for them. VERY disappointed.

title: So many crybabies
review: Mulan is a premium movie that was to be released in theaters.  Because of the pandemic it was released online for $30.  Why are you complaining about it?  How do you think movies are paid for?  The movie cost $200 million to make and they have to charge money for it.  Everyone should stop whining about it and understand that nothing in this world is free.  I know the Democrats have corrupted our society with that belief but it’s not true.  Someone always has to pay.

title: Add A.N.T farm to Disney plus
review: I love Disney plus and all my childhood memories of the shows I used to watch but when ever you watch a couple episodes then switch to a different Device it gets you episodes mixed up also some of the older shows aren’t on there like I’ve been DIEEEEEEING for A.N.T farm to be on her since I started use it Disney plus a couple months ago and it seems as though you guys are only adding movies and if it’s not a new movie it’s a Disney plus original so it would be great if you guys added more Disney channel shows

title: Love this app
review: I love this app I’ve found new shows to watch old ones bad newer ones like I really like the suite life of Zack and cody and the suite life on deck and wizards of Waverly places and a really old one the adventures of spin and Marty and I have two things I want you to add the further adventures of spin and Marty and the New Adventures of Spin and Marty  I want to add those because there is probley no other way for me to see the further adventures of spin and Marty and the New Adventures of Spin and Marty so please please please add them

title: The problems
review:
Dear Disney

I am writing this review to tell you that I love watching movies and tv on Disney+ but there is one serious problem and that is The episodes of some tv shows are in the wrong order. Now it’s don’t sound like a problem but let say you love Phineas and ferb and want to watch every episode from start to end, so you go in and click the episode they showed as the first episode but it’s not. Sure It’s a problem with most of the shows on here, but Phineas and ferb is one of Disney’s most popular shows of all time, and this is how you treat it. It also have effected two other well known Disney shows. The original ducktails and ducktails 2017. So Disney, could you please fix this problem

title: We want episodes to be released more frequently
review: I don’t like how new episodes come out once per week. I know many others feel this way. For example, fans of “The Clone Wars” are dying to see what happens to Ashoka and Anakin. All we ask for is to at least release new episode every other day. Example: every Sunday, Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday and new episode could be released. I know releasing episode once a week builds up suspense so we would want to watch shows more, however all we want to see our favorite characters. Please do this.

title: Disney Fan
review:
I love what Disney did for this app! 
I’ve seen a whole bunch of movies and tv shows since the first day it came out. 
My only issue is that sometimes I’ll be watching on my phone and I get kicked out of the app and it won’t work for a few minutes. It doesn’t do that on my tv. It’s only happened once on my daughters tablet. 
I’m hoping that it’s something related to an update because I checked if it needed an update and I have the most recent one. 
Again thanks Disney and hopefully this tiny issue will get fixed.

title: Updated!
review:
Great app, no troubles with it at all, from a technical point of view. 

But where is the “Resume/Continue Watching” list??? And no way to know if you’ve watched something already? So odd. Annoying when you’re trying to watch a series but can’t remember which episode you stopped on so you don’t know where to resume next time. 

I love the app and I love being able to watch all my favorites, including all the movies previously in the vault. Where is “Ben and Me” by the way? Stop showing me pop ups for new episodes of shows that I haven’t even watched (wouldn’t know it though, since I can’t see what I’ve recently watched). Once these few issues are resolved, I’ll be more than happy to add that fifth star.

They fixed everything on my list! (Except adding “Ben and Me”....) so they have earned their 5th star.

title: Not enough for older people
review: After a couple of weeks, you go through everything, don’t not let us watch shows that some call racist. They were good enough for Walt(Who was friends with my Grandfather and Grandma who was from Mexico) it was how the past did movies then. It’s ok to stereotype aliens in Star Wars? Star buying more old movies of sports, TV sitcoms like Home improvement, Last man standing. Heck for the 20 to 40 year olds do A reality show like Bravo’s Below deck, but on your cruises. If I could come up with 100’s of ideas why can’t your team who is getting paid to come with just few?

title: Pause/continue watching issue
review: I have the Disney + app on both my iPhone and iPad and experience an issue on both when I pause a movie or show for more then a few minutes (which happens after with children). If I come back to resume 5 minutes later or the next day, the title image shows that I’ve watched some of the show but when I resume it starts from the beginning every time. I’m using the most up to date app and this continues to happen. My only issue and complaint with the app

title: Loading issues
review:
I’ve been on this app two weeks now and it has been working great and everything has been going well. But recently i have been trying to watch my shows and I am receiving black screens and also the show will not load. This really make me frustrated and make me want to get my money back. I tried to Change to using my data then to trying Wi-Fi and I refuses to load.
I’m out of ideas and will fight to get my money back because this is very disappointing for me. This problem has been happening for the last two days. I even deleted the app and reloaded the whole app and the same issue occurs.

title: Best movie app EVER!!!
review: Love this app I been using it since my bestie told me about it I started to hate Netflix I didn’t like the movies on it and even deleted way before Disney + came out! I use this app every day when I want to watch something I want! Next the price is cheaper then Netflix I really would pay for Disney + every day just to watch! Last I think the movies are amazing (and the new ones) on Disney + I give this all stars! If you could rate out of 10 I would! I recommend Disney + :D

title: Issue with continue watching
review: I absolutely love this app. So many great things to watch. But recently whenever I go to the continue watching section. I click whatever I was gonna continue watching and it starts all over every single time. I’ve updated the app and it happens every time. Also, it either won’t remember what I was watching or it’ll say I am still watching something I finished three weeks ago. Which now means I’ve lost what episode I’m on :/ Hope a fix comes soon or if a simple reinstall would help?

title: Great but doesn’t load.
review: I love all things Disney and go to Disney parks a lot. I was very happy when this was announced. Great shows, movies,etc. I watched as a kid. However, on mobile and console it doesn’t load a lot. On mobile it’s not so bad, but on console I tried for half an hour to pull up a Star Wars movie and nothing worked. And on mobile the avatars for your profile don’t load. Also, I downloaded 3 episode of a show it said it was all good and downloaded. I get on the flight and try to pull them up and it doesn’t load or says there is an error. Please fix these loading issues.

title: Boot people off ?
review: Hey so I would find it really helpful if y’all made a feature where you can kick curtain people/devices off of your Disney plus account because it has come to my attention that a fellow acquaintance  of mine has been sharing my Disney+ with a couple of his friends. If you guys could do that I’ll be very appreciative! Disney+ is honestly really great with all its shows and movies, it give me my childhood nostalgia n I love it ! And the boot feature would make it so much better

title: Bugs
review: So I don’t know if I am the only one that this is happening to. But when I spend time going through everything in the app and adding things to my watch list I would expect the things I pick to be there. That being said, about 80% of what I chose is no where to be seen when I go into my watch list. There is only a handful of what I put in there. Then I have to go back through and uncheck and recheck everything. But then more stuff gets taken out of my watch list. And the things that are there, show up twice. Other then that... great app. I feel like a kid again.

title: Good but needs work
review:
-So far I like the things that are offered but it’s mostly content for kids 
- add more profile pics like all the characters from Baymax, all marvel characters, Meg from Hercules, and more. (Honestly the 3D animation characters look better than the 2d characters so add more 3D characters). 
-Their should be more content like from fox since Disney owns them. So could you please Release the old X-men movies and all of fox content. Their should also be a my list option to mark up the shows/movies you want to watch for later.
-Add more content like the mandalorian.
-Their should also be a option to watch the movies released to the theaters and we could pay a little extra to watch it at home then after 6months the movie should be free. 
-Add more adult content, make a kid mode for your kids and a teens mode for teens. Then the adults will be able to watch the content they want.

title: Good content but can use some updates.
review:
I am a marvel and disney classics fan. I got subscription on day one. I don’t know of they are still adding content or not but I don’t see a few movies. Nor they are mentioned. Like the incredible hulk (all hulk movies for that matter), Spiderman (homecoming and far from home). Also don’t have continue watching thing which most apps/website that have streaming services have.

Overall good content but can be made better. I am a fan and it is not going to change because of few in-app hiccups.

title: I mean... it works
review: The app works fine on my phone. But on my TV... the whole service is jank to say the least. Once you select a movie or show to see the description, you are committed. There is no way to return to the home screen and select something else, once you start playing the movie or show you have to watch until the very end, and even after that you can only watch related movies and shows. The only way to go back to the home screen is to completely restart the app. It’s. So. JANKY! I have full faith that all of this will be fixed in the future, but in it’s current state the app is not compatible with a non-Apple TV...

title: I need help
review: I created my Disney account so I can purchase one of the plans, then I go to buy the $6.99 a month plan and then it takes me to a screen where it says “please contact customer service” then it gives me two options, call customer service or dismiss, so I then call customer service and it says estimated wait time will be greater than 10 minutes and it’s been 38 minutes and I have called multiple times, is there anything else I can do?

title: Great App
review: Okay so this app does have a little bugs here and there. But overall this is a great app. Sometimes the bios of episodes will switch around but to me it’s not a big deal. Being a new app I am surprised how there are not many bugs. The profile thing is great if you don’t want others with your account to watch what you are watching and get you off track. I didn’t realize how many movies would be on here. I recommend this app to anyone that is a Disney fan.

title: Disney
review: This app is horrible! You can never play anything. Every title says something is wrong and you have to chose something else to watch. If you get lucky and can watch a show, it glitches and lags! I signed up for Disney plus before it came out. I actually signed up for the year. When it went live I was unable to log onto my account. I reset my password and it still told me I had to call customer service. When I went to call, I had to wait for more than hour three days in a row! I was never able to speak to anyone. I had to create a whole new account with a different email to be able to get on. I love all the movies and shows the app has, too bad I can never watch any of it!

title: Disney Is the Bomb, this app isn’t
review:
There are a number of issues with this app.
The biggest is the rewind or restart from the beginning.
I watched a movie all the way through. You would think it would start a the beginning if you pulled the movie up again, but no, you have to spend time backing it up. Like the old days when you had to rewind the VHS tapes...
Additionally, it would be nice to have a thumbnail image as you scroll forward or backward 
2) adding a profile. Let’s say we add a child, because certain content, pg 13 movies, should not be watched by underage kids.
So, you set them up with their own profile, but that doesn’t restrict them from going into their older sibling profile or the parent profile. There needs to be controls for this.
3) series information. It would be very nice to know when the next episode of a series will be released. Also, if there are future shows coming it would be nice to know their prospective release date.
I’m sure there will be improvements...

title: Loving it so far, Device Control
review: Loving the app so far, all I would say is that I would like to be able to manage the number of devices that are logged unto my device and being able to kick off if the number passes the limit. Most other steaming devices have that option where you can log into to their website manually & manage the number of devices. Also a continue watching feature would be nice as well as more personalization with profiles, possibly even locking them. Thank you!

title: EVERYTHING A FAN OF DISNEY WOULD LOVE...
review:
...and SO much more.  Only wish there was a way to continue watching movies/shows without having to look for them every time I go back to them.  Also, depending on the device, the movie I’m watching either continues where I left off (Xbox One) or completely starts over (Samsung Smart TV).  Other than that, keep up the great work, Disney!❤️❤️❤️

*Side-Note:

I HATE... HATE... HATE that I have to wait two years before I can watch ‘Tomorrowland’.  A real heartbreaker.  Good thing Disney’s hat is deep.

title: Navigation Issues Ruin the Experiene
review:
On the Apple TV this is really terrible to work with. 

If you try to watch a movie that is 95% complete (and in the credits) it just takes you to a suggested screen and shows you the end of the credits over and over. As others have said it needs a “recently watched” or “continue watching” option. I am actually shocked such basic and critical functionality was missed in Disney’s beta testing. It is a big enough issue that we are going to other apps/services to find items we know are still playing other places. 

This also desperately needs to ask you if you want to resume or start over. I know Apple recently switched to the automatically keep playing option for their TV App....but we don’t like it there either. 

And last, finding movies that are not in Disney’s key categories  is not as easy as it needs to be. Why do I need to go to search, and then scroll right 3 million times to see the moves from a decade?  How about letting us click a category and then see a larger list of movies.

title: best thing ever!!
review: Disney+ is probably the best thing that has ever happened to me. Bringing my childhood back was all I ever dreamed of, now I have it. However, I do have one suggestion. I really really wish that there was a place for “continue watching” or that it kept track of that you are watching in some way. I was watching a show and the next day, went to watch it again and it started the whole series over again. It was a little bit frustrating. If this could be fixed, I would have no complaints what so ever.

title: What you could think and More
review: For the first foray into the steaming war, Disney has hit the spot. It has plenty of quality content and I can only see it getting better in time. Must have addition to the home that cost the price of a cheap lunch. The app has anything you would want in a 2019 app, besides a currently watching feature which is kind of a weird omission. Nonetheless, the layout and ease of use really make the app stand up to the quality of content it delivers.

title: Great content~ One suggestion
review:
I am really enjoying all of the content on the app. I love all of the old movies and cartoons from my childhood. The Pixar shorts are also so cute.

 My one suggestion would be to add a Continue watching  feature so we can find the shows we were previously watching right away. I’d also request that the show start where we left off watching it.  At this time the show starts at the beginning each time. I’m sure in time this will be rectified. 

Thanks again for a wonderful app. I’m having so much fun with it.

title: Updated: fewer bugs but still annoyances
review:
Still a number of bugs in the app; frequently won’t remember where a video was paused, trying to fast forward or rewind fails and may crash out of the video, won’t show the “resume” until you play a movie completely until the end, etc. Needs a lot more work.

Update: more stable, but it still won’t show allow me to watch a movie or episode again if there is any time, even a few second, it considers “unwatched”. Quite annoying.

title: Could be better
review: I love that all the old shows are there however if I back out of a show or movie I’m watching it makes me start all over from the beginning. I’m halfway through a season of Hannah Montana and whenever I go to play it, it starts from the very first episode so I have to go look for the episode and fast forward to where I was. Same goes with movies if I pause it and back out to go do something else it starts the whole movie over. I’m a Big disney fan so the fact that it makes you start all over is quite annoying. Netflix doesn’t do that neither should Disney+

title: Beyond my Expectations, Thank you Disney
review: I had no idea what to really expect when this came out; I suppose in a way I didn’t fully grasp what it meant to really open up “the vault”. My focus was really only on the Princesses, Star Wars, Avengers, the more recent stuff. But to open the app today and see essentially EVERYTHING from Steamboat Willie forward, it’s absolutely incredible. I’m overwhelmed with such wonderful memories from my childhood, I couldn’t be happier. Thank you Disney for making this service possible.

title: The whole family is FREAKING OUT!
review: I was up at 4 am this morning looking through everything and making my profiles. My 4 year old was just as excited as me and I’m 26. Not only does it have every show imaginable that my daughter watches and every movie, but it has all of my old throw backs as a kid too and I am so excited to binge watch some of this stuff (HANNAH MONTANA!). This is incredible. Thank you Disney for bringing something so wonderful into our homes! So many choices the possibilities on what to watch are endless! Yay yay yay yay yay yay yay!!!!!

title: I love Disney+
review: Although you have to pay to access Disney+ tv shows or movies, in my opinion it is better to get Disney+ then getting Nickelodeon. Yes I know I’m shading them or whatever it’s called. But let’s be honest here. A lot of people most likely hate/don’t like the app💔 Nickelodeon as before when they had better reviews and shows. Now back to Disney+. I just love that Disney+ has all the shows that I and others have grew up with. It brings back memories of happier times. ❤️

title: Bug issues?
review: I like Disney+ itself, but there are some technical issues. If I cast to my tv and hit resume episode/movie it always restarts it. I don’t have this issue when watching on my computer. Also the close-captioning needs fixing as well, but I think that is an overall site/app issue, not just the app. Sometimes it just straight up stops working, or only works every other sentence, for someone who is a bit hard of hearing this is extremely frustrating, especially when I am watching something new and don’t already know the story.

title: Like a bad Netflix knockoff
review:
So if you go on vacation, or move to a different country, instead of just displaying what Disney+ offers in that country-using your same app and your same account(like Netflix)-you not only need to make a new account in country B, but you have to make a whole new Apple ID for that country, download the same app but from that countries App Store, and then sign in with the new Disney+ account you’ve created, for another monthly fee. 
Disney might have a great catalog, but they have a terrible user interface, and don’t seem to have a real care for customer experience. Has more the feeling of someone dropping a bunch of DVD‘s on the floor, for you to figure out what to do with.

title: It’s a good app
review: It’s a favorite streaming app but there’s one thing I would like to see in it. Ever since all the Older Disney shows been on Disney channel I been wanting to watch them again and this is the best chance. But I want to see an option where we can put different shows in a list have have a auto play where it chooses different episodes from show randomly because sometimes it gets tiring watching the same show over and over. Thank you for reading and hopefully this is a good idea

title: It’s good, but needs improvement
review: Overall, I love that I get to watch all my favorite movies, but I really don’t like that it shows a movie, then I click on it thinking I can watch it, but then I can’t until like 2 or 3 years pass! I think that you guys should step up your game a bit, and add more shows and movies, and I’m really excited for the new Marvel shows that are coming out! But it a super long wait, hopefully you guys could release them a bit earlier, but please take as long as you need to make the best. Thanks!

title: Great app with a few flaws
review: I absolutely love being able to watch shows that I used to watch a long time ago on Netflix, like Jessie, Lab Rats, Best Friends Whenever, etc. The classic movies are also all great. I just wished that before they added some stuff that not that many people watched they would add stuff that I feel more people would watch for the nostalgia like the most populars, A.N.T Farm, and Mighty Med. Anyways, it’s still a great app that I recommend getting a subscription on.

title: WAIT. VERY Limited Content. Lots of issues.
review:
I’ll keep this one short. 

There is very little top rated content. 

Most material is old Disney channel or broadcast TV from 10-20 years ago. There are also missing episodes for some reason. Likely something not considered acceptable for whatever reasons and Disney self censored. Like many missing movies like Song Of The South which will likely never be seen ever again, sadly. 

Likewise very little original content or recent movies. 

Unless you own no Disney movies on video, don’t see them in theaters, and largely want to watch old Disney movies you’re likely better off holding off. 

I preordered and prepaid for three years in advance at nearly half price. Even though the family has annual Disney park passes and loves Disney and their movies it still turns out to not be worth even half price to us. 

There are also numerous issues with accessing and filtering content. Product feels very rushed to market with lots of bugs and limited quality material.

title: 2 way login
review:
I would wish for a password when entering the app.
Like me having to enter a password than another password that I can get by text if you know what I mean??? 
I would love for Disney + to do this for secure reasons and for me to have more control over my account and who I have on my account.
I would love to see the history of who’s watching and I guess kick profiles out of my account if I don’t want them on my account no more.
Either than that i absolutely love Disney +, it’s literally the future of watching a channels

title: Slow load speed
review: This app is great and I’m loving almost all of it. The only problem I have is it can be pretty slow sometimes and whatever show or movie is playing will pause for no reason and the loading circle will pop up for minutes at a time. This can be triggered by random occurrences or fast forwarding or rewinding. I understand that fast forwarding and rewinding will be slow but I feel that for a multi billion dollar company they could make it faster like Netflix. Other then that this app is great!

title: Not happy
review: Very disappointed with Disney+. I loved the idea of it. So I purchased the annual subscription after my week trial. When the trial ended my account was suspended because I was a minor (which is understandable). Three days later it charged me $70 for the annual subscription. I called Disney+ customer service, waited an hour to talk to someone and he said they would put in a request for a refund, and it would take around 10 business days to get a refund. That was November 23rd of 2019! I have yet to receive a refund, i’ve called the customer service number more then enough times.  If it was only $7 for the month subscription it would not be such a big deal to me, but this is $70 we’re talking about.

title: Love the app
review: I absolutely love Disney + but I do have one suggestion. Please allow different users under the same account to have separate profiles, otherwise if we are watching the same show it becomes difficult if we are on different episodes. Also, the movies that aren’t available yet should be under a “coming soon” area. I’ve gone to watch some movies only to be disappointed because they are not yet available to watch.  Other than that, the app is great and I haven’t had any issues.

title: It’s great but.
review: Ok first of all it’s an great app. But there are a few glitches that I really want fixed. The most annoying one is if that it’s buffering and it goes the app will get glitched and the video will play but there are TWO AUDIO TAPES GOING AND I CANT STOP IT the only way is if I delete the app and sign back in. And two why aren’t there all the movies that were made I get that Disney wants us to spend our money and watch the movies in the theater but the ones that came out already like The Incredible Hulk or Home Alone 4 why aren’t they on there?

title: Great and all, but still very buggy
review: I love that I can watch all of my favorite shows using Disney+, but it still has several flaws. It constantly crashes for me and will randomly pause for no apparent reason. I also downloaded several hours of content to watch for later, but it appears to have disappeared even though it’s still taking up space on my iPad. I have no way to access it or delete it, which means I have several gigabytes of storage going seemingly nowhere. Please fix these issues.

title: App is great content is great but.....
review: Not being allowed to use a VPN to stream is a total crock Disney, so you want me to leave my phone vulnerable to get hacked to use WiFi or use all my data to stream anything. If you find somewhere that has free WiFi and you turn on your VPN, then it won’t let you watch anything..... totally stupid! Fix that issue please! Also not allowed to use an adapter from your phone to HDMI to a TV if you are away from home on Vacation is pretty crappy too! Those are the only two issues I’ve had... but they are pretty big ones to me! Otherwise would be 5 stars

title: Good but not great
review:
Disney plus has a lot of great content but they have not figured out all the nicks and kinks. Doesn’t always work well on my Xbox 1. Every so often it will kick me out of the show I’m watching. The bundle package isn’t worth it. You CANNOT watch ufc fights live! Also they have no customer service. I’ve called three times with questions regarding my account and have yet to speak with a representative. All three times I was told my wait time was 10 minutes and waited longer than 20 minutes all three times and didn’t get to speak with anyone. Disappointed with a company such as Disney that cant produce adequate customer 
service.

title: It’s Disney!!!
review: I’m loving watching all my favorite childhood tv shows and movies, my kids enjoying there favorites at their finger tips also. I must say it money worth spending even though it use a hell of a lot of data. So if you don’t have WiFi or unlimited high speed internet you need to get ready to run out of data fast. I will say to it would be nice if I had like a currently watching list, would be nice, I don’t like to go search for the same show or movie over every time I come back to the app, other than that 👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾

title: Missing episodes :(
review: I love having access to all of my favorite Disney content, but was very sadden to see that of my favorite shows were missing many of their episodes. It's hard to binge watch a series without every episode. In fact, binge watching in general seems to be made harder on Disney+ also through their original content, which is updated weekly by episode instead of a season all at once. That I can deal with though because I know the episodes will be there eventually-- it’s the missing episodes from established series that I'm more worried about.

title: Great so far but missing functions
review:
Easy to use. Some bugs and missing functions like “Play from the beginning”, “Watch again”. I really need “Play from the beginning”

Tapping ‘+’ button to add the movie/TV series to my watch list seems it works but there is a bug. ‘+’ button turns to ‘v’ checkmark, but when I get back from other section, it rolled back to ‘+’. The movies and TV series I tapped are added into the watch list but the + button in the each content page stays the same and it makes me confused.

Great so far.

title: Continue watching section
review: I love the content on the app! I’d love to have a “continue watching” section or a way to know what I’ve already watched. Also maybe switching up the movies/shows that show up when you open the app. I’d like to have more options to watch without having to search for them.  I was born in 94 so keep that in mind when you’re making the selection for the home page.  Haha 😃 I added this app specifically for the throwback movies. 😄

title: Enjoying but there’s a big part missing
review: So I am loving Disney+ it’s honestly a gift from the heavens above but with that being said I was that there was a continue watching. I feel like that is a necessity because I’ve been binge watching Hannah Montana and some times I fall asleep and for get where I am at in the season. Other than that everything else is great. Oh one other thing I was a little disappointed that The Proud Family series wasn’t on there but I got all the Disney classics so I’m not going to complain. Loving it really happy with the results!!

title: Just a couple fixes
review: So far, I love Disney+. I have watched multiple movies and started several shows. My biggest problem is that there is no “currently watching” section. If it were just a service for movies, I would understand it more, or even if the progress were saved if I searched whatever I was watching, but right now, as I have a horrible memory, I can’t watch more than the first couple episodes of a show as I can’t remember exactly where I was. Otherwise, I’m finding Disney+ to be an amazing platform.

title: Great Content! Missing “recently/currently watch lost”
review:
This seems like a no-brainer, but for some reason this app appears to be missing a feature common to every other streaming app in existence. There’s no “recently played” or “in progress” section in the main area or side menu, meaning one has to search for the title again if coming back to the app to finish a show. 

Further, perhaps due to a bug, playback has occasionally started over at the beginning of a show instead of resuming my previous position.

title: No Continue Watching?
review: This app is great and I really love it. It has all the throwback shows and movies that we love except the proud family tv show which disappoints me. Now, this review would have gotten the full 5 stars if they had a continue watching section. It’s very inconvenient when you have to go back into the app and try to remember the exact episode that you were on. Please fix it in the next update Disney. I know y’all got the money for it. Make it happen. And please consider putting the proud family tv show on there.

title: Where’s my continue watching section??
