review: I download this app trying to watch the psych movie and I pay for premium and there’s 160 seconds of commercials and I try to connect the app from my phone to the television but it doesn’t work and we don’t have the right television to download it so I have to use my phone and connect it to the chrome cast and that doesn’t work

title: No streaming on tv!
review: So you can only use this app on your phone/tablet/computer. You can’t stream to any smart tv through chrome cast or screen mirroring. It only plays sound and no video. In this age of streaming and mirroring, this app is useless if you want to watch on tv. There’s no app on the smart TVs too!

title: Trash app, doesn’t sync with Apple TV app
review: Purchased a premium subscription and couldn’t sign in to the Apple TV app. Said my password was invalid. Same password works on the iPhone app. Multiple account management issues. You guys have sabotaged a decent streaming service with your trashy developers and feature testers. Not gonna use this sorry excuse for an app again.

title: No Support. Louse Subtitles
review:
I customized the subtitles and they would not change.  I had tiny white subtitles that I couldn’t see.  
I signed up for 1 week complimentary service. Within the week I tried to cancel and it wouldn’t let me.  Once I was outside the week, I was able to...huh.  I would like a refund and I can’t find any way to talk or chat with PEACOCK.  Leave to NBC to rip me off.

title: Not user friendly
review: Very poorly made app. Not user friendly at all. Not many options for casting to smart TVs and the app will not auto play the next episode if you are watching a series. The shows will just randomly stop playing half way through the episodes. And it’s not easy to search for specific episodes.

title: Missing some features
review: Good selection but a few bugs/issues: Where is the watch list after I add my desired series to it? Also, when I watch live tv, how do I exit the broadcast back to my main menu?

title: I really recommend for anyone
review: It lets you watch anything for free right now I’ve watched 2 Harry Potter’s and that would cost is $30

title: Trash
review: The only thing I watch on NBC is EPL soccer, which should play on the NBC channels as opposed to hidden away on this poorly made app. NBC has instead decided to play rerun hockey shows so instead of paying ANOTHER fee to peacock to just stream soccer, I will be streaming these games for free somewhere else and complaining to YouTubeTV about NBC and NBCSN as well. Soccer is your highest rated show, put it back on regular tv

title: I want AMBER
review: I love Amber Ruffin and I have been waiting for her own show. I downloaded the app and wanted to watch her first show and I can hear her but cannot see her. It’s just a blank screen. The commercial for AP bio was seen in the commercial for Maybelline was seen but not the actual show. Come on peacock! You can’t just show us commercials and not the actual show!

title: Why can’t sports be on one app?
review: NBC, seriously?!  You have to split EPL b/w two apps?!  Why can’t you make it simple and easy and keep sports on NBCSN app?  If i want to watch a game on Peacock I have pay for Premium.  Are you going to make me pay for NBCSN Gold too?  I can’t wait for some other network to pick up EPL tv rights.  Do you know what sound the Peacock app makes when it crashes into the NBCSN app....douche.

title: It’s OKAY🥴
review: Overall, this app isn’t that great. When I downloaded the app and opened it, it just kept on kicking me out. Sooo I went online and I saw their “great” shows that they have. I tried looking up movies to watch but you have to PAY to watch the good ones🥱😒sooo I would rather stick with Netflix. Thanks anyways😊

title: Needs some work
review: This app needs to be able to run in the background, with the audio. It shuts down the audio every time you go to work on something else, on iOS.

title: Too much scrolling
review: I have to scroll through every episode of the season to get to the current one. Why aren’t the new shows at the top? There should be an easier way to access new content.

title: Audio Does Not Match
review: I have watched more than one thing in the app & each time the audio is either ahead of the show or behind which makes it difficult to watch. I uninstalled the app hoping it would solve the problem but it didn’t fix it.

title: Good content but kinda needs work
review: I like the content but Is not available in some places and if u install and then accidentally erase the app it wouldn’t let u log in for a while

title: 50 %load 30% scam 20% bad
review:
I like but it does not have the content it says it would and when I search something it takes 10 minutes to load so they need to fix     
And I  at great WiFi so I would give it 3 stars ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️ so if this happens to you I would delete it.

title: Presidential speeches/interviews
review: It is appalling that NBC scheduled their talk with President Trump at the same time as candidate Biden’s talk on another network, forcing the voters to choose between the candidates. I’ve never thought of the networks as being politically sided. Why they would choose to alienate half of their viewers is unwise to say the least.  And I for one will be uninstalling the app until NBC chooses to be non-partisan.

title: Pay for both?
review: I have a sports package which includes a few channels I watch for sports. Now I have to download an app that doesn’t work for my tv and pay even more to watch the games I thought I was paying for? No thanks, I’m going to pay for the subscription to the teams streaming service instead. Strange way to do business.

title: Greedy nbc ruining premier league with peacock paywall
review: Forced to download this app because nbc wants to setup a paywall and not televise premier league games. Besides the fact the app is garbage and doesn’t stream to a lot of devices like lg or roku (they just made a deal with roku today) it is idiotic for nbc to be so greedy and ruin premier league experience for so many people. They are hurting the growth of the game in America with this garbage setup.

title: NBC double dipping. Terrible app for 2020!
review: Deceptive marketing for plan options, limited shows/live sports, user interface is garbage and the app is limited to few device options and cannot cast/stream to TV. Obviously NBC double dipping from its cable options, making customers pay for content they previously could access for free.

title: Free shows
review: What’s not to love. I have iphoneX and it works for me. Don’t expect free after first episode, but so far, I’ve gotten past a lot of first episodes for free. Pleasantly surprised by this app

title: Review
review: Ok I get that you want people to use your app but when you actually get in the app most of the shows that people like you have to pay for them. The shows people don’t like? They’re free. And I’m the add it made it seem like everything was free but it wasn’t. If you’re gonna sell this app you should at least say that it costs money. 😔

title: No Chromecast
review: Who’s very excited to watch murder she wrote when I downloaded the app. Watching has been fine. But every time I go to cast to my TV, it doesn’t work. I looked up online and peacock says they’re compatible with Chromecast. I’ve been trying for three days off and on, and it still won’t work. It’s just a blank screen. Otherwise the app is OK

title: Dissappointed
review: I thought this was going to be at least somewhat like cbs all access but it’s not even close and not even available on rocky so it’s use will be very limited. It also won’t remember where you were at if you go back in to watch a show

title: Decent content but the cost structure blows
review: I’m sorry, paying for the premium plus package and still having ads is obnoxious; there isn’t any overwhelming content here that’s really worth streaming for both a fee and ads.

title: Upon further review
review: I thought this was another Pluto TV clone but I was wrong. They have some great content here some decent movies, TV shows and original content. Good job.

title: So frustrating
review: To watch Premier League soccer we have to buy this subscription on top of the cable subscription we already have. I will switch to watching Bundesliga and other leagues that come with cable. I am absolutely sick of all these individual subscriptions for a ton of horrible content with one winner. NBC is not ESPN, Apple or Disney. Best of luck.

title: Free and easy to use!
review: So much free content and the app is beautifully designed, so it’s easy to browse or find exactly what you’re looking for.

title: Horrible app and service for premier league
review:
Homework for the developers:

The NBC sports app was an excellent option, but NBC got it totally backwards with this app. 

1. The app lacks the basic features of all apps today. 
2. I paid a subscription with my iPhone and they took my money,
3.  but there is no way to see the game in my iPad.
4. No way how to change email or password. 
5. No way to plug my iPhone to the TV. 
6. No way to to link my account to the tv app. 
7. No way to link my account to my xfinity account. 

Basically, I’m locked to watch a soccer game in a 6” screen. Go figure. 

Canceling the subscription.

title: Garbage
review: The fact that this isn’t compatible for direct airplay from IPad or IPhone is ridiculous. Then you can’t pause live sports or rewind. Again, what a joke. Do the right thing NBC, fix this piece of trash App or quit putting live sports on their exclusively and charging for premium content every month when there are no premium features.

title: Not streaming
review: First they say it’s “free”. But you’re unable to open the app up. They keep telling you to try again later. So when is later? I can only watch it on my iPad. Not my TV nor my iPhone. Who wants to carry they I pad out the house. And only you can watch it by yourself

title: Needs work
review: The iPhone app needs a lot of work to make it usable. Can’t find a way to access the watchlist. Need a setting to turn off the autoplay when scrolling channels or shows. Settings should be available from every screen not just Trending.

title: Junk
review: Absolute junk. It was working fine on my iPhone then just stopped. It took 30 min to get a chat agent. They told me to delete and reinstall, now I can’t even sign in. Says it doesn’t know my sign in info (but they know it enough to charge me) Won’t even load on the tv.  I will be demanding a refund. Don’t waste you time or money!

title: Peacock
review: This app is insane they have all the classics completely free we’re talking columbo, the Rockford files, Tarantino movies, and so on buy this app now you won’t regret it

title: Streaming
review: My family and I are really looking forward to watch the new Psych movie. We’re using and adapter to watch it on the tv. The show gets going ok, all of the commercials show on the screen. But then once it gets to the actual show, nothing. We can hear it, but it’s only playing on my phone, and not on the screen.

title: No Premier League football (soccer)
review: The main reason I got this app is so that I could finally watch the premier league, I can never find it when I search it up, nor can I find it on sports, and I feel like that unless you search up the exact title you won’t find anything

title: Awesome
review: I hope this app remains free. If so, I’ll stop paying for my other tv apps 😃. I have already recommended this app to a few. It’s nice, I enjoy the shows on it.

title: Content decent, app terrible
review: I got a trial to watch Brave New World. The content otherwise seems pretty good. The app is awful. No PiP, watchlist is impossible to find, can’t see the time without exiting the app which closes it. I won’t be keeping anything other than free content after my week is up.

title: Need to work out the bugs
review: After every commercial break the audio and video are out of sync and I have to pause the show and rewind to restart with sync. Happens every single time with chrome cast.

title: No PIP on iPad
review: Why is not done on any of the NBC apps, it’s simple to do, as a developer there’s no way I wouldn’t add this, please add because it makes the app much more useful if you suddenly have to check an email but still want the picture showing.

title: Awful
review: The layout is awful. The library can be found almost anywhere else. The channels are a poor attempt to copy PlutoTV. You have no option for Comcast subscribers to log in for the premium version and there is no way I’m paying extra for this. I’m deleting the app because even the free version isn’t worth it.

title: Best app!!! Better than the NBC app!!!
review: This app let’s me watch my shows with just one ad break!!! Most of the time no ads during my shows!!! TOTALLY RECOMMEND!!! 100% Free!!!

title: Apple TV app needs work
userName: this app is so bad still
review: They need to make the video playback controls more like the rest of TVOS. Being able to jump forward and back ten seconds, or skip thru intro credits in tv shows would be great

title: Pathetic
review: What in the world has happened to this app?  All of the sudden I can’t pause a show I’m watching?  There’s also no way to scroll through the program?  So now if I’m halfway though a show and I need to step away for ten minutes my choices are 1. Miss those ten minutes or 2. Start over at the beginning.  Pathetic.

title: New app, already out of date
review: Given all the development effort that NBC put into this app, how have they failed to make it compatible with the new Picture in Picture feature in iOS 14?  If you’re going to keep making me pay more to watch premier league games, I at least expect your app to be up to date.

title: Recommend it
review: Super great, you have access to a multitude of shows regardless of wether or not your subscribed to there premium shows.

title: Password
review:
To tell you the truth I’m just done with creating passwords for every single app. If you can’t be bothered to integrate with google our some other password service then I think I’m done. 

Just downloaded and logged into iMDBs app using my google account and was watching a movie in seconds— and I don’t have another password to remember.

title: It’s ok, but empty
review: Why is it that this service is empty of recent shows? My main issue is that there is only the last season each of Chicago Fire, PD, and Med. why? I heard lots of news in the last week that the whole series would be on here.

title: No Closed Captions in TVOS
review: The Capture is difficult without closed captioning. For some reason you decided to make some clever new way to do the captioning interface and made something that doesn’t work at all. Well done on spending all that extra money by not using the SDK. No worries, a torrent version with captions is minutes away.

title: No issues
review: It’s good but I see a lot of an issue of people getting to cast first of all it has to be downloaded on you tv and then cast but over all I like the app

title: This app is unusable
review: It used to work and it was great. But then I updated to iOS 14, and the app is incompatible or something. For an app this size, we shouldn’t have to worry about things like this. It just crashes on launch, no matter how many times I retry, or reinstall the app

title: Doesn’t take you to resume last watched
review: The app won’t take you to what you watched last to resume. Although if I access it through Apple TV it shows where you are.

title: Ads cutting off parts of the movie
review:
I’m watching a movie or series, and when the ads play, it cuts off a large or small portion of the movie.
Example, I’m watching harry potter and i certainly remember Harry getting sorted, getting his wand, and other school supplies, but the Ads cut all of that off.
Terrible, do not use this app to watch new series or movies.

title: And I thought “are you still watching?” Was annoying.
review:
No auto play. 
I like to fall asleep to tv and put the tv sleep timer on. This makes it so annoying. There is no auto play. I have to manually click on my phone every time I want to continue a show. This happens particularly with a chrome cast. Infuriating.

title: Freezes up
review: Almost every time it gets to a commercial it freezes up. Many times it stops casting. I do pay for the service but with commercials. I don’t mind the commercials but the constant freezing up is very annoying.

title: No Picture-in-Picture on iOS
review: Along with the audio syncing, Airplay/casting, and video playback issues mentioned in other reviews, I have found that the app does not include the PIP feature on iOS devices. Unfortunately, this makes the app nearly unusable for me as someone with ADHD.

title: Very disappointed with Premier League coverage
review: Peacock is not doing what they could to provide coverage for games to American Premier League fans.  Why change things so drastically from NBC Sports gold?  That app worked well and provided great coverage. This is trash and the Premier League should consider what they are loosing out on here in the US with this poor streaming service.

title: Can’t even open the app
review: I don’t know if it’s because the app developers at NBC forgot how that they needed the app to be compatible with iOS 14 or they just decided they didn’t want to but every time I open the app it immediately crashes. This happened when I was on the iOS 14 beta and on the completed public version.

title: Beyond Greedy
review: NBC is now taking the Premier League almost completely off of television and forcing viewers to pay an additional fee to watch what was free 6 months ago. They are doing everything they can to kill the sport in America and I desperately need ESPN to get the Premier League rights. No chance I pay for this subscription, I’ll just watch the games illegally.

title: Worst streaming app ever
review:
Constantly crashes!
I’d rather give myself a prostate exam with a pitchfork than try to watch a single episode on this terrible app!

Also your original content is perpetually butthurt libtard race pandering garbage - I run your trash on an apple iPad mini 3 - why does it crash - because I do not pay $ and subscribe for the privilege for your ideological indoctrination???

title: WORST APP EVER
review: So it says that you can stream and or watch on ANY Apple device. I’ve installed it, uninstalled and everything else. I sign up for it and keeps saying ERROR TRY AGAIN!! WHAT the HECK??? Won’t come up on my TV or Apple TV. Yes I have current iOS of everything. This is NOT Apple friendly and doesn’t seem like it’s supported by Dish either. Not going to get Xfinity just for this.

title: buffer PIG
review:
Great potential for this app/service. Won't give a dime until they work out the horrible buffering issues. Extremely frustrating.

Perhaps they should hire someone who know how to fix this major issue..........

title: Cannot screen mirror on other devices
review: Peacock will screen mirror the 3 minutes of ads but once the show/movie starts it only shows a loading screen for the mirrored device while the original device will play the show/movie.

title: No rewind or ff
review: I used to be able to watch premier league matches from the start even if I got home late from work through my provider on NBCSN. They forced this app on me to watch my team and it’s virtually worthless to me to not be able to rewind to the beginning. Really awful from NBC

title: Chromecast Needs Work
review: Tried to put it up on my TV via Chromecast, but this functionality doesn’t work. Would be great if the Chromecast feature could work!

title: It blows!
review: First of all too limited on devices no Roku please second Days of our lives and other programs have only select episodes and those are dated. Like 6 months or longer. I can get recent episodes on nbc. What a waste of time!!!I even bought the 4.99 subscription and still old episodes

title: Terrible Excuse for an app
review:
Freezes and fails to stream to chromecast most of the time. When I did get it to cast, the app would freeze and the show would continue to play on the tv despite attempting to stop or enable CC on the app. Would have to force close then restart the app to be able to control it again. 

Sad.

title: Disappointed
review: Cannot add the app through my big screen samsung smart tv.  That is a problem.  Also cannot send from a mobile device (iPad) to the TV.  My other streaming apps are all on my smart TV and I am also able to push to TV from a mobile device.  You need to get these capabilities corrected.

title: Peacock not working for ios
review: I’ve been waiting for this app and once it got here never got a chance to use it crashes on my iPhone doesn’t matter if I’m at an older version or newer version of iOS won’t even open I’ve updated the app every time it updates but nothing has been fixed 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻

title: Awful
review: First of all, it’s only available on very few streaming devices. If you have an older Apple TV then you can forget about it. Secondly, the premium content should be separated from the free content to make browsing easier. Finally, stop being greedy and make it available on more devices.

title: Old News
review: This is a terrible app for news. All of the clips are from broadcasts that aired weeks and months ago. I expect to see clips from the most recent broadcasts, and I expect to see them within 24 hours of the time they aired. Old news is garbage.

title: Free?
review: If you want to watch certain shows you have to upgrade to premium which is $4.99. I was pretty much willing to use this app but not anymore cuz the shows I wanted to watch are not free to watch and i'm not willing to pay the fee for maybe one or two shows.

title: Fire stick tv
review: When will it be able for  the fire stick tv , I would definitely up grade too 4.99 a month r even 9.99 a month . I like it so far

title: So Many Bugs
review: I think it’s a great channel to have, especially for Psych, however the app it super buggy. I have to back out of the program constantly to restart and try to keep going. Plus the advance or rewind options are terrible and not easy to execute. (This goes for both the mobile versions and Apple TV.)

title: Will not load
review: After watching almost 6 episodes of one show i can not make it work for the last 4 episodes!! It stopped loading and nothing will help to make it work. Soo strange!!

title: Great content!! Love it on my Apple TV and iPad!
review:
Hey guys. I’m not sure what to say. This app works outstanding on my iPad and my Apple TV. Maybe don’t use a crappy chrome cast. 
Can’t wait for Battlestar Gallactica!

title: Casting
review: Can not cast from my iPhone to my tv! The show begins for just a second then a screen pops up saying’Ready to Cast’, but it does not. I don’t have this problem with any other app and when I try emailing them I get a message saying ‘ Opps a problem has occurred’ to try again so the message is never delivered. Very frustrating!

title: Limited app
review: Peacock has some things that interest me from shows to watching EPL football games.  The only bad thing is you can’t cast , at least not to my Samsung TV.  The only way I can watch it is on my phone, or if I use the Xfinity flex box.  This greatly limits the options.

title: Not currently functional
review: I wanted to watch a “Peacock” exclusive show. It streams just fine to my phone, but is currently unable to cast to my TV. Surprisingly incapable, this app appears to only be cognizant of advertisements and self promotion, without consideration of the consumer. It is generally not functional at this time, despite the fact that they’ve launched the app.

title: Premier League!
review: Having a way to watch all Premier League games without having to have cable and NBCGold! This is the greatest thing ever. Take my $10!

title: Amazing
review: This app is awesome. It’s easy to navigate. They shows are amazing. And how is this app free this is to good to be free. Keep working in this app to make it even better than before.

title: Terrible for watching Premier League
review: Watching the Premier League is terrible on the phone and TV app. It stops streaming all the time (today one of the 10 times it did this was right as Brighton was scoring). I had to close the app and reopen it 5 different times. Never had this problem with NBC Gold. It’s unacceptable for streaming live sports.

title: Cannot stream to TV from a tablet or phone
review:
This app will not let you connect an iPhone or iPad to your TV to watch. Some shows only sound comes through and never any video. Some you get neither. 

It’s not always the best to watch on a smaller device.

title: Great app
review: Available on the Sony PlayStation 4 so you can stream on your tv as well. To be honest the content is decent. Great way to spend time.

title: Horrible interface on Apple TV
review:
These streaming apps need to stop making their own interfaces. Peacock has no skip back or forward buttons, I can’t access closed captioning with my triple click menu button shortcut, and I can’t play/pause with the trackpad.
Just use the standard interface, please!!

title: Can’t even get premium
review: I was trying to watch the Chelsea vs Liverpool game today and I had purchased premium so I could watch it and it kept saying I have purchased premium but wouldn’t allow me to access the features of it. It ate $25 of my money and I didn’t get any plan besides the free one. Peacock is AWFUL and highly don’t recommend. LEARN HOW TO MAKE AN APP!

title: Useless
review: First attempt to use, won’t cast to my Apple TV or my fire stick so what can it do?  Oh awesome, I get to watch previously free Premier League games on my phone now.  Way to screw thongs up and get totally greedy, NBC.  Your app is a useless mess and you’re gonna lose all the goodwill you created over the last 5+ years to create football supporters in the US!!!

title: Audio doesn’t sync right when you Chromecast
review: Bought a new Chromecast because our old Chromecast is too old to work with Peacock, only to have the audio be out of sync. Really wish you could watch Peacock on Roku or Samsung smart TVs

title: Doesn’t Work
review: Downloaded the app, attempted to create an account, I get a message to try again later. Tried again later, same thing. Deleted the app, re downloaded it again, attempted to create account, same message. Three strikes and I’m out, not exactly all that excited to try again, and I won’t.

title: Inaccessible with voice over for dblind users and no audio discription
review: Xfinity nbc universal normally price itself and accessibility for blind users and for usability in general. This app is very poorly designed with no search function and no audio description. The buttons are also not properly labeled when it comes to finding movies.

title: Literally can't watch
review: Lame. NBC. So so so lame. Pathetic ad set up where you can't stream this nice new platform via HDMI cable or Roku. Once they get over themselves and stop being the most selfish television company in history then maybe it'll be a good streaming option but for now it's a steaming pile of as revenue and incompatible viewings.

title: Great for a new app
review: Yeah, it doesn’t have all the features you want right away but for a new streaming app, it’s pretty awesome. Plus, it has all of Cheers!

title: Great content, flaccid app
review: One of the very biggest corporations on planet earth and this is the best they can do. Laggy, buggy, wobbly.  An ad in the middle of a show (also, premium, why ad?) locks it up and gives a black screen that I have to fast forward past to jog the app to play the ad? Come ON!!!

title: Great friendly UI
review: I am glad NBC/Universal took the needed time to release a stable and reliable app free from technical glitches so far.

title: Not Bad At All
review: This app is pretty good... I enjoy being able to watch all the Harry Potter films. But I wish they included some anime in there but other than that outstanding app!

title: Peacock TV 👍
review:
We absolutely love our new TV app. There is so many great channels to watch crystal clear.
Ya gotta try it you won't be sorry you did 🤙

title: Greed.
review:
I detest the fact that some of my favorite shows are now riddled with commercials. I have to pay even more ON TOP of cable & internet fees to enjoy programs that I once did on Netflix. This was a greedy power money play. Disappointed. 

The app loads slowly. And you can’t create more than one profile. Do. Better.

title: No way to watch on a TV
review: There is no app for Samsung TV and this app does not support airplay. It will play the sound on the TV but the video stays on the phone or tablet. Very annoying and makes this streaming useless for family TV. If you’re thinking about paying for a subscription, DON’T BOTHER! Until they add a Samsung app or Airplay it isn’t worth it.

title: Terrible Apple TV app
review: The content is fine, but the Apple TV interface is the worst I’ve ever seen. Why can’t we skip forward or back 10 seconds like every other streaming service? If I miss a line of dialog and want to skip back, the app is so imprecise I usually end up having to rewatch the last 5 minutes.

title: All my homies hate Peacock
review: All I wanted as to stream soccer and Peacock has made that exponentially more annoying. Now I’m paying for cable and 3 streaming services through NBC just to watch EPL. Most useless app and can’t even access it on all my devices or plug my computer into the TV because it gets blocked. You lost all your trust with soccer fans NBC.

title: Can’t use Xfinity login
review: I downloaded this app to my Apple TV but can’t use my Xfinity login information. I also can’t link my account, so even though I have Premier access with Xfinity, I have to pay for money per month to watch it on my Apple TV? And I can’t airplay from my phone to get around this? No thanks. Complete money grab.

title: SERIOUSLY HOW DO YOU WATCH REPLAYS and FOR PEAT SAKE, HIDE SPORT RESULTS
review:
I open the app to watch a Premiere League match and what do I see, a large tile that tells me who won.  

Why pay to watch something via replay when they’ve spoiled the whole experience???

Next, I have yet to figure out how to watch a replay.  Has anyone that wrote this app even considered how difficult it is and why it must be difficult?

Please add a sports spoiler option.  

Please make it easy to watch replay. 

Please make it easy to figure out watch is being played on NBC Sports Gold and what is on Peacock.   

Oh, can you change the name to NBC All Access?

title: Doesn’t work outside US
review: Would love to try but after i signed up and getting bombarded with email notifications for peacock programming , realized none if the peacock content is available outside the US. At least not for me. Cant believe even news shows which are viewable on the nbc or cnbc app arent viewable with this app. Disappointment.

title: Harry Potter Streaming
review: Absolutely LOVE that the 8 Harry Potter movies will be coming out. It is in October though which leads to 4 stars, today is August 7. Wish they could be faster! Read online they’ll be in the free tier, hope so!!

title: add more languages ​​
review: ok the app is good it has many interesting programs but the thing is that I am from Puerto Rico and I don't understand English well and for example I want to see pawn stars because it is in English and I don't understand it so please add it

title: far left leaning
review: If you Enjoy the alphabet channels abc, MSNBC , cbs, and left leaning ideologies, than this is the perfect application for you. I think they put the older movie and Tv content to attract traffic, but once you use the application you notice it’s really just away for the media to keep you focused on the left agenda on entertainment, politics. And thought.

title: UX issues
review: The free content is really nice, but I’m having difficulty using the app. I’m not able to find my wish list item and I am not able to see all the available content in one area.

title: Lies
review: It says all of this stuff bout being free and everything but it wasn’t even free I tried watch one of my favorite shoe George Lopez show all 6 Seasons where had to be buy for 4.99$ only thing I’m going to pay for is my Netflix this app is a scam please don’t download it if you like to pay for this go ahead but I’m not i don’t have the money

title: Horrible
review: I was excited to get this app when I heard about it even paid the annually premium price just to find out the limitations this app has you can’t even cast on most devices complete rip off coming from a company like NBC you would expect better...hope they fix it cuz I see a big failure in there future

title: Like it but one thing’s missing
review: My only suggestion is that there needs to be a way to make a list of you favorites or “to-do” list.

title: Why bother
review: Downloaded the app this morning to watch the English premier league and the app has already frozen 4 times even though the audio was still working. Only way to restore is to close out and reopen the app.  Really sucky when watching live sports.

title: Keeps on bugging
review: I’ve never seen a streaming app so buggy, it’s really annoying. It crashes, or doesn’t resume after an ad, or the sound resumes but not the pictures, ...  it often resumes at the wrong place. In short: this app isn’t ready.

title: An alright application
review: The app is decent. Most of the shows and movies available are free. Not much bugs encountered on my iPad.

title: 😡😡Peacock is an ugly bird😡😡
review: Who is writing 5 star reviews, NBC employees? This program is junk. It would not accept a paid subscription through the App Store. Deleted and tried 3 times. Canceled the subscriptions, deleted the app, tried to start over but wouldn’t take free sign up. And to make things worse, NBC took the Premier league games off NBCSN.

title: Terrible for soccer
review: The app is junk. It’s hard to find what you’re looking for, especially if it’s a Premier League game. Also, the premium service advertises that replays will be up by 9pm on match days, which so far is mostly a lie. Don’t pay for premium if you want to watch the EPL. They should have just kept the sports on the NBCSN app.

title: Update.
review: Update   I sent them my receipt and fixed it right away. Thank you.

title: Crashes
review:
Another poor NBC app. Search is very slow and the app crashes when I try to access the episodes.  I added a few shows to the watchlist, how do I find the watchlist?

Updated for the third time and the app still doesn’t work.  Still crashes when clicking on Episodes. Hopeless.

title: SUCH A PAIN, PROMPTED ME TO WRITE MY FORST REVIEW
userName: DOESNT WORK NO MATTER THE FIX
review:
Exactly the sam issue as reviewer Sun! 

What the hell? App is not available on my Samsung TV, nor Apple TV app, when I do airplay from my phone - all is fine until a commercial...then it forgets its place and goes back like 30 mins and you cannot fix!!! Not restarting, reloading, deleting, during Bluetooth off....tried it all. Seriously NBC fix this crap!

title: Nice app but
review: It’s a nice app with good content but why is it only on certain devices I don’t understand why It can’t be on fire stick it’s only for Apple products come on now we can do better. It’s almost as if they are forcing you to get an Apple product just to get the app not cool.

title: ADD FULL SCREEN VIEW
review: Please add the full screen view feature where we can watch our content on our phones where we can expand the view to cover the whole screen. Similar to how the Xfinity Stream app does it.

title: Terrible search
review: It shows preview of a live show and it won’t let you click on it you have to search for it even when you search for it Word for Word how it is advertised it still cannot be found

title: Your UI needs more updating
review:
What is the point of the channels that are more random that ACTUAL channels? I mean I love SNL What’s Up Wit Dat sketches but geez!

Why have original programs if you’re not gonna feature them?'

Why have a watchlist that doesn’t go right to episodes to choose / watch?

title: Doesn’t even open
review: Just downloaded the app. Excited to give it a go- so I clicked open, and the peacock bubbles did their little dance... then froze and the app crashed. This has happened about 10 times now. After turning the iPhone off and on again, redone loading, etc. terrible.

title: You must agree to marketing emails
review: When you sign up and give them your email this disclaimer appears “By signing up you agree to receive occasional marketing messages from Peacock.”  While I’m fine with commercials or paying to get rid of them, I’m not subscribing to their email spam. Uninstalled.

title: Pretty good
review: Hopefully live tv and local news (kcra) will be available after trial period is over. Aside from that there are so many programs to watch. The video quality is excellent. The app is easy to use.

title: Casting Issues
review: I have had this app for week and use chrome cast to watch on the tv. And it continues to kick out whatever I am watching usually 15-20 minutes in. It will go back to the “Ready to Cast” screen on the app. Which makes it not worth using for me.

title: Can't Use
review: Every time I click the app, I get a few seconds of the loading screen and then it crashes. My friend has the app, and while it works, trying to get it to cast to the tv was near impossible. Was looking forward to free streaming :( Seems the platform needs some serious debugging.

title: Fix Airplay to Apple TV video
review: Only reason I got this app was to watch PL because you had create another app from NBC sports. Im paying and can’t use a very important standard App streaming feature. What kind of customer experience is this?? Why is this not compatible with Apple TV AirPlay???

title: Questionable Security
review: Tried to sign up with a medium length complex password. App just says “illegal characters in password “ without saying which characters are “illegal “. Apps should accept passwords with all printable characters and at least 64 characters in length.

title: Custom Video Controls Ruin This
review: The Apple TV app playback controls are uselessly custom. Skip forward/backward is nonfunctional. When trying to scrub playback for a movie it is very difficult to control. When playing with AirPods in, taking one out paused the playback and I had to kill the app to get it playing again.

title: Why?
review: Well NBC followed CBS’s idiotic idea and network TV started charging to watch what used to be free on their websites.  And there’s still ads!   Everyone’s just nickeling and diming you these days.  Rather pathetic when you realize how easily it could be free and they’d still generate ad revenue.

title: Shocking avoid at all costs
review: Making me have 2 subscriptions to watch 1 product? This is a joke... and starting the season without apps on Roku or fire stick and not sorting out making chrome cast work? Absolute trash can’t wait until another network buys the the rights so I can never watch nbc again

title: They’ve made it so you can’t mirror
review: For those of you who thought you would be able to mirror your iPhone to an AppleTV or other mirroring app, so you could at least watch it on a larger screen, they have purposely made this app unable to do so. As soon as any stream is opened it does not allow it.

title: No AirPlay on iOS App, locks in landscape mode
review: I can’t Airplay what I’m watching on the phone Peacock app to my Apple TV. The videos on the app do not have an airplay option. Please add. All I get played on my tv is the 41 second peacock promo on loop with no sound. Also please enable viewing in portrait mode or at least don’t lock it to landscape. Incredibly annoying.

title: Love the app, please support airplay
review: On an iPad connected to a lightning to HDMI adapter, the app appears on the TV, but video only appears on the iPad and not the external TV. Other streaming apps work just fine, so please fix this.

title: Ugh Really?
review: There is a nice selection and all, but Peacock cuts out many scenes of different shows. It's so annoying. And it's not disturbing or innapropriate scenes, it's just regular parts of shows. Not to mention an insane amount of adds. I know there was going to be some adds, but not this much! This app can be highly irrigating!

title: Terrible
review: Where are all the SNL episodes?  We get a lousy 5 out of 45 seasons and a “channel” that shows the same clips over and over. I am very disappointed. Even Seeso had all the episodes before you shut it down. I have never reviewed an app before today but this is the biggest disappointment ever.

title: App not loading on open
review: The app is not loading past the second load dots. Your apps then freezes once. Tried to close and reopen and it's just a black screen no loading. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling multiple times with the same outcome.

title: Amazing App
review: I’m so happy this exists! And the mobile experience is absolutely beautiful and unique. Love the channels and there is something for everyone.

title: Ghost Adventures and Teen Wolf
review: Please add all seasons of ghost adventures and teen wolf. You can never find seasons of those anywhere, you always have to buy them. Those two are my favorite shows I miss besides Heroes. Please bring them on here with all seasons

title: Wow!!! What a selection of shows... For free!!!
review: Amazing to think that this service is currently free! Can’t believe they have unsolved mysteries on here an the premiere league!! Thank you!!

title: Amazing!!!
review: Super user friendly and excellent content! Love having my news and entertainment all in one place!

title: Best app
review: People may think this app is trash but in my opinion it is the best app ever for one reason only it has all 8 Harry Potter movies on it.

title: Buggy
review: Midway through tends to jump back to the first section. Then you have to watch all the ads again to get back to where it was. First ad is in the first 3 minutes. Wish it was a little later.

title: Absolutely crap
review: So so bad. NBC has us over a barrel when it comes to watch the premier league and they know it. Can’t pause or rewind live games. Replays are not available when they are supposed to be. The user interface is difficult to use and has load times when navigating the menus. Crap.

title: Obsessed
review: Loooove it so much it has all of my favorites it honestly couldn’t be any better!

title: Can’t watch premier league
review: The fact that I’m paying for nbcsn to watch the premier league and now have to pay for both nbcsn and peacock to watch my team play is evil. You guys are a bunch of money hungry pigs that do not care about the viewers which is why I’m switching to watching pirated streams instead of giving you my money

title: Disappointed
review: The fact that there is no app for smart TVs is really not acceptable. Additionally, practically all EPL games are now on the app, which you need to pay for to watch. It used to be 2-3 games a day on the weekend. Now it’s just one a day?? I’m sucked into subscribing to this service because I love the game so much. I’m very disappointed.

title: Great app
review: Excellent choice for content otherwise not easily available. Well done.

title: Worst Streaming Service EVER!
review: We downloaded this app to watch a movie in our backyard only to discover that the Peacock app intentionally blocks you from watching through a projector. WHAT. THE. CRAP. Whoever made that decision hates their viewers and needs to be fired immediately. I will never support this app and will actively discourage everyone I know from using it as well. Garbage.

title: Extremely Poor Search Functrion
review: I tried to search for an actor in a movie that is currently on the service but it came up “could not be found”.  I would have give the app one star but the steaming works.

title: Great app with one exception
review: When watching any video in the Peacock app, the white bar thingy at the bottom of my screen doesn’t go away. Please, make it go away. Thanks

title: Best
review: Even tho i don’t have premium I think peacock is better than Tubi but I don’t know It’s all about the entertainment so peacock

title: Free to watch?
review: Why advertise “Free to watch” yet we gotta pay monthly for extra features and more seasons/episodes for any show? 7 day free trial? Why not a month like regular steaming apps do?

title: Not able to use iOS 13.6
review: Saw that this app was released and was curious and downloaded it on the latest iOS 13.6 but when opening the it it shows the logo for a few seconds before crashing . I am using an iPhone SE 2. Can’t give a good rating when I can’t even access any content

title: this is all FREE??
review: still in Absolute shock that i don’t have to pay for any of this amazing content! love this service, what a lifesaver honestly!

title: only app that won’t connect to apple tv
review: I was forced to get this app because they bought the rights to half of the english league soccer games. No options for languages, cant scroll back if you’re watching live and I can’t watch it on my apple tv, I don’t even know why they’re editors choice.

title: Poor streaming quality and lots of errors
review: Have had the app a little over a week and it’s full of errors and poor streaming. Always choppy and constantly buffering. This isn’t a internet speed issue as all my other streaming apps work with no concerns.

title: Absolutely Brutal
review:
This app is terrible. I have it on my iPhone XS and an iPad and it doesn’t work on either. Constantly freezes, doesn’t tell me what shoes or episodes I’ve recently watched, doesn’t pair well with chromecast.. the list goes on.

If Parks and Rec was still on Netflix I would’ve never switched. Please go back 😩

title: Very buggy
review: Sometimes jumps to the next episode before the current one is over. Sometimes drops to SD quality. Sometimes hangs for long pauses, repeatedly. Always acts unpredictably, e.g. sometimes auto plays next episode, other times simply ends.

title: Horrible app
review: Aweful, money hungry app.  Only allows 3 streams where as NBCsports gold was 5.  They are trying to promote this app so much that they are not showing huge EPL games on cable.  Also it glitches and boots you off. I have to resign into my account multiple times a day.  Horrible, horrible app and a total waste of $50 bucks

title: Clunky
review:
Its bad enough that they added Tim Howard but the app itself is terrible. Nbc had a great Epl team and coverage and all that is gone. 

I don't mind paying to watch a game. But games are hard to find because of the app layout. Then once it you find it the app crashes and crashes. 
  
How in 2020 does a app have no rewind of live games so when you tune in late you can go back and see the goals. 

Plus  No Picture in Picture in ios14 

Get it together or I will just do what others have suggested and find another way to watch.

title: App doesn’t launch and error handling is terrible
review: Downloaded so I could watch the Dan Patrick show. Tried to create an account and an error occurred with a message stating “try again later.” Should provide better error handling if it is not going to work. ‘Try again later’ is the kiss of death.

title: App has bugs
review: Tried to redownload app it will not and blocks itself this is just me trying to go to pay for the service I’m not sure there’s no info nor support to help fix it hopefully these things get resolved

title: Getting away from a potential bad experience
review: I was getting ready to download this app, but after reading so many reviews,I will not. When I watch tv I want entertainment, not frustration. I’ll stick to Pluto tv. They are great, live content and an array of movies and tv shows to choose from.

title: Needs work
review: We purchased Peacock for a number of the shows they were advertising. Unfortunately, the app will not cast to our TV (we’ve been seeing a number of other users support the same). Please fix this!

title: Audio no video when using Airplay
review: My other apps work using the airplay2 with my Samsung TV.  Peacock only has audio, the video doesn’t work.  I paid for a year and cannot even watch it on my TV.  Bad enough there isn’t an app for my TV.

title: Not there yet
review: Doesn’t support AirPlay, also has loads of technical issues that most streaming apps would never have for optimal viewing experience. Peacock/NBC needs to get it together, rather than force themselves into the streaming space without considering what consumers truly need/want. Disappointed

title: Bad selection
review: I was very disappointed to see only current seasons of current shows to be on the app. The ads and commercials made it seem like I would be able to catch up on the seasons I missed and almost every show on their I can watch for free without ads anyway

title: Great service but one problem
review: This is an all around great service and i’ve been waiting for a long time for it but there’s one big problem, WHY THE HECK DO THEY NOT HAVE BROOKLYN NINE NINE?!?!?!?

title: App needs work
review: App is poor quality, when you take out AirPods  instead pausing the video it switches to playing with using the speaker. Poor choice of development. I looked for settings to adjust but those didn’t exist.

title: Play in background
review: The service is great, but the player in the app needs to be Allowed to play in the background and download videos for offline play

title: Sound Quality Awful
review: Sound/ volume is constantly changing loud to low on shows and commercials. Get it together ! None of my others apps do this . Hope there is a fix in the works . Using Apple TV

title: Limited streaming
review: Signed up for premium mainly for Premier League matches.  App is not available for Firestick or Roku though, and unable to cast onto TV so limited to watching on an iPhone.  I changed from an older Apple TV to Firestick after NBC Gold transferred to NBC Sports App, as there was no app for the Apple TV.  Very frustrating.  Will likely cancel subscription.

title: Super Laggy
review:
Super laggy service. Tried multiple show. It’s not my connection as all other streaming services are great! Conveniently the commercials were fine. 

Also, don’t appreciate the bait-and-switch tactics by not showing a premium flag on “free first episodes”.

title: SCAM of a 7-Day free trial, deceptive in general
review:
Charged a day before free trial was up.  Emails from apple confirms this.  Currently waiting for refund.

Also when I had used the app many of the shows had 1-3 episodes truly free after those the premium plan is needed.  So deception all around.  This app is now permanently deleted off my devices.

title: So many options!
review: Can you make it available on Roku?

title: AWESOME APP!👍🏼
review: I really like the show Get out of my Room, and thy have all the episodes for free. They also have a lot of Curious George episodes, and American Girls movies. I give it 5 stars!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Premium and Premium Plus DON’T WORK
review: Not worth the frustration!!  NBC needs to put their content on apps that work and stop wasting our time.  Paid for the upgrade to watch new shows but app doesn’t register that I bought upgrade.  Impossible to watch any new shows.  Peacock need to fix this!

title: Facepalm
review: It’s literally impossible to get rid of stupid white swipe up during the viewing. It don’t disappear during playing just like other streaming apps such as Netflix. If they would try to fix this annoying feature then I’ll re-consider using it again.

title: This is so far off from being the best
review:
Listed as a top app 
Read the reviews 
Nobody has had a good experience with this app but Apple thinks we love!!
Not free $4.99 a month for premium or $9.99 for premium plus 
Audio is in low quality 
Picture is in Standard Definition 
Sub titles out of sync 
Commercial ads even during movies that you cannot skip 

I bet the prices change in 6 months to over $50 bucks 
It is a lot cheaper than cable 
Screencast works good !

My Nvidia shield get all the stuff on this app for free !
Pluto TV has more content and no charge

title: Bugs, lots of bugs
review: I love the programming but I constantly have to delete and reload the app due to it freezes up or you can hear in background but no video.  Please fix these issues.

title: no spanish dubs like netflix, disney plus, or apple tv +
review: Hoped they would have spanish language dubbing on their shows like competitors. I would be happy to subscribe if they had some shows with spanish dubbing.....but after checking 20-30 shows and none having alternate language tracks, i gave up.

title: Poor playback controls
review: No pause. Videos start playing while you are searching or browsing. Very annoying.

title: Can’t rewind with Apple TV
review: This is pretty disappointing. I can’t rewind using the Apple TV remote. Apparently the only way to rewind on the Apple TV is to use the app on an iPhone. I understand why NBC is taking their shows back, but please please please fix this problem.

title: App too buggy, doesn’t allow continuous play of content, layout too crowded
review: Needs a UX/UI overhaul.  That said, love the original programming (AP Bio & Amber Ruffin ❤️), SNL vault, and Hitchcock movies — hopefully some of these archives can be expanded.  As is, the functionality of the app does a huge disservice to the quality and breadth of programming coming from NBC / Universal.

title: Won’t allow connection to TV
review: One star due to app will not allow hdmi/lightening connector to push image to TV. Freezes immediately when show/game starts. Other than that context, image, streaming is good on device but should have ability to play to a TV like all other apps.

title: This is 2020
review: If you like being caught in an endless cycle of a Bot providing you bad service, an unorganized structure, and unclear directory this is the app for you. Signed up to watch Premier League, but finding the available games is similar to attempting to find a long lost treasure. NBC, quality is more important than speed.

title: Forced subscriber
review: I wasn’t really interested in being a peacock subscriber, but, I was forced into it by NBC putting some of the biggest premier league games on premium only. To add insult to injury, the app is not even supported on my streaming service, so I am watching games on my computer. Shame on you during an, already, stressful 2020.

title: Ruined Premier League.
review: This app does not work properly. If it did I would be willing to pay for Premier League but it doesn’t and is not worth the money. Premier League morning show and games are hard to find. No rewind, fast forward. A poorly designed money grab not worth the ransom money to watch Premier League.

title: App freezes and goes in and out
review: Downloaded today for Premier league..... constant lockup’s..... video quality goes in and out from fuzzy to crisp. Seems ok once going I wish it wasn’t so buggy! All my other streaming apps work fine.

title: Doesn’t work on iPads
review: This app works fine on my Apple TV, but when I try to use on my iPad it keeps saying there’s no internet connection, which isn’t true. Not sure it’s worth the money if I can’t watch on all my devices.

title: EPL promises broken again
review: Once again American fans get to be disappointed with how we are taken for a ride to see games. For shame NBC. You have a choice to provide access to a worldwide fan base and you continue to choose to cater only to those who can afford top tier access. Way to miss the 2020 memo.

title: Clunky
review: The home line indicator on iPhone X is always visible which is super annoying and obtrusive especially when watching a dark show. Nothing like a bright white line to ruin the mood. Hopefully they get this fixed soon.

title: No AirPlay option is a joke
review: It’s been a month and there’s no AirPlay option on iOS. I can understand if they’re not going to support older Apple TV devices, but then to not have AirPlay is a big miss. In a time of people staying at home, you have to provide options to watch in their TVs.

title: Ehhhh
review: Constantly buffers so it takes twice as long to get through watching nothing. I jumped in and signed up for the $4.99/mo plan but think I’ll cancel after the free week trial.  Would sign up again if the buffering issue is resolved.

title: No full screen or zoom on iPhone
review: No full screen option on iPhones. Movies on my 11pro look tiny with black bars on top, bottom and both sides. This should be a basic feature in all video apps.

title: Has potential...
review: The content and price point is good. But have two days of multiple downloads, still can’t get my brand new chromecast to work...You really expect me to spend hours consuming content on my phone when so many other apps/services let me connect to my TV?!

title: Glitches
review: I tried watching Jurassic Park (an old favorite) the vocals did not match what the actors were saying, and the commercial breaks are sloppy. The screen froze on the movie, and I heard the commercial before appeared on the screen.

title: Needs User Profiles and air dates of shows!
review:
Not bad... but desperately needs user profiles!!! I also like to see the air dates of all the programming if it is a tv show, or the release date if it is a movie. 
Please add these!

title: New streaming app!
review: Great new streaming app that offers great variety. Can’t wait for them to get on Roku so I can watch from my tv!!

title: Love
review: I love it so much totally recommend i love watching movies and show it has so many movies and shows ❤️love

title: Paying for Commeericals
review: I paid for the monthly subscription, yet still watching commercials that last over 5 minutes. The ideal beginning paying it to not see commercials.

title: I can only watch this from my cable box
review: I have the app on my iPhone, but I have repeatedly tried to sign up and it tells me that there is a problem every time. Unfortunately I can’t take my tv with me “on the go”. The app is useless if you can’t sign up to watch.

title: Why?
review: Ever since the newest iOS, parts of my drop down bar appear on the side of the screen when watching shows. When I force quit the app, it goes away. I’ve only ever seen this problem on this app :/

title: great until i couldn’t watch anything
review: it was fine for SVU until they added that “premium” crap. now i can’t watch it. the ads weren’t enough?

title: Apple TV app needs work
review:
After signing up it took until the next day for streams to actually play instead of doing nothing, not even a warning.

It’s also practically impossible to skip forward or backward because they use non standard controls that make you skip minutes at a time.

New bug: every time you want to continue a series you’re watching it just restarts the last episode you watched.

And I’m not sure if this is under your control but why are swear words bleeped out? What am I, 12 yo?

title: missing a key basic feature
review: so far, works ok, as long you don’t need to fast forward or rewind on the apple tv. there’s no back 15 seconds or anything functionally similar. you have to swipe, and it’s basically a lottery. am i going back 5 seconds or 5 years? who knows. better off just starting the show completely over which means more ad play for them—funny how that works out

title: Impossible to navigate
review: You can only search from one page, there should just be a search bar no matter where you are.  Also, the only reason people have this app is premier league soccer, and get every game is impossible to find.

title: It does not make sense (Premier League)
review: They payed all that money for the TV rights just to hide so much of the content behind an absurd paywall. It's so corporate and tone deaf especially during these times. When watching sports is at its highest demand while people are stuck at home, lets charge everyone extra.

title: So many bugs.
review: Good shows but the app keeps locking up and shows keep freezing. Scrolling through shows can be painful as the screen is sensitive and selects random episodes as you scroll.

title: App crashes every commercial
review: It’s annoying that every time a commercial plays, the app crashes, I have to exit out & back in & it doesn’t always pick up where it left off.

title: Turn off auto-play
review: Please include an option to turn off auto-play.  Also, like the other streaming services, there should be an option to always show cc (closed captions).

title: Great app! CJC Network
review: I love the app. I just wish they would get TheGrid Network then I can get rid of my SelectTV app and watch everything on Peacock.

title: MONSTER HIGH
review:
I love this app because there’s monster high monster high is my favorite monster high monster high monster high monster high IFBTHEY GET RIG OF MONSTER HIGH IW WILL MAKE SURE THE GO DOWN 
like you thanks for monster high 🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰

title: App will not open
review: I’m sure this is a good app but it basically crashes upon launch on my iPhone XS. After the latest update it still does the same thing.

title: It’s okay
review: I’m okay with some of the stuff, but it advertises as a free streaming network. When it’s not that at all. i understand that $5 a month is not a lot but don’t advertise as free then try to charge me when i go to watch a season 2. Fix how you advertise this app.

title: Ok - needs improvement
review: This is a good app but when you try to cast to Google Chromecast there is an audio lag often. Willing to make this five stars if this gets updated.

title: Apple TV + HomePod issues
review: If you’re like me and your output your Apple TV audio to a HomePod pair don’t expect this app to work consistently. I can occasionally get it to do so, but it requires multiple tries (dozens, not a couple). Not ready for prime time for a premium television experience.

title: New and Exciting
review: This is a new platform that is free and really fun to use! I would recommend getting this!

title: Idk
review: I was soo excited to watch all seasons of bgc but they only have seasons 13,14,15,16,17 🙄soo there for iam hurt and disrespected by peacock because they even said “all 17 seasons will be streaming on peacock “ and no theres only 5 seasons and not even good seasons 🙄

title: Sign in
review: My wife and I have both tried several times to set up an account and keep getting an error. We have tried on multiple devices and keep getting an error occurred, try again later. I'm done trying. Deleted this app.

title: Amazing App
review: You can get so many movie and tv shows for FREE! Definitely recommend!

title: Loaded my show once and never again.
review: I’ve attempted to watch Harry Potter for over 30 minutes now. It doesn’t load and you can’t say it’s my internet because it is 200+mbps. It is a shame that this service doesn’t work. It would be good otherwise.

title: No pip
review: I use this because parks and recreation is being taken off of Netflix but I like using my phone for other things while I watch it and I can’t do that with this app please add pip

title: Good but...
review: I like the selection of the shows, however I cannot get it to work on my Apple TV.  It works fine on my phone but will not let me mirror the screen to the Apple TV or sign in.  If it were not for that, I would rate higher.

title: Pass word never works
review: Can’t watch anything tried signing so many time s it’s a joke. Your pass word does not match so they sent me a email to reset a new pass word. So I did. Signed in again there is a problem try again. This is a waste of my time. I’m deleting the app and emails.

title: Auto Play
review: I love the app and the shows available but I primarily use chrome cast to watch it and there is no auto play nor an option to enable it. Please give us auto play!!!

title: Ok app but
review: The service is good but the UI for the Apple TV is utter crap! Trying to navigate just a few seconds requires multiple steps. Please allow the 10 second skip on the Apple TV remote.

title: Not worth the $$
review: Not at all what I expected. Many of the shows that were advertised pre-launch are not current and are old seasons. Anything current is something I could have watched on my TV anyway. Such a disappointment and I will not be renewing my subscription.

title: I can't watch the premier league
review: I pay for the premium and the reason why is because I lik soccer they u can watch the premier league that was the reason I pay for the premium when game are on can't even find live section

title: Constantly freezes when casting to TV
review: Constantly freezes when casting to TV. Seems to work OK if I watch on my iPad but forget about casting. I hope they start working on that and get the bugs out soon

title: Crashes Upon Opening
review: I’ve re downloaded the app several times and it continues to crash about three seconds after opening it. Nothing has loaded it just opens with a black screen and peacock logo then crashes. Hopefully this will be patched with an update. iPhone XR

title: NO STREAMING TO DEVICES
review: Talk about crappy, you wait 3 years for a movie and it has to be on this stupid app. Not only does the app not cast to any devices when streaming, you also cannot use peacock tv to play on even a web browser?! So glad I waited til today for real free instead of getting one of the paid plans!

title: No Air play available
review: Please update the interface and functionality to allow for airplay. I would like to stream from my phone to Apple TV.

title: App shuts off
review: I’ve been having constant issues with the app. It will stop playing after about 7 mins and will make me watch ads every time I restart the same episode I’ve been trying to finish for over an hour...

title: Can’t sign in with TV provider
review: I can watch peacock premium with my xfinity account, but I can’t watch it on the app? So I have to pay to use the app..but I can watch it for free at home with cable?

title: Desperately needs jog controls on AppleTV
review: Every other streaming app will jog forward or back 10-15 seconds by pressing either side of the remote. As far as I can tell Peacock doesn’t support this feature. Really annoying if you miss something or want to skip ahead.

title: Awful and money grabbing losers
review: It’s one thing to rob your already paying customers from previous years. It’s another to do it with a pathetic product that fails and doesn’t stream at all. Weak effort to grab more money in the USA by NBC sports, shameful and worse pathetic. Did they do any testing whatsoever?

title: Looking forward to future updates
review:
Really enjoying the app so far and loving the content!

I know you all work really hard on this app, so please keep up the hard work!

One thing I would really love is Picture in Picture capability. Is that in the pipeline for a near-future update?

Thanks!

title: Gold was bad. This is worse
review: Come on NBC. This is going to kill soccer in America. Putting this many matches behind a paywall is a huge mistake. Also no Airplay and no ability to split screen on iPad is a joke. At least offer the same features that Gold had. Very disappointed.

title: The App doesn’t work
review: I get errors every time I log in. I try to create a new account and get errors then. I try to reset my password and never get an email. I’m sure the app works great. I’ve just never been able to use it which seems like an important feature.

title: Give me all the Law and Order
review: I’d give five stars easy if they’d put all the seasons of Law and Order on Peacock. They only have 13 and up. Ridiculous. Shouldn’t this be the app that has them all???

title: commercials > user experience
review: The irony of bragging about sponsors paying for “limited commercials” & then ruin shows with commercial breaks that cut into the middle of random dramatic moments throughout shows. Billions of dollars, decades in the biz, & these morons can’t get commercial breaks right... sad. I’ll just wait for these shows to hit netflix...

title: Can’t use on Samsung TVs nor can you AirPlay to Samsung
review: This app is useless to me if I can’t watch it from the TVs in the house and I shouldn’t have to buy an adapter.  Every other competitor is at least able to do this. Very disappoint that I’ll have to watch the EPL from my iPad. I guess I can have the Bundesliga up on the TV then.

title: I Agree. One of the Worst Apps I’ve ever dealt with
review: Which is really disappointing and perplexing because we’ve come so far and there are so many great streaming services out there, this feels like going 20 years in the wrong direction. C’mon, guys.  Fix your app

title: Why
review: This make noSense. Every other streaming program you can watch on your phone or your television or your iPad or wherever. NOPE, not this one! Only on your phone or your iPad I feel like I’m back in 2000. Get it together guys streaming mean streaming

title: Needs picture in Picture
review: I think this app should have picture in picture feature

title: Accessibility is horrible
review: If you’re going to make a good app please make sure that you make it accessible for others. There is no reading on the labels meaning I can’t even see what the heck is coming on unless it’s on the watchlist. Fix it please! Make sure you have voiceover testers to make this happen!

title: Very disappointed
review: this app needs a lot of work . Too many glitches. episodes sometimes take forever to even play. It has a decent library of shows and movies but the app itself is not as great as they advertised it to be.

title: Unfinished
review: Streaming to chrome cast from iOS is broken, get blank screen only. Apple TV streaming also broken, you need to do screen mirroring but only audio works. However, the ads somehow stream flawlessly.

title: Premier League
review: Terrible App for the Premier League. Unable to view the premier league game or rewind it to the beginning. Splitting the Premier League games between this app and their sports network seems like a blatant attempt to make you pay for two subscription services. What a huge disappointment for this season.

title: Not allowed to mirror...
review: I downloaded this app planning to use my phone to mirror-but it won’t let me. Except it will mirror the ads??!! I’m getting rid of it until they’re willing to change it and I’ll be sticking to Disney+ and Netflix even though I have to pay for these services.

title: Crashes on Ipad Air
review: App description says this works on IOS 11 and up but my Ipad Air on 12.4.8 doesn't get past startup screen. I have tried restarting my Ipad to no avail. Works fine on my phone but I would rather not watch TV on my phone.

title: Searched Episodic Content Feature Broken
review: The application crashes every time you attempt to watch any specific episode of searched content. (iPad) This is so frustrating that it completely ruins the application for me. What use is content if you cannot view it?

title: Good idea, terrible apple tv app
review: Too many technical issues with this app. Did these people not their app before releasing it??? 🤦‍♂️ App keeps crashing after a few minutes. Also, content is very similar to Pluto TV which is also free - I see no value at the moment to download Peacock 👎

title: Poor
review: Real problems with mirroring. No problem steaming news clips, movies, or commercials. However, while I see the content fine on the device, all I can get on live or programmed TV is audio, presumably buffering.

title: Will Not Stream to Chromecast on iPhone
review: Just downloaded app & it will not connect to chromecast. It clocks for a few minutes before ultimately disconnecting. I tried multiple other apps & they all connected & streamed just fine so I can only assume the issue is with this app & its compatibility with iOS &/or chromecast.

title: Missing Watch List Button
review: Button to access Watchlist is missing. Unable to just view the items I have added to my Watchlist.

title: I love it
review: I don’t know why people say it is bad I mean come on you get to watch movies for free

title: Freezes constantly
review: I have to re-cast episodes at least 5 times each show; very frustrating and after the 5th time, I switch to a different channel, ending of the show be damned. Almost ready to just delete it.

title: Can’t beat free
review: There is little to no new content that I’m interested but as there’s a handful of classic TV shows, it’s worth the low cost of free as long as it stays free.

title: Soccer hostage
review:
I downloaded this app and bought Premium membership for the English Premier League games that they are hiding from the NBCSN audience. 

   NBC buys more sports rights than they can handle, and now they are pimping their precious purchases, declaring Peacock as the “home of the EPL”. 

I can’t record Peacock games, and if I miss the one I want, I am on the pimp’s timetable for replay.

The rest of their material isn’t worth the hype. I get more voluminous options on free streaming apps.

title: Completely Useless - complete money grab
review: “Would you like to pay twice for games/shows that you already pay for with your cable subscription? Great! Pay for Peacock and we’ll show you MORE commercials. Oh and the quality will be terrible.”

title: DONT SUBSCRIBE
review: This is a greedy and the worst move made by comcast. So they want to pay for a subscription to watch a game when we’re already subscribed to cable provider? What a worthless selfish inconsiderate company it is I hope it goes bankrupt and burn to the ground then you start giving us content.

title: Terrible for football
review: I’m trying to watch a football match and the app keeps loading every 30seconds. The picture is often grainy. Also the app isn’t playing the halftime coverage and commercials. I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone!

title: Love it but need to be able to mirror it
review: This app is great! But it’ll be even better with the ability to screen mirror it with any tv

title: iPhone screen mirroring doesn’t work
review: It appears that the app doesn’t support screen mirroring with iPhone. I googled the issue and there are many threads out there verifying this. It’s a shame because it’s a decent app and I like the shows....but I want to watch on a bigger screen.

title: App keeps crashing
review: So when I try to open this app it crashes. I like the app but it keeps crashing

title: Casting issues
review:
Constant casting issues. Locks up my chrome, freezes out every 30
Minutes and unable to disconnect or reconnect. Only
App to have this problem. Frustrating, most likely going to delete it if not fixed soon.

title: Poor with Live TV
review: Trying to watch a Premier League game that’s clearly Live on my phone, but when I try to Chromecast it to my TV, it jumps back several minutes and there’s no way to make it go Live again. Really frustrating.

title: Horrible
review: Unless you are ready to watch shows on your iPad or phones, it’s not worth the download. This app refuses to connect to chromecast to play on the tv. We’ve tried everything! It’s not rocket science to click the button but nothing happens. Waste of time! Don’t download!

title: not a hit
review:
easily one of the worst steaming apps i’ve used. 

for example - 

so far i’ve had to restart this same episode 3 times. all of a sudden it jumps to the ready to cast screen for no reason. and every time i have to restart the subtitles.  which by the way are spoilers as the next statement shows up in print before it’s said if there is a long pause after what was just said. nbd but still annoying. oh and if the show has subtitles something you may have missed the app subtitles will cover that, but won’t include it so you’ll miss that statement completely.  again. nbd but really annoying and distracting.  and i’m only trying to watch below deck ffs. 

if paying for this app is the only fix for the steaming quality issue, i’d say not worth it.

title: Paying for this
review: NBC makes us once again change applications, pay for a new subscription, simply to watch premier league soccer, and you can’t create the simple tool to stream it to my TV

title: Out of sync audio on Chromecast
review: App works great on phone but audio goes out of sync when using Chromecast. Restarting the stream fixes this temporarily but it will keep falling out of sync. Please fix!

title: Pathetic - Long delay in casting Live Sports
review:
Tried to watch the Premier League game live and there is a 5 minute difference between casting to TV and watching on the phone. It’s like watching highlights when the game is on Live! Imagine that!!! 
I expect an established company like NBC to make an app that can cast well. In this age, casting to TV is basic.

title: Amazing
review: I finally have a place to watch premier league matches for FREE!!! Amazing app can’t wait to see what happens in the future.

title: Obsessed
review: The layout is amazing and all my favorite shows and movies are on here. Thank you peacock!!!!!!

title: Needs Work
review: The interface is not great and needs a lot of updating. Also it buffers frequently when it’s time for an ad. I would not recommend this app in its current state.

title: Terrible streaming app
review: Good streaming service, but the app is missing many features like picture and picture mode. It's really annoying that my show pauses everytime I have to reply to a text message. And when it resume the playback studders.

title: Movies A-Z/Awful app design!!!
review: Would really love to see ALL the movies available on this service, but it only shows my the first 12 in alphabetical order and no more! Hope you know what your looking for via a search. Where is my view all option!?

title: Horrible App, Decent Streaming Service
review: The app lacks many features that seemingly have been standard for 10+ years. It doesn’t even offer play/pause buttons for live tv or the ability to cast to a device. By far the worst streaming app on the App Store.

title: BOYCOTT PEACOCK
review: If you’re trying to watch Premier League you should boycott this service and find another way. You can’t record matched and Match replays aren’t available until 9 hours after the match! NBC really butchered this. Probably the worst streaming service available right now.

title: Why am I paying for NBC through cable?
review:
They just took all of their decent content from NBCSports and threw it behind a paywall with a poor app.
There is now nothing on NBC I want to watch, but I am still forced to buy it though cable and now this extra.

No way. Too much of a money grab.

title: Paywall for premier league
review: I pay for cable to get the premier league on NBCSN, now they’ve decided to move it all to peacock. Not only is it an extra charge, it isn’t even available on Roku! This is a disgrace of a streaming service and should be shut down for a more competent replacement.

title: There is nothing to watch
review: How many times can I watch the same shows over and over again?  There are all  old re-runs, nothing new, creative or exciting.

title: No audio only
review:
All the other stealing apps allow user to lock phone, and then hit play to lists to the program audio only. Great for bedtime. 

Peacock does not. Bummer

title: Disappointed MSNBC Fan
