review: I’m disappointed that there aren’t complete shows under the News tab. Only short, undated clips. It would be great if you could add the last four or five episodes of your news shows, and please date them. Thanks in advance.

title: All kinds of sports?
review: World soccer, motoGP , nascar, ...wow, a must  download for me. Whoever is responsible for all this sports on local channel i say to you!!!! A big thank you

title: Awesome!
review: I love the concept of “mostly free streaming” and peacock does this in an amazing way.  Not trying it out would be a waste - it’s free!

title: Peacock
review: They heavily advertise this streaming service as free, which is true to a certain extent but not entirely. Shows and movies go away after a few weeks and some content you can’t even watch without premium.

title: Not available ANYWHERE yet.
review: I have a brand new high end Samsung smartTV... I subscribe to all of the streaming services... I have top tier Spectrum broadband internet/cable service... and yet for whatever BS reason Peacock is not offered here in my STL market — are you serious?!?! What the hell guys??!! IF YOU’RE GOING TO LAUNCH W SUCH A TINY AVAILABLE MARKET THEN MAKE YOUR NEW PROGRAMMING AVAILABLE ON NBC & BRAVO APPS UNTIL YOU’RE MORE NATIONWIDE

title: Just awful
review: This app is fine for browsing on-demand content, but their “live channels” streams are terrible. No way to pause (or mute) the feed on the default channel while you’re looking through the list of other channels?!?

title: Good start
review: There’s a lot of great NBC content here but there needs to be a live local channel, like CBS All Access offers. The price (free) is right though!

title: Wow
review: I really can’t believe that a  app with a truck load of tv shows is free. Honestly unbelievable!

title: Its not free..
review: Its not free ... just a marketing gimmick...Others streaming services give you free trial ..peacock gives free episodes.. I thought its like TubiTv .. not quite so. But explore and decide ... is the content really worth 5 bucks per month..

title: Samsung Smart TV’s
review: Will this app be available soon for Samsung Smart Flat Screens ?  I would rather watch TV on my 55” flat screen as opposed to my iPhone.  Hope you guys make this available to to Samsung Smart TV’s soon !!!!

title: Doesn’t work on Chromecast
review: iOS App won’t cast to my Chromecast. The cast icon just keeps showing that it’s trying to cast for about a minute and then stops. All of my other apps (like HBO Max) work fine, so it’s not the Chromecast, it’s the app. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app and it still doesn’t work.

title: False advertising...
review: Advertises itself as completely free but it is not. You get random episodes of random shows here and there free, but everything else you have to pay 5 bucks a month for. It’s not expensive, but don’t advertise to be something you’re not...

title: Love it but wish it was on Samsung tv
review: I really love this app I can watch all my favorite movies for free but I just wish it was on Samsung tv so I didn’t just have to watch it on my phone

title: Review
review: Not horrible but they need to work on continue playing between devices. Good shows and movies for free

title: Putting EPL matches on a paywall is bush league
review:
It’s the early morning on 10/18. Instead of showing the match on TV (NBCSN), it’s behind this slow app with over a minute DELAY of actual results. How do I know this? Because any human can follow live feeds such as Twitter. 

So the app is slow. The app UI is terrible. The paywall is abhorrent.

title: Picture in picture?
review: Where’s the picture in picture?? Why doesn’t Peacock have that feature?

title: Streaming on a Samsung smart tv is problematic
review:
NBC should be tar and feathered. They put all the good soccer match’s on this streaming service and then don’t provide apps that work on a 2019 Samsung TV

Then they announced that it works on Roku. Well not on a Roku Express.

Until they get the licensing agreement worked out. It is worse than useless

title: Errors with using HDMI to TV cord
review: I like the app and the available movies and tv shows, but when I try and use my HDMI connecter cable that plugs into my iPhone, it won’t play anything on my TV.

title: Disappointing for Prem Fans
review: Stream is behind always behind by a few minutes. Most games are behind paywall now instead of on NBCSN. Have to switch from pregame on NBCSN or on peacock to the game stream and then back for postgame often times. After years of great coverage I expected more from NBCSN.

title: What were you thinking???
review: NBC is going to RUIN the US market for Premier League by pushing us all through an additional subscription that they provided for free through cable just a few months ago. Not to mention it’s not on smart TVs, app is super glitchy, and hard to use.

title: Wants to sell your info
review: So now in order to watch stuff they used to show on NBC, you know I have to give them your personal info so they can sell it to other parties. I can’t even download this on my Samsung TV. Looks like I’m watching something else from now on

title: A bunch of CROOKS!!!!
review: Out here taking off prime time premier league games from cable to put it on another streaming service in which you advertise is free but it is NOT!!!! I will not pay and I hope this whole peacock crap doesn’t work out!!!! Anyone reading this please don’t pay them!!!!

title: Can’t even open
review: I attempted to download the app, and after 5 attempts to create an account with the screen saying “sorry, try again later “ I’ve given up. Now that I’ve gone back to read more reviews I guess I’m thankful it never worked.

title: Why cant these other services learn from Pluto?
review: We just want to watch tv. Why can’t all these apps work like Pluto? Just open the app and start watching. Soon as you ask for my email it gets deleted.

title: all sound, no picture
review: That says it all. Signed up to watch the US open golf. Worked great on my 4" phone screen, but when I tried to stream it from my iPhone to my TV, I got nothing but sound and a black screen. If I wanted that, I'd just turn on the radio. Sheesh!

title: Worst app ever
review: This is the worst app I’ve ever used I signed up for the premium package to watch premiership soccer but I can’t do a mirror to my Apple TV it’s completely blank when I try to mirror it it’s like it’s blocking me from using Apple TV from my iPhone this is horrible it’s one of the biggest flaws in this app.

title: Peacock is the 2020 of streaming apps
review: So happy to see that Peacock is onboard with 2020 and decided to make access to sports and quality streaming bottom priorities with the app. I was hoping that with the increase in rates from YoutubeTV, NBC would step up its game. Instead it’s a race to the bottom and we are along for the ride.
This app is the best it doesn’t buffer and picks back up right after a commercial love it 😌‼️

title: No commercial plan should mean no commercials!
review: If I’m paying for no commercials, then I don’t want to be forced to watch stupid Peacock Commercials in between episodes! The cost of this is way to high for what is being offered.

title: Worst streaming app I’ve used
review: This is the first time I have written a review of anything. This is garbage. I am literally just trying to watch the second episode of a single show and it won’t load using chrome cast. Will not purchase until the app is functional.

title: Can’t Reset Password on iPad/iPhone
review: The password reset form blocks paste and 1Password. When I manually type the same password twice, I see a couple “loader” dots flicker briefly, then nothing happens. Hard to rate an application anything other than 1 star if you can’t log in.

title: Closed Captioning is badly timed
review: The subtitles generally either show up a second before or after audible sound. You can obviously tell this ruins comedic timing and dramatic effect.

title: Force Closes
review: I have not been able to use the app because it force closes after the loading screen. I have attempted everything I can think of, uninstalled and reinstalled along with updating my iPad, nothing has worked.

title: Bad interface
review: The interface of this app needs a lot of work. How do I see my watch list? Finding the complete list of shows is very hard. Poor design overall.

title: Streams ads to Apple TV fine but won’t stream the shows
review: Same issues that others seem to be having. Watched 120 seconds of ads for Psych but when the movie started could only get the sound picture was locked. Same issue for Brave New World.

title: Terrible quality
review: I’m trying to watch soccer and the quality to that of illegal streams. The game froze twice in the first half and I might as well be playing the original fifa game as everyone is pixelated through out. No idea how this app got an editors choice. I cannot stress how BAD the picture is with this app.

title: Its cool but.....
review:
peacock is amazing but it doesn’t have anything I like on here Maybe ad some more dreamWorks movies
and illumination movies but otherwise THIS APP IS AMAZING

title: Hate it!
review: First it made me mad that they interrupted the us open and made us have to figure out how to watch it. Now it doesn’t work to watch Yellowstone. I tried to give it one star but it won’t let me!

title: Interested in Sports? Look Elsewhere.
review: The only app we use on our TV that freezes frequently so the problem appears to be in Peacock. Very unsettling when viewing live sports. Don’t buy Peacock “Premium”, look elsewhere.

title: Absolutely disgraceful
review: NBC clearly does not care about their customers. Making them pay for an app that has loads of problems just to watch sports, and peacock is not even compatible with Roku and Firestick. No one wants to watch sports on there phone instead of the TV.

title: Greedy tossers
review: Thanks for splitting up premier league content and holding us fans to ransom. I hope you lose the premier league rights and your app fails all just because you need to try and scrub a few more bucks. And the layout and navigation of the app is horrible.

title: Total loser of an app
review: I can understand unreliable performance if the app is free. However, if it is going to cost money, it better work all the time. I’ve a 200mbps Internet service and every other streaming service is working except this one. Totally unsubscribing it...

title: Is technology traveling backwards in time
review: Unable to watch using Airplay. Was told by customer service that I can watch on the laptop or iPhone. So the whole family has to crowd around the laptop or phone?  Is technology traveling backwards in time?

title: No playback controls?
review: I am not able to rewind or fast forward while watching on iPad. And if  I switch to something else and come back to a video, it starts over.

title: Worst Bird in the Bizz
review: Only use the app for The Dan Patrick Show & The Rich Eisen Show. I chromecast each show and the app is constantly glitching, freezing, and interrupting the broadcasts. Incredibly frustrating and annoying as Fan & Rich are part of my daily routine & have never had an issue till they moved to Pecock.

title: CANCELLING SOON
review:
What is the purpose of paying to watch movies and tv shows when on the Apple TV all you just get is sound and a black screen,  this would have been better called Peacock radio!!!!

Please fix this!

title: Does not export to HDMI
review: This app is the only streaming app by a major network that doesn’t correctly export audio or video through the Apple lightning digital AV adapter. I have tried multiple adaptors and this is the only app with that problem.

title: FAIL
review:
This app is not available on Roku or any of my three different smart TVs. I tried to access it from my TV browser and it is not supported. 

The iOS app needs to allow for screen mirroring so I can watch it that way. I do not want to watch TV on my tiny little phone.

title: Constantly Crashes
review: This app is terrible. It took two hours to watch a 45 minute episode due to the app continuously crashing over and over. This is with the premium subscription by the way. Not worth your time or money.

title: Pretty crappy to have NBC behind
review: Not at all impressed! Can’t watch anything with commercials or it will just keep crashing!! My former boss can build a better app than this crap! Very disappointing

title: AppleTV vs iPhone App
review: I have to agree with other reviewers I don’t like how the Watchlist works. It should be a tab just like Browse. Also, the TV app needs to have the fwd/back 10 secs like the iPhone app does.

title: It’s barely even free
review: So I downloaded this app and made an account only to watch one movie that I couldn’t get free anything else :shrek. But it turns out that most of the shows require a paid subscription. There advertising is lying when they say that a lot of stuff is free

title: Love it!
review: It’s very nice that it is free, but with free, there’s ads, but they are at the most a minute long (for now at least).

title: Major Flaws
review:
The content they have is great. 
BUT:
• The service is missing most of the networks best all-time shows.
• The “Channels” menu doesn’t display channels it displays TV shows which you can get to from Browse instead. Waste.
• Your WatchList is buried a couple of rows under the “Browse” menu??
• If you paid for NO ads, you still get ads for PEACOCK, a service you already paid for.
• There’s only ONE profile so good luck keeping track of who in your family is where on which show.

title: Confusing
review:
They announced 7 day free but after a day they charge me 4 time, $1 dollar each time. I am not sure yet my credit card still pending them.
I like English Premier, but I hate there’s channel program. I probably move to Spanish Soccer or no more watching.

title: User not friendly
review: It’s hard to navigate through their menu and sub menus. It’s annoying to make a mistake you have to start all over again.

title: IN LOVE
review: i have been using this app for one day and it has ALL of the harry potters for FREE i love it so much yes it has some bugs but it’s free!!!!

title: Content is Not Bad, App is Underwhelming
review: At this point, we really expect streaming apps to have Picture in Picture and Airplay — this has neither.  Although it is not necessarily relevant here, it is also unfortunate that they don’t have apps for Samsung TVs.

title: Why is the video so small?
review: Why doesn’t the app make full use of a phones screen to show the video. Instead I see huge black borders around the video on my iPhone XS Max.  Go full screen on the video!

title: Cash grab!
review: Used to watch all premier league games last year now I have to pay twice for it because they decided to make an exclusive for this crappy app. Money above all, no regard for customer service. I refuse to give money to Disney for the same reason.

title: Awful crap service but they charge you!
review: What a joke ! Can’t pause or you’ll miss out, can’t record . It’s blurry for no reason and you gotta pay for it ! Well done nbc ! And they put all the good games on this crap 1982 technology ! Way to ruin football !

title: Constantly buffers. Unwatchable
review:
I have 1 gig internet speed and can’t get more than two minutes of video before buffering. It’s totally useless. 

Also, the navigation and trying to find what you’re looking for isn’t the easiest.

title: Worse than horrible
review:
Want a frustrating experience, download the app for ipad. Want to make it worse, add to appletv.

Terrible content once you’re there. Brave New World was an embarrassment as one might expect coming from NBCU. Didn’t get through a second episode.

title: No pause or Volume
review: It’s a good interface. Intuitive and easy to use however when just channel surfing there is no volume control particularly No Mute or Pause functionality

title: Hey, I got a big screen tv so my weak eyes have it easy
review: I could not throw shows on this app onto my Apple 4 tv. Would it been so hard to put an air drop of some kind!

title: Editors’ Choice
review: These “Editors’ Choices” are becoming a joke! They advertise all the stuff you can watch, then ask for your information. On top of that, they’re telling me I cannot watch with VPN. App deleted. You want me to turn off my VPN to watch, I’ll go somewhere else! Don’t waste your time.

title: Seriously?
review: What is the point in blocking the ability to screen mirror onto a TV? I have a third gen Apple TV so I cannot add the app onto it. Wanted to simply watch a movie on a bigger screen that wasn’t my phone. What’s the point in blocking this? All it does is frustrate your viewer.

title: This app is terrible
review:
1.  I don’t have Peacock for my Samsung TV and 

2.  Both Airplay and mirroring are disabled.  Garbage.  

3.  No video controls at all on live streaming.  None.  Why not?

4.  Navigation is awful.  It just comes up with a single, full screen offering from whatever is Trending (usually something stupid or it wouldn’t be trending). You have to figure out how to get to what you really want.  

5.  Why is English Premier League on this godawful platform?  I hope NBC is losing truckloads of money right now.

title: Doesn’t support basic AppleTV UI controls.
review: For instance, you can’t easily skip ahead 10 seconds like you can on nearly all other apps on AppleTV. They have access to the IOS API and they were like “nah, let’s just do our own thing...which does nothing”.

title: Not smooth
review: The only reason I bought the premium was to watch epl and honestly it’s better to watch live games on different illegal links you find on internet than peacock tv. Live stream gets stuck every second

title: Garbage app - no cast or screen share
review: Waste of money really, can’t cast or share on Apple TV from phone or iPad. They have to update or I’ll find another way of watching and stop paying for the app like everyone else I know who is stoping after the first month

title: Worst streaming service
review: Great to have all your stuff in one place! Wrong! Advertise free service then won’t allow to stream to the tv from your phone and you can’t get the shows you want without paying. More of a scam than anything else.

title: Money grab
review: Ridiculous that you have to pay to watch sports when I already pay for cable to watch NBC Sports. Literally just a money grab by NBC and insane that there’s one soccer game on and guess what? Can’t watch it unless you pay extra money for it.

title: Really, NBC??
review: This is the most un-intuitive app for sports out there. Try searching something simple like, um, today’s line-up & schedule for English Premier League matches.  EPL keyword search results show teams that have played so far - not matches, just the teams. Never a problem with NBC Sports Gold.

title: Rip off
review: Paid subscription with 5-6 mins of ad breaks every 15 minutes is the worst idea I came across for video streaming. Barely any significant content. Wrapping the same old content from all NBC channels and trying to resell is plain simple low level of greed. it’s demise imminent.

title: Peacock TV
review: I was wandering if you guys could add more bad girls club and I really you to pretty please add some more bar girls club you guys

title: Can’t sign up
review: Try to sign up get nothing but an error message telling me I error signing up please try again later. Does tell me what it is though.  Oh and I think trying it for 2 days straight after the initial try can be considered later.

title: Goodbye soccer
review: The fact that peacock will not work on hdmi adaptor is a huge loss. I have purchased every app nbc has made for the premier league. I live in the middle of nowhere and do not have internet access. Now it looks like I have to watch every match on a phone. Please fix this!!!!!!!!!!!

title: False advertisement
review:
It’s not free. Anything that’s worth watching on this app isn’t free. I’d be happier customer if I wasn’t lied to. Unfortunately, this app was made and sponsored by NBC so I should have known better than to expect something honest. My fault really. 

Don’t be like me and waste your time on this.

title: Could be good if it worked
review: Was excited as app seemed to have some good content I was looking forward to watching but it won’t connect with my Chromecast at all, just keeps failing.  Use lots of other streaming apps through my Chromecast without issue.

title: Apple TV but no Peacock App
review: If you have an older model Apple TV device it will NOT update to include the Peacock App.  You basically have to buy a new Apple TV device. I can get the Peacock App on my iPhone and ipad, but it will not mirror to my TV.  Every Peacock article and promotion says you can get Peacock if you have an Apple TV.  Not exactly true.

title: NBC, over it!!
review:
Was excited and looking forward to this for months, it does not vast to chrome cast.  Screen says ready to connect forever, plays on the device. 

Failed launch, nothing plays, NBC should have tested this prior to launch.  Very disappointed.

title: Quality
review: I clicked to watch a movie and it gave me like 160 seconds of adds and when They we’re done it just buffered and timed out and when I clicked resume movie it made me watch ads again and it kept doing this very annoying very wack

title: Streaming window
review: The streaming service is good, but when I am watching on my iPhone 11, the video doesn’t fill the screen and there is only a small window for the video.

title: Unstable
review: Running on an iPad Pro. Feed freezes but sound keeps playing every few minutes. Need to exit out and restart every time. It’s been advertised for months, not like they haven’t had chance to Beta test it.

title: Terrible
review: This app is terrible. There are too many protections. I am unable to stream from my cell phone to a tv. It is not available on my Samsung TV. It only streams to my Sony TV. Unable to open on my laptop which has a screen connected to it. Unimpressed with this rollout. Had high hopes for NBC.

title: Other profiles
review: How do I add other profiles on one account

title: Awesome Experience!
review: I’ve been patiently waiting for this app and it’s finally here. I’m in love with the content, thanks Xfinity!

title: UI needs major work
review: The player is not user friendly and lacks basic features like controlled scrubbing or go back/forward a few seconds by clicking. The actual streaming is good but the UI is awful.

title: took out scenes
review: i was rewatching the harry potter series and i noticed that they had taken out many scenes from each movie. really disappointed because i thought i had found a free way to  watch the series. besides that when a commercial add shows up it doesn’t pause the movie so you end up missing a who 45 seconds of the movie or show. and lastly the recent movie i was in the middle of never shows up on my continue watching. super annoying.

title: Not smooth
review: Frequently stops and goes, back up for no reason. I have a premium account still have to watch ad. Sometimes yellow spinner just stopped!

title: 40 minute shows
review:
Will only cast to chrome 40 of 43 minutes before jumping to next episode restarting gets another minute
Very annoying. Needs fix now

title: No way to cast to Samsung TV
review: Why on earth would you put all these important games on this app without an ability to cast to a Samsung tv?  You don’t have an app for the tv and can only cast to a google device... Just keep the important games on NBCSN until you fix this!

title: Ads
review: Ad will come on at the beginning of show which is cool I guess being I’m using the free version. The will skip the first 15 minutes and if you try start over it’s more adds and keeps skipping part of the show.

title: Can’t use it with Roku
review: If I had known it would not have worked with my Roku TV and devices I would have never subscribed.  Can’t add the App on my Sharp Aquos TV either.  Doesn’t work with fire stick.  They need to get it together.

title: Glitchy
review:
- Buffers too often
- doesn’t return to program after commercials
- navigation issues.

title: Good app
review: It’s a good app and I haven’t had any technical problems except I can’t get it to go to full screen like most other video watching apps.

title: Restrictive Accessibility
review:
Won’t allow viewing on a desktop with multiple monitors, no HDMI access, no screen mirroring to project phone to television. (Only screen mirrored the ads).

Psych fans will be disappointed if they don’t have the newest and most expensive technology.

title: Free?
review: I found this app through one of the app store pages under the home tab. They advertised it as FREE and then when i download it, i have to pay to watch certain content. I’m not mad bc i have to pay, im mad bc it was ADVERTISED as being free when in reality it kind of isn’t

title: NO REWIND OR LATE START!! - ONLY LIVE - GARBAGE
review: I paid for a full year since they are forcing good Premier League matchups to Peacock. ZERO REWINDING AND NO STARTING LATE!!! UNACCEPTABLE!! Clearly whoever created the app and functionality knows nothing about sports and necessary features. Forced to pay for Peacock Premium and it’s worthless. Don’t pay for it until they fix this

title: TERRIBLE
review: This app is only good if you like to watch stuff on your phone. You CANNOT screen share this to your tv because you will only get audio and no visuals... Honestly I’m glad it comes with a free trial because it’s not worth the money if I can’t STREAM the games to my tv off a STREAMING APP.

title: Partial English Premier League coverage
review: Peacock being an NBC owned app, I was very hopeful that this will finally be the one stop shop for all EPL games. But this is a disappointment just like the previous NBC premier league pass in previous years. At a minimum, NBC should enable a Peacock Premium log in feature to the NBCSN app.

title: Where are the shows?
review: Can’t watch already aired episodes of the current season. NBCU gives you a few weeks to watch or too bad. Guess the dinosaurs at NBCU don’t understand the desires and behaviors of people these days. Sorry your up service will be a flop.
